Summary: We just came back from a 2.5 day short stint at the Ritz in Laguna Niguel. What a beautiful and special place! We had booked a basic room using points and were offered an upgrade as Ambassador elite. We were then able to pay a small fee to upgrade to an even better two-room ocean view suite with a fire pit. A must! Totally worth it to have that experience. The sunsets were breathtaking. The room was massive and had two bathrooms, both of which were spacious. There were smores kits and coffee makers in the room along with mini fridges.   We walked down to the beach all 3 days and called for the shuttle to come pick us up at the beach shack. The shuttle was always there in less than 5 minutes and the driver super friendly.   We used the jacuzzi but not the pool. It's a bit
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Amazing views and terrific club level service
Summary: December 2022 - We visited during the holiday  season and stayed on the Club Level. The hotel lobby, lounge and restaurants are beautiful. In particular, sunset at 180Blu is spectacular. While we didn't try the two restaurants, Raya and Enosteak, neither was busy during our stay.  The views from the property are amazing.  The beach is a bit of a walk from the hotel down from the cliff but the hotel runs a golf cart-type shuttle on a regular schedule (but you can also call them directly for a ride).  Beach is well maintained and its great to watch all the surfers.  The resort has two pools but I would call them below average for a 5 star hotel.  It's clear the view and the beach are the stars at this resort. The club lounge was hands down the best part of the resort for us.  The
Room tip: Splurge for a room on the club level
Manager Response: none

Summary: Such an amazing stay! Beautiful views and a pleasant staff! Special thank you to Kevin for helping to make our anniversary weekend one to remember. Can’t wait to return! Things to note: There is a free trolley that runs from the ritz into Laguna beach!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This place is special. The staff are super. Really superb.  I guess it’s in Dana Point and it’s just a breathtaking location.  Definitely worth it to upgrade to Club-Level. And that is a staff within a staff and I can’t even tell you how amazing they are. Special note to Penni and Diane.  Water pressure in the shower is subpar and walls are a little bit thin, but so be it; that’s kind of the way most (even five star) hotels are with few exceptions so it’s not a dealbreaker here. The plusses far outweigh those two items.  Also special note to Michael P (overnight valet parking) and Arian at the Spa.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nice stay but little recognition of Marriott status
Summary: Great two night stay, huge property but still very quiet. Gym overlooked ocean.  Checked in and provided titanium number. Given 1000 points for check in bonus and inquired about room upgrade from garden view room. Ocean view available for $200/night, told it is usually $400 but reduced for titanium. In speaking with other guests at lower status levels, same “exclusive to you” tactic employed.  Emailed hotel for clarification of room upgrade and told brand does not participate. Sought additional clarification whether this meant resort specific or brand specific to Ritz Carlton. Hotel did not reply to my additional inquiry.  Overall beautiful property but don’t expect any recognition of Marriott status here.
Manager Response: Dear LAMarriottGuest,  First, we would like to thank you for your loyalty as Titanium member and we sincerely appreciate you taking the time to share about your most recent stay with us. We are happy to learn that you had a nice stay while enjoying the property’s beautiful views and oceanfront fitness center.   We do apologize for the experience you encountered upon check in regarding your room upgrade inquiry. We are so grateful when loyal Bonvoy guests stay with us and typically always try to upgrade their room category based on availability. The genuine care and comfort of our guests is our highest priority so we thank you for expressing your feedback so we may review with our team.   We do hope that you will stay with us again at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel and look forward to welcoming you back upon your return.  Warm regards, Tejas Deshpande Front of House Manager

Summary Heading: Amazing coastal view, but not a 5 star service hotel
Summary: My wife and I stayed 5 nights to celebrate our first anniversary, and we got upgrade to ocean view with Balcony as Marriott Titanium Elite. Guest experience team were amazing for welcoming gifts and lovely decoration in room. The view was truly spectacular, reminded us Hawaii ocean / mountain view during honeymoon.  But the hotel itself - the quality of the room, the staff’s attention to detail and creating a sense of hospitality, the quality of the restaurants - were not 5 star. We understand staff shortages are everywhere, especially during Christmas holidays, but for $1000 per night (or 100k points per night), that is not worthy.  The restaurants: highly recommend 180 Blu in hotel, awesome ocean view and light foods, price relatively cheap, service okay. And French brunch
Room tip: Free street parking at Stonehill Dr, 10 min walks
Manager Response: none

Summary: Wonderful stay! Was given nice suite upgrade as Ambassador which was nice. We ate at restaurant and Mary our server was wonderful! Highly recommend!  We also got a drink at bar which was great experience as well. will be back
Manager Response: none

Summary: rooms small and bland. small bathrooms.  strange landscaping prevents good views.  restaurants not great, though view from breakfast is great.  spa ok. beach not great for lounging. seems better for surfers.  location fine, very suburban, lots of strip malls around.
Manager Response: Dear Vinaydium,  Thank you for recently staying with us at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are very sorry to hear that you did not have an exceptional visit during your time at the resort. Our dedicated Ladies and Gentlemen are committed to providing the finest personal service and facilities for our guests every day at our coastal resort. We apologize that we did not meet your expectations and do hope that you will give the resort another chance in the future. We look forward to welcoming you upon your return.  Warm regards, Tejas Deshpande Front of House Manager

Summary Heading: Beautiful luxury hotel with incredible view
Summary: Went there for lunch. The hotel is beautiful and luxurious, and the view from the restaurant or the outside area is just incredible and breath taking. The food and service at the restaurant were very nice, and the deserts beautifully placed on each plate.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff are the best people on earth! Diane at the lounge totally made our girls trip so epic. Love her! The food at the lounge was very good and non stop.   We also took advantage of the yoga class in the morning. Can’t wait to come back next year!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Poor service !  Amazing view with a beautiful beach.  Tired property .
Summary: Great location. .   Average small rooms.    Superb  restaurant amazing food with a fantastic view to the beach.    But But bad service, lack of trained staff from the valet parking to the room service but the worst is front desk service.  No one knows anything and they do the lest possible to help.  Not a Ritz quality hotel !
Manager Response: Dear AlbertoMay,  Thank you for recently staying with us at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We appreciate you taking the time to express your feedback and are happy to hear that you enjoyed the location, dining offerings, and ocean views at the resort. We apologize that you did not have an exceptional experience and feel that you did not receive the Ritz-Carlton service that we strive everyday for. The care and comfort of our guests is our highest mission and we thank you for sharing your experience as we are always looking to improve. We have shared your sentiments with our team and hope that you will give us a second chance in the future to restore your confidence in the resort.  Warm regards,  Tejas Deshpande Front of House Manager

Summary Heading: Tired in spots; food not that great.
Summary: I was here for a work event for 4 days.  I’m glad as I was here for work because if I had paid (or used points) for a stay here I would be disappointed.    I’ll start with the good, which is the location. Beautiful views of the ocean and right on the beach. Dana Point is a great place of stay.  The rooms are large and the bed was comfy.   Now for the not so good: - Rooms are noisy. I could hear the person talking on either side of me. - No tub in the room I had.   - Tiny tiny balcony that barely overlooked the ocean but rather a courtyard.  - I didn’t think the food during the event was anything to write home about.  - Common areas were tired, especially the hallways had a bit of a tired marriott feel. - I was shocked by the pool areas.  Neither overlooked the ocean but rather
Manager Response: Dear BostonGirl02118,  Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback regarding your recent stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed beautiful ocean views and a spacious guestroom during your stay, however, we apologize that you had to endure noise disturbances. Regrettably, we did not meet your expectations, nor did we live up to the high standards of service for which we strive for daily.  Thank you again for sharing your feedback, we have passed your comments along to our team so we can continue to improve the guest experience. We do hope that you will give us a second chance in the future to resort your confidence in the resort. We look forward to welcoming you back for a more memorable stay in the future.  Warm regards, Tejas Deshpande

Summary: Excellent service.   Beautiful rooms.   Would stay there again.   Away from the downtown area but love how quiet and secluded it is.  Golf cart to take you to the beach was a plus.   Room service was excellent too.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very disappointed .  The interior is very outdated and needs a refresh. Kids playground was  poor excuse for a play area. Tiny and backs up to a loading dock. No place to have a meal with little ones ( 3 & 8). Took the ride down to the beach , when I was getting off I requested towels . No offer of umbrella or chairs . I figured they weren't available until I reached the water and two sets of folks had them.  I will say the personnel were amazing , super friendly and polite to the kids . We come to Dana Point every Thanksgiving week, thought I would give the Ritz a try . Back to the Monarch resort we go !
Manager Response: Dear leenieakajoekid,  Thank you for choosing to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for your Thanksgiving holiday. On behalf of myself and The Ladies and Gentlemen here at the resort, I apologize that you and your family did not have an exceptional stay with us. We are very sorry that we fell short of your expectations and hope that we can find time to discuss your recent stay. I am available at any time at your convenience. I look forward to speaking with you, please contact me at my direct line at +1 (949) 489-5839.  Warm Regards,  Andrew Dandy Recreation & Eco Adventures Manager

Summary: A beautifully located property with excellent service.   My family wanted a bit of a staycation for Thanksgiving and to celebrate my dad's birthday.   Communicating with Tiffany and Monique was a breeze and they did everything to make our stay memorable.    Checking into the hotel was a breeze with champagne to boot!  The hotel was very festive and everyone we encountered was in a wonderful mood.   We had a minor issue with our room - we discussed with Haley at the front desk and she was more than accommodating and helpful - and made switching rooms very easy!  The property is located on the beach and every restaurant, gym, walking path had an amazing view.   I would highly recommend this hotel for any special occasion or just to get away!  Can't wait to come back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Discrimination! Be safe. Don’t go there if you’re not white.   We used to love the Ritz. Stayed there for many celebrations and had afternoon tea there on many occasions.   Now… what we experienced there today is clearly discrimination against people of color. The only friendly person is the Asian man from valet guest services. He is the only one who took time to greet us and thank us for the visit. That’s how we know that the other staff discriminate.
Manager Response: Dear UndergroundFish,  On behalf of myself and The Ladies and Gentlemen of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel, I wish to extend my deepest apologies for the experience you have described. Please know that I would love to discuss this serious matter with you immediately and I am available at any time at your convenience. Would there be a time that you could share your contact information with me so that we have a private conversation? I look forward to speaking with you and if you wish my phone number is +1 (949) 240-2000, extension 5270.  Warm Regards,  Kelly A. Steward General Manager

Summary Heading: Luxury hotel that defines what it means to be 5 star
Summary: This hotel is in the perfect location right on the beach. The hotel decor and and interior design is stunning. Since it was my birthday, the concierge delivered chocolates to our room. I requested an ocean view room, but they did not have any available. That said, this hotel has beautiful rooms and defines what it means to be a luxury 5 star hotel. The only complaint I have is that the hotel gives preferential treatment to celebrities or guests that slip the front desk staff money. I was waiting in line and someone cut in front of me. The front desk staff took the money and humored the guest, helping him out without requesting that he also stand in line. Overall, the hotel is pricey, but if you do want to see what a solid 5 star hotel looks like, this hotel definitely fits the
Manager Response: none

Summary: The only thing that was disappointing is that we only got to stay for one night. Jaycee and Gui did a wonderful job checking us in. They have been so polite, friendly & attentive that we felt at home right from the start. They also were very helpful throughout our (short) stay. Chris from the bellstaff team was super quick bringing our many bags and was making sure we were taken care of before he left. The room was gorgeous and so was the view, what a great location. We enjoyed a nice lunch at the pool bar and later had  fantastic drinks on our balcony while watching the sunset, what an experience. Maria was very welcoming  and lovely at the Raya Restaurant and Sarah & Gustavo provided excellent service with a lot of love for the details. The breakfast food was amazing, I'm sure
Manager Response: none

Summary: I want to say THANK YOU to Ms. Diana Bentley for helping make my newly wed wife and I special day even more memorable. The extra little details were just the cherry on top. It was deeply appreciated! Diana went above and beyond as well as the rest of the staff at the front desk in providing us exceptional service and accommodations. Tom at valet assisted my bride with her belongings in the most friendly manner and was very pleasant to talk to. Appreciated all the little extras and the choice of room with the balcony to the beach. Thankyou all!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our stay was enjoyable and we would be sure to return here if business or pleasure brings us back to Dana Point.   We ate at three of the restaurants, Blu180, Raya & the Market Place. Each meal was delicious.  The view during the day was stunning at Raya and Blu180.  Amanda at the Front Desk was especially helpful.  Our room was spacious with an unbeatable ocean view.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have stayed at this property three times for business travel and it is consistently disappointing. Apart from the spectacular view, this hotel has no redeeming qualities. It is tired & dated, and housekeeping standards need improvement.  The in-room HVAC systems do not function properly--my room was freezing cold, yet extremely damp and humid. The air was so thick that the edges of my papers were curling from the humidity. Re: housekeeping,  on a prior stay I encountered massive wads of hair on my shower wall (which I called to be cleaned several times), and this most recent stay was greeted with small curly hairs on my toilet seat upon check-in. Speaking of check-in, they are routinely behind and leave guests waiting for their rooms past their stated 4pm check-in time.  I
Manager Response: Dear bonjourlina,  Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback regarding your recent stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are so very sorry to hear that you had a poor experience at our hotel and would like to take this opportunity to sincerely apologize for the issues you endured.  Regrettably, we did not meet your expectations, nor did we live up to the high standards of service for which we strive for daily.  We have shared your comments with our leadership team so we may continuously improve our guest experience.   Again, thank you for sharing your feedback, and we hope to welcome you back for a more memorable stay in the future.   Warm regards,  The Ladies and Gentlemen of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel

Summary: Definitely the highlight of our trip was our stop at the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel.  Spectacular ocean views and friendly, courteous, professional staff made our stay one to remember.  We were here to celebrate our 10th anniversary and we cannot thank Juliette and Diana enough from the guest relations team for the special arrangements!  Penny and Mercedes in the concierge lounge were very welcoming as well and as was Kaylin at the steakhouse - thanks for entertaining our baby and surprising her with toys!  This is definitely a busy hotel, often with multiple weddings/events going on but with its prime location, welcoming staff and extensive facilities/venues make this resort one of the most memorable in our travels.  Looking forward to being back soon!
Manager Response: none

Summary: It was probably a beautiful property once upon a time, but now it's *literally* falling apart. The structural decay is matched with stained and cracked furniture and carpet that's absorbed so much ocean air that it feels soggy beneath your feet. And the bed was so bad that it'll take a week to recover. On the bright side, other than the front desk staff who did the usual (though not for the Ritz) deception around when the room would be ready, the staff was warm and welcoming and attentive. Special thanks to the kitchen for accommodating my dietary restriction.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your experience while staying with us. I have shared your feedback with our engineering leadership team to ensure we are able to rectify the defects you noticed with the property. I am deeply sorry you were not able to have restful sleep while on property, and the bed left you with lingering effects. I have notified our housekeeping leadership team as well, so we may replace worn beds in a more efficient manner.  Providing the highest level of hospitality is our number one priority and I sincerely apologize for failing to meet your expectations. I understand we did not make a good impression, but do hope you choose to stay with us again so we may make this experience up to you.

Summary: Came here for three nights for work, very beautiful setting.  Staff was very helpful and friendly.  Food was fairly priced for hotel food, especially the patio bar.  The room service menu was lacking so consider eating out.  Plenty of food choices within a short uber ride or walk.    Roomwise, pay extra for a bottom floor room with a fire place. Comes with a water view and Smores in the room, nice touch.     Pricewise, we paid roughly $1,600 per night which is high, but was worth it.  Parking was a bit crazy at $70 a night.  Rooms come with Nespresso coffee pod machines and  water bottles every day.    Beach is at the bottom of the hill.  One issue is, the tram stops running at 7 pm which means before sunset. If you go to sunset, you will be walking back up.  Internet was solid,
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: BREATHTAKING PROPERTY, EXCELLENT SERVICE, small misses but will return again!
Summary: Beautiful beautiful property! One cannot deny this and it’s great location perched above the cliffs of salt creek beach.  BREATHTAKING  Starting with positives:  Check in process was a breeze! Jessica Miller at the front desk was THE BEST! She treated me so kind and gave me a fantastic room that met my needs exactly with the perfect location near everything I wanted to enjoy at the hotel. 5 star service and kindness!   The room was fab! It even came with a firepit and free smores which was a great bonus feature!! Soo cool!!   All meals, all restaurants and bars had great service and friendly kind staff that met your needs. Even when the rooftop crew got a little overwhelmed due to the large groups, they were sure to check in often and didn’t neglect us which was nice.   Anyone

Summary Heading: One of the worst Ritz and very very COMMON services
Summary: This is the worst Ritz Carlton I have ever stayed. This year I have stayed in 9 Ritz Brand property already, but this one is definitely not a Ritz standard. And that made me to leave my review here in TripAdvisor.  As an ambassador status, I have to negotiated several times to get the ocean view room. Yes, I have booked the garden view, but they even refused to do the complimentary upgrade to the coastal view, which they declared that is the best complimentary upgrade they could do for ambassadors. And they said if you want to upgrade to the ocean view, it would be an additional $300.  After checked into the Garden view room, I was disappointed about this. Came back to the front desk, they now offered me the coastal view room. Honestly, I was satisfied before I saw the view. It

Summary: I stayed for three nights in between leaving one job and starting another.  The people were amazing.  The service was out standing.  It was everything that I hoped it would be. I love the spa, the beach butlers and the concierge on the club floor. Thank you so much.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Such a fabulous trip. The resort is in an incredible location. The service was excellent. In particular, Tall Taylor in Raya was great. I was dining alone and he made me feel very welcome, which I appreciated. I look forward to my next visit!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Not sure a work conference could feel like a holiday, but the oceanfront-setting of the Ritz Laguna-Niguel certainly helped bring relaxation and calm to some busy days. Beautiful views over-looking the ocean - loved drinking coffee, watching the surfers, and listening to the waves each morning. Great running trails right at your doorstep. Conference facilities and catering were also perfect for what our team needed. Thank you for a lovely stay!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Been coming here the last handful of years and feels like a second home, would always recommend springing for the club level because that’s what differentiates this resort. All the folks up there are wonderful and truly make you feel special!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: An exceptional experience all around. The service across the entire resort exceeded our expectations. Special thanks to Blake, Derick, the beach valets and club staff who helped to make our first beach vacation with our toddler so special.
Manager Response: none

Summary: A beautiful property! The views were absolutely spectacular (prepare yourself for stunning sunsets!). Rooms are large and bright - I was lucky to get an ocean view room with a little balcony. The service was top notch. Can’t wait to return!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Terrible Service and Care for Guests
Summary: It has now been nearly 3 weeks since our visit and I still haven't heard from the hotel or corporate.  We were visiting the property with our autistic son for a nice family get away and I have to say the way we were treated was appalling, especially for a brand like Ritz.  Upon arrival, we went straight to the pool to enjoy our time together. The pool steps - with glass tiles - hadn't been cleaned properly and were covered in lotion / oil residue leaving them slippery as ice and within ~20 minutes I was the 3rd person to fall as I entered the pool. Unfortunately, as a result, I fractured a bone in my foot.  Thankfully I was holding on to the safety bar (which is what I kicked on the way down and what broke my foot) or I would have had much worse injuries. As I got up other
Manager Response: Dear CRM2581,  We are so very sorry to hear the details of your recent experience. The safety of our guests is paramount and we take your feedback very seriously. We will be in touch with you regarding the status of this situation, but please reach out to our Executive Office directly with any concerns. Thank you and we look forward to speaking with you soon.

Summary Heading: Fantastic Ocean Views, Delicious Food & Friendly Staff
Summary: Hello! I met a good friend for an early Sunday breakfast at The Rizt-Carlton, Laguna Niguel...and it was an amazing experience. From Troy who greeted us (love Troy and his humor!) to the staff at the Raya restaurant who indulged us (we were glued to the ocean view and kept ordering drinks and dishes) to the whole experience overall...AMAZING.  I give the manageres and staff (some are football fans and teased me about my Buffalo Bills sweatshirt) my sincere thanks for the warm welcome and care. I'll be coming back soon!  Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank you for recently choosing to dine with us at RAYA! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the beautiful ocean views, coastal cuisine, and delicious beverages. We would like to sincerely thank you for your kind sentiments expressed about our Ladies and Gentlemen, we are so proud of their dedication to ensuring every guest has a wonderful experience like the one you and your friend had. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon to create more memories at our seaside resort.

Summary: My husband and I recently visited for a mini honeymoon shortly after our wedding. We stayed in the executive suite on the club level. The room was exquisite and had two bathrooms which was so nice. We also enjoyed the club level access. Jenny, Penni, and the rest of the team were so welcoming and kind. Additionally, the food and drinks they put out every day were actually REALLY good and high quality! Their continental breakfast was our favorite but they even had sushi as a pre-dinner appetizer which was so good!  Unfortunately, the rest of the hotel wasn’t up to par. When we checked in and mentioned it was our honeymoon, all we got was a half-hearted congratulations. No free drink or perk to make us feel special. This was pretty unbelievable considering the high price tag we

Summary: I’ve been to this hotel many times over the years, and maybe it’s just COVID, but at some point are we supposed to return to old standards?   Or do we have lower expectations forever?  Hotel was under-staffed.  Food was not prepared well.  Menus listed items that were not available.   Etc.   Location remains great (COVID at least can’t change that).
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel, we can assure you that we hold ourselves to the high standard and are committed to creating the possible experiences for our wonderful guests. We are so sorry that you did not have an exceptional stay with us and appreciate your feedback as we are always looking to improve. We thank you for your kind sentiments regarding our location and look forward to restoring your confidence in the resort upon your return.

Summary Heading: Don’t be fooled by hotel name and waste your hard earned money
Summary: Can’t believe how much they charge for this place. Cigarette butts in planter, cheap flimsy patio furniture, somebody singing live music by pool all day on weekends with kids screaming and dogs fighting!! There’s some weird glass mystery box I think it houses the air conditioner, but there’s just a curtain hanging to cover up whatever is inside but the curtain is falling down ( see pic).  The trash in photo was there our entire 3 day stay. Yeah I should have picked it up but we didn’t pay outrageous fees so I could pick up someone else’s trash. The meeting rooms are beautiful and our server for our private conference dinner, Jennifer ( I think) was excellent. The beach towels and chairs and umbrellas are nice. Maybe just don’t stay next to the pool unless you like constant noise
Manager Response: First, we would like to thank you for choosing to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel and we appreciate you taking the time to express your sentiments regarding the stay. We are very sorry that you did not enjoy your stay at the resort and apologize for our team's shortcomings that you experienced. We hold ourselves to the highest standard on levels of cleanliness and would like to apologize for the trash that remained in the hallway, this is unacceptable and we have relayed your feedback to our team so it does not happen again. We are glad that you enjoyed the meeting rooms and beach amenities, however, are very sorry you were unable to enjoy a relaxing day at one of our pools. We look forward to welcoming you back and truly hope that you give the resort a second chance to restore your confidence in us.

Summary: Pros:   - spectacular views of the beach  - accessible hiking paths  - beautiful grounds and rooms  - decent business center  - lots of organized activities to choose from for individuals / children  - great for couples and families, business as well   Cons:   -- fitness center has lovely views but was rather small without many options in terms of equipment  -- location of hotel is isolated and not walkable near any stores so if you need something, you will need your car to get to where you need to go or shop  - dining options offered at hotel are not great. It's very expensive and the quality does not match what you pay for. If you're willing to take a drive, you'd be better served at nearby Laguna Beach / Irvine / Newport Beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our lovely beach path with direct access to Salt Creek Beach along with the property and amenities. We are very sorry that you were not provided with ample equipment to maximize your workout experience in the fitness center. Additionally, we apologize that the food and beverage offerings were not to your liking and understand how important dining options are to one's stay. We hope that you will give us another chance in the future and look forward to welcoming you back to the resort.

Summary Heading: Great service at an aging property
Summary: Always love to stay at the Ritz.  This one has great setting with the back of the property looking over the water.  Food was great and service was very good.  The property is aging and you can see it on all the floors, beat up woodwork and rusting metal and chipped tile surfaces.  Not at the same condition as similarly priced luxury hotels.  Still enjoyed it and would go back.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we appreciate your feedback! We are happy that you enjoyed the dining outlets and service provided by our Ladies and Gentlemen. Thank you for your concerns regarding the property, we are happy to share that we are always renovating and updating to deliver the best product for our guests. We look forward to welcoming you back to the resort upon your return.

Summary: The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel continues to be the most beautiful resort in Southern California. Public areas are very well maintained, exterior enhancements are lovely, most of all the service is most spectacular and separates from the other resorts.  Diane, Penny, Yolino, Erica and Mercedes on Club Level are best in the business. Proactive, personalized, remember guest preferences, and continue to find new ways to anticipate needs, while being warm, and genuine. Gillian at the Front Desk remembers guests year over year, and always makes a wonderful first impression of the arrival experience. Bella and John, the Beach Butlers continued a great conversation, and truly cared about the beach experience.  Over the years, while the waves crashing along Salt Creek Beach continue to
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel and continuing your tradition staying with us! We are so glad you enjoy our property year after year, and would like to truly thank you for the kind words expressed regarding our Ladies and Gentlemen. We could not be more proud of our team members that enhance the guest experience daily and provide the best personal service to our guests. We look forward to welcoming you back to the resort upon your return!

Summary: This hotel is stunning s the grounds are extensive the staff is great! The rooms are a little dated. A note about the food- There was a long line to eat dinner on the balcony just a heads up come early if you want to eat there. Also the hostess at Raya would only seat us if we ordered a full meal which was interesting. She wouldn’t allow us to just buy dessert.  Very good experience overall!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel! We are glad you enjoyed the property and service provided by our Ladies and Gentlemen. We apologize that you experienced a longer wait time for seating at 180blu and we are sorry for the miscommunication regarding our RAYA restaurant. RAYA is a full-service restaurant, however, guests are able to order whatever they would like that is on the menu at the time of dining. Our team does recommend enjoying dessert or cocktails at Bar RAYA or 180blu, but will serve these items at RAYA as well. Thank you for sharing this feedback to improve our guest experience. We look forward to welcoming you back to the resort soon!

Summary: Huge hotel.  Beautiful location.   Came here for our anniversary.   And, to escape AZ summer heat.  They put us on 2nd floor right over the party area.  We skipped our room service breakfast plans and kept our curtains drawn as the hotel staff set up for a party of about 200.  Now we’re holed up with door closed with the party & band in full swing.   We can’t enjoy our patio or even open the door.  I finally opened the curtains and am staring at party.   So disappointed.  So much for my peaceful stay at the Ritz.
Manager Response: Dear Azmve,  We would like to thank you for choosing to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel and we appreciate your feedback.  We completely understand your frustration regarding your experiences throughout your stay and are so very sorry to hear that you had a poor experience with us. I would like to take this opportunity to apologize on behalf of all our Ladies and Gentlemen at the hotel. Regrettably, we did not meet your expectations, nor did we live up to the high standards of service for which we strive for on a daily basis.    We would appreciate the opportunity to talk with you more about your experience. At your convenience, would you please contact our Executive Office at 949-240-5090 so we can gather more information regarding your stay? Thank you.

Summary: We chose this property due to specific requirements since we were traveling with our adult daughter who is a full-time wheelchair user.  Despite 2 calls to the property and  3 emails with the concierge pre-arrival, and 2 conversations with the front desk on arrival, we finally got into our room at 4:45 pm and found that the room was still not as promised despite an email trail showing what had been confirmed. After a 7 hour drive and dinner plans at 6 pm, we were stuck and had to make do.  When we quietly mentioned the issues at check out and explained how difficult it was for me to lift another adult in and out of bed and the shower, the agent apologized, but the weird thing is that he was smiling as he apologized, which was so inappropriate. It was actually kind of creepy.  I
Manager Response: First, we would like to thank you for choosing to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We know that you have a choice and appreciate your decision to stay with us. With that said, we are very sorry that you did not have an exceptional stay at the resort. We completely understand your frustration with not receiving the correct guestroom type, especially since you had several communications prior to your arrival. We apologize that you and your family were unable to enjoy a seamless stay due to our failure to deliver on our brand promise. We would like to thank you for expressing your honest feedback, we have communicated your sentiments with our team so we can improve the guest experience. We do hope that you give us a second chance to restore your confidence in The Ritz-Carlton.

Summary Heading: Indeed gentlemen and gentlewomen service! Great Laguna beach ocean view and good choice for couples
Summary: Celebrate my birthday here at the beginning of May. Ocean room has beautiful ocean view and it’s really breathtaking. Juliette got contact with me before check in and after he knew my membership and birthday, he kindly prepare a gift card and a champagne for me. Amazing view for all the restaurants and bars, especially gym. There are many other activities spots like basketball court and trail
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at The Ritz-Carlton. Laguna Niguel and for your sparkling review! We are so glad that you enjoyed your birthday stay with us and received the legendary service that the property is known for. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your accommodations, dining outlets and amenities during your stay. We look forward to welcoming you back to the resort in the future!

Summary: We arrived at the hotel after a 17 hour trip and it was a great pleasure to get our room three hours early. But. Because of the 10-hour time difference, I was going to bed early, but it didn’t work out. The room was on the ground floor and behind our patio about a meter away a guitarist was playing for the guests at the reception on the lawn. I asked the supervisor if the performer could be moved further, but the answer was: "We're having a lot of receptions here." No apologies. I went to the front desk, but the feedback was just as arrogant. I switched clerks and showed pictures of my room. He gave some credit to my account so I could even eat during reception cause sleeping was impossible. So I went to the bar to drink Gin & Tonic, which was mixed with water instead of tonic.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are glad that you we were able to offer early check in, however, we are very sorry to hear that you were unable to find some much-needed rest due to an event taking place on property. We can understand how frustrating it must have been to arrive after a long flight and not be able to relax. While the care and comfort of our guests is our highest priority, we apologize that this was not reflected in your experience. We truly appreciate your feedback and thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are constantly looking for ways to improve and hope that you will give the resort another chance.

Summary Heading: Boring, shockingly poor service, and overpriced
Summary: Terrible service. As a Hyatt Globalist for nearly a decade, I am used to great service from all of their properties. This Ritz shocked me with the low level of service I experienced. The front desk leave the phone ringing for 20 to 30 minutes when calling from the room. They didn’t have bar service by the pool so we had to order room service to deliver food to the pool area. The person who delivered the overpriced food but the pool acted like it was a hardship to deliver the food and then added an extra large tip without my consent on the bill which I then had to dispute. The parking fee was around $60/$70 per night on top of their resort fee. I wouldn’t mind paying a resort fee if there were amenities but there was nothing to do around the hotel but walk down to the beach.
Manager Response: First of all, we would like to thank you for choosing to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We know that you do have a choice and appreciate you making the decision to stay with us. While the care and comfort of our guests is our highest mission, we sincerely apologize that you did not feel well taken care of during your stay. While the pool cafe was closed during the off season, we are sorry for your experience with ordering food to the pool. We also would like to apologize for the opportunities you faced while dining with us at RAYA. We are glad to hear that one of our Ladies at RAYA provided you with Ritz-Carlton. We would like to thank you for taking the time to share your experiences with us as we are always looking for ways to improve. We deeply regret the poor experience that you had at our resort and truly hope that you will give us a second chance to restore your confidence in The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary: Our family stayed at this hotel for a few days last July for our friend’s wedding. The property is beautiful. It’s a gorgeous place for a wedding. The staff was very friendly. The workout faculty was amazing with a gorgeous view.  There’s a few eateries across from the hotel that are a five minute walk away. The beach was great as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel! We are so glad that you enjoyed the wedding at the resort along with the service provided by our Ladies and Gentlemen. Thank you for your kind words regarding the fitness center and we are happy to hear that you took full advantage of our beautiful location! We look forward to welcoming you back to the property very soon.

Summary: My wife and I had a two night get-away from the kids.  We chose the Ritz because we wanted a luxary resort on the beach away from the craziness of the city.  The resort is situated on a cliff with an easy 5 minute walk down the 150 elevation (per my garmin watch) to the ocean.  We ended up booking a regular room with a garden view and was able to upgrade to an ocean view at checkin for minimal extra cost.     Room and amenities.  The view from the room was amazing.  The room is actually feels a lot bigger than it looks online.  The room and facilities were very clean.  One negative is the balcony which is very small.  It barely fits two chairs and a table…… not a deal breaker though.  The gym was spacious with lots of equipment.  My wife loved the fact that there were
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for your couples getaway. Thank you for the kind words that you have expressed regarding our coastal paradise with a playful side. We are so glad that you were able to enjoy beautiful ocean views from your accommodations. It is also wonderful to hear that you were pleased with the workout equipment and took full advantage of our fitness center with a view! We are happy to learn that you enjoyed all of our dining outlets and were specifically fond of the pairings at enoSTEAK and the views at 180blu. We are so very proud of our team of Ladies and Gentlemen that provided you with fine personal service and attentiveness. Happy Anniversary from The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We look forward to welcoming you back to the resort very soon!

Summary: This hotel is in a must see location. The beach, the grounds, the lobby, and the work out facilities and spa are all top notch! The rooms are not huge and the cost is not inexpensive. I felt a little slighted over the cost. $1,300 a night for a small ocean view room and tiny bathroom was not the luxury I was hoping for. I have stayed at this Ritz on several prior occasions and the cost has definitely gone up.The main restaurant overlooking the ocean was fabulous and the service was superb. The town of Laguna has gone from charming to drab. Covid has taken its toll.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel!  We would like to sincerely thank you for the kind sentiments you have shared about the resort. We are so happy that you were able to enjoy the property's amenities and cuisine in RAYA accompanied by ocean views. We look forward to welcoming you back to the resort very soon.

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel and amazing service (club level)
Summary: Thank you for an amazing vacation. We stayed 3 nights in a club level room. The club staff was so warm, welcoming, and went above and beyond to make guests comfortable. Thank you Jenny, Penny, Mercedes and team… you exceeded our expectations! We’ll be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel! We are delighted to hear that you had such a wonderful time during your stay and were pleased with our Club Level Lounge. We are extremely proud of our team of Ladies and Gentlemen for providing you with genuine care and Ritz-Carlton service. We look forward to welcoming you back to the resort very soon!

Summary Heading: Service is lacking, not worth the price
Summary: First off this was our very first time at this Ritz location and we’ve heard great things. Supposedly they have beach toys for kiddos and beach chairs for the family. They did however they run out of sand toys by mid day so have to go get it early in the day.   I felt the pool service was lacking as we ordered drinks and food. The food didn’t come for an hour and Ive asked that same server (who took our order) to go check on the food. That server just kept on telling me it’s coming. Two hours later that same server asked us to close out the tab even before the food came.  The audacity of her to ask me to pay for something that never came. So I told her you better go check on it again! She reluctantly did and half hour later, she came with the food. Told me the kitchen indeed had
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for your loyalty as a Bonvoy Member and for staying at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are very sorry that you did not have an exceptional experience during your stay at the resort and appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us. We apologize for the opportunities that you experienced at our pool. We can understand how frustrating it must have been to experience a longer wait time receiving food, especially when you were out in the sun and by the pool. We also would like to take the time to apologize for your unfortunate experience with housekeeping and the miscommunication regarding dinner reservations. Our Ladies and Gentlemen are constantly striving to provide the finest personal service and facilities for our guests and are always looking to improve. We hope you will give the resort a second chance to restore your confidence in The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary: My partner and I just spent a weekend at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel and we were blown away. My partner was recently diagnosed with cancer and we needed to get away for a weekend to relax and get some fresh sea air. It's been about 20 years since I have been back at the hotel and it still has the magic that it always had. The staff at the hotel couldn't have done more for us. Elizabeth in the restaurant is such a wonderful person, she took great care of us, made some wonderful recommendations . She has a true passion for what she does. Diane and Penny on Club are the most wonderful ladies you will ever encounter. They gave us an overwhelming amount of TLC during our stay. The valet parkers were fast, efficient and very friendly.   The property itself has the most amazing
Manager Response: Thank you for your continued loyalty and choosing to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It was a pleasure to welcome you back to our seaside property and we are very sorry to hear about your partner's diagnosis. Thank you for your kind sentiments expressed about our wonderful Ladies and Gentlemen at the property, we are proud that they provided you both with the finest personal service during your stay with us so you were able to enjoy a relaxing experience. We appreciate the positive feedback and will continue to provide our guests with genuine care and comfort. We truly look forward to welcoming you and your partner back to the resort very soon to create more special memories together.

Summary Heading: Poor service, poor treatment, poor response, and absolut neglect
Summary: This pains me since I live near this property and have visited it perhaps 200 times in the past 15 years.  Our most recent, and last encounter was horrific.  Nothing anyone should be proud of but the hotel did nothing to resolve not just poor service but incompetent management at all levels.  We were disrespected by the restaurant manager, rather than fixing the issues we had which was over an hour wait for apps and terrible food, he decided to insult our wives, escalate the situation by calling security, and then lied about the incident to management who believed him.  No apology and very unprofessional by any standards let along Ritz Carlton.  It is a shame nobody seriously addressed our concerns, in speaking with GM's of other local properties there was not one thing the Ritz
Manager Response: First of all, we would like to thank you for staying at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We can assure you that the genuine care and comfort of our guests is our highest mission and we are very sorry that you did not experience this during your stay with us. We appreciate you taking the time to express your honest feedback, as we are always looking to improve the guest experience. We sincerely hope that you give us another chance to restore your confidence in our beautiful property.

Summary: We are OC locals/Marriott Ambassador members and this is our 2nd stay at this property within 2 months. Coming in for our 1-year anniversary. The stay started with super pleasant surprises from the Guest Relations team, impressed us with the amazing ocean view from both our room and 180Blu, and left us with great memories by the service provided by the rooms and F&B teams which all truly went beyond our expectation.   The most pleasant surprise is the Ritz newborn gifts, rooms set up and handwritten card left in the room. We only mentioned about our upcoming baby when inquiring about restaurant options pre-arrival because my wife has morning sickness and diet restrictions at early pregnancy stage. It is so delightful to be surprised by rose petals on the bed, balloons with
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty and choosing to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are honored that you decided to celebrate such a special occasion at our seaside property and it is wonderful to hear that you received the legendary service that our Ladies and Gentlemen are known for. We are so happy that you enjoyed the in-room surprises, delicious cuisine, and breathtaking ocean views at the resort! We look forward to welcoming you back to the resort very soon to create more special moments at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary: This was our first stay at this property and we had a very nice stay. Service was attentive and our room was clean. We dined on property for dinner, ordered room service for breakfast and walked along the beach. We will return again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your first visit to the property with great service, wonderful dining options, and relaxing beach walks. We look forward to welcoming you back upon your return to the resort!

Summary: Our annual trip to the Ritz Carlton Laguna Nigel, our favorite property in the Marriott line, has resumed after a long COVID hiatus. To our delight, not much as changed. The service has gotten better, the property well kept and the club lounge is always a must.   This time around we drove our EV Tesla and were disappointed to find that the EV chargers are non existent.  Marriott app said there was and I did recall a destination charger in 2016ish? The valet were kind enough to recommend the Superchargers 15 min away. However it is surprising that a property of this caliber, especially with nearly every third vehicle being a EV, that there was none to be seen. Four seasons down the street and even the Best Western a few miles down had one!   Food - the Market Place has gotten
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to stay with us at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the excellent service provided by our Ladies and Gentlemen along with the presentations of our Club Level Lounge and Market Place. We are very sorry that we did not have EV chargers available for use during your stay with us. We look forward to welcoming you back to the property very soon to create more special memories by the sea.

Summary Heading: Best Ritz Carlton Property on Westcoast
Summary: First, we travel all over the world and all over the county, and I usually do not write write reviews unless my stay was either really excellent or really horrible.    We've previously stayed at RC Halfmoon Bay, Lake Tahoe, Rancho Mirage, Marina del Rey, Los Angeles, and San Francisco. So basically every single RC properties in California except for Bacara which we will be staying over my daughter's spring break next week, and by far, RC Laguna Niguel was the best of all. Attentive service, beautiful property, friendly staff, nice view, delicious food- you name it.    It would have been nicer if the Ritz Kids was open or any other kid's activities for my daughter, but my daughter got the kid's mini manicure and pedicure and she LOVED it, and the lady who works at the spa was
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel and for your glittering review of our cliffside paradise! We appreciate you taking the time to share about your experience at the property and are so glad that you enjoyed our sweeping ocean views, coastal cuisine, and high-touch, personal service. It is wonderful to hear that your daughter enjoyed her Salon experience. We look forward to welcoming your family back to the resort to create more special memories!

Summary: My wife and I experienced our second stay at Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel in celebration our wedding anniversary in February 2022.  We have considered other properties, but we've had such an amazing stay back in 2019 that choosing to stay at this property was an easy decision.   Check in was extremely convenient. Alex Allert (front desk agent) had recognized that we are Marriott Platinum members complimented us for our loyalty. Alex, (very super friendly) and answered all my questions. I don't experience many hotels that remember calling me by my last name during our stay. Just amazing!  We were assigned to room # 1012. Ocean View with Firepit was EPIC!  I can't say enough great things with this room.  This is a MASSIVE property. The beautiful grounds was heavenly. I was
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel as the location to celebrate your wedding anniversary! We thank you for your kind sentiments you have expressed regarding the property as well as out team members. We are so proud of our Ladies and Gentlemen for providing you with the finest personal service, allowing you to enjoy yourselves to the highest degree. We take great pride in our resort and are thrilled that you thoroughly enjoyed your accommodations along with the amenities. We look forward to welcoming you back to the resort very soon!

Summary: This is definitely a must visit property. The staff are fantastic. Starting with the front desk. Amanda was very warm and welcoming. She took the time to go over details with us, something that you don't get often now.  The views from this property are amazing  and the property its self is very tastefully decorated. I will absolutely be returning.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel and sharing your feedback about your experience with us. We are thrilled that you enjoyed the property's sweeping ocean views and beautifully decorated halls. Thank you for your kind words regarding our Ladies and Gentlemen, we are certainly looking forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: As far as 5 star hotels go - it's just ok.  The hotel has definitely lost personality (in fact I think all of the Ritz-Cartons have).  It's now more of just an upscale Marriott.  The service is still ok, but the facilities, décor, furnishings are dated and in need of a refresh...one that's authentic to the hotel architecture and design and not just the corporate Marriott style.   We were there for my birthday and a number of our requests (private dining on the bluff for a picnic, fixing the broken firepit, an extra rollaway bed) were met with declines.  The pool was supposed to be heated, but was actually quite cold.  Never mind that it's an interior pool, so no looking at the beautiful water or sunset while you're swimming.  With that said, the view is out of this world, most
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are very sorry that you did not have an exceptional stay with during such a special occasion as your birthday. We can understand how frustrating it must have been to make requests that would elevate your stay and not receive what you asked for. We are also sorry that the pool temperature was not warm and can understand how uncomfortable that was for you. We thank you for your kind sentiments regarding our Club Level and are happy to hear that you enjoyed the ocean view around the property.  We apologize for failing to deliver on our brand promise and truly appreciate your feedback. We can assure you we hold ourselves to the highest standard and will take your words to heart moving forward. We are always looking to improve so we can give our guests the best possible experience.

Summary: We had a fun, short stay at this wonderful 5-star resort.  The Ritz-Carlton was beautifully decorated for the holidays and the location just next to the beach was very convenient.  The room was nice & comfortable, the service was solid, and the views across the beach were spectacular.  We would certainly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel! We are thrilled to hear that you were able to experience the resort during the holidays. It is wonderful to know that you enjoyed our property with sweeping ocean views, direct beach access, and high-touch, personal service by our dedicated Ladies and Gentlemen. We look forward to welcoming you back to the resort in the new year.

Summary Heading: Perfect Location, Phenomenal Stay, Pleasant Staff
Summary: I would like to give Gillian, Garrett and Angie a shoutout for the wonderful service, attention to details and the gentlest care for my pregnant wife and I during our stay at this beautiful hotel. This review is certainly overdue but better late than never.   We decided to stay at this location to rest and relax, and celebrate a pre-baby moon period. That meant a host of things, including dining luxuriously, living in tranquility, sleeping peacefully and basking radiantly in the sun. Our stay there was virtually perfect. We did run into a little bump where there was a company event planted right in the lawn area where we stayed. This created a bit of friction initially but Gillian and Angie really took care of us immensely. They gave us the option to move or stay, assuring us
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel, we know that you have a choice and are honored that you decided to stay with us! We are so glad that both you and your wife were able to find rest, relaxation, and peaceful night's sleep during your time with us. It brings us great joy to know that you enjoyed our fabulous cuisine in the dining outlets and took advantage of our yoga on the bluff experience with an ocean view! We are incredibly proud of our Ladies and Gentlemen for assisting you and ensuring that your experience was a positive one. We look forward to welcoming your family back to the resort very soon to create more beautiful memories.

Summary: Everything was perfect! The room, the view, the food, and the people who work in this fantastic property. The entire experience was gloriously exquisite!   Check-in: 5/5 The front desk associate asked if we could wait for a room as we were entitled to an upgrade. Then, they gave us all the details about the property, treated us very special, which we greatly appreciate!   Room: 5/5 The room is regal! We love the character and vibes. Clean and comfy! The coastal view from the balcony was phenomenal.   Food and beverage: 5/5 Lots of selections and all of them were superb! I couldn't say more. Just go!  Experience: 5/5 The associates were outstanding. No matter who you are, they will ensure that you will have the best experience in your life. We couldn't wait to go back!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel and for your sparkling review! We are thrilled that your entire experience was exceptional and are truly proud of our Ladies and Gentlemen for providing you with the legendary service that we are known for. From the positive check-in experience to the wonderful room and cuisine that  you enjoyed, we couldn't be more happy that your stay was outstanding. We are thankful for the memories you made while here and look forward to welcoming you and your guests back very soon upon your return to our seaside escape!

Summary Heading: The Best Club Lounge from Marriott
Summary: The Club Lounge at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel is amazing, which beats any Executive Lounge in JW Marriott or the Club Lounge at the InterContinental I have been experiencing.  For example, the seared tuna here is better than any 5-star Japanese restaurants that provide Omakase or Kaiseki in Los Angeles, including West Hollywood, or Beverly Hills, Calif.  The prime rib I had tonight is better than the high-end steakhouse like Fleming's or Morton's in Los Angeles or Woodland Hills where I have been there many times.  Surprised to me, the Bloody Mary cocktail drink one waitress made at the Club Lounge is far better than the one I had recently at a 4-satr hotel whose hotel chain is one of the top three hotels in the world.  Congratulations on engineers at The Ritz-Carlton,
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel! We are very happy that you enjoyed our Club Level Lounge and the entire experience at our oceanfront resort. We pride ourselves on being one of the best hotels in the world and your review truly highlights the best of what the hotel has to offer - from impeccable service to exquisite cuisine, cocktails, and our attention to detail. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Top Hotel in the United States
Summary: This is wonderful hotel. They have a great pool and the grounds are unbelievable. It’s probably sitting on some of the most expensive land in the world. Check in was great and the service was perfect. Took my daughter there for a mini vacation. We had a great room very accessible to the pool. It’s perfect for kids and if you have furry friends.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel and your glowing review. We appreciate your kind words and are thrilled you had a wonderful visit - from our beautiful grounds to the views and overall service. We look forward to your return!

Summary: First time at Ritz as Gold Tier.   We were warmly greeted, acknowledged for our tier, but they didn’t have any availability for an upgrade.    Rooms are decent but there were so many events going on at the hotel.    We rarely have a night out without kids and wanted to celebrate our anniversary in peace and quiet.   Unfortunately, this isn’t the resort for that.  Our garden fireplace room was directly facing a wedding Buffett (probably 50 yards from our room fire pit.  We kindly asked for another room and they found another room on the other side of the hotel.  When we got there, we saw another event setting up…again maybe 50-100 yards from the pit.   Again, not an ideal getaway if you’re looking for peace and quiet.   We tried to get our original room back but they already gave
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty and choosing to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We're happy you felt acknowledged and welcomed at arrival. However, we sincerely apologize for the excessive events and noise levels outside of your room. We can see how frustrating that was since you were there to celebrate a special anniversary with a beautiful fireside guestroom. Thank you for taking the time to express your feedback as we are continuously looking to improve. Again, we are very sorry for not delivering on a peaceful experience and hope you'll give us a second chance to restore your trust in us.

Summary: A quick and easy getaway from San Diego and our first trip as a family of four. The hotel is beautiful and there are plenty of things to do. Our 2 year old loved the pool, beach, and playground. We dined at the market and cliffside restaurant everyday.  The staff was so warm and kind to my son who can be a bit rambunctious.  They gave him s throughout our stay and on a particularly cool afternoon, one of the waiters went out of his way to track down a hot chocolate for him.  Staying at a nice hotel can be stressful with little ones but this was such a pleasant and easy going trip thanks to the wonderful staff.  A perfect getaway for these tired parents :)
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We know you have a choice and are fortunate that you chose to stay with us. We are glad that our Ladies and Gentlemen exceeded your expectations by elevating your son’s experience and ensuring you received a relaxed atmosphere during your stay. We look forward to welcoming you and your family back to the resort very soon!

Summary Heading: Truly an exception experience and property
Summary: We had an overnight stop at this Ritz and by far, hands down the best service. Valet was courtesy upon arrival. Larry, the doorman, greeted us and our puppy with dog treats and presents. Harrison was super fast during check-in and showed us our way around on property with the map. They also offered an upgrade and accommodated a room near grassy area for our puppy. Tom, our bell hop, was spectacular and showed us the hidden coffee bar and fridge in our room. He also showed us how to start the fire pit. We had a great meal at both 180blu (Christian and Allan) and Raya during our stay. Highly recommend this property. Treated so well and definitely lived up to our expectations as a Ritz. We will be back again for sure and hopefully, greeted with the same courtesy!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We're so glad you had a wonderful visit and enjoyed our genuine service from our Ladies & Gentlemen. We're happy we could make your stay a memorable one and look forward to your return.

Summary: This is a great place to stay if you want to relax!  Took the family for a week stay and had a blast in and around the Ritz, this was our first stay and we loved it.  To my point, Penny upstairs helped us with everything we needed, mind you we had a great time at the beach because of Penny.  My family raves a bout the Ritz and begs to go back soon .  You will not be disappointed , my point was, families can find many activities and fun stuff, my wife found out about a trolly service from Penny and what a Hoot!   For relaxation this is your spot, breakfast lunch and dinner the Ritz has you covered.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel! We're thrilled you had a great experience at our oceanfront resort and enjoyed our genuine service from Penni on our Club Level. It sounds like you had a wonderful time exploring the local area, the resort amenities, and dining! We look forward to your return and continuing to make lasting memories with you!

Summary: Ive stayed at this property several times. As a Bonvoy member i was disappointed that the lounge access is no longer part of the stay but an upgrade at an additional cost. The room i was provided was located by the small pool, my balcony provided ample space to enjoy the outside. My room was clean and i always enjoy the robe. Service was fantastic as always.
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty and choosing to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We're glad you enjoyed your visit with us and our legendary Ritz-Carlton service. We look forward to your return.

Summary: Luxurious hotel, excellent service, superb location, attended a wedding on Friday and Saturday evenings.  Everything is pricey but I guess you get what you pay for.  Gorgeous pool and jacuzzi, nice gym with cardio and weights with lovely views of the beach.  The spa was closed.  Several wedding were held this weekend but that didn't bother us.  We did not get an ocean view room and chose a  pool/garden view with a balcony which was nice and less expensive.  I posted some photos.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We're so glad you had a wonderful visit and enjoyed our amenities, from the pools to the ocean view fitness center and our overall beautiful location. We look forward to your return and creating more lasting memories.

Summary Heading: Only Stay if you are attending  wedding.
Summary: Will start by saying we left our first night there.  We arrived on a Friday, unaware there were 4 weddings scheduled Friday snd 4 Saturday of our stay.  We walked into our room and saw a wedding directly beneath us.  Called the front desk and was put on hold for 30 minutes (this happened multiple times).   BTW- this happened with spa also.  We called 3 days in a row because no one answered and no one called us back.    I digress -   We were assured the party would go inside after the ceremony.  What she neglected to say was the ballroom is open so you hear everything,  The worst part is that they had a drone flying to take pictures and it was flying right OUTSIDE OUR LANAI AND WINDOW.  This is a horrible breach of privacy.   We were told we could not move anywhere because the 4
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to express your feedback regarding your visit with us last month. Feedback like this is invaluable as we are constantly looking to improve. We sincerely apologize for failing to deliver on our brand promise and providing a wonderful experience. We can imagine how frustrating it was to show up with multiple events onsite, loud noise levels, delays in wait times, plus more.  We have shared your feedback with our team so that we can do better and resolve these opportunities so this doesn't continue to happen. We hope you'll give us a second chance and allow us to restore your confidence in us.

Summary Heading: Disappointing—not up to par with Ritz-Carlton brand
Summary: I did not want to believe the reviews on here, but they are true. This hotel is nowhere close to what you expect from a Ritz and not worth the price. The service and rooms are about the level of a cheap hotel, the only good thing is the view of the ocean. If that’s all you want, this is the place for you. The room was small, old, and the shower didn’t drain properly and immediately flooded several inches when used. Worse, we had to call THREE times over 24 hours to get someone to come repair the shower (even though the first two times we were told someone would come to fix it). We also spent 20-30 minutes waiting for the valet every time. We spent the first half of our trip at the Waldorf Astoria just a mile away, and it was worlds apart, far more like the luxury you’d expect at
Manager Response: We sincerely apologize for failing to deliver on our brand promise and our legendary Ritz-Carlton service. This is not the standard we hold ourselves to and we can imagine how frustrating it was to experience the long wait times and overall service. We are very sorry and disappointed in ourselves. We thank you for taking the time to express your feedback as we take this to heart and want to do better. We welcome you to contact our Executive Office directly so we can further discuss and restore your confidence in us.

Summary: Soooo, where to begin? I guess we will start with the attempt to make a reservation? My husband, who is a marriott titanium member, for what it’s worth, and i were attending a wedding in Laguna Nigue/dana point. We opted to stay at Ritz Carlton [“RC”] given it was actually the less expensive option—we used an obscene amount of points +$600 to get us a “garden king fire pit” [normally $1200 w/o points] room—free s’more kit. Yay. Anyhow, we drove down from LA and since bride and groom had thoughtfully set the time of the ceremony at regular check-in time for all hotels on planet and RC refused to give us an earlier check in time [even tho we offered to pay to get in 2 hours earlier] to change into our black tie optional clothes, we decided to book room for previous night even tho
Manager Response: Thank you for your patience with our response. We want to start by saying that we sincerely apologize for failing to deliver on our brand promise. From your reservation experience to pre-arrival and being onsite, we can imagine how frustrating it was to feel uncared for with continuous mishaps along the way. We are disappointed in ourselves. This is not the level of service or overall experience we know you were expecting nor is this the standard we hold ourselves to. We thank you for taking the time to express your feedback from beginning to end. While we wished you had a much better experience, we take your thoughts to heart as we are constantly looking to improve. We have shared your feedback with our team and have implemented new practices so this not happen again to you or our guests. Again, we sincerely apologize and hope you'll give us a second chance so we can restore your confidence in us.

Summary Heading: Sadly, the end of a once great brand.
Summary: Once a great and reliable brand, I’m afraid Ritz Carlton is no more. Here for a conference.  Here’s how my first morning started - woke up and TB didn’t work. Coffee maker didn’t work. I called the front desk and am on hold for 20 minutes. I elect to send a message on the app. I call for room service breakfast. 1 1/2 hour wait. Still have the call to charge $5 “delivery fee” and 21% tip.  Mistakenly leave my “Do Not Disturb” sign out (my bad). I call at 4 and ask of housekeeping could make up my room, and apologize for my mistake. Am told housekeeping ends at 4:30. Really? At a Holiday Inn, yes. At a Ritz Carlton?  Apparently their ladies and gentlemen went home.   Sad, I used to love and rely on the brand. I’ll go to the Montage next trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for your patience with our response. We sincerely apologize for failing to deliver on our legendary Ritz-Carlton service and the mishaps from the in-room coffee maker, delayed wait times, and lack of housekeeping. You should not have to experience that and we are very sorry. We thank you for taking the time to express your feedback. We are constantly looking to improve and want to be aware of this so we can do better. We have shared your review with our team and have implemented new practices so we can resolve these opportunities moving forward and ensure you have a wonderful visit from start to finish when you're here with us.

Summary Heading: No benefit of being platinum Bonvoy
Summary: Went there with a group, when we checked in, we asked if we could get a better view, ie water, since we are platinum and chairman level with the time share. We were told we had an upgrade already, hard to believe since we were looking over the gardens, we had a  smaller balcony then the people next to us. Beside the fact that they did not treated us as platinum members, the hotel is very nice, big room, clean, friendly staff and beautiful location, we had breakfast at the cafe, nice selection, pricey of course but you are at the Ritz
Manager Response: Thank you for your patience with our response. Thank you for choosing to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel and your continued loyalty. We sincerely value your commitment to our brand and sincerely apologize for not recognizing you throughout your stay. This is not the standard we hold ourselves to and want you to know that we truly appreciate your continued support. We thank you for taking the time to express this feedback. We've communicated your thoughts with our team so that we can do better moving forward.

Summary: We were here for a work reward trip and it was unbelievable from arrival to departure.  Amazing views, perfect weather, friendly service with a smile in every interaction.  I would absolutely stay here again and can’t wait to bring my kids on the next trip.  The beach is mostly locals and there was very little to no obnoxious blasting music, which we have experienced at almost every beach on the east coast.  The people in this area love and respect their beach and ocean and everything in and around the hotel is spotless and clean.  The only thing that was a little weird was we had a master suite with an ocean view and there was no refrigerator or coffee maker.  But we honestly didn’t care as the room was so amazing in every other way.  Treat yourself and stay at this hotel at
Manager Response: We appreciate your patience with our response. Thank you so much for your kind review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We're thrilled you had a wonderful visit with your family, enjoying our beachfront location, amenities, and overall genuine Ritz-Carlton service. We look forward to your return.

Summary: The view, setting, drinks and dessert were just perfect. The staff was courteous and we had a fantastic time. Would recommend this place to all for all occasions. An excellent place to celebrate all events. Price is affordable for where it is.
Manager Response: Thank you for your patience with our response. Thank you for visiting us at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We're so glad you had a wonderful time, enjoying our cuisine, service, and beautiful views. We look forward to your return and creating more memories with you.

Summary: This is luxury. The very definition. Spectacular views from everywhere in the hotels, stellar service with dignity and class. Every room and hallway seem different and unique! Stunning pools and overall exactly what u imagine in a 5 star resort.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel and for your patience with our response. We are so happy you had a wonderful experience, from our beautiful oceanfront location to our genuine service and overall amenities. We look forward to your return.

Summary: My husband and I were married at the Ritz Carlton, Laguna Niguel 20 years ago.
