We decided there was no better place for us to spend our Anniversary than the magical place that we had exchanged our vows. I was able to get in touch with Leslie Harper who was part of the amazing Ritz Event Team and she contacted Management for us to make them aware of our arrival and the special celebration we would be staying for. Upon arrival, Kyle upgraded us to a beautiful ocean front suite much like the one we stayed in on our wedding night. He had the room ready for us with an early check in and we decided to begin our celebratory weekend with lunch at Raya. When we finished our lunch they brought us a delicious complimentary chocolate souffle with a chocolate Happy Anniversary sign on top.
Manager Response: Thank you for your patience with our response. Thank you so much for choosing to celebrate your anniversary with us and choosing all those years ago to get married at our location. That is such a special memory and we are thrilled that we could create a wonderful, memorable experience for you on your 20th anniversary. We look forward to welcoming you back and creating more lasting memories with you and your husband.

Summary Heading: Go for the view and proximity to the beach but don’t expect true five star accommodations or amenities
Summary: My wife and I stayed to celebrate our tenth year anniversary, and we went for an executive suite ocean view room. The view is truly spectacular, right above a wonderful surf spot. The location is amazing - a quick 7 minute walk to the beach, with a small electric cart available if you’re not interested in hiking down the hill.  But the hotel itself - the quality of the room, the staff’s attention to detail and creating a sense of hospitality, the quality of the restaurants - were not remotely 5 star.  It felt like a slightly above average hotel with some fancy amenities bolted onto the side. We give the hotel a benefit of the doubt - coming out of the pandemic, they’re likely facing staff shortages like everywhere else, and the hotel hosted two weddings in a weekend. But the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to express your feedback and your patience with our response.  We are very sorry for not delivering on an exceptional experience, from our room product to cuisine/cocktails, spa, and the overall attention to detail, along with exceeding expectations that we promise our guests. We failed you and take full ownership for not following through. Again, we sincerely apologize and thank you again for sharing your thoughts in detail. We've reviewed them since you shared your feedback and have adapted new practices and menu selections so we can do better and continue to deliver on the promise of The Ritz-Carlton brand. We hope you'll give us a second chance and allow us to restore your confidence in us.

Summary: Disappointing stay overall.  Lifetime titanium member   -Checkin I was told that a ocean view room is available for additional fee. I passed. I was upgraded to a suite in Cancun and multiple locations in Asia for no additional cost. Was upgraded to much better rooms (not suites) in Santa Barbara and Lake Tahoe all in the past 3 months.   -Dining I dined at Raya 3 times ( 2 dinners and 1 breakfast) The maitre d’ were excellent. The waiting staff lousy 2 of the 3 times. Really just not what you’d expect at a place like this. Super slow due to no staff   -Beach / Pool No staff to be seen. Understaffed.  This is particularly apparent at the pool. Shocking to me to see no staff at the pool at all. The beach you don’t expect much given they tell you beforehand that there is no
Manager Response: Thank you for your patience with our response. We sincerely apologize for failing to deliver on our brand promise and providing excellent service. This is not the standard we hold ourselves to and we can imagine how frustrating it was to experience the wait times and overall lack of service throughout your visit. Regardless of the current environment, you should not have to experience any of this and we are very sorry. We thank you for taking the time to write this review. We take it to heart and have implemented many new practices over the months to ensure a seamless, legendary Ritz-Carlton experience. We hope you'll return and give us a second chance.

Summary Heading: One of the best in California
Summary: My husband and I live in the Southern California and decided on the Ritz because we wanted to stay within a few hour drive and be right on the beach.  I'd read some mixed reviews on Tripadvisor but went forward anyway because of the location and I'm very glad we did.  We stayed in a club room with a beautiful view of the sunset and it was delightful to be able to hear the waves.  The club lounge had a pleasant selection of breakfast, lunch, snacks, and desserts (as well as a wide variety of alcoholic options)-- though it was not quite as extravagant as some of the Ritz spreads you see in Asia or even J.W. Marriott clubs we've seen around North America.  The staff there was very friendly and the club room itself was lovely with nice views and a few different cozy seating areas.
Manager Response: Thank you for your patience with our response. We appreciate you choosing to stay with us this past summer. We're glad to hear that you had a wonderful stay on our Club Level, enjoying the ocean wave sounds outside of your room, our friendly staff, and our selection of food and beverage options. We apologize for the A/C noise levels and have addressed this with our team so your return is much more pleasant. We thank you for taking the time to express your positive experience and look forward to welcoming you back soon for more lasting memories.

Summary: This is our go to place in Laguna and have been staying here since 2016.  Since our last stay in November, they updated the carpets and the entertainment center.  Best hotel views in Dana Point by far.  Will continue to stay here for many years to come.
Manager Response: Thank you for your patience with our response and for choosing to return to stay with us. We're glad you had another wonderful visit, taking in our stunning views. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: This was the most disappointing luxury accommodation experience, to my surprise!!! I was booked for 3 nights and checked out after the 1st night.  Do take into consideration the covid situation that may have likely affected my experience. It is an expensive nightly rate, plus $50 parking fee (no other parking option) and $50 resort fee despite having most amenities unavailable due to covid restrictions. The property is immaculate and the staff were friendly, but for luxury resort, seemed somewhat disinterested.  The property sits on a bluff with amazing views, but not directly on the beach. There is a shuttle to the beach, but inconvenient.  The room was small and clean but dated with double beds - not 2 queen beds - 2 double beds - so parents of children would be cramped in a
Manager Response: Thank you for your patience with our response. We sincerely apologize for the poor experience you had at our oceanfront resort and for failing to deliver on our commitment to deliver excellent service and an overall beautiful experience that's of value to the price point. We thank you for taking the time after your visit to share your feedback. It's invaluable to us as we are constantly looking to improve. Since July, we've returned many resort amenities and hope you'll give us a second chance so we can restore your confidence in us.

Summary: Once again, Ritz delivered! We stayed for two nights and enjoyed our stay a lot. It’s a bit pricey and would think there would be more poolside amenities. Staff is friendly. The location is the best! Look forward to coming back for another staycation!
Manager Response: Thank you for your patience with our response and for choosing to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We're glad you had a wonderful visit and enjoyed the pool, our genuine service, and the beautiful oceanfront location. We look forward to your return.

Summary: Enjoyed having couple cocktails & light dinner cocktail Lounge.Ken,Bar tender with  Jose.They were courteous & professional.Glad to enjoy back at the Ritz Carlton. Family fun trip. Atmosphere & activity was more pleasant & full of energy.
Manager Response: Thank you for your patience with our response. Thank you for choosing to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We're happy you had a great trip with your family, enjoying our craft cocktails, legendary service, and overall amenities. We look forward to welcoming you back to our oceanfront resort for more lasting memories with your family and loved ones.

Summary Heading: Great venue, marvelous location! It’s a can’t miss for business ,vacation, famiy or romantic!
Summary: Great venue, marvelous location! I’ve stayed here more then 50 nights through the years and it always impresses me. My family had another memorable stay. 15 nights and wish it were longer.  The staff, management and culture of the venue is second to none.  See you soon.
Manager Response: Thank you for your patience with our response and your continued loyalty to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are thrilled to hear that you had another wonderful experience at our oceanfront resort! We cannot wait to welcome you back.

Summary Heading: Some of the staff is excellent, but the overall value leaves something to be desired
Summary: My wife and I made our first trip anywhere after COVID restrictions were lifted and we settled on this resort not too far from home, but far enough to make it seem like a trip.  There were ups and downs, but for the price you have to pay, I was left a little flat. But it could be that I was expecting perfection and that's hard to do in these transitional times.  I should start praising the best service we received which was from the "beach butler" service. My wife really wanted to get down to the beach, but she's has some back and knee problems that made it hard for her to get down the stairs that you needed to take to get to the shuttle that takes you to the beach. The woman driving the shuttle got us set up on the beach with chairs and an umbrella. And she and her colleague
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel and for your patience with our response. We're glad you experienced our genuine care with assisting your wife at the beach and returning to the resort. We sincerely apologize for the miscommunication with your bags and the lack of food options. We have since added more dining options, online reservations, and robust menu offerings. We thank you for expressing your feedback when you did as we always are looking to improve and immediately shared this with our team and made adjustments. We look forward to welcoming you and your wife back.

Summary: Got lucky because my Father-in-Law got upgraded to be on the Club Level of the Ritz-Carlton in Laguna Niguel/Dana Point.  Club level serves complimentary beverages, alcohol, espresso, hor d'oeuvres at breakfast/lunch/dinner/dessert hours. And the hor d'oeuvres were actually very good. For example, chocolate covered strawberries, chicken salad, cocktail shrimp, salmon california rolls were tasty and of good quality. There is also a candy bar. So, we didn't even need to pay for meals.  Pool was at a nice temperature of 80 degrees. There's a golf cart ready to shuttle you to the nearby beach.  There's views of the ocean all over the hotel, including at the exercise gym.  Nice decor...felt like Hawaii but without the humidity.  All of the staff were super polite and kind and
Manager Response: Dear Angela, thank you for choosing to stay with us and for your kind sentiments! Our Club Level is one of the best in The Ritz-Carlton collection and we are thrilled you had the opportunity to experience our service and exquisite food and beverage presentations. It sounds like you thoroughly enjoyed our breathtaking ocean views and amenities to the fullest. We look forward to your return and creating more lasting memories with you and your family!

Summary: This is a beautiful property. We were upgraded to a coastal view suite and it was perfection. Recently renovated the design was relaxing and luxurious. Only complaint is that it didn't have a bathtub, but I'll survive!  It really bugs me (and not just at this property) is the very expensive fees added ($60 to valet and an additional $50 resort fee). Definitely going back!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel! We are so glad you had a wonderful experience in our newly renovated suites. I'm sorry you weren't able to experience a tub. Some of our other room categories feature bathtubs and we'd be happy to accommodate that request when staying with us again. We look forward to your return!

Summary: Wow. In hotel school, you learn about the greatness of the Ritz Carlton brand. You hear about the two time baldridge award winners, the Mystique program, the discretionary account staff has to create a wow, the anticipatory training everyone goes through and the ladies and gentlemen serving ladies and gentlemen mantra. Yet, normally, the Ritz has always been a very fine product - sometimes very, very good. This time it was magic. I don’t normally write reviews, but Ritz Laguna Niguel deserves even this small token of recognition.  We are staying for one night for our 9th anniversary with our 14 month old on the marriott discount rate - so ordinarily not a hotel’s highest level of VIP. I am always nervous about how traveling with our little tyke will go.  We were given a quiet
Manager Response: Dear Patrick, thank you for choosing to celebrate your 9th wedding anniversary with us! We are thrilled you had an exceptional visit and had the opportunity to experience The Ritz-Carlton service like you were taught in school. Our genuine, high-touch service and culture is what continues to make The Ritz-Carlton a leader in luxury industries. It makes us happy that you had the opportunity to celebrate such a special memory with your family at our resort. We cannot wait to welcome you back for more lasting moments!

Summary: At first when we checked in, we were wowed by the hotel, all the staff was super friendly.  And everything ended there.  We paid for an upgrade to ocean front view with fire pit on ground floor.  got to our room, first, my keys didn’t work.  The room was DIRTY and DUSTY.  I wiped it down with Clorox wipe and it was black.  The counters, the doors were SO dirty, drapes are stained, carpet was dirty and stained, the mini fridge is rusty, dirty marks all over the tables and counters.  The fridge we had asked at check in was forgotten,  Called to inquire about it again and our packages too. Now comes the kicker.  They didn’t tell us there will be a wedding rehearsal right now AND a wedding tomorrow RIGHT outside my door.  They were looking right at us and us at them.  I have to
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. First and foremost, we sincerely apologize for the poor experience you had at our oceanfront resort, from the uncleanliness to the disruption from our onsite events. We are disappointed in ourselves and failed to deliver on our brand promise of uncompromising levels of cleanliness and creating memorable experiences for our guests. We thank you for taking the time to write this review as we are constantly looking to improve and have shared this feedback with our Ladies & Gentlemen so we can grow and do better moving forward.

Summary: This is the place where you can feel disrespected, berated and unappreciated as a guest all at the same time. From the rudest waitress at the restaurant that’s half empty telling a group waiting for few more people to join them for dinner to literally get out or order now, to a valet that takes half an hour to retrieve your car, not even a slight indication of apology. The most arrogant, snobby, disrespectful staff for most part. Absolutely never will stay here again or recommend it to anyone. This is the worst of treatments we got from any hotel we ever stayed in. We are pretty down to earth and easy to please so to get this review from me says a lot. I have no idea how this kind of service can even be associated with The Ritz name.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We sincerely apologize for our lack of genuine service, respect, and care, along with failing to deliver our brand promise. No one should ever feel this way and we are very disappointed in ourselves. We appreciate you taking the time to share this feedback with us as we are always looking to improve and have communicated this review with our teams so we can ensure this doesn't happen again. If you'd like to further discuss, we invite you to contact our Executive Office directly so we can restore your trust in us.

Summary: Edris Ekhlas and Melissa Langley,  I want to sincerely thank you both for accommodating my wife and I during our first stay at the Ritz Carlton in Laguna Nigel on May 4, 2021 through May 6, 2021. I wanted it to be special for my wife who turned 50 years of age and you both exceeded my expectations by making it an enjoyable and relaxing stay. Words cannot describe our great experience over our two short days and I owe you both a great deal of gratitude. Every touch you both made to make this a memorable experience special has convinced me that the Ritz in Laguna Nigel is a definite return destination for us moving forward on a regular basis. Thank you both from the bottom of my heart and if there is anything I can do for you, please let me know. I would like to provide you both
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to celebrate your wife's 50th birthday with us! We are happy that you truly enjoyed our first-class Ritz-Carlton service from our Ladies & Gentlemen. It's because of them that defines our brand and makes a visit to our resort special and memorable. We will be sure to share your kind words with them, and look forward to welcoming you back to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for more lasting memories!

Summary: Beautiful hotel in a perfect location, great memories with a wonderful beach, but it’s almost 40 years old. And it shows its age in many subtle and not so subtle ways. Lobby renovation is great but considering the value of the property is close to $1 billion it would be smart to modernize further.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are happy you enjoyed our beautiful beachfront location and made new memories with us. Thank you so much for your candid feedback about the property's enhancements as we are constantly looking to improve and keep the experience fresh in a modern,  warm environment. We have shared this with our team and look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: My husband and I stayed here to celebrate his 50th Milestone birthday this past week.  As a titanium elite member, I reached out to the guest relations team of Melissa Langley and Edris Ekhlas to request a complimentary upgrade in advance of our stay.  Edris was extremely warm and pleasant.  He was able to accommodate my room request with a gorgeous ocean view.  He also welcomed us with a charcuterie platter with chocolate truffles for my husband’s birthday.  What an elegant touch! Many thanks Edris! We were also greeted very warmly by all of the hotel personnel, including the valet, concierge, front desk, restaurant and housekeeping teams.   The beach and hotel grounds were clean and well-kept. The beach shuttle was very convenient.  We enjoyed every minute of our stay!  Below
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your loyalty and choosing to celebrate your husband's birthday at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel! We are so happy you felt appreciated and cared for by our Ladies & Gentlemen and enjoyed our beautiful oceanfront location, newly renovated guestrooms, and overall genuine service that defines The Ritz-Carlton. Additionally, we appreciate your candid feedback and insight, as we are constantly looking to improve the guest experience. We sincerely apologize for the disturbance during your pool experience and lack of additional food and beverage options. We have communicated these areas of improvement with our team so we can adjust and provide an overall better experience. Thank you again for staying with us and we look forward to your return for more lasting memories!

Summary: Me and my husband were on a date night here and we had never stayed at a Ritz Carlton before. We had high hopes that it would be better than staying the Four Seasons or Pelican Hill. Sadly, it fell very short from my expectations. On the bright side the view from our room was amazing. Our room was on the ground floor, outside it had a patio with our own private fire pit with a view of the ocean which was wonderful. What diminished the level of luxury was was the serviced we received during our stay. First of all, in the restroom there was a foul smell - only to find our there was feces on the side of the toilet bowl that had not been cleaned. When we called the front desk it took at least 10 min to reach them (by calling multiple times), thankfully they switched our rooms right
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty and choosing to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We sincerely apologize for not delivering on our brand promise and the many shortcomings you experienced throughout your visit. This is not acceptable for us either and we appreciate your candid feedback as we are constantly seeking to improve. We want to make this right and invite you to contact our Executive Office so we can further discuss and restore your confidence in us.

Summary Heading: Just not worth staying here during Covid
Summary: It’s a shame that this lovely property simply doesn’t have their act together during Covid, not even close.  As a result I would not advise that you stay here until they make changes.  They have one open restaurant, and they won’t take dining reservations, even for hotel guests.  As a guest of the property your only option is to wait in a rather long line and hope for a table.  When we were at this property two weeks ago the wait was approx.. 30-60 minutes.  It would be an easy solution to take reservations for hotel guests – apparently, they just don’t value their guests and specifically they want their guests to go off site to eat lunch and dinner.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We sincerely apologize for our shortcomings and for not delivering on the promise expected when staying at a Ritz-Carlton hotel. We are disappointed in ourselves but appreciate your honesty as we're constantly seeking ways to improve. We have shared your feedback with our Ladies & Gentlemen and are looking forward to reopening more of our dining outlets when it is safe, so we can offer more options to our guests. Please reach out to our Executive Office directly as we'd like to make this right and restore your confidence in us.

Summary Heading: Great location but disappointed in some ways
Summary: My husband and I decided to spend a night at the hotel for a mini getaway over the long weekend.  I was told when I checked in that I could not get the room that I preferred when I first booked the room because the hotel was full.  They offered me some credit card points back in return though.  Masks were required inside the hotel everywhere as the signs indicated, but there were plenty of people lounging in the public areas without their masks on (just a note for the more COVID-conservative).  Our room was mostly clean, but we discovered that the drawer in the night stand was broken, and the fridge door was rusty.  Sometimes it's the little things like that that show us the hotel may need to take a closer look at maintaining their rooms at 5-star quality.  Also, the text
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and honest feedback. It’s incredibly invaluable to us as we’re constantly seeking to improve and want to ensure our guests receive the high-touch service we promise to deliver. We’re sincerely sorry for our shortcomings during your visit. It is not the standard we hold ourselves to and we are saddened that you had to experience this during your weekend getaway. We’re glad that still enjoyed our beautiful oceanfront location and fireside garden view guestroom. The outdoor fire pit provides the perfect touch to end the day. We welcome you to contact our Executive Office directly to further discuss and to restore your confidence in us.

Summary: We just returned home after a 5 night stay at the Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel, we took our two dogs (Large labradors) and stayed in the gorgeous Fireside Ocean Front rooms.  Melissa Langley, the Guest Relations Coordinator, emailed us before our trip to ensure all our needs were met, she went above and beyond to make our stay perfect. We had our meals mostly with room service and the food was delicious, and  promptly delivered. The hotel was spotlessly clean, the staff were pleasant and keen to help, the overall atmosphere was calm and very relaxing, we didn't encounter anyone not wearing masks. We really couldn't have had a better trip. We will certainly be returning. Also the location of this hotel is ideal, the views of the coast are breathtaking, the easy access to the beach
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing about your positive experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are thankful that you and your pups chose to stay with us. We are thrilled that you felt safe and thoroughly enjoyed your entire visit - from the pre-arrival experience to in-room dining, stunning ocean view setting, and our high-level, Ritz-Carlton service. It sounds like many lasting memories were made and we can't wait to welcome you back so we can continue to make more memories with you and your labradors!

Summary: Book with Amy G! She turned a one star review into a 5 star review!  I drove down in the Tesa X and I was under the impression that they would charge my car because I would have to be towed out of there otherwise, I must have spoken to at least 3 people regarding the charge...well, as it turns out we wake up to ZERO charge but 20 excuses.
Manager Response: Dear Bill S, thank you for your review and for sharing your excellent experience at The Spa with one of our lead therapists. After recently reopening this past weekend, we are thrilled that you thoroughly enjoyed your treatment. However, we are very sorry about your vehicle's charge and where we fell short. We pride ourselves on high-touch service and are disappointed that you did not experience that. We appreciate your feedback as we're always looking to improve and will share about this opportunity with our Ladies & Gentlemen so this doesn't happen again.

Summary Heading: Did not live up to my expectations.
Summary: My husband and I went to celebrate our sons birthday. We wanted to just get away for the weekend and felt that the Ritz would be a good and safe option considering we’re still going through a pandemic. The ocean view suite we stayed in was great. What was unsettling were the guests I saw indoors without masks. There were several people along hallways not masked and people eating at tables without any masks when to my knowledge, indoor dining was still not allowed. We went the weekend they started allowing outdoor dining again and despite their claim to continue a safe social distance, people were seated right next to each other. My husband and so have stayed at tons of Marriott brand hotels and it was not up to by standards for a Ritz. The walls in the room were very thin. I
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to celebrate your son’s birthday at our oceanfront resort. We know you have many luxury hotels to select from and we’re grateful you chose to stay with us. We sincerely apologize for where we fell short, from the lack of mask enforcement and social distancing to the noise complaints. Our guests’ safety is our highest priority and we are very disappointed to hear that you did not feel safe during your visit. Please know that we take this very seriously and are communicating this concern with our Ladies & Gentlemen so this doesn’t happen again. We invite you to contact our Executive Office directly so we can make this right and restore your confidence in us.

Summary Heading: Amazing Ocean Suite upgrade for Ambassador Elite birthday stay
Summary: A replacement birthday celebration -- in lieu of our canceled Utah trip last weekend -- was the incentive for our first ever stay at the Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel just a 20 min drive from our home. Despite being booked on a discounted 45K points award, the hotel graciously pre-upgraded us more than a week in advance to its amazing and aptly named Ocean Suite -- the 2nd best specialty suite in house. #AmbassadorStatusMatters  As usual, we brought our dog with us -- all 112 lbs of him. The hotel graciously waived the pet fee due to my Ambassador status and short stay. We saw many dogs in the hotel, so this definitely is a popular dog-friendly resort.  We found the hotel to be far more tranquil and relaxing than we'd expected -- especially considering how many times over the years
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your loyalty and thoughtful review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We value your feedback and the amount of detail you shared with us about your entire experience. We know there are many luxury hotels to visit and we are thankful you chose to stay with us on your birthday with your pup. It sounds like you truly experienced our personal, high-touch, and exceptional service The Ritz-Carlton has become known for, taking full advantage of our beautiful location, dining, and amenities. We sincerely apologize for where we fell short with the black-out shades, in-room phones, and water temperature, but glad our Ladies & Gentlemen and mobile chat app helped expedite your concerns. We’re glad you felt very safe and enjoyed a relaxing birthday getaway with us. We can’t wait to welcome you and your pup back to our resort for another wonderful experience, and to create more lasting memories with you!

Summary: We just did a one night stay to celebrate our daughters 11th Birthday and had such an amazing time.  The room we stay in was newly remodeled and they did an amazing job.  We left our dogs at home, but we love that this property is pet friendly and are hoping to bring our new puppy on our next visit.  The best part about this property in my opinion are the employees.  They are all so friendly and always go above and beyond to make each stay memorable.  I would especially like to recognize Jordy!     We can't wait until our next visit.  Thank you again for everything!
Manager Response: Dear Greggfi626, thank you so much for choosing to celebrate your daughter's birthday with us! We appreciate your thoughtful review. It looks like you had a wonderful time celebrating and were well taken care of by our Ladies & Gentlemen. We can't wait to welcome you back and your pup, as we're very pet-friendly and love showering our four-legged friends. We look forward to your return and continuing to creating meaningful memories with you and your family!

Summary: This is a breathtaking property in a beautiful location. We had one takeout meal from Raya restaurant and room breakfast and it was all terrific.  All the staff we interacted with were super helpful, knowledgeable, and extremely pleasant.  And while the hotel was quiet during our mid-week stay, we saw excellent adherence to COVID protocols and guest safety.  If you're an Angeleno looking for a beautiful break without a long drive or plane ride, you should consider a getaway to Orange County and the beautiful Ritz!!   We had a couple of minor complaints with our room and expectations - and the staff members we dealt with were SO responsive and helpful - providing not just an explanation, but solutions that were helpful and meaningful.  We couldn't have been happier with how they
Manager Response: Dear Sunseeker0221, thank you so much for choosing to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We appreciate your honest and thoughtful feedback. We pride ourselves on delivering personal and genuine service and it looks like you truly experienced that to the fullest at our oceanfront resort. We're glad you felt safe, well taken care of, and enjoyed our beautiful location, excelled food, and interactions with our Ladies & Gentlemen. We look forward to your return and creating more memories with you!

Summary: We went to stay on our anniversary. We asked to switch rooms. The said no problem and that it would take about 5 minutes. We waited and waited and waited. We finally called and the said they will be right up. Still we waited. then we called and nobody answered the phone. Then I walked all the way down ( the elevators are far from the room where we stayed). They finally said they send someone up. The bellman finally showed up. I don't like being lied to. Ground swere nice. Hotel was nice. Very disappointed in the service. Ruined our anniversary.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to spend your anniversary at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel, as we know you have many options of luxury resorts in Southern California. It is unfortunate to hear that you were disappointed by your experience, particularly our service. This is an area that we pride ourselves in, and we sincerely apologize for the extended wait times you experienced to switch rooms, which put a damper on your overall experience. We value your feedback and are continuously looking to improve. We will be sure to share this with our Ladies and Gentlemen to ensure a much smoother visit, and we hope you give us another chance to prove ourselves as the leading luxury resort you envisioned.

Summary Heading: Wonderful Experience at this Property - celebrated daughter's 8th birthday
Summary: My wife and I experienced our first trip to the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel. in celebration of my daughter's 8th birthday  This was our first visit and we are already in love with the property. We stayed for 1 night and without a question, the service was exceptional. The hotel staff seems to make EVERY effort to attend to your needs.  The front desk staff Ana, Bria, Koryssa, Angie, and Chandler made sure that our stay would be a memorable experience and they delivered. The staff definitely went well above and beyond during our stay.  I didn't expect all the extras including having a complimentary room upgrade. My daughter received a gift bag in our room as soon as we entered. Wow!  We enjoyed breakfast, lunch, and dinner at the Raya. James K. was such an amazing host. We had
Manager Response: Thank you for your glowing review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are so delighted that you and your daughter left with many positive memories while celebrating her eighth birthday at our luxurious oceanfront resort. Our Ladies and Gentlemen take pride in going above and beyond to ensure an extra memorable experience, and it was our honor providing you with a room upgrade and gift bag to make the birthday celebration extra special. We are delighted to hear all aspects of your visit were enjoyed to the fullest from our luxury service to dining at Raya. We look forward to welcoming you again for an equally as wonderful experience at our serene beachside oasis.

Summary: Having never stayed at a Ritz,  we had high expectations for service and surroundings. The hotel location cannot be beat.  We arrived around 3:00 and we were received with “welcome to the Ritz Carlton” which I loved.  The  lobby is pretty and somewhat understated.  The flower displays are very well done.  We had hoped for an ocean view upgrade but our garden room overlooked the small pool (room 3005). The service was good, however it wasn’t over the top.  People were very helpful.  The highlight for us was sunset at the fire pit.  Stunning view and not crowded.  We dined in the hotel and ordered a dinner of small plates (swordfish dip, lobster tacos, ceviche and shrimp). All fantastic and honestly not as expensive as I had expected.  The service at dinner was top notch and the
Manager Response: We appreciate your thorough review of your recent visit to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It delights us to hear that you enjoyed many details and aspects of your visit, from our lobby’s magnificent flower displays to indulging in delicious small plates and of course, the magical experience of watching the sunset at our fire pits. Our Ladies and Gentlemen are committed to providing you with top tier service, and we will certainly take your valuable feedback into consideration so that we may provide you with unparalleled luxury service upon your return. We very much look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable oceanfront getaway.

Summary: We had a fantastic stay for our honeymoon especially thankful to Alex Baxendale and his team. Everything was perfect and they went extra miles to make sure the best stay for our honeymoon.  We are looking forward to staying there soon.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel to spend your special honeymoon weekend. It was our pleasure going above and beyond to ensure your stay was luxurious and memorable through our personalized service. We look forward to welcoming you back for another magnificent getaway in our serene surroundings.

Summary: We arrived at the property and welcomed with the biggest  smile by CATHERINE at front desk. She wished my wife Happy Birthday as this trip was a surprise for her and she upgraded us to an Ocean view room with amazing view of the Ocean. Catherine made our trip special and my wife was wowed by her friendly and sincere welcoming to Ritz Carlton. We had dinner at 180 Blue. Tommy our server was great and the food was excellent, but the best was the view we felt like we were in Monaco. Raya was an amazing experience as well our server Joel gave us tips of the local area and recommended few must see local spots like the Top of The World which we went hiking. We had an amazing time and will be back with kids in our next visit. Thank you team Ritz Carlton .
Manager Response: We are absolutely delighted to read your review. It was our pleasure upgrading you and your wife to our luxurious ocean view room in honor of her special day. Our Ladies and Gentlemen work diligently to ensure an unforgettable experience, and it sounds like you left with many positive memories. Aren’t the ocean views at 180blu fantastic? Dinner is more than a meal, but an unforgettable experience when you pair our elevated food with the serene atmosphere. We hope your wife had a splendid birthday, and we look forward to your return with your family for more magnificent adventures.

Summary: My wife and I celebrated our 19th wedding anniversary at the Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel and we stayed in an ocean view room with stunning views that are incomparable to any other!  We were graciously welcomed by Nasime and Alex who even prior to our arrival and during our stay, checked in on us regularly ensuring that our needs were met.  Their kindness and attention to detail really added a personal touch to our stay and showed that they genuinely cared about making our anniversary weekend special.  We enjoyed lunch at the Raya which had amazing views of the Pacific and refreshing cocktails and incredibly well prepared food.  The hotel did a phenomenal job keeping guests safe, requiring masks in public areas, and providing hand sanitizer, etc. Finally, the accessibility to the
Manager Response: On behalf of all our Ladies and Gentlemen, thank you for sharing your wonderful review. It was our pleasure to go above and beyond to ensure a luxury experience during such a special anniversary weekend. We pride ourselves on personalized and attentive service and are delighted to hear your needs were met throughout your visit. From cocktails at Raya over Pacific views to walking along the sugary sands of our beach, it sounds like you left with many great memories to look back on. We look forward to your return and sharing our magical surroundings with your family.

Summary: My opinion initially regarding the room was unimpressive. The room was small and dated for a Ritz Carlton but that was my only complaint. We were upgraded to a gorgeous suite after the first night. The service was always top-notch and the flowers were a gorgeous touch. We loved the location on the water. It was a short beautiful walk to the beach. On the walk they have chairs and towels to use on the beach---very convenient.  Excellent food options:  180Blu has a deck with a view where we took our breakfast from the cafe--amazing experience. We also ate at RAYA --the filets are pricey but delicious. Aside from the room the hotel is fabulous.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. It delights us to hear that you enjoyed our beautiful oceanfront grounds as it is the perfect setting for a relaxing vacation. We are also elated to hear you enjoyed a variety of our dining options from filets at RAYA to breakfast on the serene deck of 180blu. Please know that we are continuously enhancing our resort, and we will keep your feedback in mind when it comes to upgrading our rooms. Thank you again for sharing your review, and our Ladies and Gentlemen look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: My first negative review for a hotel.   We stayed overnight in August, driving down from LA to Dana Point with our two little children, eagerly awaiting some relaxing time.  Having stayed here in the past.  Unfortunately, the hotel was completely overwhelmed, due to a combination of covid restrictions and poor planning.    Since the restaurants weren’t allowed to be open for service, there was one long line at the cafe (over one hour) and a two hour wait for room service.   The line for the outdoor bar wrapped thru the hotel.  In essence, we were told that our best option was Uber eats.    So, with two children we essentially spent 24 hours in our outdated room having to either call out for Uber eats or go to a valet with a 30 minute wait to get the car to track down food.
Manager Response: We are disheartened to read your review, especially as you are a loyal and valued guest. You put your trust in us for a relaxing and special family getaway, and unfortunately, we fell short in many aspects. We apologize for the inconveniences you experienced when it came to our restaurants, room service, and communication. As we pride ourselves on luxury and attentive service, we sympathize with your expectations not being met. At your earliest convenience, please contact our Executive Office so we can address your concerns directly and reassure you that this will not happen again. Thank you again for your loyalty and we look forward to speaking with you to make this right.

Summary: We live in San Diego & frequently visit Dana Pt/Laguna. As such, we are on many of the local email lists - including the Ritz-Carlton.  Recently, we received a promotional email - a fire-side room with a view for $499 in late October.  But Really it is $595 after the resort fee/tax.   We had to call >5 times to reach the Front Desk to add notes (like King Bed & late checkout @ 12 noon).` So we reserved the fire-side room for our anniversary (in notes). We had to book for a Monday night to get the DEAL.  When we arrived, the place was empty due to Covid.  The Front Desk "bait & switched" - telling us we would get a garden room with no view.  When we showed them the notes/confirms - they said "no problem; we will upgrade you to the fireside room".  ONLY THEY CHARGED MY CREDIT CARD
Manager Response: We are deeply concerned to read your review. We know you have many choices of luxury resorts in Southern California, and you put your trust in us to make your anniversary getaway special. As we pride ourselves on attentive guest service, we understand that this is completely unacceptable. We would love the chance to directly address your concerns regarding your recent visit. Please contact our Executive Office at your earliest convenience so we can sort this out and make you feel confident in returning for an improved experience.

Summary: My boyfriend and I enjoyed a beautiful stay cation at the ritz Laguna and loved it! The food and staff were excellent!! We enjoyed the spa and stocked up on products as well as visited the pools! We can’t wait to stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed a magnificent staycation with your significant other among our romantic beach surroundings. From oceanfront dining and relaxing at our spa to the attentive service of our Ladies and Gentlemen, it sounds like many memories were made. We look forward to your return!

Summary: The good: recognized bonvoy  status and upgraded room. The so-so:  very limited food menu, probably due to covid. The negative: $50 resort fee and $55 parking?!? They are doing a good job of cleaning, and the pools and gym were open. The big draw us the view, and the fact that Marriott sold their nearby competition (St. Regis). If you are an   Elite bonvoy member, check your benefit chart.
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty to our brand. As a valued Marriott Bonvoy member, it was our pleasure upgrading your room and providing you with an elevated experience. We are continuously updating our protocols and will keep your feedback in mind regarding our prices and food menu. Thank you for bringing this to our attention, and we look forward to welcoming you back for a five-star experience in the future.

Summary Heading: There are better hotels out here
Summary: Can’t say that I loved it. We had a beautiful view but the rooms are dated.  Breakfast starts at 8. Why not 7? I’m from nyc I wake up at 5 am. Because of the time difference. I don’t wanna eat croissant from the coffee shop. I want a normal breakfast.   There’s no coffee station. You can only buy coffee which I find ridiculous in a hotel 1000/night.
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest review. We are disappointed to hear certain aspects of your visit were unsatisfactory, including your room and breakfast. We will certainly keep your feedback in mind when updating our resort and adjusting our protocols to keep guests like you in mind. In the meantime, feel free to contact us directly to address your concerns so you feel confident in returning again in the future.

Summary: Note - you cannot add a review to the Marriott site unless you are 'invited' to do so - fishy.   My wife and I wanted a luxurious get away. We decided to splurge on the Ritz Carlton.  The place is a dump. Every door, doorway, corner, baseboard etc in the halls have been damaged for years and covered with many sloppy layers of point.  Our room had a 'lovely' view of an artificial turf lawn. The room was spartan - missing key furniture one would expect.  The walls were stained.  The artwork was water stained. Room service got every item in or our order wrong.  The bathroom didn't have a proper shower - glad we didn't have any issues stepping into a slippery tub. There were no modern bedside options for charging devices, let alone convenient outlets.  The highlight had to be on the
Manager Response: We are very disheartened to read your review. Summary Heading: Celebrating another birthday at my fav place!
Summary: For the past 8 years I have been coming to the Ritz to celebrate my birthday and it never disappoints! From the amazing concierges to the front desk, restaurants, fitness center to gift shop, etc. everyone has always been exceptionally welcoming! It is honestly my favorite place in the Laguna/Dana Point area. Salt Creek beach is the perfect spot to watch a sunset and go for a morning stroll! 5+ star and obviously will return! Thank you for another amazing vacation!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review and your loyalty to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel—it is always our pleasure to host you. We agree that Salt Creek Beach is a beautiful place for a moment of serenity—we are lucky to be surrounded by so much beauty and delighted to share it with wonderful guests like you. Summary: I'm sad and disappointed about my experience at the Ritz Laguna Niguel. I will start by saying that the locations is obviously beautiful, even though you don't' event feel like being by the beach when hanging out by the pool. It's really tucked in and because of that it could literally be anywhere. There rooms are very outdated. Not only are they old but our room on the first floor by the floor smelled moldy. The furniture is all ruined and does definitely not portrait a 5 star resort. The "mini bar" is empty, there's not even water for purchase (not saying free). The pool area is not fancy at all. There chairs don't have any cushions which I would honestly expect at a Hotel of these levels. There's no service by the pool area either. You have to literally stand in line and
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback. We appreciate you taking the time to express your disappointment. You put your trust in us for a relaxing getaway at our luxury resort, and we are saddened to hear we fell short of those expectations. Summary Heading: Worse than no vacation at all?
Summary: My husband and I checked in here for two nights for our wedding anniversary, and within the hour had decided that it would be better to check out after only one night. Our level of disappointment at the quality of the hotel cannot be overstated.   We started in a garden view room (ocean rooms were fully booked), and came to a tiny, dated, and underfurnished room overlooking a small concrete pool area. When the bellman saw our faces drop, he said "I'm seeing what you're seeing here, but all the rooms are like this." We called to upgrade to a suite (which we paid to do) but found only minimal improvements.   The furniture in the room is worn, with visible holes in the upholstery of the chair and a giant crack through the coffee table. Both rooms were weirdly underfurnished, with
Manager Response: Thank you for your thorough review. We are saddened to hear the details of your experience, especially given this was such a special weekend for you and your husband. We know you have many choices of luxury resorts in Southern California, and you put your trust into us for a pleasant anniversary getaway. As a leading luxury resort, we hold ourselves to very high standards and are unsettled that you felt anything less than comfortable in our guest rooms and throughout our resort, driving you to check out early. We understand and sympathize with how this affects and limits your overall experience. In the meantime, please reach out to our Executive Office at your earliest convenience so we can address your matters directly and ensure your faith in choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel in the future.

Summary Heading: I expected a lot more from a Ritz property
Summary: When one thinks of a Ritz hotel, they think of beautiful rooms and top-notch service. At this particular property, a lot is lacking. I stayed in an ocean view room (which had a beautiful view), but the room was very outdated. It appeared as though furniture had been taken out of the room, which was odd and made the room feel empty. What made it even worse was the level of noise. It was a connecting room, and we could hear everything next door. We heard little kids screaming and a mother cursing till the late hours of the night and early morning the next day. There was no sound barrier between the two rooms; we could see right under the door.   We had room service delivered every day, and the food was always good. We also ate at the outdoor restaurant overlooking the ocean a few
Manager Response: We are disappointed to read your review. As a leading luxury resort, you should feel pampered, relaxed, and well-attended-to throughout your visit. It sounds like your experience, however, left much to be desired. We apologize for the inconvenience that took away from the luxury experience of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel, including the noise from your ocean view room, long wait times, and the disruption from the wedding parties on site. Please know that we take your feedback very seriously and will communicate this to our Ladies and Gentlemen as we continue to enhance our resort as well as adjust our protocols during these unprecedented times. Summary Heading: Breathtaking location and view - Hotel overrun by weddings
Summary: The hotel was packed.  I think our biggest problem was with the amount of wedding events.  They had wedding events taking place all weekend.  This is a wonderful property for a wedding, but they don't have a lot of outdoor space.  So when they are having events, setting up an event (started very early), cleaning up after an events they are really inconveniencing other guests.  For example.. an outside area that had a wedding reception the night before still hadn't been cleaned up the next day at 1pm with garbage all over the lawn.  Another area had workers at 7am setting up making lots of noise right outside of guests rooms for another wedding.  We couldn't take the golf cart up the steep hill to the hotel because of a wedding.  We couldn't use another area because of wedding
Manager Response: Thank you for your review on your recent experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. While we are delighted to hear you enjoyed the serenity of our ocean surroundings, we are disappointed to hear of the shortcomings that took away from experiencing full relaxation. We pride ourselves on top tier luxury service, and unfortunately, you were unable to experience this. We apologize for the noise disturbances from the wedding parties as well as the wait times you experienced at the pool, as every guest should feel like our first priority. We will communicate this feedback to our Ladies and Gentlemen as we continue to adjust our protocols and enhance our resort. Should you wish to address your concerns directly, please do not hesitate to reach out to our Executive Office. Thank you and we look forward to welcoming you back for an improved experience in the future.

Summary Heading: Melissa and Ana saves my visit!
Summary: We were so looking forward to bring back at the Ritz after 20 years for our girlfriend getaway. I booked us into an ocean view with patio fireplace room for two nights over Labor Day weekend. It was crowded!  Boatload of people crowded the pools. Beach was covered with people. All OK until our ocean view was taken over by these weddings on the (fake) grass between our little patio and the ocean with dozens of guests!  The first night was ok as they moved the party to an adjacent yard for the dinner and after party... at 11:30 pm the grounds crew came by with loud blowers to clean up the million rose petals on the ground... Sigh. OK. Then at 10 am the next morning the crew came back to set up chairs for a second wedding! OMG I couldn’t believe it. We came to have peace, quiet and
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing the details of your recent experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. First and foremost, we thank you for putting your trust in us to enjoy a relaxing girlfriends’ getaway. While we are disappointed to hear your visit started off with us falling short due to the noise of back-to-back weddings, we are pleased to hear that our Ladies and Gentlemen were able to seamlessly turn it around. We pride ourselves on going above and beyond for our guests as your satisfaction is of utmost importance. It was truly our honor to move you to a larger space in order to round out your vacation on a much more positive note, topped off with wine and delicious room service. We hope you will visit us again to experience the full luxury of our oceanfront resort in all of its peace and serenity. Thank you for being a valued guest.

Summary: We came here to relax.  When we got there, there were 2 weddings going on, so there were a ton of people with minimal social distancing.  We were able to get our room then stood in a line for 45 minutes to get our keys to check in , while the lady at the front desk got keys for a lady who just walked to the front of the line ( which was why we were standing in line for 45 minutes) ..we got to our room and the wedding was right outside our balcony .  The wedding was so loud until 10 pm. It was a beautiful location ; however not so relaxing.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: COVID protocols are all smoke & mirrors
Summary: What a surprise, the big corporation claims it is going "above and beyond" with COVID cleaning protocols while the reality is quite different.  The common areas in this hotel are a breeding ground for spread.  The staff does not enforce non-compliance of mask wearing and social distancing is frequently violated.  Long lines to eat are met with people all huddled together with barely 6 inches, let along 6 feet of separation.  An indoor area for eating is primed for super-spreading events with tens of people in a room without masks and inadequate ventilation.  A TV in a bar was allowed to be used for people to watch a game, with fans cheering and shouting.  I only hope that they actually did clean our rooms as promised, but there's no way to know that for sure.  It's asinine
Manager Response: We are deeply concerned to hear the details of your recent experience. You put your trust in us to protect your wellbeing in order to enjoy a relaxing vacation, and unfortunately, we fell short. The safety of our guests is paramount during these challenging times, and we take your feedback very seriously. We would love the chance to speak with you directly to address your specific concerns of social distancing throughout our common areas as well as our enhanced cleaning procedures. Please contact our Executive Office at your earliest convenience. Thank you and we look forward to speaking with you soon.

Summary Heading: I won't pay for the overprice..
Summary: The room was priced 972 USD/night when I stayed here, plus 50 USD/day as a resort fee and 55 USD/day as the only parking option.  As a Titanium member, there were little to no upgrade as expected. We were accommodated to a room with pool view ( luckily, not those at the end of the hallway which has no view but priced at garden-pool view). The room was OK but slightly outdated.. The bath was spacious however, the face tissue was very cheap: Tissue dust came out for every use which was a shame for such luxury hotel.  There was a wedding or similar activity at the south lawn, facing the sea.. Hopefully you wouldn't have such noise when you paid extra for the ocean view.  Resort fee of $50 USD/day was ridiculous since the resort amenities were heavily cut due to the COVID-19...   I

Summary: Book this place for my birthday celebration. When I made the reservation they asked are you celebrating anything. I mentioned it's a milestone birthday. While checking in no mention of my celebration. No late check out for Gold status. Restaurants were not opened due to COVID. Went to the beach and received a chair and umbrella which we had to set up ourselves compared to Monarch Beach Hotel who sets up the chairs for you. More luxury st Monarch. The Ritz is a nice hotel but not luxury enough with the vibe. Rather stay at Montsge or Monarch Beach.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We just stayed for the Labor Day weekend, to get away and relax.  Our room was a Club Level Oceanview King, for the price of $955/night, excluding the extra $200 a night in fees, so really $1155/night.  Our room was overlooking the wedding reception area facing the south, and there were receptions both nights we were there.  Along with the loud music and microphone pulsating right outside our room and balcony, the set-up crew started at 7:00am and were hammering, drilling, banging until the reception started, so we were not able to enjoy our balcony AT ALL the entire weekend.  We were gone from our room both Saturday and Sunday for upwards of 6 hours during the day, and neither day did our room get cleaned.  We had no coffee pods to make coffee in the room.  The Club Level,

What the website doesn’t tell you... pool is by check in only, you might wait 1 or 4 hours. Or you may not get to visit the pool at all. But you will still pay the $50  daily resort fee. The spa is closed, the gym is closed, there are 3 restaurants open. All have the exact same menu. All have a line. Oh, in-room dining also has the same menu as the open restaurants. Mini bar empty. Everything is call for this, then you call for that and nothing shows up. The manager Blake is always called as an escalation point. But he doesn’t show up. It was such an unfortunate experience. If you’re gonna open with caution, be more

Summary Heading: Disappointing, should not be called a Ritz property

I returned to the lobby to request a different room that wasn’t as far away as possible and didn’t have a balcony covered in overgrown tree branches. I was given another room just a few doors closer, but still far. As others have mentioned, the rooms are dated and it looks like furniture has been removed. The hotel also hosted several events while I was there including a loud party with DJ that was directly outside my room.  I checked out 5 days early because the experience was so poor. You have to wait 20 minutes to get your car from valet (and that’s after they answer the phone which doesn’t always happen on

Summary: This hotel is perfect if you want to spend an evening at the night club.  It’s loud, parties and groups of young people in rooms, and weddings/events outside your balcony booming music loudly until late night.  Cant even hesr the TV in your room because of the noise.  Thus hotel is NOT for anyone wanting a calm night overlooking the ocean.  Walked past groups in halls not wearing masks (someone hands out a mask when you walk in to hotel, but no one enforces anyone not wearing them).  No evidence that room is sanitized appropriately.  Also, outside my room there were young guys walking about in rooms and barefoot talking about snorting Adderall in the rooms.  Also, mobile check-in doesn’t work when you arrive.  Then you have to go to front desk to tell them, then you have to wait

Summary: We stayed here on a Sunday over Labor Day weekend to celebrate a birthday. This has been the most disappointing stay at a resort ever! When we pulled up to the hotel there was a very long line and we had to wait quite a bit. There was more wait to check in at the front desk. Room was still not ready. I saw them offering bottled water to some guests but not us. When we went to the pool, there was another long line to check in. You have to be put on a wait list and there’s no guarantee they will even call you and be able to use the pool. We went to the beach instead and finally get a text that our room is ready.  We were told at 3:30pm they won’t be able to shuttle you all the way up again because of the wedding. Our room was on the first floor by the pool. It was a very small
Manager Response: Thank you for your thorough review, and choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for a special birthday celebration during the long weekend. Waited for 20 minutes to pull up to the hotel to get valet parking, waited another 25 minutes for 1 of 2 front desk representatives to be free so we could check in.  We’ve been waiting for 3 hours on a waitlist to sit by the pool.  Went to the beach, which is public and there are thousands of people competing for spots.  Back to the pool 3 hours post-check-in, after hard negotiating we get a chair (and we’re made to feel lucky).  Ok I’d like a $22 cocktail by then pool...no wait staff...get in line for 17 minutes.  Wait 9 minutes for your drink.  This is what you should prepare for.  If you’re

But here’s the thing: you can’t charge full fare ($1000/night in our case) when restaurants, fitness facilities, concierge lounge and spa are all closed.  Also, room service food was good but served in paper bags with plastic utensils. Even without the pandemic this RC is not worth the money. We had an ocean view room. View was great, room dated and small. Also, curiously, there was very little furniture in the room which made it uncomfortable to hang out in. One club chair and a desk chair. No table or sofa. Only one of us could sit comfortably at a time.  Sadly won’t stay here again. As

Paid for an ocean front room put in a room with a big wall on one side.Did not complain. This is VERY DISTURBING, BLOOD DROPS IN OUR BED WHEN WE PULLED UP THE COVERS.  This is really outrageous. Unheard of. BIRTHDAY trip, so very dissapointed as were my children.  Room change at almost 10pm all luggage, shoes, toiletries had to be moved to another room CLOSER to the big wall. If you dont want to risk being at a Resort that might potentially ruin your vacation PLEASE STAY AWAY!!!!  We work so very hard, cleanliness, time with your family and special moments are so important, this was really bad.  Posting pictures of blood droplets in bed. BLOOD IN BED, PAID FOR OCEAN

Summary: We are so disappointed with our stay. It wasn’t anything like we had dreamt about and saved for. The hotel is on the older side and the rooms are under whelming. You pay for the location of the property and the beautiful view. Left there a little broke and a little heartbroken.

Summary: This is the first time we have stayed at a Ritz property for a special occasion and it was completely ignored. When i booked I spoke to the front desk let them know it was our anniversary. Talked to another woman about plans while here she knew and had no thoughts of any activities or restaurants. Then when we checked in with Carissa at the front desk she knew. For our elite status and the money we paid I’m so surprised no note, no champagne or desert any acknowledgement. So if you are looking for a place for a special occasion expecting the regular personal touch Marriott/Ritz usually does don’t count on it from here.

I brought my dog along for this trip, and she was in heaven. Every morning we had a beautiful walk around the property followed by a coffee and croissant as we sat outside and enjoyed the sun. Yoga and Pilates were offered and that was included in the resort fee. The pool was nice and they have figured out a nice and efficient system to get food and drinks over to people in a safe way. I feel like during this pandemic they’ve found really great ways to give their guests a nice experience. The rooms would really be
Manager Response: First and foremost, thank you for your loyalty. The staff is working their ass off to make sure you have a quality stay. It’s obvious they are light staffed but those that are here do a wonderful job. Will definitely come back to this property in the future. Thanks to the staff for the baby gifts, made us feel very

Odd room layouts, cheap furniture and not anything more than a mid range

Either be open with a coupe of restrictions(which I understand like not having indoor dining or the spa open) but everything else needs to be up & running. This is unacceptable.

Summary: My daughter and I were in California back in February when she got on the Price is Right and we went down to Laguna for a night. We stayed in a club level ocean view room and it was amazing. We did not try the restaurants because we were on the club level, but they had wonderful locations as well. We saw the surfers in the mornings from our balcony. It was a fantastic trip. The staff was so nice and we felt very safe with the celebrity like security walking the ground. :) The bathroom was unbelievable.

Pool staffkeep everything very clean! And all the guest did there best wearing mask as they walked around and keeping safe space while laying out. I love it here and I stay at hotels everywhere and all different brands.. The

I have

Since it’s situated on top of a bluff on the Pacific Ocean, you can imagine the amazing view it produces. The hotel has made many amenities to provide comfort of viewing of the ocean and the sunset. You can relax under the palm trees or just sipping a drink in front of the panoramic windows watching people surfing below the cliff. When you’re hungry, you can

Summary Heading: Dog friendly Ritz Carlton in South OC
Summary: What a wonderful staycation!  This is a beautiful dog friendly resort.  Incredible sunsets and the grounds are very nice.  It’s an easy walk to Salt Creek Beach.  The large pool is kid friendly too.  The entire staff is super hospitable, accommodating & helpful!  Highly recommend.  Steve Concialdi

Summary: This review is for my fellow Marriott rewards travelers. Do not burn 60,000 Marriott point per night to stay at this hotel - not worth it. Clear with check-in interactions with the front desk that the worst rooms on property and very far from everything are used for points redemption.  The person who checked me in was very nice and professional but did let me know the poor options for my point redemption room  Good 1) There is no doubt that this hotel has one of the most spectacular views of the Pacific Ocean you will ever see. 2) The Food and beverage was good but from what you are paying they should be. 3) Great fire pit. 4) Friendly staff who did an excellent job with Covid restrictions  Bad 1) Hotel was 50% full but I was told I had to take a room with a view of a wall that
Manager Response: First and foremost, we thank you for your loyalty to our brand. We are pleased to hear you had the pleasure of experiencing our magnificent Pacific views and that our Ladies and Gentlemen made you feel comfortable during these unprecedented times. We are, however, disappointed to hear your expectations were not met in other areas. We especially pride ourselves on providing our guests with a luxury experience, so we are saddened to hear we fell short of this during your recent stay. We understand each of your concerns and invite you to contact our Executive Office directly so we can further review the opportunities described. We hope that in the future, you will put your trust in us again to experience a relaxing and luxurious beach getaway.

Summary: Front desk manager and acting GM goes above and beyond to accommodate the needs of his guests . The pool staff is amazing gorgeous property very clean the club level staff is very professional and has by far the best customer service
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your delightful review. We are pleased to hear your visit to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel exceeded your expectations from the service, amenities, to the level of cleanliness. Our Ladies and Gentlemen work diligently to ensure a luxury experience, and it sounds like you experienced just that. We look forward to hosting you in the future for more #RCMemories.

Summary: We had a very nice stay at the Ritz Carlton.   Prior to our visit, we were concerned about some recent negative reviews during the COVID-19 pandemic.   However, we were happy we went anyway as we did not experience a lot of the negativity mentioned by other reviewers.    We also knew in advance that some services would be limited due to the pandemic.   We found the staff to be very friendly and helpful.   The rooms we had were really nice and definitely not dated.   The gym is incredible.  And, of course, the location is spectacular.   We did not eat in the hotel.   Rather, we  found a number of great restaurant options for dine-in or take-out about 5 minutes away in Dana Point.   In addition, we picked up some breakfast items at a Von's nearby as well.   The refrigerators in
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed a relaxing getaway and were able to soak up the magnificence of our surroundings, while also exploring the local area. It sounds like many #RCMemories were made, and we look forward to continuing to make more upon your return to our oceanfront resort.

Summary: Beautiful setting, great rooms, great food. Lots of great food options in the hotel itself. Really friendly and helpful staff. Steep price tag but you get what you pay for. One of the better Ritz carltons that I have stayed at.
Manager Response: Thank you kindly for five-star review. We are pleased hear of your experience at our resort. From our ocean view setting to exquisite food. Please join us again when a relaxing beachfront escape beckons you.

Summary Heading: Amazing location, service and hotel disappointing!
Summary: I had always dreamed of staying at this hotel due to the breathtaking views and location. We had a free night with our Bonvoy credit card so took advantage to give it a try for a much needed getaway. Let me tell you, for a hotel that charges $700-$900 for the most basic room with no view, I expected a lot more. The didn’t expect the same experience as we normally would during COVID-19 pandemic but for a ritz Carlton, we did expect a lot more. The service was non existent (granted we are in a pandemic but the room rates are not lower to compensate for the lack of service and closed amenities). No pool bar/ resto at the pool open, no pool service either. If you want something, you have to go order it yourself from their marketplace or go pick it up from the restaurant that is only
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your thorough review. We are disappointed to hear that your first experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel did not meet your expectations. As a leading luxury hospitality provider, we are known for our exceptional service and it saddens us to hear that you were unable to experience what we pride ourselves upon. Please know that we take your feedback very seriously as we continue to make adjustments to our protocols. At your earliest convenience, we ask you to contact our Executive Office so we can address your concerns more directly and regain your confidence in returning to our oceanfront resort. Thank you and we look forward to speaking with you soon.

Summary: We arrived June 30th, and was delighted to see great social distancing in the lobby. All workers were masked and most guests were as well. ANN checked us in and was very sweet and welcoming and we had a ocean facing room, she put us in a great location. The rooms facing the ocean are so beautiful. We explored the resort and again great social distancing everywhere,  pools, outdoor restaurants, indoor sitting areas. No crowds and though there may be less workers, I felt the same Ritz standards were upheld regarding customer service, cleanliness and overall experience. Angie at the front desk also helped with many things. Our dinner at 180 was fantastic both in taste and scenery as we sat at the edge of the ocean and watched the sunset. And the tables were far apart. Thanks Ritz
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your experience from check-in to check-out. Our Ladies and Gentlemen are pleased to extended exemplary service and ensure a memorable stay. From your ocean view room to dinner at 180blu, and of course, exploring our breathtaking beach surroundings, we are delighted to hear that you enjoyed a relaxing vacation. We look forward to sharing another sunset with you upon your return.

Summary: We very much enjoyed our stay here. Valet was very good. Check in was fine and quick. The room is average. It is rather large but not very well equipped. The view was OK. I had an upgraded room because of my titanium status at Bonvoy. One food outlet was open and the service and the food was pretty good. Pool and other services were closed. However, we were able to visit the beach. The location is very good and you are near many activities and restaurants. I would definitely go back when the situation with the virus calms down.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review regarding your recent experience at our oceanfront resort. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our beautiful surroundings and were able to relax on the beach during your visit. We value your feedback and will keep it all in mind as we continue to improve on our service offerings at our resort. We look forward to your return so you may experience the full luxury of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary: I recently had the pleasure of staying at Ritz-Carlton.  My check-in was outstanding we got the opportunity to upgrade our room to an ocean view for an extra $100 per night.  But I’m sad to say that after checking in our experience was less then amazing.  We ordered room service and like others it arrived in a paper bag in plastic containers.  For the price we had paid it should have arrived on real dishes.  I get the current COVID-19 precaution, but I could get exposed just as easily handling that plastic container.  Second I called house keeping twice to please service our room since we had all these plastic containers from breakfast.  We did not have our privacy sign up.  No one came to service our room so I finally went down to the front desk to ask them to please have
Manager Response: Thank you for your review regarding your recent stay at our oceanfront resort. We agree that our guests should receive the luxury service we are known for, and we are saddened to hear that we fell short of that expectation during your recent visit. We apologize for the inconveniences you experienced and will work to improve upon these immediately. Please know that we take your feedback very seriously and will address these breakdowns as we continue to adjust our protocols during these unprecedented times. In addition, we would appreciate the chance to speak with you so we can address your concerns in further detail. At your earliest convenience, please contact our Executive Office and allow us the opportunity to restore your confidence in The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary: I stayed over the weekend just after they had re-opened and was opting for a nice room with an ocean view as I planned to spend some time in the room and relax.  It cost a lot to chose this room type and I was expecting something extra special. A majority of the property is situated along the oceanside high up on a bluff and all rooms that face the ocean have magnificent views of the beach below and the ocean in front with stellar sunsets.  Not my room.  It was situated on the South side of the resort and my view had as much land as ocean and NO SUNSET nor sunrise either.  Mis- advertised and overpriced at close to $1,300 per night and that was before all of the taxes. This hotel is dated and one can see in its days it was fantastic luxury.  Now there are too many signs of wear,
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We understand you have many choices of luxury hotel providers, and appreciate you putting your faith in us. It saddens us to hear that your recent experience did not meet your expectations and the high standards we hold ourselves to. As we are always looking to improve our resort, we truly value your feedback. We invite you to contact our Executive Office so we can address your concerns in more detail. It would be an honor to have you stay again, and we look forward to an opportunity to regain your confidence and trust in us.

Summary: Decided to get away for weekend (2 nights).  Completely understand Covid-19 there would be many restrictions. What we didn’t expect was inferior service.
