Paying over $1,100 per night you would expect Ritz Service when you need it, such as room service for breakfast took 2 hours and 15 minutes. Yogurt, bagel & omelet two orange juices, $110. Arrives in paper bag at your door. Understand with precautions but are required to sign for food? Yogurt parfait was in bowl, granola was in cereal box. Again understand the precautions but during these times I can’t believe they should be charging full price.  Dinner, quality of food was good but service again was so inferior to Ritz we are accustomed to.   Check out time, no one would answer the phone to help us with our bags. Had to take
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and sharing your recent experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. As a leading luxury hospitality provider, we are incredibly disappointed to hear of the shortcomings you experienced. Our Ladies and Gentlemen work hard to ensure exceptional service, and it saddens us to hear this is not what you experienced. We hope to regain your confidence in our oceanfront resort as we continue to adjust our protocols and experiences during these unprecedented times. We invite you to contact our Executive Office to address your concerns in greater detail and hope to speak with you soon.

Summary: Very disappointed by my second stay here. Of course, I’m factoring in operational changes due to Covid, which I’ll get to. They had months during the slower early Covid days to deep clean and refresh their rooms, but the rooms are really showing wear and tear. There was dust on many surfaces indicating a lack of deep cleaning.  The resort itself was VERY crowded, and very few guests wore masks. I get that OC reversed the mandatory mask guidance, but that doesn’t mean people shouldn’t wear masks or take precautions. Also, forget physical distancing as there was none of that on part of guests and was not being enforced by the hotel. Having been to the Ritz a few times, I could see that they made no adjustments to their table and seating layouts, no extra spacing, no seating people
Manager Response: Thank you for your comprehensive review of your recent stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are saddened to hear of the shortcomings you experienced, as it is our top priority to ensure our guests feel comfortable during these unprecedented times. We pride ourselves on providing luxury experiences and first-class service. We extend our sincerest apologies that your recent stay was not as expected. Please know that we value your feedback as we continue to adjust our protocols. In addition, we invite you to contact our Executive Office so we can address your concerns in further detail. We hope to speak with you soon and regain your confidence in us.

Summary: My girlfriend and I stayed here for 3 nights in June and were surprisingly disappointed with the service across the entire hotel.  You could not order a drink at the pool.  You could either make a phone call from the pool to the hotel to order and they would bring it to a designated table near the pool and you had to pick it up.  I called to place a lunch order and they told me it would be 1 1/2 hours for me to get it.  There was no service on the terrace overlooking the ocean.  Again, if you want anything you had to go to one designated place in the hotel and order it.  I ordered two glasses of house white wine and they came in these very small plastic cups at a price of $17/each.  I asked if we could rent two beach chairs and an umbrellas and they said they weren't doing that
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback of your recent experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are disheartened to hear of the shortcomings you experienced during your visit to our resort. As you noted, our Ladies and Gentlemen are known for exceptional service, and we are saddened to hear we fell short on providing you with a luxury experience. While we continue to develop new protocols during these uncertain times, your feedback is extremely important to us.  Furthermore, we invite you to contact our Executive Office at your earliest convenience so we can address your individual concerns in detail. We look forward to speaking with you soon and restoring your confidence in The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary: My stay (May 16-18) reminded me of an episode of Fear the Walking Dead when guests took over the hotel after employees had abandoned it.   First the good: Valet did a decent job although they only wore masks occasionally. Check-in was efficient and guests were properly distanced while waiting in line. There were also sanitation stations placed throughout the hotel.   Now the bad: First, the room was dusty and had a musty smell. Paint was chipped and the bathtub needed to be resurfaced. The room did not live up to Ritz-Carlton standards and was in desperate need of an update. On a positive note, the beds were comfortable and the linens were clean.  Circling back to the Walking Dead analogy, there seemed to be a serious lack of employees. Walking around, one would never know that
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your thorough review. Your safety and well-being is our utmost priority and we sincerely apologize that your trust was broken. Please know that we take your feedback very seriously as we work to improve and evolve our policies for our resort. We understand how important it is that you feel safe during these unprecedented times and our Ladies and Gentlemen should reflect that from check-in to check-out. We would welcome the opportunity to address your concerns further so that we can regain your trust. We would like to request for you contact our Executive Office at your earliest convenience so we may begin to do so. We look forward to restoring your faith in us with full confidence.

Summary Heading: Not a Ritz Carlton (Except the view)
Summary: This is now a Marriott with a Ritz Carlton view. Granted, we did not have the "full" experience due to COVID-19, but even so there is little that could make it stand-up to the nearby Monarch Beach Resort or Montage.   First, with COVID-19 it is expected that numerous services and amenities may be limited and I support such measures. However, it seems that many of the decisions about what to include/not include are based on budget cuts, rather than current local law or health concerns. We all joked that it seemed like the Tower of Terror, in that it was an abandoned hotel with some guests in it. For example table service restaurants in OC are now operating with strict social distancing limits. At the Ritz, they are still shuttered. You can order from Raya from 11-8pm, but they
Manager Response: On behalf of all our Ladies and Gentlemen, thank you for your detailed review. We are constantly looking for ways to improve our resort and we take your feedback very seriously, especially in such unprecedented times. We are disappointed to hear the details of your recent visit and apologize for the shortcomings you experienced. While we continue to make adjustments to our protocols and adhere to safety guidelines, this should not impact the luxury experience you come to expect. At your earliest convenience, we ask you to contact our Executive Office so we can address your concerns more directly and regain your confidence in us. Thank you and we look forward to speaking with you soon.

Summary: Before the pandemic hit CA, my partner & I (plus our foxhound-beagle) did an overnight getaway to the Ritz Laguna Niguel for Valentine's Day. Service was amazing & the views are breathtaking. Decor & finishes are what you'd expect from a beach-side Ritz (not my personal choice, but high quality nonetheless). The check-in process was flawless. I had made a note to the concierge ahead of arrival that my partner had a spa appointment at the same time as regular check-in, so if they could get us into our room prior for us to drop our bags and allow him some time to relax after the drive down from LA, that would be great. We arrive and not only was our room ready, but they had upgraded us to ocean side! They also immediately sent to our room a doggie bed that Quinn absolutely enjoyed
Manager Response: We are so pleased to read of your experience over Valentine’s Day. What could be more romantic than a spa treatment, cocktails, and ocean views? It is wonderful to read that our Ladies and Gentlemen provided not only you and your partner with exceptional service, but Quinn, too. We appreciate your lovely review and we look forward to having the pleasure of welcoming you back soon.

Summary: We stayed for Mother’s Day weekend (during corona) in a room with a fire pit. We have been to this hotel several times to go to their restaurants and the experiences have always been amazing. So I assumed the rooms and the rest of the property would leave the same impression.  It definitely did not. The rooms are dated, small and smelled very musty. The fire pit was ok,.. the view of our neighbors fire pit was dirty and the paint was chipping and peeling off. As you walk around the property the wear and tear was very apparent.  Following suit with the other reviews here, the pools were WAY over crowded. We couldn’t stay because there was just way too many people. Literally not a free chair. Room service was also ridiculously slow.  We ordered breakfast and was quoted 2 hours...
Manager Response: We are grateful for your loyalty over the years and your choice in staying with us over the Mother’s Day weekend. While we are pleased our views were to your liking, we are disappointed that other aspects of your stay fell short. We sincerely apologize for the shortcomings you experienced. As we enter new phases of serving our guests, we are confident that many of the issues here will be resolved. We hope you will consider a return in the future so we can provide you with the luxurious stay you deserve.

Summary: I agree with the previous reviewers and I wanted to be positive about this hotel - the location is spectacular BUT it feels like the hotel management is using COVid as an excuse to provide far less service overall - especially cleaning. We understood and appreciate no housekeeping but fresh towels and daily garbage pickup from outside the room should be a minimum. The pools are crowded, dirty and small. Overflowing garbage bins. 45 minute wait for car pickup at the valet. 1.5+ hour wait for cold, average, overpriced room service. Rooms that need to be renovated and slamming exterior doors. We were willing to overlook a lot, but this was too much.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to review your experience with us. We continue to learn and evolve with our new circumstances. We are sorry to hear we did not meet your expectations, and we regret falling short. At your earliest convenience, we welcome you to contact our Executive Office directly so we can further review the issues described. It is our hope that we can provide you with an improved experience in an effort to regain your confidence in us in the future.

Summary Heading: Stay during Memorial Day Weekend (and COVID)
Summary: This was our third time staying at the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel. I have written a previous review about how amazing the property is and how great the staff is (and those remain true).  Unfortunately, we had a disappointing experience this time and we ended up leaving one night early at 8:30 PM of our second night. It was a bummer, since we were really looking forward to a relaxing weekend at one of our favorite getaway hotels. The parties taking place in other guest rooms (namely, in the fire pit suites that overlook the ocean front lawn) were becoming increasingly loud, drunk, and belligerent. I was unable to take a nap due to the noise. We complained 4 times and asked to be moved to a different room (however, a similarly appointed room was not available). Security spoke to
Manager Response: We would like to extend our thank you for being a loyal guest of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We hold ourselves to high standards, and we are disappointed that we did not fulfill what you have come to expect from us in the past. Please trust that we are looking into this situation to ensure it is more properly addressed in the future. We also appreciate your feedback regarding the masks. As we have continued to update our protocols in accordance with local and state guidelines. We will continue to make improvements and adjustments as needed. Your concerns are important to us, and we will take them into consideration as we adapt to new hospitality measures going forward. We hope to have the chance to improve on this experience and welcome you back once again for a getaway in the near future.

Summary Heading: Review from a stay during coronavirus
Summary: The good:  Gorgeous view. Spent $620 per night for coastline view. On fourth floor.   Good food. Even tho it’s all takeout, it’s still delicious. However, can take up to 2 hours during mealtimes.   Property. Absolutely gorgeous and the beaches are open (however, bring your own umbrellas and beach chairs).   Service. Even though we decided to leave a day early, the manager gave us back our full night’s fee.   The bad:  The quiet pool is not quiet. It was full of kids and music blasting from nearby hotel rooms.   Rooms. The furnishings are ripped and battered. Furniture pictured online is not in rooms - assume due to COVID.  No service. Rooms only cleaned every three days, so you won’t have fresh towels, robes or a made bed.   Noise. While sitting on our deck, there was noise from
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our oceanfront resort for some rest and relaxation. We are pleased to know the views of the ocean and the service of our ladies and gentlemen were highlights for you. As we continue to make adjustments to our service hours and offerings to align with evolving guidelines, your feedback is much appreciated. We will continue to work hard to provide our guests with the luxury experience they deserve, and your review will help us to do just that. We hope for the opportunity to welcome you back in the future and regain your confidence in us from your most recent experience.

Summary Heading: Really disappointing that this is a Ritz-branded property
Summary: The location is awesome and I know these are unprecedented times so I give the staff a lot of leeway, but overall this was just such a disappointing stay.  Starting with the room, it was sparse and in poor condition, including a number of spiders.  The fridge was malfunctioning, phone on the desk didn’t work at all, and the paint/walls were chipped and cracking. Our biggest complaints were about the staff who were unhelpful and in some cases very rude. Not what I have come to expect from a Ritz property. Made multiple requests to the front desk, housekeeping, and in-room dining for champagne glasses (never delivered) and silverware (received plastic forks). Asked for housekeeping to come make up the room and was told they would, but 5 hours later when I asked again, the front
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. As a loyal guest of Ritz-Carlton properties, we are very disappointed to hear that your experience fell short of expectations. With our current circumstances, our commitment to our guests should not waiver, and we apologize for the uncharacteristic interactions you had with our ladies and gentlemen. At your earliest convenience, we ask that you contact our Executive Office directly so that we may discuss your review. You deserve a relaxing experience, and we hope to discuss the possibility of improving on this in the future. Thank you.

Summary Heading: Killer location but a refresh is in order
Summary: The Ritz is showing the signs of age and although the lobby and restaurants have been re-designed and updated, guest rooms and guest hallways still look tired and faded.  Nonetheless, the view from a lawn chair overlooking the ocean is stunning - Mother Nature, particularly as the sun sets, still delivers!  A continued injection of cash into the hotel will be welcomed.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your valuable comments and feedback. They are in great hands and we are so excited to share with you our upcoming enhancements. We hope you come back soon and enjoy the property and our guestrooms after they have been enhanced. Mother nature awaits!

Summary Heading: Supposed to be an icon, the reality is different
Summary: The building was freezing, they were since over a week unable to heat even the restaurants, no explanation given. Their signature restaurant was -BAD-, after ordering lamb that should have been roasting for over 24 hours, i was served a largely RAW piece of meat. No excuses offered at all.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we appreciate your feedback very much. We certainly hope you had a chance to speak to our leadership team while you were at the property. We would have loved to make it right for you at that time. However we would still welcome the opportunity to speak with you and learn more on how we can regain your confidence. Please contact us at your earliest convenience. Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience we may have caused you.

Summary Heading: One of the best hotels in the United States
Summary: The Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel offers everything a person could ask for in a luxury hotel experience, but in my estimation, it even exceeds expectations. This is one of the nicest hotels in the United States, with astonishing ocean views, terrific amenities, and excellent service from happy-looking staff.  Walking through the hallways and exploring the indoor and outdoor areas is a sheer pleasure, with eye-popping views and impressive art work around every corner. This is a hotel that would be especially appreciated by those who don't live near the ocean as the views from the hotel, which sits atop a bluff, are breathtaking. I am not a regular picture-taker, but I have never taken so many pictures in my life!  The rooms are beautiful and the bathrooms are exquisite. Pool areas
Manager Response: Thank you for your glowing review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are overjoyed by your detailed reflection on your recent visit, as it is our utmost pleasure to hear you enjoyed a memorable experience to the fullest. We are glad you took many photos to document our ethereal and breathtaking ocean surroundings, which will certainly make you smile when looking back on your time here. From dining and wining at the Club Lounge to experiencing our amenities such as the pool and tennis courts, we are delighted you immersed yourself fully in all that we have to offer. On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to making more memories with you in the future.  Thank you for your loyalty!

Summary: We have been WOWed by the Ritz Carlton Laguna property! One of the nicest Ritz properties we have ever stayed. Food, service, grounds, ambiance - it is all a ten. If you have the chance to stay here you must do it. It is pure luxury. We used points for 3 nights and booked a firepit room for 1 night. When we booked we knew the hotel was at capacity so we were totally fine with changing rooms. Upon arrival our minds were completely blown. We were upgraded by Melissa Langley to the Ritz Carlton Suite with club access - Truly beyond our expectations! The wraparound porch views of Monarch Bay and the grounds of the Ritz were simply breathtaking. The food, drinks and service at the Club level were fantastic. Dale in particular did a great job taking care of our every need in the Club
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your loyalty to our resort, brand, and company. It was our honor upgrading you to our incredible Ritz-Carlton Suite and we are overjoyed to hear you took full advantage of its offerings. On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we are so grateful for your review and we look forward to creating more memories with you in the future.

Summary Heading: still a great place to stay after as these years
Summary: stayed here 10 years ago with the family and it was just as good.  we had a room with a fire pit adjacent to a private lawn it was great for the kids to do gymnastics and us to have a glass of wine.  The pool is still small and it was definitely crowded but we were there but we weren’t really going to spend time at the pool so it didn’t bother us.  The beach is great -it is shared with the public but that is fine because beach butler will set you up. like another reviewer said the chairs could use some updating some of them seemed a little raggedy. all in all a solid stay
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty! We value your feedback so we can continue to improve on a luxury experience for our guests. We are delighted to hear you and your family enjoyed your deluxe accommodations and took advantage of our pool, beach, and serene surroundings. We look forward to your return for another memorable family vacation in the near future.  Please don’t hesitate to reach out to our Exective Office should you need anything to ensure full confidence in your visit.

Summary: Great place to watch the sunset while enjoying a cocktail and some bites at the outdoor seating. They don't take reservations so you have to go early. The rooms are well maintained and the staff are very accommodating and friendly. Getting to the beach is not easy, you have to walk down the hill but the staff is always happy to give you a ride in a buggy.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you reveled in our beautiful beachfront surroundings, watching the sunset and enjoying refined food and drinks at our phenomenal outdoor lounge 180blu. We hope you enjoyed your overall experience and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Please let us know if we can do anything ahead of time to make your stay more convenient, luxurious, and memorable.  Thank you for your loyalty!

Summary: This was our second stay at the hotel, the first being in 2013. Stayed for one night this time with the family and had three rooms. Overall I’d say this hotel is a great hotel.  The coastline is beautiful and the beach is a fun walk. Food and drinks were very good. Rooms are slightly dated and depending on which rooms you get, can be a little dark. We had two in the north wing that were coastal view and those were the dark ones. The third room that we checked into first had a pet odor. I didn’t realize this was a pet friendly hotel, and while I’m not against that, the dog either smelled really bad or the cleaning crew did a poor job. Either way, the staff moved me right away to a room that smelled much better.   The check in and check out process was slow. I will say it was
Manager Response: Thank you very much for this very valuable feedback. We take it seriously and this is extremely helpful. We hope you enjoyed your overall experience and we look forward to welcoming you back for a much more refined and flawless stay. Please contact us and we will be delighted to assist you with your next visit to ensure everything is perfect. Thank you for your loyalty. We look forward to assisting you.

Summary: This is a great hotel in an awesome location but..... I couldn’t believe it when I saw people bring their dog into the restaurant we were eating at.  What has the world come to.  Ironically the beautiful Salt Creek beach just below the hotel does not allow dogs.  Most concerning is the thought that our room may have been inhabited by dogs previously when I found a pet menu in our in-room dining menu.  Am I on my own?  I would choose a dog free location ahead of a smoke free environment any day.
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid feedback on your recent visit to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are disappointed that you didn't enjoy the ambiance of the resort due to the fact that we are pet friendly.  Please know that we have a pet policy in place and do our utmost best to enforce its rules and regulations consistently. There are prohibited areas of the resort where pets are not allowed, and they must be on a leash or in held in the arms of their owner at all times. The only exception that is made is with respect to service animals.  Please feel free to contact our Executive Office at any time so we can assist you personally.  We value your loyalty and hope to welcome  you back soon.

Summary Heading: Like No Other Place in the World
Summary: Staying in a hotel like this is a true privilege. The grounds are luscious with ocean views and fresh florals through the hotel, but the standout for me was the service. I have stayed at one other Ritz before, Bacara at Santa Barbara, but Laguna Niguel showed me the epitome of hospitality excellence this weekend.  Check-In: Upon check in, the valet staff offers you water as they take your keys and load up bags. At the front desk, I was treated as if I was expected, acknowledges for my Marriott loyalty status and offered a long stem red rose and champagne. From this point on, I knew this would be an unforgettable weekend!   The Room: As we entered our room we realized Melissa, the guest relations coordinators, had organized a balloon and gift for our babymoon. An hour later we
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we thank you for your loyalty to our resort, brand, and company. It gives us so much pleasure hearing of your glowing experience from start to finish. From your upgraded Club Lounge experience to the golf cart ride soaking in the sparkling Pacific views, we are delighted to have made your babymoon such a special occasion. We look forward to making further memories with you and your family in the future.

Summary Heading: Beautiful location, beautiful hotel but rooms are old
Summary: This is a beautiful resort with spectacular views of the ocean. Everything was handled efficiently and everyone was very friendly. My room was clean with a very comfortable bed. The room and especially the bathroom were old though. No separate shower, ie. standing in the bathtub with a curtain.... Restaurants are great. Everything very very expensive though.
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear you enjoyed our stunning seaside surroundings and the service excellence provided by our talented team.  We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back one day soon.  If we may be of assistance in the meantime, we would be delighted to speak with you any time.  It would be our pleasure!

Summary Heading: Love the Ocean View & incredible staff!!
Summary: I have stayed at this hotel four times and always have had the best treatment the most friendly faces and people and willing to go that extra mile! I’ve always stayed at club level and the concierge staff is just the most loving and caring people.  They go that extra step to make sure that your stay is incredible and it always has been.  Thank you Penny, Mary, Dean, Colleen, Mercedes and everyone else that is on the staff at club level. Also because we don’t have a car, all of the valley people are incredible and too numerous to mention because you were all fantastic as the door people and everybody they always great Mark Wilkinson and I with a smile and will go that extra mile!!  Thank you and looking forward to my next visit🐬
Manager Response: First and foremost, thank you for your loyalty! We are delighted to hear of your repeated visits to our luxurious seaside resort, as it shows how much you place your trust in us when choosing the best place to stay. It is truly our honor going the extra mile for you during your visit, whether that be simply greeting you with a smile or providing you with the utmost memorable experience in our ocean surroundings. On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you again, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Had delicious dinner both of us
Summary: My wife and myself enjoyed at the bar delicious dinner.Server Alfanzo was wonderful we ordered Wine and Salad for appetizers, salmon with vegetable and bread along with was warm and healthy.Ken server also take good care of us.Bar atmosphere is very pleasant ,so we enjoy having conversation with bar tenders.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton. It sounds like you enjoyed a memorable experience over delicious food and drinks amid our elegant surroundings. We look forward to your return, whether for another meal or a luxurious overnight visit.

Summary: The rooms here feel pretty basic and minimal for what you are paying but the customer service is personable and excellent and the food is always delicious! I personally think the Ritz Carlton has the best beachfront property than the other resorts in the area. The view is beautiful and salt creek beach is a great place for families.
Manager Response: We greatly value your opinion and thank you for your feedback of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It pleases us to hear that you fell in love with our beach surroundings, service and cuisine, which we agree are perfect for creating special memories with family. We are constantly making updates to our luxurious resort and will communicate your feedback on our rooms. In the meantime, please feel free to contact our Executive Office to learn more about our plans. We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary Heading: Great hotel with fantastic access to a nice beach
Summary: Lovely place in Laguna Niguel, perfect for relaxation and for people watching. Wonderful service all around, courteous upgrade to a nicer view room (which was much appreciated), and all around hospitality at its best.
Manager Response: Thank you for your glowing review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It is our utmost pleasure hearing the details of your stay, from your room with a view to the wonderful service of our Ladies and Gentlemen. We agree that there’s no better place for relaxation than our serene coastal surroundings. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon for another memorable experience.

Summary: Kristen, at valet desk of the  Ritz Carlton provided above and beyond service during my visit. Everyone on the Valet staff was fantastic. Thank you! The grounds of the Hotel are beautiful with amazing views of the Pacific Ocean.
Manager Response: Thank you for your five-star review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It was our pleasure going above and beyond to ensure your experience was the utmost luxurious. We are delighted to hear you were swept away by our magnificent surroundings and exceptional service.

Summary: We went for our anniversary and were treated like royalty! From the front desk on every employee we encountered was so polite, attentive and helpful. All the waitstaff at the restaurant, the bar and the pool were great. Christina at the bar was amazing! She waited on us several times and made us feel so special. Even when she was very busy she treated us like her only customer! She also shared some very helpful information with us.The property is just gorgeous. We had a beautiful sunset view from our balcony and even had room service dinner one night just to sit and watch. The pool is very nice and we loved the fire pits. They have a little shuttle down to the beautiful beach. The flowers inside and out were so pretty. I will definitely go back!  We also went to the spa one day
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, it was our pleasure providing a memorable experience for you!  It always gives us great joy to hear our guests have enjoyed every little detail of our property and service.  Thank you for trusting us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Let me start by saying my husband and I got married at a Ritz Carlton being such fans! In this case, we have high expectations based on previous locations we have visited. We were a bit frustrated with the lack luster experience as we could have spent our money elsewhere for my birthday. The rooms are way outdated and do not feel luxury at all, the moment you walk in to check in was lacking the Ritz Carlton way no greeting or fruit infused water, the housekeepers came by at 8am it was our fault that the do not disturb was not on however I thought common courtesy was around 9am then we left to workout and have a late breakfast (we were gone about 3 hours 1pm the room was still not cleaned) Then one evening after a beach walk around 6:15pm they were doing turn down service and the
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we thank you for your loyalty to our resort, brand and company.  You placed your trust in us to celebrate your special day amid luxury and enhanced by exquisite service. We are extremely disappointed to hear we fell short on this. Please know we are constantly making updates to our resort to keep it up to our standards, and we will indeed share your valuable feedback. In the meantime, we would appreciate the chance to restore your faith in us and make this right for you. Please contact our Executive Office at your earliest convenience so we can address your concerns directly. Thank you and we look forward to speaking with you soon.

Summary: Top notch and total relaxation!  The rooms were gorgeous. We listened to the waves crashing with the balcony doors open all night.  It was perfect!  The rooms are clean and spacious. The property is picture perfect. So many photos op spots.  The fire pit at night was cozy and romantic.  Watching the surfers from the balcony was so relaxing, while wearing the robe and slippers they supply.  The pool was pretty not many others sitting by the pool, played music through the speakers.  The gym is perfect, large windows overlooking the beach!!! They are very generous with supplying water bottles through out stay.  They were replenished in room every day/ evening. The roof top bar offers an awesome view of the cliffs and ocean. The breakfast sandwich was delicious, the Butter toasted
Manager Response: Thank you for your exceptional review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed a peaceful stay within our serene surroundings. From falling asleep to the crashing waves to keeping cozy by the firepits and soaking in the sights of our rooftop bar, it sounds like you enjoyed your experience to its fullest. We hope you return soon to experience more breathtaking sights, sounds, and luxury.

Summary: Pros: Spacious room, choice of 10,000 Bonvoy points or $100 food and beverage credit for not being upgraded as a Platinum elite member. Haven’t received such a gift previously at a Ritz property. Friendly bartender at main bar. Nice sunset views and walkable beach.   Cons: $50/night valet parking with electric vehicle charging that did not work. Car app had a “check power source” message during our stay. Valet admitted the EV charging infrastructure at the Ritz is “antiquated.” $50/night resort fee on award stay that could not be applied toward food and beverage. Had to rummage through overpriced options in the gift shop to use. Clock in room was an hour off. No blackout curtains, so up with the sun. A first at any property. Very noisy housekeepers that started knocking on other
Manager Response: First and foremost, thank you for your loyalty to our brand. We value your feedback so we can continue improving, and appreciate your candid review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. As a leading luxury resort, our prices reflect the quality of our services, amenities, and features. That being said, we apologize for our shortcomings, as it is our duty to inform you upfront on what is included and what you will need to budget for. We sincerely apologize for the miscommunication on our end. If you would like to discuss your concerns further, please feel free to reach out to our Executive Office at any time. We would love the chance to restore your faith in us as well as see you again at our beachfront resort.

Summary: I can’t explain how appreciative I am of everyone @ the ritz. I booked a room for my in-laws and they went above and beyond to give them an unforgettable experience. Huge thank you to Melissa Langley!
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we appreciate your five-star review. It was our honor and utmost pleasure providing your in-laws with a luxurious experience. We look forward to making more memories together with you and your family.  Thank you for your loyalty.

Summary Heading: Doesn't live up to a 5-star Ritz experience
Summary: The best part of this property is its location, on beautiful Dana Point, steps from the beach.   The rooms are ok but you will see things such as paint chipping, dull finishings, etc. A renovation looks like it's in order. The hallways are very cold, no heat. The walls are very thin, could hear the conversation in the room next door as clearly if it were in ours, lots of other noises heard as well.  There is no minibar, only a fridge. Staff seems overwhelmed, tired, and not well trained.  Usually at a Ritz all staff will smile and say hello but often you'd get passed and not recognized at all by the staff.  Management should assess its capacity, seemed like staff overwhelmed.  Housekeeping was constantly in the hallways yet room was not cleaned until afternoon.  Could use a
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we thank you for your business and providing your extremely valuable and detailed feedback. We do have enhancement plans in place and would be delighted to share them with you. We would enjoy speaking with you. Please feel free to contact our executive office at any time. We care about you and your experiences at our beautiful resort. Thank you for taking the time to post your review.

Summary Heading: OK but falling behind the others
Summary: Location for this Ritz is obviously prime so no issues with that. Service is good and the views are OK. The reason for only 3 stars is that, the resort is showing it's age and needs an update. The Ritz at Santa Barbara feels more luxurious and upscale however the service and food at Laguna Niguel is still top notch.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we can’t thank you enough for your valuable feedback. We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you and we look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary: Location, Location, Location!!! Wow. The ocean views are breathtaking!!! The property is Beautifully maintained. The rooms are Awesome. The BEST part of my stay was Valet Kathryne Forehand!!! Sure was genuinely sweet and welcoming. She helped me relax and feel comfortable away from home. I would return to this location just to see her. What a Blessing this visit has been. Kudos Ritz Carlton. You have really outdone yourselves.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our phenomenal location and our ladies and gentlemen.  We hope to see you again very soon!

Summary: I've traveled to this property on two occasions for business functions hosted yearly. Our events are always 'themed" and the hotel does a phenomenal job at accommodating our requests. Our weekends are generally filled with activities from breakfast meetings to treasure hunts. Besides the exceptional ocean view rooms, the property is always clean and staff very friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It sounds like you enjoyed our luxurious amenities and picture-perfect surroundings to its fullest during your business travels. There’s something about the sunshine and sparkling waters that inspires big ideas while also allowing for relaxation. On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we hope you return soon, whether for business or leisure.

Summary: We had a bad start to our stay at this beautiful hotel.  When we pulled up into the driveway, there were several valets standing around.  Only one of them approached us, after I clumsily climbed out of the back of the car and my husband got the bags from our  driver.  Only then, did one of the valet, who has been standing and observing, ask if we needed help with anything, as we were walking inside towing our own bags.  Not the type of valet service I expect from a Ritz.   After we checked into our ocean view suite, I discovered that there was a huge event on the lawn directly beneath our balcony.  There was a beautiful sunset view but we it was clouded by the BBQ smoke.  The noise of people gathering under the huge tent sent us back into our room.  My husband called and
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback of your stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are pleased to hear that your visit to our beautiful resort was worthy of five stars, despite initial shortcomings. It was our honor upgrading your room on the second night in order to maximize relaxation time amid our ocean surroundings. From Salt Creek beach walks to exquisite meals at RAYA, it sounds like you left with many positive memories. On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Stellar views, great staff, but a few rough edges
Summary: While I would argue that The Montage in Laguna Beach holds the crown for luxury resorts in Orange County, the Ritz-Carlton is still among the top destination resorts in Southern California.   The pros:  fantastic, cliff-top views; excellent and (relatively) reasonably-priced dining options; dog friendly; the best views from any fitness center I’ve seen; friendly staff; and spacious, comfortable rooms.   The cons:  dated bathrooms; no minibar; fitness center is crowded during peak times; and maid service that is efficient, but (judging from all the carts we continually had to dodge in the hallways) could hardly be described as unobtrusive.   If you are traveling with kids, there is plenty to keep them busy, although I think the Hyatt Regency in Huntington Beach is the most
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your valuable feedback!  We appreciate all of your wonderful comments, and take the constructive ones seriously.  It is our highest mission to be the worldwide leader in experiential luxury, and we would enjoy learning more about you and your expectations, and assisting you in creating another unique experience soon.  Please feel free to contact us any time.  We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: This is my 3rd time visiting this hotel and it is due for a bunch of updating and improvement across its staff.  Lots of pros, but this is on the lower end of ritz properties in my mind.   Pros: location is awesome, cannot be beat.  Beach access and easy ride to laguna or other nearby beach cities Cons: - rooms need some updating.  Walls are very thin, other hues also mentioned this to me.  - Seems like the staff are overwhelmed, I am leaving today and holiday season is busy, you just don’t get the same ‘ritz’ attention when they are swamped and understaffed.  - Hotel is cold...lobby and hallways have windows that don’t close and just feels drafty.  We met a couple this AM sitting by the fire in the lobby saying it was ridiculous. Person said at front desk they could not turn on
Manager Response: On behalf of our executive team and all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for your very helpful and detailed feedback.  The overall experience you had at our beautiful resort is not in keeping with our reputation.  We apologize for having let you down, and would enjoy having the opportunity to welcome you back in the future for a wonderful, relaxed, refined and memorable experience.  Please contact our Executive Office directly so we can learn more and ensure your complete satisfaction pertaining to this specific visit and your next one as well. Thank you again for taking the time to share your thoughts on TripAdvisor.  We value you and hope to be of assistance to you soon.

Summary: The Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel has a great location on a bluff overlooking the ocean.  The view from our ocean front room was spectacular!  The room's patio with firepit was a great feature.  The room itself was rather small, but quiet and comfortable.  Staff was helpful and professional.  Overall we had an excellent stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton!  We are delighted you enjoyed your experience with us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: It’s all about the view, but I most liked how dog and family friendly the property is
Summary: I agree with other reviewers that the hotel rooms are a bit dated - especially the mirrored bathrooms. It would be very difficult to remove the 90s from this property because that decade was designed into this hotel. The rooms are also very small.  I also booked the AAA rate, which was a significant savings, and they made me show my card even though I had to enter my AAA card number to book. A property like this shouldn’t do that, as if I’m scamming them with AAA discount fraud. The Ritz is a luxury property - you are above that. But, now that the bad stuff is over, the property is remarkable. As a Bonvoy Ambassador (then Titanium) member, I wasn’t able to use a certificate for Club level access, but they did upgrade me to a terrific ocean front fireplace room. It’s pricey, but
Manager Response: Thank you for your five-star review of our luxury property. It was our pleasure going above and beyond to make your visit with your dear friend extra special, as well as accommodating her dogs—they are a part of the family, after all. We hope you left with many memories near and dear to your heart, from your upgraded room and oceanfront view to relaxing by the fire and celebrating the magical spirit of the holidays. It would be our honor to host you again in the future, and we look forward to your return.

Summary: What a great stay at this beautiful resort.  The Ritz does it right in December!  It’s very festive and the Christmas spirit is everywhere.  They honestly have the nicest staff of any resort we have been too.  The food & dessert is always outstanding.  One picture is the view from the gym we worked out in & the other two ocean views are from our hotel room. Incredible coastline views from all over this resort.   I highly recommend.  Steve Concialdi
Manager Response: It is always an honor to welcome you back!  We are delighted you enjoyed your experience once again. We are grateful for your trust and loyalty. Happy Holidays and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The staff was knowledgeable, helpful, & polite. Beautiful, clean rooms and views at every turn.  The beach is not easily accessible, but the hotel has done the best it can under the restraints of the terrain. And California beaches are not for swimming anyway, so the viewing is plenty adequate.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you and hope to welcome you back soon.  If we can assist you in any way, please feel free to let us know.

Summary: The Ritz is always my choice for luxury hotels. I have booked into many Ritz Hotels worldwide. I The Ritz Luguna Niguel is one of my favorites and I try to spend time there at least once a year. Always a delight and always a great expectation that is always fulfilled with satisfaction.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your loyalty to our resort and brand. We are honored to be your number one choice of luxury hotel providers. From our elegant interiors and surroundings to the exceptional service of our ladies and gentlemen, it sounds like you enjoyed The Ritz-Carlton experience again to the fullest.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Please contact us if we may assist you in any way.

Summary: Staying at the Ritz is staying in another era.  Compared to the very modern styled hotel from where we just came, the Ritz is a throw back to the luxury of the chateau.  Its public spaces, like the lobbies, are vast, enough to convene a banquet by themselves, and very elegant in materials.    The staff are trained precisely to understand what their responsibilities are toward guests.  You sense that when you ask the valet to retrieve your car that they’re way ahead of you.  There is ice water there already.  The car is waiting for you, and the AC is on.  They greet you by your name.  Mercy!  This hotel is perched high on a cliff edge overlooking a splendid flat crescent of light coloured sand.  The waves wash ashore looking for all the world like some mermaid’s lace hem.  Its
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you very much for taking the time to provide a thorough review of your visit to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are elated to hear you were charmed by our picturesque seaside resort and the luxurious service and amenities. From surfing the crystal-clear waters of the Pacific to relaxing in our posh ocean view rooms, it sounds like many memories were made. We hope next time during your visit you will consider dining with us again, as we would love to find a dish that best suits your palate. Please come back again for another luxurious escape!

Summary: I will start this off by saying that I did not actually stay here overnight, but did receive help from an employee at this property.   My mom is currently in California escaping the cold weather, and I am stuck here in Chicago. My mom's birthday is coming up and I really wanted to surprise her with something special, but am completely unfamiliar with the area.   Because I haven't spent much time out there, I decided to call the Ritz to see if they had someone who could give me some ideas and was met with only kind and patient people, especially Lucinda the concierge.  While I was very sad I couldn't go visit my mom for her birthday, Lucinda was very friendly and helpful over the phone. My mom is staying in a somewhat different area from the Ritz but Lucinda effectively helped me
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your confidence in The Ritz-Carlton. We are humbled that you trusted our dedicated team to provide you with the best Southern California recommendations to make your mom’s birthday extra special. Spectacular customer service is something we pride ourselves on. We hope that you and your mom will visit us in the future!

Summary: Definitely not worth the money.  Paid $800 a night for a room that was average.  Not tiny, but small.  No glitz, no glamour and no “WOW” factor inside the four-corners of the room to justify the $800 tariff.  Speaking of ‘nos’, there was no clock and/or clock-radio in the room (which I think is standard equipment in guest rooms at Motel 6 and Red Roof Inn).  There was also no walk-in shower stall with a ritzy-glitzy, rain-forest shower head, something that you’d reasonably expect at a world-class resort.  In its place was a tub with an immobile shower head which couldn’t adequately transition from hot to cold water.  Overall, the room and bath looked, not quite antiquated, but dated.  Once again, I wouldn’t mind if this had been a Courtyard or a Howard Johnson.  At those places
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton. We greatly appreciate your kind words about our team, and are delighted we provided the legendary service known to our reputation and brand. Your constructive feedback regarding our guest rooms as well as the value received for your overall stay are welcomed and taken seriously. We enjoy hearing from our valuable customers whether in positive or negative light as it helps us improve and continue providing the best experience possible. We would be grateful if you could contact our executive office directly so we may share our upcoming enhancement plans with you and learn more as to how we can make this right for you. Our highest mission is for you to return and have complete trust in us now and in the future. Thank you again for taking the time to share your thoughts and concerns.

Summary: I've been visiting this place for over 25 years...I am lucky!!!  Stay on club level! The best concierge staff in the world!! The best valet staff! The best restaurant staff! This is a wonderful hotel and I know hotels...read my reviews!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your sharing your experience with us at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are thrilled to hear that you had a fabulous recent visit and that you appreciated interacting with our ladies and gentlemen. We look forward to welcoming you back for another wonderful visit soon!

Summary: Needed a weekend away so we decided to book at the Ritz since my husband is Platinum Elite status with Marriott. We booked our stay using 110,000 points, but were excited to get some R & R after a busy work week. Upon arrival, Valet was great as usual. Very polite and professional. Check-in on the other hand was not. Once I got to the counter and gave my name, the person behind the counter in a loud voice says "So I see you booked this stay using points!" Um, yea I did and why does that matter? Is that how they greet people at the Ritz?! Does he realize how much I spent on my Bonvoy card to EARN those points? Either way it's certainly not how one should be greeted when checking in to the Ritz. In addition, he didn't mention status and I had to ask him if he had an upgrade
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you very much for taking the time to provide your feedback.  You have our word that we will take this as a learning and coaching moment for our front desk team.  We are delighted you enjoyed your overall experience, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Thank you for your loyalty to our resort, brand, and company.

Summary: The entire property is immaculate from rooms to the grounds. Any amenity you desire is there or they will get it for you. A great location for a special occasion or just to get away. No need to leave the property.
Manager Response: Thank you for your glowing review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We agree that our seaside location makes a wonderful setting for any special occasion or simply to refresh your mind, body, and soul. Come back anytime for another special, relaxing getaway.

Summary: I wish I could say more about this resort, since the location is really beautiful. The property is very large, but the design maximizes views for the most expensive hotel rooms vs. public spaces. No ocean view from the pools, and almost no public outdoor areas with ocean views. That is not fixable, but I hope Ritz-Carlton will take another look at service, maintenance and food. -- The hotel sent a few emails ahead of time asking for room preferences: check-in time, amenities etc. I noted arriving around 2pm, requested a king room, and asked for extra pillows. I also noted to the concierge-- when asking for help with a restaurant res-- that I would be celebrating a wedding anniversary. None of that had been reflected in the double room I was assigned, and the front desk clerk
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your candid feedback regarding your recent experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. While it’s clear you enjoyed our beautiful oceanfront location, we are disappointed to hear that we fell short in terms of service. Our ladies and gentlemen work very hard to elevate each guest experience, and not meeting your expectations is disheartening. We apologize for the miscommunication on your room assignment and other mishaps you experienced. We would love the chance to address your concerns directly. Please feel free to contact our Executive Office at your earliest convenience. We look forward with speaking with you and restoring your faith in us.

Summary: You get what you pay for! It's not a cheap option but it is 100% worth it. We love this hotel/resort and it's great for couples and families... Perched on the cliffs over a great surf break the hotel setting is amazing. And the staff is top notch as well. Attention to detail is always in mind and they take such good care of you when you stay here. We came for our anniversary and they took extra time to send us a bottle of wine and chocolate covered strawberries and then also had gift bags with toys and fun activities waiting in our room for the kids... The fire pits on the balconies of some rooms are AWESOME... I definitely recommend the Ritz in Laguna/Dana Point. It's AWESOME!!!!
Manager Response: We are pleased to read your positive review of our luxurious seaside resort. Thank you for taking a moment to share your glowing feedback of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. From your sweet anniversary surprise to abundant activities for your children, and of course, our stunning ocean view rooms, it sounds like you enjoyed a memorable experience. We look forward to celebrating many more occasions with you and your family.

Summary: I was amazed how the paradise looks like but I could experienced it at RC Laguna Nigel. Amazing customer service, attentive to details on its best, room, pool, spa and gym. I enjoyed the gym with the view, and the restaurant was just perfect.  The room spacious and WOW. It was the best hotel experience i ever had so far in this small entire world.I would recommend it for honeymoons as well...but if you are around, you have to go, it is a MUST and please don´t miss it, the perfect combination of both comfort and luxury, just AMAZING.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review and citing us as “the best hotel experience” you have ever had. Our ladies and gentlemen work diligently with great pride to exceed our guests’ expectations, and it sounds like we did just that. We are pleased to hear you took full advantage of our amenities from our pool and spa to luxurious dining. We hope to welcome you back soon for many more memories.

Summary: Phenomenal hotel. From the moment of my arrival, until my departure 5 days later, I was made to feel as if I was the only guest. My room overlooked the ocean, and I enjoyed sleeping with my door open. I tried each restaurant and was impressed by all. The spicy margarita was the best Ive ever had! I will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel and providing feedback about your superb stay at our oceanfront resort. On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we're so glad to hear that you had a wonderful time and enjoyed every moment. You cannot beat our stunning location or dining experiences! Thank you again, and we look forward to sharing more memorable moments with you.

Summary: Ok, let’s start off with WOW! Great place in a great location. The staff is friendly and professional. They knew my name and were welcoming. They put our luggage in our room before we got there ourselves after check-in.   The food is very good. We had our first meal at enoSteak.   Our room was bright and airy. We could hear the ocean in the back ground. The bed was perfect as was the bathroom.   If you’re in Orange County California, this is the place!!
Manager Response: It was truly our honor hosting you for a memorable experience. From exquisite dining to lavish ocean front rooms, and of course, our serene surroundings, it sounds like you left with many memories. On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Beautiful serene hotel, wonderful service, amazing photography service!
Summary: I had a wonderful stay at the Ritz Calrton Hotel,Laguna Niguel , the staff wrote me a week before I check in ask me whether there's any request before I arrive. Once I arrived all of the staff were all very friendly and tried their best to provide to let the guests feel at ease  (be it move the appointment or request an early check in).  The Pacific Dream Photography located near the main lobby did an amazing job capturing beautiful images to make the experience even more memorable. They continue to provide timely, considerate service after the purchase is finalized.  I would strongly recommend booking a photo session with Jose and Chris.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, it was our pleasure making your experience luxurious, relaxing, and serene. We are delighted to hear you left with many memories which were also captured into beautiful photographs. We have to agree our ethereal surroundings make the best photo backdrop! We look forward to enjoying another photo shoot with you again soon as well as welcoming you back to our beautiful resort.

Summary: We visited again for our 5th time at the property.  Another awesome and flawless visit. Our stay simply could not have been better.  What sets the property apart from the many other properties at which we have stayed (other than the amazing location, of course!) is the warmth and attentiveness of the staff and the desire of everyone to make you feel welcome and pampered.  There is truly a CA charm and relaxed spirit that permeates the property and all you do.  The food in the Lounge remains interesting and excellent.  Everything one could want and need for a great getaway is there and easily accessible.  I cannot speak more highly of the experience.
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your glowing review and loyalty to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. Thank you for taking a moment to share your appreciation for our stunning surroundings, delectable dining, and the kindness of our ladies and gentlemen. It is our honor going above and beyond for our guests to ensure a memorable experience steeped in SoCal charm. Thank you again and we look forward to welcoming you back for another relaxing visit soon.

Summary Heading: So hard to do something nice for someone!
Summary: With my best friend checking in today with his fiancé for a private wedding on the beach, we wanted to surprise them with a bottle of champagne. For a "luxury hotel" this wouldn't seem like too much of a problem. But after 3 calls and an email, I gave up. Each time I called, starting yesterday evening around 7, a recording answered the phone. When a person finally answered, I asked to speak to the concierge. When told the concierge had gone for the day, she asked if she could help and told me she could arrange for the champagne. Once I told her I wanted to order something besides the house champagne, I was informed it had to go through the concierge and she would leave a message for the concierge to call back in the morning. When I did not receive a call by 10 in the morning, I
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we apologize for the miscommunications when planning to surprise your best friend on his wedding day. We understand you wanted to do something special for this momentous occasion, and we are disappointed to hear this was not followed through on our end. As a leading luxury hotel, we pride ourselves on going above and beyond for our guests and we failed to do this for you. We would love the chance to apologize personally and assure you that this would not happen in the future. At your earliest convenience, please contact our Executive Office. Thank you for posting your feedback, and we look forward to speaking with you.

Summary Heading: The most accommodating Ritz Carlton ever
Summary: I can’t say enough about how the staff at this property does everything possible to make your stay absolutely the best experience.  Adrian at the front desk went above and beyond to accommodate my ocean front room request. Brian in the gift shop found the last logo jacket for me in my size and color I wanted.  Lucinda at the concierge desk was delightful and very helpful.   The sunsets at this hotel are off the charts.  Friday evening at the outside patio bar was fabulous. Having a glass of wine and listening to the guitar player and singer and watching the sunset was great.  The hotel has gorgeous roses and orchids throughout the common areas. You get an instant happy feeling as soon as you walk into the hotel.  The guest rooms inside are ok but need a redo.  The bathrooms are
Manager Response: First and foremost, thank you for your loyalty to The Ritz-Carlton. It was our pleasure not just accommodating you but going above and beyond to provide exceptional service, so you could enjoy your experience to the fullest. We agree that watching the vibrant Laguna sunsets over a crisp glass of wine on our outdoor patio is a magical experience. We were also happy to upgrade your room to a sweeping oceanfront view. Please know we have enhancement plans in place for many areas in the resort to enhance our guests' luxurious experience. It was truly a delight having you and we look forward to enjoying another sunset with you soon.

Summary: Love going to Ritz to enjoy fancy happy hour with breath-taking views around the property. Lots of spots to walk around for photo opportunities. Yappy Hour events with our dogs is so much fun too, where snacks and treats are catered to our 4-legged friends. If you are in the area for Christmas season, be sure to drive around Ritz to see all the spectacular lights. And go inside to see gingerbread house and other decorations. It's magical!
Manager Response: It is always a pleasure having you visit us and we thank you for your loyalty. Our community events are so much fun and we truly enjoy welcoming our neighbors back.  We hope to see you at our annual tree lighting event on November 24th.  It indeed will be magical!

Summary: Read all the amazing reviews about this resort, and it lived up to its hype.   Rooms: spacious, clean. Bathroom is gorgeous with 2 sinks and marble all over. I believe most rooms have a firepit, but we did not use it. Ours was garden room, but could still see the ocean.  Amenities: lots to do for kids. We had our 3 year old with us and he was well entertained by the pool and pool toys, beach, and small playground (with slide, swing). Shuttle service is convenient to take us down to the beach and had plenty of beach chairs, toys, and towels  Service: fantastic. Jordan from the cafe was superb and accommodating.   Would return in the future as a family.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel!  We greatly appreciate your loyalty and we look forward to creating another unique and memorable experience for you soon.

Summary: Beach and view location couldn’t be topped, dinning was excellent, hotel must be going through renovations. Our room was “ok” furniture was weird and very tired looking. The lobby and hall art was beautiful, while some flooring and carpet also looked older. Staff was helpful. Wonderful stay for work, I wouldn’t pay the lux price for a family stay. Not family friendly. Pool is under sized.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your valuable feedback. We greatly appreciate your patronage and thoughts about the resort. If we may answer any further questions for you please call us direct. It would be a pleasure to speak with you and share our enhancement plans. We hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: This hotel is amazing. What a beautiful facility with a staff that was amazing. I travel a lot and Ritz Carlton can be hit or miss. Last year we stayed at the Santa Barbara Bacara location. Laguna Niguel makes that Ritz look like a Fairfield Inn.  Let’s start with the amazing checkin by Blake. I am a Platinum member and to be honest, I am use to being treated average at best. If you stay in Marriott’s 50 nights year it becomes a blur. Blake took it to another level with the room upgrade. We were celebrating our anniversary and this was a wonderful gesture. It was not just the upgrade but Blake’s personality that made a great start to the stay.  We had club access and the team in the club were awesome. Penny, Jessica and the rest of the staff went above and beyond. I wish I could
Manager Response: Thank you for your glowing review of The Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel. We are overjoyed to hear of your five-star experience from arrival to departure. It was our pleasure going above and beyond to make your anniversary extra special, from upgrading your room to the warm interactions with our ladies and gentlemen. We look forward to creating more memories together in the future.

Summary: A business meeting took us to the Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel, in late October.  The hotel is grand with well decorated open spaces.  The rooms were well appointed with free wifi and coffee machines and the usual amenities for upscale hotels.  The hotel did not upgrade us as a Marriott Bonvoy member which was disappointing.  The views from many rooms and the restaurant give you spectacular panoramic views of the Pacific ocean.  Check out was easy.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, it was our pleasure providing you with a unique and memorable experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We extend our sincerest thank you for your review, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Wow. ROMANTIC and SUNSETS to live for
Summary: From the minute you arrive , you are in excellent hands.  This hotel is located on a cliff overlooking an amazing beach. Can not get a better location   SUNSETS AND VIEWS ARE PRICELESS   Service is top notch.  Grounds are immaculate.  Pools ( provide SUNBUM sunscreen 30/50/after sun ) no need to pack your own sunscreen.  Tennis courts were in perfect condition ( they provide racquet and balls )  Room and bathroom were large with a balcony. Walk in closet.  Beautiful trails to wander just outside hotel  Very very safe   GYM What’s your excuse with a view like no other. ??   You do need a car if you want to explore shopping or other restaurants unless you decide to take a taxi or Uber or walk about 20 min.   Negatives:  Pool food menu could be better
Manager Response: Thank you for your five-star review of our seaside resort. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed a luxurious Ritz-Carlton experience from beginning to end. From our sparkling pools and state-of-the-art gym to soaking up the beautiful nature and sunsets from your balcony and beyond, it sounds like many memories were made. We look forward to sharing another magnificent sunset with you again soon.

Summary: The resort has beautiful ocean views and the food at Raya was very good, however that doesn't make up for the fact that at this 5-star very expensive resort, the walls are truly paper thin. We could hear basically every word that the people staying in the room next to us were saying and they were not being particularly loud. In general, the rooms felt pretty dated but we would have been fine with that if the walls had been thicker. Will not be returning.
Manager Response: On behalf of our executive team and all our ladies and gentlemen, we regret to hear you did not enjoy our luxurious Ritz -Carlton experience to the fullest. We appreciate your honest feedback of our rooms and apologize for any disturbances. We understand comfort is key to enjoying your stay. Please know we are in the process of making modern enhancements to our resort.  It would be our pleasure to inform you of our ongoing plans. Please feel free to contact our Executive Office at your earliest convenience. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back for a much more private and comfortable experience. Thank you again for your review and we look forward to speaking with you soon.

Summary Heading: AMAZING anniversary vacation away from kids!
Summary: While its true the rooms here are underwhelming and in need of updating and warmth, the overall experience here was 5 star outstanding. The property is breathtaking, the hotel lobby areas and restaurants are STUNNING and food DELICIOUS.  Outdoor patio bar overlooking the ocean was fun.  Everything is crisp, clean and classy. The beds were comfy cozy and the beach was wonderful.  My husband and I had some great walks and jogs along the beach and on the trail.  I found the staff to be extremely attentive, warm and friendly.  A very big thank you to MICHAEL who is fairly new to the property, and went out of his way to make sure we had a room we were satisfied with.  He was lovely, kind, patient, accommodating and everything you would expect from Ritz service.  Thank you Michael,
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for sharing the details of your experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. From your cozy, spacious room overlooking the ocean to walking along our white sandy beaches, we are delighted to hear you departed with many memories. It was our pleasure hosting you and we look forward to doing so again soon.

Summary: Was excited to spend two nights at the Ritz. Unfortunately it pales in comparison to The Montage just up the street. Rooms were lackluster, pools were generic, lobby was non impressive. Food was over praised ($6.00 for a can of soda) and bland. Ordered a burger rare. It was barely pink.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we are saddened to hear you did not enjoy a perfectly executed service property experience.  We appreciate you candid feedback however and hope you will consider this instance a rare occurrence.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back for a much more personal and unique experience in the future.  We would be grateful to speak with you direct so we can learn more and share with you our upcoming enhancement plans.  We hope you have a moment to contact our Executive Office. Thank you again for your most valuable feedback. We look forward to speaking with you soon.

Summary: Stayed there last month, struggled with whether or not to post because it feels a bit bratty to complain about a Ritz- here are my thoughts: 1) Service: feels super-corporate and actually the people are overall not helpful. (Exception: the cleaning woman who zipped my dress because my husband could not) 2) The Facility: feels dated and a bit cheap. Views are gorgeous, but leads down to a public beach. (Again, this is a Ritz...so just expected more). 3) Food: some bright spots, but mostly felt like generic catering food. 4) The Spa: BY FAR THE LEAST POSITIVE EXPERIENCE FOR ME. *The Staff: -Only positive was the friendly, handsome guy with dreads in the fitness room who answered questions and helped me out. -My Therapist was sweet, but the service was super-meh (please see below)
Manager Response: On behalf of our executive team as well as all our ladies and gentlemen, we are very disheartened to hear of your unpleasant experience.  The Ritz-Carlton brand signifies excellence a traditions of luxurious service.  Our team thrives on providing the utmost genuine care and comfort to each of our valuable guests, and we sincerely apologize for letting you down.  We thank you very much for your feedback and have shared it constructively so that we may learn from it and perform better.  We would be grateful to speak with you direct so we learn more and ensure your complete satisfaction.  We hope you have a moment to contact our Executive Office.  Thank you again for your most valuable feedback.  We look forward to speaking with you soon.

Summary: The Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel is a gem on the coast that offers spectacular views and excellent service.  The rooms, hallways, public areas, and restaurants are beautifully maintained. I loved the gorgeous fresh floral arrangements that line the lobby. Although bustling and busy during the weekend due to a wedding taking place on site, all hotel staff members were friendly and helpful.  I didn't squeeze in time for a massage this time, but their spa is one of my favorites. While other hotels in the area have gone downhill, the Ritz maintains high standards and keeps the property beautiful, clean, and updated.
Manager Response: We are delighted by your review of our luxurious, seaside property and we thank you for your loyalty. We know you have many choices of resorts in the SoCal area, and it is our goal to go above and beyond to make your experience memorable. Through little details such as our floral decor to keeping our rooms cozy and clean, we hope you feel like you always have a home with us here at The Ritz Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary Heading: Great club level staff! Great view!
Summary: We stayed for 4 nights. View is perfect. Location very relaxing. Pools nice. Rooms old but comfy. Get one with a private Firepit!  Gym is really good with a lovely view. SPA is great, get a massage with Ed! We were lucky to have a club level access, I have to say that they really cared about us. They want to know every guest and give you the feeling of a second home. Especially Penni, she is so nice. Also thanks to Mercedes, Amy and Dale. Made our stay so special. One thing you need to know, the rooms are very old. So if you have a light sleep, take earplugs with you, be aware to hear your neighbor talking and listening to music. And if they have a dog, you’ll hear him too.   I was very disappointed about our check out. Very cold lady, didn’t care if we had a nice stay or not.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback.  We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our exclusive Club Level experience.  It truly is one of a kind, and we look forward to welcoming you back one day soon.  We appreciate you sharing your concerns regarding our guest rooms as well as your departure, and will use these comments constructively.  If we can assist you further in any way, please feel free to contact us directly.  Thank you again for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary: This hotel is absolutely amazing. Everything is perfect from the location to the service. I look forward to staying here annually during Ohana fest! Special Kudos to Andrea for hooking my 5 year old up with the biggest treasure box treasures we have ever seen. Once again, amazing job Ritz!
Manager Response: We are humbled by your feedback! It was truly our pleasure providing you with an unforgettable experience, including gifting your five-year old with treasures. We look forward to your return and making more memories with you and your family.

Summary: If you’re looking for a family friendly getaway for the weekend, look no further. We have two young boys (5 and 2) and wanted something within driving distance of Los Angeles that could keep our boys busy. The most outstanding part of our trip was the service and friendliness of the staff. When we first arrived and took in the ritzy atmosphere, the fancy patrons in evening wear and wedding guests galore, we were concerned that our sometimes screaming 2 year old would get us thrown out pretty quickly. But we were wrong. All the staff was so friendly and accommodating. From Maddie who sent us welcome emails and arranged for a special beach surprise and s’mores kit for the boys in our room to Cole our beach butler who helped get us set up on the beach and let our son hold on to his
Manager Response: Thank you for your glowing review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It was our pleasure providing you with a memorable weekend getaway for you and your family. We are happy to hear that you appreciated our incredible ocean views and wonderful family friendly service from our ladies and gentlemen. We hope you will return to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel again in the future for another weekend getaway. Thank you again.

Summary: The drive up to the hotel is nice and service was good with a glass of champagne to greet us, however the hotel itself is somewhat dated when it comes to the rooms. Nice views from the restaurants and walk to beach. However no amenities nearby. Pretty average. Our room phone didn’t work and when we entered the room it smelled stale.
