Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We hope you enjoyed your overall experience and the service excellence provided by our ladies and gentlemen. We thank you for your feedback regarding our guestrooms and take it seriously. We would enjoy sharing with you our upcoming enhancement plans and if you would like to discuss further please give us a call direct.  we look forward to welcoming you back and creating another unique and memorable experience for you soon. Thank you for your business.

Summary: This is an unbelievable hotel. In an amazing location overlooking the ocean. The rooms are well decorated and spacious and the staff are friendly. Understandably this venue is popular for weddings, birthdays and probably bar mitzvah’s as well.  This weekend there were just so many events staged at the same time which made the hotel communal area resemble something like grand central station at rush hour. That aside this hotel is truly fantastic and is well worth a visit. I have been lucky enough to visit many beautiful places in the world but the view from my hotel window was just very special. One bug bear is the car valeting. There is no other option and at $50 per night seems a little steep and just greedy. It’s not as though the guest iisn’t already paying a premium price
Manager Response: Thank you for your glowing review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It was our pleasure providing you with a memorable experience among our sweeping coastal surroundings. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your ocean view room and the personalized service of our ladies and gentlemen. We look forward to your return for another unforgettable visit.

Summary Heading: A SoCal jewel with amazing service
Summary: We recently had an opportunity to return to the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel and were extremely pleased with every facet of our visit from the warm and welcoming staff to the wonderful room, to the dining and beautiful public spaces.  This was a very short stay for us, but we enjoyed it so much that it provided the relaxing break we needed.   True Luxury properties provide personalized service at every level and we felt the hotel really  shines here- all of the staff- front desk, valets, club concierge, restaurant servers, housekeeping and phone agents were personable and efficient and made us feel at all times like valued guests.  The property is in a beautiful location (we were treated to a stunning ocean sunset) and the rooms and grounds are lovely and well maintained.  We had
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It was our honor hosting you again, and we are delighted to hear that you enjoyed a well-rounded luxurious experience. Staycations are meant to be relaxing and indulgent—from our picturesque seaside surroundings to five-star dining and top-notch service, it sounds like you enjoyed just that. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Was made to feel like we were unwelcome by everyone but the front desk
Summary: Valet didnt even say hi and we unloaded our own bags. Spa hours are not posted on door and I could see the manager inside, but door was locked so I couldn’t ask when they were open. Pool attendants blatantly looked away from us and would’t take our order. Kids’ club door was also locked, with an employee inside, at like 4-5pm. Atleast she came to the door, told us their hours (which we were within) and then told us she didnt have anyone to help us! Front desk folks nice- gave is our free smores after we saw someone else get it (should be automatically offered at check in). Stick for the kits are toothpicks- other Ritz properties offer smores sticks that wont cause you to lose a hand.  The manager I spoke to about all of our inconveniences listened politely and offered us some
Manager Response: We are saddened to hear about your recent visit to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel, and we thank you for your honest feedback. As one of the leading providers of luxury hospitality in the world, we value your feedback to improve our guest experience. Unfortunately, we fell short on many aspects of your visit and we sincerely apologize for any miscommunications and lack of service excellence. We appreciate your input and would honor the chance to speak to you personally to learn how we can redeem ourselves in the future. Feel free to contact our Executive Office at your earliest convenience. Thank you and we look forward to speaking with you soon.

Summary: This review is a tough one because the property is amazing and location is great, but the service was somewhat lacking and the room itself was just okay.    I stayed at this property several years ago, and I feel like I had a better experience then.  Our most recent trip was for a quick family weekend getaway.  Check in is supposed to be at 4PM (which I feel is a little late for a hotel), but we arrived around noon to enjoy the property.  We checked in with the front desk and were told to give them my cell number and we would get a call when our room was ready,  We went down to the beach for a few hours to kill some time.  The beach crew were outstanding. They set up chairs, an umbrella, and brought boogie boards and sand toys for the kids.  Very helpful considering they have to
Manager Response: First and foremost, thank you for your loyalty to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We understand you have many choices of luxury resorts when you vacation, and you trusted us to provide you with exceptional hospitality. We are saddened to hear that we fell short of your expectations and sincerely apologize for shortcomings such as your check-in process. In regard to our rooms, please know we are continuously enhancing our resort with modern amenities. We would love the chance to speak with you about our ongoing plans as well as learn more about your recent visit and how we can exceed your expectations for visits in the future. Feel free to contact our Executive Office at any time. We look forward to connecting with you soon!

Summary: This is one of the best Ritz properties I’ve been to.   Pros: - An A+++ club level (a HUGE thank you to our club level concierge Diane who made our stay so much better).  - Access to Salt Creek beach and the beach butler system is fantastic. It’s a beautiful beach and occasionally you’ll see professional surfers.  - Consistently has one of the most beautiful sunsets I’ve ever seen.  - Great spa/steam room.  - Beautiful common areas; lounge areas outside looking over the ocean.  - S’mores packets for their bonfire.  - Very friendly staff.  Cons:  - Outdated pools were nothing special, and the lack of breeze makes them get pretty warm during hitter days.  - Lots of conventioneers and business folks shuttling about; kinda impedes the vacation vibe.   - Many rooms don’t have
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We look forward to welcoming you back soon for another memorable experience, and we thank you for your feedback.  If we may be of assistance or answer any questions for you,  please feel free to contact our executive office anytime.

Summary: We had a wonderful stay at this lovely hotel. The location and views are spectacular,especially from the club. The service was excellent though the food at the club could be better as it didn’t come up to the same standards as the other RC clubs we have stayed at. As is customary with such properties there is a resort fee which takes into account the valet parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We look forward to welcoming you back soon for another memorable experience, and we thank you for your feedback.

Summary: The resort is huge and beautiful. You can walk down the cliff or take a hotel shuttle to the public beach, which is great but not as good as the huntington beach we just visited couple days ago. The hotel staffs are friendly. My daughter fell down when she run. The first aid team of the hotel helped us promptly.
Manager Response: Thank you for your glowing remarks of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It sounds like you enjoyed memorable adventures with your family during your visit, and it was our honor providing you personalized service and a five-star experience. We hope to host you again in the future, and we thank you for your loyalty!

Summary: Check-In was a cinch, the staff superb, concierge services amazing.   The hotel accommodated our early check in so we could attend a show we were in the area for.    The room was delightful, and just so relaxing and enjoyable. The best way to describe is would be surreal. You didn't want to leave the room.   We spent the extra to get a room on a higher floor and with lounge access, this further enhanced our experience with being able to get light snacks, appetizers and some beverages.   Everyone person here was attentive, so personable you felt like you were staying with extended family.   I can't say enough good things about this place, they even washed my car free of charge!
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It was our pleasure making you feel right at home through our luxurious amenities, personalized service, and relaxing guestrooms. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your experience from start to finish and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: We had a nice staycation at this beautiful resort over Labor Day weekend with our 2 year old who has been asking to go to the beach nonstop. Warmly greeted by Larry at the valet, who walked us inside and gave us a little info about what kind of weather we could be expecting. He even remembered us by name when we checked out 2 days later and gave our daughter a toy dolphin.  Front desk checkin by Grace, who upgraded our view without us asking and gifted our daughter a bucket with shovel, and a rubber duck. She offered us champagne as well.   We had a pool view room with a King Size bed. Very spacious and well maintained, CLEAN, and includes the Nespresso machine like all other RC properties and a mini fridge.   We immediately went down to the beach and utilized the Beach Butlers.
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed and candid feedback of your visit to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed a luxurious staycation and were pleased with our guestrooms, pool, personalized service, and on-site dining at RAYA. We are disappointed to learn your second meal at RAYA was not as enjoyable, as we strive for consistency and quality. We also apologize for the noise disturbances in your guestroom. Please know we are continuously updating our resort and making modern enhancements. If you would like to hear of our ongoing plans, feel free to contact our Executive Office directly. We look forward to speaking with you and also welcoming you back for another relaxing staycation.

Summary Heading: Incredible hotel overlooking the cliffs of Laguna
Summary: The property is massive and most rooms have a beautiful view. We were upgraded to a room with a view of the coastline that really was perfect. The rooms haven't been recently updated but they still have a ton of class and luxury. I really enjoyed my stay here and look forward to coming back soon. 180Blu (especially thurs-Sat) for live music is a dream
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It was our pleasure upgrading your room and providing you with the utmost luxurious experience during your vacation. We are delighted you enjoyed our classic guestrooms and live music at 180blu with its whimsical ocean views. We look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Beautiful Resort with Top Notch Service!
Summary: I'm writing this review as I sit in my divine bed at the Ritz in Laguna Niguel. It's not a frequent occurrence for me to take time out of my day to write a review, however, my experience at the hotel demands no less. I arrived at the hotel for the weekend and was warmly greeted by one of the hotel associates in the lobby prior to even walking up to the front desk. She kindly asked my name and if we were celebrating any special occasion.. by the time we walked up to the desk they greeted my girlfriend and I by name and wished us a happy anniversary whilst thanking us for choosing the property to celebrate. What came next was something I never expected... After finding out it was our anniversary the hotel had champagne ready for us at the counter. From there, we arrived in our
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing the exquisite details of your visit to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. From the bottom of our hearts, it was our pleasure to make your anniversary magnificent and memorable, from the champagne delivery and divine dining to the attentive service of our ladies and gentlemen. It sounds like you enjoyed our luxurious amenities to the fullest! We look forward to welcoming you back soon for another celebration or romantic escape.

Summary: This hotel is simply stunning! The room had a fireplace and a s'mores kit waiting for us. :) We also stayed in the club level room with unlimited food and drinks. The food was delicious! The views from this hotel are unmatched and it's a great way to see what California has to offer. The employees were friendly and accommodating. We will be back here.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, it was our pleasure hosting your romantic getaway. From the fireplace and s’mores kit to luxe dining and immaculate ocean views, it sounds like many memories were made during your visit. We look forward to enjoying another luxurious experience with you again soon.

Summary: We stayed here after staying at the Ritz in Santa Barbara. Was so disappointed. Our room had paper thin walls and we could hear the guy next door conducting business on his cell phone. The main pool was loaded with rowdy kids and we could not find a server to get a drink for us. The quiet adult pool has no hot tub and you can not get a drink here. Hotel is on the beach, but is so far away. The ritz does not have a private section on the beach with lounge chairs. Public beach only, ritz gives you sand chairs and towels, but not comfortable. We did not bring any cash thinking we could charge food and drinks to room. There’s a public snack bar only. After staying at the lush property in Santa Barbara, I felt this property was no better than a holiday inn. My room was $799, I wish I
Manager Response: We appreciate your candid feedback very much. We pride ourselves on being a luxury, five-diamond resort putting our guests’ satisfaction first. That being said, we apologize for shortcomings such as the noise from your guestroom and the miscommunication on our public beaches. We would appreciate the chance to speak to you personally, so we can regain your trust. Please reach out to our Executive Office at your earliest convenience. Thank you again for taking the time to post your review, and we look forward to speaking with you soon.

Summary: We spent 5 days at this resort and loved our experience. Excellent service, clean, beautiful accommodations, and the location and view that can’t be beat. We had a first floor, ocean front room with an outdoor fire, and it was perfect for enjoying cool evenings outside. The Ritz also provided S’mores kits that our kids enjoyed a few evenings of our stay. The on-site restaurants were all great, we ate most of our meals at the resort. Overall, a great combination of beautiful grounds, access to the beach and walking, great food, and excellent service. All around a great experience at this Ritz Carlton!
Manager Response: We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: The hotel is beautiful and high class.  Lots of amenities from tennis court, swimming pool, ping pong table, to of course, the beautiful Pacific Ocean!  They also provide Beach service to ride you there and provide Beach towel, chair, umbrella!    Incidentally, I also met their monthly Yappy Hour, lots of community folks and their dogs were there.  Lots of fun if you love dogs.  Even doggie water has various flavor.  While hotel is nostalgic, it doesn’t provide all the charging outlets and stations like newer hotels.  I was there for a conference and my laptop was drained by mid-day.  I had to charge at the back of conference room while standing the whole time.  Similar lack of plugs too in hotel room.  That’s why I reduced 1 star.  But this hotel is not cheap.  Easily
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of The Ritz Carlton, Laguna Niguel. Your feedback is taken very seriously to help improve our highly-rated resort. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our amenities, breathtaking coastal views, and of course, Yappy Hour—indeed a dog lover’s dream come true. We appreciate your feedback on your shortcomings as well and sincerely apologize for any inconveniences during your conference. We are continuously updating our resort and would enjoy sharing our ongoing plans with you. Please feel free to contact our Executive Office at any time to learn more. We look forward to your return!

Summary: Overall, the most amazing resort experience we have ever had.... from pre-arrival, to check in, to arriving in our and all that we experienced at the resort!  Aileen in Guest Relations really outdid herself and we believe was key to setting our stay on an extreme high!  The entire staff on the club level was amazing, as well as the pool, outdoor and indoor lounges and beach staff.  My wife and I have worked for world class retailers and hospitality companies, so we know what amazing Guest Service looks like.  Aileen and team set a new level of personalized service!  The Ritz Carlton Laguna Nigel is our new "go to" vacation spot!
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your five-star experience at The Ritz Carlton, Laguna-Niguel. We are delighted to hear that our ladies and gentlemen made your visit exceptional from start to finish. It sounds like you enjoyed our luxurious experience to the fullest and left with many memories. Thank you again for your positive review and we look forward to creating more memories with you in the future.

Summary: “What makes this hotel five stars” I was asking my husband at the beginning of trip ?   Property location : 5 stars Room : max 4 stars ( standing shower in the bathtub with curtains , I thought it is obsolete for 5 stars)  Pool service : 2 stars ( need to look for staffs to get serviced)  Front desk : 1 star ( waiting so long , not enough stuffing ; not commentating at all for members ) Privacy : 1 star ;noisy , waken up early by the noise from next door/ hallway and outside ground    So you tell me what star this hotel should deserve ??
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your candid feedback. We know you have many choices in luxury accommodations, and we sincerely thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. As a brand who prides ourselves on excellent execution and personal service, we are saddened to hear that we fell short of your expectations. We encourage you to contact our Executive Office so that we can learn more and regain your trust. We look forward to speaking with you soon. Thank you again for taking the time to post your review.

Summary: This resort embodies luxury and second to none service. Club lounge access is one of the best luxury values I have ever experienced. Every member of the staff is friendly and absolutely ready to help you in any way possible. They all go "above and beyond". The pools are fabulous. The restaurants are all top notch. The beach is awesome. I could not more strongly recommend this property.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we thank you for your spectacular review of our luxurious property. It sounds like you had quite an exquisite experience, from dining at our five-star restaurants to taking in the sweeping surroundings of the Southern California coast. It was truly our honor going “above and beyond” for you to ensure a memorable stay. We look forward to enjoying another sunset with you again soon!

Summary Heading: Wonderful vacation resort and business hotel
Summary: I can’t wait to come back when I’m not working.   Beautiful hotel beautiful service wonderful food and the area is just so breathtakingly gorgeous!   They provide so many amenities.   You spend a little more and you get so so much more.
Manager Response: Thank you for your five-star review of our beautiful seaside resort. We are elated to hear you enjoyed a well-rounded positive experience with us, from our stellar service and fine dining to our breathtaking surroundings. We hope many memories were made, and we look forward to making more with you in the future.

Summary: I love when I have a conference booked at this beautiful hotel. Service is always top notch and because I’m a Marriott Bonvoy member I got upgraded to a fire pit on my balcony. It was wonderfully relaxing and they also brought me a new s’mores kit every single day.  I love to be able to walk along the ocean and see the view and walk all the way to the north end where the golf course is. If you’re lucky enough to be playing golf with a corporate group that is even better. It is a beautiful challenging course.  Are conference room seats were like sitting in first class on delta aircraft. Big white luxurious leather seats. I can’t wait to have a conference return to this hotel.
Manager Response: First and foremost, thank you for your loyalty to The Ritz-Carlton brand. It was our honor upgrading your room, and we are delighted you were able to take advantage of its high-class amenities (aren’t our s’mores a nice evening treat?)  It sounds like you enjoyed your experience to the fullest, from scenic ocean walks to soaking in the luxury of our polished conference rooms. We hope your meetings were a success and we look forward to welcoming you back soon, whether for business or leisure.

Summary Heading: Great Anniversary Stay at the Ritz
Summary: We loved our time at the Ritz. All the details were 5 star. The grounds are pretty incredible, fresh roses indoors everywhere. We had one foggy day and then it cleared out and was even more beautiful! Ate at Raya for dinner...request a window table bc the sunset is amazing!! There is a steakhouse, too, but the views are not as good. Did one day around the pool. Service good, towels, water etc.. An anniversary platter and champagne were delivered to our room as a gift which was nice. Lots of places to sit and take in the view....benches along the way, walking paths.   For me only regret is room choice, although we wanted to spend money in other places....like nice dinner and booze...versus the room. We had a garden level room facing the smaller pool. It was a bit dated and damp
Manager Response: Happy Anniversary! We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your special experience at our beautiful and romantic resort. We look forward to welcoming you back for years to come.

Summary Heading: Great Location, Nice Views, Friendly Staff, Damp Rooms
Summary: My wife and I stayed at the Ritz-Carlton to visit some friends for the weekend.  He used his points for the rooms. We were given a room on the 3rd floor, which is the lobby level when you walk in. That ended up being nice because the partial view room toward the right was a really good beach view.  The pros: Typical exceptional service by the staff here; if a bonvoy member, guaranteed late check-out; pool area nice with great towel service including free ice creams handed out; 180blu was a great little spot for breakfast burritos and great grilled cheese sandwiches.  The cons: Room feels damp and has a musty smell; the bathroom doesn't have enough vents and fogs easily and towels don't dry.   Overall the prices of the rooms are consistent with a 5 star on the beach.  We have
Manager Response: First and foremost, thank you for your loyalty to The Ritz-Carlton brand. It was truly an honor having you as our guest at our luxurious seaside resort. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your dining experience at 180blu as well as the attentive service of our ladies and gentlemen throughout your visit. We regret to hear our rooms fell short of your expectations. We understand that is a large factor in the quality of your stay and take your feedback seriously. Feel free to contact our Executive Office at your earliest convenience to learn more about our future enhancement plans. We look forward to speaking with you and welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: We recently stayed in the hotel for a portion of our daughter's sweet 16 celebration.  We reserved 2 rooms to accommodate our family of four and two of my daughter's friends.    The hotel significantly exceeded our every expectation:  Rooms:  we were delighted to discover that the hotel upgraded our rooms.  Our Ocean View rooms were truly breathtaking - we will definitely pay the higher rate for these rooms when we return.  Thank you Blake!  Service:  we were overwhelmed by the service/hospitality of the entire hotel staff.  Our Guest Services Coordinator, Aileen, arranged for a birthday surprise for my daughter upon arrival: balloons, a gluten free dessert and a small present.  She even had the hotel chef contact me to confirm the extent of the allergy.  Throughout the entire
Manager Response: We are honored you chose to spend your daughter’s sweet 16 celebration at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. How wonderful it is to celebrate this once-in-a-lifetime occasion with family and friends amongst our luxurious surroundings. We are delighted to hear of all the memories that were made, from our birthday surprise and handwritten cards to the tremendous outdoor activities among the sweeping SoCal coast. Thank you for letting us be a part of these everlasting memories. We look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Enjoy the sun setting over the Pacific
Summary: This is a large property, so be sure to book a room that has an ocean view--one must obviously be on the ocean front side and you must be up high enough to see over the edge of the cliff--we reserve an ocean view room with a small balcony.  Sipping a glass of wine as the sun sets is wonderful---however, enjoying a cup of coffee with the morning sun gleaming off the ocean is pretty great too.  Our room was fairly basic and a little tired.  The property has a wonderful place for breakfast (Raya Restaurant) and there is an outdoor bar space where one can also take in the sunset---there are other restaurant options too.  If you want to swim in the ocean, you will be taking a golf cart down to the water.  They also have a very nice pool area.
Manager Response: It is wonderful to hear about your time at our luxurious resort. The ocean views from our balconies are truly unparalleled, and we are delighted that you were able to relish in the natural beauty of California. We take your feedback very seriously and thank you for taking the time to inform us about your stay. That being said, on behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we would be honored to host you again at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary: The Ritz Carlton in Laguna Niguel is a stunning property, but the room we were given was terrible. It was dark, tired, with no place to unpack. The "garden view" was essentially another building. It was worse than many work hotels I've stayed at. We asked for an upgrade and were told the entire hotel was booked, so for over $1,000 per night we got a room that wasn't much better than a Holiday Inn. I'd stay elsewhere.
Manager Response: Firstly, on behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We understand you expected the best and that is absolutely what you should have received. We are saddened to hear of the condition of your room and we look forward to making this right for you. Please contact our resort manager on duty at your earliest convenience. We certainly hope you enjoyed your overall experience at our phenomenal resort.  We hope to have you back again one day soon and we thank you very much for your valuable feedback.

Summary Heading: Everything you expect at the Ritz
Summary: Stayed here one night in June on the way to visit family. We arrived early, at about 1 pm and took our belongings with us to the club level until room was ready. The Ritz Laguna has a wonderful club level dining room. We enjoyed breakfast and lunch which included fresh fruits and vegetables, salads, pastries, sandwiches, treats, drinks and more. I was able to change in the bathroom and use the "quiet" or adult pool while we waited for our room to be made up. Our ocean view room was stunning and we enjoyed watching the sunset from our deck. Loved the bar just below our room and had appetizers and drinks there before dinner. The beach is just below the hotel and a shuttle is provided. Umbrellas, chairs and beach towels are available and included in the resort fee. Sunscreen is
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your review of the Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel and are elated to hear the details of your stay. It sounds like you were able to take full advantage of our stunning surroundings and amenities, from walking our breathtaking beaches to relaxing at our sparkling blue pools. We look forward to welcoming you back for another sunset from our Ocean View room soon.

Summary Heading: Best Pacific Coast Ritz-Carlton in California with a wonderful beach and Ocean View rooms
Summary: In July 2019, we stayed at the three Ritz-Carlton on the Pacific Coast in California and the Laguna Niguel at the Dana Point was the best for Ritz-Carlton Reward members with Platinum or Titanium Elite status.  We booked a club level room and on our arrival, we were upgraded to the Ocean View room because of our Titanium Elite status. The Ocean View rooms at the club access level have a fantastic view of the beach and the ocean. The club lounge is on the floor and so it's always open for you. Food in the club lounge was excellent and was multifold better than Ritz-Carlton Bacara at Santa Barabara which was the worst of the three Ritz for a Reward member.  We were very happy with Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel front of house management especially Rory Emslie, who jumped on to an
Manager Response: We are humbled by your warm review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel and thank you for your loyalty. It was our honor upgrading you to the Ocean View room (isn’t it stunning?) and are delighted our ladies and gentlemen provided exceptional service, which is something we truly value across our properties. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon—our Ocean View room awaits.

Summary: Because I had such an amazing time here for my anniversary a year ago, I had to come back again.  As expected, the hotel did not disappoint.  One can gather from the consistent reviews for this hotel: the real strength of the hotels is its staff.  The Ritz Laguna has some of the best staff in an American hotel/resort that I have seen.  They are a combination of Japanese luxury hospitality (unparalleled professionalism and presentation) and California hospitality (warm and friendly).  Whether it was the marketplace staff remembering our names on subsequent visits, the beautiful platter sent to our room to celebrate our anniversary, or a customer relations staff flagging us down in the lobby so that our 2-year old toddler could get free toys from a literal treasure chest of
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we appreciate your loyalty and do not take it for granted. We are delighted to hear that we provided another unique and memorable experience for you and your family. We hear you, the coffee makers are being upgraded as we speak. Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback. We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: This is definitely NOT a 5 star hotel. The rooms are very dirty and dated, old sheets and dirty carpets. If you’re visiting the hotel during the summer, expect there to be A LOT of NOISY children running around. The hotels also very busy. On the other hand the property is absolutely beautiful with breathtaking views of the pacific Ocean. Other than the view, there’s nothing special.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for taking the time to post a review about your recent experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We are grateful for your feedback and take all of our guests' comments seriously.  We certainly hope you had a chance to reach out to one of our many leaders throughout your stay so that we had the chance to turn your perception around and ensure your absolute comfort and satisfaction.  If you did not have the chance, please allow us to speak with you personally by contacting our Executive Office.  We want you to have nothing but amazing feelings about our resort and team.  We look forward to speaking with you, and also welcoming you back for a truly memorable experience in the future.

Summary Heading: Amazing location... worth the price to get ocean view
Summary: The hotel is what you expect from a Ritz property, gorgeous property, beautiful lobby, and just top notch staff to assist.  From the valet arrival to the attentive front desk staff you know you will be taken care of.  The club level ocean view rooms are just magnificent albeit expensive.  If you can afford the stay I highly recommend it.  Onsite dining options are fantastic.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our exclusive Club Level experience.  It truly is one of the best in the world.  We enjoyed having you and look forward to your return!

Summary: We decided to stay at the Ritz for our first family vacation. We have two daughters, one 2 years old and the other 10 months old.   Upon arrival the valet personnel greeted us and helped us with our luggage quickly. We arrived a couple of hours before checkin but the front desk was able to find us a room to checkin immediately, which was awesome given the holiday week we stayed.   Our room had plenty of room with one king bed. Our 10 month old was able to crawl around nicely. We also had a pool view, which I thought would be loud but couldnt hear much outside. our room was next to the main entry way to a hall of rooms so at night you could hear people talking and walking back to their rooms but it wasnt burdensome to us.   The service of the room was excellent. The room always
Manager Response: We are honored you chose to spend your first family vacation at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. How special it was to create new memories with your daughters among the sweeping views of the Pacific with plenty of adventures out your door. We are delighted you left with so many memories, from riding our beach trolley to the personalized service of our ladies and gentlemen. We look forward to becoming a part of your family tradition and look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Putting on The Ritz for families
Summary: The location of the hotel makes for dramatic vistas from most positions on the property. It is little far from Laguna Beach, so you will need a car or Uber to go into town. The rooms are large and nice spacious bathrooms. All rooms have a balcony or patio. The staff are very friendly.  Some Cons: there is a ridiculous lack of seating out on the grounds.  A few chairs here and there, even by the fire pit.  It makes no sense for those that want to relax and enjoy the view. The restaurants close too early.  They basically stop seating at 9 pm. The hotel really needs to designate the smaller pool as "adults only." For the cost, one is not going to relax at these pools. Kids are everywhere screaming.  The ambiance of the pools feels like a Holiday Inn.  In these days where parents do
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we thank you for your most valuable feedback. We appreciate you taking the time out of your busy schedule to share it.  We certainly hope your overall experience was a memorable one and that you enjoyed the holiday at our beautiful resort with our talented team. If we can address any of your concerns directly, we would welcome you to contact our executive offices any time. Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: Was here for business the past month of June. An awesome hotel with an awesome location. The hotel is right on the water and you can hear the ocean waves from your room (assuming you on that side.) The restaurants and workout area are very nice as well. Will revisit for sure.
Manager Response: Thank you for your visit!  We look forward to welcoming you back when you have more time to enjoy every phenomenal aspect of our location.

Summary: This was our second visit to the Dana Point Ritz.  We love the location on the cliff above the beach.  The walk down the hill is great exercise, but they also provide a convenient shuttle.  At the bottom of the hill, the hotel provides chairs and umbrellas for the beach.  The surfing at this beach is very active and fun to watch.  Because of the outstanding view of the ocean and sunset, we booked an ocean view-- it is worth the upgrade.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for choosing to join us a second time. We are very appreciative of your loyalty. You could not have chosen better than an ocean view room or suite—the views are truly remarkable. Thank you again, and we hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: Although a little oddly laid-out, it's a very good hotel, some of the views are just wonderful.  The food was good, but not really *fantastic*, the way you'd want food at those prices to be.  I ended up going off campus to eat, and had some great meals (at reasonable prices!)  The middle bar off the lobby is nice, but too small to accommodate guests and the large parties that sometimes come in.  But the service is generally great!
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It was an honor to be of service to you and we look forward to welcoming you back.  We appreciate and thank you for our feedback and take it seriously and constructively.

Summary: My husband and I both extensively travel domestically and internationally. I have stayed at this property on many occasions and it is perhaps my favorite hotel in the world. The staff is always incredibly attentive. The view is incredible. It’s beautiful and relaxing. Expensive but incredible.
Manager Response: We are proud to receive this high praise from such an avid traveler as yourself. Thank you for sharing. We strive to provide perfect experiences, from the view, to the service, to the memories that linger after you check out. It has been our pleasure to welcome you, and it will continue to be in the years to come.

Summary: My wife and I travel a lot for both business and pleasure.  We have now stayed at this hotel three times in the last year and can't wait to return.  Frankly, we have found ourselves constructing reasons to return to this property.  It is not only a beautiful setting in a wonderfully maintained property but the staff go beyond anything expected to make your stay enjoyable.  Special credit goes to Leslie H because she is imbued with the grace and charm that is why the Ritz Carlton brand is so special.  Can't wait for the next trip
Manager Response: Thank you for this wonderful review and for being a loyal guest over the past year. We aim to make every stay more memorable than the last, and our ladies and gentlemen do an exceptional job of ensuring that is the case. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary Heading: Great view.  Iconic Hotel due for a refresh.
Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed staying here.  Great service checking-in.  We got an upgrade to a room with a fire pit overlooking the Pacific coast.  It was somewhat private in that it was elevated from the walkway to the beach.    There were trolleys going into Laguna Beach and Dana Point if you don't want to deal with driving and parking.  What we liked:  - Location overlooking the coast.  Totally relaxing. - Majority of the service (see exception below).  What we didn't like:    - One of the key's had repeated issues not working.  On one of these two different Ritz personal saw I was locked out and radioed for maintenance/security/engineering to open the door.  There was no response.  The front desk had a lame response. That was not a typical Ritz experience. - The rooms are due for a
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate the time you have taken to review your luxury experience. It was our pleasure to provide you with an upgrade—ocean views are a must in Dana Point. In terms of the key issues you experienced, we regret this inconvenience. You are correct that it is atypical, and we will be looking in to how we can avoid any reoccurrences in the future. Your feedback is important to us, and we look forward to welcoming you back to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary: A three day conference can drag a little, but this location was great to break with.  Right on the beach, set high, the view is amazing. Facilities, food and staff all first rate.  The rooms were clean and well appointed, if a little tired.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our magnificent surroundings while attending your conference. We are continuously making enhancements to our rooms and would be honored to share our ongoing plans with you to ensure your next visit exceeds your expectations. We look forward to welcoming you back soon, whether for business or leisure.

Summary: My husband and I recently attended a conference in Laguna Niguel and were looking forward to the “Ritz Carlton” experience that we had heard so much about. Unfortunately, our stay was anything but exceptional. The location is beautiful, perched right on the water and the venue certainly caters to the view, but there were enough small issues with the hotel and service itself that it actually made our stay much less pleasant than expected. Right from the get-go, they didn’t have the correct room ready (to be fair, we were checking in a couple hours early) – we had reserved a King, but all they had available were two “executive doubles”…which means two double beds. We were clear that this wasn’t ideal and we’d like to eventually switch rooms so we didn’t have to sleep in separate
Manager Response: On behalf of our entire team, we appreciate your candid feedback and we look forward to helping you through this disappointing experience to your satisfaction.  Please contact our Executive Offices directly at your earliest convenience.  We value your opinions and your loyalty, and hope you offer us a chance to regain your confidence.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary: We picked this hotel as a getaway for an anniversary trip.  The location of the property is quiet, secluded and breathtaking.  We arrived late and the front desk agent was friendly and welcoming.  The bowl of salt water taffy was delicious, we tried every flavor!  The room we were assigned to was comfortable, but smelled of mildew.  There were no other rooms as the hotel was sold out, so we bought a candle in the gift shop and had that sucker going 24/7.  We even asked housekeeping if there was anything they could do, but other than another vaccuuming, the grody smelled remained.  Keeping the balcony door open also helped.  I just didn't want my clothes to wind up smelling like mildew.  The other downer is that the bath tub is miniscule.  Barely large enough for one person.  The
Manager Response: First and foremost, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel to spend your anniversary. We know you had many choices in luxury accommodations to spend this special celebration. We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed our breathtaking grounds and delectable breakfasts overlooking our magnificent surroundings. We appreciate you letting us know your feedback concerning your room and we do take it seriously.

Summary: Truly a once in a lifetime experience!  Amazing ocean views, incredible in-room fire features with s’mores kit!  Service is great, terrific restaurant and bar options, surf competitions out the front door. Business or pleasure - perfect!  I’ll be back.
Manager Response: We are honored that you chose The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel and are elated to hear of your experience. It is wonderful you were able to enjoy our outstanding dining options, in-room amenities, and outdoor adventures amid the sweeping Southern California coast. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Beautiful facility/always a pleasure to visit
Summary: Beautiful facility and a wonderful location.  Top notch personnel add to the experience.  Food/restaurants are great and the Laguna setting offers many attractions for walking/hiking/shopping driving tours and various recreation.  Can’t say enough good things about this place.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to spend your vacation at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are delighted to hear you had a memorable experience, from dining at our exquisite restaurants to enjoying our outdoor activities where you can soak in the breathtaking views of the coast. We look forward to welcoming you back again in the future.

Summary Heading: Beautiful and the service was amazing!
Summary: My wife and I stayed for a three day business conference.  Other than a few clouds in the sky, our trip was perfect.  Bruce, Dale, and Colleen took wonderful care of my wife as I attended meetings.  Felt like home!  Thank you all!!
Manager Response: We are delighted your conference was a success and that you and your wife felt at home with us.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Staying at this hotel was on my bucket list simply because of the location and views. I would’ve paid $1000 for the one night I did stay just to sleep in a hammock at 180blu, as long as bottomless chef’s grilled cheese sandwiches were included. What a view!
Manager Response: We agree! Thank you very much. When will you be returning? We will have your hammock and grilled cheese waiting!

Summary: The hotel sits right on the ocean and a beautiful property.  Most of the personnel were friendly and helpful and made the visit a very nice one.  One should be cautioned that this is a very pricey property with a $50 per day parking fee and a $50 per day resort fee.  We are big fans of Ritz Carlton and while this is a great property we did not consider it a great value.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to provide your valuable feedback. Our ladies and gentlemen take pride in serving our guests and we're glad you enjoyed our oceanfront resort. We are disappointed to hear that you didn't see the value in staying with us. We are continuously enhancing the resort and services to provide even more memorable experiences for our guests. Please feel free to contact our executive offices. It would be a pleasure to speak with you  and welcome you back.

Summary Heading: Own private beach and pool, towels supplied!
Summary: About $200 bucks a night but you get what you pay for,right?! A little stiff necked for famillies however, the rooms are fantastic. Carefull if you keep the supplied bathrobes they will charge you about $30 laguna itself is charming almost European in places. Beautifull!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We're glad you enjoyed your experience and had a great time exploring Laguna Beach. We look forward to welcoming you back to our oceanfront resort.

Summary Heading: The service is always very good, but the hotel need another update.....
Summary: I like the people at the Ritz.  They are well trained and always provide excellent service.  The rooms, however, need another update.  It feels a little old and dated, but we knew this when we booked and did so anyway.  Might give something else a try next time.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are grateful for your loyalty and  would be honored to welcome you back for a memorable experience.

Summary: I took my wife here for our 14 year anniversary.  We have stayed at a Ritz-Carlton before and like to stay for special occasions.  We booked through Amex Platinum Fine Hotels.  This was supposed to give us some additional perks.  We received a $30 each breakfast credit as well as a one time $100 credit.  The $100 covered the $50 a day parking fee.  I was supposed to get a room upgrade if available.  I had booked a partial ocean view.  The front desk said that they had an upgrade, however, when I got to the room it was a partial ocean view.  I asked if I was upgraded and told yes I have been upgraded 3 levels.  I'm sorry but I don't believe them.  The room was still great a little small.  The grounds are amazing and very well kept.  Just remember you are at the Ritz.  It is not
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton brand for your special occasions. We are grateful for your loyalty and enjoy providing you a unique and memorable experience each and every time. Please feel free to call us prior to your next visit so we may ensure we have the exact room you are looking for. We look forward to hosting you again soon.

Summary Heading: Second time around and just as good
Summary: Was at the Ritz at Laguna for the second time at the beginning of May. It was as I remembered a beautiful place and I feel very lucky to have stayed there not once but twice. Location is just beautiful. The service and food also wonderful! Just my opinion but the rooms could use a bit of an upgrade/refresh but certainly doesn’t take away from a great hotel and a beautiful destination. Would love to go back for a third time.
Manager Response: Your loyalty means the world to us.  On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, it would be an honor to welcome you back for another unique and memorable experience soon.

Summary: Stayed at this hotel for a conference.  The hotel is gorgeous, from the lobby to rooms.   The staff was very friendly, attentive and helpful. Views are incredible, especially from bar on property 180blu, the best place to watch the sunset. There are great walking paths by the beach and also beach access. Service was incredible during our stay, the only downside I would say is that turndown service was pretty early in the evening, before we even left for dinner. Overall amazing hotel and service!
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking a few moments to write about your experience. From watching the sunset at 180blu to scenic strolls along the beach, it sounds like you enjoyed the perfect blend of business and leisure travel. Thank you for your compliments of our service and accommodations.

Summary: I was visiting the Ritz as part of a business conference from Toronto, Canada. Last night, a waiter unfortunately dropped a glass of red wine on my back. An accident - this could happen to anyone. A manager named Courtney was instantaneously at my side apologizing and offering to help.  We went to the bathroom where she tried to put club soda on my trench coat and white jeans. She promised to have both items back to me the next day after being dry cleaned.  At about 5:30pm the next day, I phoned the concierge, worried that my trench coat was not back for our outdoor party starting at 6:30.  A sweet young man called Leonardo brought my jeans back shortly after the call, and apologized that they were still working on my jacket.  He offered to find me at the party when it was
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for taking a moment to share your experience. We take great pride in always trying to provide the most excellent service and attention. It was our pleasure tracking down and purchasing a replacement jacket for you to wear to your event. We hope you enjoyed the rest of your visit, and we hope you will return again soon!

Summary: Had such a wonderful time! Great time at the pool, walking on the beach, poking around tide pools. Unbelievable views from the restaurants! Very nice Ritz Carlton!  The staff was extremely helpful! John the bellman kept us in stitches our whole stay, Natalie met us with refreshing glasses of Champagne, Adrian was very helpful at the front desk and Dora was very helpful at the shop!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are pleased to hear the details of your luxurious experience, from enjoying our immaculate surroundings and renowned dining to the personalized service of our ladies and gentlemen. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: We’ve stayed in other Ritz Carlton hotels (Grande Lakes, Philadelphia, Virginia) but have never been as impressed as we were by this particular Ritz in Laguna Niguel.  The property is absolutely breathtaking, on the bluff of a beautiful beach, surrounded by pretty flowers and palm trees.    The service here is impeccable, starting from check in by Melissa, who made our bad flight from NY much better by being so kind and friendly.    We stayed on the club floor and had access to the club lounge.  The dessert at the club lounge is truly wonderful.  Works of art!  Prior to our arrival, Aileen emailed me and inquired about our trip.  I mentioned it was my birthday and imagine my delight when I found a bottle of champagne and a cake in the room to welcome me!  Then another night,
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for your loyalty and choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are humbled by your kind words and delighted to have made your birthday a memorable experience. From your surprise cake to yoga amid our stunning ocean views, it was truly our pleasure making your visit unforgettable. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Best Short stay we have ever had.
Summary: It was my wife's birthday and one of the items on her bucket list was to see the Pageant of the Masters in Laguna Beach.. Of course it was sold out for the season for any decent seating. We called the Ritz-Carlton and they had a package for the Pageant of the Masters and a nights stay. It was a little pricey but they made it so worth while. We walk into the lobby to check in and the greet us with champagne, then check in and they bring us our tickets and a special bag of goodies for the Pageant of the Masters, a program and a very nice little blanket for each of us as the nights can get a little on the cool side at the Pageant of the Masters. ONce we returned back tot he room after the end of the event, we found a note to call room service to have them bring us something, We had
Manager Response: Thank you for placing your trust in us. We are delighted to have made your wife’s birthday a memorable one with our Pageant of the Masters package along with the surprise birthday cake. We hope to welcome you back again in the future for even more memories.

Summary: I had the occasion to visit Raya restaurant at the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel for lunch with my family. They offer a great variety of typical Californian cuisine and the meats, seafood & Veg options are exquisite. The service is outstanding and personalized and the ambience and the view of the pacific made the whole experience very memorable
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing RAYA at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We enjoyed creating a unique and memorable experience for you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Spectacular everything. Travelled for a meeting. Food, rooms, hospitality, grounds, pool, hot tub... unimprovable. Particularly grateful to the lovely front desk staff who loaded me up with the awesome saltwater taffy (to which I developed a minor addiction) before sending me on my way at checkout. Note that Ubers are fast and plentiful if you’re going anywhere. Normally a Holiday Inn person, so this hotel was a little intimidating to walk into, but staff friendly, professional and gracious and we felt right at home.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton. We enjoyed having you and look forward to your return!

Summary: beautiful loacation - on the cliff above a beautifull surffing areae. Great staff very helpful and positive. room is extra clean. Shower is wide and nice. Bed is extra comfortable and cozy. all together expensive and great
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed a luxurious experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. Our ladies and gentlemen and sleek seaside rooms will be awaiting your return.

Summary: The Ritz at Laguna Beach far exceeded expectations and we have stayed at top resorts worldwide. Spectacular service, food, value and drop dead gorgeous hotel, location and grounds. Club level is excellent. Beautiful pool areas and beach area.
Manager Response: Happy Anniversary!  We are delighted you chose our beautiful seaside resort for your celebration, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable experience soon.

Summary: This is a beautiful and luxurious resort overlooking the ocean and everything is impeccable. We came here for a relaxing weekend birthday even though it is fairly close to where we live. We felt like it was a real vacation. There was a surfing competition on the beach that we could watch. In April the ocean is still very cold and the waves can be rough so no one was swimming but the Ritz has a good pool. I had a massage that was excellent but very expensive – almost $300 for an hour with the tip included. The restaurant overlooks the ocean and part of the coast. They don’t reserve tables by the window but you can ask when you come down if they have one available. The dinner was wonderful. I had Mexican sea bass, very fresh and prepared to order. We stayed in a suite on the 4th
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  It was our pleasure creating a memorable experience for you, and we look forward to creating more unique memories for you again in the future.  We are honored to be your "staycation" getaway.

Summary Heading: surprised us in a good way
Summary: We were at this hotel for a work event and weren't really expecting much, but were very pleasantly surprised! The beach was gorgeous and the staff were so helpful and gracious! We enjoyed our stay so much that we plan to book again in August when we are back in SoCal dropping off my son for college- we'll stay a few days before hand for some quality family time.
Manager Response: Thank you for your trust and loyalty. We look forward to welcoming you back in August for a wonderful and memorable experience with your family.

Summary: My wife and I returned a few weeks ago after spending 5 days mixing a couples get away with business.  The Ritz Carlton, located in Laguna Niguel and Dana Point surpassed even the magnificent ocean views that it provides to all its visiting guests!  How is that accomplished?  Hospitality is not the view, its all the professional staff that do their jobs to make the view secondary.  From our friendly greeters at the main entrance, Milo at the front desk, Miguel in Raya who welcomes you to “His Office” before serving the freshest and most colorful breakfast dish that I ever had.  Chef Sandoval has composed each and every dish with his ability to reach all your senses.  GM Bruce Brainerd the Team that you work with reflect professionalism even the maintenance team that were
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. Our ladies and gentlemen work very hard to ensure every aspect of our luxurious accommodations exceed your expectations. We are pleased to hear you left with many memories, including our impeccable views, elegant rooms, and delicious food. We look forward to welcoming you back again in the future.

Summary: This hotel has every possible thing that makes a vacation perfect. The Club Level has been updated in the last year to a modern, light & bright gorgeous lounge. Even better than the update is the staff. While the whole hotel has incredible staff, the Club Level staff is beyond 5 star. Mary is AMAZING & kind & sweet & has been there for 22 years. My 4 yo granddaughter *adored* her & they were fast friends. Penni, who has been there 34 years is also wonderful & special & made our stay extra lovely. This is our favorite hotel for many reasons (views, vibes, location) but, the staff make it exceptional. Thank you to everyone who contributed to making us feel welcome & special. We love you all!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words, and most importantly for your loyalty to our beautiful resort and ladies and gentlemen.  It is truly our pleasure to provide unique experiences for you and your family.  We are delighted you enjoyed our newly enhanced Club Level, and we look forward to welcoming you back "home" soon.

Summary: I booked two rooms with points for a weekend getaway to celebrate my wife's 30th birthday with family.  I exchanged emails ahead of time with Aileen in Guest Relations, notifying her of the occasion (Thank you Aileen!).   The staff not only provided an excellent upgrade to a sea view room with fire pit, but provided birthday cake and balloons in the rooms upon arrival.  While my Gold Elite status does provide upgrades, this was a particularly generous upgrade (several tiers higher and for two rooms).  My wife, family and I were all thrilled with the upgrades, cake and balloons setting a positive tone for our stay.  The rooms are very luxurious, as you expect for a Ritz.  The beds are exceptionally comfortable and the bathrooms very ornate.  I always appreciate the double vanity
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz Carlton, Laguna Niguel to spend your special weekend. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed such a memorable celebration with us, from your room upgrade and birthday surprise for your wife, to watching the sunset with your family over exceptional food at RAYA. We look forward to creating another memorable experience for you soon.

Summary Heading: Outstanding Hotel, with One Caveat - the Rooms
Summary: We stayed for a week in February and spent almost all of our time at the hotel.  We had an oceanfront room with a balcony overlooking the beach. The hotel is spectacular in almost every way and if you are used to the brand, it lives up to expectations.  Pros: - Professional staff and level of service befitting the RC brand - Perched on a picturesque cliff with scenic trails and superb landscaping - See whales, dolphins, hawks, sunsets, and people surfing from your room - Relaxing and comforting atmosphere in all the common spaces and restaurants - Very knowledgeable concierge who will send you where you actually want to go; a few miles up the PCH or a few hours into the state, instead of just pointing out the attractions within a few blocks - Great room service selection for
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your valuable feedback. It was truly an honor to have you as our guest. We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed our scenic views and the personalized service of our ladies and gentlemen, who work diligently to ensure your stay is as magnificent as our surroundings. We are disappointed to hear your experience fell short of your expectations in other areas, such as our front desk service and guestrooms. We are continuously enhancing the resort, and are always happy to share our ongoing plans with you.  Please feel free to contact the executive offices any time. It would be a pleasure to speak with you and welcome you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Stayed for a conference, would not pay to.
Summary: I stayed 3 nights as part of a conference, however there are much better hotels in the area. The Marriott in Dana Point has some great renovated rooms, and the Montage to the north has service that is beyond.   What the Ritz Laguna does well:   Bell staff. The bell staff exceptionally friendly, quick and genuinely seemed to care that I had a good stay.   Beds were comfortable and clean. The room I was in had a nice balcony to enjoy the sea views from.  The Coffee Bar. An odd thing to highlight but it’s really stocked, quick with great service and quality drinks. I was really in the mood for Ginger Beer one day and they had it, which is was an unexpected surprise.   What didn’t go well:   The rooms are very dated, and oddly configured. The bathrooms are marble, but not in a lux
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for taking the time to provide your detailed feedback.  We take it to heart and appreciate every word.  We are delighted to hear your positive comments about our bell service, our sleep experience, and our Market Place.  Unfortunately we fell short of your expectations with respects to our guestrooms, our front desk service, and our In Room Dining menu.  We do hope you choose to join us again in the future, and we trust your next experience will be a much more desirable one.  We would welcome the opportunity to assist you in the future and share with you our room enhancement plans.  Please feel free to contact the executive offices any time.  It would be a pleasure to speak with you.

Summary: This hotel is my favorite hotel I have ever stayed at - the rooms are classic and beautiful, the beach and views are stunning and the staff was incredible. I went with a girlfriend for a girls getaway and we had the very best time. We didn't even leave the property except to walk the beach.
Manager Response: This sounds like a fun getaway filled with many meaningful memories!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: I used Marriott points to reserve a room for our family.  We were extremely satisfied with everything about the Hotel.  The staff was outstanding.  The hotel is very open, clean and very relaxed.  I highly recommend this hotel!  We stayed at the Montage a few years earlier and the views are probably better at the Ritz!  Get an ocean view room.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel to spend your family vacation. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your experience with us.  We truly value your loyalty to our resort and look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Ritz in Name and Price Only
Summary: My husband and I have stayed at over a dozen Ritz-Carlton properties and can't wait to return to many of them.  The Laguna Niguel did not meet expectations and I am baffled by the positive reviews. (Different room levels?)  Of course, the views are gorgeous.  The valet was top-notch. Car was ready when you called down and the staff made a point to know you and which car you drove. (We were driving a rental, so nothing noteworthy.)  It is a older hotel and a little tired, but the decor is fairly up-to-date.  Here is where the hotel fell short... Room:  Our teenage son was traveling with us, so we requested a room with two double beds. There were two beds, but not sure they were double-bed width.  The electrical cord "jungle" on the floor between the bed and nightstand (not behind
Manager Response: On behalf of our executive committee and all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for taking a moment to provide your detailed feedback.  We cherish hearing from our guests and take all comments, both positive and negative, to heart.  We know you had many choices in luxury accommodations, and we were honored to have you and your family as our guests. We regret that your experience fell short of your expectations, and we extend our sincerest apologies for the service inconsistencies you mention. . Please know we are grateful for your loyalty to our resort and brand, and we would value the opportunity to speak with you further. Please contact our Executive Offices so we can learn more from you and ensure you feel confident in choosing The Ritz-Carlton in the future. Thank you..

Summary: Beautiful views, great space, several pool areas, access to the beach. There is a patio overlooking the ocean where you can watch surfers on the waters. The bar area also overlooks the waters. There is a cafe and coffee bar in the lounge with various televisions available. The hotel restaurant is beautiful as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It was our pleasure providing you with a memorable experience, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Worked with Mai in group sales for a special event recently. This is, by far, the best property in Southern California. The views are spectacular. I highly recommend this hotel for business and personal travelers. Excellent location as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are delighted to hear your event was a success and you were able to enjoy our spectacular views. We look forward to welcoming you back soon, whether it be for business or leisure.

Summary: Our first stay at the Ritz Laguna Niguel won’t be our last! Top notch from the moment we pulled up....gorgeous resort and grounds with breathtaking views...luxury at its finest! Everywhere we went we were greeted with helpful, pleasant service that is hard to come by consistently with other hotels. Delicious dining options, some with outdoor seating. We could spend days just admiring the coast and cliffs from the various balconies around the resort or walking the beach during sunset. Our room was very spacious with a beautiful balcony - walk in closet and large bathroom with plenty of space to get ready in (water pressure in the shower was really good which is so important!). We can’t wait to return one day to enjoy this wonderful experience again! Thank you Ritz Laguna Niguel!!
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our phenomenal resort and magnificent surroundings.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton.  We look forward to welcoming you back one day soon!

Summary Heading: Sweeping views of the California Coast
Summary: Staying here is like living in a fantasy dream world. The employes are top notch and the service is the best in the world. The rooms are elegent and the grounds are awsome. The location is close to everything you could want to see including Dana Point harbor and Fashion Island.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we appreciate your kind words and are delighted to hear you enjoyed your Ritz-Carlton experience. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Ritz Laguna is exactly how you see CA in the movies. Its scenery and beauty is wonderful!!! The hotel is a five stars no doubt about it. The rooms and the bathrooms are impeccable!!! The beds are sooooooooo confortable, you will sleep like a baby!! The rooftop terrace bar and tapas is also where you want to be at sunset. It is the most beautiful sunset I have ever seen. You will agree with me once you re up there :)!! Enjoy your stay in Dana Point! It is the best place on earth!  Stephanie from Montreal
Manager Response: Thank you for your visit Stephanie!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon for another magnificent sunset and memorable experience.

Summary Heading: Amazing views, service and food but our room was as tired as we were...
Summary: Arrived on Thursday from the Midwest and even though it was cool and rainy, I felt I was in one corner of Paradise. The hotel's grounds are beautiful and the service first-rate. Even though I was attending a conference, I felt that the food offerings were among the best. For me, the only aspect of the visit that was disappointing related to the guest room itself. The bathroom shower/tub is great but the tub side is high and for a short person or someone with arthritis, getting in and out is a challenge. There is a phone in the "water closet" which hits you when seated in a most awkward place and the use of mirrors not only in the bathroom but in the room itself is not attractive. Some of the furniture seemed mismatched and the wallpaper tired looking.The bed mattress and balcony
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review of your recent experience at our resort.  We appreciate your feedback very much.  We are delighted to hear your conference was a success and we look forward to welcoming you back soon whether it be for business or leisure.  If we can assist you in any way, please call direct and it would be our pleasure.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary: What can I say, it’s the Ritz.   Spectacular cliff side views from each of the restaurants, balconies and gardens. There is direct beach access below the resort with good sand and enough waves to draw a good surfing crowd each day.   The service was exactly what you’d expect from a Ritz. Every member of the staff greeted us, was courteous and immediately ready to help.   The rooms are a little aged, but well appointed. The bathrooms are marble with large deep tubs and split sinks and the bed was clean and comfortable.   We were there for a conference so our meals were all through the catering service. There were over 300 people there for the conference but the staff wasn’t even phased. The food was excellent so I have to imagine the restaurants do even better considering they
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for your visit!  We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your conference, and we hope you had a chance to soak in a little of our magnificent surroundings as well.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon whether it be for busy or leisure.  Please let us know if we can assist you in any way.

Summary: My family lives in this area and I have always stayed in one of the other five star hotels in the area.  I decided to try Ritz Carlton.  I had a wonderful experience.    The rooms are somewhat basic but the views are fantastic.  I love it that you can use the spa facilities even if you don't have a treatment booked which is not the case with Monarch Beach Resort.  I love being able to pop into the steam room after a workout or a swim in the ocean.  The spa staff are so gracious.    I loved my view over the ocean.    The bathrooms could use a little upgrade - especially the bathtub is quite small for a 6 ft tall girl.  There is one person who motivated to take time for this review.  His name is Joel Raya and was the Head Waiter in the restaurant at breakfast.  He provided true
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We truly value your feedback and are delighted to hear you enjoyed our stunning views overlooking the ocean, luxurious spa, a la carte breakfast, and of course, the kind and attentive service of our ladies and gentlemen. We are continuously making enhancements to our rooms as we believe in providing guests a full luxury experience. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: I was part of a conference taking place at the hotel and, as such, spent two nights.    The hotel's setting is gorgeous; it's right on the Pacific ocean, dramatically sitting atop a cliff.  It poured during the entirety of my stay, limiting my ability to enjoy a walk along the beach or an outdoor cocktail, but I still appreciated the lovely location and incredible views.    My room was okay.  On the plus side, it was ocean-facing, with a small balcony.  Obviously, having an ocean view in such a beautiful spot was welcome, and I appreciated being able to open the French doors and hear the ocean.  Sadly, even during the brief periods when it was not raining, the balcony was impossible to use:  drainage on the balcony was poor, and consequently the balcony was consistently filled
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen thank you very much for your detailed comments. We were honored to have you as our guest and are so sorry if certain aspects of your stay were not as exceptional as you have come to know. We would enjoy hearing more from you, if you wouldn’t mind giving us a call in the executive offices. We certainly hope you can come back when the weather is much nicer and we can provide you with a memorable experience. Thank you again for posting your feedback.

Summary: My husband and I stayed at the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel this past weekend and it was an amazing experience! We were upgraded to a club floor and a suite, which was lovely and much appreciated. The hotel staff was absolutely wonderful— very friendly, professional, and helpful. Penny and Mercedes in the Club Lounge are absolute gems— they were so friendly and hospitable. Our room was clean, spacious, and well-appointed (though there was a strong cleaning fragrance scent when we first arrived in the room, which wasn’t great and kind of gave me a headache). The hotel decor was impeccable and I still can’t get over the gorgeous rose floral arrangements in the lobby/3rd floor hallways of the hotel during our stay! The view/ location is spectacular, and the hotel grounds are
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  It was a pleasure creating a unique and memorable experience for  you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Perhaps you can join us for one of our amazing Yappy Hours this year.  Contact us directly or visit our website for more information.  Welcome home!

Summary: I ran into a few logistic problems during this visit, and I have to highly commend the manager for graciously helping to solve everything.  It was a pleasure to interface with a hotel staff person who seemed truly engaged in making things work superbly for his hotel guests.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We're so glad to hear that you enjoyed your visit and had a memorable experience. We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary Heading: Amazing views, great location, immaculate rooms
Summary: Stayed in room with fire pit and view of the ocean and beach.  Felt like heaven on Earth.  Room was large, bathroom clean and well appointed.  Comfortable bed and nice fitness center.  Only improvement I'd make would be to enlarge the fitness center--it was crowded in the early morning.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you and look forward to doing so again soon. Welcome home!

Summary: My partner and I decided to book a stay-cation for a few nights at The Ritz Laguna Niguel. It was our first time here, and it was absolutely wonderful. Three people specially made our stay very special. Hannah from the Welcome Desk was absolutely amazing! She was patient with us and our pursuit to find the perfect room. She was able to accommodate us with the perfect room that truly made our stay memorable. Our server Dianna, from the restaurant Raya, was such a sweetheart. She was very attentive and made sure our dining experience was great. She came out and surprised my partner with a dessert for his birthday, and even wrote his name on the plate! Last but certainly not least, Dyanne from The Marketplace was unbelievable. She overheard me talking to the barista about how cold
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Ritz Carlton, Laguna Niguel for such a momentous occasion.  We are delighted to hear you had a unique and memorable experience with us.  Our ladies and gentlemen will enjoy your kind comments, and we thank you for sharing.  We look forward to celebrating with you again soon!
