Summary: Had a business meeting and enjoyed the hotel. Service and staff are friendly. The club floor is excellent and meeting rooms very good. The views are breathtaking and lovely.  Beautiful grounds and walkways.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear that you had some time to enjoy our incredible property while on your business trip. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Stayed here in 2012 and had a marvelous experience.  Stayed here again this week for a similar business meeting (group of about 100).  Again, among the best of all Ritz properties in which I have stayed.  The bars and catering services were first class.  Dale in the club lounge could not have been more attentive.  Plenty of beautiful vistas and great little places to sit and enjoy.  The property is immaculately groomed. Recommend without hesitation.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear both of your experiences with us have been enjoyable. Thank you for your loyalty to our resort. From our sweeping Pacific views to our lavish facilities and the personalized services of our ladies and gentlemen, we aspire to treat our guests to a true luxury experience. We hope you come back and enjoy another sunset with us soon.

Summary: The views from this hotel are stunning. The resturant has a front row seat to surfers and the coastline. Splurge on an ocean view room, it’s worth it.   The rooms have been redesigned and are very strangely decorated. There is a flat screen on the wall with nothing underneath it -no furniture like a credenza or table. Also, they hide the safe and coffee maker in a closet by the window. I didn’t even know it was a closet until I saw a little tag that read “open me”. The inside is tricked out with lifted mirrors in a very tacky way...I half expected music to play when I opened the door!
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We appreciate and enjoyed your feedback, and look forward to welcoming you back soon

Summary Heading: Classy and comfortable but at a price
Summary: It’s a Ritz—everything is overpriced. Had a pool view room which was large and comfortable, but it was a bit dark and depressing because an archway over the balcony blocked light. Very comfortable bed and lovely bathroom. Didn’t go to the spa because the services are outrageously expensive. Restaurants very expensive (raya dinner better than brunch). Pretty views. Was too cold to use the pool or beach. Valet was very helpful but didn’t seem to be a self park option. Front desk at check in could have been better. First off it seemed as though they were all teenagers. The girl thought I was staying 3 not the 4 nights on my confirmation. When I corrected her and told her my confirm said 4, her response was “let me make sure I can get you the fourth night at that same rate.” Her
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel and for providing your feedback. We value your opinion and are pleased to hear our sleep experience was memorable and you enjoyed our stunning views. We appreciate your constructive comments and will most definitely use them appropriately.  We hope to welcome you back soon, and if we can assist you in any way, we would be delighted to.  Our leadership team is always available for you.

Summary Heading: Seriously needs a major update-the 80s are over
Summary: I remember coming here in the late 80's and what a buzz it had around it then.Unfortunately nothing in the hotels rooms have changed since then.The view is still the same so it has that but there are other hotels around that have the same views but won't make you feel like Reagan is still president.I would rate it average only because the staff's friendliness brought the score up.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your feedback.  We greatly appreciate you posting on Trip Advisor.  We value your opinion and have shared it with our executive team.  We hope to have the chance to welcome you back in the future as we are continuously executing enhancements throughout the resort, and we would be delighted to share them with you. If we can assist you or answer any questions, please feel free to contact our Executive Offices any time.

Summary: I was upgraded to an oceanfront room on 3rd floor with an outstanding view of the ocean & beach.  I kept the french doors open at night to enjoy the sounds of the waves crashing & fresh ocean breeze!  I sat on the lovely lawn on the cliff every late afternoon to watch the amazing sunsets; best in the world!  You can easily walk down to the beach or the hotel provides a golf cart shuttle to/from.  The property is a bit dated & needs some work, but the location makes up for it.  As with all Ritz properties it's expensive & they top it off with $50/day in resort fees & parking....plus, all the restaurants, bars etc are expensive.  But I guess you pay for the atmosphere.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to describe the details of your stay. We are pleased to hear that our well-appointed guest rooms improved your experience with us—waking up to the sounds of the ocean truly is wonderful. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back soon.

Summary: If you're looking for a luxury resort on the Pacific Ocean, then the Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel fits the bill. Built into a cliff overlooking the ocean, the Ritz has a commanding view that I could have looked at all day long. I had a lovely room with a king bed and balcony with a view of the ocean. Unfortunately, it wasn't warm enough to sit out there for long. I did walk down to the beach, but the path is quite steep. Luckily, the hotel has a beach concierge that you can call for a ride back to the top of the cliff.   The room had plenty of space to put two large suitcases on luggage racks and still walk around. Even better than two sinks, the bathroom had two self-contained vanity areas with a make-up mirror in one. My only complaint was that I'm short, and the mirror was too
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share the details of your experience with us. We are thrilled your stay was luxurious and memorable, from our spacious guest rooms to the personalized service of our ladies and gentlemen. Our sweeping views of the coast will be here waiting when you return to Dana Point.

Summary Heading: Family friendly resort with great views
Summary: This is the second time I have been to the hotel and enjoyed it with my family this time.  My young children received a gift upon checkin and a baby accessories were delivered with a crib.  The room is quite large with a balcony, bathroom with double sink, bathtub, and shower, and refrigerator.  There is a large pool, hot tub, and access to the beach with chairs and umbrellas provided by the hotel.  The beach is at the bottom of a hill from the hotel, but a shuttle is available to and from the entrance to the beach.  The only parking available is valet and it is expensive, but the car was available within minutes of request. Dogs are also allowed on property.  Great stay overall.
Manager Response: Thank you for spending your family getaway with us. We value your loyalty to our hotel and are elated to hear that you and your children received all of the accommodations you needed to ensure it was a comfortable and memorable stay.

Summary Heading: Fabulous Views from Hotel Sitting on Rock Cliffs
Summary: Very luxurious public spaces for dining, lounging and people watching. Rooms quite comfortable although furnishings rather dated-no usb ports and very limited electrical outlets. Management advised that they are soon to undertake major refurbishment of all guest rooms. Although Platinum Elite-no upgrades offered and unable to have early check-in even though requested by personal concierge a couple of times in advance of our arrival. We were compensated with wine, champagne, fruit and chocolate strawberries two evenings. Did offset the mixed arrival experience to some extent. It was the week between Christmas and New Years and very full of young facilities with their grand parents. Outdoor pool and spa facilities outstanding. Meals at small cafe for breakfast much less hassle
Manager Response: Thank you for spending your family getaway with us. We value your loyalty to our resort, brand, and company, and are elated to hear that you and your children received all of the accommodations you needed to ensure it was a comfortable and memorable stay. We look forward to welcoming you back soon and providing you with a complimentary upgrade based upon our availability.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary Heading: Great Spa for Relaxation at the Ritz!
Summary: This is a review for the Spa at the Ritz-Carlton. First, any hotel guest can use the facilities even without a service. There is a quiet and calm sitting room where you can read or take a nap or otherwise relax. They have trail mix, dried fruit, tea, cucumber water, etc. - everything you would want! You can also use the steam room and sauna, as well as amazing rainfall showers. They have hair dryers, lotion, mouthwash, lockers, etc. However, all of these services are separated by men and women, so you may not be able to relax with your boo.  I had a wonderful and relaxing time here, and was well taken care of. It isn't too busy, so you can really get some R&R in.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed a relaxing retreat to our spa. Thank you for unwinding with us and enjoying our extensive amenities. We appreciate your kind review, and we would enjoy providing you with another rejuvenating experience soon.

Summary: Postives: Can take drinks from club lounge to pool Alcohol selection Cleaner than most Bathroom bright Toilet flushes well Fireplace we get to turn on Beautiful Views & property, staff takes pride Jay - drove us to beach via the golf cart many times, very friendly Places all over property to enjoy and relax (fire pit, adarondeck chairs) Restaurants with views Snack shop  Valet is fast Manager cares We had nice patio Lots of fun shopping and restaurants nearby Concierge was very helpful   Negatives:  The Club Louge:  It has a strange layout, drinks not refrigerated and sit on shelves, people staying on the floor walk through the lounge, not many tables, only one small table outside with an ocean view, food not nearly as good as other Ritz lounges, always have to knock on the back
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton.  We value your patronage and loyalty.  We appreciate your very detailed feedback and will certainly use it constructively.  If we can assist you or answer any questions for you regarding your most recent stay, or a future one, please contact our Executive Office.  It would be our pleasure to speak with you.  We want you to feel excellent about choosing our resort and brand.  We look forward to welcoming you back one day soon and providing you with a very memorable, first-class experience.

Summary Heading: One of my fav resorts in the US
Summary: Is the Ritz perfect - no.  Is it better than the Monarch across the street?  Well, for me I give it a slight nod, although there is room for improvement.    Pros - It’s on the ocean - the view here is amazing.  You’re on top of Salt Creek Beach and almost every room above the main floor facing West has some view.  You can watch the dozens of surfers from either your balcony, from RAYA restaurant or from the outdoor bar area.  There are also chairs along the first floor grassy areas where you can order food and drinks.  One of the best views on the West coast  - The pools do not have a view of the coast, likely to protect them from the wind, but there are two pools (one main and one smaller - there’s also a hot tub tucked in the corner of the smaller pool which is nice) - Both of
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for your detailed feedback.  We hope you enjoyed your experience at our resort, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  We appreciate your loyalty to our resort, brand, and company. If there is anything we can do for your prior to your next visit, please let us know.  It would be our pleasure.

Summary Heading: Great Location with huge easy access beach
Summary: Rooms were small and my room was actually a 15-minute walk from the entrance.  The hotel has very easy access to a huge and mostly deserted beach and a golf course so wonderful to walk around on. Great sunset views but the bar does not have adequate heating so you will freeze while you watch The restaurant had very limited vegetarian options -- I think they should seriously get that fixed unless they only care to cater to rich old white people who are astonished that someone may not want to eat meat. The staff was very nice to my grand daughter
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid feedback.  We always enjoy receiving our guests thoughts and views, and sharing them with our team.  We hope you enjoyed your experience and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary: This is a beautiful beachfront property. Unfortunately our room was located on the “garden” side. And it was as far from the elevator as possible. It was a very long walk from the lobby.   The bathroom is a bit tired. Combo bath/shower. Dual sinks appreciated.   My husband and I were sufficiently under impressed that we opted to leave one night earlier than we had originally planned.
Manager Response: On behalf of all of us at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel, thank you for staying with us and providing your feedback.  We have enhancements plans coming soon for all of our guest rooms and we would be delighted to share them with you.  If we can answer any questions for you, please feel free to contact any of our leadership team any time.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: The scenery and location is just superb. Grounds were well kept and enjoyable to walk around.  The help is very friendly and all of them helpful and accommodating. Very interesting interior. Can be a bit crowded in some restaurants and lounges making it impossible to get a seat, and of course can be very pricey at times. Overall, a nice place and a nice experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton. We value your business and feedback, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: What a beautiful property! From the moment we checked in, this hotel makes you feel like royalty. The doorman greats you, the bellman gives you a overview of the property. They are eager to help. We ended up taking my daughter to Disneyland the next day and it was a drive but worth it. Ended up leaving Disneyland early to come back and enjoy this beautiful property. Would highly recommend this hotel. Centrally located!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton. We  enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Laguna Niguel has spectacular view and staying is awesome. We enjoy to be pampered and here you get that and more. You can just relax and enjoy fine food, drink and of course the view! We always look forward to visiting when we go to Southern California.
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your kind review. Thank you for taking a moment to share that you love our stunning views, five-star service, delectable dining selection, and more. We value your loyalty to our resort, and we look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit Southern California.

Summary: We stayed here over the Christmas holiday. The place was decorated very nice. The lights out front were substantial and looked great. Service was what you expect from the Ritz. The exception was room service Christmas day - it took nearly an hour for it to arrive when we were quoted 30 minutes over the phone. Location, location location.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for joining us during your Christmas celebration. It was our pleasure to host you, and we are delighted you enjoyed our festive décor and breathtaking location. We do regret to hear that there was a delay in your room service. Please do not hesitate to contact our Executive Office if you wish to discuss your experience further. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: In early January we had a chance to enjoy the gorgeous RC Laguna Niguel property.  The hotel is absolutely beautiful, situated at the prime location, at the point where the Pacific wraps around it, providing amazing vistas of the ocean, the beach and the surrounding area.   We had the good fortune of working directly with Ms. Julie Lytle, Executive Assistant to the General Manager, who was kind enough to book us into one of the best ocean view, fireside rooms.  Upon arrival, Ms. Lytle also made sure we were welcomed to our room with a hand-written card and several RC items to make our stay extra special.    In addition to Ms. Lytle, the entire staff was amazing.  Bradley, Billy, and Clark at the bar were a delight, Ryan at Raya, and Alex at the Enosteak were phenomenal.  While
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We appreciate your kind comments and will be sure to recognize our team for their efforts.  We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your experience with us, and we look forward to creating more unique memories for you soon.  Welcome home!

Summary: Was out in SoCal for a business meeting, so we stayed over a few extra days at the RC.  It was in June, so naturally the weather was gray and cool the whole time.  We had one drink on the outdoor lounge, but the cool and wind did not make for a comfortable setting.  Would love to go back in August when the weather is warmer,  Service was as expected, up to their usual standards.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your feedback. We enjoyed having you and look forward to your return this summer. Please let us know if there is anything we can do to assist you.

Summary Heading: Nice stay, but I've had better RC service at other locations!
Summary: The location of the hotel is beautiful - can't imagine better views in this part of OC. Loved the walking trail, proximity to restaurants and the beach and all of the outdoor lounging areas. It was especially convenient for having our dog- they put us on the first floor for ease of taking him out. Hotel staff are friendly. We will definitely return -- however. The service here was not quite as good as I've experienced at other Ritz Carltons. We asked for a do not disturb sign for our door as we left, to be put on our door as our dog was inside and we didn't want turn down service while we were out. The front desk assured us they would take care of it. Returned that evening, no sign. Breakfast at the restaurant was VERY slow. They seemed flustered and a bit overwhelmed. We
Manager Response: Thank you for joining us during your recent Dana Point getaway. We are thrilled to hear that our stunning property and perfect location along the coast made your stay a truly memorable experience. We do regret to hear that our service was slower than you hoped—we take this concern very seriously. Please do not hesitate to contact us if you wish to discuss your stay further.  On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we are excited to welcome you back soon!

Summary: I am Marriott Platinum and don't stay at too many Ritzes -- so used to getting more perks at JW Marriotts, etc.  Ritz does not do much for you -- 10k points per room if no upgrades available but no concierge lounge or anything like I am used to.  The 10k points is per room and not per night -- so not much of a perk when we had 2 rooms for 5 nights (10 nights total) and used 480,000 points for the trip.  I also did not appreciate the $40 daily resort charge (although that is pretty standard now) and the $50 mandatory daily valet (no self park option).  The setting is beautiful.  Really spectacular views of the ocean and huge windows.  Hotel is busy and bustling but was fun.  Lots of dogs and kids over the holidays and cool surfboards all over the hotel that were being auctioned
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton.  We value your loyalty and honored to have your business.  We hope to be your choice in the future for another unique and memorable experience.  If we can assist you in any way, we would be delighted to personally place your next reservation for you and answer any questions you may have.  It would be our pleasure!  Our executive office team is always available for you.  Thank you.

Summary Heading: Great stay on points. Thanks Marriott
Summary: Decided on the Ritz Carlton to burn 60,000 Marriott point to celebrate my wife’s birthday. First time staying at a Ritz Carlton, but I am a seasoned traveler, Lifetime Platinum Elite with well over 800 Marriott nights stayed. I had read several of the review of the property before we traveled and there were several sub-par or negative reviews.  Bottom line, if you are staying at the Ritz Carlton and high end hotels all of the time, you will find things that bug you. We loved our stay here and found the staff very friendly and accommodating. We arrived late and even though we had been told earlier in the day the hotel was full and there were no upgrades available, they were able to find us an upgrade with an ocean view. The room was clean and classy, the views from anywhere on
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience. We are pleased that you and your wife enjoyed such a memorable celebration with us.  We value your loyalty to our resort, brand, and company.  We look forward to creating another memorable experience for you soon.  Happy New Year!

Summary Heading: Luxury/near luxury-but close the doors, please!
Summary: Was visiting family in LA, and we decided to stay at a beachside resort in the Laguna Beach area.  We’ve visited this area before, so have some basis to compare.  The Ritz Carlton is a lovely property on a bluff overlooking a terrific beach a few miles south of Laguna Beach, just north of Dana Point.  Our ocean-view room on the top floor had a wonderful and expansive view, with a small balcony.  The room is small, as is the bathroom.  Stayed here during the holiday week, it was very busy but overall the staff were great-very friendly, and usually responsive.  The spa is compact, offers a full range of services.  Valet parking, though expensive (and required) worked well, as did the WiFi.  Nice fitness center that overlooks the ocean. Two pools, as others have noted they are not
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for placing your trust in us.  We appreciate you choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel while you were visiting the area.  We cannot agree with you more that our doors should remain closed during the cooler temperatures that we are experiencing in Southern California.  Thank you for your valuable feedback.  We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back soon, and if we may provide any assistance to you prior to then, please feel free to contact us any time.

Summary: We can not recommend this hotel highly enough! The service is beyond excellent. Eileen at guest relations went above and beyond to make our trip feel so special. Special touches in our room and every accommodation to our requests. The hotel is beautiful, has amazing views and great food. They even checked us in at 11 am. We’ve stayed at other Ritz properties as well as the Montage (another local hotel) and this definitely ranks at the top. Again, the setting and quality of the location is fantastic but the customer service was what puts this truly over the top! Definitely stay here!  -Bensons
Manager Response: Happy Anniversary!  We know you have many choices in luxury accommodations, and we are delighted you placed your trust in us.  We look forward to celebrating with you again one day soon.

Summary: I've stayed at many RCs and was really disappointed in this property. It is definitely resting on its laurels -- or rather, the great views of the ocean -- and the rooms, gym, and service left a LOT to be desired. The gym equipment seriously feels like it's from the 90s (and the fridge that was supposed to be filled with water bottles was empty when I finished working out), the rooms are TINY (at the cost of $1k/night) and there was no actual showerhead in the shower... there was only a handheld spigot but it only reached mid-waist so you had to put it down every time you wanted to soap up, shampoo, etc... very bizarre and DEFINITELY NOT 5-star!! Then it took over an HOUR to get our food at the pool and it was totally mediocre. I expected a lot more and plan on checking out the
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your valuable feedback with us. We regret that your experience fell short of expectations and extend our sincerest apologies for any shortcomings you encountered. We would enjoy sharing with you our upcoming enhancement plans and invite you back for a future visit.  We would value the opportunity to restore your faith in our resort and brand. Please contact our Executive Offices so we can learn more about your experience.  We appreciate you bringing your concerns to our attention and look forward to speaking with you. Thank you.

Summary: The Ritz-Carlton , Laguna Niguel has impeccable service and absolutely stunning views!. Everything about this place is amazing. We dined at two of the restaurants and the food was outstanding. We stayed here for two days and never left the resort. It felt like being in an Utopia completely cut off from the stress of one's everyday life. When I left I felt totally well rested and replenished. I will definitely be back!
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  It was our pleasure providing you with a memorable experience.  We hope to see you again very soon!

Summary: We were there for a special event, and although we live locally, we wanted to treat ourselves and opted to stay overnight. On the day of check in, my Marriott app showed that we had gotten an upgrade (I have Platinum Elite status) to an ocean view with fireplace. We we thrilled! But when we checked in, we were told that there must’ve been a mistake. No upgrade for us. The unfriendly woman at the front desk told us there was nothing available.   A short time later, we met up with a number of people in our group, who were also staying at the hotel. Five couples had been upgraded. Zero of them had status. So back to the front desk we go, and lucky us, we end up with the same woman who checked us in. She again tries to tell us there is nothing available, even though the Marriott app
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share the details of your recent experience at our resort. We regret to hear that the confusion with your check-in negatively affected your stay. Please know that excellent service is of critical importance to us—we would value the opportunity to speak with you further if you would like to contact our Executive Office directly.  We look forward to welcoming you back one day soon.

Summary Heading: Our Favorite Resort for Our 23rd Anniversary
Summary: Where do I start? Booked one Saturday night for my wife & I mid-December for our anniversary. This Ritz-Carlton is an hour from our home in So Cal. I booked an Ocean View Room for $350 plus Marriott points. I left the front desk a phone request that I'd like an (Lifetime Platinum) upgrade to the Club Floor as they gave us a couple years ago. When checking in, they told me the floor was closed due to renovations. Blake, I'm assuming the front desk manager, made our anniversary with a welcoming gift of chocolate strawberries in a cool plated display and a typed card. Above and beyond our wildest expectations. He upgraded us to the fourth floor to the far left of the resort w/an amazing corner suite (living room/dining room/ocean view) and an attached bedroom. The beds are the
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for you loyalty to The Ritz-Carlton.  Congratulations on your Marriott Lifetime Platinum Premier Elite status!  We are delighted you enjoyed an unforgettable experience with us and we look forward to creating more memories for you soon.  Happy Anniversary!

Summary: The location and views are amazing, staff super friendly and food delicious. Room we had was dark even though it had a balcony and the room itself was kind of outdated. Could do with a touch up. The worst thing was that EVERY night we had to call at midnight to ask them to stop the vacuuming in the hallway. That was terrible to wake up to that every night. You would think they would learn that it was disturbing to guests. Unlikely to come back here for sure.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we thank you for staying with us and providing your candid feedback.  We are delighted to hear that our team created a unique and memorable experience for you, and we sincerely apologize for the noise in the corridor.  We are investigating this issue promptly to avoid this happening again.  We appreciate you letting us know.  We hope to have another chance to provide a wonderful stay in the future.  Please contact our Executive Office if we may assist you in any way.

Summary: Just stayed in this location for a couples getaway and had an amazing time. View is gorgeous and staff are attentive to detail. We had fallen asleep early and they quietly left chocolates for the turn down service on our door along with a little note. Made us feel welcome and like we had our own little slice of Laguna Nigel. One thing to keep in mind is that the hotel is chilly. The lobby doors are kept open and you are on the coast — so pack warm and sit outside to watch the sunset!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton!  We appreciate your feedback and we look forward to creating another unique and memorable experience for you soon.

Summary: Location is beautiful!  Stunning views of the Pacific Ocean. Wonderful beach below. Bring walking shoes or sandals as it’s small hike to the beach but worth it!!  We loved sitting out on the wicker sofa & chairs to relax  and take in the ocean and floral scents of California. The hotel lobby, bar, coffee shop and ocean view restaurant were lovely. The bar is super for day or evening by the fireplace gatherings.  Our room ..... well it was a hike and I mean a hike to get there. Long long halls and elevators and more long halls. Nothing fancy. Just long halls. You really want a room closer to the elevators or main lobby. Otherwise it’s like leaving the hotel for an extension with no thought to the glamour of the lobby you entered.  Our room was ok. We asked for a 30th anniv.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing to stay with us and for sharing your detailed review of your experience.  We are honored to have been chosen for such a momentous occasion and we take your comments constructively. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back in the future and ensure you have a wonderful stay. If we can answer any questions for you regarding our rates and fees, please call us direct. We would enjoy assisting you with our best possible packages and amenities.

Summary: Let me preface this by saying I’ve visited the property before on a romantic get away. I visited the property this time for a girls trip. I planned on visiting the property again for a weeding in 2 months (but now I highly doubt it.)   The Good:   The service was impeccable. From the spa to the restaurants to the very attentive bar staff. I love staying at the Ritz because you can’t heat the service. The Yoga/Pilates instructor was amazing and helped me so many with issues I had with flexibility. The food was great and restaurant staff were always attentive and there when I needed them.  The Bad:  Okay I came during a bad time. It rained for 2 days during my visit and it was no fault to the hotel staff. Plus California needs the rain so I will never complain about some good ole
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing to stay with us and for sharing your detailed review of your experience. First and foremost, we would like to apologize for the disappointment you have expressed and the impact it had on your stay and perception of our property and service. Our Assistant Rooms Executive will be in touch with you shortly, and we certainly hope to restore your faith in our resort and brand.

Summary: We were there for a business meeting in early December. Was decorated beautifully for Christmas w/North Pole display, carols playing & songs sung. Room was lovely with 2 sep sinks, nice robes, balcony overlooking pool. Unfortunately it rained which they needed but I was unable to use the pool. At least I could make use use of the nice TV.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts with us. We are delighted that your recent business trip was enhanced by our beautifully festive property. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back for a sunny getaway one day soon!

Summary: What a beautiful property overlooking the Pacific Ocean. Beginning the day in an ocean view room with giant balcony, I could watch the surfers, view Catalina Island and just enjoy the serenity of an incredible sunset in the evening. The room was beautifully appointed with a comfortable bed that you just disappeared within its comfort. The bathroom was stunning with its marble twin sinks, wonderful large soaking tub,copious mirrors and a separate private water closet with a telephone. It was the 'luck of the check-in time' that we had this room, a favorite of the staff member.  From the valet car parking personnel (the only type of parking available $$$) to the wait staff to check-in staff, all were professional, friendly, so helpful and willing do to whatever they could to make
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your wonderful review—we are thrilled to read that you enjoyed everything from our spacious, oceanfront rooms to our incredible ladies and gentlemen. We truly value your loyalty to our hotel and would be delighted to host you again in the near future.

Summary: Just returned from a wonderful stay at this hotel. Setting is so beautiful- we enjoyed watching the non stop surfers below and daily walks on the beach. The hotel itself is decorated beautifully for the holidays. The staff was amazing. We were upgraded to rooms with views- we were there to celebrate my sisters 40th birthday and the room had a happy birthday cake there when we arrived. The staff at the club lounge was absolutely fantastic. So kind and courteous and personable. The club lounge food was wonderful and they even gave us a wonderful surprise dessert (again!) on the second night for my sister. The workout room has an amazing view. We visited the salon to get nails done and both technicians were great. In general we just can’t wait to go back!
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for your special occasion.  We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your experience and we hope to see  you again soon!

Summary: Spacious, lovely room.  Top notch service from the check in staff to the restaurant servers.  The views are heavenly.  Enjoyed a drink at 180 Blu.  Delicious dinner at the on-site restaurant.  Couldn't have asked for anything more! What a treat.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  If we may be of assistance, please feel free to reach out to us any time.

Summary Heading: wish the reality lived up to the expectation
Summary: Spent two evenings at this hotel in Dana Point, aka Laguna Niguel. You can't deny the  location evokes romance. The lobby and adjoining public areas are old world beautiful, stately and elegant, promising a first rate stay. The welcome was warm and dignified. The ocean views are stunning. And our room, even though we had pool access and no view of the ocean, was lovely. But the stay was tarnished by lack of attention to details. When we visited the take away market for breakfast we learned that the electronic sign was not working and could not order breakfast. We could however order lunch since that was what was displayed. Not what we wanted but the food was fine. One of our party of two had business the second evening, so room service was ordered for the other in our party
Manager Response: We truly appreciate you taking the time to share your experience, and we value your loyalty to The Ritz-Carlton brand. Although we are pleased that you found our property beautiful in both architecture and surrounding scenery, we regret to hear that aspects of our ladies and gentlemen’s service fell short of your expectations. Serving our guests well is our greatest priority, and we would value the opportunity to speak with you further if you contact our Executive Office directly.

Summary Heading: Perfect?  almost, but deceiving at the end
Summary: we were at the Ritz, Laguna Niguel in August 2018.  The hotel is fantastic, view outstanding, You would think that my stay would be perfect? No. Let me tell you that it was very deceiving.  When we left the hotel to San Diego, we forgot 6 pieces of clothing in the closet of our room.  When we arrived in San Diego, we realized that we were missing clothing, so I called immedialty the Ritz lost and found department.  No answer, I left a message, no call back. I finally was able to speak to someone after many calls, I explained the situation. The person told me he would look into it and call me back.  No call back. After few days in San Diego, we were heading back to LA, so I decided to stop by the Ritz to see in person, what was going on. When I was there, after waiting a long
Manager Response: First and foremost, we would like to thank you for taking the time to outline the details of this situation. We truly regret that this confusion resulted in such an inconvenience for you. We understand how frustrating this can be, and we assure you that our ladies and gentlemen serve our guests to the best of their ability at all times. We invite you to contact our Executive Office directly, as we would hate for your wonderful stay to be tainted by this experience. We are confident we can resolve this to your satisfaction and regain your trust in us. Thank you

Summary Heading: The view and grounds are unforgettable.
Summary: My husband and I had an amazing stay at this location. The view and the grounds are so beautiful; we spent most of our time relaxing outside and just watching the surfers at Salt Creek Beach below. The service is excellent, the gym is great (the best view from a gym I've ever seen!), and the food/drinks are delicious. A special shout out to Allen and Arnold from 180 Blue for making our sunset dinners extra special. If you stay, be sure to go to 180 Blue for sunset! There's a great path leading from the hotel down to the beach for a walk/run. We also met lots of furry friends as the hotel is dog friendly. One thing to note is that neither pool faces the ocean; for this time of year that worked out because it might have been too cold to swim on the oceanside due to the breeze.
Manager Response: We are delighted by your wonderful review. Thank you for taking the time to share just how much you enjoyed our breathtaking sunset views, excellent dining selection at 180blu, and our accommodating ladies and gentlemen. We will certainly pass along your kind regards. It would be a pleasure to host you for another personalized getaway to Dana Point soon.

Summary: I’ve been to this Ritz numerous times over the years for conferences, it’s one of the best locations in all of California! My only minor criticism is that they seem to struggle sometimes with the service level of the staff. Nevertheless, if you are looking for one of the most beautiful places on earth to watch the sun set over the Pacific Ocean, this is definitely it!
Manager Response: It was a pleasure to host you during your recent stay at our beautiful resort. We appreciate your loyalty and your feedback.  Our greatest priority is providing memorable and personable experiences for our guests, and of course in a timely manner.  The next time you plan to visit us, please feel free to contact us prior to your visit so we may ensure an exceptional experience.

Summary: It's hard to beat the beach and overall setting for this Ritz.  The staff, from chambermaid to waiters to valets to concierge were all terrific and made our stay special.  That said, the view when dining are a bit limited and the lounge has a very limited view.  Also, the pools have no view, causing us to choose either beach or pool.  Often, resorts of this caliber have a pool perched to enjoy the view. The food is excellent, at least breakfast, lunch and appetizers (we did not have dinner there) and again, the service superb.  I'd also like to see slippers in the room (also standard for high end resorts) and turn down service at night.  That said, i wouldn't hesitate to return and am thinking of having my next family vacation there!
Manager Response: We are delighted that you had a memorable, relaxing stay at our resort. Our ladies and gentlemen are committed to providing personalized experiences. We truly appreciate your feedback and look forward to hosting you during your upcoming family vacation.  If there are any specific needs/preferences that we can note prior to your arrival, please contact our Guest Relations team so that we may ensure your stay is everything you wish it to be.

Summary: It's a lovely place and the hotel, which dates from 1984, is on a bluff overlooking the Pacific and Monarch Bay Beach.  We were just overnight, so we didn't use much of the facilities.  The staff were all great, from the guy who took us to the room, to the multiple people who hovered over us in the restaurant.  The breakfast was probably the best part of the stay.  Great!  Beautiful view, my wife loved her blueberry pancakes, and my oatmeal was terrific.  Memorable.  Rooms a bit small, perhaps dated.  I did resent the high parking fee - $40 a night - and the Resort Fee of $40.  Both these are rather predatory IMHO.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for sharing your recent experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We take all feedback to heart and use it as we continue to improve our guest experience. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us, we do hope you'll join us again in the future for another, and hopefully longer memorable experience.  Please let us know if we may be of assistance.

Summary Heading: Beautiful grounds, wait staff and hotel, a memorable stay
Summary: have stayed here a few times and the grounds are some of the most scenic of any hotel in the world.  the food and service is amazing and similar in quality to any Ritz Carlton Its hard to find a nicer place to stay.  always look forward to traveling and staying here
Manager Response: We are delighted that you have enjoyed memorable experiences with us, time and time again. Thank you for taking a moment to share that you love our service, dining outlets, and gorgeous Pacific views. There will always be a spot for you at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. Thank you for your loyalty.

Summary: I stayed here for the first time for a conference. I flew into John Wayne airport, took an Uber for approx $40 for a 30 min drive. You could rent a car too , but parking fee is $40 a night ( discounted to $25 for the conference). I was not planning on venturing out so it wasn’t worth renting a car. Check in was smooth , I was able to check in early. Staff at the reception, bell boys , concierge were all friendly , welcoming and willing to help.  The hotel is magnificent, on a cliff with amazing views of the pacific. The decor, ambiance was just beautiful! I think the flowers in the lobby are changed daily . My room was spacious with a patio, huge bathroom , double sink, storage area, safe, coffee maker, fridge , smart tv ( Netflix or others if you have an account) etc. There is
Manager Response: It is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed our stunning views and so much more during your recent conference. Thank you for taking a moment to let us know how memorable our ladies and gentlemen, pristine beaches, and delicious restaurants were. We will eagerly await your return to Dana Point.

Summary: It was my wife and my first visit and were wowed by the personal service, recently renovated decor, views and of course the food, especially at the Club.  For a relatively large hotel, we thought the attention to detail was perfect for a Ritz.  And, outside activities (shuttle to beach, with chairs and umbrellas), natural walks just steps away, a nice large firepit on top of the hill, and two nice pools, made it a very relaxing visit.  Management and Staff deserve the numerous accolades they have received, and more.  Will recommend and will return.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your glowing review. We could not agree more that our breathtaking views and relaxing amenities make for the perfect coastal escape. It is also wonderful to hear that our welcoming ladies and gentlemen were able to provide you a personalized experience to remember. We would enjoy welcoming you back to our property very soon.

Summary: My husband and I ran away for an anniversary celebration to the Ritz at Laguna Niguel. This was our first visit and we really wanted a chance to connect. Unfortunately it wasn’t the romantic rendezvous  we had anticipated.   Pros:  The view is incredible. The sunset was breathtaking, especially with having the outline of Catalina Island as part of the sunset stage. Fresh flowers are everywhere and they are in beautiful colors. I loved the use of natural woods, agates, selenite and other stones in their lighting and decor. There are lots of windows just walking around the hotel, and breathtaking views from all of them.   Cons: I felt the establishment was more focused on the 3 weddings and 1 private party. It was difficult to get around the hotel because so much was closed off to
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing our resort for your special celebration.  We agree with you that our magnificent views make for a perfect romantic getaway.  We appreciate your feedback and your loyalty, and hope to welcome you back very soon.  We would enjoy hearing from you prior to your next stay so that we can ensure your experience is excellent.  Our executive offices team are always available for you.  Thank you again for providing your review.  Happy Anniversary!

Summary Heading: Nice quiet room and great service
Summary: Went to a wedding in Trabuco Hills and was not staying around there. Hadn’t stayed here in a few years, remodeled room is very nice not too hip, very Ritz clean and bathroom is their signature bathroom. Ate at bar, great time with bar tenders and food was good. Had room service, delivered in timely manner. Had to buy a shirt in gift shop because I forgot one. Bought one, was offered ironing or steaming while I wait! Even the valet is quick. Probably going back in a couple of weeks.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton. We enjoyed having you!  We appreciate your feedback, and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  If we can assist you with your upcoming visit, please let us know. Thank you for your loyalty!

Summary Heading: Great hotel and easy access to area activitites
Summary: We were very happy with the hotel, rooms, service/staff and restaurants- everyone was super helpful, everything was clean, food was delicious! We used lyft and uber to get everywhere on our weekend and there was always one within 5 minutes or less which was great.The walking path from the resort through the neighborhoods nearby was really nice for getting a little exercise and seeing some of the nearby area. The location on the cliff is beautiful , especially at sunset, but the walk down the beach is a bit of a pain- thankfully they offer the service to set up chairs and umbrellas and give you a ride down or up if needed but the beach was just ok- very crowded on the weekend. My only complaint was the pool(s)- a bit disappointing for a ritz, both were fully enclosed by buildings
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We appreciate your feedback very much.  It is helpful in our efforts to always provide the best possible service and facilities to our guests.  We enjoyed having you with us and we hope to have the opportunity to host you again soon.  If we can assist you in any way, please feel free to contact us in our executive offices any time.

Summary: I stayed at the Ritz while attending a meeting being held at the hotel. The accommodations were so great that I felt like I was on a vacation and not on a business trip. I don't remember the last time I enjoyed every meal at a hotel. You should definitely consider booking a room.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we are delighted to hear your enjoyed your recent experience at our resort.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future for a much longer visit.  If there is anything we can do to assist you, please let us know.

Summary: This place is a hidden gem! This property provides top notch service and hospitality! Immediately upon arriving Shawn in valet took great care of us. Milo at the front desk provided excellent service. During our stay the property was fully committed but Milo still honored our platinum elite status. Despite limitations Milo managed to provide an upgrade! Patrick noticed that we were lost and he immediately provided us with directions to our room. Darius took care of us at Enosteak restaurant! He provided great service and the food was absolutely delicious! Both bellhops Larry and Cary made our check in and check out easy. This property is not only visually appealing but it also provides great service. We were impressed with staff’s ability to anticipate our needs and willingness
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful comments about our ladies and gentlemen.   We are delighted to hear they exceeded your expectations, and you enjoyed a memorable experience.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Wow, The club level at this Ritz makes all other club levels look pathetic. Fantastic food, never ending wine, champagne and cocktails...Breakfast, lunch, dinner and deserts..But what made it the best was the staff...Always welcoming us back by our first names, and ready to do anything for us.. The room was great, wonderful Coastline view and comfy bed, big bathroom and deck over the ocean. Only small complaint was the refrigerator and the air conditioning were both very noisy at night. Asprey products in the Bath a real luxury.. Pool great, but get a beach umbrella and a few chairs, and hit the beach for a day.. Love this location and opulent hotel. I am told that they will be doing a major remodel this winter....Can't wait.. as how could it get any better..
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel Club Level for your stay.  We appreciate your business and are delighted to hear you enjoyed your experience.  We agree with you that our ladies and gentlemen are extraordinary.  We appreciate your feedback and we look forward to creating more memories for you soon.  We are excited to share our enhancements with you!

Summary: I came here with my wife overnight on the way to a wedding. This has to be one of the most beautiful hotels I’ve ever seen. I found the staff to be extremely friendly and genuinely caring. This is an absolute highly highly recommended property. Great job!
Manager Response: Thank you for trusting us with your evening away!  We enjoyed having you and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: We stayed 5 nights to celebrate our Anniversary and upgraded to the Club Lounge.  Our stay met and exceeded in literally every way our extremely high expectations.  The property is gorgeous, but I always felt comfortable being casual.  The staff goes above and beyond ALWAYS to get to know us and what we like, and then continuously wows us with their service.  We felt welcome and pampered and special.  The Club Lounge is well worth it--the food and atmosphere were just about the best we have experienced, and we have stayed at countless Marriott properties around the world.  In particular, Coleen and Diane at the Club went out of their way consistently to make us feel welcome and to deliver kindness, attention and service that were beyond compare.  I could not recommend this
Manager Response: How wonderful to hear that you spent such a memorable celebration at our resort. Happy Anniversary to the both of you! We love hearing that our ladies and gentlemen pampered you with a personalized, luxury experience. The next time you are craving the coast, our stunning views will be waiting for you again.

Summary: I do not leave negative reviews very often but feel compelled to share with others our experiences the Ritz Carlton in Laguna Nigel.  The only outstanding feature of this hotel is the view. Everything else from the room to the service was substandard . It was unlike any other Ritz that we have stayed at and a huge disappointment.   We checked in late for a conference and got a room with a view of a walkway - literally all I saw was the wall and a sidewalk - no sky, definitely no beach. But I understand that when you’re the last one checking into a hotel for a conference someone gets the bad view. However, what I did not find acceptable was the moldy, musty smell in a room that needs updating, curtains that were NOT blackout, having to call and request housekeeping at 3 pm in
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts. It is disappointing to hear that your experience at our resort was anything less than extraordinary, and we appreciate your feedback. We invite you to contact us directly as we would value the opportunity to restore your faith in our resort and brand.  Thank you again for sharing your concerns.  We look forward to speaking with you.

Summary: First time staying at this property and it did not disappoint!!!!! From the moment of arrival, the stress levels seem to melt away! Took a guy’s trip for a little R&R. The pool area during the day for cocktails and food is a must! Make sure AJ helps you out. He’s fantastic!!!! Blake as well at the pool is a great guy as well. You won’t go wrong with these two.  They’re 180Blu outdoor observatory deck is a must for great shots of the sunset. Then grab dinner next door at their restaurant, Raya. Excellent food and service!! Their breakfast at Raya is off the chart as well.  There’s a large open glass fire pit in the ground that has bean bag style chairs to kick back and enjoy the sunset from too.  Thanks for a very memorable stay Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel! Very pet friendly
Manager Response: We are thrilled that you enjoyed a stress-free stay at our resort. Our ladies and gentlemen take pride in offering each of our guests a personalized, luxury experience, and we will certainly pass along your kind regards. We would love to welcome you back to enjoy our delicious food and beverage outlets and stunning views again soon.

Summary: This perfect setting has it all.  Great views - rooms with fireplaces on patio - wonderful spa - delish food and perfect wine and cocktails.  Service oriented. Loved the location.  If you have the opportunity, this is a great spot to land for a while!
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear that your getaway was luxurious and relaxing. Our ladies and gentlemen are proud to provide unparalleled service in our beautiful resort, and we love knowing that your experience was no different. The next time the west coast calls, we would enjoy helping you answer.

Summary: Staff and service were wonderful from the doormen to the front desk staff, the restsurants, bar and pool, etc.   I also enjoyed Club Level and the Ladies serving all week were friendly and very accomodating! They knew what I wanted before I did.  Room was superb, views from yhe outside areas was awesome.  The fire pit was my favorite in the evenings. View of the Pacific where there was never a shortage of surfers to view.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your experience with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: World Class views at high end luxury resort on the beach
Summary: I have visited this property dozens of times, (3 times as guest) and then monthly for a sunset snack and drinks. Visiting luxury resorts is my passion, but living locally now, I must admit that this is THE BEST place to watch the sunset over looking the Pacific, with a 180 coastal view of the beach, mountains and Catalina Island in the distance. This is beyond words, and there are so many aspects of this resort that make it a world class luxury property. The pools, the spa, the rooms all with views, the gym overlooking the vistas so you don't need to watch more TV! No need for virtual reality when you have the most spectacular views to pump it up or rev it up on one of the state of the art machines. But above and beyond, the landscape, the cliffside vistas all become a
Manager Response: How delightful that you have enjoyed so many memorable experiences at our resort! We are grateful for your loyalty to our property and brand. Thank you for taking the time to note our breathtaking views, delicious food and beverage outlets, fun on-site activities, and five-star amenities. The next time you are tempted to take a Dana Point getaway, our ladies and gentlemen would love to host you again.  We hope to see you on October 25th for Yappy Howl-O-Ween!

Summary Heading: Spectacular Lunch, Very Pleasant, Professional Staff
Summary: From the moment we were greeted we experienced a smile, pleasant attitude, and exceptional service. Perfect amount of time was given between seating to taking the order, to checking in, etc. Outstanding! The only exceptionally minor item of note was the iced tea received tasted like it had been brewed right after coffee/coffee-flavored. However, the follow-up glass was perfect. Otherwise, plates were chef-perfect, beautiful and full of flavor (highly recommend the fish). Also, excellent portion size. Guests around us seemed pleased, too. It's worth mentioning the entire staff, outside the restaurant, too. As we strolled to look at the view, they offered to direct us to the amenities of the hotel. Staff attitude makes the biggest/lasting impression. We appreciated the kindness,
Manager Response: We truly appreciate you taking the time to share the details of your experience with us. It pleases us to know that our ladies and gentlemen were able to provide you a luxury resort and dining experience. From our chef’s perfect plates to our stunning views, our dining outlets offer the complete package. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Everyone at this Ritz was very helpful and always accommodating. They were very knowledgeable about the area and the hotel itself was very clean and if your needing a get away definitely a must stay. I would recommend an ocean view room because it’s so relaxing being able to sit on your balcony and hear the ocean waves crash. The food at the hotel was very delicious in every restaurant here. Defiantly have to go pool side for a homemade ice cream sandwich and an adult cocktail.
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed your experience with us, and we look forward to creating more meaningful and fun memories for you soon!

Summary: I have stayed here twice for conferences and absolutely loved both stays. I would go as far to say this is probably my favourite hotel (and I have stayed in many, many hotels primarily as a result of frequently travelling for work but also pleasure). The setting and views are unparalleled to anything I have experienced and the decor is incredible, the fresh flowers everywhere are amazing too. It Is naturally rather expensive but in the US you have to pay up for excellence
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience.  We appreciate hearing from you.  On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we are delighted to hear you had a great stay.  Thank you for your loyalty to our resort and brand.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  If we may be of assistance, please let us know.

Summary: We are currently at this property. The view is gorgeous. However, for the price I thought a Ritz compared more to a St Regis or Four Seasons property (other Ritz properties are more similar). If the hotel was much less expensive then I wouldn’t expect these things but... - Most properties offer complimentary bfast or at least a pot of coffee. We asked at the front desk and they said it’s available from 4 - 6 AM. - At the pool there is no service. You can grab your own towel etc. but no one to set up lounge chairs like most resort properties. - The rooms are average (similar to any Marriott or Westin but again not a luxury resort) - The rate includes nothing (parking is an additional $40 a night etc) - Drinking coffee at 8AM outside now and cigarette butts and glassware from
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your feedback with us. Although we are glad to hear that you have enjoyed the beautiful views from our resort, we are disappointed that your overall experience has not exceeded your expectations. We hope you had an opportunity to speak with one of our leaders while you were here, however if you didn't we would welcome a time to speak with you. We look forward to regaining your faith in us.  Thank you again for your valuable comments.

Summary: This hotel is one of my favorites.  I’ve stayed here once a year for around 9 years or so and it’s a well oiled machine.  The facility is well kept and the staff is superior.  Many of their employees have worked there for many years as well.  The location is magnificently located right on the ocean and Dana Point is a beautiful little city in its own right.  I highly recommend!
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for continuing to choose The Ritz-Carlton.  We love having you and we value your loyalty to our resort and brand.  It is an honor and pleasure to create meaningful experiences for you each time that you visit us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Well I went with a group to a conference and stayed at the Ritz. Never had I stayed in such flash digs. The changing of the flowers was a sight. What happens to the other ones? They weren't brown yet. After a looonnnnggg walk to my room I discovered 2 sinks. One for my teeth and one for my face. Awesome! Short walk to the beach but got pummeled in the waves swallowing several mouthfuls of the pacific ocean. A walk proved safer with several beach games on show. No rugby ball or cricket bat on this beach! The restaurant in the hotel that is outside on the deck (forget the name) was extra busy. You have to get in really quick for a seat. We spent the night people watching, picking the face lifts and botox addicts. Lovely service and food with live music and to die for views. The
Manager Response: Thank you for joining us during your recent conference in Dana Point. We are thrilled that you enjoyed a relaxing and luxurious experience at our resort, as well as the ongoing events around our property. The next time you find yourself in need of a California escape, we would be delighted to welcome you back.

Summary Heading: YOU CAN'T FIND ANY PLACE MORE RELAXING
Summary: Some people would think that I am crazy to travel 3,000 miles to a hotel just to relax but that's because they do not know the Ritz Carlton Hotel at Laguna Niguel. This hotel is absolutley terrific.  Not only is the hotel at a 5 star level in every department,  the natural beauty of being on a cliff overlooking the ocean is unbeatable.  The walk down to the beach is actually easy and the friendly beach staff carry the chairs, umbrellas and towels to wherever you would like to be perched. There is a shuttle to drive you back up to the hotel when you want to return. The day starts with breakfast at Raya restaurant with floor to ceiling windows overlooking the surfers on the ocean. Joel and his assistant, Cesar, made every breakfast special. Everyone is super friendly here. Even
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear just how much you enjoyed your time at our resort, from our unparalleled Pacific views to our dedicated and personal service. Thank you for taking the time to share your kind thoughts with us. Our ladies and gentlemen would be thrilled to welcome you back again soon.

Summary Heading: S'mores, Beach, Spa, Pools and Food all Excellent!
Summary: We had a lovely long weekend in Laguna and could not have been more pleased with the Ritz. We opted for the room with the ocean view and fire pit and it was an amazing! We spent each night on the deck taking in the view. We also took advantage of the beach service which includes umbrellas, chairs and transportation. The pools were great and we ended up dining at the hotel each evening because the food was so impressive. Get a seat by the window and watch for the dolphins. We would love the opportunity to return. If you get a chance get to the spa, it was one of the best massages I have ever had.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We are delighted you enjoyed some of the many amenities and offerings that we provide.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Stayed at The Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel. We had a view of the ocean with easy access to the beach and pool. Restaurants and service were on point! Thanks to Pacific Dream Photography we were able to also squeeze in family photos and they were ready for review by the next morning.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you and your family enjoyed a picture-perfect stay at our resort.  We are delighted to have Pacific Dream Photography and our partners to capture those precious moments.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Awful - don’t come here unless you want a bad experience
Summary: Horrible service, horrible room, horrible experience. Booked a room 3 months prior. Hotel emailed a week before asking time of arrival (2pm), special requests (none)  and reason for visit (5 year wedding anniversary). Arrived at the hotel and was told room wasn’t ready but they would text once it was. No text after 1.5hr and ended up having to check again at the front desk. They finally said the room was free. Now mind you I was aware it wasn’t going to be the nicest room since we booked a partial view room but was shocked and highly disappointed in the room that was provided. For a room that cost over $600/night I wasn’t prepared for it to smell of mold, mildew, wet dogs and old wet towels. Also a partial view was a full view of a wall (really?). Called the front desk to ask if
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your detailed feedback on TripAdvisor. Our greatest priority is ensuring our guests are well cared for, and we sincerely regret that our ladies and gentlemen were unable to provide you with a satisfactory solution while you were here on property.  We are delighted to assist you, and make this right for you, however we would need to speak with your further by phone.  Please contact our Executive Office for a more personal and applicable resolution.  We want to regain your faith in us, and hopefully welcome you back for a wonderful experience in the future. Thank you again for providing your review of The Ritz-Carlton, and we look forward to speaking with you.

Summary Heading: From the U.K. to the Ritz
Summary: Maybe you had to be there to get the idea  of some inconsistencies. Yes the views are incredible. Yes the food is top notch. However, I was with my in laws from London and we saw and heard the crowds and lack of calm. This is a luxury resort, but it was too busy to have a calming effect.  We ate here and of course it was very loud and crowded. Always a large event. Long walks to rooms. Service great one day and not the next. Thankfully there are carts to transport you to the sand and back. A plus.  The valet was especially good.  Pricing was almost obnoxious as if to say “yes, we’re charging you triple for a breakfast because we can!”  You get the idea. Worth it for some things. Plenty of other more updated hotels. Worth a trip but hardly two.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for providing your honest feedback. We appreciate hearing from you.  We are sorry to hear that your experience at The Ritz-Carlton was anything less than relaxing and memorable as our ladies and gentlemen strive to provide unique and exceptional service to each of our valuable guests.  We would enjoy welcoming you back in the future. Please feel free to utilize our Executive Office team amy time.

Summary: Stayed over the Labour Day Long Weekend with my family ( 2 kids 10 & 7 ). We really enjoyed the hotel overall. Rooms are great. Location is perfect. I had a hard time figuring things out by reading other people’s reviews. So let me break it down as there are several things to consider:  1-we arrived at LAX and it’s 1.5hrs drive to the hotel ( with no traffic ). The hotel suggests Uber. Well, we arrived at 1130pm. 4 people & luggage so we looked at UberXL, Select & Black. Cheapest option was $400!!!! We couldn’t find a cab & at 1230am when All seemed lost, I spotted a blue sign Super Shuttle”. The lady standing at the sign told us that the shuttle seats 9 people with room for luggage. $130 to drive us four exclusively to Dana Point from LAX. It was amazing. The driver was
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to detail your experience at our resort.  We appreciate it.  We enjoy hearing that your stay exceeded your expectations in many ways, from our accommodating amenities to our beautiful coastal location. If we can be of service to you any time, please let us know.  We look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: Nice location above a good beach, but it is Dana Point which is a little way from Laguna itself.  The hotel is quite big and was hosting a conference when we were there in August.  The main pool is very crowded with not enough beds or servers and the other pool offers no service at all.  We paid the same here for two rooms  as for the Four Seasons in Santa Barbara and they are a world away in quality.  Nothing is bad per se, but would stay elsewhere for the same money.  The executive level floor is probably worth it as the food is free and high quality, and the service was charming.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback. We appreciate hearing from you. We certainly hoped your experience at our resort would be a unique and memorable one, and we will share your comments with our ladies and gentlemen to ensure we continue striving for excellence. If we may be of assistance any time, please let us know.

Summary: Ok I have mixed reviews about this place. First with the positives. Beautiful grounds, well kept, 2 pools, gorgeous view, great service, good food. Now for the reason I give this place 3 stars: no amenities in any rooms other than the $4,000US/night suite you need to pay to get a sink to wash a cup. Rooms smaller than your closet. Carpets everywhere in the rooms. No fans in the washroom so you're always in a steam room. Everything is overpriced especially food for kids. $20US Mac and cheese for maybe a cups worth. The breakfast was awesome but costly at almost $80US for 2 adults and toddler. This place is not kid friendly for kids under 5. Overall I wouldn't recommend this resort to a young family. There are upscale beautiful more up to date resorts out there.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for providing your honest feedback. We appreciate hearing from you.  We are sorry to hear that your experience at The Ritz-Carlton was anything less than relaxing and memorable as our ladies and gentlemen strive to provide unique and exceptional service to each of our valuable guests. We would enjoy hearing more about your stay and welcome the opportunity to speak with you directly. Kindly call our Executice Offices at your convenience.

Summary: The location is it's best feature, then, the very pleasant and kind staff.  Unbeatable in comfort and delicious food with a great array of choices for their Sunday Brunch! It is indeed an exquisite place to relax from it all and have very healing Zen moments!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We are proud to be your choice for relaxation and comfort.  We look forward to welcoming you back one day soon.

Summary Heading: Amazing Views - Beautiful Hotel - Great outdoor Bar
Summary: The hotel sits atop an incredible coast with panoramic views of the Ocean and Coastline!  I would like to see them renovate the pool areas and add more options to the two restaurant menus- Great stay !!!  Be sure to get a coastline view or Ocean view - otherwise you have a dark room.
Manager Response: It is wonderful to hear that the sweeping coastal views from our resort made your experience one to remember. We truly appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us.

Summary: Went there for business trip, oceans a little bit down  hard to get to, but they do have a tramp to get down to the beach you up about it that say 500 feet above the water. Property was gorgeous and well-kept rooms were adequate and very well-kept personnel very very friendly. Food good little pricey but that’s the Ritz .
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  We look forward to welcoming you back whether it be for business or pleasure or both.

Summary Heading: Little Piece of (very busy) heaven - customer service needs a lot of work.
Summary: Stunning property, very well maintained. Beach quite busy (open to public) but hotel provides chairs and umbrellas and towels and there is a great little beach cantina on-site. Housekeeping staff are ok... that they are very busy (as is the whole facility) is obvious. Late check out is a gamble - even though we confirmed by phone that we had late checkout, this was not communicated to housekeeping or to concierge when we called back after our hotel card stopped working and housekeeping would not help us back into the room (thanks guys - really helped to get us packed up to allow your next guests in to the room in a jiffy) - not to mention a critical item left in the safe that they did not bother to inform us of until we called the next morning. There was no indication that they
Manager Response: On behalf of our executive team and all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton brand. We know you have many choices in luxury experiences and we wish to assure you that you have chosen the best.  We appreciate and value your loyalty, and will always strive to provide exceptional service and extraordinary memories.  We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back soon.  If we may assist you with any planning in advance, or answer any questions for you, please contact us directly prior to your stay so we may ensure we meet and exceed your expectations.  Thank you for sharing your feedback.

Summary: We had one night to spend in paradise and I now know we have to return for a longer stay!  The staff and grounds fully embody the Ritz-Carlton brand — from the bellman to the manager, we were greeted and made to feel special (with champagne in the lobby at check in)!  Our ocean view was fabulous and our dinner at Raya was enjoyable from start to finish.  I wish I had time for pool, beach and spa — but those will have to wait until my return trip!
Manager Response: Hurry back soon!  We look forward to seeing you again, and promise to provide you with another memorable experience.

Summary: This is an extraordinary place.  The grounds are well kept, and the view spectacular.  The friendliness of the staff will get you hooked.  An example: we (family of 4) wanted to roast marshmallows at a fire pit near the pool.  We stopped a housekeeper to ask how to get the fire lit.  She gladly called the appropriate person, then checked back with us to make sure it was done, and if we needed anything.  She was friendly, helpful and didn’t appear all put off-as I am certain she had her own busy schedule to keep.  We have never been disappointed during a stay here.
Manager Response: We appreciate your loyalty, thank you!  It is always a pleasure having you with us and we look forward to more memorable experiences with you soon.

Summary: This hotel sits on a beautiful property overlooking a cliff on pacific coast. The public areas in the hotel is just gorgeous, decorated with upscale taste. Marbles, fresh roses and manicured garden everywhere. The view is breath taking.  It overlooks a sandy beach and guests get to use complementary beach chair and umbrella.  Staff is extra friendly and responsive. Excellent hotel crew. They give personalized attention, which is unparalleled elsewhere.  However the one star that was taken off is for the hotel room. With the price tag, one would expect the hotel room to be well appointed and live to th name Ritz too. But the rooms were just not furnished as one would expect. I think rooms in some other chain hotels we stayed in that are less costly might have better decorated
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for posting you detailed review of our resort.  It is a pleasure to hear from you, and we are delighted you enjoyed your recent experience with us.  We enjoyed taking care of you and we look forward to another opportunity to do so soon.  If we may be of any assistance to you until then, it would be our pleasure.

Summary: Excellent stay, hard to top a location like this.  Staff was great, from arrival to check-out.  I was there for business so didn't get a chance to utilize many amenities.  Fitness center is in a prime location overlooking the cliffs and beach.  Had a room that overlooked the pool which looked really nice and didn't seem overly crowded.  Room was good size, but could use a refresh and updating.  I was a little disappointed with the room service food, but overall the property is so nice that it makes up for a lot.
Manager Response: We agree with you - our view is magnificent!  Thank you for joining us here at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We appreciate your feedback regarding our guest rooms and our in room dining.  We look forward to welcoming you back one day soon.

Summary: I visited this hotel with some friends and I fell in love with the ambiance of the hotel. It was late upon our arrival so couldn't do or see much but it was charming. We had a view of the pool with a balcony so we sat outside and chatted under the warm moonlight. It was nice to sit in a charming place that felt European. The bed was luxurious and SO comfortable!
