I think I sank into my pillow and faded into dreamland. In the morning we ran down to the beach, and WOW. What a spectacular view. We spent the entire morning at the beach and forgot about our hunger. Once the sun hit high noon, we ran up for lunch along with other friends and all you could hear was the buzz: of staff, china and silverware, people chatting....It felt like a movie in my head. Not long after we lounged
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed your Ritz-Carlton experience!  Thank you for joining us and taking in our warm, relaxed, yet refined ambiance.  We look forward to your return.

Summary: We stayed here for a few days in August '18 and really enjoyed the area, the hotel and the service. We had an ocean front room with a balcony that had an amazing view of the ocean. We want to come back when it is a little cooler and try one of the fire pit rooms. That being said, the rooms were a little dated but very clean and well kept. The staff were very nice and helpful. I have to say the hotel employees were a highlight - everyone not only provided great service but they were very personable and were willing to go the extra mile - for ex, the waiter that gave us water bottles to take on a boat trip we planned after he asked what we were doing that day. The housekeeping schedule seemed a little off - one day we returned from the beach at 4pm and our room wasn't cleaned -
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear that your experience at our resort was full of relaxation, adventure, and wonderful service. We love knowing that our ladies and gentlemen personalized your stay in a way that was accommodating and memorable. We truly appreciate your feedback, and we would be honored to host you again the next time you are in Dana Point.

Summary Heading: Yoga and Pilates with Cynthia Nielson
Summary: This summer I had total knee replacement and looked forward to our week at the Ritz Carlton as a recovery and relaxation from daily Physical Therapy. On our last visit I had enjoyed the yoga classes with Cynthia Nielson but I was more than hesitant to take a class this year. I sought Cynthia out and asked her what she thought and she welcomed me into the classes. She made the classes successful for my recovery and ego! Not only have I benifited from the daily yoga classes but I have stayed for her pilates classes as well. Instead of loosing flexion this week, I have improved flexion, built strengh and feel so much better!!! Cynthia's extensive knowledge as a teacher and practitioner have made my week the best possible for healing. I am feeling great and walking straight!
Manager Response: Thank you or taking the time to recognize our very own Cynthia!  We couldn't agree with you more she is extraordinary and we are fortunate to have her as part of our Ritz-Carlton family.  We are delighted to hear she provided you with genuine care and concern.  We wish you a speedy recovery and look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary Heading: Stunning views of the Pacific Ocean
Summary: Stunning views, lovely courtyards, salty ocean air, fabulous restaurants. the bouquets of roses throughout the lobby were stunning and aromatic. Even the coffee service was memorable!. We loved our visit!
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you had a relaxing, luxury experience at our resort—thank you for joining us. Your kind review means so much to us, and we would look forward to welcoming you back any time to enjoy our coastal views and wonderful amenities once again.

Summary Heading: Came To the Ritz, left not impressed
Summary: Was so excited to stay at the Ritz last week.  The initial impression upon arrival, was very pleasant, being received by the valet and bell staff.  Upon approaching the registration desk, the queue was abnormally long and the sense of order was not there as people were cutting the queue from the other side of the room.  Upon getting  my room, I walked to the other end of the property, and found a lovely ground floor room with an expansive bathroom and comfortable bed. Upon examination of the bath tub, there was a rust stain around the drain and shower curtain attachments had seen better days. The main issue was the poor staff levels in the hotel.  We went to the 1800 Blue outdoor restaurant for lunch.  It was terribly understaffed for lunch and took over 90 minutes to complete
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to spend a relaxing vacation at our resort. Although we are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the comforts of your room and our valet service in particular, we regret to hear that you found our the service extended to you overall to be anything less than outstanding. Please do not hesitate to contact us directly if you wish to discuss your stay further.  Thank you again for using TripAdvisor to share your experience.

Summary: We went here for our 5th anniversary and as a Marriott member - all I can say is that I was greatly disappointed by the treatment, from the front desk to checkout it was sub-par.  At dinner our server ignored us and the room was mildewy/moldy.  We won't make a return trip despite the great views.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback on TripAdvisor.  We truly appreciate your time in using TripAdvisor to provide your experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We are disappointed that your overall stay did not exceed your expectations as our ladies and gentlemen strive to provide unique, personalized service for each of our extremely valuable guests.  We regret to hear this was not your perception.  We hope you would be willing to allow us to make this right for you and we look forward to learning the details surrounding your visit.  Please contact us directly.  Thank you.

Summary: Had an amazing stay at the Ritz in Dana Point, CA. The view, the beach, the food, and the service were outstanding. This was a business trip but would go back on my own as a special getaway with my honey. Need more reward points to get a free night or two.
Manager Response: Thank you for joining us in Dana Point. It was a pleasure to offer you a truly unique experience during your business trip, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another unforgettable getaway.  We hope you acquire enough rewards points soon....it will be worth the wait!

Summary: Been very fortunate to have stayed at multiple Ritz properties in the US and outside.  This one with the view, the proximity to the amazing beach and the helpful staff I think takes the cake  Look, it’s the Ritz, so the at some point it is like picking a favorite child....but if I had to, this one wins !!
Manager Response: It was a pleasure to welcome you to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are ecstatic to hear the breathtaking views of our property and outstanding service of our ladies and gentlemen made for an extraordinary experience. We hope to welcome you back "home" soon!

Summary: We just checked into the property yesterday afternoon. We stay at this property annually, and often more than once per year. There are many small changes here that all add up to disappointment... 1.  Upon check in we were told they cannot offer us any sort of upgrade to our rooms (we are Platinum Marriott Rewards members). When I asked if we could pay to upgrade to club lounge or a suite or ANY other option I was told the canned response of “sorry, we are sold out”.   2.  Upon arriving into our rooms (I’m here with three young children), we found out that the bedding requests for 2 Queen Beds connected to King) had not been honored even though I requested online and had called ahead to request.  Again, sorry there is nothing we can do. Hotel said “We will send up a roll away”.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for providing your feedback.  We greatly appreciate it and we will be in contact with you today.  We value your platinum status and your loyalty to our resort and brand.  We look forward to speaking with you shortly.  Thank you again for making us aware of your experience thus far.  We are confident we can turn this around for you.

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel with beautiful views and attentive staff
Summary: We had been looking forward to our arrival at The Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel after reading many reviews and hearing about the hotel. There was a slight mixup with our room upon arrival, but Cole at the front desk was very patient and provided us with options as the hotel was very busy.  He was extremely professional and followed up with us even bringing chocolate covered strawberries to our room.  The views overlooking the ocean are outstanding and there is a shuttle to the beach which is located down a path.  The hotel provides chairs, towels and an umbrella.  There are also two pools on property, and even the gym has a beautiful view overlooking the ocean.  The staff was very nice throughout the hotel, and we had access to the club lounge where Shelley and Diane went out of
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to be of service to you.  We appreciate your business and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We spent my birthday in July at the Ritz-Carlton at Dana Point. The hotel is lovely and the views are spectacular. Views from our room were amazing, though it was warmer than usual, it was very pleasant even when standing in full sun. The accommodations at the hotel are very nice and the facilities offer pretty much everything. The bar was convivial and we enjoyed drinks in there each night. The market was perfect for a take-out breakfast. Golf cart shuttle to the beach with towels, chairs and an umbrella. It is a perfect place....already planning to return!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  Happy Belated Birthday!  We are delighted that you enjoyed a memorable experience with us, and we enjoyed creating it for you.  We look forward to welcoming you "home" soon.

Summary Heading: Great spot - Poor Service including Club level
Summary: I have long wanted to experience the Ritz Carlton at Laguna Nigel.  With a milestone birthday approaching my wife and our 12 y/o son decided that it was time to travel across the country and experience for real.  Around the time we made the reservation I started to notice some negative reviews but decided to go for it.    This property get A+ for views and location, but even they can't screw that up.  Having long been a fan of the Ritz in Aruba, the Ritz in Aruba ratings went up based on this trip to Laguna Nigel.  They should send the entire staff from the Valets that greet you to the front desk to the club level staff all to Aruba to understand what service is.  No drink upon arrival, no one to open the door for you (throughout the entire 4 day stay, long wait at the front
Manager Response: On behalf of our executive leadership and all our ladies and gentlemen, we sincerely apologize for the service failures you and your family encountered while being our guests; especially in honor of such a momentous occasion. We take great pride in our exclusive Club Level Experience as well as our physical property condition, and are extremely disappointed to hear you did not take away unique and wonderful memories with you. We have taken your feedback constructively and we thank you for sharing it.  Hearing from our guests is the most powerful way for us to learn and continue striving for excellence.  We realize you have many choices in luxury experiences, and we hope to welcome you back to rebuild your faith and trust in our resort and brand. We kindly ask that you contact our Executive Office at the resort so we may speak to you further and make this right for you.

Summary: Spent a weekend here. The location is absolutely stunning. All of the food we had at the restaurants was excellent. I had bolognese from room service and it was some of the best I've ever had. Did end up being very busy in the lobby area at night on Saturday.
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear that you had an excellent weekend getaway. Thank you for joining us and for sharing the details of your experience. If we may be of assistance in the future, please call us directly and we will ensure your next visit is amazing.

Summary: I’ve been to the Ritz many times since I live down the street, obviously haven’t stayed there so I can’t review that part of it.  The people have always been friendly when we go to lunches and dinners, well, the people are still friendly but my friend and I had lunch at their poolside and waited 20 minutes before I finally asked the bartender if there was service at the table or should we be ordering from her. She said somebody will be right with you. 10 minutes later still no service so I got up and asked a young man if we could get service. He said he’d be right with us, ordered drinks took another 20 minutes to come, very expensive for a margarita that was pretty small but I expected that because it’s the Ritz.  But I was really surprised at how slow the service was and  then
Manager Response: We are greatly disappointed to hear this!  Our ladies and gentlemen take great pride in providing a level of genuine care and service excellence that ranks amongst the best in the world, and we are always saddened if this is not our guests' experience and perception.  We would be more than happy to review your bill with you if you can kindly contact us in the Executive Offices.  Thank you for your time and efforts.  We appreciate it!

Summary: This property has breathtaking views. Staff at front desk very kind upon check-in. Platinum w/ marriott and I was offered an upgrade that we declined due to location not being near the main pool so they issued hotel credit in lieu of the upgrade.... very nice treat! Rooms here are nothing special but the beds are super comfortable. There’s a lovely new fire pit where the gazebo was previously but when I asked to have it lit I was told they weren’t authorized to use it .... it’s a shame to have something so beautiful and not be able to use it. Only other disappointment is after paying over $5 for a cup of coffee I can no longer get a refill. This is a new policy this year. That’s something that we enjoyed in the past visits.... not sure why managers would change that policy.
Manager Response: Thank you for joining us for another luxurious vacation. We truly appreciate your loyalty to our resort and brand, and are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed a relaxing getaway with us. Thank you for sharing your feedback, as this helps us to provide the best possible guest experience in the future. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: I don’t understand how a negative review can be had. Views that make your jaw drop. Service that doesn’t have to solve problems because it prevents them. Amenities you didn’t know you needed and now can’t live without. Our business accommodations were seamless with perfect venues and dinners. Our room was impeccable with great service from Mrs Lucy. The concierge made our travel plans to San Diego with deft precision, thanks Lucinda. I just can’t say enough kudos. And did I mention the view  PS I included some wedding photos because those services were so gorgeous the event staff deserves a plug
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing such wonderful feedback. It was our pleasure to offer you an impeccable experience.  We will certainly pass along your regards and look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Although the staff was really trying to help the experience was OK. The front desk was nice they upgraded me because valet was not there however the hotel itself is a 3 star hotel. They where trimming the trees and debris almost hit my wife on the porch. They said they will call to discuss,still no call. The views and beach are spectacular!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We invite you to please contact our Executive Office in order to discuss the details of your visit.  We strive to provide each of our valuable guests with an exceptional stay, and would enjoy the opportunity to make this right for you so that you feel confident in The Ritz-Carlton.  On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to speaking with you.

Summary Heading: Pay close attention to the reviews
Summary: I read the reviews on the hotel and still opted to try it.  Do I regret it?  Probably.  The upside is that now I will not ever worry that I have missed out by not staying there.  Once is enough.  There is just not much that is special about the hotel.  I think the staff tries hard but something is just missing.  The pool is nothing great.  The beach is a let down bc it is the public beach and the way the hotel sits on the hillside makes it difficult to carry the chairs up and down or even to catch the shuttle to the hotel.  It is really steep.  Yes there are attendants to help but bc the beach is public I felt like I had to carry my chairs up and that is a chore.  The fitness room is amazing the way it sits looking out at the ocean.  The marketplace is good for breakfast.  The
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback via TripAdvisor. We regret that your overall experience was less than exceptional as our team strives to provide a relaxing yet refined stay for each of our valuable guests.  We are disappointed this was not your takeaway and we would enjoy the opportunity to hear from you personally.  Please feel free to contact our Executive Office, and we would be delighted to speak with you.  Thank you!

Summary Heading: If you can, you should stay at the Club Level.
Summary: Splurged on Club Level, and was not disappointed. Gorgeous room, the service was impeccable, and the views were spectacular. We upgraded to club level, because we had our two teenage girls with us, and it was totally worth it. Loved goinng to the Yappy Hour when we were a bit homesick and wanted some fur babies to pet. The RC knows how to empower their employees, and it shows. They seem to take personal pride in the customer experience. Dreaming of staying at the Ritz again.... :)
Manager Response: Welcome home!  Thank you for sharing this glowing review. It was our pleasure to host you and your family. We are elated to hear that our Club Level amenities and unparalleled service made your stay so memorable. The next time you are in need of a Dana Point getaway, we would be honored to welcome you back.

Summary Heading: Don’t waste your money! This is not a 5 star hotel.
Summary: While the property itself is in a beautiful location, the hotel is FAR from luxury. . Hard to believe a hotel with a such a strong brand has their heads in the sand on a number of fronts..   - plastic water bottles offered at every turn.  - food is poor and genetically modified (little to no options for people with sensitivities, or organic) - bath products in the rooms are filled with toxic chemicals   - the rooms are stuffy with possible mold (my husband had a bad allergic reaction every time he entered the room)  - air conditioner was old and loud. Probably never had the filters changed.  - dirt on the balconies and the cleanliness of the rooms felt average.   This is not luxury  This is not leadership This is not setting a good example for the world as a luxury brand- no
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, and our executive committee, we thank you for providing your valuable perspective and constructive feedback regarding your recent experience at our resort.  We value you and we are equally as disappointed that you departed the resort without the fondest of memories.  We take great pride in supporting a comprehensive sustainability program that is in alignment with our company and brand values, as well as our local community initiatives.  Located in such a magnificent area, protecting our environment and encouraging a healthy lifestyle are our highest priorities.  We would enjoy sharing the details of our programming with you.  Kindly contact our Executive Office directly at the resort so we may schedule a time to speak with you further.  Thank you again for taking time out of your busy schedule to post your review via TripAdvisor.  We look forward to hearing from you.

Summary: Not only is this hotel dog-friendly and ocean front but they actually host YAPPY HOUR events for (wo)man's best friend. This hotel was amazing in every way but how they treated my dog was truly heartwarming. I had an ocean view room that was nice and spacious with a balcony that I'd highly recommend. And their ocean view restaurant 180Blu was so good. Friday night they had live music and their sangria was pretty tasty although pricey for the size. Their Jidori Chicken Salad was off-the-hook delish although their lobster tacos were extremely tiny and not worthy of the price tag. I guess this should be a separate review but I do recommend going here as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing this lovely review. We pride ourselves on being a welcoming retreat for humans and dogs alike, and we could not be more pleased to know the whole family enjoyed their time here.  Your recommendations are important to us, and we look forward to our next chance to accommodate you.

Summary Heading: A bit of a let down if I’m honest...
Summary: We finished up our west coast vacay with 4 nights at the RC Laguna Niguel. Which I was REALLY looking forward to, as I am huge hotel snob and the hotel pretty much makes or breaks my trip for me.   Our room was just average if I’m honest. Crappy coffee maker, chipping paint, etc. The hotel grounds were nice but not amazing. The pool area was unorganized and the service was so-so; same for their valet area. You just dreaded headed out/in each time it was such a clusterf*ck. Their beach service was great! I will give them that.   The main saving grace of this place is the hotel’s many restaurants. I don’t believe we had one bad meal at any of them, (Room service included) so that was at least nice. I really wanted to give them another star but I just couldn’t. We were just that
Manager Response: Thank you very much for providing your candid feedback.  We appreciate it and have shared it appropriately.  We are equally disappointed that you were not beyond satisfied with your experience at the resort.  Our ladies and gentlemen intended for your stay to be exceptional so you could take home long lasting memories.  We would enjoy having you back in the future so you may enjoy the service and facilities that we are normally very proud of.  Please contact us directly so we my arrange a future stay for you.  We realize you have many choices for luxury accommodations, and we wish to reassure you, you have chosen the best.

Summary Heading: Love this hotel but club lounge is overrated
Summary: Fourth year in a row but this year we did the +$150 for the club level. Check in person said “once you do you will never settle for less again”  So here is the deal with club.  Service is spotty. The staff will gush over a table and table serve and my wife and I sat there like what are we chopped liver? Observed this day one and two. 3 and 4 yet to come.  The food is cheap starch like noodles and bread. Yesterday they had a plate of crab claws at 5pm but gone by 510. After that it was a shot glass of gazpacho with 2 shrimp scraps on top.   I don’t know how so many Marriott properties can screw up scrambled eggs. I would expect the ritz club lounge to top your typical residence inn but no joy on that. Eggs are a congealed clump. Eggs are cheap! Throw some in half and half and
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for sharing your experience via TripAdvisor. We kindly ask that you contact our Executive Office right away so that we can ensure your preferences are met for the remainder of your stay. We look forward to speaking with you as soon as possible. Thank you again for letting us know. We appreciate your valuable feedback, and are confident we can regain your faith in us.

Summary: The hotel is located on a cliff side overlooking the beach, amazing views and sunsets!  Check in was quick, able to get in the room earlier, valet parking only; the room was spacious but only had 2 double beds not queen size, offered to move to a suite with a roll out bed for an extra $400.00, so we stayed put! Room has coffee pot, small fridge, robes, turn down service. Breakfast is available at the restaurants or at the small cafe by the lobby. Pool was nice, quiet, the bar closes super early, at 5 PM! There's a beach shuttle that takes you down the steep walk to the beach, and umbrellas,chairs and cold water are available at no charge, staff sets up them for you. To get Laguna beach you need a car, or you can take the trolley, Ubber, taxi, etc, about 15 min
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton.  We are delighted to hear you enjoyed a memorable experience and we look forward to being of service to you again soon!

Summary: We booked 4 nights at the Ritz Laguna Niguel for our family of 4.  Turns out the room with 2 queens is actually a room with 2 “double” beds.  No way 2 adults or teens can comfortably sleep in a double bed, and they won’t bring a roll away bed in.  I am so frustrated and angry.  My kids are anxious to swim and hit the beach, but instead we are sitting in a tiny room waiting to speak to a manager. We’ve been waiting for over an hour.  We will likely leave and stay somewhere else, but I want others to be aware that there are no rooms with queen beds here, there is no flexibility once you arrive if things aren’t as you expect, and the staff here will look down their noses at you if you even think about trying to use reward points of any kind.  This has been the most frustrating
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for sharing your experience.  We kindly ask that you contact our Executive Office right away so that we can ensure you have everything you need for a comfortable and memorable stay.  We look forward to speaking with you as soon as possible.  Thank you again for letting us know.  We appreciate your valuable feedback, and are confident we can regain your faith in us for the remainder of your visit.

Summary: This was a combined business/pleasure trip. The room was booked thru a group and fortunately the price reflected such, unfortunately the room type did as well. Our 1st floor garden view room had a patio open /shared with the rooms around us and looked at a burn. The view was dirt and some green plants. This property is all about the view and unfortunately we were unable to enjoy it other that from common areas. That said, I doubt we would have paid to upgrade to a room with a view bc the rates are extremely high and the rooms underwhelming. A bit dated  but brand new properties wouldn't have the view or location. My biggest disappointment was the odd layout and amenities. Coffee maker, fridge and safe in a mirrored cabinet but no outlet. Had to move the coffee maker to the
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we thank you for your most valuable feedback.  We share all the comments we receive with all our leaders here at the resort in an effort to be the best we can be in both service and facilities.  We are delighted to here that our team provided exceptional service, but are equally disappointed that you did not enjoy your overall experience.  We hope you had a chance to speak with a member of our management team while you were on property, but if time did not allow please feel free to do so any time.  We would enjoy speaking with you.  We do look forward to having you stay with us again, and would ask that you make your future arrangements through our Executive Offices.  Thank you.

Summary: We were greeted by three valets who helped myself my wife and kids out of the car and ere super welcoming.   We spent a day at the pool and a day at the beach.  Amazing views..  the staff was great.  Overall picture perfect stay.
Manager Response: We are appreciative of your kind review, thank you!.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Just returned from a 6 night stay for our honeymoon. The entire trip, the fact that it was our honeymoon was only acknowledged twice at check-in. Nothing else was done by the hotel to recognize the occasion. And, I just read in a few reviews below mine that another couple just honeymooned at this property and received a $300 voucher from the hotel. Why didn't we receive this? We had a bottle of champagne sent to the room by a family member, but nothing from the hotel.  You stay at this hotel for the location and views. I think the hotel staff relies to heavily on this, and they allow their service level to fall behind. The only person at the resort that delivers old-school service is Miguel at Raya restaurant. The pool servers come across like undertrained college interns for
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to share your experience via TripAdvisor. We enjoy hearing from our guests and take all feedback seriously and constructively. While we are delighted you enjoyed our magnificent location and overall service, we are equally as disappointed you did not leave the resort with unique and personal memories. We hope to have the opportunity to speak with you further to  make this right for you. It is our highest mission to ensure you are 100% satisfied with our resort and team, and we want you to be proud of choosing The Ritz-Carlton. Please contact a member of our leadership team at your earliest convenience. Thank you. We look forward to welcoming you back and providing you with the unforgettable experience you deserve.

Summary Heading: Drinks on the Observation Deck - ohhhhh yeahhhh
Summary: My annual Fourth of July trip to the Ritz Carlton to have some adult beverages and food on the observation deck did not disappoint.  It was really busy [including a lot of kids of all ages], yet the service wa fantastic.  They had a great sushi station set up that sent out some great looking sushi.  The food available is very good.  Sitting atop the bluff,  you can see fireworks from Laguna Niguel, Laguna Beach and other locations between.  The beauty of that location is unsurpassed.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for joining us for another spetacular 4th of July celebration. We appreciate that you have taken the time to share your experience—from our stunning views to our delicious food and beverages. We look forward to seeing you again next year at 180blu!

Summary: I stayed at the hotel for 3 nights for my honeymoon after 17 hours flight from Dubai to Los Angeles, I wanted a hotel to relax before heading to downtown LA. And I was really happy with the hotel view and services.  We were tired but the staff were very helpful to gave us the room before check in time and they greeted us with some strawberries and chocolate inside the room.  The reason I really writing this review is to thank personally JULISSA ALBURQUERQUE - Front office Agent as she surprised us by amazing letter to congratulate us for our wedding and giving us a $300 credit for Breakfast, Lunch or   Dinner from the hotel, we tried to see her and thank her but we didn’t have a chance.  So please thank her on behalf of us and thanks Ritz Carlton for this experience.   Regards,
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you had a wonderful celebration at our resort!  We look forward to welcoming you back for many more special moments in the future.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton.

Summary: We splurged for a room on the Club level and found it to be a totally worthwhile experience in spite of the ridiculous price.  The room was good (not amazing!) the service was impeccable during our stay, the ocean view was divine and the amenities on the property meant we didn't have to venture out into the rest of Orange County which is not a favorite place to visit otherwise.   We had a situation with our room which was quickly handled and we were given a generous voucher for the spa to make up for the snafu.   If you're considering staying here, then you may as well upgrade and be sure to get a room with a view.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and that our ladies and gentlemen were able to ensure you had a memorable experience. Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel Club Level.  We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback.  We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: Stayed here over the 4th of July holiday week.  I was really looking forward to staying at this property since the pictures looked amazing.  Unfortunately we ran in some trouble right from the beginning.  As soon as I entered our room, I stepped on wet carpet.  I didn't think much of it because the family was excited to go to the beach for the day.  A few minutes later, my wife steps on the wet carpet and wonders what it is.  She places a towel on top of the wet spot and the towel turns yellow which we could only hope that it was not human body fluids.  There were lots of families with dogs so I am hoping it was from a dog, even though it does not make it better.  When I called the front desk for a new room, they didn't apologize.  They just said that the would get me a new
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel, thank you for taking a moment to share your experience. We are very sorry to hear that your stay did not live up to your expectations. We take pride in offering our guests’ the best possible service and facilities, so this concerns us and we take it seriously. We would be grateful for the opportunity to make this right for you.  Kindly contact us directly iso we may regain your trust in our resort and brand.  Thank you again for your time and feedback.

Summary: $1000 for a view of the ocean. Nice but average room. Service ok but casual.  Overpriced food, expensive spa, $40 overnight parking.  If someone else is paying for it then good. To get back and forth to the beach a long  Uphill walk or ride their cart. Staff is young and robotic.  Fake grass in back.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for taking the time to share your review of the experience at our resort. We are disappointed to hear that your time with us did not live up to your expectations. We take pride in offering our guests luxury experiences with excellent service.  If we can be of service to you or answer any questions you may have, please contact us directly.  We do hope you choose to return to our magnificent location soon.  Thank you again for sharing your feedback.

Summary: Loved loved the view and the amenities this hotel has to offer.  Everyday I would take a stroll down to the beach. We had a ocean front room and slept with the patio doors open to hear the waves and feel the breeze. Room service food was good and the staff was friendly
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback.  We are thrilled that waking up to an oceanfront view from our stunning property made your getaway relaxing and unforgettable.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: My sisters and I had SUCH a fun birthday weekend at the hotel. The welcome champagne, tasty taffy and friendly smiles at the front desk were a perfect way to kick off the weekend. The views from the room were stunning and only got better as the sun went down and we got toasty by the fire pit and made s'mores. Just thinking about that weekend brings back great memories. The only thing I'd change is making the trip a little longer. WhatAHotel is a great place to book with and helps make magical memories like this possible. Richie -- you're the best! :)
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, Happy Birthday! It was our pleasure providing you and your sisters a unique and memorable experience. We look forward to creating more memories for you in the future. Your s'mores and taffy will be waiting for you!

Summary Heading: Excellent bluff top location and service
Summary: Sometimes the brand name says all one needs to know.  In this case that could not be more true.  An assortment of venues for eating, fine dinning to casual patio. Try breakfast with an expansive view and cocktails watching the sunset behind Catalina Island.  Exemptlory service and accommodations.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We enjoyed creating a unique and memorable experience for you.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Where do I begin? First of all, my expectations are high. This hotel is well over $700 a night. We have a six month old daughter, so I called ahead to request a pack and play and a crib (not knowing which my daughter would sleep in). They weren't in our room when we arrived, so we requested them at the front desk. Three phone calls and an hour later, a man showed up with a pack and play with no sheets. I asked for some sheets and he first told me no. Eventually, he brought back a king sized flat sheet which most parents would tell you isn't even safe to use on a pack and play. At this point, I just accepted it and moved on. Five days later and I have been continually underwhelmed with everything about this hotel. The valet is constantly crowded. Our friends came to visit and it
Manager Response: We truly regret to hear that your experience at our resort fell short of your expectations, and we sincerely apologize.  We are glad you let us know of these shortcomings and we are eager to correct each and every issue, and resolve them to your satisfaction.  We have taken all of these comments to heart and shared them with our leadership team in an effort to provide coaching for our ladies and gentlemen.  We look forward to regaining your trust in us, and it would be an honor to welcome you back.  Please do not hesitate to contact us directly so we may personally and directly assist you. Thank you again for your time in submitting this review.

Summary Heading: Terrible Hotel, this is a Fairfield Inn, not a Ritz
Summary: I’ve been staying at Marriott for over 30 years.  I’ve stayed at many of their properties worldwide and been to many Ritz Carlton’s.  This is at best a poorly maintained Marriott.  It is not a Ritz.  The list of negatives are lengthy.  It’s a tired, poorly maintained, worn property.  We used points and it was a total ripoff.  I demanded they cancel my reservation after the first night and refund my points plus additional $200/night for upgraded “coastal view”.   The guest services rep immediately gave a refund.  Her performance was that I expect from the Ritz.  The rest of the experience was unacceptable. Some of the negatives:   -Waited 30 min to turn into the hotel (100 ft) because of poor traffic management.  Looked like 1 high school student trying to vector a line of cars
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for sharing your detailed review of our resort and ladies and gentlemen.  We sincerely regret that your experience at our resort was anything less than exceptional and memorable.  Our guests’ comfort and satisfaction are our highest priorities,and we would truly like to make this right for you.  Kindly contact us directly at your convenience, and we would be delighted to assist you. Thank you again for your feedback and we hope to speak with you soon.

Summary: Outstanding accommodations perched on a hill above a delicious stretch of Laguna Beach. Marvelous sunsets. Rooms were spacious and comfortable! Totally awesome decor exceeding expectations even for a Ritz!! Valet parking was efficiently called by text message and was seamless and without wait!! Service was over the top also. Pool and beach were both pieces of heaven on this delightful trip!
Manager Response: We are grateful for such a glowing review—thank you for sharing your wonderful experience with us. We love hearing that our sweeping coastal views and relaxing amenities made your stay so special. The next time you are in need of a California escape, we would love to welcome you back again.

Summary: We have now visited this property three times in the past 9 months.  Our most recent stay was for 6 nights and it was amazing!  As I mentioned in a prior review our biggest focus is our daughter's severe tree nut allergy.  The Ritz is more accommodating than any other hotel/restaurant we've encountered.  Our daughter - who would not eat anywhere other than home - has become so comfortable that she no longer needs the added assurance of a chef explaining their preparation procedures.  Now she goes and happily orders from all of her favorite restaurants at the RC!  We are relieved in that we no longer have to carry the burden of worry while traveling.  On that basis alone I would recommend this hotel to anyone with food allergies.  But it doesn't stop there.  Upon booking the
Manager Response: WOW thank you for sharing this incredible story!  We are so proud of our ladies and gentlemen.  We truly enjoy creating memories like this, and it warms our hearts to know that your trip was a success.  It was an honor to welcome you and your family back, and we look forward to creating many more unique and memorable experiences for you in the near future.

Summary Heading: A deliberate effort by staff to ruin a perfect brand
Summary: We have stayed at this beautiful property by the pacific coast may times but the staff indifference and arrogance on the recent trips, especially the stay last night made us say goodbye for the last time.  We checked in the room and when we opened the curtains all we could see was the valet parking . I called the operator to get connected to the front desk. It took over 17 minutes for a live body to respond and then their abrupt response was they could not do anything about the room.  Thirty minutes after I angrily objected and hang up, someone called and offers us a room 2 doors away that was just as bad,  The rest of the stay went further downhill and ended up with a valet attendant that had me wait several minutes to take my ticket while she was flirting with someone on the
Manager Response: Dear Henry H,   We are truly disappointed to hear that your experiences with your room and with our ladies and gentlemen was less than exceptional.  Providing a unique, personal, and memorable experience for our guests is our highest priority, so we take your concerns very seriously. Please do not hesitate to contact us directly to further discuss your feedback.  It would be our pleasure to speak with you and make this right for you.  Thank you for your constructive comments.  We greatly appreciate it.

Summary: My wife and I spent 4 nights at the Ritz in Laguna a few weeks back as our two little ones were in an overnight camp back in AZ.  The Ritz is always a pleasure but this property is gorgeous, very private and so connected to the water.  The price if you aren't on a corporate junket is out of control (sorry guys) so do yourself a favor and try to secure a 4th night comp package to soften the blow.    Also, we chose to stay at the Club Level as we've always had good luck with the top notch service and flexibility with food/drinks.  This was the best club experience we've ever had even compared to HK, Naples, SF and some of the others.  The Ladies upstairs made our trip unforgettable and we can't say enough - we felt like family!!
Manager Response: Dear Patrick H,   We are thrilled to hear that your experience at our resort was so enjoyable, from start to finish. Thank you for spending your Dana Point escape along the coast with us and for taking a moment to share your kind review.  We couldn't agree with you more that our exclusive Club Level Experience is one of the best in the world.  It truly is like coming home each and every time.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  You are a part of our family!

Summary: Always love the Ritz. This property is beautiful and everyone is so nice. We stayed at the club level so always has food in our belly and drinks at our finger tips. Coming from Tampa- this was a pleasant change in weather. The tide pools were amazing- could have had great surf lessons but chose to body board and tackle the waves on our own. Just a ton of fun. Sunsets never disappoint!!!
Manager Response: Dear SKJUDD,   We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed a relaxing and luxurious stay at our resort. It was a pleasure to host you in our stunning location, and we love knowing that you were able to incorporate a bit of adventure into your time with us. The next time you are in need of a west coast escape, we would be eager to welcome you back.

Summary: Gorgeous ocean views and friendly staff! They were eager to help guests navigate around the property. There is a jogging path that was perfect for exploring the beachfront. outdoor eating was divine. Loved the landscaping and attention to detail. We were able to upgrade rooms for ocean view when we arrived.
Manager Response: Dear careswell,   Thank you for joining us on a wonderful getaway to Dana Point. We love that our breathtaking views right along the Pacific coast made your beachfront adventures so memorable. We are also pleased that our delicious dining outlets suited your expectations. The next time you would like a relaxing escape, we would love to welcome you back to our resort.

Summary Heading: A favorite but Prices just keep soaring year after year!
Summary: Tiny ocean view rooms with the big ocean price.  Elegant and a must visit at least once. Always very clean.  Excellent food selections for breakfast, lunch and dinner but again very pricey.  Has an executive lounge for platinum members but you have to pay extra for access.  Try Marriott New Port Villas (they only have 2 bedroom suites for a third of the price) if you want a better price with an ocean view.
Manager Response: Dear Jnine N,   Thank you for your loyalty to our resort and for taking the time to share your thoughts with us. We are glad we are on of your favorites! We know you have many choices in luxury experiences and appreciiate you keeping us top of mind. You will be glad to know that we do have several periods throughout the year in which we offer value rates and we are more than happy to work with you on those the next time you are thinking about visiting. We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: this is a very nice hotel.   it starts from the moment you drive up and are greeted by the valet who either takes your vehicle or helps you into registration.   staff at the front desk are quite friendly and helpful.   rooms are spacious, comfortable and clean.   good space to relax or do some work.   we had a room with an outdoor fireplace which we found quite nice in the evening.   very good excercise room and they offer a number of classes.   couple of nice pools.   restaurants are top notch.   hotel sits just above the beach which is spectacular.  great place to simply sit, hit the surf or go for a run/walk.   this is a wonderful property that i highly recommend
Manager Response: Thank you for spending your getaway with us!  We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your experience, and we look forward to creating more meaningful memories for you one day soon.

Summary: This was our first time at a ritz property.  With the merger, decided to give it a try. Although location and service is top notch, very disappointed with the outdated room (two full size beds...no queen, no bathroom ventilation, late 80’s / early 90’s room decor).   Might return after they renovate...but not worth the stay next time.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share your feedback. While we are thrilled that you enjoyed our beautiful location and unparalleled service, we regret to hear that your time spent in our guest rooms was not the same.  We are continuously enhancing the resort and we would enjoy sharing our projects and plans with you.  We hope you have the chance to re-visit us soon to experience them. We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary Heading: Brady Bunte - The Ritz Carlton, Laguna Niguel
Summary: One of my favorite Luxury Hotels.  I was married at this hotel.  I am a local and I still stay at this hotel even though it is so close to home.    Great dining, location, unforgettable views.  The staff is great, the rooms are spacious, I just really love everything about this hotel.  They also carry Tres Sietes Tequila which can be hard to find.   Sometimes I go there just for a Tres Sietes.   Highly recommend.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for your kind words and loyalty to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It is an honor to be considered one of your favorite hotels, and it is our pleasure to provide you with an impeccable luxury experience every time.

Summary: Beautifully located on a bluff overlooking the ocean. Very picturesque! Worth bring a good camera. Not convenient to the beach. But there is a shuttle most of the way down. Great beach. However not really supported by the hotel. Public
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your overall experience at the resort.  Although our world renowned beach is a public one, we always ensure our guests have convenient and flawless service there, and our shuttle is always available. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: I treated my husband to a surprise trip to California for his 40th Birthday - I did not know anything about it - someone just told me it was fabulous.   We spent money beyond our budget because it was a special occasion - 30 years later - this is a memory we will never forget.  On the concierge floor - incredible arched window views of the ocean and the dolphins . . .morning champagne breakfasts enjoyed with no makeup on in your bathrobe from the club area overlooking the ocean with other guests enjoying the view . . .afternoon tea and snacks after a round of golf. . first in line reservations from an Italian Restaurant that was packed . .  late night chocolates and after dinner drinks in the circular lounge on our floor with people who were so interesting . . .  Now at age 71,
Manager Response: Thank you for spending such a momentous occasion with us. We are so appreciative of your loyalty to our resort. It would be our pleasure to serve you and your husband on his 75th birthday and recreate the wonderful, luxury experience you had years ago. Our ladies and gentlemen will eagerly await your return to Dana Point.

Summary: The location cannot be beat. Service was exceptional. Easy walk or trolly down to beach. Ritz provides chairs, towels, and umbrellas at the beach, which was very convenient. Can even leave the chairs on beach when done (bring up towels).   Staff was all super friendly and helpful. Pools were nice. Only complaint was the rooms themselves were outdated and probably the least nice out of the RC’s I have stayed at (Dorado, half moon bay, Boston). If they redo those eventually, it may be perfect. Location is awesome.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a few moments to share your experience.  We are delighted to hear our perfect location overlooking the Pacific, as well as our accommodating beachside service, made your stay a memorable one. We would welcome the opportunity to share with you our upcoming room enhancement plans.  Please contact our Executive Office for details.  We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary Heading: Spent a very special birthday thanks to the ladies and gentlement at the Ritz Carlton
Summary: My husband treated me to an overnight stay at this beautiful location to celebrate my recent birthday as my family and I are fond of the Ritz Carlton properties. We were in Southern california visiting family and he thought it would be a nice surprise and that it was!  From even before our arrival we were accomodated and were made to feel extra special. Not only were we upgraded as a thanks for our stay on a special occasion, we were allowed to check in several hours early and they were able to accommodate a 2pm checkout. Upon arriving to our room, a short cake was set out with a nice happy birthday note. I thought it was very thoughtful.  The room itself was nicely set up and the terrace had a beautiful view. The closet space was slightly small but since we weren't staying for
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, Happy Birthday! Thank you for spending this special occasion at our resort. We appreciate your candid feedback, and hope to spend many more special occasions with you in the future.  If we may be of assistance any time, please contact our Executive Offices.  It would be our pleasure to hear from you.

Summary: We stayed here for the first part of our honeymoon and were very pleased with this decision.  We were welcomed into the hotel with congratulations on our recent marriage and were treated amazingly.  Our fireside ocean view room was the perfect place to relax and take in the ocean air and view.  The box of s’mores for us to cook via our fire was a nice touch!   The staff was always friendly and very accommodating of any requests that we had.  Look forward to a return visit in the future.
Manager Response: Congratulations on your wedding and thank you for choosing to spend such a special time with us. We are so pleased that our breathtaking ocean views and the personalized service of our ladies and gentlemen made your experience luxurious and unforgettable. We would be honored to celebrate more special occasions with you in the future!

Summary: The Ritz here at Dana Point is one of my favorite properties. The view from the balcony is amazing and the rooms are very nice with, of course, the famous Ritz Carlton bed and pillows. You must ask for 4th floor ocean side. There is an additional cost but you will not be disappointed.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. It is wonderful to hear that our 4th floor ocean view room made waking up at Salt Creek Beach a memory to keep forever.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: I do a lot of travel for business. I stay at many top notch hotels. As of late many of these hotels do not live up to their price or their name. This hotel is the exception! Every staff member is fantastic! From house cleaning and fitness employees to check in and luggage, everyone is friendly and helpful. They go out of their way to make sure you are comfortable, satisfied, and left feeling 100% served. The views are phenomenal and the staff puts this place over the top. It’s one of my favorites of all time! Also, a big shout out to Lauren who works in the sales side but was willing to help me find the fitness center even though she was just randomly passing me. Thank you!
Manager Response: We are elated to hear that our accommodating ladies and gentlemen made your time in Dana Point so memorable. We are proud to pair personalized service with our breathtaking views for a wonderful luxury experience. The next time you make a west coast escape, we would love to welcome you back.

Summary: We have been coming here almost every summer for the last five or six years and returned again this May for a wedding. As usual, everything was perfect—the food, the attention to detail, the spa, the gym, the flowers, and, best of all, the location. It was absolutely relaxing. We look forward to coming back.
Manager Response: Thank you for joining us once again!  We are grateful for your loyalty and we promise to always provide you with a unique and memorable experience each and every time you choose to stay with us.  .

Summary: After a three-night stay at the Ritz with my children I left with very mixed feelings about the hotel. The high points are the beach, which is just down a short hill from the hotel, the beach service provided by hotel, which was stellar (shuttles, chairs, and everything you could need for a day at the beach), and overall service at the hotel, which was unfaillingly friendly and helpful.  Despite those features, our room was a disappointment. Allegedly an upgrade due to Ritz gold status, the room was small and dated. The worst aspect was the bathroom, which is wall-to-wall marble and has seen better days. More importantly, the bathrooms (or at least ours) are completely without ventilation, so a hot shower results in thick fog and water everywhere. And in this coastal climate,
Manager Response: Thank you for spending several days with us during your California getaway. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our beautiful location, welcoming service, and convenient proximity to the beach. However, we regret to hear that you found aspects of your room less than satisfactory. We truly value your feedback and appreciate that you have taken the time to share your thoughts. Please do not hesitate to contact us directly if there is anything you would like to discuss further. We would enjoy hearing from you.  Thank you again for your valuable feedback.

Summary: Incredible view and exceptional excellence! Raya Restaurant offered a wonderful selection of culinary experience. The Salmon and Thai Budda Feast were amazing. Hailey, Catering Manager extended excellent customer service for the event we are planning. She was so curteous and accomodating of our busy and hectic schedules. Finally, the room with 180 degree ocean view was amazing,
Manager Response: We are elated to hear that you had an unforgettable luxury experience at our resort—from the wonderful service of our ladies and gentlemen, to our breathtaking views and delicious dining selection. Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts. The next time you find yourself in Dana Point, we would enjoy welcoming you back!

Summary: Wow - this location is unbeatable. The views are spectacular. We didn’t dine at the restaurant, but grabbed a drink at the bar and sat on the outside grassy area to watch the sunset.  Our room was probably one if their lower tiers, had views of one of the two pools, but still a nice room.  Went there for my birthday, and they brought a small birthday cake (nice touch).  The food and drink are a little pricey (2 drinks at the bar were $41), but you’ve got a view that makes the price less painful.  One area for improvement was at the pool. They were understaffed, and it took about 20 minutes from the time we sat down to get a drink. Waitress was super polite - just a note to management to watch staffing at the pool in the summer months.  Oh, and one of the better perks was being
Manager Response: Thank you for spending such a special occasion with us—Happy Birthday! We are delighted you enjoyed a memorable experience.  Thank you for your feedback about our pool service.  We appreciate it and will keep it top of mind.

Summary: Long relaxing weekend to breakup the winter. The hotel is beautiful with exceptional staff. The view is spectacular! Our room had a fire pit on the patio, and a s’mores kit was provided in our room which made for a fun family evening. Recommend spending an afternoon with on the water with Dana Point Charters whale watching.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your kind words. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the service of our accommodating ladies and gentlemen, as well as our wonderful amenities and attractions. Dana Point has so much to offer and we look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: You know it's an amazing experience when you start booking a return visit to the property while you are still onsite. Being that we travel a lot and are in the hospitality business we can attest that the Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel checks all the boxes. We have stayed at our share of Ritz Carlton hotels and found the layout of this property to be perfect, our Club Level suite was awesome and our overall accommodations were nothing short of amazing. The staff was outstanding, especially Penny, Silvia, Mercedes and the rest of the Club level lounge staff were extremely helpful and pleasant to visit with for our 3 nights. The sunset view from 180blue was spectacular and Brandon at Bar Raya was super friendly. I cannot forget to mention Anthony at the front desk as well as the Valet
Manager Response: We kindly thank you for leaving such glowing remarks. We are elated to hear that you had such a wonderful, luxury experience at our resort, and we will certainly pass your regards along to our ladies and gentlemen who made your stay so memorable. We look forward to seeing you again this summer!

Summary: Where do I begin?!?  This hotel is simply gorgeous, classy, and is set upon the most amazing view. The food, the staff, and everything about this place is beyond wonderful. I didn’t want to leave!  Yes the food and cocktails are pretty pricey  (average drink was around $16) but it was worth the cost!  Passion fruit mojito - yes please!  I was there for work. I hope to return another time with my husband.   Love it!
Manager Response: We love hearing that you had such a memorable time with us during your business trip.  Thank you for sharing your kind regards, and we look forward to seeing you again in paradise.

Summary: Stayed here two nights while attending a conference at the hotel.  The setting, with the hotel set on-top of a dramatic cliff above the ocean, is beautiful, and one cannot complain about walking along the beach at the conclusion of your meetings!    My room, on the club level, had a nice view of the ocean, and a nice balcony.  The design of the balcony was somewhat annoying, since you had to rearrange furniture to get the doors open.  The decor was upscale and the bed very comfortable.  The club provided a light breakfast, very nice lunch, and tasty desserts; to have food available throughout the day was very nice.  Service was good.  I was disappointed with my first room assignment, which was basically a conference room with a desk, computer, and sofa bed!  Thankfully, when I
Manager Response: We are pleased that you were able to spend two nights with us during your recent conference. Our beautiful location, views, and property are perfect for both business and leisure experiences. Thank you for taking a moment to share your thoughts. It  would be our pleasure to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: I loved the location, it really is why people go here.  Rooms were ok, food was good at all locations at the hotel, ambiance is fantastic, but you really go for the location in my opinion.  Service was 8/10, Food was 9/10, location was 10/10.  It was an event my company paid for, so was happy to experience it.    The spa was great, although the lounge for the ladies is on the smaller side.  With a company event, it was hard to manage us all and keep that zen feeling (not really their fault).  A lot of chatter in there made it hard to relax and also became standing room when more than 7 people were in there at a time.  I had Allie performing my massage and she did a wonderful job!  Others came out looking like they would melt into a puddle on the floor, so no issues with the spa
Manager Response: We love hearing that you enjoyed a luxurious getaway with us in Dana Point. We are proud of our gorgeous location and views, accommodating ladies and gentlemen, delicious dining selections, and excellent spa amenities. Please feel free to contact us directly if you would like to elaborate on any of the shortcomings you experienced—we would be happy to discuss any of your concerns further. Thank you for taking the time to share your review, and we would love to see you again soon.

Summary: I wish I could afford to stay at this hotel. Stopped by just to check it out. The views are absolutely breathtaking. The flowers in the lobby beautifully displayed. The grounds are meticulous.. I cannot attest to their rooms but I’m sure they are outstanding.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting the resort!  Our ladies and gentlemen take great pride in our beautiful surroundings and stunning views.  We do have discounted rates throughout the year and would welcome a chance to find an evening that you could come see us for an overnight visit.

Summary: I happened to be here for a business activity, but as a loyal frequent worldwide Marriott traveler, this is hands down one of the best.  If I could go back and have another wedding venue, this would have been my choice.  Stunning views, excellent service and a beautiful property.  Well done.
Manager Response: We love hearing that you enjoyed everything about your time in Dana Point. Thank you for sharing your experience and kind regards with us. Our gorgeous views and accommodating ladies and gentlemen make a California getaway perfect for business and leisure travelers alike. We would love for you to join us on your next escape.

Summary: Every now and then you find a hotel that is simply world-class.  It's not just the location, the views, the service, the food, the room.  It's everything combined that creates a simply exceptional experience. The Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel is one of those place. It starts even before you arrive with emails inquiring of your needs.  The personal service during the stay is outstanding.  Every staff member is trained to the the remarkable. It goes without saying that the location, the rooms, and everything else was simply "wow".  Pay the extra for a sea view room, it's worth it. I'll be back, for sure!
Manager Response: Your wonderful review means so much to us—thank you for taking a few moments to share your thoughts. We love hearing that our perfect location, breathtaking views, and personalized service made for an unforgettable experience. From our delicious dining selection to our classic and spacious guest rooms, we take pride in offering a complete luxury experience. We look forward to seeing you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Felt the love at The Ritz Carlton
Summary: My husband surprised me with an overnight at The Ritz Carlton in Laguna Niguel for our anniversary. He had tried to get us a room upgrade but was unable to -- when we checked in he asked again and because they were unable to accommodate they gave us a credit for champagne (unsolicited) and within minutes of arriving in our room we received a tray with chocolate covered strawberries and a note. The staff were great - we took a walk on the beach and then they set up our beach chairs and after a lazy afternoon in the sun drove us back to the property. The views are spectacular with lots of cozy places to take in the ocean - it felt like a much longer get away.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed an unforgettable day at our resort. Your personalized, luxury experience is of the utmost importance to our ladies and gentlemen, and we are so pleased that you had a wonderful stay as a result. Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts and we would love to welcome you back again very soon.

Summary: Stayed at the Ritz-Carlton Laguna with my wife for a weekend getaway.  By far this was the finest hotel with the best staff I’ve ever stayed at.   To begin, weeks before my trip they reached out by email asking about my trip and how to make it extra special.   We were taking this trip as a last getaway as my wife is expecting and I had mentioned that.  When we arrived to the room we had a very nice note of congratulations from the staff which was an incredibly nice touch.    From the moment we arrived the staff was there to serve and make our lives easy and boy did they deliver.    When we needed our car all I had to do was text and they had it ready for me.  Never once had to wait.    They also would ask when I needed something and showed up and took care of any request.   The
Manager Response: On behalf of the ladies and gentlemen at our resort, thank you for taking the time to share your wonderful review. Your kind thoughts regarding our gorgeous views, spacious guest rooms, and welcoming ladies and gentlemen are greatly appreciated, and we are so pleased these factors benefited your stay. We eagerly await the next time we get to see the two of you—and your new little one—in Dana Point.

Summary Heading: Kids that are “managers”, and seems quite mismanaged!
Summary: We have stayed at this ritz before, and have always been treated properly,  but this time was terrible.  Check in in late, my room was not available. The wall and door in the room was dirty.  Good luck getting the air conditioning to work, it kept going on and off all night, with a loud awakening noise when it turns on.  Phone did not work, and had to sit in the bathroom to have them come fix it.   Walls were really thin. After waking up all night because of the ac, ended up being woken up by neighbors because of the walls.  Then at 8:30 housekeeping knocks to try to clean the room.  if you look at the other poor reviews, every response the hotel responds with is just a generic copy and paste response. That’s how the employees have been. When speaking to the manager it seemed as
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts on your recent stay at our resort. Your feedback is very important to us and allows us to provide better luxury experiences going forward. That said, we thank you for drawing our attention to the air conditioning issues in your room—we will inform maintenance of this shortcoming. We regret to hear that the other amenity and service situations you described were less than satisfactory. We are particularly concerned with your encounters with our ladies and gentlemen during the evening and would value an opportunity to discuss this further. Please feel free to contact us directly in order to do so.

Summary Heading: Embarrassing to call themselves the Ritz
Summary: Came here post wedding as a "honeymoon" getaway. We are Marriott Platinum Elite members. My husband called in advance to see if he could upgrade our room given the special occasion. The response he got was "we can't upgrade you to a suite because it is extra however we can upgrade your garden view king bedroom to a double bedroom ocean view". He declined because it is our honeymoon...and 2 beds is not exactly desirable.   Upon arrival check-in took about 20ish minutes (it was 10pm, we were the only guests at the desk). Once everything was finalized the front desk said the only room they have available is an ocean view with double beds and that there are no other options except double bed rooms. They tried pushing this as an upgrade point however my husband explicitly told the
Manager Response: First and foremost, we want to congratulate you and your husband on your wedding! Thank you for spending this important occasion with us. We are sincerely disappointed to hear that the service and guest rooms you experienced did not meet your expectations. Regarding the confusion with your room and upgrade, we would sincerely value an opportunity to discuss this situation further with you. Please feel free to contact us directly to do so. We would be eager to offer you the quality service you deserve.

Summary Heading: Amazing views , nicest hotel, great service
Summary: Absolutely loved my stay here. The room was super clean and nice. Food was amazing. Especially the Mac and cheese!! The views are breath taking. Close to everything. Only complaint was the thin walls and the pool And jacuzzi area are okay. But I will definitely be back for many more. Totally worth the money :)! And the 180 blu is really nice for lunch to enjoy the views
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking a moment to share your feedback. From our beautiful rooms and delicious dining selection to our stunning views, we take pride in the wonderful amenities we offer our guests.  We look forward to providing you another Ritz-Carlton experience soon!

Summary Heading: A luxurious Resort  with Amazing View.
Summary: Stayed 3 nights at this hotel. Immaculate lobby and services. Rooms were good. Very comfortable beds and nice luxurious bathroom. Very Nice pool and restaurants on the property. Attended a wedding at the hotel. The experience was awesome.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to spend your Dana Point getaway at our resort. We are so pleased to hear that your luxury experience with us exceeded your expectations. We take pride in our beautiful property and views, as well as our wonderful dining and recreational amenities—and we love knowing that this made for an unforgettable stay. We would be excited to welcome you back to make more memories very soon.

Summary: Just returned from the Ritz in Laguna and it was the best weekend getaway I have ever had (and I have traveled all over the world). It's amazing for all of the reasons you can imagine (beautiful grounds, view, dining, rooms, etc.) but what is truly exceptional is the staff. My boyfriend brought our dog and I there for my birthday and they were so kind to Dug (our 103lb dog) who has cancer. They brought him treat goodie bags, Fiji water, and most importantly - showed him so much love. Sharee Spence working in the Dana pool Cafe area actually set up an entire area for Dug so he was comfortable in the sun. Sabine Altrichter - the F&B Manager made sure we had everything we needed at all times - she was an angel. Stephen in the bar area is literally the nicest guy to ever bring me a
Manager Response: We are elated that you chose to spend such an exciting occasion with us—Happy Birthday! Thank you for taking a few moments to share your wonderful thoughts. We love hearing that the personalized service of our ladies and gentlemen made your weekend getaway one to remember, and we will be eagerly awaiting your next escape to our beautiful resort and breathtaking views.

Summary: We stayed 4 days for vacations. The hotel and the view is beautiful, service impeccable but honestly I will have expected a better room. It was clean, but small and dark. Had a great experience at the Spa with Lola, she treat me like a princess.
Manager Response: We are so grateful you chose to spend your Dana Point getaway with us, and we love hearing that our beautiful property, breathtaking views, wonderful spa, and accommodating ladies and gentlemen made for an unforgettable time here. However, we regret to hear that your room fell short of your expectations. Please feel free to contact us directly to further discuss any of your concerns. We would love to welcome you back for another luxury experience very soon.

Summary: The entire staff was very personal and very polite. The rooms were nice, I personally stayed in a basic room by the smaller pool room 2007. Would definitely go back to another ritz hotel.  Plenary of accommodations at the location from a gym to spa and multiple levels of food options. As well as on-site beach access and wedding services.
Manager Response: We are honored that you enjoyed such a wonderful, luxury experience with us. On behalf of our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing to stay at our resort and for taking a moment to share your kind remarks. We are proud to provide so many accommodating amenities in this beautiful location and are very pleased that this made for an unforgettable time in Dana Point. We would love to welcome you back again very soon.

Summary Heading: Fun and restful short stay for all.
Summary: It was a short jaunt for us. Ritz properties are on the most beautiful location.  It is so pretty to have coffee on the patio looking out on the ocean with my puppy in the morning.  We had the pool view but we can easily enjoy the Ritz patio.  We checked in with the App but had a little bit of trouble with that.  Hotel explained that it needs little work. ( not a problem)  Service for us was very good, Ritz service.  We needed few extra water and amenities and it was delivered quickly.   I am a harsh critic of service so, well done.  It was a good stay for us.  Only one request or suggestion.  I would love to have dogs allowed on the beach, maybe ask the city for restricted time access.  It's such a shame that we couldn't take him on the beach, we stayed here for beach access.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to spend a brief getaway at our resort. We are grateful for your thoughtful review. From our beautiful location and views to the wonderful service of our ladies and gentlemen, we are pleased to know that you enjoyed a luxury experience. We regret to hear of the aspects of your stay that did not live up to your expectations and would be happy to address any of your concerns further—please feel free to contact us directly to do so. Again, thank you for staying with us and we would love to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: As with most Ritz Carlton's, Laguna Niguel is a must stay hotel.  Starting with driving into the hotel, the valets were on top of their game.  They immediately greeted us as we stopped our car in the main entryway.  Our bags were whisked away, before we entered the hotel.  The hotel main foyer and guest check-in area has been updated and are very nice.  We usually stay on the Club Level when we stay at the Ritz.  Great value with the food and service.  The managers of the floor were always making sure that every need was met.  The food and drinks were excellent.  These ladies work very hard to make sure our stay was most pleasant and enjoyable.  Our first night we stayed in a regular sized double queen room.  As a older hotel, the room was very small, much like most hotels built
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your luxury experience with us. We are very proud of our welcoming ladies and gentlemen, beautiful workout facility, and breathtaking views—and we love knowing that these features benefited your stay. We do regret to hear that there were aspects of your stay that you found less than satisfactory, and we invite you to contact us directly to discuss any of your concerns further. We look forward to seeing you again very soon.

Summary Heading: So far very disappointing- not what expected of a RITZ!
Summary: We came here for our BabyMoon. We are Marriott’s platinum Elite member. Have stayed in JW, Marriott, SPG hotels around the world. Have always heard about “The Ritz” service and saved this babymoon for a “Ritz” experience. So far it’s very very disappointing.  To start with, NO upgrades to our rooms which we usually get from any other properties we stayed in. The property is nice but the room is really avg. We went for a tapas and teas in the 180Blue Lounge where bird splatters poop all over our food and teas. Had to wait another 45 mins to get new food ... $7 for a cup of tea! In any other restaurants I bet they would give a huge discount in food for the inconvenience... but nope, for two tapas and two cups of tea you pay $65+ Tips and 2 hours of wait. I guess we are paying for
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest review. We were disappointed hearing that you had a few experiences that did not live up to your expectations and we are pleased that we were able to connect with you while you were still at the resort. We hope you enjoy the remainder of your babymoon.

Summary: My now husband and I eloped at the Ritz Carlton on March 1.  We reserved the Gazebo, but were fortunate enough to be able to have our ceremony set up on the lawn to the right of the gazebo facing the beach.  We stayed at the hotel for four nights in a "firepit room" facing the ocean which was on the side of the hotel by the gazebo.
