Everything was perfect, the staff were so gracious and accomodating the entire time we were there and we thought our room was very nice.  Yes, the bathroom is a bit old school, but it was clean and everything worked.  Our room did not look shabby at all and the hallways were bright and clean if a bit chilly because the doors to the outside were left open during the day.  I think we were lucky because the hotel was not overly crowded when we were
Manager Response: First and foremost, congratulations on your wedding! Thank you for choosing to spend such a special occasion with us. We are so pleased that our welcoming ladies and gentlemen, beautiful rooms, and breathtaking views made your big day, and the days to follow, so memorable. We would love to welcome you back for another luxury experience again soon.

Summary: When you enter the hotel, the lobby area is modern and quite lovely.  The art is interesting.   The restaurants, bar area and views are beautiful.    The rooms are standard and not very updated.  The bathrooms are old.  The rooms need more than a soft makeover.  You need to step over an old tub in order to take a shower.   In other word, there are no separate showers.  These rooms are similar to the beach resort at the Naples, FL RC where at least the rooms are brighter, but have the same old bathrooms (no separate shower).    The ocean view from the room is spectacular.     We did stay on the club level.  I thought that the service was average.  The club is a bit small.  The guests staying on the Club level were very nice and interesting.  We all watched the Super Bowl
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to spend your vacation with us and for taking a few moments to share your thoughts. Although we are pleased that you found our beautiful property and views and proximity to local attractions satisfactory, we are disappointed to hear that other aspects of your stay did not live up to your expectations. Please feel free to contact us directly, and we would be happy to discuss any of your concerns further; we would love to offer you the luxury experience you deserve. In the meantime, we will certainly pass this valuable feedback along to our respective departments.

Summary Heading: Now what I'd expect from a Ritz Carlton
Summary: This hotel looks nice from the outside, and the common areas are lovely, but the rooms are less than luxurious.  The walls are paper thin so be prepared to hear literally everything in the hall and your neighbors' rooms.  I'm here now and moved rooms because the conjoining door in my previous room had about a 2" gap to the floor so I could hear my neighbor's phone conversations (that went late into the night), her TV, etc.  Now I'm in a new room and my new neighbor's dog is barking incessantly.  When I went to the front desk to ask about moving, the employee was unapologetic and emotionlessly moved me to a different room.  Definitely not the level of service I expect here.  I'm sure there are hotels in this area that offer the same or better quality of stay with a less expensive
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking a few moments to share your review. Although we are pleased that you enjoyed our beautiful property, we regret to hear that other aspects of your stay did not live up your expectations. Your feedback is incredibly valuable to us, and we will certainly pass this along to our respective departments. We strive to provide each guest with a perfect, luxury experience, and we would love the opportunity to speak with you further about your concerns. We invite you to contact us directly to discuss how we can better serve you in the future.

Summary Heading: Poor attention to detail and rude staff
Summary: While the location is not to be beat, the staff here is inexperienced and very junior.  The majority are young “bros,” one of whom ended up essentially lecturing me when I needed help getting into my room after my key did not work.     Lots of platitudes but no professionalism at all.  “Can I send you a beverage/meal etc”.  No.  All I needed was professional help. Not rote lines repeated over and over: “I want you to feel taken care of”.    The room has seen better days. Why doesn’t management visit each room with a Mr Clean Magic Eraser?!   Tons of huge scuffs across all of the walls.   Seriously.  This is junior high. Go to the Montage or Pelican Hill for better rooms and service.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your recent visit to Dana Point. We are disappointed to hear that your encounters with our ladies and gentlemen did not live up to your expectations, as we strive to provide each and every guest with a perfect, luxury experience. Your feedback is incredibly valuable to us, and we would appreciate the opportunity to further discuss your concerns if you contact us directly.

Summary Heading: Fabulous Five Star Oasis - Almost Perfect
Summary: Beautiful Facility in a Beautiful Location.  The staff was gracious and accommodating.  Ocean Front room was perfectly situated and nicely furnished.   I booked the room using Marriott Points and upgraded to an Ocean Front room for an extra $150.  It was a good investment as the Ocean view really are lovely to see from your own perspectives.  The Pools, Jacuzzi, Gym, and Spa were all lovely and a needed de-stressor.  Absolutely no complaints - they were perfect.  I didn't spend much time in the gym but the view it afforded was spectacular.  Raya - For the price it was average at best.  A $32 lobster salad entree had at most 1/2 cup of lobster and the rest spinach leaves.  The margarita was good but at $17 it should be.  The green tea cake was good.  I ended up eating in the town
Manager Response: We love hearing your kind words—thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We are very pleased that you enjoyed the service of our welcoming ladies and gentlemen, our breathtaking views, and our relaxing amenities. We are disappointed to hear that part of your stay did not live up to your expectations and would be happy to further discuss this if you contact us directly. Thank you so much for choosing to spend a luxury experience with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Three nights in a motel room called the Ritz, at $900 a night
Summary: King, oceanfront room. Balcony out to the ocean below.   None of that can rectify the poorly maintained facilities.   The room is a 90’s time capsule. The poorly ameniated bathroom with its bath/shower unit and a shower head and tap reminiscent of Motel 6. Guess work where to find the right temperature because your interaction returns a water temperature response minutes later.   The dirty grouted marble tile is almost Reto enough to come back in style.   Out towards the bed, along well travelled bedroom carpet. A seat at the desk stained black with grime.   The nondescript wall coverings and lighting. The pastel wall paper.   The exorbitantly over priced swill served in plastic cups as we were part of a conference.   The SPA! With its broken sauna and steam controls. Good luck
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to leave us your valuable feedback. We regret to hear that you felt your experience did not meet your expectations. We encourage you to contact us directly if you wish to further discuss your experience, as we would appreciate the opportunity to restore your faith in resort. Thank you.

Summary Heading: An Open Letter to the GM from Elite Platinum Marriott Member
Summary: Dear Bruce;  It’s taken me a few days for Re-entry back to South Florida after my incredible experience celebrating my 50th birthday with my Father and family at your luxurious property; The Ritz- Carlton Laguna Niguel.   50 years is a big number to crunch. Especially when you still feel like you’re 20! But some other numbers have a way of keeping things in perspective. So that you don’t forget you’re really 50! For example I’m going on 20 consecutive years of earning platinum status which is a minimum of 75 nights a year with the properties. Of course now that I have achieved Starwood lifetime platinum status a few years back there’s no longer a requirement. But that also makes me feel like they are putting the old Bull out to pasture. LOL.  One may think, after spending
Manager Response: It was such a pleasure to speak with you and we thank you for such a wonderful review. As a valued guest, we were thrilled that we were able to make your recent celebration visit truly memorable and we look forward to having your visit again soon.

Summary: So it is a cool setting and the service is outstanding but do not expect an updated hotel. The rooms are small with little or no extra furnishings. Our ocean front room had one small club chair and a small desk.  The bathroom is small with little space for a shaving kit. Shower head and shower pressure were terrible. You get more water pressure at a camp ground. Very disappointing.  You will fall in love with the setting and views even though your balcony is a ledge, but the rooms are dated and the bathrooms need substantial work.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking a few moments to share your thoughts. Although we love that you enjoyed our picturesque setting and the outstanding service of our ladies and gentlemen, we regret to hear about the situations that did not live up to your expectations. Your feedback is incredibly important to us, and we would appreciate an opportunity to discuss any of your concerns further if you contact us directly. Thank you again for your visit and we would love to see you again soon.

Summary: It's a beautiful property, on the cliff of the beach. Dog friendly. The rooms were recently renovated however some of the finishes looked cheap. The bar at night got very crowded and the service was hit or miss. Valet parking was on point and called me by name. The snack bar on the main floor was perfect I wish all hotels had that, it is pricey but it was nice to pop by and get a coffee or something quick to eat. The gym over looks the beach cliffs too.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to spend a few days with us and for taking a moment to review your luxury experience. We are elated that you enjoyed our beautiful views, valet service, and accessible snack bar. However, we are truly apologetic for the encounters you described that did not live up to your expectations. We take pride in our ladies and gentlemen’s genuine service and would be happy to discuss any concerns you may have further. Please feel free to contact us directly at any time and we hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: The RC has the best site of all the hotels along this stretch of coast. They got there early - and I am afraid they have relied a bit too much on that lovely location and the RC name, and haven’t done quite as much modernizing or updating as one would wish or expect. To be fair, the service is exemplary.  The facilities however, are aging. The soft product and indoor common areas are fine, but the bones - plumbing, HVAC, pool areas and the like are sorely in need of overhaul. My sinks regurgitated, shower banged and HVAC roared. The original design of the pool area has always baffled me - why with this gorgeous site do they have the pools in claustrophobic interior cement courtyards?  Makes for a VERY loud and distinctly unrestful experience as there are almost always hoards of
Manager Response: From the ladies and gentlemen at our resort, thank you for choosing to spend time with us during your recent stay. Although we are very pleased that you enjoyed our wonderful service, we are disappointed to hear that you found other aspects of your stay less than satisfactory. Our promise to each and every guest is a perfect, luxury experience, and we would love the opportunity to further discuss your concerns if you contact us directly. Again, thank you for staying with us and we would love to welcome you back very soon.

Summary: I don't know how I can top what other reviewers have written about the incredible service, beauty and luxury of this property,   It is without a doubt perfect, to illustrate I must share what just happened. My husband and I were enjoying a lovely poolside lunch when we a member of the management staff stopped to ask how everything was going. Of course we replied with so many positive (all true) superlatives that you would think we had never been on a vacation before. As we were raving about our experience a young man came up to out table with a complimentary tray of apples. We had just finished lunch so declined and my husband jokingly said if they had taffy to go with the apples. With an earnest face Genevieve Serhal, the manager said she could provide taffy if that was
Manager Response: On behalf of the ladies and gentlemen at our resort, thank you so much for choosing to stay with us. We appreciate the time you have taken to share your thoughts. We are proud to provide every guest a personal luxury experience, and we are so pleased you have enjoyed this accommodation. We sincerely hope that the remainder of your stay has been equally as wonderful and would love to welcome you back again very soon.

Summary: We had our wedding at the Ritz-Carlton in Laguna in November!  The weather was perfect and the hotel grounds were beautiful.  We stayed in a beautiful suite - and we extended our trip an extra 2 nights in this room (4 nights total).  The room was situated in an outstanding location for sunset and was on the main level for easy access to our wedding ceremony and for our private brunch on the lawn the next morning.  One major problem we had was the hotel checked a family with noisy kids who were kicking the walls adjoined to the master bedroom next door from 3 AM onward - you'd think for a bride and groom that the hotel would make a note in the computer to place a family away from a wedding suite?  I'm so happy we chose the month of November because when we visited for a weekend
Manager Response: We are honored that you chose to spend your wedding with us—congratulations! Thank you for taking a few moments to share your thoughts on your experience. We are elated that our beautiful grounds and views enhanced your stay. However, we sincerely apologize for the unfortunate encounters you’ve described as our promise is to provide every guest a perfect stay. Thank you again for staying and celebrating with us and we would love to see you again in the future.

Summary: We spent four nights here in February.  The room had a nice balcony and was spacious, with a spacious bathroom, too.  The prices were ridiculous but we expected that.  Everyone at the hotel is friendly and helpful.  I especially liked the daily yoga class at 9 am., taught by Cynthia.  She did a great job and was very supportive and welcoming. Overall, a lovely and pricey stay.  The view of the ocean from the cliff is gorgeous.
Manager Response: We are so pleased that you enjoyed four wonderful nights with us this February. Thank you for sharing your thoughts on your stay. We pride ourselves on promising each and every guest a perfect, luxury experience, and we are elated that the beautiful views, spacious rooms, and our helpful ladies and gentlemen made that possible for you. We would love to welcome you back to our resort again soon.

Summary: Enjoyed every aspect on the property and its staff. We will be back. Restaurants are good. Pools lovely. Beach spectacular. Staff was very accommodating. Good for business meetings. Hotel is on a cliff overlooking the ocean. Views are amazing.  Ken
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your recent visit to Dana Point. We truly appreciate that you have taken the time to share your kind thoughts with us. From our breathtaking views to our beautiful rooms, excellent restaurants, and numerous amenities, we are so pleased that you had a true luxury experience. We would love to welcome you back to our resort again very soon.

Summary Heading: The Club Level is a MUST
Summary: Dear Readers  Xtrapicky is Xtra Happy!  Having just returned from a delightful stay at the Ritz Carlton in Laguna Niguel. I have to say the resort and the location is breathtaking. Panoramic ocean views, gorgeous beach and surf. My guest and I visited the spa and had wonderful treatments there as well. Definitely recommend any scrub treatment with the Vichy shower. We also ate at the restaurant in the hotel Raya -  The food was amazing and the drinks were even better. I can’t remember the name of our waiter but he was absolutely fantastic. Five star service. But I have to say the crème de la crème, Cherry on our cake was the fact that we stayed on the Club level. The Club level service is par none. I had my doubts given that I am indeed picky as you know,  but the club there
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to spend a relaxing getaway at our resort. We appreciate that you took the time to review your stay and are elated that our breathtaking views and genuine service made for a wonderful experience. Our Ladies and Gentlemen are committed to providing each and every guest a perfect escape. We are also happy to hear that you enjoyed a fine dining experience in RAYA. We cannot wait to see you when you return again soon.

Summary: This rig-Carlton is in a world of its own. It's a classy hotel, the service is fantastic, the food is top quality, no matter which one you choose. Especially nice is the Sunday brunch. During holidays,, especially at Christmas, there a lot of theme related activities. It's a real treat to experience this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking a few moments to share your kind thoughts. We take pride in our excellent service, meals, and amenities, and we are so pleased that these made for a perfect, luxury experience. We would love to welcome you back again soon to enjoy more of our year-round activities.

Summary Heading: Extremely enjoyable stay / Topnotch service / Awesome views
Summary: Before our visit to the Ritz Carlton Dana Point we had been reading the reviews, which were fairly mixed from poor to great.  Hmmm.  For us, whose expectations are not over-the-top, we had a really enjoyable stay.  From the moment we pulled up to the valet to our checkout, the service was topnotch ... we were addressed by name, staff smiled and gave pleasant greetings in the hallways, housekeeping did a good job and was unobtrusive (they did miss turn down service one evening ... no big deal though), and the event staff was terrific.  There are two pools ... one smaller and one quite large.  The pool service was only open at the larger pool and offered drinks and sandwiches.  The fitness center is well equipped and they provide bottled water and towels ... plus the view from the
Manager Response: On behalf of the Ladies and Gentlemen at our resort, thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to leave such kind remarks. We are elated that you enjoyed a luxury experience as a result of our genuine service, swimming pools and fitness center, beautiful views, and efficient checkout process. We apologize for any inconveniences you encountered during your stay and have notified our respective departments of your valuable feedback. Again, thank you for visiting us, and we would love to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: For Valentine's Day, I wanted to do something special for my wife, so I decided to take her to the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel, about 20 minutes from home. I could not find last minute babysitting, so our 1 year old came along for the fun (husband fail). From the moment we drove up, the staff was extremely friendly and accommodating. I have a vision of what a Ritz Carlton is- lots of gold, crystal, etc. This property is more modern luxury than I expected and also has a level of beach informality. As you can imagine, their restaurants were jammed given the special occasion, but they made an extra effort to get us in after initially being told it would be over an hour (and well into the witching hour for our daughter). When our daughter got fussy, a hostess walked up with a little
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to spend your Valentine’s Day with us and for taking the time to share your thoughts. Our promise to each and every guest is a perfect, luxury experience, and we are so pleased that you had a wonderful stay as a result. Our beautiful views, helpful ladies and gentlemen, and delicious dining options are the perfect combination for a spectacular escape. Again, thank you for visiting us and we look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: Gorgeous views and spacious conference rooms
Summary: I came to this hotel for a conference and was not disappointed. Service is great, staff is friendly, and the views are breathtaking. The gas fireplaces outside the first floor rooms make for a fun s'mores experience and the pools are beautiful and have a private feel even though they are in the middle of a large hotel.
Manager Response: On behalf of the ladies and gentlemen at our resort, thank you for choosing to stay with us. We appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughts on your recent stay and are so pleased you had a wonderful experience. From luxury service to the details of our beautiful views and pools, our guests’ satisfaction is our greatest priority. Thank you again for visiting us, and we would love to welcome you back in the near future.

Summary: Don’t recommend for family travel. No question that the cliffside perspective of this hotel is spectacular...but the hotel doesn’t provide the value for the steep price tag. This would be a nice hotel for a corporate event, but options for families are limited starting with the dining. The one more casual restaurant, 380 blue, was packed all weekend and was first come first serve which made casual dining choices limited to the snack bar. I was surprised that the pool bar and restaurant were not open while we were there, especially given that it was a busy holiday weekend.   The rooms were fine, but to me, not worth the steep price. We upgraded to an ocean front room only to have the lawn below occupied by a corporate event, a yoga class and a wedding which made it awkward to sit
Manager Response: On behalf of the ladies and gentlemen at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel, thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts with us. We are thrilled that you enjoyed the beautiful views our resort has to offer. However, we sincerely apologize for the situations you have addressed. We will certainly notify our respective departments of your valuable feedback, and we invite you to contact us directly to discuss any further concerns you may have. We look forward to hearing from you and hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the future for an all-around improved experience.

Summary Heading: Ritz in Asia put this one to absolute shame
Summary: To start off, I’ve been to a few Ritz in Asia and I have to say they might have set the bar a bit too high. This Laguna Beach Ritz has killer views, but overall it is underwhelming at best.   Service: Our bellman was awesome but it stopped there. First of all, the gentleman that checked us in didn’t address me by my last name twice during check in. Not that I’m mad about that, but I know it’s the standard Marriott practice because one of my best friends interned there for a summer. I just think it’s kind of funny. In addition, I was pretty shocked that they don’t have any hair ties available. Even some of the lower tier hotels have hair ties in the restroom. Also, housekeeping never came after we requested combs. To make things a bit worse, valet didn’t pull up our car to the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your thoughts on your time with us. Although we are very pleased that you enjoyed the beautiful views at our resort and a delicious meal from enoSTEAK, we apologize for the other circumstances you have described that did not live up to your expectations. Our promise is to provide a perfect experience for each of our guests, and we would be happy to further discuss your concerns in order to offer you the luxury experience you deserve in the future. We invite you to contact us directly and would love to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: i have stayed at many lovely hotels, but never have I wanted to go back to a place JUST for the hotel. The wonderful experience started on check in with a beautiful hotel, and lovely staff, from valet, to front desk, to porter.   Heres the difference between a good hotel and a great hotel. Good: Is there any thing else I can get you? Great: You will probably enjoy the beach later, I've put some extra water on the desk for you.  What the staff imparted was a genuine desire to help people, and make their guests comfortable, and give a worry free experience. The room we had faced the ocean, with its own fire pit. Every day, we would watch the surfers, just below us. every evening we put our feet up, toes warmed by the fire, and watched the sun set. the room was graciously
Manager Response: From all of the ladies and gentlemen at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel, thank you for the kind words. We are elated that you encountered such extraordinary service and enjoyed the beautiful surroundings and amenities at our property here in Dana Point. From yoga classes to our perfect location on the beach’s edge, our promise to each and every guest is a thoughtful, luxury experience. We thank you for your valuable feedback and would love to welcome you back to our resort in the near future.

Summary: I was looking for a retreat not far from L.A. Someone recommended Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel but I was a little apprehensive as they'd also recommended a resort I had a bad experience with and ended up sick twice. So, I was concerned that I may experience disappointment in the investment. BOY was I ever pleasantly turned around and VERY quickly. So, I had read reviews on this resort before going. Honesty this place has it DOWN to a perfect A-lister "T". I was there alone and had a very specific experience in mind. I got that and MORE. Not only did the Ritz make me feel as though I had been romanced by some invisible Prince Charming following me at every turn and corner but they also exceeded service, quality and integrity in the handling of their guest. Me. EVERY single staff

My husband had an odd request and the concierge didn't even flinch.  She was a true professional!!! The hotel is absolutely gorgeous.  The views, the amenities, the location, the food, everything was first rate.   We had a beautiful room with an ocean view.  I would go back in a second.  i didn't want to leave.  I wished I could live there.

Unfortunately, I had a pool view from my room which was still great but next time I'll 100% book the ocean view room as the views are breathtaking! Great food on property and you can sometimes see whales in the ocean from the hills! Not too much around in the area but If you want to impress your significant other this is the place!

Summary: I stayed at this property for a recent business trip. Rooms are nicely appointed. Bathrooms are a little older in style but are in good condition. The view from the restaurant is lovely. Spa is worth visiting. Sunsets over the ocean are breathtaking.

Summary: I stayed at the location for a mini vacation with my family.  Pros: 1.  Great location.  It's located on a bluff overlooking the ocean.  The hotel offers great sunset views.  It's a 5 minute downhill walk to the beach, or you can also ride a complimentary cart offered by the hotel.  The hotel is also located at the edge of a residential area so it was quiet.  There are many local restaurants and shops nearby, but a car is needed. 2.  Great staff.  Valet service was always quick.  Check in and check out were no hassle as well. 3.  Hotel grounds.  The staff does a good job of keeping the grounds immaculate. Rooms are clean, but we had a small issue with ants. 4.  Swimming pool.  The hotel has 2 swimming pools, and both were heated.  Even at 8am (in February), it was a pleasant

The minute you arrive and greeted by the extremely attentive valet staff you are escorted into the lobby you exhale all stresses you may have come with in extra baggage.  I highly recommend spending the extra dollar to experience the Club Level, and if you have an extra dollar... do the ocean view room. The views are Simply Sublime! The room exudes effervescence with a incredible design aesthetic that compliments your views outside. I did tell the front desk about the musty smells in the room and furniture and they were very accommodating.  But, it wasnt my favorite hotel in that area nor close to my favorite ritz. There were spider webs in my lights and they stayed there for four days until I reported it to the front desk at which time no apology was given. I take care of my room the same way that I take care of my house. Things are picked up, glasses put in one area, items thrown in the trash. Then to top off my stay, they threw away the lids to my conditioners and left no conditioner for my husband. Don’t order from the appetizer menu as I think you will be disappointed. We had limited cell phone service and had to go outside to talk or else we would loose service. Just not what I expected from a Ritz Carlton.

I can't say enough about how gorgeous the views are from this hotel!  Enjoy!

Fitness center was very well arranged with lots of equipment, access and views to the beach spectacular and beautiful. We look forward to returning.

We were greeted at the entrance by the first of many eager, competent staff. Check in was a breeze, and the promenade to our room passed several of the hotel venues, with their grand views overlooking the Pacific.  Our room was spacious and spotless, with the perfect balcony overlooking Dana Point: a perfect spot for a leisurely breakfast, with the local surfers as the floor show. We also spent some time walking the beach and tide pool at the base of the bluff. Its was an invigorating walk back to the hotel. This facility was ideally suited to our wishes. We cannot wait to come back.

The bathrooms have tub/shower combination which is typical of a business class or lower level property..  Lastly, the ventilation is very poor with the bathrooms easily fogged up by a hot shower-- and poor dissipation of bathroom odors..   It is a nice enough place for a coastal visit, but it is not a true luxury property like the more current Ritz Carlton hotels-- and the age of the property shows

The valet was a catastrophe most of the day - trying to get in / out added 10-15 minutes unless you were coming in very early or late. The market restaurant was often overrun in the morning. Summary Heading: save money and go to Montage
Summary: We arrived early and had to wait for our room to be ready. In that 2 hour time frame, I had noticed valet had left our bags on the luggage cart outside by valet desk. I watched them for 25 minutes and no-one monitored my bags. I was shocked to see they did not store in a locked room until our room was ready. I mentioned to front desk and they said they would handle it but by the time they went to handle it, my room was ready. So needless, to say I was not happy our personal belongings were just sitting outside where anyone could have walked off with our stuff.   Our garden fire pit room was dingy, dark and very dusty.  Extremely overpriced. The bathroom toilet area smelled liked sewage. The tub had mold   For the price of the room, I can stay at The Peninsula Hotel in a STANDARD
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share your review. It is concerning to hear that your experience was less than perfect. It is our priority to provide our guests with exceptional service in all areas, and we sincerely apologize for any shortcomings you noticed. We encourage you to contact our office directly if you wish to further discuss your experience, as we would appreciate the opportunity to restore your faith in our team, brand and resort.  Thank you.

Summary Heading: Perfect venue for celebrating a special event
Summary: A beautiful property in an exquisite location. The service was exceptional and the rooms feel like you are in a private home not a hotel. We will be returning without a doubt to spend more nights at this resort.
Manager Response: On behalf of our dedicated ladies and gentlemen, thank you for taking the time to leave us such a wonderful review. We are thrilled to discover that you were impressed with our stunning location and impeccable service during your time with us. It brings us great joy to know that you plan on returning, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another exceptional experience.

Summary: I got service, treated right, I had one of the best rooms in the whole place, it was so nice to get away....... Food was spot on the best sculpts dish ...and the weather was just perfect for shorts.......sleeping in the most ultra comfortable bed I've ever sleep in.........and till almost noon...it all made my birthday weekend just nice.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing to spend such a special celebration at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It was an honor to welcome you for a bit of much deserved rest and relaxation, complete with exquisite cuisine, luxurious accommodations and impeccable service. We appreciate your kind words and look forward to welcoming you back for another unforgettable getaway in the new year.

Summary Heading: Too many people with pets were present at this property. The management should account for a maximum pet allowance
Summary: The carpets are too old, rooms need update to live up to the brand name! This was so sub par to Ritz Dove Mountain. The staff were overwhelmed and not so friendly. The facility was freezing! When we asked the front desk about the reason they said that the heater was broken. The rooms were also too small, the coffee machine was basic and not the espresso machine seen at the other Ritz. The location is perfect and loved the fireplaces even though we were surrounded by multiple slobbery humongous dogs at all time. We checked out before 9:30 as we didn’t feel staying longer, and the $40 resort fee seemed way much considering the amenities weren’t more than 4 star hotels
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review. We are disappointed to hear that your experience did not live up to your expectations. We encourage you to contact us directly to share your feedback and we hope to have you visit again so that we can restore your faith in our resort.

Summary: The ritz is always a good experience well appointed and customer centric. A predictable experience. I value their attention to service and recommend this facility to those staying in Southern California
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your excellent review. How delightful it is to hear that you appreciated our exceptional ladies and gentlemen, and their impeccable services. We thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna and look forward to welcoming you back soon for another memorable luxury experience.

Summary: One of the most elegant hotels I've been to, undeniably beautiful location.  Super friendly staff at all levels.  Very comfortable bed and impeccably clean.  Banquet food was fabulous, many options.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for your lovely review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. How wonderful it is to hear that you enjoyed a flawless luxury experience in our beautiful resort, particularly thanks to our exceptional service and comfortable accommodations. We are grateful for your kind words and look forward to seeing you again in the new year.

Summary: This was our first visit to RC Laguna Niguel and we enjoyed the views at the hotel.  Watching the surfers every morning then watching the sunsets every afternoon was probably the highlight of our trip.  Service was a little underwhelming for an RC property - a little slow at times in the restaurants and difficult to get someone on the phone when calling for front office and room service.  Rooms are nice and spacious.  Bathrooms have a double vanity with a tub (not sure all rooms have tubs but they don’t have both).  If you can, upgrade to an Ocean View or an Ocean Front room.  View will be stunning and you will never want to leave your balcony!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are delighted to hear that you were impressed with our fantastic Pacific views and luxurious guest rooms. We do apologize for any lapses in service you may have encountered, and hope this did not detract from your overall positive experience. Should you find yourself in Dana Point in the future, it would be our pleasure to welcome you back for an all-around five-star experience.

Summary: Absolutely loved the experience staying at the Ritz-Carlton! Breathtaking views and impeccable service at the hotel. Every meal was incredible and the conference facilities were extremely well set up. Would highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: We appreciate your kind words and lovely review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are elated to hear that our phenomenal views, exquisite cuisine and state-of-the-art amenities exceeded your expectations. Whether for business or leisure, we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon for another memorable experience.

Summary Heading: Huge beautiful property, a classic Ritz
Summary: We stayed three nights in a pool facing room on the top floor. This is an enormous property which seems to specialize in weddings and conferences. It is gorgeously decorated. Our room was clean and well appointed. Room service and pool-side service were excellent. Our only disappointment was the pool itself, which is surrounded by rooms, unfortunate when the hotel's location on the beach bluff is so lovely. We looked had decided between the Ritz and the nearby Montage, and since we wanted plenty of pool time, the ocean-facing Montage pool probably would have been a better choice for us.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our exceptional ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. How wonderful it is to hear that you enjoyed our beautiful public spaces, stunning Pacific views and impeccable service. We are sorry to hear about any minor shortcomings you may have encountered at the pool, and hope this did not take away from your otherwise excellent experience. The next time you are looking to get away, it would be our pleasure to welcome you back for an all-around five-star luxury experience.

Summary: RE: Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel Subject: Anniversary Dinner  Arrived for sunset anniversary dinner and beautiful Christmas lighting of palm trees literally directed our entry to an outdoor Christmas tree over 50 feet tall amazingly decorated. Valet directed us to the dining room Tuesday evening with no reservations. Alison our hostess  seated us and Elizabeth provided a little history of recent events. Ordered New York Steak and Scallops. Daniel our waiter was very personable and made our evening memorable with a chocolate mouse and lit candle. Toured the grounds to walk off dinner and discovered the ginger bread house constructed "by hand" in the main entry way lobby and a couple preparing for their wedding. Great 31 st anniversary dinner and recommend this to do again.
Manager Response: First and foremost, congratulations on your anniversary! Thank you for joining us to celebrate such a joyous occasion, and for sharing your thoughtful review. It is heartwarming to hear that you appreciated the exceptional services of our dedicated ladies and gentlemen, and we will be sure to pass along your kind praises to them. Whether for another special dinner or just to get away, we look forward to welcoming you back to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary: Not a lot to mention about this Ritz property as everything was flawless from the rooms to the service. The hotel is absolutely fantastic and it has fantastic views as it sits on a cliff in Laguna Niguel. I can’t wait to go back!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your delightful review with us. We are thrilled to discover that you enjoyed nothing but perfection during your time at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. Should you find yourself in Dana Point in the future, we would be honored to welcome you back for another unforgettable experience, complete with breathtaking views and impeccable service.

Summary: Excellent property and service. The folks made me feel like a million bucks. The complimentary upgrade to the club level as a Marriott platinum elite member was excellent. The ladies at the club were very kind and helpful, and the food and drinks were excellent. I spend at least 250 nights a year at hotels across the world and can confidently say this is the best hotel I have ever stayed. It rivals some of the luxury European hotels I have stayed in. I stayed on rewards points during my stay, but the nightly rate, although pricey, is well worth the value provided. Thank you!!!
Manager Response: We are grateful for your kind words and lovely review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. What an honor it is to be considered one of your favorite resorts! It truly was a pleasure to have you as our guest and to provide you with a five-star luxury experience from start to finish. Should your travels bring you back to Dana Point, we would love to welcome you back for another extraordinary experience.

Summary: This is a special resort with an outstanding view and places to enjoy it from abound. If you are lucky (or pay) you will have an ocean view room. Two of my favorites on any floor are rooms ending in xx25 and xx26. Others face I towards the pool or courtyards Rooms are all well equipped and water offered in plentiful supply with a nice turn down service offering chocolates. The reception desk has coffee at night till 6am.  The gym is good and has great views over the ocean to inspire you (personally I’d take the opportunity to walk the beach and ocean walk Service is attentive and welcoming and on property choices are good but pricey
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your valuable feedback with us. We are certainly proud of our impeccable service, luxurious amenities and breathtaking views, so it brings us great joy to hear that you appreciated these aspects of your time with us. On behalf of all our exceptional ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to welcoming you back to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary: My wife and I decided to do our 30 year anniversary at the Ritz-Carlton in Laguna Niguel, CA and the experience from start to finish was an awesome experience.  From arriving to departing the staff was amazing, helpful and extremely pleasant.  The dinning we did their was excellent as was the service.  The hotel offered may activities and the beach/ocean view is second to none.  We left the Ritz with a very memorable experience.

Summary: This is the perfect place fo r hosting a meeting event. No distractions, peaceful, and all the amenities that anyone could need.  Makes it easy to network, have access to resources, and provides a setting that is less stressful.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to leave us your wonderful review. It was an honor to have you and your colleagues as our guests, and we thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the future for another memorable experience.

Summary: Driving in to the Ritz Carlton at Laguna Niguel you realize that this is going to be very special. The hotel architecture, the warm welcome from the staff, the terrific views and the clean, opulent entrance and fist class rooms and facilities. This is all a great hotel should be! Book a room on the club floor for that extra service that makes a stay so special. We cannot wait to return - this is one of the best hotels - service, location, rooms and the restaurants, pools, fitness spa - it is all here!
Manager Response: We are grateful for your kind words and recommendation of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. How wonderful it is that you enjoyed an impeccable experience from start to finish, complete with breathtaking scenery, luxurious amenities and exceptional service. Summary: Very comfortable and close to all business locations for the 3 days. Restaurants and Bar were excellent. Staff are very friendly and there to help! Room was very comfortable with a nice view of the Ocean.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments. We are pleased that you enjoyed your visit. We hope to welcome you back again soon to our oceanfront resort.

Summary: My wife and I have stayed at this property 6 times and it is fantastic!  It has the best sunset views, great access to the beach and the Club Level staff is incredible!  We love this property and make it our go-to getaway spot to decompress and reconnect.

Summary: We spent a couple of days for my wife’s birthday. They provide impeccable  service and have an impressive attitude! Always the best! Kudos to Anthony at the front desk on check in who made our trip memorable.

Summary Heading: I want the Rifz to be the best it can be
Summary: I was told that our room was upgraded. I was disappointed by the actual room but not the grounds. I wanted to love the Ritz but our “upgraded” room was barebones and felt like a Motel 6 with a better bed and bathroom. The furnace was so loud we didn’t turn it on. The movie rental, at $19.99, was unwatchable and kept skipping. Restarting it was tricky. The fire pit is a good idea, but the switch on the fire pit hung by a tread and didn’t work until we called maintenance. Our patio was open to the room next to us and was a security concern as the occupants of the adjacent room could simply walk onto our patio. I went for a walk after dark and started to slip over the edge at the corner of the building on the ocean side, as it’s unlit (very dark), muddy, slippery and at most two
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your review. We know that our guests arrive with a certain expectation, and we are disappointed if your room did not meet those expectations. Please do not hesitate to contact us directly if you would like to discuss your comments further. We look forward to speaking with you and welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: The location will trump everything else, so I will try to stay there again. As you get access to the beach, with a good fitness center with a great view. The path robe, the towels, the pens, double sinks are of great quality, but I was surprised that some of other amenities are mediocre, such as TV, TV programming, in-room coffee machine and iron were as bad as other non-luxury $60/night hotels..

Summary: I've stayed in about 6 Ritz Carlton in the US and this by far is my favorite. They have the best of everything. The resort is so clean and well maintained, the service was amazing, from the front desk to the guy that drove us to the beach, everything was great. We also had a chance to try their restaurants and they were all delicious. The terrace also serve really good drinks and I remember them playing a movie when we were there. We had a great experience and I can't wait to go back again next month! Hoping to have the same experience again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the time you have taken to leave us such a wonderful review. Summary: Stayed at the property 5 times in the last 5 years and always had a great experience.  Casual elegance, not stuffy.  Top-shelf property with a top-shelf staff...friendly and accommodating. Excellent food and service.  Oh, and it has a beach.
Manager Response: On behalf of our dedicated ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It is always a pleasure to have you as our guest and to provide you with an impeccable luxury experience in all areas. Summary: From the moment you pull up to the porte cochere valet - to the time you check out and nostalgically wave farewell, one is treated to THE  Ritz Carlton luxury experience they are known for and consistently equal to very few in the world.  We attended an annual holiday event and stayed the weekend ... and year after year, we encounter the same luxurious service with perfect execution from beginning to end.   For those looking for a great pool/spa and not planning to enjoy this world re-known beach location,  the pool, spa and disabled guest equipment are in dire need of refreshing.  We'd love a beautiful spa like the Montage, but even without it, we do love the Ritz because all in all, the service is simply outstanding.

It is always an honor to welcome you to our beautiful resort in Dana Point, and we are delighted to hear that you have found every experience with us to be an impeccable one. We eagerly await your next visit, and hope it comes soon.

Summary: The Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel is a beautiful resort on the beach in Dana Point, California.  The rooms have a great view of either the beach or their stunning pool, heated year round.  There are plenty of options to eat on the property or in the charming town of Dana Point.  The rest of Orange County, California is easily accessible but far enough removed to make this feel like a vacation.  The Spa is gorgeous and the views of the beach, or, if you're like me, the beach itself, are the crown jewel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us your thoughtful review. Summary: Ritz Carlton remains number one in our book for a place to stay in southern California.  From food, to the view of the ocean, the hotel holiday decor was such fun!  The rooms are gracious and clean and inviting.  Great beds so we slept very well.  The banquet facility is wonderful and well set up.  The bar is such fun - wish it were larger!

Summary: There is sufficient reason to call this hotel the "Flagship" of the chain.  I have stayed at the Ritz on Maui, the Rita in Herzaliyah, Israel, and the Palm Springs, Rita.  This Hotel was significantly better than the others.

Summary: The beach here is so beautiful and the hotel will take you to it, set you up on the beach with an umbrella and chairs, and then bring you back up the hill. Service was INCREDIBLE. Food and bars were spectacular. Rooms were totally luxurious. I loved this place. Very romantic.

Summary: I can't say enough about the service and the hotel itself. From the moment we walked in the door we we're treated to everything we could have asked for. We never left the hotel during our stay and every drink and meal was spectacular.

Summary: The Ritz in Laguna Niguel is the perfect place to relax and enjoy the beach, fresh air,  and amazing team. We visit whenever we can and are never, ever disappointed. The world class team lives up to legendary Ritz service and are genuinely glad to have you as their guest!

Summary Heading: It was my first stay at Ritz-Carlton
Summary: The staff went out of their way to provide everything I need. My daughter needed a brush they got one. The Thanksgiving buffet was excellent, in the amount and types of food and the staff was friendly and helpful. I can't wait to go again!

Summary: Recently spent Thanksgiving weekend at the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel with my wife's family and we had a fantastic time.  We were celebrating 2 birthdays for both of her parents, and the staff at the club level went above and beyond to make the experience extra special for us.  I can't say enough to compliment them on their hospitality and making us feel welcomed and at ease.  The location of this property is spectacular also overlooking Salt Creek Beach.  We enjoyed walking the beach most days during our stay, or just enjoying the views from the property above.

Summary: Pros- Fantastic customer service. Beautiful location, Lots of Activities Cons- Rooms are very dated and have maintenance issues. Pool Areas are shabby and also need updating. I would suggest this resort for a first time getaway to the California coast. This Ritz is a bit less not he super luxury scale that I have experienced at past Ritz Carlton's but still not a bad spot.

Summary: Flawless stay!!!! Will be back next year for sure! One of the best steaks I ever had (ENO Steak Restaurant). The room was perfectly-appointed, with a view of the ocean. Got an early check-in, birthday amenity and a late check-out.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review and for choosing to spend this special occasion with us at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It brings us great joy to hear that you plan on returning, and we look forward to that day.

Summary Heading: Amazing Views, Hotel a let down
Summary: I haven't written a review of a hotel for a a long time, however i felt so let down by the hotel i feel i have to this year.    We stayed in sept 2017 ...   Historically your hotel has been one of our favourite places in the world and for the last 5 or 6 years we have stayed here every September/October for sometimes 7 nights sometimes 14 nights. 2 years ago we got engaged at the resort and the staff were excellent and last year we finished our honeymoon. If i was writing this review any other year apart from 2016 or 2017 it would have been 5*s.   This trip we spent part of our trip at your property for 5 nights on the 1st September, and whilst I appreciate that it was a holiday therefore you were busier than usual, I would just like to comment on what a poor experience we felt
Manager Response: We are grateful for the time you have taken to share your honest review. We thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel; however, we are concerned to hear such uncharacteristic feedback. We take pride in our impeccable service and attention to detail, and we regret that your expectations were not met. We encourage you to contact our office directly if you wish to further discuss your experience. We look forward to hearing from you, as we would appreciate the opportunity to restore your faith in our team and resort. Thank you.

Summary: This was my first time staying at a Ritz-Carlton and I was very impressed all around. I was on-site managing an event so I worked closely with many of the hotel staff. They all were wonderful to work with and incredibly helpful. They are a "yes" team and always work with requests.  The hotel's location is beautiful! It sits on a cliff that overlooks the ocean, specifically a hot-spot for surfers. The restaurants are delicious and in-room dining was equally as  good and the service was very prompt. Great experience!
Manager Response: On behalf of our dedicated ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. Summary: The antithesis of the busy LA scene, the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel is great place for business meetings or a getaway.  If you want great food, great views and some peace & quiet, this is the place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review and for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for your escape. It was a pleasure to read that you enjoyed our dining experiences and amazing views. We look forward to you coming back soon for another getaway.

Summary: I was thinking about getting married here and stayed for a few days. The hotel and location are absolutely beautiful. It's pricey, but fair for the experience (we paid over 700/night). I am not a big meat eater and really appreciated the yummy vegetarian food they had - starting off the day with my favorite green smoothie. It had spinach, pineapple and some other things and it was so good. Salt Creek beach is great and I loved my morning walks along the multi, multi million dollar homes and the locals with their dogs and the staff at the hotel itself were wonderful. Love this area of OC!
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely review and for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It was an honor to welcome you to our resort in Dana Point, and we are delighted to hear that you enjoyed a relaxing five-star experience. It is also wonderful to know you appreciated so many aspects of your time here, from our divine dining options to our incredible Pacific views. The next time you are planning a getaway, it would be our pleasure to provide you with another impeccable luxury experience.

Summary: The location is incredible, a beautiful property. Service was excellent but expect a laid back feel , especially for a Ritz. The food quality was outstanding however. The amenities were less than you experience at most Ritz properties but adequate nonetheless.
Manager Response: On behalf of our dedicated ladies and gentlemen, thank you for leaving us such a thoughtful review. We are elated to hear that you enjoyed a relaxed yet refined experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We truly appreciate your valuable feedback and hope to welcome you back in the future for an overall five-star getaway.

Summary: Having an ocean side room with a fire pit is the way to go at this Ritz Carlton property. Laguna Niguel is the perfect location with its stunning Pacific Coast views. Watching the surfers ride the waves daily was a pleasure and quite frankly made we a bit jealous as I was here for work and no play. A complimentary starter s'mores kit was a welcome site and paired nicely with the red wine and sunset views.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share your wonderful review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. Although you were here on business, we are pleased to discover that you were able to enjoy our breathtaking ocean views and luxurious amenities. Summary Heading: Views are amazing, Hotel itself just o.k.
Summary: This is a very large property on a stunning coastline. Splurge on a room with an ocean view or don’t even bother. I️ came here for a wedding and they booked two weddings on the same day and didn’t tell the couple until last minute and it made it feel less special. We got “upgraded” to a room with a bbq pit but it was kind of dingy and soooo far away overlooking a giant conference room would have probably preferred original room. This hotel struck me as being amazing in the 90s or whenever they opened it but now is a little shabby in certain areas. It’s a nice hotel and Ritz staff is always super sweet and attentive but certainly not a five star experience.

Summary: Loved our stay, highly recommend.  Staff was awesome, took care of everything and provided the level service one expects from a hotel of this level.  Get club level. Thanks for a great vacation! Ffffffff

It was a pleasure to have you as our guest, and we are elated that you enjoyed nothing but the best in terms of service and accommodations.
