Summary: I can't say enough about this property. This is the best Ritz-Carlton that I stayed in. In fact I stayed in the Ritz Half Moon Bay a few weeks ago and this one blows it away in service. We stayed at the hotel for three nights for a little R&R. We were greeted at the front desk by Brandon Hill who could not have been friendlier or more professional. He truly made us feel like we were VIPs. The manager of the hotel should be proud of him because he understands service and how to make people feel welcome. The concierge, Parker, I believe, was also there to greet us but it was Brandon who checked us in. Because of our SPG status and availability, we were upgraded to the Club Level which was fabulous! Great food and drinks was an amazing addition to our stay but the cherry on the
Manager Response: We are grateful for the time you have taken to detail your recent experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It was an honor to welcome you for a bit of much deserved rest and relaxation, complete with delicious cuisines and breathtaking ocean views. We will be sure to pass along your kind praises to all of our wonderful ladies and gentlemen, who will be thrilled to know that their friendly and attentive services exceeded your expectations. The next time you are looking to get away, we would love to welcome you back for another impeccable luxury experience in Dana Point.

Summary: Incredible property!! View of ocean is breathtaking. Rooms comfortable and well stocked with towels and robes. Lobby is beautiful with a lounge/bar that is relaxed yet upscale with its drink choices and service.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to leave us your thoughtful review. It brings us great joy to hear that our stunning views, luxurious accommodations and relaxed yet refined ambiance exceeded your expectations. Should you find yourself in Dana Point in the future, our ladies and gentlemen would be honored to welcome you back for another memorable experience.

Summary: Conference at Ritz. Great food, room on the Pacific. Staff very friendly and helpful. Great facility. Clean and updated. Service was top notch. Beautiful sunsets on the patio. Room was spacious, clean and bathrooms were well done.
Manager Response: On behalf of all of our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for the lovely review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are delighted to hear that you were impressed with our delicious cuisine, magnificent views and impeccable service. Whether for another conference or a relaxing getaway, we hope to welcome you back for another impeccable experience in the near future.

Summary: Excellent place to stay.  The view is breathtaking. The bed was great. Wish I had the same mattress. The food was great creme brûlée French toast was to die for. The dinner items were also unique and pleasing both to look at and eat.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your kind words with us. It was a pleasure to welcome you for a relaxing weekend getaway, and we are elated that you enjoyed a memorable luxury experience. The next time you are looking to escape, we would love to welcome you back to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary: Loved our stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. Felt welcome from the moment I arrived and can't wait to go back at the end of the month. I spend more nights in hotels than I did at home, the last few months and couldn't be happier with my recent visit.
Manager Response: We are grateful for your kind and valuable feedback of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your luxury experience from start to finish, and we look forward to welcoming you back at the end of the month. Should you need any assistance planning your next visit, please do not hesitate to reach out to us directly. Thank you.

Summary: First welcomed with a glass of champagne at check in, then our luggage did not make it with us, airline delay, hotel offered overnight kit to freshen up. Outstanding view of ocean waves, suffers, sunset from this cliff top hotel. Food and beverage service all over the resort was first class, cool 180 lounge overlooking ocean and lobby bar. My new favorite. Room was perfect, bathroom amenities, only bad thing we had to leave to go home.
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely review and for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It is a pleasure to hear that you had a memorable time in Dana Point, particularly thanks to the quality of service provided by our exceptional ladies and gentlemen. We are already looking forward to your next visit and hope it comes soon.

Summary: Such a beauty hotel with the most amazing views. The rooms are stunning and the cliff the hotel is over the ocean is so beautiful. The food at the restaurants is also amazing. I would love to go back here again. One of my favorite hotels I have ever stayed in.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to leave us such a wonderful review. We are elated to hear that our stunning Pacific views and exquisite cuisine exceeded your expectations. It is an honor to be considered one of your favorite resorts, and we look forward to welcoming you back to Dana Point for another impeccable visit in the future.

Summary: I love this property and appreciate their staff. Everyone I encountered made sure my experience was the best it could be. The stunning views and great food enhanced my business trip even more. Can't wait to return!
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for reviewing your recent experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest, and we are thrilled to hear that our delicious cuisine and exceptional views made for a more pleasant business trip. Should you find yourself in Dana Point in the future, we would be honored to welcome you back for another five-star luxury experience.

Summary: This hotel is a beautiful fun place to stay!!! The staff are very polite and helpful. The rooms are very clean and I am very particular about cleanliness. The restaurants have gorgeous views of the beach and ocean area. The food is very good !!! You will truly have a wonderful time at this place!!!!
Manager Response: We truly appreciate the time you have taken to share your review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. From our impeccable guest rooms to our exceptional ladies and gentlemen, we are delighted to hear that you were impressed with your recent luxury experience. We thank you for your kind words and recommendation, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable visit to Dana Point.

Summary: CONS- older property. Rooms need renovations as the carpets smell moldy. Bathrooms are nice but the bathtub shower in a ritz doesn't feel very luxury. No dedicated adult pool. Tried to enjoy a peaceful day at the pool but it was cut short by screaming babies even though we were in the more hidden pool that many don't go to. They were painting the hallways while we were there so it was somewhat inconvenient.   PROS- gorgeous views of the ocean. Fireside rooms are the best so that you can sit out on the balcony and watch the sun go down. You can also make s'mores using the firepit. Room service had good options as well as the marketplace. Gym is big and has very nice views of the ocean.   Overall our stay was good, but I believe it could've been better, especially for what you
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to detail your recent experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. While we are pleased that you enjoyed our breathtaking Pacific views and delicious dining options, we are disappointed to hear about the areas in which your expectations were not met. We have passed along your feedback to the appropriate teams and will be handling these concerns immediately. On behalf of all of our ladies and gentlemen, we hope to welcome you back for a visit that more closely meets our standard of excellence in the future.

Summary: This is an amazing hotel in an amazing location.  Was here for an investor conference that was hosted at the hotel, so it was just an overnight stay, but the service was impeccable, as you would expect.  Wonderful welcome by the staff, and a spacious, clean and very comfortable room.  Received a credit at the restaurant for breakfast as a result of the Marriott rewards program and enjoyed a delicious breakfast of eggs and bacon while overlooking the Pacific ocean and the many surfers.  While the hotel is at the upper end of the price scale, my experience was excellent.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your lovely review with us. It was a pleasure to welcome you to Dana Point for a five-star luxury experience. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the stunning views and impeccable service provided by our ladies and gentlemen. Whether for another conference or for leisure, we hope to welcome you back to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel again soon.

Summary Heading: Very Poor for what you're paying
Summary: We were supposed to stay for 3 nights and we ended up only staying for 2. We chose it because we were attending the Forbes Summit. We decided to go elsewhere for the 3rd night, and if we knew we would have chosen a different hotel.  Cons: - the hotel is completely overpriced for what you get. We payed 450$/night and we would expect a wonderful amazing stay and ended up being a disappointment in many ways - decor of the hotel is ok, mostly classic, but overall needing a renovation if you wish to be a 5 star hotel. - No breakfast was included. The options for lunch or dinner were absolutely overpriced. We actually ordered room service for a simple dinner and we payed 100$ for 2 burgers and 2 cokes and the fries were frozen like in a Macdonald's. Staff in the restaurants tend also
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to review your recent experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our stunning views and spectacular private beach areas; however, we are sorry to hear that you were not completely satisfied by your visit. We encourage you to contact us directly at your earliest convenience, so that we may better understand your experience. We look forward to hearing from you and, hopefully, welcoming you back for an impeccable luxury experience in the future.

Summary Heading: Another sensational stay at one of Cali's best resorts
Summary: My first stay at the Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel was two years ago. Then, I was blown away with the property and its scenic views in the very peak of summer. Returning in the fall, I was pleased to find even better service and more openness as opposed to the crowded summer months. The room was immaculate, the views sublime, and the resort restaurants were unbelievable. I can't say enough great things about this property; it is undeniably one of the premier resorts in California and perhaps in the United States as a whole. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: We are grateful for your valuable feedback and loyalty to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are honored that you consider our resort to be one of the best, and it brings us great joy knowing that you enjoyed our breathtaking views and luxurious guest rooms. On behalf of our dedicated ladies and gentlemen, it would be our pleasure to welcome you back for another exceptional experience.

Summary: Was here for a friends Wedding! Never knew this place was here. The views were as good  if not better then Hawaii. Being a former chef I thought the food and service was outstanding. The only drawback is if you are having a wedding here, there are people dressed as homeless, some with animals, mingling with your guests prior to the outdoor wedding. My guess is they are going to the beach and are very slow about it! If it were my wedding I would have gone beserk!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It was a pleasure to welcome you and your friends for such a special celebration, and we are elated to hear that you enjoyed your time in Dana Point. We apologize for any disturbances you may have encountered, and we hope these minor shortcomings did not detract from your overall pleasant experience. Should you find yourself in the area in the future, we would be honored to welcome you back for an all-around five-star luxury experience.

Summary: Very disappointing for a Ritz Carlton. The entrance is nice but that’s about as good as it gets. It just didn’t have the feel of a Ritz Carlton both pool areas were awful and the restaurants unbelievably expensive I think it was $47 for chicken. Some of the staff luckily were very Ritz Carlton especially Patrick (bell boy) Jazz ( in the steak house) and Rory all deserve to be at a top class Ritz Carlton they were extremely professional and friendly
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to the share your experience. While we are pleased to hear that you encountered several of our exceptional ladies and gentlemen, we are concerned that other aspects of your experience did not exceed your expectations. We apologize for any shortcomings you may have come across, and would like you to know that this is not reflective of our high standard of excellence. We would greatly appreciate the opportunity to speak with you further about your experience, and we ask you to contact us directly at your earliest convenience. We look forward to hearing from you an, hopefully, restoring your faith in The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary Heading: Five star service, five star experience!
Summary: First of all, our experience at this hotel was fabulous!  We came as a couple to celebrate our anniversary.  We booked under the AMEX fine hotels and resorts program, and we are RC gold as well. Upon check in we were given a very generous upgrade to Club Level coastline view guest room.  I called a few days before to say that we will be arriving around 1:30pm to try and take advantage of our early check in through FH&R. Our room was ready for our early check in upon our arrival.  The room was beautiful, the view was magnificent, and the weather was perfect.  Later that afternoon, we received some chocolate covered strawberries as an anniversary acknowledgement.  We thought it was a very nice gesture...  Anyways, basics:  the bed is comfortable, the pillows as well, housekeeping
Manager Response: First and foremost, happy anniversary! We are grateful for your lovely review and your decision to celebrate such a special occasion at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It is heartwarming to hear that our luxurious accommodations and exceptional Club Level Lounge exceeded your expectations. We are most delighted, however, to know that our ladies and gentlemen offered exceptional service throughout the duration of your stay. The next time you find yourself in Dana Point, we would be honored to welcome you back for another impeccable experience.

Summary: Loved my stay. 5 star hotel, 5 start quality and 5 star service.   Recommend to anyone looking for service, quality and comfort. Worth every cent.   Staff is well trained and prepared. Facilities are in top shape, and the location is one of a kind.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to leave us your kind review. It brings us great joy to hear that you enjoyed every moment of your time with us, particularly the service provided by our exceptional ladies and gentlemen. The next time you are looking to get away, it would be our pleasure to welcome you back to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel, for another five-star luxury experience.

Summary Heading: My Stay at RC Laguna Niguel
Summary: The quality of service and friendliness of the staff was extra ordinary! I have stayed in this hotel several times and every time we had a great experience. The check in was quiet easy and I got one of the best ocean view rooms. I will definitely come back again ...
Manager Response: Thank you for your fantastic review and loyalty to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It is heartwarming to discover that each of your experiences with us has been an exceptional one, thanks in part to our impeccable service to our stunning views. We are thrilled to hear that you plan on returning, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable experience soon.

Summary: I joined my husband here on a business trip - our first trip away from our kids together.  The experience was beyond our expectations.  The views of the ocean were breathtaking at every turn!  The staff bent over backwards to make our stay exceptional.  I treated myself to a massage at the spa and it was by far the most wonderful spa experience I have ever had.  It also gave me access to the amenities of the spa for the rest of my stay.  We had dinner at the restaurant, Raya,  and the view of the sunset literally brought me to tears.  My husband and I were debating over what dessert to choose and settled on one - the waitress (I wish I could remember her name) came back with both desserts and said that the other one was on her and gifted us two complimentary Ritz-Carlton water
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving us with such a wonderful review. We are beyond thrilled to learn about your lovely getaway to Laguna Niguel. Whether it was the inspiring views or your relaxing spa experience, we are happy to hear that the resort went beyond your expectations.

Summary: It is one of the most luxurious hotel with an outstanding service standard that I have not seen at any other hotel, let alone another Ritz Carlton. The most important part of the service is their excellent staff, from the moment you step on the premises, valet the car, check-in, room service, club lounge and restaurant experience and the views are just mind blowing! Well done Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel!
Manager Response: We are grateful for the time you have taken to share your wonderful review. While we are delighted that you enjoyed our exquisite cuisine and breathtaking Pacific views, we are most elated to hear that you were beyond impressed by the exceptional service provided our ladies and gentlemen. Should you find yourself in Dana Point in the future, we would love to welcome you back to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel, for another impeccable luxury experience.

Summary: Incredible hotel with a one of a kind view. The entry has a peaceful feel as you are greeted by great staff who do their best to make the boring check in process as quick and painless as possible.  The room was beautiful with one of the most spectacular views I've ever had.  Amenities were plentiful, impeccable service from all areas of the hotel.  Amazing staff made us feel at home. Will stay there every chance I get!
Manager Response: Thank you for the lovely review. What a pleasure it was to host you, we are thrilled that you found so many aspects of your getaway impressive. Whether it was the impeccable service from our Ladies and Gentlemen or the stunning views from your room, we are happy to learn that you enjoyed yourself fully. Please join us again soon.

Summary Heading: DO not stay here if you expect luxury
Summary: This hotel is awful, trashy and not worth the money. I had previously stayed at Beverly Hills hotel which is a 5* hotel, cheaper than this and was 100x better , and now staying in Four seasons which is also cheaper and 100x better. They have a steak restaurant at the RC and it’s so expensive it’s ridiculous. Do not stay here
Manager Response: We appreciate your review and are disappointed to hear that you did not enjoy your experience at the resort or enoSTEAK. We encourage you to contact our office directly if you wish to further discuss your experience, as we would appreciate the opportunity to restore your faith in our team, brand and resort. Thank you.

Summary: Wonderful hotel in an outstanding location, great views and the staff provide focus and attention to detail.  The enoSteak restaurant however is exceptionally overpriced considering the decidedly average food quality. In addition, the wine selection available at this restaurant is restricted to high priced bottles for no good reason. A shame and why I am awarding the hotel 4-stars only. On the other hand, the RAYA restaurant in the same hotel is really good.
Manager Response: We are grateful for the time you have taken to detail your recent experience at our Dana Point resort. It is fantastic to discover that you enjoyed a relaxing getaway, thanks to our stunning Pacific views and exceptional ladies and gentlemen. We are, however, disappointed to hear that your dining experience at enoSTEAK did not quite meet expectations. We apologize for any minor shortcomings and hope this did not take away too much from your overall pleasant experience. Should you find yourself traveling in the future, we would be honored to welcome you back to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for an all-around impeccable experience.

Summary: Surprised family with stay at the Ritz. Everything was outstanding - rooms, restaurants, staff and more!!! Totally accommodating to our needs (accessibility). Ocean view and hearing the tide made this visit so special.
Manager Response: We appreciate your kind review and decision to bring your family to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are elated that you enjoyed an exceptional luxury experience, from our impeccable service to our breathtaking views. The next time you are looking to get away, it would be our pleasure to welcome you and your family back for another memorable experience.

Summary: We recently stayed at the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel Club Floor to celebrate our birthdays. We have visited this property for more than 30 years. There is no other hotel experience that can exceed the one provided at this Ritz Carlton club floor. We have been to  many other Ritz Carlton  properties and stayed on their club floor there is no better one than the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely review and loyalty to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It is heartwarming to hear that you were well taken care of by our dedicated ladies and gentlemen for your birthday celebration. We strive to provide impeccable service in all areas, so it is wonderful to know that you enjoy a five-star luxury experience each time. We look forward to your next visit to Dana Point and hope it comes soon.

Summary: This property is at its low point.  The rooms are beat down and do not reflect luxury pricing.  The spa is woefully small for a property this size.  The men and women’s spa had broken steam rooms.  The men’s spa only had one worked shower with stopped up drains.  The property was jammed with events which severely intruded on guests comforts.  There was a doggie event with 500 barking dogs, a band, 1000 people immediately outside our room.  It was crazy.  We had to be moved from our room due to a broken pipe in the wall and they had no rooms to offer except a room one foot from a wedding of 100 people.    We checked out only 2 nights into a six night stay and moved to Monarch Beach Resort, where we were very pleased.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts. We are sorry to hear that you found your experience to be anything less than perfect, and we apologize for any disturbances you may have encountered. We encourage you to contact us at your earliest convenience so that we may better understand your time with us. We look forward to speaking with you directly and, hopefully, restoring your faith in our brand, team and resort.

Summary: Love this place had the most wonderful time .. Will definitely return for that Christmas celebration… I come every month for the yappy  our get together with dogs… So much fun for the whole family! Rory Emslie  Guest relations manager took great care of us
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely review and loyalty to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It is wonderful to discover that you enjoyed an impeccable five-star experience with your pups. It brings us great joy to know that you had a memorable time, and that you plan on returning. Should you need any assistance planning your next visit, please do not hesitate to reach out to us directly.

Summary Heading: A Romantic Night overlooking the Pacific
Summary: Every so often we have the opportunity to escape.  If you choose to escape to the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel you will not be disappointed.  We stayed for a single night get away in early March.  Our room was a second floor ocean view room with a small balcony.  The room was very well appointed.  In fact we enjoyed it so much that we chose to have room service and even slept with the doors open so we heard the ocean all night.  There were so many high points that it is hard to focus on just one - here are a few highlights: - the coffee shop.  From coffee to wine by the glass, or a quick bite it was great. - a walk on the beach - a drink in the lobby lounge (at sunset)
Manager Response: We are grateful for the time you have taken to share your kind review. We are elated to hear that you enjoyed every moment of your time with us, from our luxurious guest rooms to our spectacular Pacific views. It was a pleasure to welcome you for a relaxing romantic getaway, and we look forward to seeing you at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel again soon.

Summary: My company has an event every year at the Ritz in Dana Point. This hotel knows how to make everyone feel special by paying attention to the small details. From the banquet captain memorizing our event team drink orders to the long time staff hugging us every year when we see them, it all makes us feel so welcome. The rooms are comfortable. The restaurants on site are all very good and once you’re there you never want to leave. I look forward to coming back year after year as do our conference attendees.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It has been an honor to welcome you and your colleagues, year after year, for an exceptional event. It is heartwarming to hear that you appreciate our dedicated ladies and gentlemen, luxurious accommodations and delicious cuisine. Whether for business or pleasure, we look forward to welcoming you back to Dana Point for another impeccable experience soon.

Summary Heading: The Ritz Carlton specializes in customer service
Summary: The view is wonderful . The sunsets are beautiful. Get an ocean view room.  The salon pedicure was great. Everyone goes out of their way to be sure you are happy and comfortable. You will feel pampered.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for taking a moment to share your review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It was our pleasure to provide you with a five-star luxury experience in all areas, and we hope to welcome you back for another memorable and relaxing getaway in the future.

Summary: The Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel is a fantastic property with a great staff who come across as genuine which is not very common in 5-star hotels. The bar next to Raya was fantastic, I had well-shucked oysters from Baja with a cocktails. Also, enoSteak in the hotel is worth a visit. We booked an oceanfront balcony room which was amazing for sunset views. Depending on the time of year, I would probably try a terrace room with a fire pit next time. Overall, I highly recommend this property to anyone looking for a relaxing and/or romantic getaway.
Manager Response: We are grateful for your kind review and recommendation of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna. It was an honor to have you at our beautiful resort in Dana Point, and we are elated that you enjoyed every moment of your time here. We look forward to welcoming you back soon for another luxury experience filled with delicious cuisine and spectacular views.

Summary Heading: About a good as it gets!
Summary: Stunning property, awesome staff, terrific food. Rooms seaside are a little small but spectacular view. Take thee shuttle to the beach for a stroll, get up early for the sunrise, watch the surfers, grab a massage, lounge by the pool, grab a glass of wine overlooking Salt Beach. Bring your yoga clothes- morning yoga overlooking the ocean is the best!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your kind review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It is lovely to know that you appreciated our exceptional ladies and gentlemen, breathtaking views and overall relaxing ambiance. We are pleased to hear that you were able to enjoy our spa services and other activities during your time with us. We look forward to your next visit to Dana Point and hope it comes soon.

Summary: We stayed on the club level for 5 days. I’ve never seen so much personal attention. These employees went above and beyond. Club level had food and drinks up until 11pm. I never had to leave our hotel floor (even though my husband made me)
Manager Response: On behalf of our ladies and gentlemen, it was a pleasure to have you and your husband as our guests. We are thrilled that you enjoyed a five-star experience in all areas, thanks to our impeccable service and luxurious amenities. Should you find yourself in Dana Point in the future, we would be honored to welcome you back to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for another exceptional experience.

Summary: Everything about this hotel was fabulous.  My room was comfortable and clean , the food was excellent and service was impeccable. The views are amazing and the spa treatments were high quality.  I had a very relaxing visit and look forward to returning.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share your fantastic review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we are elated that you enjoyed a five-star luxury experience. We hope to welcome you back to Dana Point for another relaxed yet refined experience in the future.

Summary Heading: Needs coordination for what your paid for
Summary: This hotel is ranked as a 5-star hotel, thus, you expect a 5 star treatment. When we stepped out of the vehicle, attendants came swarming at you asking if you needed help with your luggage. This can be overwhelming especially if you drove far to get to this place. I am unsure as to they take turns, or whoever the client chooses to assist them. The check in area is not clearly signed. Check in though was a breeze (I thought it was at that time). Managed to checked in early at 2 PM. I was asked for my credit card for any incidentals and my ID which is the norm when you check in, despite my room being paid for using the bride's account. I was told I was given a garden view which was in my itinerary.  The room upon a quick inspection looks average for what you paid for, nothing
Manager Response: Thank you for the time you have taken to detail your recent experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. While we are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our breathtaking Pacific views, we regret that other aspects of your time with us did not quite meet expectations. We strive to provide impeccable service in all areas, and we apologize for any miscommunication or shortcomings you may have encountered. We encourage you to contact us at your earliest convenience, as we would appreciate the opportunity to learn more about your experience and restore your faith in our resort.

Summary: Overpriced and suffering from typical resort hotel overuse. Cleanliness and service issues inside but stellar grounds and setting. Incredibly beautiful sunsets. Could have one of the best bar views of the Pacific Ocean in SoCal but dated interior wall of cabinets and bar service  items obscure it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest review. While we appreciate that you enjoyed our amazing sunsets and ocean views, we are concerned to hear your disappointment in our facility. We encourage you to contact us directly so you can share details of your visit as would like to welcome you back in the future for an improved stay.

Summary: This is our favorite Ritz Carleton! We have celebrated our anniversary here for the past 6 years. We love to watch the sunsets from our deck and the staff on the club level are the absolute best!  The attention to detail is unmatched in all the places we have stayed all over the world. We especially appreciate the kindnesses of Diane Tango, Penni Garcia and Mercedes! I would definitely recommend an ocean front room where you can hear the sound of the waves rolling in. A beautiful property in a gorgeous setting!
Manager Response: Aren't the crashing waves and the sunsets incredible?  We enjoy experiencing them as much as you do.  Thank you for your kind comments about our ladies and gentlemen.  We will be sure to share it with them.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: The stay was very nice. The Ritz was welcoming. The food was good. The staff very attentive. The grounds were well kept, although large and sometimes hard to navigate. The map provided was helpful. Long survey at the end.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your review! It is lovely to hear that our exceptional cuisine and dedicated ladies and gentlemen exceeded your expectations. Should you find yourself in Dana Point in the future, we would be honored to welcome you back for another impeccable luxury experience.

Summary: We recently spent a long weekend at  Ritz-Carlton's property on Laguna Beach. throughout the hotel are floor-to-ceiling windows which highlight, wonderfully, the views of the Pacific Ocean. It is as if you are on a cruise ship.   We were there for a meeting, and the staff were superb. We had "banquet" meals, all of which were fabulous. The breakfasts and lunches on a terrace overlooking the courtyard and pool were particularly good.  Everything was, expectedly, Ritz-Carlton nice!
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to detail your time spent at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It is fantastic to know that you enjoyed a relaxed yet refined luxury experience in all areas, from our stunning Pacific views to our exquisite cuisine.  We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary Heading: Close your Eyes, you are in Heaven!
Summary: From the moment we checked in with Kylee at the front desk, to when we checked out with her, you know you have stepped into heaven and unfortunately you must leave! You are in the hands of professional, incredible, and caring Ladies and Gentlemen! The privilege was ours and we feel so lucky to have experienced this slice of heaven. The views, the Ocean, the weather, the food, did I mention they have an Ambassador of the Lobby, that provides the warm feeling of being welcomed like you belong. We never wanted to leave this property. Thank you for making my Birthday extraordinary!!!!!!!!!!  We will be back.
Manager Response: First and foremost, happy birthday! We are grateful for the time you have taken to share your thoughtful review. We are elated to hear that you enjoyed a five-star luxury experience from start to finish, thanks to our exceptional ladies and gentlemen and breathtaking scenery. We hope to welcome you back to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for another memorable experience soon.

Summary Heading: Our new favorite Ritz Carlton property!
Summary: We plan our vacations based on where Ritz Carlton properties are located and this was our first trip to this property as it coincided with a wedding.  Up to now our favorite location was the Beach Ritz in Naples.  We now have a new favorite!  We had an ocean view room on the amazing club level.  The service in the entire hotel was incredible and the offerings on the club level are unsurpassed.  We enjoyed the spa and had two great massages.  Food in the restaurants is excellent and while the food in the steakhouse is great the prices are absurd.  The only objection we had was the chairs by the pool are very uncomfortable.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. Next time you are looking to get away, it would be our pleasure to welcome you back for another impeccable experience.

Summary: My husband and I just stayed here this past weekend.  We have stayed here in the past with our children and it is always a wonderful stay.  Perfect for a romantic or family stay.  Beautiful resort, very clean and excellent staff.  Great restaurants to choose from on site.  Gorgeous views and just a short walk down a path to beach. Will definitely return!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review and loyalty to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. On behalf of our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to welcoming you back to Dana Point again soon.

Summary: This hotel is beautiful and very clean.  My room had balcony doors that overlooked the ocearn.  I am giving this a 3 star rating because when I was checking out they charged me $100 for a parking fee.  I live in Canada and flew to the U.S. so I did not have a car.  Upon checking out the hotel staff said they would remove the charge off my account, but instead I just received my statement a month later and the charge is still there.It's a huge inconvience to sit on the phone long distance to try to resolve this hotel error.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your honest review. While we are delighted that you enjoyed our stunning Pacific scenery and luxurious guest rooms, we are sorry to hear that you encountered some miscommunication upon checkout. We understand your frustration and sincerely apologize. Please contact us directly at your earliest convenience so that we may remedy this situation as quickly as possible. We look forward to speaking with you and, hopefully, restoring your faith in The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary: Stayed here 5 nights.  Pros. Gorgeous lobby. All the restaurants and food at pool are great.  Especially love having breakfast at Raya. The views are amazing.  Staff is very nice  Beautiful running/walking trails around the hotel.  Spa is wonderful. Had a massage and facial. Highly recommend both  Cons Every day had to call down for shampoo face cloths and coffee and creamers  I'm sorry we've stayed at other Ritz Carlton properties  And never had this problem.  After day 2  I stopped leaving housekeeping tips.   Also the coffee maker. All other Ritz  Carlton properties have Nespresso machines. Sounds silly but I think would be a great change.   The beach situation is ridiculous  They give out business card with a phone number to call for beach services but no one ever answers.
Manager Response: We are grateful for the time you have taken to share the details of your recent experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. While we are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our beautiful public spaces and delicious dining options, we regret that other aspects of your stay did not exceed expectations. We apologize for any miscommunication or shortcomings you encountered, as these are certainly not reflective of our high standard of excellence. Summary Heading: Very good will come back again
Summary: The best resort in my Trips to California of 14 days. Exllent service and good conditions. The lounge is really good. For desert time you could have many choice of wines and the bartender could give me surprise!

Summary: My wife and I stayed for three nights over Columbus Day weekend.  It was our 4th or 5th time at this Ritz and we are Silver Level Ritz Rewards members and have stayed at numerous Ritz and other high end resorts.  This Ritz is not up to par and although it is priced for 5 stars it only earns 3.  Upon our arrival at 4 PM Saturday we received the worst possible ocean-view suite.  It was furthest from the ocean and the longest walk from the lobby.  Their excuse was that they had 3 weddings and a few business groups that weekend.  I guess the loyalty program only means I am loyal to them and they could care less about my repeat business over the years.  We then saw multiple examples of what we surmise was cost-savings/penny pinching although the rates were $800 per night before the

Summary: I stayed at this lovely property for a business meeting and can say with absolute certainty that it is the most beautiful hotel I've stayed at.  The property is located right on the coastline and the views are stunning.  There are trails that lead down to the beach and plenty of really gorgeous areas for walking.  One day we saw a shark fin!  Another day we saw a seal. We were able to walk into the town where there were some great restaurants.  The bars and restaurants on the premises are also top notch with excellent service.  They do everything here to make  you feel at home and taken care of.  I hope to stay here again in the future!

Summary: Getting close to refresh time.  Beautiful location however resort needs renovation  I found it combersome to find my way around the property,especially the different levels with Lobby on 3rd floor. Dislike the lack of Mimi refrigerator in room, mini bar only.

Summary: Hello and good day everyone! A must see and dine or stay if you’re in Laguna Nigel. Stunning view from the dining area, call and pre book your table and request the sea view, it’s worth! The food @ RAYA was well represented with class. The flavour was delicious 😋. Never will you be disappointed. Don’t forget to get a photo remembrance of yourself by the stunning flower arrangements by the main entrance! Have fun and enjoy everyone!  👌❤️😎🇺🇸

Summary Heading: Remarkable service yet property has much room for improvement
Summary: The Ritz has tremendous potential to be an ideal resort property but unfortunately I feel obligated to share it's shortfalls. First let me begin with the positives: 1) incredible views throughout the property from your room, fitness center, dining areas and the bars 2) Food quality was excellent for the most part 3) service was impeccable. The only exception to this was our dining experience at ENO, where my filet was undercooked and the service was too slow. It was not that busy in the restaurant so I feel this is an area that can easily be improved upon. Now for the negatives. A fire alarm went off at 6 am during our stay and this continued for 10 minutes. I called the front desk to inquire if we should evacuate and they told me there was not a fire and they were unsure why

Summary: Just a beautiful relaxing place for a combination of buiness and pleasure.  The views are unbelievable and the staff if top-notch, particularly in the Club Room.  We have stayed more than once and hope to go back soon.

Summary: This may be the most beautifully situated property in all of southern California.  Nirvana for anyone who wants a relatively up close, beach experience.  The walk to the beach is steep and long but if you prefer to be shuttled, the Ritz is there to provide that service.  It's a very well run hotel designed to create the maximum experience for the guest.  If you have the money or the points, make this a top destination.

Summary Heading: A Tale of Two Cities-One terrible room/one great!!
Summary: Flew here with my wife to celebrate a birthday after having stayed here several times on business. Always before had beautiful rooms with amazing views. Bragging to my wife to my wife that she would love the view and never want to leave the room.  After a very lengthy check in process where 6 other guests were given rooms was told the hotel was sold out and that there weren't "many good options". Was given a room overlooking the roof of the restaurant at the pool. Very disappointed!!   As a frequent traveler-NYC, Paris, Copenhagen, The Hague, Seville, London, Edinburgh, Key Biscayne, Del Coronado, Miami, Deer Valley.....this room had the worst view of any hotel this year.  To be made worse. The evening Front desk manager "Charles" was rude and insulting to my wife. She came back

Summary: It really is shocking to leave a two star review for a Ritz-Carlton property but in this caseI think it is merited. Firstly, let me tell you what is good about the property. The location and the staff. He is off the charts amazing. However, they have let the property go to a point where I think the only way you can describe it is that it looks tired. You can look in corners of the door jams and see dirt or peeling paint. Something you might expect for another hotel and not think much of it but for a Ritz-Carlton property it is really unheard of. I was only here for a da I made an appointment with the spa for a 30 minute massage. The masseuse was excellent however when I went to shower, one of the two showers was not working and the other one remaining only served lukewarm water.

Summary Heading: One of my favorites in the US
Summary: This is the third time we stayed here - the property and location are outstanding and the service / personnel are top notch.  People watching is fabulous, as there was an elaborate wedding event that was happening outside on the lawn below our room.  The concierge staff was so helpful in arranging an outing to Pageant of the Masters - the seats that the Ritz has reserved each night are among the best at the amphitheater.  This is a must do for anyone that hasn't been there before.  The only disappointment is that the signature shop was out of the waterfall candles that I love (signature scent of the hotel).  The shopkeeper was apologetic and explained that they don't like having the candles shipped to them during summer (subjecting the candles to melting during transport).  We
Manager Response: On behalf of all of our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. Summary: We recently stayed two nights at the Ritz Carlton and had a fabulous time, thanks to Candice.   She was  professional,  while also being warm and friendly. We found this hamburger spot on the 3rd floor, offering ocean view/front dining.  Candice  made us feel very, very special and I will always be grateful to her.    I live in San Diego, so I plan to visit frequently and hopefully I will be able to work with Candace again.  Btw,  don't miss the chocolate covered strawberries 🍓 to die for!!!!

Summary Heading: Gorgeous Beach & Attentive Service keeps us coming back
Summary: We used to stay in various hotels on the busy S Coast Highway when we visited Laguna Beach.   Now we probably wouldn't stay anywhere but the Ritz Carlton in nearby Dana Point, even if it is not the most modern choice. (we can easily overlook this bc of the unbeatable location/beach and staff)  Here are some of the reasons we keep coming back:  The LOCATION is stunning.  The views are phenomenal.  It's peaceful here, away from a touristy 'strip' feeling.  Breathtaking sunsets.  Bunnies, hummingbirds, dolphins in the distance. Unlike the nearby Monarch where you have to take a golf cart to the far away beach, the Ritz beach is a manageable, short walk down a paved path.  (Beach accessibility is one of our top priorities.)  The water this weekend was a beautiful /clear turquoise
Manager Response: Thank you for your thoughtful review and loyalty to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. In addition, housekeeping entered our room at 8am without allowing us time to get to the door to let them know we were still sleeping.   If you are staying here, be sure to be ready to pay. Enjoy the beachside location but don't expect great service or new room conditions.

Summary Heading: Amazing stay week after Labor Day
Summary: Valet only - They greet you with complete respect and service immediately.  I felt like an idiot rolling up in a Toyota Corolla as my travel agent booked that for us and we pull up to the Ritz and the first car we see there is a Ferrari 488, But the staff treats you no differently.  We had LOTS of stuff piece by piece as we had our 3 year old son with us and they were very accomodating to get it all packed on the cart and taken to our room for us.  When you walk in to this hotel the smell of the 20 plus boquets of roses and flowers is awesome.  When you stay at a Ritz every detail is taken care of and thought of beyond what you can think of and the beauty of the lobby is wonderful.  The front desk was very accomodating, i always ask for a free upgrade to see if we can get a

Beautiful gardens.  All the tables at Raya restaurant have a great view.  I observed lots of birds, rabbits, and there seems to be a hummingbird that enjoys hanging out near the way to the Ocean on the North side of the main Hall.  The room itself was not exactly the best, but it had a great view (Coastline). Overall

The hotel is perched on a cliff overlooking the Pacific but beach access is an easy stroll down a path. The views from our room were beautiful. We had breakfast at the hotel every morning and the food was excellent and it was only exceeded by the super friendly staff. In particular, a waiter named Joel went out of his way to ensure that we enjoyed each and every meal. This hotel is great and worth making the trip there.

Every detail was executed with amazing precision. He honestly deserves a medal (or at least a paid day off) for pulling this off.

Summary: Ritz Carlton, Laguna Beach is one of the loveliest places in  Orange County.  The resort has exceptional full ocean views.  You can experience one of the many restaurants from casual to fancy.  You almost won't need to leave the resort.  There are walking paths behind the resort.  The beach is one of the best. The pools offer shade and sun and from what I can tell there is not those over-priced cabanas, so that makes me happy.   It is the loveliest place.  I would strongly suggest an ocean view room or a side room with partial ocean view if I were you.

Summary Heading: Many issues but a good getaway
Summary: I try to be very fair in all my reviews and I am a self confessed "hotel snob", meaning I have to have the room spotless and clean. That being said, when I went to take my shower in the evening, I pulled back the shower curtain and saw a big blob of swirling black hair on the marble of the side of the shower. How could they have missed that when cleaning the room? What else did they miss in that room? I took a photo and went immediately to the front desk and spoke with a manager, Natalie. Her attitude was brusque and overly profession. She did not offer any credits, only to move my room. I had to ask for the credit of points back into my gold Marriott account. I wasn't going to move and before you know it the whole housekeeping staff was in my room trying to assuage my grossed

Summary: True first-class service, from the moment you park to the final checkout. The staff are highly courteous and go out of their way to ensure you have a pleasant stay. When we want a luxurious stay-cation not far from home, we look no further than the Ritz Laguna Niguel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your lovely review. It is fantastic to hear that you enjoyed your luxury experience from start to finish. We are proud of the service that our dedicated ladies and gentlemen provide for each of our valued guests, and we are delighted to know that your expectations were exceeded. We look forward to your next visit to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel and hope it comes soon.

Summary: My wife and I stayed a few nights at the Ritz-Carlton in Laguna Niguel, California.  Our stay was extremely enjoyable.  The room was beautiful, the view was outstanding.  Service in the hotel was top-notch.  Breakfast on the small balcony overlooking the ocean was one of the highlights of our stay.  The young staff who worked in the restaurants, in room service and who drove the little shuttle to the beach were terrific and helped make our stay so very enjoyable.....
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your thoughtful review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are pleased to know that you enjoyed a five-star luxury experience, thanks to our breathtaking views, impeccable service and delicious cuisine. We are grateful for your kind words and look forward to welcoming you back to Dana Point soon.

Summary Heading: You must stay here at least once in your life.
Summary: The resort is amazing, the location is amazing, the food is amazing, the staff are amazing.  Every time I come here the experience is consistently 5 star.  Maybe I have just been lucky but I have never been disappointed.
Manager Response: We appreciate your lovely review and loyalty to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It is our promise to provide exceptional and personalized service for each of our guests, so it brings us great joy to hear that your expectations have been exceeded every time. We are pleased to hear that you also enjoy our stunning location and exquisite cuisine. On behalf of all of our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable luxury experience soon.

Summary Heading: Late checkout not guaranteed for Platinum members
Summary: It was our first time at the Ritz laguna. To my surprise they forgot to document my late checkout request and I had to request multiple times as an elite to get me late checkout. We had to leave early and unfortunately couldn't enjoy the resort completely
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share the details of your recent experience. We would like to know more about your experience and encourage you to contact our office at your earliest convenience. We look forward to speaking with you and, hopefully, restoring your faith in our resort.

Summary Heading: Amazing Time at Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel
Summary: Exceptional service and great food.  My wellness treatment at the Spa with Amy made going back to Hurricane Irma manageable.  I will cherish the memories especially since the last 2 days we've had no running water or power.  Can't wait to go back.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your thoughtful review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It is heartwarming to hear that you were able to enjoy a relaxed yet refined luxury experience during your time with us. We will be sure to pass along your kind praises to our ladies and gentlemen, who will be delighted to know that their services exceeded your expectations. We look forward to your next visit and hope it comes soon.

Summary: This is a beautiful hotel and we had a great time here. However, we stayed during a hot weekend and the air conditioner in the main parts of the hotel was not up to the task. Whenever we enjoyed a meal or drink at the hotel our entire party would leave drenched in sweat.
Manager Response: We are grateful for the time you have taken to share your review. It is delightful to hear that you enjoyed your time at our beautiful resort. We regret any discomfort you may have encountered from the heat, and hope this did not detract from your overall experience. Should you find yourself in Dana Point in the future, it would be our pleasure to welcome you back for an all-around five-star luxury experience.

Summary: Epic Failure  This Ritz Carlton hotel used to be my “happy place” however this time I left frustrated and disappointed.  The hotel clearly was not prepared for the crowd of the Labor Day weekend several members of the staff were rude, short tempered and just had an overall lack of accountability. Actually nothing was “their pleasure”.  I booked under the AMEX Fine Hotels and Resorts Platinum card. As I was driving to Laguna from LAX I called to confirm and early check in by 1pm and the hotel staff assured me a room would be available. When we arrived at the hotel the room was not available and was not ready until 4pm. Although the room was supposed to be a “resort view” the view we actually had was the hallway from the pool. I would recommend avoiding room 1523. The next morning
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to detail your recent experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are troubled to hear that your time with us was anything less than perfect and sincerely apologize for any shortcomings or inconveniences you encountered. We would greatly appreciate the chance to learn more about your experience, and we encourage you to contact us directly at your earliest convenience. We look forward to speaking with you and, hopefully, restoring your faith in our Dana Point resort.

Summary: From the moment of arrival, the greeting by the friendly valet Orion, my stay was clearly going to be exceptional. Although my early arrival met my room wasn't ready yet, my bags where quickly stored and held for the appropriate time. My guest room was wonderful with a stunning view of the Pacific and coastline. I ate three meals at the property and each was delicious.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we are elated to know you enjoyed your time at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It is heartwarming to hear that your expectations were exceeded in all areas, from our exceptional service to our delicious cuisine. We look forward to welcoming you back for another luxury experience in the near future.

Summary: This Hotel has amazing views! They have grass area next to the hotel that has public access and is amazing to watch the sunset. The hotel staff is friendly but during a trip to visit and out of town aunt an employee at the pool asked what room & name when we wanted the fire pit put on. Not sure why that matters. She was a blonde at the pool area Aug 30. Otherwise we have had amazing experiences at this location & all other staff is always amazing. We recommend this place to enjoy a staycation if you live in California. Thank you Ritz Carlton staff for always being so amazing besides the pool incident on our last visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star review and for choosing to stay with us at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It is lovely to know that you enjoyed our stunning views and beautiful public spaces. On behalf of all of our ladies and gentlemen, it would be our pleasure to welcome you back again soon for another memorable experience.

Summary: The waiters were excellent, very polite, precise and neat. Food is good. Thank you for making my experience and first visit to US so warm and cheerful.  The view from the restaurant zone on the ocean is so incredible that it is worth to visit this place just for that spectacular view. In the morning you see many surfers riding down there and in the evening there is a terrace where you can see a sunset and eat a lot of tasty food. I liked also a comfortable and nice bar where guests can chill-out and have some drinks.  The zone itself around the hotel is very clean, neat and beautiful. Many trees, places to relax and walk, coastal zone is perfect to explore. I would say this place have everything you need to relax, eat well, to spend your time near to the ocean.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share your review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It was a pleasure to welcome you to our beautiful home in Dana Point. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our fine cuisine, impeccable service and breathtaking views. The next time you are traveling, we would be honored to welcome you back for another exceptional luxury experience.

Summary: The views are incredible and the hotel has very convenient access to a very long and wide beach with fine sand and nice surf.  If you don't want to alk on the sand, there is also a long paved walk path that seems to go on forever and that is easily accessible from the hotel as well.  One bedroom was excellent - on par with the usual Ritz Carlton quality.  However - service was spotty - both check in and check out took way longer than it should and the valet car service was very slow, with inattentive attendants.  Definitely not up to par for a Ritz Carlton.  Concierge was great.
Manager Response: We are grateful for the time you have taken to share your review. It is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed our breathtaking views, beautiful public spaces and luxurious guest rooms. It is, however, concerning to know that you experienced anything but perfection in other areas. We pride ourselves on our impeccable and personalized service, and we regret any shortcomings you may have encountered. Should you wish to speak further about your time with us, we encourage you to contact us directly. We look forward to welcoming you back for an all around exceptional experience soon.

Summary: This hotel felt like a basic Marriot. We paid over $900 per night, which felt like a complete ripoff. This did not feel like a 5 star resort. There were too many children throughout the hotel, and the "private/adult" pool area did not serve food or alcohol. The rooms were small and basic. I have stayed in $200/night hotels which were much nicer than this. We expected to have a really great, relaxing experience, but we were happy to leave at the end. I would not recommend this hotel. Save your money.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review. We are disappointed to hear about the situations you have described, and we would like to learn more about your overall experience. We encourage you to contact us directly at your earliest convenience. We look forward to hearing from you, as we would appreciate the opportunity to speak with you further and restore your faith our resort.

Summary: One of Southern California's most amazing hotels and properties just shy of going to Hawaii.  The location doesn't get better as far as beach access and sunset views.  The personnel treat you with the utmost kindness and really go out of their way to make the stay quite pleasant.  The property is clean and well-kept.  The rooms are clean and the beds are comfortable.  I don't think I could ask for more from a hotel stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the lovely review and for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we are delighted you enjoyed our relaxed yet refined ambiance. It was our pleasure to have had you as our guest and we look forward to welcoming you back for another personal and memorable luxury experience soon. Please do not hesitate to contact our office directly should you need any assistance planning your next visit.

Summary: A little disappointed in the rooms.  Even a garden view really has no view and is more like the quality of a typical Sheraton.  Nice but not what you'd expect for the $ you're shelling out.  However, at a property like this, you're not spending long in the room.  The views are magnificent and the service quite good....typical Ritz-Carlton Service.    Re: roooms, our door didn't close properly...had to slam it shut.  Didn't realize until the next day that we had our door ajar the entire evening.  Told housekeeping but never saw anyone come by.  I suspect the weather played a role in expanding the door frame so limited on what they could do.  Just an FYI.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review and for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It is lovely to hear that you enjoyed our stunning scenery and impeccable service. If you should ever find that something in your room does not quite meet your expectations, please do not hesitate to contact our front desk so that we may remedy the situation for you right away. On behalf of all of our ladies and gentlemen, it would be our pleasure to welcome you back.  If we may assist in any way at any time, please feel free to contact our Executive Office directly.  Thank you!

Summary: When staying at Ritz Carlton properties there is a level of service and luxury you expect, this property has some exceptions.  PROS: The service from all the staff was exceptional, upon checking in Supervisor Charles ensured that we had a room with a spectacular ocean view and his professionalism was unmatched. Our welcome champagne was provided and our room was clean with a lovely marble bathroom, ample closet space yet in need of an interior design update.The Beach Butler was friendly and ensured we had umbrellas and chairs and provided a 30sec golf cart ride to the beach. Busy beach great for body boarding but waves pretty rough for swimming public so crowded. CONS: In the room there was no mini-bar or snacks. The adult pool is shaded and small. To find beach, we had to keep
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share your feedback, thank you.  We are delighted you enjoyed your overall stay with us, and that our ladies and gentlemen created a memorable experience for you.  If we can answer any questions for you or assist you in any way, we would welcome the opportunity to assist you from our Executive Office.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Spent the holiday weekend here with two kids, ages 8 & 11.  Definitely a kid friendly hotel and I'm glad I was here with mine, versus trying to escape for a quiet couples weekend (probably not the best, quietest and most romantic place for just couples).  From a family perspective, it really couldn't be better!    Our only regret was not bringing our golden retriever because apparently the hotel has a very friendly pet policy for dogs of all sizes.  We had no idea!  They even allow the dogs to hang out by the pool which is so cool.  If you're annoyed my dogs, this isn't the place for you but we loved seeing all of the furry friends.    Remarkably, the service here was outstanding. I couldn't put my finger on it but unlike other hotels of this caliber, every single person we came
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your experience at The Ritz-Carlton!  We look forward to welcoming you and your special furry friend back soon.  If we may be of service or answer any questions for you, please feel free to contact the Executive Office any time.  Thank you!

Summary: If you want to be completely disappointed this is the place to stay. This hotel isn't up to ritz standards especially for business travelers. It's a big bold hotel with a nice location, but it falls short of having that something extra the ritz is known for. You feel processed and not pampered.
Manager Response: We appreciate your honest review and are sorry to hear you felt as if your stay was anything short of perfect. We encourage you to contact us directly so we can better understand your feedback. We look forward to hearing from you, as we believe that our guests deserve the absolute best and we are committed to upholding this promise.

Summary Heading: Amazing Hotel For Service and Location
Summary: The Ritz isn't a cheap joint and there's a reason, its the height of service and location in Laguna.  We stayed five nights (only planned on four) and enjoyed every moment.  The staff understands that the guests have great expectations and strive to fulfill those expectations.  The restaurants on the property served great food but service was even better.  The location high atop a bluff overlooking the beach is unmatched.  The beauty of the views, the property and the experience with the staff make this a 'bargain' !
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience. We greatly appreciate your time.  It was our pleasure to have had you as our guest, and we are delighted to know you felt the same.  We will be sure to pass along your kind praises to our ladies and gentlemen.  We all look forward to creating more unique and personal memories for you soon.

Summary Heading: The Club is one of the best, anywhere, and service is superb
Summary: In a single word: Awesome.  The room was perfect, the service was 'Ritz', and the view is undeniably spectacular!  The service is superb.  I didn't use the pool facilities or do the 'tourist' things that people do.  I stayed on business and had a wonderful time.  As far as service goes, I arrived on a day when there was a sudden crush of guests.  One of the guest-services folks made a special point of approaching the guests in the lineup and taking our names so the front desk would be fully prepared by the time our turn came up.    The girl at check-in handled every single guest with patience and efficiency.  Really well done.  Eventually, I made my way to the room and then to the Club Lounge.  Wow!  What a pleasant surprise.    The Lounge is open all day and offers very good
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience.  We are honored to have your trust and loyalty to our resort and brand.  We are delighted you enjoyed every moment of your time with us, from our impeccable service to our excellent amenities. We will also be sure to pass along your kind praises to all of our ladies and gentlemen. We  look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: First things first; there is no better location, view or beachside hotel that you'll find compared to this hotel in Southern California.  The views are simply stunning.  We stayed at the Club Level floor for the first time and I'm now sold to its benefits.  Aside from the tons of free food and drinks that are available all throughout the day, the concierge staff are genuinely friendly and greet you by name and I saw them go out of their way to meet the guests' needs.  The food is also quite excellent.  We ate at pretty much at all the restaurants in the hotel.  The poolside food is actually quite good, particularly the poke bowl.  RAYA is also worth trying.  Excellent food, service, and it is also where you can watch the sun set.  Very pretty.  EnoSteak: I have to give this one

Summary Heading: Lobby/ Linda Shiffer ( from in room dining) is the only good thing this property has to offer
Summary: Unlike most people who write reviews after they stay in a hotel to complain; I am here to write a review during my stay hoping this place can get their act together. Where do I begin, well I am going to start with the most bothersome things to and will go down the list. I got up this morning pretty early and had breakfast which went really well. Then at around 9:30 my wife joins me at the pool. We get down to the pool and there is no one to greet you and even ask to help you get set up. In fact there was no member from the Ritz Carlton staff at all at 9:00 Am. Then I finally see one about 10 minutes later. This one doesn't even offer to help with towels or an umbrella until I have to ask. I thought to myself " its early I am sure they have more than one pool guy to help out and
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We take guest feedback very seriously. We welcome you to contact our office to discuss your concerns. We would like to restore your faith in our hotel.

Summary Heading: What's not to LOVE about this property
Summary: Upon entering, the staff greets you by name...and remembers it during the entirety of your stay... I've yet to figure out if they study a social media profile, have an app that tracks your arrival or just simply are this top notch.  And that's just the beginning.  The check in, Foyer, view down the main hall to the ocean over the cliff.. The restaurants, beach view, room on the back lanai, EVERYTHING about this hotel is elegance, charm, class and more.  Having stayed several times for company events, if you need to host a gathering, the team at Ritz Carlton Laguna Nigel goes above and beyond to ensure your guests, who may or may not be staying at the property, feel welcome.
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely review and loyalty to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We look forward to your next visit and hope it comes soon.

Summary: If you have kids and dogs this is the perfect Hotel for you.  There are tons of both.  We weren't expecting this as we came for a Romantic Anniversary celebration.   Be ready to open up your wallet too.  Just saying that the Ritz is supposed to be some special Hotel but they need to get their priorities straight.  I think all Ritz's have their own personal Charm and Flair but this one just didn't do it for us.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback!  We truly appreciate hearing your perspective.  On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we hoped your romantic anniversary celebration at our resort would have been a very memorable one.  We would be delighted to recreate this special evening for you if you would give the opportunity to do so.  Please contact us directly and we would be honored to assist.  Thank you again for sharing your experience via TripAdvisor.  We hope to speak with you soon.

Summary Heading: Our favorite go to Hotel in Southern California
Summary: We stay here every year for special occasions. Birthdays, anniversary, even had our wedding reception after party here. From valet, to check in, to maid service, to restaurant staff, to pool staff, to guest relations coordinator, they did not disappoint. You ask and they give it to you. When staying at hotels, I observe the customer service of the staff, are they friendly? Do they go out of their way to please you? Do they answer your questions in a polite way? This hotel staff did just that! I had a nice ocean view room with extra ammenities and  a Birthday cake waiting for me! This is why we come back every year! Thank you ladies and gentlemen of the Ritz in Laguna!
Manager Response: Thank you for your trust and loyalty!  They do not go unnoticed and we enjoy surprising you each and every time you choose to stay with us.  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.  If you need assistance, please feel free to contact the Executive Office any time.

Summary: Garrett the bellman was the best he went above and beyond I thought my wife was getting on his nerves asking so many questions lol but he told us all about the hotel and restaurants and even hooked up her Pandora which really made the rest rest of my day stress free lol. Also Big Kev the bartender in the lounge was fantastic they didn't have shrimp cocktail and he made one call and it was there. Thanks Big Kev because a happy wife is a happy life ha!  This service is above beyond. The lady bartender at the pool (Malina) and her runner (Cory) went out there way to assist me anyway possible if it was for drinks towels or whatever. Over all it's been only a half a day and I'm blown away.
Manager Response: We are grateful for your lovely review and decision to stay with us at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It was our pleasure to have had you and your wife as our guests and we are happy to hear that you enjoyed every moment of your luxury experience. We will be sure to pass along your kind praises to all of our ladies and gentlemen, as they will be thrilled that their services exceeded your expectations. We look forward to welcoming you back for another "10-Diamond" getaway soon!

Summary: this was a beautiful hotel.  the rooms were spacious and pretty.  our room overlooking the beach was magnificent.  the staff was very accommodating to our every wish. I would definately recommend this hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for your five-star review and kind recommendation. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our stunning views and luxurious guest rooms. Summary: We had the pleasure of being guests at the Ritz Carlton in Laguna Nigel, this weekend. Our dear friends hosted a beautiful wedding and we enjoyed the most amazing time.  Our first impression of your property was hotel registration were we met Charles.  Right away Charles was helpful, joyful, and welcoming.  Charles’s engagement with us set the theme before our visit to the room.  Our room was clean, luxurious, and comfortable. The views all around the property as well as in the dining areas are fantastic.   We are anxious to visit your property in the near future with our family and friends.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share your thoughtful review. It is fantastic to hear that you plan on returning, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable occasion.

Summary Heading: Excellent experience...go ahead and pamper yourself
Summary: Go here and enjoy a special experience. I invite you to google Ritz-Carlton and read about their corporate culture...it shows in how you are treated at their properties. Although this property is older, it has been maintained beautifully. Perched on a seaside hill, the vistas looking out over the ocean are fantastic. Close to Laguna Beach (a free shuttle takes you all the way downtown) and other SoCal attractions.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your lovely review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel, thanks to our breathtaking views and beautiful resort. Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights and were very pleased.  It was as expected for a typical RC, however, be advised this property is a bit older than some.  Still very very nice.  We would stay here again.  Everyone extremely friendly and spot on.  Management fantastic.   Shuttle to and from beach very nice.  Park next door very nice.  Good location and very very safe.  Loved it.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your lovely review. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed every aspect of your experience with us. We are very proud of our unparalleled service, and it is wonderful to hear that our ladies and gentlemen exceeded all of your expectations.
