Summary: What an amazing customer service experience... they found us on the grounds and called us by name to address a concern with room...  excellent establishment and service.  The meeting rooms were ample in size, and accommodations were exceptional, and those views!!  I'd do another seminar here gladly, and probably will...   Thank you to a wonderful staff and ownership group.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share your lovely review. It was a delight to read about your exceptional experience at our beautiful resort. We are thrilled to hear that the impeccable service of our ladies and gentlemen did not go unnoticed, and that your seminar went effortlessly. We look forward to having you back for another luxury experience again soon.

Summary: We check-in early this am and they had a room ready 10 am which was great. As a platinum member they waive the resort fee, you get $60 for breakfast and 1,000 points!! Also they upgraded us to an ocean view which has a king bed but they brought two rollaway beds for the kids.  Balcony has 2 chairs/tables and amazing views.  The beach valet is great. They brought chairs, towels, kids toys and water for us. We walked to the beach (pleasant and downhill) but took the golf cart shuttle back.  Bed is very confortable. Room itself is nice but nothing our of the extraordinary but then again, you'll want to spend your time on the balcony anyways.  We had lunch at 180blue which was good. Kids meals are $18 but big enough to share for two young kids.  I'm happy we decided to stop by for 1
Manager Response: Thank you for your thoughtful review. It was our pleasure to have had you as a guest and we are delighted to hear you enjoyed every moment of your stay, from our breathtaking views off the balcony to our luxurious accommodations.  On behalf of all of our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to welcoming you back fro another five-star experience.

Summary: The grounds at this Ritz are spectacular.  The views of the sunset over the ocean alone are worth visiting for--simply amazing.  There are some very quirky things about this property--you cannot see the ocean from either pool.  This is so odd to me.  The quiet pool may as well be someone's backyard pool and the main pool is only a little better.  There's also no one to do chair set-ups at either pool--which is fine but not very Ritz like. Since the beach is a public beach, there are no nice lounge chairs at the beach, though the staff is happy to lone you little folding chairs and bottled water.  The food at the Club was great but the club itself is awfully small and minimal views and almost no outdoor seating. The morning yoga was lovely. Overall, if something was bringing me
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts. It was a true pleasure to have you as a guest, and we are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our beautiful resort and grounds. Your feedback regarding outdoor accommodations has been noted and we hope that this did not take away too much from your overall experience. On behalf of our dedicated ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to welcoming you back to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for an all-around five star experience soon.

Summary Heading: Allergy Friendly and Happy to Support Customers
Summary: My young daughter has anaphylactic tree nut allergies and had recently experienced a hospitalization from a supposedly 'nut free' restaurant.  She was terrified of eating anywhere outside of home.  The Ritz-Carlton staff went out of their way to make her feel comfortable. It began with Julia at guest relations who greeted us and went through Chef Chris who gave her a tour of the kitchen to show her their clean prep area and continued with Raya manager Nour who had her staff note our concerns to our account so that all would be aware and careful.  Every single person we interacted with went out of their way to support our daughter.  The level of concern and care was far beyond any we've ever seen.  Thank you!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the time you have taken to share your lovely review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are proud to hear about the exceptional service that you encountered during your time with us. It brings us great joy to know that our ladies and gentlemen made you and your daughter feel right at home. It was an honor to welcome your family, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another luxury experience in the future.

Summary: We had a very nice stay for our 56th anniversary. The staff greeted us with acknowledgement of our anniversary and provided delicious chocolate covered strawberries and other chocolate treats  in our room. We had complimentary deserts and everyone went out of their way to make our stay a success.
Manager Response: First and foremost, congratulations on your anniversary! It was a pleasure to have had you as our guests for this special occasion, and we are delighted to hear that you enjoyed an exceptional luxury experience from start to finish. On behalf of all of our ladies and gentlemen, we would be honored to welcome you back for another romantic getaway soon.

Summary: My daughters and I went back to this special spot Aug 11-13 and were impressed with how friendly and happy the entire team was-again! We have visited every couple of years for the last 10 years, and we have never been disappointed. Bryan McCarthey at the pool made my girls feel special with a little parting gift before we headed to the airport. Miguel was friendly and helpful both mornings at Raya for breakfast. Allyson at enoSTEAK was welcoming and friendly and had a special welcome gift when we arrived.   There are so many more people to thank from the beach team to the pool team. It was a busy weekend and they never made us feel rushed or in the way. Will continue to visit The Ritz, Laguna Niguel and make more wonderful memories.
Manager Response: We are grateful for your lovely review and loyalty to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, it was a pleasure having you and your daughters with us. We look forward to welcoming you back for another unique, personal, and memorable experience soon. The food was excellent at the on site restaurants.  I am not sure why people have said they were disappointed.  we have stayed at the Monarch Beach Resort also and although it is lovely as well, I found it too big (incredibly long halls) and the staff not nearly as attentive and courteous.  We have stayed multiple times (for business conferences and pleasure- the only complaint my husband had about the conference hall was there are no windows.)  Fantastic stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely review. We are thrilled knowing that you enjoyed everything about your visit,. We hope to welcome you and your family back for another five-star stay again soon.

Manager Response: First and foremost, congratulations on your 20th anniversary! We are so grateful that you and your husband chose to celebrate with us at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. However, from thence on the service was exactly that expected from an RC entity.  The location is spectacular and the service highly professional yet not stiff but very friendly. The beach, albeit accessible to all, is very well monitored by the lifeguards, who are clearly extremely well trained.  The only peculiar matter that arose during our visit was when we booked the steak house, it was seriously cold and our wives, who understandably were dressed to impress, were frozen. I failed to
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate the time you have taken to share your review. Summary Heading: Does NOT live up to the brand
Summary: I have stayed at this property more than ten times in the last decade (and twice this year) and it never fails that things go wrong here and the staff never remedies the situation.  During this recent visit, my room was not ready when I entered.  In fact, the housekeeper was still in the room when I walked in and asked me to leave and come back in five minutes.  I obliged and when I returned, the room was still in disarray and the housekeeper once again asked me to leave so the room could be finished.  This made me delayed for an important meeting.  I texted the front desk, but never heard back from them.  In addition to this check-in fiasco, the hallways were dirty, the food was only fair and the service was poor.  The one redeeming feature was the outstanding valet staff
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share your review. Summary: Parts of the property need updating, including some rooms.  However, the view cannot be enhanced.  Our room was on the far southern aspect of the hotel (ocean view) on the 2nd floor.    Breakfast each day overlooking surfers far below was outstanding.  The views are matched only by food quality and preparation.  And the staff was top notch.  At dinner at least one waiter had serving patrons since the property first opened.    A shuttle will take you to the wide beach, set up umbrellas and beach chairs, and pick you up for the ride back up the hill.  We did yoga each day outside.  The crash of the Pacific added to the experience.  Our teacher was a local artist and yogi with vast experience.    We very much look forward to the next trip back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely review. We are pleased knowing that you enjoyed your visit and  all of the amenities the resort has to offer. We look forward to welcoming you back for another five-star visit soon.

Summary: One of the best Ritz-Carlton's I've stayed in -- especially with family.  A room with an ocean view that has a firepit is an absolute must.  Get the s'mores kit for the kids and a bottle of wine for the parents from the Marketplace and enjoy a wonderful family experience. This Ritz has everything that you need for a fantastic day at the beach -- towels, sunscreen, Frisbees, chairs and umbrellas...and they'll even carry them and set them up for you!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed every aspect of your visit and that you found our resort to be a perfect place for your family vacation. We hope to welcome you back to Dana Point again soon.

They told us that there was music in the outdoor bar area but not only was there no seats (people were eating dinner there) but at 8 PM on Friday , there was NO music. It is heartwarming to know you enjoyed your visit to our resort thanks to our relaxed yet refined service and magnificent surroundings. We are pleased to hear you plan to return, and we look forward to it!

Summary: what a great location witha breath taking view, the staff is over all great, the food is amazing and the view and location is picture perfect. from the moment we walked in to the moment that we left everyone in the hotel were so nice and helpful, the beach service is great they provide you with everything you need even sunscreen, sunglasses, visors,...you will see beautiful sunset while you are zipping your drink at the open bar on the 3rd floor. go have fun.
Manager Response: Dear jacksandi,  We appreciate your kind review and the wonderful details you have shared. It is fantastic to know you enjoyed each and every moment of your luxury experience, from your time by our magnificent beach to your experience at our incredible outdoor lounge. On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to welcoming you back to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel soon!

Summary Heading: Now THIS is a Ritz Carlton!
Summary: I typically try to stay at Ritz properties when I can, but as you can see from my previous reviews, they are sadly not ALL up to par. But this one was an absolute pleasure. From Brendan at the front desk to all those who helped me on the phone and in person with laundry, room service, gift shop, concierge, etc. to get ready for an important meeting in my suite. Fantastic food. Amazing views. I also finally checked out the spa and it was just lovely and I had a wonderful massage with Jill and then a pedicure upstairs at the salon. I can’t wait to come back. If I had to be picky i would just say the pool area is quite ordinary — no view or anything — but the beach here is the main attraction anyway. I’m usually here on business. THANK YOU for an amazing stay. xo
Manager Response: Dear sologirltraveler,  We are grateful for the time you have taken to share your review. It is wonderful to know your expectations were exceeded in all areas, from our impeccable level of service to the food prepared by our incredible team. We are pleased to know you were able to take advantage of our spa while you were here as well. It has been our pleasure to welcome you for business, and we would be honored to host you for a leisure experience in the future. Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel!

Summary: My husband and I recently spent a 2-night "staycation" here and it absolutely exceeded our expectations. The friendliness and genuine warmth of the staff was the thing that really impressed us. Literally every person we encountered on the property was genuinely happy and gracious, and it just made being at such a beautiful property even better. Candice at the front was nice enough to acknowledge my husband's platinum status and upgraded us to a full ocean-view room, which was spectacular. Kylie at the Dana Pool Bar, Austen at 180 Blu, and Linda from in-room dining were also standout employees and made our time at the Ritz so pleasant. We couldn't have had a better stay, and since we're local, we're already planning a return trip later this year. We can't wait to come back!
Manager Response: Dear travelgirl53015,  Thank you for taking the time to share the details of your recent "staycation" at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. While we are thrilled you enjoyed delicious dining and unbeatable views, we are most proud to hear about the exceptional service that you encountered. It brings us great joy to know that our ladies and gentlemen made you and your husband feel at home. We look forward to welcoming you back later this year for another memorable experience in beautiful Dana Point.

Summary: loved the shuttle to the beach and use of umbrellas and chairs... food and location are amazing. we wish to live at that  hotel.... friendly helpful staff and amazing views. appreciate the effort made .....
Manager Response: Dear shornocio,  We appreciate your kind review and your decision to stay with us at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It was an honor to welcome you to our home in Dana Point, and we are elated knowing your expectations were exceeded. On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to welcoming you for back!

Summary Heading: Stay at the Montage- not Here
Summary: Very disappointed with the level of service and lack of communications....Had to wait until after 4 pm for our room which was promised at 2:30 and could not even get an estimated time of delivery. Was told: "Your a Platinum, so you should understand that Platinum guests take late check-outs and that means that you need to wait for them to decide to leave..."
Manager Response: Dear travel1150nts,  We appreciate your honesty and the time you have taken to share your experience. It is our promise to provide our valuable Platinum Rewards members exceptional service in all areas, and we regret any times you noticed shortcomings. We offer many added benefits at our property to our Platinum guests and we strive to accommodate all early check-in and late check-out requests to the best of our ability.  We would welcome the opportunity to speak with your further about your experience.  We enjoy hearing from our Platinum guests and take feedback constructively.  Feel free to contact the Executive Office here at the resort any time.  We look forward to restoring your faith in our team, resort, and brand.

Summary: Attended company party at this beautiful resort!  The food was delicious and the view was amazing! They provide chairs and umbrella for you at the beach.  The only downside is that the pool didn't have views of the ocean.  That would have been lovely.
Manager Response: Dear ClaireABG,  Thank you for reviewing your business-related experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are thrilled to know you enjoyed a lovely party thanks in part to our stunning location and delicious catering. We look forward to welcoming you back for more celebrations in the future.

Summary Heading: A beautiful location with beautiful views
Summary: This hotel is located in one of the most beautiful locales in California.  While not right on the beach (on a bluff), it's only a 7 min walk to the sand.  The beach is beautiful.  The beach butlers are so sweet and helpful. All the restaurants (except for the steakhouse) has jaw-dropping views- some of the best I've seen!  The rooms are in need of renovation, however,  as compared to other Ritz hotels (Georgetown is beautiful), especially for the room rates this hotel charges.  I had an oceanfront room, on club level.  I love club level.  Food servings all day long and complimentary alcoholic drinks (wine, beer, cocktails, etc..)- great offerings.  Would I stay here again, yes.  But I'll look for a special-  guest rooms need renovating.
Manager Response: Dear jacquelinef448,  We are grateful for the time you have taken to detail your luxury experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It is heartwarming to discover that you enjoyed our proximity to the beach as well as our stunning views of the Pacific. We appreciate your feedback regarding our guest rooms and will use these comments when making improvements in the future. On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary: we have 3 person but got the one king bed room. i have been called for exchange the room, wait for over 30 min didn't have anyone show up for key, i called again, they told me that they are busy i have to wait. then i went to front desk for pick up key by myself, the front desk have poor service i never see in 5 star hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback. We  are disappointed to know that your experience was anything less than perfect. If you would like to discuss your experience further please contact us directly. We would like the opportunity to restore your faith in our resort.

Summary: It was a fabulous experience! Great food, views, bed, cocktails, service, pool, and much more! We come here three times a year and are never disappointed. We love it! We can relax, go to the beach, shop for art, rest, relax and partake in all the beautiful surroundings.
Manager Response: Dear 127jamiv,  Thank you for your review and for your loyalty to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It has been our pleasure to welcome you several times a year, and we are proud knowing each experience has exceeded expectations. We are thrilled you have been able to take advantage of our incredible surroundings area as well. On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to your next visit and hope it comes soon.

Summary: The RITZ CARLTON Laguna Niguel is our favorite hotel anywhere due to the stunning views, superior sincere service culture, quality of food and variety of activities and experiences. We will be back as soon s we can!
Manager Response: Dear Gretchen M,  We are grateful for you review and for your choice to visit us in Dana Point. It was heartwarming to know The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel remains your favorite resort thanks to our breathtaking ocean views, our exceptional service and our various dining options. We truly appreciate your recommendation and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary: OUTSTANDING !  Ocean views and spectacular service.  This particular Ritz Carlton has an accommodating, friendly staff.  The food is very good - but not cheap.  Beach is clean and the staff sets up your seats and umbrellas.  Steep walk to beach - but Ritz provides a shuttle.  Was here with family for second time and coming back annually, for sure...
Manager Response: Dear eugenen831,  We truly appreciate the time you have taken to share your kind review. We are proud to know you have enjoyed multiple luxury experiences thanks to our excellent ladies and gentlemen as well as our pristine beach area. It was an honor to welcome your family, and we look forward to your next trip to Dana Point.

Summary: Hotel staff is excellent from check in to valet   The hotel grounds view and location are excellent The club level staff is outstanding as well as there food items. The the rooms are a bit dated especially the carpets. The markup for the Fourth of July was a bit excessive and I won't pay that again.  The prices were higher than Amalfi coast and the French Riviera for that period.
Manager Response: Dear Jeffrey r,  Thank you for taking the time to review your experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It was our pleasure to host you for the long holiday weekend, and we are proud knowing you enjoyed our beautiful resort in Dana Point. On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to welcoming you back again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Dramatic Cliff Side Setting and Fabulous Service
Summary: Whether you're looking for a vacation spot or location for a business meeting, the Ritz Carlton at Laguna Niguel is first rate. The cliff side setting of the hotel is dramatic and breathtaking. The fitness center has amazing picture window views of the ocean with talented surfers in action, beach and hills. The beach is very wide and the Pacific Ocean welcoming to both swimmers and surfers although the waves can get high at times. The service is  consistently high touch and personalized across all areas and functions. If you visit, be sure to go to the Market Place for takeout breakfast, lunch etc. and Derek, Kaytlin, or their colleagues will take good care of you and make sure that you get exactly what you need, despite the standard menu. And if you're so inclined you can take
Manager Response: We are grateful for the time you have taken to review the details of your time at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are proud to host both vacationing families as well as business travelers, and we are pleased knowing you found our resort to be suited to both. It is wonderful to know you were able to take advantage of both our fitness center as well as The Market Place. It is our promise to provide impeccable service across our entire resort, and we are thrilled you enjoyed a five-star stay in all areas. On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Most of the staff here are very kind and the events that you can do here are amazing. Such as boogie boarding at the beach or just swimming at the pool. The most surprising thing was, when we rented the chairs, umbrella, a d boogie board, the staff down at the beach helped carry it down. Last time we carried all the things, so this was very suprising.This trip was overall satisfying.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share your kind review. It brings us great joy to know our ladies and gentlemen provided exceptional care both within our resort as well as on the beach. We look forward to welcoming you for more luxury experiences in the future.

Summary: Very classy hotel, if you need to get into Dana Point the shuttle or Uber is easily accessible. The prices are a little over the top - Parking $40/night, a beer & sandwich runs around $20-25, cannot get food at the beach & it is a steep descent to the beach.
Manager Response: We are grateful for the time you have taken to review your visit to Dana Point. It is lovely to know you appreciated our beautiful property. We are grateful for your honest feedback and will take each of your comments to heart. On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: Great location, great Ritz service, great quality, pricey cafe offerings, friendly staff, high quality food and dining, great room views on the Ocean side, overpriced daily valet service tacked onto your daily rate....
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to review your visit to Dana Point. We are proud to know you enjoyed our stunning location, exceptional service and unbeatable dining. It is concerning to know you found our valet to be anything but perfect, and we are pleased this did not detract from the overall five-star quality of your luxury experience. We look forward to welcoming you back to Dana Point soon.

Summary: Julian (server) from 180Blue provided an exceptional service at this visit and our visit last year. He went beyond his duties to provide an outstanding experiences to our family and our children. My son treasured the memories from last year that were made with Julian and was looking forward to returning this year. His expectations of meeting with Julian again were more than met. Julian is everything that Ritz epitomizes, with his level of care, service, understanding, quality, memories and wanting to come back. I hope Julian is recognized because he is really an outstanding employee. Julian truly raises the next generation of Ritz customers! Thank you, Julian!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your visit to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are elated to hear your visit to 180blu was perfect thanks to our welcoming atmosphere and the perfect service you received from our ladies and gentlemen. We are proud to be a part of your family’s memories, and we look forward to welcoming you back for more excellent meals in the future.

Summary Heading: Business trip to Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel
Summary: Excellent hotel in a prime beach location.  Staff, food, and service is top notch.  Low rise layout blends the hotel into the natural setting, even though the area is very built up.  Access to the beach is easy and the opportunities for recreation difficult to beat.  Good destinations for families with the means.  Facilities for our business meeting were excellent.
Manager Response: We are grateful for the time you have taken to share your helpful review. It is lovely to know you enjoyed your experience in Dana Point. We are proud to welcome vacationing families as well as business travelers, and it is wonderful to hear you found The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel to be suited to both. Should you find yourself back in the area in the future, we would be honored to welcome you back.

Summary: I went to join my friends wedding and my friends pay for the open bar. I  went to op n bar for three times and ordering 4 drinks each time , they stop serving me drink the 4th time claiming that I am drunk due to multiple orders and I ask for the manager and he claims that is ABC requirement for not serving me drink due to the multiple drinks order. I am ordering drinks for 4 people , I am not intoxicated and I felt they just don't want to serve drink to save money in open bar . I ask if they can how did they evaluate that I am drunk and they can't beside I order lots of drink .
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to review your wedding reception experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  If you would like to further discuss the details of your experience, we encourage you to contact us directly. We look forward to speaking and, hopefully, restoring your faith in our resort.

Summary: It was my third time staying on the club floor in Dana Point and I have to say that each staff member at every level make a true and genuine effort to connect with and welcome us.  All of the staff that we interacted with on this trip were professional, accommodating, pleasant, and also went out of their way at each interaction to provide us with the utmost highest level of customer service, and they did this with effortless demeanor.   However, it is with my genuine pleasure to specifically point out one individual, Penni Garcia, that I cannot say without hesitation, is soley responsible for us having one of the top 3 "Ritz" experiences we have had ever since being club platinum members.  She is extremely professional, responsive, so tremendously intuitive that most times she
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share your kind review. It is fantastic to hear that each of your three stays has exceeded expectations. It has been our pleasure to provide impeccable service in our Club Level and beyond. We will pass your kind praises onto our ladies and gentlemen, as they will be thrilled to know you were satisfied. It is gratifying to know you have already planned your fourth stay. If there is anything we can do to ensure this next experience is the best yet, please do not hesitate to contact us directly. We look forward to your upcoming visit to Dana Point.

Summary Heading: Very posh area loved my view
Summary: I'm a platinum member with Ritz Carlton and really enjoyed this hotel. Great location, great food, and great staff.  I would definitely return to this hotel a very romantic place.  If you're looking for Ultra exclusive Hotel in the Dana Point area this is it.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your visit to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are grateful for your loyalty and are pleased to know you appreciated our unbeatable location, exceptional service and overall romantic atmosphere. On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary: Mattress lumpy and stained with urine. Mattress was old and we found it to be stained. They said they did not have any clean mattresses in the hotel. They said they could change our room, but no guarantee that the mattress would be any better.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to review your experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. While we are thrilled you enjoyed our stunning views, we are concerned knowing our room design and amenities did not meet expectations. If you would like to further discuss the details of your experience, we encourage you to contact us directly. We look forward to speaking and, hopefully, restoring your faith in our Dana Point Property.

Summary: I could not imagine a better experience. Everything was first rate from beginning to end. I highly recommend club level to anyone visiting this property. It is the best club level I have ever been visited. I also recommend the Eco adventure whale watch. Our guide Josh was the best. He was very knowledgeable about the marine life and was very easy to talk to.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It is fantastic to hear that you enjoyed our Club Level as well as our Eco-Adventure Center while you were with us. Your kind words will be passed along to each of our ladies and gentlemen. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: This is the definition of class.  Everything here is over the top, of course, that includes the prices. :>)  Food is spectacular, the grounds are enchanting, the views breathtaking and the staff will kill you with kindness and efficiency.  It's a little out of the way to Laguna Beach and the traffic can be just awful, making it between 10 and 40 minutes to get there.
Manager Response: We are grateful for the time you have taken to review your visit to Dana Point. It is heartwarming to discover that you enjoyed a five-star, luxury experience thanks in part to our delicious dining and stunning location. Although we are disappointed knowing you experienced traffic on your way to Laguna Beach, we are pleased to know this did not detract from the overall perfect quality of your experience. We look forward to your next visit to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary: Impressive all the way around!  EnoSTEAK was possible the best Steak I have ever eaten. Friendly and helpful staff.  Bed was amazing and restful. The view is absolutely awe inspiring. The business conference meals were of the highest quality.  The only downside was access to bathrooms on the 1st and 3rd floor meeting areas.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We greatly appreciate your kind words regarding your meal at enoSTEAK and your experience with our conference catering. It was our pleasure to welcome you to Dana Point, and we look forward to seeing again in the future.

Summary: Fantastic property with short drive to Laguna Beach.  Very friendly and attentive staff.  Gorgeous ocean views from property.  Monarch Golf close by. Busy weekend due to wedding.  Some noise in hallways at night.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your kind review. It is lovely to know you enjoyed our proximity to Laguna Beach as well our exceptional service. We regret any disturbances you encountered, but we are pleased these did not detract from the overall impeccable quality of your luxury experience. On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Hosted son's wedding at The Ritz Carlton Laguna Nigel June 25, 2017. The event was flawless! The property is breathtaking, the staff professional, and went to great lengths to accoommodate and make our event and stay a beautiful, once in a life time experience. The reception was spectacular. Our dinner was perfection and enjoyed by all.  I highly recomend!
Manager Response: We appreciate your review, and we were honored to play a role in this special day in your son’s life. It is heartwarming to know our exceptional dining and perfect service exceeded your expectations. We wish your son a lifetime of happiness and look forward to welcoming your family to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for future special occasions.

Summary: We saved our stay at The Ritz Carlton for thee end of our trip in Southern California and were so please with our visit. The pool and room were spectacular and we enjoyed the fire pit on the balcony as well. We had a great view of sunset and the kids loved our dinner at 180Blu. I would encourage anyone thinking of going to definitely take the plunge and indulge yourselves.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your kind words.  We are delighted that The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel was the highlight of your trip and are thrilled knowing you enjoyed your room and the fireplace.  On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: Scenic and first class hotel and accommodations overlooking the Pacific Ocean is about the only way to describe this spot.  Cool breeze with beautiful sunset and picturesque view of the surroundings.  Off the busy path of Newport Beach but close enough for entertainment and golf.  First time here but have stayed at a few RC hotels and would put it on top of the list.  If I was encouraging others to go I would say the staff was very friendly and helpful and the food was excellent and the outside dining area was a real treat for the view and the food, plus I was able to sneak in a cigar, so all good.  Very romantic spot as well with the beach and view.   Business trip and outdoor social areas worked out really well.
Manager Response: We are grateful for the time you have taken to share your review. It is spectacular knowing you enjoyed a five-star, luxury experience thanks in part to our unbeatable location and exceptional dining. We are delighted you were able to enjoy golf and other activities while you were with us. On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary Heading: Lovely property but don't expect tranquility!
Summary: I have a certain expectation when staying at a Ritz property...it wasn't met this time. To be fair, we stayed here on a busy June weekend when the hotel was hosting a huge wedding, so my perception and opinions may not reflect a typical weekend...but I don't know.  In any case, we arrived a bit late on Friday night after a long drive.  Normally when I enter Ritz properties I experience instant "serenity."  There is usually a calmness about the hotels.  This was not the case...it was lovely...don't get me wrong but what immediately came to mind was being at the Grand Wailea or one of those large beach resorts in Hawaii.  The noise level was extremely high--that was ok...I learned at check in there was a large wedding on property...and to be fair I love a good party but when we
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to detail your experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. While we are delighted knowing you enjoyed our beautiful property as well as your time on 180blu, we are disappointed knowing your expectations were not exceeded in other areas. We regret any disturbances you may have encountered while at the resort. It would be our pleasure to learn more about your trip and do what we can to restore your faith in our resort. Please do not hesitate to contact us directly if you would like to speak further about the aspects of your stay that were not perfect. We look forward to speaking and, hopefully, welcoming you back in the future for an impeccable visit to Dana Point.

Summary Heading: A property worthy of recognition... but there's one VERY small detail...
Summary: My friend and I decided to splurge and booked a getaway weekend at The Ritz-Carlton in Laguna Niguel. We had not seen each other in a long time after all. I spent a week at another hotel and after attending meetings all week, I was looking forward to spend the weekend here. I was not disappointed.   When we arrived a very nice gentleman took our car and told us where the front desk was. The front desk gentleman was super nice and provided the service you would expect from this type of hotel. While my friend checked in, I couldn't help myself and take pictures of the gorgeous flower arrangement in the lobby.   We got to our room and were pleasantly surprised with our gorgeous view of the ocean. I had hearts in my eyes when I opened the curtains. The balcony was very nice and was
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for your decision to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for this well-deserved reunion with your friend. We are delighted you both enjoyed everything from your private balcony to our stunning Pacific views. We appreciate your feedback regarding our concierge area and will certainly take this feedback into consideration. We are proud to offer guidance and recommendations to our guests, and we are thrilled you were able to enjoy many Laguna Beach destinations thanks to the helpful advice of our ladies and gentlemen. We are grateful for your kind words, and we look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary: We love this hotel.  Perfect setting but the people make it personal and special. The Club Floor is great and worth the cost.  Close to many family attractions and very beautiful!  The rooms with the fireplaces are super cool.  Kids love the smores!
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and are please to know you enjoyed a five-star stay with us in Dana Point. It is lovely to discover that your expectations were exceeded by our central location and comfortable guest rooms. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary: In June 2017 we took our 18 year old grandaughter to the Ritz-Carlton in Laguna before she left to live in Hawaii. The food was exceptional and the peole were very warm, service exceptional also. We had a garden view/pool room on the 3rd floor and the pool was beautiful. It was also quiet when we shut the doors. They have shuttle service to the beach and you can also watch people surfing and the waves from above. The only thing for us was we could hear the refrigerator at night. (but we are a little sensitive to noise) I wish they had specials for locals for as great as this stay was, it's hard to spend so much $$ when you live closeby on Balboa Island.
Manager Response: We appreciate your kind feedback and are thrilled you chose to stay with us for this special occasion. It is lovely to know you enjoyed every aspect of your experience, from our delicious dining options to our relaxing atmosphere. It is lovely to know you were able to take advantage of our shuttle as well. We appreciate your feedback regarding our refrigerator noise and will pass these comments along to the appropriate departments. Should you wish to treat your granddaughter again the in the future, we would be delighted to welcome you back.

Summary: This hotel is way too outdated, I don't believe the resort is wortby of the Ritz Carlton title. The only thing keeping this hotel alive is the beautiful view the property sits on. Better resorts in the area. Check out the Montage and monarch beach resort.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review. We appreciate that you enjoyed our location, however, we are disappointed knowing that the rest of your experience did not meet your expectations. Please reach out to us to discuss your experience further. We would like to welcome you back for a much improved visit.

Summary: As a family we booked two joined rooms with firepits facing the ocean. Then two days in our beautiful views turned into corporate chairs.. be warned. When you book ask if any events are being held on the lawn.  The hotel staff are wonderful in the main restaurant and bar. Also the valets and bellman were great. Front desk, not the best I've witnessed in my years of travel.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your review. We are pleased that you enjoyed our beautiful views; however,  we are disappointed knowing the rest of your experience did not meet your expectations. We hope to welcome you back so we can have the opportunity to provide a much improved experience.

Summary Heading: Views that takes your breath away ...
Summary: Being from Australia, this is the second stay at the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel since Feb 2017, and both times we had and experience that is second to none. The property, the location, the people all live up to the Ritz Carlton brand that i believe represents the highest level of luxury.  Being a Marriott Platinum member, we were very happy and wonderfully surprised by how special they made us feel ! We were therefore a wedding and booked a ocean view room but was upgrade to an Executive Ocean View Suite that was incredible !! Both the size of the room, the finishes of the room and the massive balcony that we had that over looked the ocean was WOW !!! WOW !! Also as Platinum guest we were give very generous daily breakfast credit as well as not charge a resort fee. This property
Manager Response: As a Platinum member you are one of our most valuable guests and we are grateful for the time you have taken to share the details of your stay in Dana Point. It is marvelous to know that both your stays exceeded expectations thanks in part of our beautiful property and perfect service.  It is heartwarming to know you consider our resort to be your favorite in California. Thank you for your loyalty to our resort and brand. We look forward to your next visit and hope it comes soon.

Summary: We were on a roadtrip and arrived at the hotel @ 7pm at night asking for a room, we felt like Joseph and Mary asking for a room at the Inn  The gentleman on the front desk (Sean) was wonderful and found a room on the club level for the night.   The club experience was great, the bar staff very friendly and all of the other staff in the resort really seem happy with their work and trained in the customer experience.   The view is sensational and we really enjoyed this hotel experience, no comparison to the Pelican Resort, like chalk and cheese.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your kind review. It was our pleasure to accommodate you during your road trip. We were thrilled to have provided a room on our Club Level and are pleased you enjoyed your luxury experience. On behalf of each one of our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to welcoming you back for an even longer stay in the future.

Summary Heading: Fell in love all over again!
Summary: We came here five years and had such a wonderful time, we had to return! We will not wait that long to return again!  We had a ocean view room with club access and were treated royally by all of the concierges! We made good use of the beach shuttle and enjoyed spending time at the pool as well. There is a really amazing pizza place and fantastic grocery store a short walk away (about a mile). We ordered a pie one night and sat on the lawn at the Ritz enjoying pizza and watching the sunset. An amazing experience!   The hotel is showing some signs of wear and tear, but the rooms are a generous size, the views are out of this world and the grounds are beautiful. Everyone we encountered at the Ritz went out of his and her way to make us feel special. It truly is a wonderful place to
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to detail both your experiences at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are thrilled you enjoyed our scenic property and stunning ocean views. It is lovely to know you were able to take advantage of a few nearby destinations thanks to our central location. We regret any shortcomings you may have noticed in our guest rooms, but we are pleased these did not detract from the five-star quality of your luxury experience. On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: This is probably a fine place to have a business meeting if you’re in the area, but a pretty poor excuse for a luxury hotel. Incompetent and unpleasant staff if you can even find them. Really nothing positive to say except I’m glad I’m never going back.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review and are disappointed to hear that your stay was less than perfect. Our ladies and gentlemen are known for their personalized, attentive service, and we regret if you experienced anything less. At your earliest convenience, we ask that you contact us directly so we can better understand your experience. Our guests deserve the absolute best, and we are committed to upholding this promise.

Summary Heading: Do not get a room on the 2nd floor facing garden
Summary: My second stay here & it was very different from the 1st time. We checked in for a work conference & my mom's 75th bday and were assigned a room  2051 that faced a bush, no view, buses were heard backing up & pulling in at all hours of the day & night. Kids were screaming at the pool and you could hear the showers running next door. Not relaxing at all & very disappointed, 2 night stay was $866. You can do better elsewhere.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your review. We know that our guests arrive with a certain expectation of peace and tranquility, and we are disappointed knowing your room did not meet those expectations. Please do not hesitate to contact us directly, as we would welcome the opportunity to improve on this experience in the future.

Summary: Fantastic experience at this property - facilitates, locations, food and staff. Amazing staff went above and beyond at every turn and made it a truly memorable experience. We Can't wait to go back to our new favorite Ritz

Summary: The service was was excellent.  If you value excellent customer service in your hotel stay then the Ritz-Carlton is a strong contender to the five star experience. Summary: Jenna at valet is one of the worst guest experiences I ever had. I called down to valet and nobody answered the phone, so I came to the counter and approached Jenna who said "she couldn't help me." A gentleman Jenna was training was nice enough to help, the phones started ringing and Jenna told everyone not to answer. I said, "I called down and nobody answered, Jenna replied yeah we are busy...and the phones go to someone else".  I replied, " they just rang without answer and she replied...well that's unfortunate." This left the bad taste in my mouth and although this is my favorite hotel...I won't be back the attitude was completely unacceptable. This was at 7 AM in the morning and there were two other people getting their cars. Ritz Carlton and Marriott training really should

Summary: This is 1 of the best hotels anywhere in the world with its location right on the cliffs overlooking the ocean.  Received an upgrade to a suite and kids had access to the club lounge.  Would recommend if anyone is looking for a weekend leisure trip.

Summary Heading: Still the best in the area
Summary: The hotel and grounds and immaculate, keeping the flair and elegance characteristic of the chain.  While the staff are not as gracious as they used to be since owned by the Marriott, they are still helpful and accommodating.   When compared to similar large hotels in the area like the Montage, they are one step ahead overall.

Summary: Wow. The staff could not have been more thoughtful and generous in making this an anniversary stay to remember. It is definitely a fabulous place to celebrate something special.  And it would be a lovely place to come get some time to yourself as well. Breathtaking ocean views.

Summary: I wanted to review this spa somewhere!    My daughter was getting married; we planned a "spa day" for the bride, her mom (me) and her bridesmaids.  We were ecstatic about spending the time together prior to the big day.    Then....I had a tag removed from my upper cheek a week prior to the spa day and lo and behold my entire eye socket and cheek turned black like I had been in a huge boxing match and lost.  I was mortified and my thoughts that should have been on my daughter turned selfishly towards my horrible black and blue face.  I tried a bunch of make-up, ice, etc. and nothing helped.   So here I was, in the spa with these wonderful ladies... obsessing about myself and how I would look walking down the isle with a face that everyone would notice.  I was so unhappy.  Then I
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share the details of your experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. First and foremost, congratulations to your daughter. It was our pleasure to welcome you, her and her closest friends for a special day in the spa. It is wonderful knowing our fantastic team played any role in the happiness that was felt on your daughter’s big day. Summary: This place is magical. They have incredible food and beautiful views. It's right on the ocean and they offer some local activities which is nice. We went whale watching and it was so amazing. We probably saw 5,000 dolphins (unfortunately, no whales though). This place was so perfect in fact my boyfriend actually proposed to me! We went in late May (Memorial Day weekend) and it was a little chilly. One of the staff members said they typically get a 'june bloom' so if we are to return, it would be a little later in the summer. Again, beautiful scenery, just picturesque really.   Reco: Take a walk around the resort. There's a gorgeous park to the north right next door. It was honestly the most pleasant park I've ever seen.   Reco 2: splurge on the massages they offer. We got a 90

Summary Heading: Beautiful resort but rooms were just average
Summary: The staff were incredible, the resort stunning with an incredible view of the ocean. However the room we had was just average. It felt like being in a 3 star hotel. It was supper clean, but did not have that Ritz sophistication you get used to.

We stayed at one of the fireside garden rooms which I highly recommend.

Summary: I will start by saying this is a beautiful resort. This is why I'm giving a poor rating though. We had our annual firm retreat here and brought over 100 attorneys.  The group sales person sold our group the Coastal View rooms as if they were Oceanfront. Although you can see the ocean if you're out on the balcony, you can not see the ocean if you're in the room. This was deceptive and misleading and our attorneys and their families were highly disappointed. Some were accommodated into actual oceanview rooms but they were charged a $150 upgrade fee per night. When the hotel ran out of actual oceanfront rooms, the rest of us had to look at homes next to the hotel.  We feel the hotel's group sales person lied just to get our group in.  Here's karma though: our group does this every
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your comments. We are disappointed to hear that your expectations were not fulfilled.  We take our guest feedback in very high regard and we look forward to speaking with you over the phone.

Summary: The views at this hotel made the stay. The staff were very friendly and the beds were extremely comfortable. My suggestion is to get a fireside ground floor room with a view. It's divine! We will definitely be back.

Summary: Great service and staff.  We booked a pool view room and were given one on the first floor.  The back glass doors open directly to the pool.   I guess it is a good room if you have a family who wants to go right out to the pool but not for privacy.  If the curtains are open, guests at the pool can look into your room.  There isn't a private patio, so other guests use the space between your door and your patio table as a walkway.   We even had one man walk up to our glass door and peek inside.  I was surprised by how much noise can be heard from the hallway through the front door.  From the middle of our room we could hear conversations of other guests walking by the room.  Room service was prompt and good.  Great beach location with beautiful views.

Summary: Was there on business- it was a lovely property- views of water were amazing. Not too pretentious, other than the gold painted fire hydrants! If you struggle walking, ask for a room close to the lobby. The rooms are spaced out, so be prepared for a walk. The 3rd floor is the lobby floor - the 1st is ground level. Nail salon is not in the Spa- I made the mistake.   Surfers were out every day. Wonderful for strolls along the beach and views of the sunset. We found the property riddled with gnats - I was told by the salon that it was due to the moisture. They were annoying and were found in most areas.   I had one of the best massages ever! Deep tissue- highly recommend the spa!
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to detail your luxury experience. It is wonderful to hear you appreciated our stunning views, excellent Spa and beautiful beach area. Summary: The hotel is in a beautiful location on a cliff overlooking the ocean.  There is a shuttle to the beach in the rear of the hotel.  Rooms are typical resort Ritz Carlton.  We stayed in a club room.  The club hosts went above and beyond making you feel like a special guest, however, it is the smallest Ritz Carlton club lounge I have been in.  Pools are just okay and not very big for what I had hoped would be a resort experience.  Yappy Hour once a month for dogs was a nice touch.  Overall, I enjoyed my stay.

They tried to put us far from main pool and from everything... I'm 8,5 months pregnant with 2y.o. and 4 y.o., so we really just wanted to be closer to main pool and on the first floor. Nothing else.  Not even ones we received turn down service... I'm not even sure that towels were changed daily... probably not. At the end we could not find any clean towel to use.  Raya is supposed to be very good... but it's really nothing special..

Summary: Imagining a more idyllic resort setting is difficult - the Ritz Laguna Niguel occupies a spacious site set on a cliff high above the Pacific Ocean near the lovely Laguna Beach-Dana Point area. The sumptuous marble lobby leads through a colonnade to the Bar Raya providing the first panorama of the Pacific. The elongated Raya restaurant continues the view theme while providing high quality culinary selections. The other fine restaurant, enoSTEAK, tacks to the other extreme, offering the warm, intimate paneled atmosphere of a London club. The public spaces thoroughly the property maintain this luxury level.   All of the staff from waitresses to the concierges are knowledgeable and willing. Our visit over a holiday weekend made restaurant reservations difficult, but our concierge

Summary Heading: Club level Ritz Carlton Laguna way to go
Summary: Club level Laguna ritz-Carltonover the top !Club level Ritz Carlton Laguna way to go The exceptional women provide amazing service that makes you feel like a movie star nowhere else to stay in Laguna but club level Ritz Carlton!

Summary: This is not the newest, best RC I've visited, so I give it a rating of 4. The location is beautiful and the front desk staff attentive. However, I think housekeeping is a little slack and our room was a little dated and dingy. The desk chair was stained and the coffee maker had to be taken from the closet where it was housed and moved to the desk to plug it in. I called for additional towels and had to call back after 45 min when no one had arrived. The marble under the bathroom sink was stained. These few points may sound petty, but at a RC property, you would expect perfection. We did enjoy the beach and restaurants, and the concierge was very helpful. With just a few improvements, this property would get 5 stars from me.

Summary Heading: A Magical Stay in one of the Most Beautiful Places on Earth
Summary: Wow I don't even know where to begin. We had an ocean-view room on the 4th (top) floor of the hotel. to say the view was beautiful is an understatement, it was magical. Aside from the beauty outside, the room itself was very comfortable, great size (we even had a crib, with plenty of room to get around), clean and welcoming. The bed is super comfy, and the pillows are just perfect!  The entire staff is wonderful! Everyone treated us so warmly, as if they'd known us forever. They are beyond accommodating, and you really just feel at home in the hotel.  Access to the beach couldn't be any easier with their cart service. They will bring you down and set up your spot in the sand. Each day they brought us down, the staff would set up our chairs, umbrella, towels- and they even had
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share the details of your luxury experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. Summary: Each time we stay at the Club level of this hotel, we have delightful, personalized service of the highest quality. The timing and variation of appetizers, luncheon snacks, evening and dessert treats are excellent. After several visits, we have come to reliably expect the very best.
Manager Response: We are grateful for your review and for your loyalty to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It is heartwarming to know you have been consistently met with exceptional service. We look forward to welcoming you back for more wonderful experiences in the future.

Summary: Sinfully indulgent.  This Ritz is truly among the Best of the Best.  The venue, people, service and accommodations are beyond compare.  Simply one of the best places I've ever stayed.   And if you truly graced and lucky you might get to the Club Floor and meet Shelley!  Just outstanding in all regards.
Manager Response: We are grateful for your kind review and your decision to stay with us in Dana Point. It is fantastic to know you enjoyed so many areas of your experience, from our unbeatable views to our exceptional ladies and gentlemen. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary Heading: Bliss on the Horizon in Laguna Niguel
Summary: I didn't know what to expect from this property but suffice it to say that it surpassed anything I might have imagined. The hotel itself had a lush feel, which was a gorgeous contrast to sections of paths that were quite desert like. I walked down to the beach several afternoons during my stay and took part in a 5k one early morning. Bunnies ducked in and out of bushes and butterflies floated over shrubs. The breeze in off the ocean through the sliding glass door to my balcony was intoxicating. The meals were incredible and the white balsamic dressing they had was the perfect mix of tangy and citrusy. Even after I left, I discovered I had left my medication in the room and the front desk staff worked to get it back to me.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your helpful review and your choice to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It is fantastic to know your expectations were exceeded in so many areas, from our perfect service to our wonderful dining options. We are elated to hear our ladies and gentlemen went above and beyond to ensure you were completely comfortable. We look forward to welcoming you back for another exceptional stay in the near future.

Summary: The Club level at this Ritz is off the charts good. Staff is friendly and gets to know you and will personalize it all.  Take your family and tell your friends, this place is great for a birthday weekend!
Manager Response: We are grateful for the time you have taken to share your review. It was a pleasure to welcome you to Dana Point for your birthday weekend, and we are delighted you enjoyed your experience on our Club Level and beyond. We look forward to welcoming you back for future special occasions.

Summary: We spent five days at the Ritz Carlton in Laguna Beach for my wife's birthday. We had a wonderful,  relaxing and romantic time and we would highly recommend this resort. The staff was very friendly and attentive and the food at Raya's and from room service was outstanding!  Beautiful views of the beach and the beach itself was excellent and a good walking beach.  Just be ready for a good workout when you walk back up from the beach.  They have shuttles but gets your heart going when you walk it.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share the details of your recent luxury experience. It is heartwarming to know you and your wife enjoyed such a memorable visit thanks in part to our wonderful dining options and our perfect service. On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to welcoming you back to The Ritz- Carlton, Laguna Niguel in the near future.

Summary: We were here for a special birthday celebration and this was the perfect location. The staff was friendly and attentive, and the food was excellent. The location is spectacular, and a great property to walk on the beach.
Manager Response: We appreciate your kind review and your decision to stay with us in Dana Point. It was an honor to welcome you for this special birthday celebration, and we are elated knowing your expectations were exceeded. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for another five-star stay soon.

Summary: Hotel is beautiful, the grounds and view are excellent.  Just don't eat at any of the restaurants if you want good service from the managers or hostess.  Servers very nice, managers if you need something or if there is a mistake don't expect any help.  Go off site to eat.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share your helpful review. It is lovely to know you appreciated our stunning Dana Point property. We regret any shortcomings you faced during your time in our dining outlets, and we have passed these comments along to our food and beverage teams. Should you wish to speak further about your experience, we encourage you to contact us directly. It would be our pleasure to speak with you and, hopefully, restore your faith in our hotel.

Summary: Amazing hotel, service, and view Great staff Kid friendly  Acommated our every need  Stay there every year and will continue to do so Mentioned it was our anniversary and they had a surprise for us and the kids  It's the little things that made a big different "Jenny" was great
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share the details of your luxury experience in Dana Point. We are thrilled to hear our stunning views and our welcoming atmosphere continue to exceed your expectations. It is lovely to know you were able to enjoy a special celebration thanks to our one-of-a-kind service. On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary Heading: Beautiful property but a couple hit and misses
Summary: Gorgeous property right on top of the ocean! Our welcome service was amazing but I had to say I was a little disappointed in the condition of our room. Marked up walls, spots on the carpet and the furniture looked worn... you could hear the guests next door and in the hallway which again surprised me. We had a beautiful view, dinner at Raya and our spa services were amazing! The only real downer was the service was extremely slow and not friendly at the marketplace. We will definitely go back and hopefully the areas that were concerning are addressed.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to review your experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It is wonderful to discover that you enjoyed our stunning views and unbeatable Dana Point location. However, we are concerned to hear your guest room, as well as the service you experienced in The Market Place, was anything other than perfect. Your feedback will be passed along to the appropriate departments to be used when making improvements in the future. On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to welcoming you back for an improved experience soon.

Summary: I've been all across the United States staying in Ritz Carltons and other 5 star hotels for several years. This was one of the best locations that I've been to, the view is truly incredible, the food was pretty good, and the location is very close to Pacific Coast HWY and if you needed you could go south towards San Diego or north towards West L.A. and Santa Monica rather easily (as long as you're prepared to deal with the immense amount of traffic, but that's just how California is when you're taking the 405).  I'm a videographer out of Pennsylvania, this hotel provided some really nice footage for the videos that I shoot. I was treated very will (as always) and shown respect (kind of talked up to which was cool considering my age [15]).  All in all I will be back shortly as I
Manager Response: We are truly grateful for the time you have taken to share your five-star review. It is wonderful to discover that our central location and exceptional service exceeded your expectations. We value the time of each of our guests, regardless of age, and we are thrilled you felt well taken care of by our ladies and gentlemen. Next time you are in Dana Point for either business or leisure, we would be delighted to welcome you back.

Summary: We stayed at this beautiful resort for a conference and it was an amazing experience.  The location of the hotel is right above the beach and a short walk down from the hotel.  They also have golf cart shuttles to help people go down or come up from the beach.  The hotel has umbrellas and chairs down by the beach for guests to use.  The main hotel itself is nicely appointed and decorated with fresh flowers daily.  The restaurant and bar serves delicious high end fare and really good seafood.  There is also a quick serve coffee and counter service eatery that has great coffee and delicious scones.  Our room was also immaculate and had turn down service each night.  There are two pool areas in the complex and our room was near the larger main pool.  The pool side bar made great
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It was a pleasure to welcome you to Dana Point for your business-related visit. We are thrilled knowing our exceptional location, wonderful dining and impeccable service all met your expectations. The unique touches you mention — like our fresh flowers and beach shuttle service to the beach — are just a few of the one-of-a-kind features that set our resort apart from others in the area. We are proud knowing you enjoyed a five-star, luxury experience, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable visit in the future.

Summary: Where do you go to get away when you live in Southern California or anywhere else in the world? A Ritz Carlton hotel. This is luxury at its finest. Do it the right way, ocean front room on the Concierge Club level. You can graze all day, be taken care of. Walk on the beach. Sit by the pool, by the fire pit, in a lawn chair. No need to ever leave the property.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share your review. We are thrilled knowing you enjoyed each aspect of your experience, from your time on the beach to your visits to our impressive Club Level. Your kind words mean a great deal, and we are proud to know you would happily recommend our resort. On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: This is the best place to stay, period. The club level and overall hotel experience here is absolutely excellent. Club level is fantastic! My wife and I stay here all the time and we always have a positive experience. The coastline and beach access is absolutely stunning at this location. Just book it!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing the details of your luxury experience. It was our pleasure to welcome you to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel, and we are elated you have enjoyed each of your visits. We are proud to know you have visited on several occasions and have experienced consistently exceptional service. We look forward to welcoming you back for many more memorable experiences in the near future.

Summary Heading: A Beautiful hotel with beautiful views and FANTASTIC service
Summary: This hotel has fabulous views of the ocean and landscape. Their service is outstanding. I mentioned to one of the service people that my bed was uncomfortable and that it gave me a backache. They came and removed the bed and replaced it with a brand new bed. No other hotel that I have stayed in and complained about the bed has ever done anything but give me lip service. This was real service with a smile. The food in the restaurants also was outstanding but a little pricey.
Manager Response: We are grateful for the time you have taken to share your review. It was a pleasure to welcome you to Dana Point, and we are delighted you enjoyed your experience. While we regret any discomfort you experienced, it is lovely to know our ladies and gentlemen handled the situation efficiently and professionally. Next time you are in the area, we look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: We absolutely love this property! This has been the best Ritz property we have ever stayed at in the USA with a phenomenal club lounge/level. Justine at check in was incredibly nice and helped me plan my engagement that evening super discreetly and went off without a hitch!  Jennifer at the club lounge was so helpful and attentive as well and both of them just made our stay really memorable. The rooms are awesome and very well insulated with stunning views of the pacific. This hotel will have a special place in my heart and we will only stay there when we are in socal!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to review your luxury experience. We are thrilled to hear your expectations were exceeded in so many areas, from your time in our Club Lounge to your experience with each of our ladies and gentlemen. It was a pleasure to help you plan your engagement, and we are thrilled it went so well. We wish you and your fiancé the best, and we look forward to welcoming you both back in the future.

Summary: Tied for best view from a fitness center in the country (tied with Fountainbleu on South Beach).  Staff are consistently attentive, the property is well maintained and the cliff-side location is excellent. I think generally its one of the top 3 places to stay in the Dana Point/ Laguna Beach area but I highly recommend that you check first if the hotel is hosting any conference of consequence and choose from the 2 other equally impressive properties nearby if they do have a conference and you aren't part of it.. They tend to use the pool areas and outside rooms for evening entertainment and don't seem to pay a lot of attention to where they place non conference guests relative to location of the events.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your helpful review. It is lovely to know you enjoyed your stay in Dana Point thanks in part to our excellent location and our state-of-a-the-art fitness area. We are pleased you were able to enjoy breathtaking views while you worked out. We are indeed proud to host several groups and conferences each year, but this should never negatively impact your overall experience as a guest. We look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable experience in the future.

Summary: My family and I stayed at the Ritz Carlton on Mother's Day and it was absolutely wonderful. We were treated exquisitely from check in to check out. Brunch in the ballroom was to die for! The Scallop station was a huge hit. Thanks to Austin & Chuck for warmly & genuinely greeting/taking care of us. You made our experience personalized and heavenly.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to review your visit to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It was an honor to welcome you for Mother’s Day, and we are pleased you enjoyed a luxurious experience. On behalf of our all our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Ritz Laguna is situated on a very special piece of property and delivers on stunning views, great service and beautiful environment.  It is a go to place for special event,  celebrations and is great for both couples and family's.  Only negative is it allows cigar smoking on the bar deck and restaurant which also bleeds into the rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. We are proud to host guests for various special occasions and events, and we are thrilled you chose to join us for yours. Your helpful feedback is appreciated and will be used when making improvements in the future. We look forward to sharing more milestones with you in the future.

Summary: You just can't beat the Ritz-Carlton level of service! I've stayed at other "hot" hotel chains (for example, W hotels) and none of them stack up to the old-school level of service you enjoy at The Ritz.
Manager Response: We appreciate your kind review and your decision to stay with us. It was an honor to welcome you to Dana Point, and we are elated knowing you consider The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel to be one of your favorite hotels. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back for another five-star stay.

Summary: Superb location with an old style charm.  The bottom rooms with a fireplace are exceptional.  Pool is heated and nice size.  Spa and fitness room was excellent.  Food on site was delicious.  The grounds were well taken care of and the view of the ocean and surrounding area was amazing, a perfect location to watch a sunset or walk down to the beach and surrounding area. A bit pricey but All Around a definite top location and one not to miss.
Manager Response: We are grateful for the time you have taken to review your experience in Dana Point. We are delighted knowing your expectations were exceeded in each area of your visit, from our state-of-the-art fitness center to our on-property restaurants. It was our pleasure to welcome you to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel, and we look forward to welcoming you back for more beautiful sunsets in the future.

Summary: Property is beautiful - up on a bluff overlooking the Pacific.  The pool is unfortunately in a courtyard with no views (a lost opportunity in my opinion but that's just me being high maintenance. We had a ground-floor firepit room on the side of the hotel with an ocean peek.  Great accommodations, good service from the staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are thrilled our breathtaking property met your expectations. It is lovely to know you were able to take advantage of your private fire place during your visit. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary Heading: Old rooms did not feel very clean
Summary: Beautiful location and great service.  Hotel room is very dated.  Carpets felt dirty, stain in bathroom.  Very disappointing considering the expectation of a four star hotel.  For the same rates, may consider Montage nearby.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for taking the time to share your feedback with us.  Please feel free to contact our office directly to share your concerns.  We would like to restore your faith in our hotel and welcome you back to the resort the next time you are in Dana Point.

Summary: This resort is perched up overlooking the SoCal coast. It's breathtaking. Fabulous five start everything. My favorite part of the resort is the bar restaurant and patio overlooking the ocean. It's wonderful. The dining room inside has huge windows overlooking the sea and the hotel bar is wonderful as well. I was here last summer and again in May and both times were wonderful moments to take in the coast and the sea.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share your review. It is heartwarming to know you enjoyed such a memorable experience thanks in part of our stunning views and perfect service. On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to welcoming you back to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel in the near future.

Summary Heading: Beautiful Views Pleasant Staff Food just average  Hotel just Ok
Summary: I stayed at the Ritz Carlton Dana Point in late April.  The checkin process was very quick with the girl acknowledging my name and Elite status.  The room was large with a desk 2 night stands a small chair and a stand for a dvd player.  The room has a small safe and refrigerator.  They also provide 2 small bottles of water that were replaced every day.    The balcony in my room overlooked the pool and was very quiet.  The balcony has enough room for a couple of chairs and a small table.  The lighting in the room is all led's.  Unfortunately there is no desk light and the positioning of the lights makes it difficult to illuminate the desk properly.  The pool is large but just ordinary.  Also because it is located close to guest rooms the hours are very short.  The hot tube is
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share the details of your time at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are elated to hear you experienced friendly service in our beautiful Dana Point setting. While we are pleased your expectations were met, we are disappointed knowing your luxury experience was anything but perfect. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back in the future for a stay that more closely meets our standard of excellence.

Summary: Great real estate, great staff, average facility and rooms. You typically have higher expectations for a Ritz property at this price. Its perch above the Pacific is outstanding, however the rooms seem tired and worn.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We greatly appreciate your choice to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel and are glad you enjoyed the views and our amazing location; however, we are disappointed to know you were not completely satisfied by your experience.
