Summary Heading: Five Star Prices for Average Hotel
Summary: The Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel is an average hotel with over the top prices.  The best asset of the hotel is the view of the ocean, but the rest of the experience is just getting nickled and dimed for everything.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your helpful review and your choice to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. Summary: The location was the perfect venue for our business conference. For those not located close to the Pacific, they were in awe of our surrounding. The conference was superb and staff was exceptional. My family joined me on this business trip and they were greeted with personalized service that went above and beyond anything we expected.

Summary: This is a great location on big Pacific Ocean bluff about 20-25 miles south of John Wayne airport in Irvine CA .  Low rise (4story) with a bend in the property that matches the shoreline. Normal / high standard Ritz service and polite staff. It's also close to other services if you want to wander off property. Enjoy watching surfers from high above during all daylight hours.

Summary: Celebrated our 29th anniversary here and was not disappointed. The hotel is beautiful with stunning ocean views. What sets this property apart is the incredible, friendly service provided by all the staff.

Summary: Love this hotel from moment walk in with most beautiful flowers stunning through out the hotel. Rooms fantastic ask for ground floor opening to lawn over ocean. Great restaurants perfect business lunch or dinner or conference.  My favourite due to elegance and service.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review. We are thrilled your expectations were exceeded from the moment you arrived. It is lovely to discover that you enjoyed not only our comfortable guest rooms, but our welcoming public spaces and delicious dining options as well. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: The Ritz Carlton here in Laguna Niguel was my first hotel ever experienced many years ago and yes it did ruined all the hotel stays after that. hahaha.  there is no comparison, the beautiful breathtaking view, excellent trained hotel staffs, and the room. thanks to my parents for spoiling me for life.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate the time you have taken to review your experience in Dana Point. It brings us great joy to know our property has played an important role in your life and that you have enjoyed each of your visits to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We look forward to welcoming you back for many more memorable stays in the future.

Summary: The hotel is beautifully located along the Pacific and the staff mostly is very good and accommodating.  The room cleaning service (chambermaid?) was a bit out of her depth, and couldn't figure out when to clean the room or turn down the room, so, for example, our bed remained unmade (and room not cleaned) until dinner time one day.  The car valet service was excellent, but at $40/day, I though I was back in Manhattan!  Overall, there was little to complain about, but given the ultra-premium prices they charge, I was disappointed; they just didn't seem to go the extra mile.  For example, Even though it's main competitor, just up the road, offers free local shuttle services, the Ritz doesn't.  Next time I am in Laguna, I will stay at the Montage.    Our room was on the first
Manager Response: We are grateful for your review and your choice to stay with us at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. Summary: I brought my wife and 4-month old infant here for a weekend getaway. The whole crew was a class act; from the greeter Larry at the valet, to Julia at check in, and Patrick who delivered the luggage to the room. Patrick saw we had an infant, made sure to grab extra water, double check on the status of the crib, and made sure turndown service would come before the child's bedtime.   When the crib arrived in the room, I was impressed. A Ritz Kids welcome card, a full box of Tiny Travelers toiletries from Johnson and Johnson, a first aid kit with plug covers for the electrical sockets, and a Ritz Carlton rubber ducky.   Samantha the guest relations coordinator made sure there was a bottle of champagne and chocolate covered strawberries in the room before our arrival, a small gift to
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share the details of your experience in Dana Point. It is fantastic to know our courteous ladies and gentlemen, thoughtful amenities and family-friendly atmosphere exceeded your expectations. We were honored to welcome your family for your wife’s birthday celebration, and we are thrilled you enjoyed a five-star experience. Summary Heading: Fantastic property with stunning views of the coast line
Summary: The Ritz-Carlton at Laguna Niguel is a superb property with attention to detail at every turn as well as having breathtaking views.  The staff members are extremely welcoming and friendly.  I would suggest this particular location to be put at the top of anyone's bucket list.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your kind feedback. It is lovely to know you enjoyed your visit to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel thanks to our stunning views and friendly ladies and gentlemen. We look forward to welcoming you back to Dana Point in the near future.

Summary: This resort is located high on a cliff next to the Pacific ocean providing a stunning view all around. Besides its two pools, workout facility, sauna, valet parking, yoga classes, etc, it provides shuttle rides to beach along with chairs, towels, umbrellas, water, etc.  It has very nice restaurant with limited variety of meals.  Staff was extremely nice and the facility is outstanding.  It is difficult to find anything to complaint about.  Here are a few things that can be improved.  Before we changed out room after 2 days, our safe was not working and it took several attempts over 2 days to fix it with some part the staff had to get, our toilet room in the bathroom had the wall paper peeling;  printer did not work in the cubicles provided for guest to use computer and when I
Manager Response: We are truly grateful for the time you have taken to share your five-star review. It is wonderful to discover that our stunning views, one-of-a-kind amenities and delicious restaurants all exceeded your expectations. We appreciate your feedback regarding our bathrooms, saunas and our business center. We will certainly pass these comments along to the appropriate teams. Next time you are planning a family vacation, we hope you will consider returning for another five-star, luxury experience.

Summary: The entire staff is so focused on customer service, greeting us by name, helping us with the right room that would be close to an exit for our little dog, giving us water bottles for our ride home, AND the staff all look like they walked out of the pages of GQ. Staying at this hotel is like staying in another world; a very beautiful, polite and calming world
Manager Response: We appreciate your kind review and your decision to visit The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It is marvelous to hear you enjoyed a perfect visit thanks in part to our exceptional service, unique amenities and overall relaxing atmosphere. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary: The view at RC laguna niguel is amazing. The service is higher than averge. The room is dated but you may not stay in room too much.  It should be execellent, by considering amazing view and the CI guy is really nice to our 6-year-old. The negetive part comes from the pre-arrival communication.  A week before the CI data, there was an email that said they need your information and want to know you trip details. I send the information back and mentioned we re travel about my wife birthday. The response was very positive, they asked you perfer cholocate or cake, and they will prepare some celebratory amenity for my wife. So far so good. But when we arrived, there are nothing. Here is what I want to say. We got what we paid and I don't need the gift and amenity from the hotel. But
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review. It is fantastic to discover that you enjoyed impeccable service throughout your luxury experience. It is troubling to know your wife was not met with the promised birthday amenity upon your arrival. We apologize for this oversight and hope you were still able to celebrate accordingly. If you would like to further discuss your experience, we encourage you to contact us directly. It would be our pleasure to learn more about your time with us and, hopefully, restore your faith in our hotel.

Summary Heading: Beautiful Property Marred by Multiple Minor Issues
Summary: My fiance and I traveled to the Ritz Laguna Niguel for my birthday. As per usual the hotel asked if we were celebrating anything so we informed them it was my birthday.   When we got to the hotel there was a misunderstanding about our stay... We were redeeming two reward nights, and we had one paid night that was upgraded to the club level (through a certificate). To add to that, I made things more challenging by requesting to not have to move rooms. Two staff members informed me that to have club access you must stay on the club floor. However, once I asked a manager he was able to fix it so we didn't have to move.   The hotel itself was fantastic, perfectly perched on the short cliff, with outstanding views. Because we were a gold member they gave us a  room with a great view,
Manager Response: We appreciate your review and your choice to stay with us in Dana Point. It was an honor to share this special celebration with you, and we are pleased you enjoyed your upgraded room and time on the beach. We sincerely apologize for any miscommunication regarding your birthday. It is always our priority to acknowledge milestones and other important times in our guests’ lives. Furthermore, we regret any lapses in housekeeping that you encountered. We are pleased to know you would consider returning, and we look forward to welcoming you back for a stay that more closely meets our standard of excellence.

Summary: I'm writing this so as to prepare you to lower your expectations of the personal services and attention offered by the Ritz Carlton brand.  Concierge excellent. Room Service excellent. Housekeeping, some days the room was not cleaned. Bare essentials were not re-supplied.  Paper cups for in-room coffee, fine for your highway motel, here, not so much. Rooms, dated and definitely non-elegant. Pool service for food, extremely slow and extremely sporadic.  The staff sweet but understaffed. The need to double-call valet to double-check they really-really have your car ready.  An extraordinary location with a beach and views to die for.  I suppose it then becomes easy for a hazy management team and chill workers to skate-on-into-California-Dreamin'.  I hope this is not enough to
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share the details of your visit to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are delighted knowing your expectations were exceeded by our stunning location and extraordinary views. However, it disappoints us to discover that other areas of your experience were anything less than perfect. We pride ourselves on exceptional service, and we regret any shortcomings you may have encountered. On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we would be proud to welcome you back for a much-improved visit in the future.

Summary Heading: Spectacular setting; Top notch customer service
Summary: The setting is breathtaking; What truly makes the experience at this hotel memorable is the attention to detail and personalized customer service of the staff. I brought my finance here as a surprise getaway following a long deployment.  The Laguna Nigel staff exceeded my expectations and went above and beyond to make our stay memorable.  The location is fantastic for enjoying CA outdoor activities (Salt Creek beach has great surfs, running trails with stunning views are just steps out the front door).  Of note, the lobster tacos at 180Blu are a must try.  One consideration rooms is are not quite soundproof.  If you are a light sleeper, consider brining ear plugs.
Manager Response: We appreciate the moment you have taken to share the details of your experience in Dana Point. While we are pleased to know you enjoyed our location and dining options, we are most delighted by your experience with our ladies and gentlemen. We are proud to provide exceptional service to each of our guests, and we are thrilled you enjoyed perfection. Should you find yourself planning a getaway in the future, we would be honored to welcome you back for another luxury experience.

Summary Heading: Slice of heaven on this earth
Summary: You could never want for anymore. Not ever.  The hotel is beyond gorgeous. The views from the cliff was breathtaking every minute. The landscaping was so beautiful. The staff was so friendly and sweet. Especially Sean at reception. He was so helpful with all our needs. Always sweet nothing was too much for him to help us with.  This hotel has become my favorite. I think this beat out the Four seasons in Maui. You have to go and experience the atmosphere. It's pure heaven. Really really go here.
Manager Response: We are grateful for the time you have taken to share your kind review. It is fantastic to hear that you enjoyed each aspect of your luxury experience, from our stunning views to our exceptional service. We are honored knowing you consider our hotel to be one of your favorites. We look forward to welcoming you back soon for another trip to Dana Point.

Summary Heading: Best setting in the USA and service to match!
Summary: I travel the world and stay in Ritz Carlton's over 50 nights per year! The Laguna Niguel property is my favorite by far. The service is impeccable and the views amazing! Sitting outside having wine at night watching the sunset is surreal! The beach is spectacular! And above all, the people who work there treat every guest with incredible personal attention!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and for your continued loyalty to our hotel. We are truly thrilled knowing our hotel is your favorite in the world thanks to our impeccable service and unbeatable location in Dana Point. On behalf of all of our dedicated ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary: Stayed at the Ritz in April 2017, this was my 2nd time at the Ritz and it didn't disappoint. Hotel itself is amazing, there's always a view of the pacific ocean when walking. Room were spacious, bathroom was modern, bed was a little soft for me. Overall its an amazing hotel.
Manager Response: We appreciate your five-star review and are pleased you enjoyed your second visit to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It is lovely to discover that your expectations were exceeded by our stunning ocean views and our comfortably appointed guest rooms. On behalf of all of our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: A Truly Amazing Anniversary at the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel
Summary: My wife and I are truly in awe of the amazing service-oriented and talented professionals at this beautiful Ritz Carlton location!   From the helpful support from the front desk from Natalie when I first confirmed my reservation over the phone, all the way to Justine at the front desk who was so incredibly gracious and supportive of our 18 year wedding anniversary.  She spent time finding the perfect room for us to make it a magical lifetime memory!  Thank you Justine!!!  The 180 Blue experience was exceptional, with the amazing music of Ryan Heflin at sunset!  It doesn't get better than Ryan Heflin and that 180 degree view of the Pacific!   The food quality there was excellent for afternoon lunch served by Kimberly.     The enoSteak restaurant was a truly supreme dinner
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to detail your experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are proud to know that you and are wife enjoyed such a fantastic visit. It was our pleasure to welcome you for this special anniversary celebration, and we are happy your trip was so perfect. You paint a beautiful picture of your night at 180blu, from our unbeatable views of the Pacific to our live music at sunset. Your kind praises will be passed along to each one of our ladies and gentlemen, as they will be happy to know you were satisfied with their service. It is marvelous to know you plan to return, and we hope your next trip to Dana Point comes sooner rather than later.

Summary: This was one Of The nicest hotel I've stayed in in America. The view from the hotel is so amazing and watching the Su set was more than breath taking. I enjoyed training at the gym and watching over the ocean ...  we had a beautiful to watching over the garden and the ocean.we had a fire place on the balcony
Manager Response: We are grateful for your kind review. It is fantastic to know you consider our hotel to be among your favorites in the country. We are delighted knowing you enjoyed your time in our fitness center as well as your nights spent by your private fire place. Next time you are on the West Coast, we would be proud to host you again.

Summary: We stayed with our kids (17/15) and they loved it. The views are just amazing, Laguna is so pretty. They have a bar at the top of the building (180 Blu) with heater, definitely a cool place to spend time (kids were fine as well). If you don't like the food there, you can get something in the cafe and bring it up there (we did that for breakfast) - what a great way to star the day. They have golf carts to bring you back and forth to the beach and they will set up chairs/umbrella - only downside is the beach in this area is very thing (not a lot of real estate), but you can swim/surf right there. We ate out most of the time, which I would recommend since there are so many good options. We ate at Raya one night - my opinion, a bit over priced and not a ton of options, but it was
Manager Response: We are grateful for the time you have taken to review your family getaway at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It is fantastic to know you were able to take advantage of not only our beach area, but our fitness facilities and dining outlets as well. It was our pleasure to welcome your beautiful family, and we are thrilled you enjoyed a memorable experience in Dana Point. Should you wish to return in the future, we would be happy to welcome you back.

Summary Heading: Spectacular views and Ritz Service a great combination
Summary: The customer service at the Ritz is unmatched by any hotel and the staff at Laguna Niguel is top notch. Traveling with my very young grandchildren 7, 5, and 3 was enjoyable due to the accommodating staff. Cary brought our bags to the room and told the kids they were entitled to a 2 movies and he would cover the cost. You can imagine their excitement. The room was great but we soon realized that the ground floor would be more suitable for the children. Cary helped us change rooms on the other side of the hotel with a gracious smile. The ground floor was perfect as it abutted a grand lawn area suitable for some afternoon soccer and kickball. Also, no worries about falling over the balcony with a climbing 3 year old.  The bar restaurant overlooking the ocean was the best option
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your helpful review and your choice to visit us in Dana Point. It is fantastic to know your expectations were exceeded by our impeccable service, comfortable guest rooms and unique activities. Our courteous ladies and gentlemen are always happy to help you feel as comfortable as possible. We are thrilled you got settled into the perfect room for your family. We regret any times you may have experienced less than perfect service, and we are pleased this did not detract from the five-star quality of your visit. Should you wish to return for another getaway with your grandchildren, we would be honored to welcome you back.

Summary: The hotel is set on a cliff with one of the most stunning ocean views that I have seen.  The hotel itself is top notch with fantastic service and facilities.  The gym is arguably the most gorgeous gums of any hotel in the world thanks to huge windows that overlook the ocean.  The internet worked flawlessly with fantastic speeds.  My only complaint is the phone next to the toilet that gets smacked into when you reach back to flush.  I can tell that this had happened many times.    Not that this is a surprise, but prices onsite are extremely expensive.  A cheeseburger at the pool is $26.  Poolside cocktails are $16.  A cup of tea in the coffee shop is $5.50.  And these are the cheapest places onsite to eat.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to review your visit to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are thrilled to know your expectations were exceeded in so many areas, from our stunning views to our state-of-the-art fitness facilities. We are proud to provide the best in terms of service, accommodations and overall atmosphere, and we are happy you enjoyed a five-star experience. Your comments regarding the in-bathroom phone have been noted and will be passed along to the appropriate departments. We hope you will return for another visit soon.

Summary: The garden/pool view room is true to the photographs online. I like that there's an empty mini fridge in the room - it gives me the option to head out and buy some fruit to eat poolside, if I wished. I like that the entrance to the bathroom is away from the bedroom (the bathroom door faces the "hallway" in the room). The bathroom is pretty large, with beautiful marble and mirrors. I would suggest they install some shelf under the sink, as keeping the hairdryer in the closet was not intuitive. I wish there was a way to enjoy the sounds of an open balcony without the bugs, but that's not a fault of the hotel.   The spa was GREAT. I had a deep tissue massage with Donna and it was 10/10. I feel like a new person! I think the steam room and sauna can use some TLC and adjustments. I'd
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your review. It sounds as if your time in our spa was the highlight of your visit, and we are delighted you experienced such a relaxing treatment. Next time you find yourself in Dana Point, we would be thrilled to welcome you back for an all-around exceptional experience.

Summary: Cannot think of a better place and location to enjoy our stay. We decided to have a short vacation and wished we have made it a lot longer. Even the weather was great. And the concierge at the club level were just superb.
Manager Response: We appreciate your kind feedback and are thrilled you enjoyed a perfect experience. It was a pleasure to welcome you, even if just for a short time. We hope to have the opportunity to host you for a longer, even more memorable stay in the future.

Summary: We made a last minute decision to head to Laguna for Easter and we are all glad we did.  So here is the good and bad.  Good: We are Marriott rewards members and upon arrival our room had been upgraded to a deluxe double with a coastal view.  This was a nice surprise and for another $250 we could have upgraded to a coastal fireplace room, but with two children in tow two beds was a necessity.    The service from the front desk and restaurants (minus the poolside attendants) was spot on.  Very nice and accommodating.  They were all for helping make Easter wonderful and ensuring that the bunny delivered baskets to our room for the kids Easter morning. Valet is great and the property is immaculate.  Never trash or a mess anywhere.   The Marriott rewards also earned us $60 towards
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share the details of your time at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are grateful for your helpful feedback as well as your loyalty. From your Easter Brunch at Raya to your time on the beach, we are elated to discover that your expectations were consistently exceeded. It is fantastic to know you not only enjoyed family bonding, but that you were able to mingle and enjoy time with our other guests as well. We are thankful for your feedback regarding our guest rooms, bathrooms, turn down service and other areas that may not have been perfect. These comments have been noted and will all be used when making improvements to our property in the future. It was a pleasure to welcome your beautiful family for this holiday celebration, and we hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: The club level at Ritz Laguna was above all we have encountered. Especially the lead people. Penny was AMAZING. She made us feel extremely welcome all of the time. We will return because of her. The others were also above par.
Manager Response: We are grateful for your review and your choice to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We promise nothing but the best in terms of service and accommodations, and we are thrilled you experienced perfection. Your kind words will be passed along to our ladies and gentlemen. We look forward to your next visit to Dana Point.

Summary: This hotel is great. My wife and I would definitely stay here again.    Pros: -location: beautiful spot, amazing views. Great walking and running trails along the beach.  -service: we received top notch service from the front desk at check in to the bellman who helped us with the bags.   -room: our room had a head-on sea view and it was well worth it.  Amazing sunset night after night.  The room amenities were great, up to date and comfortable.  -Check out the outdoor bar for amazing views.  -gym: great gym with an even better view. Tall windows with ocean views.   Cons: -one of my biggest issues was with the Ritz Marketplace. It's a convenience store-like area in the lobby where they offer coffee, sandwiches, waters, wine etc. What upset me is that in the wine section they
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your visit to Dana Point. We are thrilled knowing you and your wife enjoyed an exceptional stay. It is magnificent to hear your expectations were exceeded in so many areas, from our proximity to the beach to the incredible views from our fitness facilities. We are disappointed that you were not fond of the wine selection in The Market Place. We appreciate your comments and will relay this feedback, as well as that concerning our security, to the appropriate departments. Should you find yourself on the West Coast again, we would be thrilled to welcome you back for an all-around exceptional stay.

Summary: We went to the Ritz for our Anniversary. From arrival to check-out they continually referred to us by name. It is a simple thing, but made me think that they appreciated and remembered us.  We had an amazing dinner at enoSteak for our Anniversary. The staff there was courteous and knowledgeable.
Manager Response: We are grateful for your review and your choice to spend this special occasion with us. It is spectacular to know you enjoyed so much aspects of your experience, from our one-of-a-kind service to your meal in enoSTEAK. We look forward to sharing future anniversary celebrations with you.

Summary: We spent 4 days at this property. It was lovely. The service superb.     Check-in was thorough and the desk agent took the time to explain the resort to us. The only blimp in our entire 4 day stay was our first few minutes…..she  listed our amenities as a FHR Platinum Amex reservation which included space available upgrade. When I asked her if there were any upgrades available she looked and said “ no”. A minute later as the welcome monologue continued she asked us if “we would like to upgrade our room” with the implication there would be a rate increase if we did. It was a little off putting and confusing to be told no Amex upgrade but then offered one if we were to pay for it.       We were in a club level coastal view room. Adequate well-appointed room, albeit a little
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you haven taken to share the details of your stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are thrilled knowing you enjoyed a five-star, luxury experience thanks in part to our fantastic service and your time in our Club Lounge. We regret any miscommunication that may have occurred upon your check in, and we hope you were made to feel completely comfortable in your room. Should you wish to return, we would be happy to assist in booking a room with the perfect view for you. On behalf of each of our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to your next trip to Dana Point.

Summary: This hotel has one of the most beautiful settings you could ask for,  The views from the Hotel are stunning.  The staff was extremely welcoming and always displayed a "can do" attitude which is refreshing these days, and greatly appreciated.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We are proud to know you were pleased with our unbeatable views and friendly ladies and gentlemen. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back for another memorable experience in the future.

Summary Heading: Outstanding Family Vacation--Family of four with two young daughters
Summary: I don't usually write reviews because when I get home from a vacation, I am right back into the swing of thing with work and parenting etc.  However, we had such a fantastic stay that I decided I must share and give recognition where it is due.    We stayed during the Easter week for a family vacation/early wedding anniversary.  Everything from the view, to the service and amenities is truly outstanding.    Valet Staff: Kevin in valet was extraordinary.  He remembered the finest details such as our young daughter's names.  Every time he saw them he asked how they were enjoying their stay.  We never had to wait for our vehicle, it was available immediately upon request.  There was a busy conference one of the days of our stay, and even then, we didn't experience any wait.
Manager Response: We are truly grateful for the time you have set aside in order to write your generous review. It was an honor to welcome you for a special holiday weekend, and we are thrilled to know you enjoyed a perfect, luxury experience. While we are pleased to know you enjoyed our spacious guest rooms, excellent restaurants and relaxing pool area, it is most heartwarming to know that our dedicated ladies and gentlemen made you feel completely at home. We are proud to provide the absolute best in terms of service, and it is fantastic to know you experienced just this. The small gestures you mention are just a few examples of the caring attention that sets our resort apart. On behalf of each one of our ladies and gentlemen, we hope to welcome you back either next Easter or sooner.

Summary: This stay at Ritz Carlton has been wonderful.  The experience at the spa was top quality with very attentive therapists.  Both Nicole and Mickey were superb.  The food was excellent and the service was attentive but with a few lapses in punctuality.  The location of the hotel is excellent with easy beach access.  There are some empty walls here and there along long walkways in public areas needing some art work. Hotel staff was friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share your feedback. We are elated knowing you were able to take advantage of our spa, as well as our many restaurants while you were in Dana Point. Your kind words will be passed along to our ladies and gentlemen. If you are still on property, please contact us directly with any specific requests you may have. We would be happy to do what we can to make the rest of your experience as comfortable as possible. If you have already departed, we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary Heading: Great site, but some complacency in service standards
Summary: This hotel occupies a stunning position overlooking the Pacific.  I had some very good experiences including a wonderful massage in the spa, but I felt some of the staff took advantage of a captive audience.  Others were great such as the valet parking staff.  Given the stratospheric prices I believe it's appropriate to expect the highest standards everywhere with no inconsistencies.
Manager Response: We are grateful for the time you have taken to share your review. It is lovely to know you were able to take advantage of our luxurious spa while you were here. However, it is disappointing to know you experienced inconsistencies in service. We hope you will return in the future for a stay that more closely meets The Ritz-Carlton standard of perfection.

Summary: The hotel is beautiful and the room was very comfortable.  I stayed only one night but wish I was able to stay longer.  If I had it to do over again I'd get an ocean view on the first floor for easier access to watch the sunset. I recommend skipping the bar to watch the sunset and rather grab a glass of wine and sit along the cliffs in the chairs provided.  It would be an excellent spot to have a picnic.  Take a sweater.  All of the service at check in/out, market, and the restaurants was excellent.  I enjoyed the brunch at Raya on Sunday and it is worth the wait to get a table in front of the windows for the view.  Overall it was a great stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review. While we wish you could have enjoyed a longer experience, we are pleased your expectations were exceeded during your one-night visit. It is lovely to know you were able to watch the sunset while enjoying a glass of wine on the bluff. Your kind praises will be passed along to each of our ladies and gentlemen, from our front desk staff to our team in The Market Place and Raya. Next time you are in Dana Point, we would be delighted to welcome you for another five-star experience.

Summary: This hotel never, ever disappoints.  We have been going to the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel for the past 9 years with our children (now ages 11 & 15).  At no point during our 11 days this year did the kids get bored or not have an absolutely fabulous time. The Club Level is worth the extra $.  Being able to quickly grab a bite for breakfast or a glass of wine prior to getting to your dinner reservation is priceless.  The pool area is sunny & spotless with a great pool menu. The gym overlooks the Pacific ocean with views that are to die for! You may actually forget you are working out.  The 180Blue restaurant has a great menu with small plates and they make it easy if you want a bigger meal as you can order off the restaurant menu as well.  Don't miss the sunsets from this
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for your loyalty to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It has been our pleasure to welcome your beautiful family for almost a decade, and we are proud knowing you have experienced consistently wonderful service. We are delighted that both you and your children have enjoyed our delicious dining, exceptional Club Level and state-of-the-art fitness facilities. As your tenth visit approaches, we encourage you to contact us directly if we can assist with booking in any way. It would be our pleasure to do whatever we can to make your next experience your best yet.

Summary: We love this place, and have made it an annual retreat. The setting is gorgeous, and the hotel grounds, especially in April, are just a beautiful, flowering garden. They bring that garden inside with fresh flowers throughout the public indoor spaces and rooms. The 180blue is a spectacular outdoor bar overlooking the cliffs and the ocean. Cannot say enough....go....enjoy....and if you can, move to the Club level. The staff is amazing.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your review. It has been an honor to welcome you for several stays over the years, and we are thrilled to know you have enjoyed each one. We are proud to provide a one-of-a-kind experience through our unbeatable location, stunning views and wonderful ladies and gentlemen. As you plan your next experience, please contact us directly if there is anything we can do to assist. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: This is a great beach walker's hotel with great ocean views, food, service and beautiful floral arrangements
Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed our one week stay. The Club Lounge on the 4th Floor is well worth the extra cost. The food is excellent and the people are warm, friendly and go out of their way to please everyone. The ocean views in the Fitness  Room and Raya Restaurant are the best. We've travelled a lot and this is a wonderful location. The only disappointment was we could not get an ocean view room because we booked a week before coming. The floral displays in the hotel and outside in the landscaping are truly beautiful.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate the time you have taken to detail your experience. It is heartwarming to know you enjoyed so many aspects of your stay, from your time in our Club Lounge to your meal at Raya. Knowing you are well traveled leads us to cherish your kind words even more. Please do not hesitate to contact us directly before your next stay, as we would be happy to assist in booking a room with the perfect view. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Maybe posting a review will get management to acknowledge our concerrns.
Summary: We are in our second of three nights at this property, and were looking forward to another Ritz Carlton experience.  Unfortunately, it has been nothing to look forward to.  Yes, the view of the Pacific is great when you can see it.  We were deposited in a room with no view, unless you consider chain link fencing and a compost bin "a view".  The room is as far as physically possible from the hotel's ameniities and the entrance, making everything you do a trek.  Despite being a Ritz Carlton "premium" hotel, there are no power outlets for guest use on one side of the bed.  Instead, there is the wire cluster sitting on the floor, not hidden behind furniture, that is shown in the attached picture. As others have noted, the hotel is tired and showing signs of neglected maintenance.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience.  We are concerned about your satisfaction and would appreciate speaking to you in person.  Please contact our Manager on Duty at your earliest convenience so we can further discuss your feedback and ensure we have resolved the issues to your satisfaction.  Our Manager on Duty and our Executive Offices can be reached at (949) 240-2000.  Thank you again for letting us know of the issues you are currently encountering.  We sincerely apologize and we look forward to speaking with you soon.

Summary Heading: Who is spending $1K/night here and why ?
Summary: First, I'm Platinum so I travel a great deal for pleasure. I've been to 50 countries and enjoyed many fine hotels and resorts in the world. I believe I have a pretty good of what to expect for this level of hotel. I had a reasonably high expectation as I expected to be coming back frequently as I live in Los Angeles (an hour away).   Good: Valet was nice, responsive, and responsible.  Staff answering the phones were helpful and very polite.   One pool was completely empty which was really great.   Bad: Room service breakfast was $90 for 2 dishes, that were not good. Fortunately, for Platinum you get a $60/daily breakfast credit. Food and service at their main restaurant was below average and expensive.   Housekeeping came into my room at 11:15 am when through the Privacy sign
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share these details of your visit to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are grateful for your loyalty to our brand and appreciate your choice to visit us in Dana Point. It is wonderful to know you experienced efficient service from our ladies and gentlemen in valet as well as a relaxing experience by one of our pools. Aside from these positive aspects, we are disappointed to hear about the areas of your visit that did not exceed expectations. It is uncharacteristic that our ladies and gentlemen are anything but friendly, polite and helpful, and we regret any shortcomings you noticed in housekeeping or by our main pool. We are concerned by the situations you have described, and we would like to learn more about your overall experience. At your earliest convenience, we ask you to please contact us directly. We would appreciate the opportunity to speak with you further and restore your faith our hotel.

Summary: Property has fantastic views. The service was not at all what one would expect from a 5 star property. It seemed the entire hotel was under staffed. The attention to the details were just not there. I experienced a wonderful massage. In room service was the best food experience. Overall very disappointed with our stay there.
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest review. We are pleased that you enjoyed your massage and our amazing views. However, we are disappointed that other aspects of your stay were not to your satisfaction. Please feel free to contact our office if you would like to discuss your experience further. We hope to have the opportunity to restore your faith in our resort.

Summary: For wedding events; Christian Folse Michèle F. Knudtson, they have done a great job!!  Thank you. I would recommend this hotel to anyone who is looking to have a very special wedding. Great planning, service, location and staff.
Manager Response: We are grateful for your generous review. We are proud to host events of all kind, and it is fantastic to hear you enjoyed the wedding you attended. It is always an honor to play a role in a special occasion such as this, and we are delighted your expectations were exceeded. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: The ladies and gentlemen of the Ritz Carlton truly embrace customer service and anticipating a guests needs.  Allison, in Guest Relations, goes above any measure of customer service to provide a memorable stay.  Patrick, in Bell Services, is amazing and makes it a pleasure to stay at the Ritz
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your lovely feedback. It is heartwarming to know that you were met with impeccable service from our wonderful ladies and gentlemen. We look forward to your next trip to Dana Point.

Summary Heading: The view that can be hardly replicated; same for the service!
Summary: Staying at the Club Level comes with a hefty price tag but it has never been more worth it. Phenomenal service by Penni and her team of concierges (Jenny, Colleen, et al) and attendants (Alida, Gabby et al) pamper you all day with phenomenal lattes and great cocktails. The homey and quaint club has one terrace with a view of the sea, and will be my only nitpick. Fair warning: do not show the kids their ridiculous candy wall, and desserts in the evening are sublime.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are thrilled you were able to enjoy our exceptional Club Level while you were here. Your praises will be passed along to each one of our hardworking ladies and gentlemen, as they will all be pleased to hear you were satisfied. Next time you are in the area, we would be delighted to welcome you for another memorable experience.

Summary: Took my sister and her fiancé here for an overnight getaway before their wedding and it was amazing.  From the moment we drove up to the entrance to the moment we drove away, everyone was great.  Warm and friendly.  The views from across the property are so beautiful. We ate one night in Raya for dinner - wow, great service and food to perfection.  Room service the next morning was also fantastic.   The IRD gentleman was so friendly and engaged.  Jonathan at the Front Desk checked us in and out again the next morning.  He was great!  Very accommodating to our special occasion needs and ensured everything went well before we left.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate the time you have taken to share your review. We were honored to welcome you, your sister and her fiancé for a special night in Dana Point. It is fantastic to know you enjoyed each aspect of your visit, from your time in Raya to your experience with our courteous ladies and gentlemen. We will certainly pass your praises on to the team. We hope to have the chance to welcome you back to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel in the future.

Summary: Allison, the Concierge, went out of her way to make out stay memorable and special! She ensured that everywhere we went, our special celebration was acknowledged and that we received extra thoughtful touches! I am so grateful that she was so thoughtful about every detail from start to end!
Manager Response: We are grateful for the time you have taken to share your review. It is wonderful to know your special weekend was made even more memorable thanks to all of our ladies and gentlemen. They will be thrilled to hear you were satisfied with your luxury experience. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Below Average - Expected more from a Ritz Carlton
Summary: The hotel definitely has a great view but the hotel itself is very dated. We used points for our stay - would have been extremely disappointed if we would have paid the full price.  Very overpriced.   Upon check in they were not willing to upgrade to a nicer room with a view.  Other places have done this for us with no problem. The room as dated along with the bathroom. The food was below average at best and very expensive. The poolside lounge chairs were uncomfortable. The poolside service was pretty much nonexistent.  The bartender couldn't make a decent cocktail. Ate dinner one night at Raya.  Very overpriced and the food was below average.  The service was below average.  We waited forever for drinks, food and our check. They kept bringing more bottled water and pouring it
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. While we are pleased to know you enjoyed our Pacific Ocean views, we are disappointed to hear that other areas of your stay did not meet expectations. It is our priority to provide a perfect experience through impeccable service, outstanding accommodations and an overall luxurious atmosphere. We regret any areas in which you may have noticed shortcomings, and we would like to learn more about these issues. Please do not hesitate to contact us directly so we may work to rectify this situation. We hope to have the opportunity to restore your face in our Dana Point hotel.

Summary: Best hotel Ive ever stayed at in Southern California! The staff were so nice and professional especially greeting by name. I cant wait to stay there again but I hope longer next time. I had the firepit in our room which was both fun and romantic.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your stay in Dana Point. We are thrilled to know you enjoyed a perfect experience thanks in part to our friendly ladies and gentlemen and stunning location. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back for a longer visit in the future.

Summary: Marriott platinum member here. Redeemed 300k points for 6 nights. Never used that many points at once so I had very high expectations. Arrived at 10 am, didn't get an upgrade at first but they said that if I come back in a few days they will upgrade me based on availability.   Staff was professional, friendly, and incredibly helpful. Restaurant on site was great too. They have us 60 dollars per day in credits towards food purchased before 11 am which we took full advantage of. They even threw in the first day since we got to hotel so early!   Room was beautiful, cleaned twice per day, and our upgraded room had a fire pit outside. We went to the cvs down the street and used the fire pit to make s'mores.   Beach was great and they drive you to and from. I stayed at hundreds of
Manager Response: We appreciate your review and your loyalty. It is lovely to know you enjoyed your upgrade as well as your morning food credits. We are thrilled you were able to make the most of the fireplace on your patio, as well as our proximity to the beach. We are proud to provide an all-around exceptional getaway, and we are thrilled you enjoyed your luxury experience. We hope you will make a return visit to Dana Point.

Summary: The hotel is lovely and the staff is always friendly and professional.  We always start our day with breakfast in the restaurant overlooking the ocean and the surfers below.  Very relaxing.  On this trip I took advantage of the outdoor yoga class.  Again, the views are inspiring.  My son enjoys the surfing and this is a well known surf spot, Salt Creek.  Also nearby is Trestles, another famous surf spot.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for your loyalty to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It is fantastic to know you have experienced consistently perfect service from our dedicated ladies and gentlemen. We are pleased you were able to take advantage of our outdoor yoga class as well as our unbeatable views of local surfers in the Pacific. We look forward to welcoming you and your son back for many more visits in the future.

Summary Heading: This is the place to AVOID
Summary: Needs renovation.  Total lack of service.  Should be a Marriott at best!! Location is ONLY good thing.  Room very run down.  Tiny TV, Air Conditioning sounds like a freight train.  Front desk is a 30 minute wait- and no place for a Platinum to check in.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share your review. It disappoints us greatly knowing you experienced anything less than perfection while you were with us. At your earliest convenience, please contact us directly, as we would like to further discuss your experience. We would greatly appreciate the chance to restore your faith in our hotel through either a phone call or a much-improved stay in the future.

Summary Heading: Great views.  Treat Platinum well.  Some minor flaws
Summary: Love the staff.  Love the view.  -	Resort fee: $30 waived for platinum -	Valet parking: $40 not waived -	$60 platinum breakfast credit for 2 people  -	We booked basic room with points. Upgraded to ocean view, unprompted. Very nice -	What we liked: the view. The ground is also nice. The beach shuttle sets up the chair, umbrella, etc for you. The room is showing some age but serviceable enough.  It's on the smallish side though as far as basic standard RC room goes. -	What we didn’t like: towards the end of our stay, a convention took over the place. I guess it happens everywhere. It’s my problem not to anticipate it.   Why not five star?  When the key cards stopped working, we had to wait for 20 minutes for replacement which was kind of disappointing for RC level of service. Then
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for your choice to stay with us in Dana Point. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our unbeatable views of the Pacific as well as the service from our courteous ladies and gentlemen. We regret any issues you experienced with our key cards and apologize for the time it took to resolve the situation. We are pleased to hear you were treated with care in the mean time. Next time you are in Dana Point, we would be honored to welcome you back for an all-around exceptional stay.

Summary Heading: A vacation of a lifetime.  We went along with my oldest son and his wife and two young sons.
Summary: What a wonderful week with our oldest son and his wife on the beautiful private beach.  We were able to spend special time with our grandsons while the kids went to the Bentley display and had a great time there.  We watched as the chef's decorated two 8 foot tables in a100%candy display.  We also were able to view all the custom surfboards that were up for a special auction. We finished the weekend with a buffet Thanksgiving Dinner to die for. Our trip back was uneventful, as we flew in and out of John Wayne Airport, it wasn't busy at all. We can't wait ti go back
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to detail your luxury experience. It is lovely to discover that you enjoyed such a memorable visit to Dana Point with your son, daughter-in-law and grandchildren. We were proud to welcome your beautiful family for an exciting holiday celebration, and we are thrilled to know your visit exceeded expectations. We look forward to seeing you at Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel again in the future.

Summary Heading: Still top notch but under stress when lots of people descend upon it
Summary: I've been coming here for 4-5 yrs for a conference and the hotel and the location have always transported me away during my stay.  It still does, but, this time, you could feel the property and the staff feeling the weight of the crowd.  The food, the drinks, the bellmen, the valet - still good.  The actual rooms - eh, this was probably the first year that I felt that they were clearly going to be due for an upgrade in the next few years.  Had a stale, moldy smell that was patched over w/ cleaning agents - not quite what you expect from a Ritz.  Even the toiletries and bathroom accoutrements could use a little bit of a refresh.  The grounds are impeccable and the views can't be beat.  I will still look forward to coming each year, but yes, they could benefit from thinking about
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your review and your loyalty to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It has been a pleasure to welcome you for your conference over the years, and we are proud to know your expectations have been consistently met. It disappoints us that this visit was not as perfect as your last few. We are proud to welcome business travelers like yourself, and we often see large groups. This added traffic should never negatively impact your experience, and we regret any areas you may have noticed shortcomings. We are happy to hear you plan to return, and we can assure you that your next visit will more closely meet the five-star standard you are used to from The Ritz-Carlton.

Summary: I stayed 2 nights in March (17-19). The only good thing is the location and scenic views. Definitely not worth $800 per night. Dinner at Eno Steak was one of the worst I can recall in a high end steak house (average price of steak more than $50). Being from Dallas I think I have a good taste in steaks. Raya restaurant was excellent. Tennis courts are in utter disrepair. Rooms can definitely use fresh coat of paint. Overcrowded (weddings, conventions), noisy and outrageously expensive for the quality.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to detail your luxury experience. While we are pleased to discover you enjoyed our unbeatable location and stunning views of the Pacific, we are troubled by the challenges you faced during your time in Dana Point. Your comments regarding enoSTEAK, our tennis courts and our guest rooms have been noted and will be brought to the appropriate departments. Should you wish to speak further about these or any other areas of your visit, we encourage you to contact us directly. We would greatly appreciate the opportunity to restore your faith in The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel through either a phone call or an improved stay in the future.

Summary Heading: Ritz on the "fritz" during our stay ...
Summary: This is a lovely property ... but clearly during our stay (March 15-18) ... this Ritz-Carlton was quite a bit "off it's game". Arrived for the second half of an 8 day visit to the L.A. area. Planned to "relax and regroup" after all the hustle bustle of the city. Our son and I were warmly greeted by one of the managers while my husband checked in. Had a nice chat about where we were from, and also learned the entire hotel had been "completely sold out" until the day of our arrival by "a large investment group". She told us several bands had played outside the night before, and "the conference" was the reason the lobby furniture was being carried back in as painters were touching up the walls and woodwork.   We booked a King Ocean View Suite. Our assigned room was spacious ... and
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share the details of your recent visit to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. While we are pleased to hear you encountered several of our friendly ladies and gentlemen, it concerns us greatly to hear you experienced anything less than a perfect visit. We are proud to welcome large groups at various times throughout the year, but their presence should never affect the experience of any other guest. We regret any areas in which you felt service was lacking. We would greatly appreciate the opportunity to speak with you further about your experience, and we ask you to contact us directly at your earliest convenience. We would like to learn as much as possible about your visit and, hopefully, restore your faith in our Dana Point property. On behalf of each one of our ladies and gentlemen, we hope to hear from you soon.

Summary: Problems using shuttle to beach. Loud a/c units turning on and off. You could hear all the neighbor units also. Walls very thin and could easily hear conversations next door. Friendly staff Very nice location but hotel was just average
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review with us. While we are pleased you enjoyed our unbeatable location overlooking the Pacific, we are disappointed by the areas of your stay that were anything but perfect. At your earliest convenience, please contact us directly, as we would like to discuss your comments further. We would greatly appreciate the chance to improve our hotel with the help of your valuable feedback. We are grateful your time and hope to speak with you soon.

Summary: Everything about this property is amazing.  The views, the lobby, the room, the bathroom, the spa, the location & most of all the staff.  Especially Diane on the club floor.  The other Ritz Carltons around the country should take a lesson from them.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your five-star review of your luxury experience. We promise nothing but the best in terms of service, amenities and overall atmosphere, and we are thrilled your expectations were exceeded while you were here. We will pass your praises on to our ladies and gentlemen. We hope to see you back on the West Coast soon.

Summary: The Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel is a truly first class experience!  Excellent caring staff who went out of there way to make our Anniversary stay a truly memorable one!  The food is amazing, as well as the gym and spa! If you are looking for a coastal getaway spot, look no further than the Ritz-Carlton at Laguna Niguel!
Manager Response: We are grateful for your five-star review and for your choice to stay with us in Dana Point. It is wonderful to discover that you enjoyed a memorable anniversary thanks in part to our dedicated ladies and gentlemen as well as our beautiful setting. We are pleased you were able to take advantage of our spa and fitness facilities while you were with us. We hope to see you again for more celebrations in the future.

Summary: I would not recommend this location for spring break. The hotel is running about 50% capacity and you can tell because there is no service. Wait until summer to visit this location. Also, they do not cater to families.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are proud to welcome many groups and individuals for relaxing spring break visits. However, the number of guests staying at the hotel should never cause the quality of your stay to be negatively impacted in any way. If you would like to further discuss your experience, we encourage you to contact us directly. We hope to have the chance to restore your faith in our Dana Point hotel.

Summary: We have traveled extensively and agree that this Ritz-Carlton property is the most beautiful one we have ever visited.  Of course, the excellent staff certainly attributed to this.  From the doorman to the concierge, every person we came in contact with went above and beyond to ensure we had exactly what we needed.   The views are absolutely stunning and can be enjoyed from the several on-site restaurants, bars, and exercise facility.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share your review. It brings us great joy to know you count our hotel among your favorites in The Ritz-Carlton family. We are grateful for your loyalty and are thrilled you enjoyed your visit to Dana Point. It is fantastic to hear your expectations were met by our courteous ladies and gentlemen. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: The Ritz has the best employees in the industry.  They are always so kind, caring and helpful in an authentic and sincere way.  This was our first time to Dana Point and we just loved the property with its incredible view of the Pacific.  We spent each morning walking the beach or catching a yoga or pilates class at the fitness center.  We stayed on the club level where the staff was very respectful and receptive to our gluten free and dairy free needs.  Penni is out of this world and the backbone of the staff.  Diane was also very helpful with local suggestions on where to go and what to see.  Mercedes and Gaby were amazing as well and Shelley, well, margarita's will never be as good again:)  We spent the evening watching the sunset and playing the many games available in the
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing the details of your luxury experience. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed nothing but the best in terms of service. Our dedicated ladies and gentlemen are always happy to assist, and each one of them will be delighted to know you were comfortable and satisfied during your stay. It is lovely to hear you were able to take advantage of our fitness offerings as well as our dining options while you were with us. Next time you are looking to get away, we would be honored to welcome you back to the beach.

Summary: We have done our fair share of traveling and the Ritz Carlton, Laguna Niguel offered our finest travel experience. The staff was unbelievable!   Our bellman that brought our bags to our room explained everything we needed about the hotel. He followed up with us with a hand written note answering all our questions and giving us his personal recommendations in the area. The concierge Lucinda was the best concierge we have worked with. The first thing she asked our 8 year old daughter was had she been to the treasure chest. She brought out a treaure chest on wheels and let her pick out a prize. She gave us excellent reccomendation on area activities and restaurants.   We were upgraded to a beautiful ocean front room with our gold status. Our views where better than our views in
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your generous review. It is lovely to discover you enjoyed your visit to Dana Point so much. We are proud to provide exceptional service, spacious accommodations, stunning views and an overall relaxing atmosphere. It is gratifying to know you consider our Dana Point hotel to be one of your favorites in the world. We will be sure to pass your praises on to all of our ladies and gentlemen. Should you wish to return for future spring break trips, we would be delighted to welcome you back.

Summary: My husband and I recently stayed at The Ritz Laguna for a work event. It is a lovely resort with stunning views. The staff is extremely friendly and courteous. I don't think we encountered one staff member who did not acknowledge us with a smile, even in just passing by in the hallways.  We had a garden view room which overlooked the pool area. Unfortunately the weather was not that stellar so we were not able to use the pool or lounge chairs. The room itself was nice, clean and spacious.  Because it was a work event, our meals were catered by the hotel. Everything was fantastic. Absolutely no complaints from anyone we were with or if there were, we didn't hear of it.  Our only complaint, and no fault of the hotel (well, maybe walls could have better soundproofing) were our
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your helpful review with us. We are pleased you and your husband enjoyed your luxury experience in Dana Point. It is lovely to discover that our ladies and gentlemen provided excellent service throughout your visit. We regret any disturbances you may have experienced. We encourage you to contact us directly if there is ever anything we can to do make your visit more comfortable. We truly hope you will return for either business or leisure in the future.

Summary: Stayed here a week prior to Christmas to visit friends in the OC.  This resort is in a beautiful location with incredible views a short drive from Laguna town center.  We had a garden level ocean view room with a fireplace, couldn't have asked for a nicer view.  Rooms are so/so - but the surroundings and all of the other areas of the resort make this place an almost perfect 10.    The bars/restaurants onsite were really nice......and the Spa was a very nice facility
Manager Response: We are grateful for your generous review. The holidays are always a special time for us, and we were happy to welcome you during this wonderful season. It is lovely to discover your expectations were exceeded in so many areas, from our beautiful property to our onsite dining options. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back this Christmas or sooner.

Summary: We visited the Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel for a vacation. This hotel has stunning views of the ocean and is a great location for easy beach access. The hotel has many amenities that we took advantage of including the all of the restaurants (Raya, enoSteak, Bar Raya, The Market Place, and 180 Blue), the Spa, Fitness Center, and business center.   The restaurants at the hotel are fantastic. Have to visit 180Blue at least once to take in the views and enjoy meal/cocktails. Would also recommend Raya or the Market Place for great breakfast options (The Market place has a good breakfast menu if looking for something more affordable and quick).   The fitness center is a must-do to enjoy breathtaking views with windows from floor to ceiling while getting a workout in.   If looking for a
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share the details of your luxury experience at the Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We promise exceptional food and service in each of our dining outlets, and we are elated to hear you enjoyed each visit you made to our restaurants. We appreciate your helpful comments regarding the set-up of our business center and the service in our Spa. We strive to provide a perfect experience for our guests in each area, and we regret any lapses in service you experienced while you were with us. It disappoints us to know you enjoyed anything other than impeccable service. Please do not hesitate to contact us directly if you would like to speak further about your feedback. We would love to learn more about your experience, as it will only help us improve in the future. We look forward to hearing from you and hopefully restoring your faith in our hotel.

Summary Heading: Heaven is found at the Ritz in Laguna Niguel
Summary: Pure delight and pampering all the way! Great location, beautiful views and incredible stay.  The staff is friendly, the food fantastic, highly recommend this as the place to stay when you are headed to Laguna Beach California
Manager Response: We appreciate your review and your choice to stay with us while you were in the Dana Point area. It makes us incredibly proud to know you experienced a five-star stay thanks to our stunning views, friendly ladies and gentlemen and unbeatable dining options. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back in the near future.

Summary Heading: Upgraded To Ocean Front With Ritz Card!
Summary: Hi all,  We arrived last Friday evening and were amazed to find out that there was ocean front availability and that staff had upgraded our room to Ocean Front and stated it was because we paid via the Ritz card. The view was amazing-- full ocean front view outside of the window. We ate at Raya that evening and the dinner was delicious. Wait-staff went out of their way to accommodate our Vegetarian diet--- creating off-menu pasta for us. The next morning we took a walk down the the beach and tide pools-- to find them filled with crabs! What an awesome experience. Will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review and for your loyalty to Ritz-Carlton hotels. It is lovely to hear you were able to take advantage of our delicious dining options in Raya during your stay. Our team was thrilled to help accommodate your specific needs, and they will be pleased to know you enjoyed each bite of your dinner. It is spectacular to hear you plan to return, and we hope your next visit comes soon.

Summary Heading: Ritz club lounge is the best!
Summary: If you want to have a special weekend go to the Ritz CARLTON Laguna Niguel and upgrade to the club lounge. It's totally worth it. Pennie and Diana and the ladies on the lounge really make it worth your while.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. It is fantastic to hear you enjoyed your experience on our Club Level. We promise the best in service, amenities and overall experience in our Club Lounge, and we are delighted your expectations were met. All of our Club Lounge ladies and gentlemen will be happy to hear you enjoyed your visit. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Another wonderful stay at a Ritz Carlton.  Never disappointing and always exceeding expectations.  There is nothing better than staying at a Ritz Carlton.  Dinners were well planned and perfectly executed.  The location was stellar with activities to be enjoyed by all.  Finally, the views Oceanside were spectacular.
Manager Response: We are grateful for your five-star feedback and are thrilled you enjoyed a perfect stay. We are incredibly proud of our beautiful location and are delighted you enjoyed our Pacific views. Next time you are in the area, we would love to serve you again.

Summary Heading: Stay here to be truly spoiled, enjoy the best service and a beautiful place.
Summary: It was our 25th anniversary and we wanted to make it special. So we rented a suite (800+ sq. feet) on the club level where the Ritz provides breakfast, lunch and light dinner daily. And this was excellent food - not just warmed over pancakes and dehydrated scrambled eggs. Then, there is twice daily room (maid) service. The bathrooms (2) are floor to ceiling marble. Plus it is located at Salt Creek, one of the best surfing beaches in CA. There are golf courses close by and interesting galleries and shopping in Laguna Beach.  Plus an open free bar. Mojito? Margarita? Crown and Coke? Wine? Just ask.   But it was the consistent and pervasive attitude that the staff had that impressed me the most. Every chance that they could deliver excellence or creativity, they did it (except for
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate the time you have taken to share the details of your luxury experience. It was an honor to play a role in your 25th anniversary celebration, and we are delighted you enjoyed your time in Dana Point. From your spacious suite to your time on the tennis courts and in our fitness facilities, we are pleased to hear each aspect of your visit exceeded expectations. It brings us great joy knowing you consider our hotel among the best you have ever visited. Should you wish to celebrate future milestones or special occasions with us, we would be delighted to assist in booking. We hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: Our stay was wonderful, we really were made to feel at home.  The whole experience was elegant and luxurious without being the least bit pretentious.  Everyone was down to earth and seemed genuinely interested in getting to know us and listening to our stories.  We were in Southern California following our youngest son's college baseball team.  Everyone (servers, valet, bellmen) all expressed a real interest in our son's games each day ( probably more than our own family would).  It was sweet when our breakfast server would catch us later in the day to see how the game had gone that afternoon.  They really made us feel that we were their only guest.  Special thanks to Miguel who would see us at breakfast every morning and made a special effort to say goodbye when we were
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review. It was a pleasure to welcome you to Dana Point, and we are thrilled you were able to relax with us between baseball games. It is heartwarming to know you felt at home throughout the entirety of your visit. We will surely pass along your praises to Miguel, Ishmael, Steve and the rest of our ladies and gentlemen. On behalf of each one of them, we look forward to your next visit to our oasis on the West Coast.

Summary: Club Level is a Nice Retreat to Relax and Recharge for a Weekend. The Lounge Always has Sports on and a Nice View for the Ladies. Out of Town Guests are Always Friendly and Eager for Local Knowledge. The Lounge Staff are About as Friendly as it gets!
Manager Response: We are grateful for your kind feedback regarding your time on our Club Level. It is marvelous to know you enjoyed exceptional service, stunning ocean views and an overall relaxing atmosphere. We hope to welcome you back for another weekend getaway soon.

Summary Heading: Beautiful ocean view, room not so much
Summary: The grounds and the ocean view were spectacular. I would recommend staying there just for the view. The staff was very pleasant and professional. The guest room bathroom was very dated. The marble was very distracting and made the floor very cold to walk on. The bathroom had too many mirrors as well. I was not impressed with the guest room overall. The room we had at the Doubletree was much more comfortable. There was a small, but noticeable hole in the wall that could've been easily patched and painted. The room just wasn't what I expected given the name of the hotel and the amount it cost per night.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share your review. Our Pacific Ocean views are truly unbeatable, and we are thrilled you were able to enjoy them. However, it troubles us to read about your experience in your guest room. We are disappointed by the areas in which your expectations were not met. We have passed along your feedback to the appropriate teams and will be dealing with these issues. On behalf of our entire team of ladies and gentlemen, we hope to you will come back for a visit that more closely meets of standard of excellence in the future.

Summary: This continues to be our favorite place to stay. Service is impeccable and the staff is welcoming and friendly.  We have been away from Laguna for some years and our return was greeted as if we had never left.  We look forward to many more visits to the Ritz Carlton, Laguna Niguel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for your loyalty to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It is lovely to know you have consistently enjoyed perfect visits to Dana Point. We are pleased you experienced nothing but impeccable service from our dedicated ladies and gentlemen. Please know you always have a home with us in California. We hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: I stayed at this property for two nights. It is a great property.  The club level staff is truly amazing.  However, I was traveling with wife and two children and despite being platinum w ritz, and lots of availability (they tried to upsell me at front desk) I was put into a tiny room with one small chair.    I just think if they had any good service they would have said, hey they are going to be cramped and we have larger rooms available and this is a loyal customer, let's make the experience better.  At check out, no one even asked how experience was.    My friend advised me to stay at montage, but I went against advice because generally I am a loyal RC customer. Next time i will.  But the club level staff is amazing.  Too bad the front desk is not at the same level.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We appreciate you taking the time to provide your comments about your visit and we certainly regret that your expectations were not met in regards to the room size and service.  If you would like to speak further about your experience, we encourage you to contact us directly. We certainly hope that you will stay with us again in the future.

Summary Heading: Yes... I died and went to Heaven
Summary: What a fabulous hotel on the beach... for just a few days you get to feel like the rich and famous.  Wonderful room, service and views.  Be sure to take a walk on the coved beach, sit up on top of the cliff to watch the sun set and have dinner on the terrace... if you want to cheap out.  Order breakfast from the café and bring it out on the terrace till 3:00--- don't tell too many people.
Manager Response: We are grateful for your five-star review of your time in Dana Point. It is comforting to know you enjoyed a perfect stay, from our ocean views to our options at The Market Place. We hope you have the opportunity to visit again for another luxury experience soon.

Summary: Perfect hotel and location for a romantic weekend.  Highly recommend the rooms with the patio fireplace.  Take note that this is an expensive hotel and every service is very expensive.  If you plan to be dining/drinking/indulging at the hotel, expect to pay another $400/day.  That being said, the quality of the food/drinks in the restaurants/bars and room service are stellar.  Wonderful time, amazing views.  Definitely perfect for an important, romantic getaway.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share a review with us. It is wonderful to discover that you enjoyed our beautiful oceanfront property. We are thrilled your expectations were met by our dining options and overall level of service. It was a pleasure having you in Dana Point, and our ladies and gentlemen anxiously await your return.

Summary: Just the most perfect location perched on a high bluff overlooking the Pacific Ocean & the view is quite literally to die for, every day the  majestic crashing waves crash on Salt Creek Beach.  A great hotel for families & also business. Lots of wedding take place here as it is just so  incredibly beautiful. Stay in Club, the Ritz Club within the hotel & be treated royally, you won't regret it it is just that good & much more.  Let Penni, Mary, Shelly, Jennifer,  Mercedes spoil you rotten ....you wont want to leave!!!!
Manager Response: We appreciate your review and your decision to stay with us in Dana Point. Our inspiring views and exceptional service are part of what makes our hotel so special, so we are thrilled you appreciated both. On behalf of all of our dedicated ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Weekend in Laguna Niguel- beautiful views + great food. A few tips for those driving from LA
Summary: Staying at the house (checking out today) and loving it. The grounds are well maintained and it is beautiful to walk around even when it's not so warm out. If you're not a beach lover, don't worry- there are paths around the beach that are gorgeous. The rooms are clean.  Here are a few tips:  1. Bring a good camera if you have one, the views are beautiful here.  2. Go to the steak house at the hotel- very expensive but great food! About $250 for 2 if having 2-3 glasses of wine. 3.
