If you are driving here from LA- it will take you about an hour- or more depending on traffic. My recommendation is to stop half way, at the Pelican Hill Resort and have lunch. It's another beautiful hotel that is on the way to Laguna Niguel.  4. Valet at the hotel is $44 a night. 5. Food is expensive
Manager Response: We are grateful for the time you have taken to share your kind review. It is wonderful to hear your expectations were exceeded in so many areas, from our unbeatable views of the Pacific to your time in our luxurious spa. We are pleased knowing you were able to experience not only Raya and enoSTEAK, but also some restaurants and destinations in our surrounding area as well. Our ladies and gentlemen were happy to help make your visit truly one-of-a-kind. Next time you are on the West Coast, we hope to welcome you back for another perfect visit.

Summary: Beautiful location, resort, and amenities, with friendly and accommodating staff. Food at Raya was delicious but would be careful with timing, much more leisurely than I would have expected. All things considered, I believe it’s everything one would expect from a Ritz Property.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your review. We are proud knowing you experienced such a lovely visit to Dana Point. We are disappointed knowing the service in Raya was not as quick as expected, but we are pleased this did not detract from the five-star quality of your stay. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: My wife and I just returned from a weekend at the Ritz Carlton -Laguna. We first came here a few years ago to celebrate our Anniversary and we had such a great time that we have been coming here every year since and made it a little tradition. I have reviewed them previously on trip advisor but I feel I have to reiterate how amazing this place is. The Resort is absolutely beautiful and the staff always make you feel right at home. I recommend getting a fireside ocean view where you will have a perfect view of the sun setting over the ocean from your patio and your very own gas fire pit to keep you warm if it gets too cool. I definitely recommend this place to everyone wanting to escape or for a romantic getaway!
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely review and for your loyalty to our hotel in Dana Point. It was been a pleasure to welcome you and your wife over the years, and we are elated to hear you have consistently enjoyed you experiences. We promise nothing but the best in service, accommodations and overall atmosphere to each of our guests, and we are thrilled you consider our property one of your favorites. We look forward to your next trip.

Summary Heading: Excellent- except for the stealing part.
Summary: UPon checkout, I checked two bags into the valet to keep for me while I completed my afternoon business meetings. Only one of them was returned and loaded into my car service. Unfortunately I didn't notice until we were on the way to the airport. I called the hotel at the airport. Not only was there no resolution, but they refused to accept responsibility for what the valets had done. Worst of the 10+ Ritz's I've stayed at.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate the time you have taken to share your review. It disappoints us greatly knowing you experienced anything but exceptional and attentive service. We regret any confusion that occurred regarding your stored luggage. We encourage you to contact us at your earliest convenience to discuss this situation, as we would like to rectify it as best we can. We look forward to speaking soon.

Summary: Amazing experience!  Everything was perfect, including the breathtaking views and hospitality of the staff.  We love the fact you are on the beach making it ideal for families.  The entire culture at this Ritz bends over backwards to make sure customers are elated. I highly recommend this hotel and absolutely will be going back.
Manager Response: It is wonderful to hear you enjoyed a perfect experience in Dana Point. We are grateful for your kind words regarding our exceptional ladies and gentlemen as well as our breathtaking views. Should you find yourself in California again the future, we would be delighted to welcome you back.

Summary: There is nothing wrong with this hotel and the staff were all very friendly, but there is nothing at all extraordinary about it other than the location. Other hotels in the area have rooms that are nicer and certainly larger for less extortionate rates. Our views were nothing special, there was a huge palm blocking most of it, and our room was $799 before tax with nothing in the way of amenities  included. We were attending a conference and the Ritz took advantage of it to charge top dollar. My advice would be to stay somewhere else with the same or better rooms for half price or less and come for the restaurant if you like the location
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest feedback. It disappoints us to know you were less than satisfied with your luxury experience. If you would like to further discuss your stay, please do not hesitate to contact us directly.

Summary Heading: The most fantastic Ritz Carlton in the world!
Summary: The Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel is the most spectacular and perfect Ritz in the world (and we have stayed at a lot of them)!  There are so many things right about this hotel it's difficult to list.  The view from hotel is so perfect that it's difficult to look at anything else.  You stand mesmerized by the view, especially at sunset.  Generally I am not a fan of California beaches (being from Florida, where beaches are perfect), but this hotel and beach changed my mind.  The setting is almost magical!    The rooms are gorgeous and elegantly decorated.  They have not been renovated into the cheap looking modern look like so many other Ritz Carlton's.  The lobby is grand and elegant, again, not the cheap modern look of many fellow hotels.  If you happen to like working out, the gym
Manager Response: We are grateful for the time you have taken to share your review. It makes us so proud to read your kind words, and we are thrilled you enjoyed such a remarkable stay. It is fantastic to know your expectations were exceeded in all areas, from our beautifully decorated rooms to our state-of-the-art fitness center. We appreciate your comments about our Executive Lounge and are pleased these minor shortcomings did not detract from the overall quality of your experience. Should you find yourself back in California in the future, we would be honored to welcome you back.

Summary: From the friendly reception at check in, to the efficiency and professionalism of wait staff and housekeeping services to the comfort of the room and the cleanliness of the fitness center, everything was splendid.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and your choice to stay at our Dana Point hotel. It is marvelous to know you enjoyed a perfect visit. It was a pleasure to welcome you, and we are delighted you had such a lovely time with us. We hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: Club Level Ocean View at the Ritz Laguna is worth every penny.  The personalized treatment, accommodation, and the food/beverage service is beyond compare.  Make sure to use (at least visit) the work out facility where you can have full view of the ocean.  ENO steak house is fabulous,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience. We were delighted to welcome you and are pleased to hear you enjoyed your Club Level room. Our views of the Pacific are truly unbeatable, and we are happy you were able to experience them — especially while getting in a workout! It was a pleasure to serve you both in your room and in our dining outlets. We look forward to accommodating you again in the future.

Summary: Excellent location, great breakfast at RAYA, great service. Rooms are little small, and no shower. Felt welcome by the hotel employees. Great hicking and walking trails. All positive experience. Recommended highly
Manager Response: We are grateful for your generous feedback. It is lovely to know you were able to take advantage of Raya as well as our beautiful surrounding area. Thank you for your kind recommendation. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Stunningly beautiful views-exquisite location and beach/park access
Summary: They remodeled this property to make it more appealing to the younger, less stuffy crowd. Very successful, especially with the outdoor deck bar. Accommodations are 5 Star. They are especially nice to the locals and I frequent this place often for the little coffee shop, the bar and dining outside. The gym has some good quality equipment, a world class view, but the outdoor activities of the beach and walking/hiking is great too. Fine dining, great for meetings and business groups. Families are welcome as well as 4 legged members. Relaxed atmosphere, not stuffy like most Ritz properties. Truly a destination resort for all seasons. The pool does not have a view, but is a nice spot to relax after a long run on the beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to detail your luxury experience in Dana Point. It has been a pleasure to welcome you for several visits, and we are happy to know you have enjoyed each one. Whether your plans include lounging by the pool or enjoying a workout on the beach, we are happy to provide the amenities you may need. We are proud to be a destination for guests from all over the country. It would be an honor to welcome you back for more quick trips in the future.

Summary: Wonderful stay as always. Highly recommend this property. From the views to the staff this is truly a magnificent property. It is definitely a place worth coming back to!!!i would also recommend the concierge level as well, there they go out of their way to get to know you as well as make sure that all your needs are met while visiting. The staff could not be more pleasant or accommodating!!
Manager Response: We greatly value your feedback and are thrilled you enjoyed your visit to Dana Point. It sounds as if our wonderful team of ladies and gentlemen helped make service the highlight of your stay. We are thrilled knowing you felt so well taken care of throughout the entirety of your visit. Should you find yourself back on the West Coast, we would be delighted to serve you again.

Summary: Rooms need updating...staff exceptional...great location...scenery unmatched.  Close to both Laguna Beach and Dana Point.  Avoid rooms on the first floor due to business entertaining in evening hours, lack of privacy.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to review your visit. While we are pleased you enjoyed our impeccable service and unbeatable location, we are concerned by the areas that did not meet your expectations. If you would like to speak further about your areas of concern, we encourage you to contact us directly. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back for a truly five-star stay in the future.

Summary: Dana Point Ritz-Carlton is an exceptional hotel experience.  We look forward to our next visit already.  The scenery and ambiance are fantastic and the staff is excellent and attentive. Restaurants are very good overall and the Eno Steak restaurant is the best!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star review. From our various dining options to our friendly ladies and gentlemen, we are thrilled each aspect of your visit exceeded expectations. We, too, are looking forward to your next visit. We truly hope it comes sooner rather than later!

Summary: Service, food, bars, ambiance, experience from start to finish -SIMPLY OUTSTANDING!! We held a wine auction and banquet for over 400 guests and everything was GREAT! Facilities were incredible as were the views!!
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and your choice to entertain with us. It is marvelous to hear your guests felt well taken care of and that your event went smoothly. Should you wish to return for business, leisure or another event in the future, we would be delighted to assist in booking. We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary Heading: Beautiful view but did not meet expectations
Summary: Stunning location. Stayed in the executive suite with my husband and kids. The first night we were in a storm . Asked to be moved since the branch hitting the windows were alarming the children. They showed us adjoining rooms on the ground floor that smelled of cigarette smoke and rooms looked dated. We decided to stay in the current room with the storm passing by midnight. In the current room, I found the half bathroom to be dirty- brown stains on the tile walls . The master bath was dated. The tile was cracked and the tub was moldy .This was not a five star room and we paid top dollar. The Ritz Carlton needs to improve its properties in general. We have come across similarly issues in other properties . We are reluctant to try another Ritz Carlton property again .
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your honest review. We regret any disturbances you may have faced and wish we could have provided a more appropriate alternative. It is uncommon for guests to experience anything but the best in terms of our accommodations and their upkeep. If you would like to further discuss your experience, please do not hesitate to contact us directly. We would greatly appreciate the opportunity to restore your faith in our Dana Point hotel.

Summary: Everything about this hotel is stunning. The ocean views are incredible especially for the sunsets. The staff is extremely friendly and accommodating. Sat at the pool and even had a kid walk by cleaning sunglasses.  Definitely get the ocean view rooms. Well worth it.
Manager Response: We are grateful for the moment you have taken to share your feedback. It is fantastic to hear you enjoyed a perfect visit, from your time by the pool to your experience with our ladies and gentlemen. We hope to welcome you back again in the not so distant future.

Summary Heading: It Lives Up To Being The Ritz!
Summary: Beautiful Hotel.  Excellent service. The room was very nice. We upgraded to the ocean front room.  What a view!  We were near the lawn with the Gazebo nearby. Yes, it's expensive. Sunday Brunch will run you $75 a person. They have a smaller cafe across from the ocean front restaurant that will costs a lot less if you can get by with a breakfast bowl or sandwich. Good coffee and sweet rolls. Nice seating areas with about six TV screens with different channels which is nice. Or, you can drive or take an Uber or whatever to the market, get some yogurt, granola, fresh fruit, etc, and store it in your room fridge. They have coffee in the room.  So, there are ways to save money. We tip housekeeping daily, though. Parking your or a rental car there is about $40 a day, if I am
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share your review. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed a lovely visit to our Dana Point hotel. It is fantastic knowing you were able to take advantage of The Market Place as well our full Sunday Brunch. We are proud to offer a truly luxury experience and are thrilled your expectations were met while you were here. Next time you are planning a trip to the West Coast, we hope you will again consider our hotel.

Summary: This is a beautiful hotel. I've been here a few times for conferences. Try to get a room with a private fire pit facing the ocean. Make sure to catch the sunset while watching the surfers--and look out for the whales swimming by!
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely review. It has been our pleasure to welcome you for each of your visits, and we are pleased each one has met expectations. We are delighted you have enjoyed consistently picturesque views by your private fire pit. Should you return to Dana Point for business or leisure in the future, we would be honored to serve you again.

Summary: My daughter and I stayed for a week and had a blast! We had fun at the pool but the ocean was amazing. It is a steep down hill walk (or golf cart ride) to the beach where they will set you up with boogie boards, towels, chairs and an umbrella. We spent most of our days playing at the beach and each evening we would do s'mores right outside our room. Lots of weddings going on which my daughter loved. The restaurant was not very kid friendly so we only went once and then ventured out or ordered room service. We did have to change rooms right after we arrived because of an ant problem and a black widow outside our room. The staff was quick to fix everything. Overall, the setting was perfect and the service was great.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your kind review. It is fantastic knowing your luxury experience was so memorable. We promise both impeccable service and exceptional accommodations, and we are thrilled your expectations were met in both areas. We are pleased any miscommunication involving your room was resolved efficiently and professionally. Should you wish to return for more mother-daughter bonding in the future, we would be delighted to host you again.

Summary: I've never stayed in a friendlier hotel. The staff is exceptional. We stayed for business and everyone was incredibly helpful. Beyond that, every member of the staff greeted me, many knew my name. Obviously, the hotel is beautiful, but the staff left me feeling like this may be the happiest place on Earth.
Manager Response: It brings us great pride knowing you experienced such a memorable business trip. We are always happy to provide an oasis for travelers of all kind, and we are thrilled you enjoyed the best in both service and accommodations. On behalf of each of our ladies and gentlemen, we appreciate your review and would be honored to accommodate you again the future.

Summary: Arrived at 2:30 for a 4 pm check in.  Disappointed that our room was not ready however we understood that we were early.  We were advised that they would text us but not given an estimation.   We went for a drink in the hotel bar.  To my surprise a beer and a house red came to $28 USD.  Checked on the status of our room again and were told they guaranteed 4pm check in, it was 3:50.  Waited again and we were texted at 4:15 that our room was ready.  Friends of ours also waited, there room wasn't ready until 4:25, they were given a $50 onsite credit for the extra wait.  Nothing offered to us for 15 min late so that was a bit disappointing but oh well.  Room was nice, bed was comfy and we had a great Northern Ocean view.  Noticed a previous comment about Marijuana smell, we noticed
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your experience. We are elated to hear you enjoyed your comfortable guest room and our various dining options. We regret any miscommunication that may have occurred during check in. Early arrivals can lead to temporary waits, but we apologize if the amount of time needed was not accurately conveyed. We truly appreciate your feedback and will use your comments when making future improvements to our property. We hope you will return, as we would be proud to provide an all-around exceptional stay.

Summary Heading: A Hotel Equal to the Extradordinary Views
Summary: I stayed for 2 nights at this grand hotel.  I would have to say it's one of the best Ritz Properties that I've been to.  You will read several reviews describing the wonderful view of the ocean.  And yes the view is as good as advertised.  What impressed me the most was the service, quality of food, and overall amenities.  The hotel will set up a wine and cheese picnic and prepare your beach bag for the day.  The service truly embodied the philosophy of "The answer is yes, now what is your question?"  I ordered room service and they were prompt and flexible with my request.  The food at the coffee shop was fantastic.  And the tables at the main dining room by the window were well...  I don't have to tell you.  Probably the best you are ever going to find.  Hotel was pricey.  But
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to detail your luxury experience. It is marvelous to hear you count us among your favorite properties. We are pleased you enjoyed such a memorable visit, from the service you received to the dining options you chose. Our unique amenities like a beach picnic are what set us apart from other Dana Point hotels, and we are pleased you appreciated these one-of-a-kind touches. Should you find yourself wishing to return to California, we would be delighted to welcome you back for another perfect stay.

Summary: We have stayed at many fine hotels around the world.  The Ritz Carlton at Laguna Niguel is at the top of the list.  It is a beautiful property with breathtaking views of the Pacific Ocean.  The staff is courteous, knowledgeable and very helpful. Our garden view room was excellent.
Manager Response: We are grateful for the moment you have taken to share your feedback. It is marvelous to know our hotel ranks among your favorites in the world. We are thrilled your expectations have been exceeded by our exceptional ladies and gentlemen and our stunning Pacific Ocean views. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back in the future.

Summary: poor reservations experience in the restaurant RAYA; requests for window table not honored despite availability and a stated first come- first served policy.  Neither the front desk nor manager were helpful.
Manager Response: We appreciate your honest review. We are troubled by the experience you had in Raya. It is our priority to ensure each guest’s complete satisfaction regarding food, service or general atmosphere. If you would like to further discuss your comments, we encourage you to contact us directly. It would be our pleasure to rectify this issue and hopefully restore your faith in our hotel and its dining outlets.

Summary: As you wound expect, the friendly, attentive staff make this expansive property a warm and welcoming place to stay. The resort was clearly designed to thoughtfully handle multiple groups on property at same time. Clever shared and separated spaces keep the public areas personal and allow for intimate conversations throughout.  Majestic floral arrangements, small and big, mixed with clever use of multi-screen displays keep bringing the outdoors in.  The second pool area serving the north wing is quiet and private but deserves a new look to better feature the hotel and landscaping.  Sleeping rooms are adequate and appointed with all the expected furniture and amenities with no surprises.  Well maybe one. It continues to surprise me how inadequate and badly designed the fold out
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to detail your luxury experience. We are proud to welcome groups both small and large, and we are pleased you did not feel overwhelmed or disturbed by any traffic on property. It is lovely to hear you appreciated our décor—particularly our beautiful floral arrangements in our public spaces. We will surely take note of your feedback regarding out luggage trays and use this when making any improvements to our guest rooms in the future. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Beautiful place, beautiful location ... a little cool in March, but we will definitely be back...area golf is great, especially pelican hill...ritz service is always truly top notch and this location/ people did not disappoint
Manager Response: Thank you for your five-star review. It is magnificent to know your experience was so wonderful. We are happy to hear you enjoyed time on the course as well as around our property. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back for a warmer weather visit in the coming months.

Summary: Great location and wonderful food. Staff very accommodating to your needs. One of the best views anyone could ask for. Large enough property to explore and find new things to see every day.  Tried both dining and room service. Both were delicious and served with kindness.
Manager Response: We are grateful for the time you have taken to share your feedback. We promise nothing but the best to each of our guests, and we are thrilled you experienced this standard of excellence. It is marvelous to hear our stunning Pacific Ocean views met your expectations. Should you wish to return to the West Coast, we would be delighted to see you again.

Summary: Stayed over for an event and it was the most amazing stay- location and facilities are impeccable - their employees are amazing!  Wonderful stay and we will be back!  I suggest you swing by and verify what I'm saying
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words. We are happy to have provided a perfect stay for your fundraiser. It is wonderful to hear you were well taken care of by our friendly ladies and gentlemen. We are grateful for your recommendation and hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: Very nice location with beautiful grounds and scenery.  The front desk staff were excellent.  The wait staff in the restaurants were friendly and attentive, but the food was not any better than you would get at another type of restaurant, pricey but nothing special.  I did not get a chance to enjoy the amenities (pool, health club, etc.), but they seemed nice.  There were some minor touch up things that need to be addressed like the caulking around the toilet and tub started to color.  Not a bad place, not sure it was worth the money.
Manager Response: We are grateful for the time you have taken to review your luxury experience. It is wonderful to hear you enjoyed our exceptional service and gorgeous surrounding area. We wish you could have enjoyed our fitness and spa facilities, but we are pleased you were able to explore our restaurant options. We appreciate your comments regarding our bathroom and will pass these along to the appropriate department. If you find yourself in California in the future, we would be proud to provide a stay that more closely meets our five-star standard.

Summary: Beautiful location and facility. The Staff was incredibly attentive and helpful in every way. The food quality and service were equally impressive.  I was there on business but plan to go back with my wife for an extended stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your kind review. It brings us great joy knowing our ladies and gentlemen offered impeccable service to make you feel at home. It was a pleasure to host you for business, and we look forward to welcoming you and your wife for a leisurely visit in the near future.

Summary: We enjoyed a lovely stay at the Ritz Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  The hotel was in a lovely location with wonderful staff and very good food. Our only complaints  involved a noise issue one evening with a party tear down and the smell of smoke that infiltrated our room due to other guests smoking cigars and marijuana.  other guests staying at the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your thoughtful feedback regarding your luxury experience. It is marvelous knowing your expectations were exceeded in many areas, from our courteous ladies and gentlemen to our various dining options. We regret any disturbances you may have encountered during your visit. The situation you describe is unacceptable, and we would like to learn more about it. Please contact us at your earliest convenience, as we would like to resolve this issue as soon as possible.

Summary: beyond 5 star. Club level location and the staff throughout the facility you could not ask for more. Add to, the prime restate location which offers the best view on the California coast and the quiet and laid back environment. What more can you ask for, we will return
Manager Response: We are grateful for your kind feedback. Our beautiful setting in Dana Point is a point of great pride for us, and we are thrilled you enjoyed it as much as we do. On behalf of each of our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to your next stay.

Summary Heading: Amazing Location, Pet Friendly, Not Quite up to the Price
Summary: This hotel is in an amazing location, on the bluff overlooking the water, with a beach below.  The views are amazing and the hotel is big.   For the price and Ritz brand, I was expecting perfection and there are areas for improvement. Hence the 4 stars.  Valet:  Hotel has valet parking.  Valet staff was quick in greeting us and taking our car.  We Had luggage in the truck and back seat.  Valet asked if we wanted everything out and I said "yes" except for one item which I pointed out to him.   Unfortunately, he somehow did not take the luggage from the back seat (which included our two carry one roller bags - seemed pretty obvious we'd want those).  Check in:  We arrived around 12:30pm and official check in time was 4pm.  There was a short 2-3 person wait as there were lots of
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share these details of your experience. We are elated to hear you found our location in Dana Point to be to your liking. We regret any miscommunication that may have occurred during check in. An early arrival can likely lead to a waiting period, but our ladies and gentlemen are always expected to be perfectly honest and clear regarding temporary delays. If you are ever unsatisfied with your room or any amenities within it, we encourage you to contact us directly. We are proud to provide a one-of-a-kind experience to each and every guest and are always open to constructive feedback whether in-person during your visit or upon your departure. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back for a stay that more closely meets our five-star standard.

Summary: Just stayed for a conference.  The property met the expectations of a Ritz.  All the meals were fantastic and the waitstaff was outstanding.  Room was great - awesome bed - and the bathroom is large (would prefer a shower with a door rather than a shower curtain).  Highlight was the quiet - never heard noises in the halls, adjoining rooms, or outside activities.  After long days with meetings this was very welcome.
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely feedback. We are delighted you were able to enjoy a quiet, relaxing stay. It is always lovely to hear when our business travelers are able to enjoy some peaceful leisure time between meetings or conferences. Should you find yourself back in Dana Point for either business or pleasure, we would love to welcome you back for another perfect stay.

Summary: This was absolutely the best stay my wife and I have ever had. It was a beautiful setting of course but the staff was the most exceptional part. Every single person made a difference because of their sincere willingness to care for us as their guest. Thank you and we hope to make it back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your generous review. It is fantastic to know you consider out hotel among the best you and your husband have ever visited. We are elated to hear you enjoyed impeccable service from our dedicated ladies and gentlemen. On behalf of each one of them, we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: The Ritz at Laguna Niguel has a prominent position at Dana Point, offering outstanding ocean views and excellent beach front.  The property is well-maintained and staffed with friendly, helpful professionals.    I stayed in a room with two doubles on the concierge floor.  The complimentary snack and beverage offerings at the reception area of the concierge floor were plentiful and high quality.  I was impressed with the effort that the staff on the floor made to ensure that my stay was comfortable.    The room was of average size, with a roomy bathroom and an above average closet (good drawers, well-positioned hanging area).  Air conditioning controls seemed responsive and allowed for a comfortable climate in the room.  My room had a small balcony that looked out into the pool
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to detail your visit. It was truly a pleasure to welcome you to Dana Point, and we are delighted you enjoyed a five-star stay. It is fantastic to hear you felt well taken care of on our spacious concierge floor. We are proud to provide exceptional service and amenities to en-sure your experience is one-of-a-kind. We are pleased to know you would consider returning, and we hope this second trip comes in the near future.

Summary: Stayed 2 nights for my son's wedding. The setting is beautiful, the hotel is wonderfully classy.  Our rooms overlooked the ocean and were well proportioned and very comfortable. All the staff were very polite and obliging and nothing seemed too much trouble. The food at the wedding buffet was to die for and the service was excellent. A wonderful place for a special occasion!
Manager Response: First and foremost, congratulations to your son on this wonderful occasion. We are honored you chose to stay with us for such a special celebration and are thrilled you enjoyed a perfect experience. It brings us great joy knowing your expectations were exceeded in so many areas, from the event buffet to the view from your room. Should you wish to return for future events or simply for leisure, we would be proud to host you again.

Summary: My family and I stayed here for 4 nights and had a nice time.  We had a beautiful ocean view room.   The room was clean and spacious.  Service was good, but not great (spotty at times). This property is very large with many rooms.   If you are looking for bespoke, highly personal service, you will not likely find it here.  Food at the onsite restaurants was ok (edible but not spectacular) but extremely expensive.  Service at the restaurants was average at best.   Concierge did a great job recommending an excellent surf teacher for my daughter.  He came to the hotel to pick us up and took us to a wonderful beginners surf beach.   The surf lesson was the highlight for my daughter.   There is a shuttle that takes you from the property to the nearby beach.   The property is not
Manager Response: We are grateful for the time you have taken to review your luxury experience. It is marvelous know-ing you enjoyed our spectacular views of the Pacific Ocean. We are pleased our concierge was helpful in recommending the right surf spot for your daughter and that she thoroughly enjoyed this Southern California experience. We are disappointed to hear certain aspects of your visit were not perfect for you and your family. If you would like to further discuss this feedback, we encourage you to contact us directly. We look forward to welcoming you back for a five-star stay in the future.

Summary: Great hotel and service. We would visit again. The property is very beautiful and the staff is great. I think that the club level lounge needs new furniture but overall everything was great! We were there for a charity event and it is a perfect place for that type of event, the garden was et up for a silent auction and it looked great
Manager Response: We are grateful for your review of your experience in Dana Point. It is lovely to hear your visit exceeded expectations in so many areas. We are proud to host many different events, and we are delighted you so enjoyed the benefit you attended. Your comments regarding our Club Lounge have been noted and will be used when making improvements in the future. Next time you feel like making the drive from Newport Beach, we would love to provide another perfect stay.

Summary: My wife and I stayed at this hotel for a conference. The room had a small balcony that was overlooking the ocean where we could enjoy the great view, including the occasional whale sighting. It is also an easy walk down to the beach from the hotel. We had dinner at enosteak at the hotel which was great, and also had great drinks and snacks at the beautiful outdoors bar. All in all we had a great stay at this beautiful hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review. We are proud knowing you enjoyed such a memorable experience in Dana Point. It is marvelous to hear you and your wife were able to take advantage of your private balcony, our beautiful beach and the delicious enoSTEAK restaurant. Should you find yourself back in the area, we would be thrilled to welcome you back.

Summary: I had the pleasure to stay at the Ritz for a conference. The location is beautiful, rooms and common space are well appointed and staff super attentive. Banquet/ conference space was good, only wish for more outlets or charging stations
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review. We were proud to host your conference and are thrilled you enjoyed a perfect visit. It is wonderful knowing each aspect of our hotel in Dana Point exceeded your expectations. If you are in the area for business or leisure again, we would be delighted to welcome you back.

Summary: Such a wonderful long weekend at the Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel. The fantastic views of the Pacific are well complemented by the terrific staff. We immediately felt at home as we were greeted warmly by Justine at the front desk. She definitely went above and beyond to assure we enjoyed our stay throughout the rainy Presidents' weekend, and made an extra effort to accommodate any requests. We took advantage of several services in the luxurious spa, and were well pleased. Lunch at Raya offers a creative menu that is deliciously prepared. Valet parking was always quick to retrieve our car. We hope to return to this comfortable, beautiful resort soon!
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share your feedback. While we wish you could have enjoyed better weather, we are pleased you experienced perfection in so many other areas. It is spectacular knowing you were able to take advantage of our spa and dining outlets while you were here as well. We will be sure to pass along your compliments to Justine and the rest of our ladies and gentlemen. On behalf of our entire team, we hope to see you again.

Summary: 10 on 10 at Ritz Carlton, Dana Point, Laguna Niguel. Excellent service, everything above expectations. Everyone eager to help and take care of you. most comfortable experience from check in to check out.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your luxury experience in Dana Point. It is marvelous to hear your expectations were met throughout the duration of your visit. We are thrilled knowing our ladies and gentlemen made you feel perfectly comfortable. We hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: The location is fabulous and we had a wonderful room looking over the ocean and near the spa and pool area.  The room was spacious and the bathroom very large.  Had dinner in two different locations on property and was pleased.  Having Dean as a server was fantastic. However,  1) was charged $ 150 for dry cleaning a suit coat, had to call Cesar to get resolved but no real apology 2)  was in the room and room attendant opened door, walked away, and then came back and realized I was still in the room  (no knock or consideration) 3)  sat in the pool area for over two hours during the day and never saw a hotel employee  (would have ordered drinks or food) See below... valet parking is only option. staff was prompt.
Manager Response: We are grateful for your honest review of your luxury experience. It is spectacular to hear you appreciated our perfect location in Dana Point as well our dining options and the service you received from Dean. We regret any miscommunication regarding our laundry service as well as any lapses in service near our pool area or with our housekeeping team. Your feedback has certainly been noted and will be brought to the attention of the appropriate teams. We hope you will consider a return visit to our hotel, as we would love to serve you with the five-star experience we are proud to provide each of our guests.

Summary: My first visit to The Ritz Laguna Niguel was amazing.   From the minute we arrived to check out; service was incredible.  There was a small 'glitch' when we first got to our room and Josh at the front desk and Miguel in engineering went above and beyond to correct the situation and turned me into a raving fan!   Penni and Shelley on the club level are the best at what they do.  They called me by name and made me feel right at home from the start.  I highly recommend the Club level as all the amenities are wonderful and the food/service is incredible.  I typically stay at another resort in the area but will definitely stay here again and again and again and will recommend this to all my friends and clients!
Manager Response: It was truly a pleasure to welcome you for your first visit to our property. We are disappointed knowing there was any confusion at check in, but we are pleased to hear Miguel and Josh handled the situation efficiently and professionally. It sounds as if our Club Level was a highlight of your visit, and we are thrilled to hear it exceeded expectations. On behalf of Penni, Shelley and the rest of our team, we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Excellent location and great staff.  The sunsets are not to be missed.  I would recommend for business or pleasure.  Pricing is at a preimum which is not surprizing for Ritz-Carlton. Dana Point and Laguna are wonderful communities to visit.
Manager Response: It is wonderful knowing you were able to enjoy a few stunning sunsets from the beaches of Dana Point. We are proud knowing your luxury experience exceeded expectations. Thank you for your review. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Stayed here for three nights for a conference in February.   It is a beautiful property with fantastic views and facilities and consistently, some of the friendliest staff I have come across in a long while.   Only complaints are that is very spread out (it can take you a long while to get from your room to a conference room for example) and that my room had a fridge in it louder than aircraft at an airport hotel...   That said - enjoyed it thoroughly and would like to return as a tourist!
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share your review. It was a pleasure to welcome you for your conference, and we hope the event ran smoothly. We regret any difficulty you experienced getting from your room to the desired meeting space. If there is ever anything we can do to increase comfort or convenience during your visit, we encourage you to contact us directly. If you should be in the area for business or leisure in the future, we would be delighted to serve you again.

Summary Heading: Highly overrated and way too expensive for what you get.
Summary: Disclaimer - I travel a lot and stay in various types of places so I base my evaluations on a sliding scale. Having stayed recently at The Broadmoor (which was flawless) my expectations were high for the Ritz-Carlton. So, where to begin? The difficulty making the reservation for various reasons too lengthy to discuss here? Short story was we were promised one thing by the reservation agent but when we checked in was told that option was unavailable.   How about the RItz website that had promotions ending the previous December but still had not been updated by mid January? And when I called to see if any current promotions were available I was told no even though its off-season.   Or, should I discuss the cramped, outdated room? We stayed in the Fireside Oceanview room with 2
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your detailed feedback.  We have taken it seriously and constructively, and have shared it with the appropriate leaders here at the resort.  We are grateful for your time and efforts and we look forward to speaking with you directly.  Please contact the Executive Office at your convenience so we can work through the issues mentioned and ensure your complete satisfaction and trust.  We can be reached at (949) 240-2000.

Summary: Stayed for our anniversary  and had the most beautiful experience. Every year we choose different hotels. This one has been so far the best of all of them. We decided to go back for a longer time with the family. Food, drinks view are amazing!!! Service was superlative.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback. It was an honor to be a part of such a special occasion, and we are thrilled you so thoroughly enjoyed your visit. It is fantastic to hear our hotel exceeded expectations—especially after years of celebrating this romantic event in other areas. We hope to welcome you and your family back soon.

Summary: Average is tough to say about a Ritz hotel experience because it's typically above average. This property is nice, on the cliff, Dana Point, great views. Service not the Ritz exceptional you might expect; it was fine, but not the over-the-top experience I have had at other hotels in this chain. Starting with the wait at check in, really!? So, I was given a bottle of water by the floor manager, but how about checking me in. Then, not a soul offered to help me schlep my suitcase to my room, which was just about at the farthest end of the 2nd floor. OK, so didn't spring for the ocean view, which would have been spectacular, but the inside view, partial pool with trees obstructing/shading meant NO light in the room. Couldn't see to iron clothes even in the daylight with all the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your honest review. It troubles us knowing you experienced anything less than perfection during your time in Dana Point. We are proud to provide not only impeccable accommodations, but also exceptional service from each of our ladies and gentlemen. If you noticed shortcomings in either of these areas, we sincerely apologize. If there is every anything we can provide—whether it be a beverage, an extra amenity or a seat by the pool—we encourage you to contact us directly. We hope you will consider a return visit, as we would love the chance to restore your faith in our one-of-a-kind hotel.

Summary: Very nice and elegant hotel with very good few restaurants, nice facilities, excellent Staff , big rooms and wonderful terrasse bar facing the ocean. Very good location withe a lot of sports activity in and around the hotel.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your five-star review. We are proud knowing you enjoyed each aspect of your visit to Dana Point, from our selection of restaurants to our breathtaking views of the Pacific. We hope you will return for another perfect stay in the future.

Summary: This hotel is exceptional in all ways. I travel a lot and this is by far one of my favorite hotels. The service was impeccable, the design gorgeous and location can't be beat. 5 stars all the way around.
Manager Response: It brings us great joy to know we rank among your favorite hotels. We are delighted your expectations were exceeded in each area of your luxury experience. Should your travels bring you back to Dana Point, we would be happy to accommodate you again.

Summary: The resort was very nice. I thought it would be fancier since it is a Ritz Carlton however what an awesome location. There was a weird smell in the hallway. It smelled like an animal peed and they were trying to mask the odor. Other than that I loved the resort and very much so the location.
Manager Response: We are grateful for your helpful review. While we are thrilled you enjoyed our beautiful Dana Point property, we are concerned by the areas that may have been less than perfect. We are pleased these minor aspects did not detract from the overall quality of your five-star experience. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back in the future.

Summary: Everything you'd expect from a Ritz... And then some! I am not sure how the staff does it, but EVERYONE remembers your name! Champagne upon arrival- I wish every Ritz offered this! Lobby is gorgeous - filled with light and gorgeous flower arrangements (yellow when we arrived, red when we departed).  Beautiful artwork and displays-- grab a seat by one of the fireplaces and enjoy a book about waves or whales or other coastal themes.  Our room looked over the ocean, we fell asleep to the sounds of the surf!  Nicely appointed rooms with fridge, coffee maker, safe, DVD player-- 2 sinks in the bathroom!!
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to detail your experience in Dana Point. From the attentive care of our ladies and gentlemen to our unique welcome amenities, we are thrilled you were pleased with each aspect of your stay. Your description of falling asleep to the sound of the Pacific Ocean paints the perfect picture of the experience we are proud to provide our guests. We hope you will return for another memorable visit soon.

Summary: It was unfortunate but we did not feel that the staff actually anticipated or needs or attempted to find out anything about what we expected about our stay and therefore we actually ended up getting less than we expected.
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest feedback. It disappoints us to know you were less than satisfied with your luxury experience. We are proud to provide one-of-a-kind service to each of our guests, and we regret any areas in which your expectations were not met. If you would like to further discuss your experience, please do not hesitate to contact us directly. We look forward to providing you with a much-improved stay in the future.

Summary: I was really impressed on how your staff treated my sister and my niece after they arrived to meet me at my symposium. you r staff treated them like royalty and made their visit enjoyable. The location is beautiful!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to review your visit to Dana Point. We are thrilled your sister and niece felt so well taken care of by our courteous ladies and gentlemen. We hope to welcome all three of you back in the not so distant future.

Summary: This hotel keeps getting better every time I visit.  They have redone many areas of the hotel and now with the rooftop bars and restaurants looking out to amazing sunsets, this hotel is a cool relaxing weekend getaway.  Rooms are clean, good sized & decorated tastefully with a seaside vibe.  Bathrooms still are older white/black marble decor but large and well planned for counter space.  Service is wonderful typical Ritz Carlton top notch, and the views from the ocean front or view rooms are the best.  Ground floor rooms also get outdoor patios and Smoores to make on the terrace.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share your lovely feedback. It has been a pleasure to welcome you for multiple luxury experiences in Dana Point. From our stunning views to our exceptional service, we are delighted your expectations were exceeded in so many areas. Should you find yourself looking for a getaway in the future, we would be happy to accommodate you again.

Summary: the hotel itself is beautiful, staff is alright. Rooms are VERY ordinary and you must know that the grounds are beautiful but beach are for surfer ( evidently) therefore, I was surprised to see that the amenities in the hotel are medium especially for a Ritz Cartlon estate. I've stayed at many hotels of that chain  and it's the first one where I find a very small room with no mini-bar, no-snacks, and very low key decor. In room service is less then average for the quality of hotel ( view picture)of when I called for bathrobes... it was not ritzcarlton standard in my opinion.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your review. It is fantastic to hear you found our property in beautiful Dana Point to be to your liking. However, we are concerned by the areas in which you may have noticed shortcomings. We promise nothing but the best to each of our guests, and we are disappointed to hear you experienced anything less than exceptional service. We hope you will consider a return visit, as we would greatly appreciate the opportunity to restore your faith in our hotel.

Summary Heading: Depending on what room you get....
Summary: Front dest help wasn't too friendly.  The boy in front didn't want to help beyond the fact that saying my name wasn't on the reservation so he couldn't (more like wouldn't) assist me (our son reserved 2 rooms under his name--one for us & one for him).  The room we stayed in was pretty shabby, it had a "fire pit" on the patio; however, there was no instructions on how to work it.  I guess they were renovating it in January, because there was rolls of imitation turf as part of the rooms view.  Room was nothing to rave about. The other side of the hotel with the corner suites are beautiful with a gorgeous view.  However, if you have a choice, stay at the Montage..staff are nicer, ambience is way better, and you still have a gorgeous view.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share your honest feedback. While we are pleased to hear you enjoyed our gorgeous views, we are disappointed knowing your expectations were not met in other areas of your visit. We regret if you feel you weren't treated with anything but the utmost care and respect. If you would like to further discuss your stay, we encourage you to contact us directly. We would greatly appreciate the opportunity to restore your faith in our hotel through either a phone call or a much-improved second stay.

Summary: The Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel is a beautiful hotel with helpful staff right on the beach near Dana Point.  The common areas are spotless, tastefully designed with wide hallways, and a luxury feel from the atrium to the conference center.  The fitness center has a fantastic view of the ocean with top level cardio equipment.  I was able to manage the remote control on my TV without having to read the instructions.  The nearby walking paths wind through ocean and golf course views with enough hills to be challenging.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to detail your luxury experience. We are elated to hear you enjoyed a perfect visit to Dana Point. We promise comfort, convenience and exceptional service and are thrilled you experienced each of these important aspects during your stay with us. Should you wish to return, we would be honored to have you.

Summary: Fabulous trip to the Ritz! Our Ocean view room overlooking the Pacific was stunning complete with a fire pit! Truly an amazing experience! All of the staff were friendly, welcoming and helpful! Thank you for a fabulous experience!
Manager Response: We’d like to thank you for your generous review. It is marvelous to hear your expectations were exceeded throughout your time in Dana Point. Our stunning Pacific views are a point of great pride for us, so we are elated to hear you enjoyed them from your private patio. We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Wonderful staff, beautiful location, luxurious rooms and amenities, great food.  Definitely would come back, and bring my family next time.  The beach is nearby, and there are so many things to do and explore in the area.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your helpful review. It is spectacular knowing your experience was lovely enough to warrant a return visit. It would be our pleasure to welcome you and your family in the future. We hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Absolutely the top of luxury and pampering with a real feel of personalization.  Always very helpful staff, could not think of anything left out.  Fitness room out of this world with a view of the ocean from the treadmills.
Manager Response: It brings us great joy to know you enjoyed such a lovely experience. From your time in our fitness facilities to your experience with our attentive staff, it is wonderful knowing each aspect of your stay was perfect. We hope to have the pleasure of serving you again.

Summary: Nothing compares to a fireside ocean view meal on your own patio. The fireside is well worth the upgrade. Request a room that does NOT connect according to our friends they could hear their neighbor through that room.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and your choice to stay with us. We are thrilled you enjoyed your private bonfire and patio area. Next time you are in the area, we hope you will return for an equally memorable stay.

Summary: I can only say that everyone that I came into contact with that was employed by the hotel was friendly helpful kind and actually interested in how they could help in making the stay wonderful . We were ion the club level which provides for meals cocktails and snacks. truly a great service. and they would be quite keen to get you anything you desired (meal or cocktail wise)  Additionally  beautiful running track near the sea with bunnies bounding about in the AM
Manager Response: We are grateful for the time you have taken to share your thoughts. We are incredibly proud of our courteous ladies and gentlemen, and we are pleased to hear they treated you with the utmost care and respect. It is our hope to ensure the complete comfort of each guest, so we are delighted you felt well taken care of. We look forward to welcoming you back for another five-star stay in the future.

Summary Heading: Beautiful property, incredible views, great service.
Summary: We just returned from a wonderful five days at the Ritz-Carlton, Laguna-Niguel.  It is located on a bluff overlooking the Pacific.  The view from the outdoor bar is incredible, and I highly recommend enjoying a cocktail while watching a spectacular sunset.    It was quite cold while we were there (end of January - early February), but my husband managed to enjoy the pool because it was heated to a comfortable temperature.  Our room overlooked the pool - which was lovely, but it would be well worth paying extra to have a view of the magnificent ocean (rooms at ground level have lovely propane fire tables - our friends had one, and it was an excellent place to gather before dinner).  The rooms are recently renovated, and are lovely and comfortable.  They contain all the amenities
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to detail your luxury experience. From our beautiful property to our exceptional team of ladies and gentlemen, we are proud of the areas where your expectations were exceeded. We promise a one-of-a-kind experience, and we are delighted you enjoyed a five-star visit. If you wish to return to Dana Point, we would be happy to assist in booking the perfect room for your needs. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Way overpriced--everything was fine, but why waste money on a place to sleep. Even a Coke needs to come from room service at an inflated price. Many folks like this, but it's not for me. I would much rather spend my tourist $$ at local businesses rather than at a place to sleep.
Manager Response: We are grateful for your constructive comments. While we are pleased you enjoyed the quality of your visit, we are concerned by the areas in which you are disappointed. It is an absolute priority to provide a luxurious experience to each guest, and we regret any shortcomings you may have experienced. We hope you will consider returning for a five-star stay in the future.

Summary Heading: Good luck at the front drsk
Summary: Negative comment to the front desk people first time in my life.  I need tell them at least three times to get my name correct for  the room.  Manager or supervisor not provided the level of expertise for guess complain handling.  This hotel not worth the reputation and the price
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest feedback. As a hotel that is extremely proud to provide attentive service, we are disappointed by your comments. We regret any areas in which attention to detail was not evident. If you would like to directly discuss your frustration, we encourage you to contact us directly. We would appreciate the chance to restore your faith in our hotel.

Summary: Amazing place and amazing service. The rooms are spacious and very clean. Bathrooms are spacious, high end and the staff make you feel like a royalty. The place accommodates your cravings for good food, drinks, snacks and leisure activities. the views are breathtaking.
Manager Response: We appreciate your five-star review. It is wonderful to hear your expectations were met and your cravings were satisfied to perfection while you were at our hotel. If you find yourself in the area again, we would be delighted to serve you a second time.

Summary Heading: An amazing combination of luxury and stunning location
Summary: I think it will be difficult to beat what this stunning locaiton has to offer. They have brought together the winning combination of pure luxury, amazing archetecture, breath taking scenery and an surfing culture all into one well molding resort. Everything worked in harmony, from great weather, fantasict food, great work out facilities, fantastic beach locaiton. short bus ride into Laguna Beach to enjoy some art galleries. The staff at the hotel take pride in their jobs, and that can be seen everday, well done!  Our room, was very comfortable, with an ocean view, fantastic sun sets. Great in room WiFi which worked throughout the resort, no problems. You wont be disapointed !
Manager Response: It brings us great joy to read your generous review. Each aspect you mention is a source of pride for us, so we are elated to hear your expectations were exceeded throughout. Whether you are working out overlooking the Pacific or enjoying the nearby attractions of Laguna Beach, we promise a memorable experience to each of or guests. Thank you for your kind words. We hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: Stayed here for 2 nights and the views are breathtaking; you feel like you are an island. Many fine restaurants in the hotel but the staff are amazing they go out of the way without you even asking which is a huge plus for any hotel. Would def come back! Only wish the beds were a little firmer :)
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your luxury experience. From our stunning views to our attentive ladies and gentlemen, we are pleased each aspect of your visit was perfect. If there is ever anything we can do to make you more comfortable, we encourage you to contact us directly. Next time you find yourself planning a getaway, we hope you will consider a return visit to Dana Point.

Summary: Fantastic property perched on the top of a cliff overlooking the pacific. Sunrises and sunsets are spectacular and the hotel is elegantly appointed throughout. Staff very friendly and willing to help with requests. The two swimming pools are nice although one is significantly bigger than the other. Get an ocean facing room and you may never leave it. Gym is stunning. Food excellent. Terrific location.
Manager Response: We are grateful for your choice to stay with us as well as your kind, five-star review. It is fantastic to hear your stay was perfect, from your time in our fitness facilities to the view from your guest room. We look forward to welcoming you for another exceptional experience in the future.

Summary Heading: Amazing Weekend Away, but not without a few hiccups...
Summary: Firstly, if you are looking for a 5-star premium weekend away or relaxing time by the beach in SoCal, you cannot get better than Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. I planned a romantic weekend away at the Ritz to propose to my partner overlooking the sunset from the hotel grounds.  I had booked an Ocean View room with fire-pit, expecting the room would be facing West which was confirmed upon check-in although after walking to the room late at night and awaking the next morning I soon realized the room was facing North and therefore in January would get no sun at all, especially the romantic sunset I had envisioned.  On top of this, the fire-pit would not start and I had to call to have it fixed twice so as the big moment got closer I became more frustrated knowing that my plans were
Manager Response: First and foremost, congratulations on your recent engagement. We greatly appreciate your choice to stay with us as well as the time you have taken to share these details of your experience. It is disappointing to know certain details of your visit did not work out as planned, but we were happy to put in the effort necessary to make your romantic proposal even more perfect than you had originally imagined. We encourage guests to contact us directly is there is ever an issue, and we were pleased you did so, as it helped us improve the overall quality of your trip. We wish you and your partner ever happiness and hope you will return to celebrate future special occasions in Dana Point.

Summary Heading: One of the Most Beautiful Ritz Properties in the US + Service to Match
Summary: We arrived on a rather chilly January Sunday Late Afternoon. From the second we arrived everything was very easy. The check in, valet, bell services etc. The room was perfect overlooking the Pacific with a Fireplace. We had room service and it was outstanding. The staff was exceptional. Patrick from valet/bell services did an outstanding job of helping us every time he saw us. He gave us recommendations about the surrounding area.We had such an amazing time we did not want to leave. This is not the first visit to this Ritz Carlton. I have had the pleasure of staying here several times, being in the Travel industry I have stayed at the other properties in the area and Highly Recommend the Ritz for the amazing staff and attention to detail. Thanks for a wonderful stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for painting this lovely picture of your visit. It was a pleasure to welcome you to Dana Point last month for a relaxing West Coast experience. We are delighted to hear your expectations were exceeded from the moment you checked in. We are proud to provide the best in accommodations, views and service, and we are thrilled knowing your visit matched these standards. Should you wish to return for either business or leisure, we would love to serve you again.

Summary Heading: A fine hotel in an extraordinary setting
Summary: The location of his hotel is fantastic; you can sip you G&T in the bar while looking out over a beach full of surfers. A short walk away, the beach offers white sands and scenic looks of the hotel high on the rocks.
Manager Response: We are grateful for your generous feedback. It is wonderful knowing you enjoyed a perfect experience here in Dana Point. We are proud to provide a drink with a view and anything else you may need on your visit. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back for another memorable stay.

Summary: I was here again for another conference for work and I've already reviewed but I can't pass up another opportunity to let you all know what a great stay and beautiful hotel to visit!  The hotel staff are phenomenal and I want send a special shout out to McClinton at the front desk!  He went above and beyond helping me with check-in and ensuring I was happy about my stay because he could tell I was upset about how my job handled the reservation which had nothing to do with him or the Ritz Carlton and he took care of us and  it was really appreciated!  Also, hotel is great location and close to everything such as stores and restaurants. Parking is valet only.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate this detailed review of your experience. It is marvelous to know your expectations were exceeded in terms of our exceptional service and central location. While we are disappointed to hear you experienced any miscommunication, we are delighted the situation was handled professionally and efficiently. On behalf of McClinton and the rest of our ladies and gentleman, we look forward to welcoming you back for future visits.

Summary Heading: A Stay yYou Will Never Forget
Summary: I had the distinct pleasure of attending a conference at the Ritz Carlton Laguna Nieguel this past week. Words can adequately describe the quiet tasteful luxury that awaits each guest. The rooms are beautiful, the views are breath taking, the food is outstanding and the staff are wonderful. No corner has been cut to provide a truly memorable experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review. We are flattered by your kind words and are proud to know your stay was so enjoyable. Should you find yourself in the area for either business or leisure in the future, we would be honored to serve you again.

Summary: Fantastic resort all the amenities one would expect in So Cal. The staff was very helpful and attention to detail was phenomenal. They accommodated a party 10 for dinner last minute and made it memorable for the group
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel and for taking the time to review your experience. It was our pleasure to welcome your group for a meal, and we hope each one of you had a lovely time. Should you find yourself back in Dana Point, we would be delighted to serve you again.

Summary: Ritz Laguna Niguel Staff were exceptional in all aspects of our stay from initial greeting, to car valet pickup.  Awesome room upgrade, as well as excellent restaurant service, made this a memorable visit.  Will definitely return.
Manager Response: We appreciate the moment you have taken to share your review. Our ladies and gentlemen are a point of great pride for us, and we are thrilled they exceeded your expectations. It is marvelous to hear you will return. We look forward to this next visit.

Summary: Nice time and wife had a good time in spa. The staff was very responsive and provided good service. Appreciated good room service food. We also had great service and food in bar.  Our room was a nice upgrade with a fire pit outside. Nice to get warm and watch the stars.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback. It is marvelous to know you enjoyed a perfect experience in Dana Point, from our helpful ladies and gentlemen to our comfortable spa accommodations. It was a pleasure to welcome you and your wife, and we hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: We have been coming to this Ritz for several years, so when our daughter's boyfriend wanted to propose to her on New Year's Eve he decided to do it there (they are both students at Univ. of Alabama) The whole staff was so helpful. The Photography Studio inside the Ritz there (Pacific Dreams) was awesome! We worked with them to capture the moment for Rachael and Hunter. Alesha (the Creative director) worked with me at the last minute since there was rain at the original time he wanted to propose. The pictures came out amazing, and they even put together a surprise video of it for us. I am a photographer myself, so I'm very picky when it comes to hiring photographers but I was beyond satisfied! We have stayed in several rooms during our visits. Our favorite is the Ocean View room
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to detail your visit. We are grateful for your continued loyalty and your decision to spend such a special occasion with us. Our hearts are full for Rachael, Hunter and your entire family! We are proud to have been a part of your daughter’s love story. Next time you wish to celebrate a special event or milestone, we would be thrilled to assist in planning. On behalf of Alesha and the rest of our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward your next visit.

Summary: Great service from a Fantastic location! I would say Ritz Carlton lives up its name at Laguna Beach. From the initial check in to check out, we had a great time.  I would definitely recommend the club level if you have the opportunity.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to review your luxury experience. We promise nothing but the best to each guest, and we are pleased you enjoyed a five-star visit. We hope you will return for another stay in the near future.

Summary Heading: Talk about a room with a view!
Summary: Location, location, location.  This hotel has it all.  Spectacular views from many different landscaped areas around the buildings.  A very special place to watch the sun set over the ocean.  Excellent service, especially in the small cafe where the offerings are rather unusual and very delicious.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your kind review of your experience. We are incredibly proud of our Dana Point location, and we are delighted you enjoyed it. Should you wish to return for more beautiful sunsets, we would love to accommodate you again.

Summary: My second time back to this property and just as with the first it was AMAZING.   Let me net this out for you. You are staying here for the view so my advice is spend the extra dollars to get a "Ocean Front" room.   Take the first floor as you'll be able to step from your balcony directly onto the cliff overlooking the beach vs. being on the upper floors where you'll have to take the elevator down to the ground level to hang-out on the Adirondack chairs that overlook the ocean.  Ask for one of these rooms; 1002,1004, 1006, 1008, 10010, or 1012. All are on the ground level, ocean front with fire pits. If you want to see the view, check out the pictures that I've posted.  You'll find the staff to be top notch and more than eager to please. The outdoor bar that over looks the ocean
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate the time you have taken to share your feedback. It is marvelous to hear your expectations were exceeded in so many areas, from our breathtaking Pacific Ocean views to our courteous team of ladies and gentlemen. Should you find yourself planning another West Coast visit, we would be proud to accommodate you again.

Summary: The hotel is situated on the Pacific coast with excellent views, facilities, restaurants and most of all exceptional staff.  The fitness area has an excellent view of the coast in ocean. The Raya, one of the available restaurants also has a beautiful view. The spa is excellent.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star review. We are elated to hear you enjoyed a perfect experience in Dana Point. We promise one-of-a-kind luxury to each guest, and we are thrilled your expectations were exceeded. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: Here on a company function and the experience has been great, although not the best RC I've stayed at. Outstanding views and the customer service and food is excellent. My one complaint is the place is spread out all over the place and very confusing with very little signage. I got lost a couple of times with doors that only open 1 way and no direction of how to get back around.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay. We could not be more pleased to hear you had time to enjoy our sweeping ocean views between meetings. In terms of signage, we appreciate this valuable feedback and will certainly take into consideration how we might better direct guests moving forward. We hope your travels bring you back our way in the future so we can provide you with the perfect stay you deserve.

Summary: Stayed for the second time at the hotel and it will probably be my last time - prices are outrageous and the food and beverage offerings are not impressive at all. Yes, the views onto the ocean are stunning but I would not go back there for just the view. The service is also not very friendly but somewhat mechanical - rehearsed and not from the heart. I was truly disappointed.
Manager Response: We are grateful for your honest feedback. While we are pleased to hear you enjoyed our beautiful property, we are disappointed knowing your expectations were not met in terms of our service. We are proud to provide complete luxury to each of our guests, and we regret any areas in which you were not treated exceptionally. We hope you will consider returning, as we would truly appreciate the chance to restore your faith in our hotel.

Summary: The excellent customer service began when we made our reservations. It continued throughout our stay. The entire staff was very friendly & looked for ways to make our stay memorable. It was a perfect balance for a business & pleasure trip.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share your experience. It is fantastic knowing you enjoyed impeccable service from our ladies and gentlemen. Should you return for either business or pleasure, we would be delighted to serve you again.

Summary: The Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel is probably my favorite hotel in the United States.  Elegant, excellent service, beautiful location.  Comfortable and spacious rooms.  Nice double-vanity bathrooms.  I love the easy access to the beach and walking-trials.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your flattering review. We are proud to have provided you with such a memorable experience. Next time you are on the West Coast, we would be thrilled to welcome you back for another perfect visit.

Summary: This has been one of our favourite hotels for a while having stayed a number of times. So whilst the location, staff and service is generally still very good, the rooms really need a refurb, particularly the bathrooms. I mean $1000 a night & still have to climb into the bath to have a shower - and try shaving or applying make up (my wifes grizzle!) after a shower! Must say though the breakfasts were the best we had in 3 weeks of travel - excellent food, & service & superb views! Wont be back until a refurb is done - plenty of other excellent hotels with better facilities around.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to detail your luxury experience. While we are pleased to know you enjoyed our beautiful location and exceptional service, we are troubled by the areas of your visit that did not meet expectations. We promise a one-of-a-kind experience to each guest we welcome, and we regret any areas in which you noticed any shortcomings. Your comments regarding our guest rooms has been noted and will be brought to the appropriate departments. We hope you will return to enjoy a much-improved stay in the future.

Summary Heading: Weekend getaway at the Ritz Carlton, Laguna Niguel
Summary: What an amazing property! Beautiful ocean views, breathtaking sunsets, luxurious amenities and extremely friendly staff who represent the Ritz Carlton credo to perfection. Following a long drive in from the city, Candice was truly amazing providing us with a warm welcome at check in. We look forward to making this our regular weekend getaway!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your kind feedback. It is fantastic to hear your experience was perfect, from your time watching the sunset to your interactions with our courteous staff. On behalf of Candice and the rest of our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to welcoming you for your next weekend getaway.

Summary: The hotel was very clean and the staff extremely helpful and outgoing. Check in was very easy and fast. We had dinners there and the food was terrific. One of the best Fillet's I have ever had. Very nice view of the ocean from the room and certain areas around the hotel.
Manager Response: We are grateful for your five-star review and are thrilled you found your stay to be so perfect. We are proud to provide everything needed for a relaxing, luxury experience, from our comfortable accommodations to our various dining options. Should you find yourself in Dana Point again, we would love to welcome you back.

Summary: This stay was amazing. I've never been at a hotel that offered such an experience!  The service was fantastic. The exclusivity made me feel like a super star!  The rooms were great! The food was great!  The beach and area was beautiful! I suggest if you can visit once in your lifetime, go for it!!!  The experience is like none other!  Go Ritz!!!
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share your glowing review. We are incredibly proud of our attentive ladies and gentlemen and are pleased you enjoyed impeccable service.
