Next time you are on the West Coast, we hope you will consider returning for another perfect experience.

Summary: I can't say enough about this hotel.  In addition to the beautiful location, the staff at RC Laguna Niguel were wonderful.  It's a great hotel for families, as they go out of their way to make your kids feel like royalty.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to detail your luxury experience. It is wonderful knowing your expectations were exceeded in terms of our exceptional service and beautiful Dana Point location. On behalf of our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to welcoming you and your children back for another memorable visit.

Summary: Had lunch there and the ocean views are just fantastic.  We were there during a rain storm.  The ocean was very rough.  The Ritz dinning room has very large windows facing the Pacific ocean.  The hotel sits on a very high bluff so the views are just unbelievable.  The food was also very good but the view is what you go for.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your feedback. It is marvelous to hear we were able to provide a perfect experience, from our delicious food to our stunning Pacific views. Should you be in the area again, we would be delighted to welcome you for another meal.

Summary Heading: Amazing Views, Beautiful Hotel, No complaints
Summary: This place is amazing, where do I start.  The staff was friendly (I read some reviews ahead of time that said the staff was grumpy, I looked but couldn't find it.) Rooms were great, comfortable beds, etc.  Views were perfect.  All this was expected since we were at the Ritz.    Here were the special things about the hotel: Exercise Room, The best view from a gym I have ever experienced.  Great selection of treadmills, ellipticals and resistance equipment.  On a really busy day, with a bunch of health conscious people it might fill up and there may be a wait, I didn't experience this.  Restaurants,  I was there at a conference so the food was provided for us and we didn't eat at the restaurants, but the food was made on site and it was out of this world.  Every dish was
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share the details of your luxury experience. It is wonderful to hear your expectations were exceeded in each area of your stay. If you’re going to workout on vacation, we believe you should at least have a view to enjoy! Therefore, we are thrilled you appreciated our state-of-the-art fitness facilities as well as our beautiful pool area. If you find yourself back in Dana Point, whether for business or leisure, we would be honored to welcome you for another five-star stay.

Summary: 50 th birthday celebration for my husband.  Incredible venue, great staff to help plan and execute the perfect evening.  Staff anticipated needs, exceeded expectations and facility/grounds beautiful and memorable for this 50th celebration.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback. We were honored to host your husband’s 50th birthday celebration, and we are elated to hear you were pleased with the turnout. Should you find yourself planning more festivities in the future, we would be delighted to accommodate you again.

Summary: We had to make a change a couple days prior to our arrival and reservations were very accommodating, which took stress off our trip. The morning of our arrival, Allison Simpson called me to let me know that since it was our 30th anniversary, the Ritz Carlton wanted do something special for us. My wife was so excited when I opened our ocean front room with rose pedals on the floor and a design for our 30th anniversary. The fire pit was a great touch.  Later that evening Brandon Hill from the front desk called to make sure all was going well on our special day. The attention to detail and making sure of our comfort made this one of our best nights ever at the Ritz. We be back soon. The Ritz Carlton has and always will be one of our favorite places to visit. Thank you, Ed & Lisa
Manager Response: It brings us great joy to know you enjoyed a perfect anniversary celebration. We promise nothing but the best to each of our guests, and we are delighted your expectations were exceeded. Brandon, Allison and the rest of our ladies and gentlemen will be thrilled to hear your positive feedback. If you find yourself looking to surprise Lisa again in the future, we would love to offer our help. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: Laguna Niguel is absolutely a place that we will return! The Location, Amenities, Service are all 5 star.  I would like to return in warmer weather and for a longer stay to enjoy the full extent of the property;  Pool Area, Fitness Facility, enjoy the expansive beaches
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your kind review. It is fantastic to hear you enjoyed a perfect experience and that you plan to return. It would be our pleasure to welcome you for a longer stay so you can fully enjoy our beautiful property and unique amenities.

Summary: This was our first time staying at the Ritz and it exceeded ALL of our expectations!! Their attention to detail was first class and made our 25th Wedding Anniversary truely memorable! The CLUB level was an amazing experience from sunrise to sunset!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to review your experience. We are thrilled your expectations were exceeded on your first visit to our hotel. It is marvelous to know you enjoyed a lovely anniversary. We hope to welcome you back for many more celebrations in the future.

Summary: The Ritz Carlton Laguna Nigiuel is truly an outstanding hotel in every aspect! Definitely a special treat and one that will be repeated! From the time we arrived until we checked out, everything was perfect! A "must see" hotel! I highly recommend it!
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your kind words. It is fantastic to hear your visit was perfect from the moment you arrived until your departure. We are grateful for your recommendation and would be honored to welcome you back soon.

Summary: All in all a great oceanview luxury hotel property in Ocean County. The views were fantastic, service generally top notch and the room luxurious. Try to get a terrace level room with a fire pit if possible, that was by far my favorite aspect of the room!  While no private beach, the private access to Salt Creek Beach was perfect and even connected to public trails along the ocean. My husband and I enjoyed a nice long stroll one morning.  The place is pricey, but you get what you pay for.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review of your luxury experience. It is marvelous to know your expectations were met in so many areas, from your walk on beautiful Salt Creek Beach to your time by the terrace fire pit. It was a pleasure welcoming you and your husband, and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: i found this hotel to be over priced, run down, and overall disappointment.  only positive was the staff.  Limited food options and these were not up to the standards i would expect for price.  i was excited for my first stay at a Ritz but disappointed.
Manager Response: We appreciate your honest review and are disappointed that your visit was anything but perfect. We are proud to provide a one-of-a-kind, luxury experience to each guest, and we are saddened to hear your expectations were not met. If you would like to further discuss your feedback, please do not hesitate to contact us directly. We look forward to hearing from you.

Summary: We knew going into our event that the property was very booked. We ended up being moved around the property which was fine, though I am sure our attendees would have appreciated more consistency. We had one day in which the 12 piece band for an evening reception was practicing. The hotel had to move us to another location after lunch. The banquet team was terrific and the food was good through that department. We do a fair number of events at R-C properties, so we were disappointed by a few things. Housekeeping was spotty in our suite. One of our guests returned to her room door being ajar and no one in there - thankfully. The restaurant was very pricey and the service and food quality was disappointing. Slow/cold. The accounting department seems somewhat disorganized. We had a
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to detail your luxury experience. We are proud to host groups of all sizes, and we are honored you chose to stay with us for your event. While we are thrilled you enjoyed our location, we are troubled by any challenges you faced. We promise excellence in all areas, and it concerns us to know this was not your experience. If you would like to further discuss this feedback, we encourage you to contact us directly. We would greatly appreciate the chance to restore your faith in our hotel through either a phone call or an improved visit in the future.

Summary Heading: A little bit of Heaven on a bluff
Summary: An amazing hotel, property, views and service highly recommend. Their attention to detail and helping me have a memorable experience added so much to a world class experience that can be found especially at Ritz Carlton properties
Manager Response: It brings us great joy to know we could provide such a memorable experience. We promise five-star quality to each guest, and we are thrilled you enjoyed just that. Should you find yourself planning another vacation soon, we would love to accommodate you again.

Summary: Wonderful property in the Ritz portfolio. Secluded with awesome views, yet close enough to great sight seeing for those quick little getaways. The staff was warm and responsive and the room was quite comfortable. When in OC, this is the place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star review. From our proximity to the Pacific to our courteous ladies and gentlemen, we are delighted you enjoyed each aspect of your stay. Next time you wish to visit Orange County, we would be honored to serve you again.

Summary Heading: Housekeeping stole/lost item inside my room
Summary: I stayed at the property for a few days around the holiday season. It was a pleasant stay until housekeeping stole/lost an item inside my room. Then I was given the runaround and nasty attitude. Definitely ruined my stay and experience with the property.   Here are the details, see for your own judgment:   - I purchased an item from a shopping mall on my first day and kept it wrapped in the shopping bag in the room.  - The item mysteriously disappeared before I checked out on day 5. I never moved the item and kept it inside the room the whole time.  - I contacted their loss prevention team, and of course was given the run around -- call this person, then that, then wait, then you need to file a police report, etc.  - Their team said they conducted an investigation, which
Manager Response: This is of the utmost importance and a top priority to ensure we resolve this to your satisfaction promptly and efficiently. Please contact our executive office at your earliest convenience at 949-240-2000.

Summary: the location on a cliff overlooking the ocean is awesome. You can watch surfers in action over lunch.. This is a vey nice hiking trail off the back of the hotel. The outdoor patio is a very fun place to watch some old surfer movies. The food is definately a notch above other hotel chains.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share your feedback. We are proud to provide breathtaking views of the Pacific Ocean and are delighted you enjoyed them over lunch. Next time you are in the area, we would love to welcome you back for another perfect experience.

Summary: Would love to come back with my family! The location is magical with incredible sunsets at Salt Creek Beach. Lot of activities to enjoy nearby. Food has been fantastic and the only negative is that being South California the weather was cold and rainy and the common stress and room aisles were cold as they are quite open in some cases.
Manager Response: Thank you for detailing your experience. We are disappointed you were not able to enjoy our typically beautiful weather, but are pleased you enjoyed a few stunning sunsets while you were here. It would be our pleasure to welcome your entire family for a memorable visit in the future.

Summary: My two friends and I went to Dana Point to celebrate their 50th birthdays.  We stayed at the Ritz-Carlton in Laguna Niguel.  I have never seen a more beautiful hotel with a picturesque view!  It is on a bluff overlooking the Pacific.  We selected a first level, ocean view room that had an outdoor fire pit on the patio.  Could not have been more perfect!  We visited in June a few years ago and were able to sit in the sun in the adirondack chairs on the bluff facing the ocean to catch some rays and then sit by the fire pit in the cool of the night and listen to the waves.  The Ritz-Carlton is the ultimate hotel in service.  Fresh flowers changed out every couple of days to a different color scheme each time.  Amazing food, excellent service, beautiful view.....heaven on earth!
Manager Response: We were so pleased to have welcomed you for this exciting special occasion. You paint a lovely picture of your relaxing summer stay. We promise nothing but the best in service, amenities and accommodations, and we are elated to hear your expectations were exceeded. Next time your or a friend is planning a birthday celebration, we hope you will consider a return trip.

Summary: This hotel is amazing! By far my favorite Ritz! My upgraded room to a walk out with a fire pit was amazing! It was surreal watching the sun set with the fire pit going and just overlooking the ocean.  The staff was amazing and the all the food at all the venues was on point! Soooo Delicious and a huge variety. The valet and bell hop was so helpful and I just love it there!! I definitely want to go back!
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your five-star review. We are proud to provide a unique, luxurious experience to each of our guests, and it is fantastic to hear you enjoyed your visit. It brings us great joy to know your expectations were exceeded during your time in Dana Point. We would be thrilled to welcome you for another perfect experience.

Summary: My Hubby and I love coming to the Ritz-Carlton, especially during the holidays!  They always have the most amazing floral welcoming and beautiful holiday decorations!  The past couple years we have enjoyed their impressive display of some of the most Classic, Limited Edition Surfboard collections and how they are tastefully placed throughout the hotel!  We love enjoying a cocktail at Bar RAYA and then dining at their amazing RAYA, and the panoramic ocean view from their outside patio at 180BLU is breathtaking!  Their amenities are first class and their hospitality is nothing but the best.  Their outside grounds are stunningly kept up and put on your walking shoes for exercise and direct beach access too!   They have the most decadent holiday brunches!  We always feel like
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to detail your luxury experience. It has been our pleasure to welcome you for each of your stays. The holidays are an especially wonderful time to visit our hotel, and we are delighted you enjoyed our décor and festivities. It is spectacular knowing you have been able to take advantage of several of our dining outlets as well. Next time you are in the area, it would be our pleasure to accommodate you again.

Summary: This Hotel is beautiful!! We wanted to go to Italy but the timing was off. so off to California we went.  Family and the Ritz carlton made our  25th Anniversary Beyond memorable!  we are SPG members and now that they have merged with Marriott we decided to use our points and add some upgrades as well... beyond incredible service..we were on the club floor with a water view!! what more can you ask for!? well we never had to ask;  we had amazing food all through out the day and evening with wine and drinks, a fire place, fabulous guest to laugh with and share what sites were all of our favorites. The Staff "always with a smile"were beyond attentive... Shelly and Colleen and the entire club staff were helpful, funny and even remembered our Anniversary and presented us with a
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your kind words and your choice to join us in California. It is too bad you were not able to enjoy Europe, but we are thrilled to have provided a perfect anniversary experience in place of a trip to Italy. We are elated to hear your expectations were met in so many areas, from our stunning views to our unique amenities. On behalf of Shelly, Colleen and the rest of our ladies and gentlemen, we would be proud to welcome you for many more celebrations in the future.

Summary: This is great place to go to get away from the day to day, which is hard to do in LA.  The local area is rich in art and beach life, which is right what we were looking for.  The people at the Ritz pointed us to the right places to make our trip just what we needed.
Manager Response: We are grateful you have chosen our hotel to be your go-to getaway. It is our pleasure to recommend various activities in the lovely surrounding area, and we are thrilled you have continually enjoyed these suggestions. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: First time at Ritz in Laguna
Summary: I have been to Lugano a few times for business and a little pleasure. I have always stayed at The Montage in the past. This year our conference was down the street at the Ritz.  The staff was super friendly. Our bellman who took our bags to the room was the most friendly and informative bellman I have ever met.   The food was very good especially the breakfast.  The workout facility was nice and it looked over the water.  It seemed a little more reasonably priced for dining than what I remembered the Montage to be.   Will definitely go back.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star feedback. We are proud to provide a relaxing retreat for business travelers from all over the world. It is fantastic knowing you were able to take the time to enjoy not only our dining options but our fitness facilities as well. Should you return to the area for either business or pleasure, it would be our honor to welcome you back for another perfect experience.

Summary: The staff at this hotel is lovely, and we had good experiences in that regard- especially with the valet team. The facility itself needs an update, however, and no level of wonderful staff can compensate for that. Little things that you notice- all the baseboards and trim were DESTROYED in our hallways and room. They have been repainted (without sanding and clearly with dirt underneath) many many times, and it just looks bizarre. The bathtubs are difficult to get into if you're even moderately short, and the balcony furniture was old and falling apart.  We were woken one night but a hysterical woman fighting with someone outside our room. The security staff was with them, trying to break it up, but it took at least 10 minutes and I could never go back to sleep. Keeping it classy
Manager Response: We appreciate your honest review of your experience. While we are thrilled you found our ladies and gentlemen to be helpful and courteous, we are disappointed to hear about the areas of your stay that fell short of our standard of excellence. Your comments regarding our furnishing have been noted and will be brought to the attention of the appropriate departments. In terms of disturbances caused by other guests, we regret the occurrence, but are pleased to know our security team controlled the matter appropriately. If you plan to return to California in the future, we hope you will consider another visit to our oceanfront resort, as we would appreciate the opportunity to regain your trust.

Summary Heading: Very nice at twice the price
Summary: The Ritz is a vibrant property that offers luxury treatment and some of the best ocean views in So Cal.  You get all of this of course at twice the price.  On top of the $600-1000/night room, they add a unnecessary 10% room tax? in addition to a $30 resort fee and $15 overnight parking.  We booked the fireplace ocean view room which was smaller than a Marriott standard room,although the view was amazing.  No fan in the bathroom so expect foggy mirrors after showers.  The staff was fantastic and the on property amenities serve your every need.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share your review. It is wonderful to hear you were treated with care by our ladies and gentlemen. However, we are concerned knowing some areas of your experience did not meet expectations. We are proud to provide a luxury experience and are always willing to assist in booking the perfect room for your stay. If you would like to further discuss your comments, we would be happy to speak to you directly. We hope to hear from you or see you again in the future.

Summary Heading: A Perfectly Elegant Home Away From Home
Summary: This Property is sensational. Location and view perfevc and stunning, food and amenities top shelf. And the staff all make you feel special, at home and so comfortable. Close to Laguna Beach art, San Juan Capistrano, and San Clemente surfing
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your kind feedback. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed everything from our convenient location in Dana Point to our friendly team of ladies and gentlemen. Should you find yourself in California again, we would love to welcome you back.

Summary: We love this hotel.  Gorgeous views & attentive service.  We love staying in an ocean view room on the club level and always feel very taken care of (thank you Mary & Mercedes!).  Returning feels like home...
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your thoughts on your luxury experience. It is wonderful knowing you enjoyed the views and comfort of your room on our Club Level. Your kind words will be passed along to Mary and Mercedes as well as the rest of our lovely ladies and gentlemen. We hope to welcome you to our home for more stays in the future!

Summary: I did a TON of research for our "Pacific Coast Highway" honeymoon and we stayed here during the trip.  The service, rooms, attention to detail and excitement and encouragement of us being newlyweds made us feel so special! Sean Murphy at the front desk was so excited we had gotten married.  From beginning to end, we felt like kings and queens.    We loved our suite, worth every single penny.  Our views (even given the nasty drizzle rain our entire stay) were still pretty.  What's nice about ocean view is even if you can't see it, you can still hear it.  We loved our champagne, the bed was comfortable, bathrooms, room and living area were very clean, updated, gorgeous and helped us enjoy being in the room or out enjoying Laguna.    My husband loved his massage at the spa.  I
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your glowing five-star review. It was an honor to welcome you for your honeymoon, and we are thrilled you enjoyed a romantic getaway. From our unique touches like champagne in your room to the service of our fine ladies and gentlemen, we are pleased you enjoyed a perfect experience. On behalf of Sean and our entire staff, we would be proud to welcome you back for more exceptional visits in the future.

Summary: This Ritz Carlton is amazing! The rooms are really lovely, super impressed with the luxurious bathroom! The staff are very accommodating, first class hotel. Pretty pricy, but worth it for a nice getaway.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. We are delighted you were pleased with our comfortable accommodations and courteous ladies and gentlemen. It is spectacular to know we could provide a perfect experience, and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Spectacular Business trip and stay at this marvelous Hotel
Summary: Stayed at this hotel in April for a business trip with my husband.  First class service and amenities at the beachside property.  The food at this hotel was the best and freshest and most amazing we have ever had for all of our continuous business travel!!! The freshest CA fruits, produce, seafood were enjoyed throughout the day and evening.  Rooms and service at this hotel were superior.  After check in we could view the spectacular beach and shoreline as we made our way to our room and enjoyed watching the surfers, yet at the same time were amazed to see how quiet and serene and uncrowned the beach was... the beach trolley was fun and staff on the beach were also ver accommodating. A memorable trip for sure and would relish to go back to this hotel again and again
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to detail your luxury experience. It is fantastic to hear your expectations were exceeded in so many areas, from our fresh, local food to our breathtaking ocean views. It was a pleasure to welcome you and your husband for business, and we are pleased you had some time to relax during your visit. Should you find yourself in Dana Point again, we would love to welcome you back for another memorable experience.

Summary: Hotel staff was so accommodating and friendly. Hotel is beautiful. If you like a fitness center you can't beat working out while viewing the ocean through floor to ceiling windows. We dined at the bar and service was very good and food was tasty. Plenty of variety to meet everyone in our party's needs. We will come back.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback regarding your experience. We are elated knowing your expectations were exceeded throughout your stay, from your time in our fitness center to your meal at our bar. Should you find yourself looking to escape the snow again this winter, we would be delighted to welcome you for another perfect visit.

Summary Heading: World-class hotel, a few (but meaningful) service hiccups
Summary: The facilities and location of this hotel is world-class - it has to be among Ritz-Carlton's best properties. Given the Dec holidays, the hotel was decorated beautifully. All of the palm trees lining the drive were wrapped in lights, which was almost magical-looking when returning to the hotel at night. The Pacific Ocean views are spectacular! The fitness center overlooks the beach cliffs, as did our room and every breakfast seating. I spent every morning of our five-night stay watching the many surfers from almost every hotel vantage point.  Our fourth floor room, while on the smaller side, faced the ocean (with a small balcony) and had a high coved ceiling, which made it feel spacious. The bed/bedding was great - almost as good as home. The hotel also arranged for a
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to detail your luxury experience. You paint a lovely picture of your holiday visit, and we are pleased to hear you enjoyed a near perfect stay. It is fantastic knowing you were able to take advantage of our fitness facilities, spa and several of our dining outlets while you were here. We promise exceptional service, and while we are disappointed you faced a few challenges, we are pleased each was resolved efficiently and professionally by our dedicated ladies and gentlemen. It was truly a pleasure to welcome you and your son, and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We stayed here during the week between Christmas and New Year's. What a gorgeous hotel and wonderful part of the world. The hotel features the excellent service levels you would expect, wonderful amenities and activities, and gorgeous views over the ocean at any time. Even in late December, we were able to enjoy the pool and beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely review. It is marvelous to here you enjoyed a perfect stay in Dana Point. From our relaxing pool area to our exceptional service, we are thrilled your luxury experience exceeded expectations. We look forward to accommodating you again in the future.

Summary: This is our favorite location in SoCal. Whenever we want to get away, we know we can enjoy amazing views, the best service, finest dishes, and the most relaxing luxury spa. We are spoiled. Thank you, Ritz Carlton!!!
Manager Response: It brings us great joy to know we are your go-to destination in Southern California. We are proud to provide perfect getaways for guests coming from across the world or just across the state. It is always a pleasure to welcome you, and we look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: No fans in bathroom.  Room became humid and foggy after every shower.  There is no excuse for a high priced hotel not to have a fan in the shower room.  Also the air conditioning did not work properly and the rooms were hot and steamy.
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest feedback. We regret any discomfort you felt during your visit and have made note of your comments. We hope the rest of your stay was nothing short of exceptional. It would be an honor to accommodate you again.

Summary: This was part of our honeymoon and was the perfect choice! The beauty and charm exceeded our expectations. The food is delicious! You must take the time to enjoy the sunset. There are several spots to capture the gorgeous views of the pacific.
Manager Response: Thank you for detailing your luxury experience. We were proud to host you for such a special occasion and are thrilled you enjoyed every aspect of your visit. We look forward to welcoming you back for more stunning sunsets in the future.

Summary: Have stayed at this hotel many times in the last few years, and we always leave knowing we'll be back again.  Service is second to none and typical of Ritz properties.  Lovely, modern decor and spotlessly clean.  Beautiful inspiring location on the beach.  Love it!!
Manager Response: It brings us great joy to read your glowing review. It has been a pleasure to welcome you for many visits, and we are proud to know you have enjoyed each of your luxury experiences.  Please contact us directly if we can be of assistance in booking your next visit. We look forward to welcoming you back for another perfect stay.

Summary Heading: Nice location. Not the service of your typical Ritz
Summary: We were there for a family get a way.  The hotel was packed and low in staff. Really don't go out if the way to make one feel great for the price. No music, or any other extras. New Year's Eve the hotel offered nothing. Very Blad.
Manager Response: We appreciate the moment you have taken to share your review. It is disappointing to hear you experienced anything but perfection throughout the duration of your visit. If you would like to further discuss your comments, we encourage you to contact us directly. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back for a much-improved stay in the future.

Summary: Room small, bathroom big,  food great, service excellent.  Banquet for the wedding reception we attended was fantastic with well trained servers, beautiful room and gdreat food. Plenty of room for the reception and great Hors doeurves.  Well done Ritz Carlton.
Manager Response: We appreciate your five-star review. It was a pleasure to welcome you for this special occasion, and we are thrilled you enjoyed a perfect stay. Next time you find yourself in Dana Point, we would be proud to provide another exceptional experience.

Summary: Construction outside our room forced us to change rooms and distributed a hopeful family vacation.  The staff at Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel worked very hard to make up for the noise and disruptive workers.  Overall we did finally save what could have been a disaster and kept things relatively peaceful and pleasing.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share your review. While we regret any disturbance you may have encountered, we are pleased our ladies and gentlemen handled the situation efficiently and professionally. It is wonderful knowing you were able to enjoy a relaxing family vacation, and we would love to welcome you for more in the future.

Summary: I want appreciation for the superb staff that we interacted with during our stay at the Dana Point RC, 12/23 - 12/27.  What a lovely property to spend Christmas!  Also, the individual staff members, Josh, Jonathan (Front Desk), Penni, Shelley, Carmen (Club Level), Miguel (Engineering), all went out of their way to make sure our stay was great -- ESPECIALLY Penni & Shelley.  Also, several of the valet guys (sorry, we didn't get all their names), but they were so pleasant, courteous and helpful!)
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to review your holiday visit. We promise nothing but the best service to each of our guests, and we are thrilled you received just that. On behalf of Josh, Jonathan, Penni, Shelley, Carmen, Miguel and the rest of our ladies and gentlemen, we would be delighted to welcome you back next Christmas.

Summary: The view was beautiful. The food was very good. And the neighborhood was lovely for strolling around with my wife. But service was terrible. They didn't have rooms ready for my brother (the groom) or for numerous other members of my family. Wait staff was unfriendly and unhelpful. And most staff walked around with a frown or a scowl. It was weird.
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest account of your experience. While we are pleased your expectations were met in terms of our location and dining, we are troubled knowing anything about your Dana Point visit was less than perfect. It was an honor to host your brother’s wedding party, and we regret any challenges you or the other guests faced. Please do not hesitate to contact us directly if you would like to further discuss your experience. We hope to have the chance to restore your faith in our hotel.

Summary: The hotel is nice but disappointing for a Ritz. Great location with beautiful view but this is the worst Ritz we have visited. We stayed for 5 nights. The lobby was cold and we always needed to wear sweaters or jackets. The Market Cafe was always understaffed and sometimes a 10+ minute wait to get a cup of coffee. Surprisingly no free coffee in the lobby. 180 Blu was the only outside restaurant and was very crowded every afternoon. Food was ok but not worth the price. We had 2 rooms and both bills were incorrect and we had to request the credits given at check-in.
Manager Response: We appreciate your honest review. It was our pleasure to welcome you, and we wish your experience more closely met our standard of excellence. We are concerned by the challenges you faced and will certainly use your feedback when making improvements in the future. Should you find yourself in Dana Point again, we would be honored to welcome you back for the perfect stay we know we are capable of providing.

Summary Heading: Don't go over Xmass or New Years!!
Summary: The view is amazing and stunning, everything else about the hotel was terrible.  It took 30-40 minutes to check in, during the whole time we stayed here there was no elite check in.  Being a Ritz Platinum Elite member we got no benefit staying here, they could not offer us an upgrade at checkin.  They put us in a room with a fireplace and did not tell us that they were doing construction and installing artificial turf outside the windows, as such every AM for the first 3-4 days we woke up to the sound of hammers installing the artificial turf.   The 5th night there was a wedding and the wedding party was comprised of mostly young people who all stayed on our floor.  They had a party at 2 AM and we had to call the hotel security to have them be quite, only to be awakened again at
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to honestly detail your experience. While we are delighted you enjoyed our ocean views, we are concerned by the other areas of your stay that did not meet expectations. We are proud to host large groups and events on a regular basis, but these occasions should never impact the quality of your stay. We regret any discomfort you experienced during your time in Dana Point. If you would like to further discuss your feedback, we encourage you to contact us directly at your earliest convenience. We would greatly appreciate the opportunity to restore your faith in our hotel through either a phone call or a much-improved experience in the future.

Summary: Property and staff incredibly disappointing. Front desk service was deplorable and incorrect on their information. The club level was a disaster, so crowded, it was nearly impossible to find a seat. Upon check in the young lady allowed others to interrupt, told me they were the only Ritz property that required a club floor stay to have club access, that is Not True! The food and beverage staff was slow, rude and failed to properly take our orders. There were a few exceptions, but overall, property was very disappointing, dirty, cold and unfriendly. Mary in the club was amazing, but when you stay on club level and it's not possible to enjoy it due to the crowd, it's disappointing. Upon check out, the front desk was again rude when they forgot to give me the credits owed. The guy
Manager Response: On behalf of our executive team and all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for taking the time to share your comments via TripAdvisor. While we greatly appreciate your positive feedback regarding our Club Concierge and our magnificent facilities and location, we are deeply concerned by some of the uncharacteristic challenges you describe. We take them seriously and would welcome the opportunity to speak with you further. Please contact our executive office directly at (949) 240-2000. Thank you.  We are confident we can regain your trust in us.

Summary: We admired the amazing sea view with surfers on the see from early in the morning till dark. Nature and hotel linked together. We enjoyed president suite in a club floor. Excellent hotel design and very nice view. We loved walking on the beach. We made trip to San Diego and Six flags park.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to detail your luxury experience. We are thrilled you were able to enjoy the perfect ocean views from our Presidential Suite. It is fantastic to hear you took advantage of other parts of California while you were here as well. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We have stayed at the RC Laguna Niguel several times, and each time was wonderful. Always warm and welcoming with superlative customer service. This particular location is idyllic with the gorgeous ocean visible from every side.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and your loyalty to our hotel. We are always proud to provide you with an exceptional experience. It is marvelous knowing you have repeatedly enjoyed courteous service and stunning views. We look forward to welcoming you for your next visit.

Summary: look ive stayed all over, waldorf.. ritzs.. regis .. mandarin oriental etc and this particuliar Ritz Carlton is by far the best.. first the location over looking the Pacific is jaw dropping, but the staff and there attention to you  as a guest is second to none..we always get incredible service at all Ritz C..but this hotel is a notch higher.. Must Stay, book now
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your glowing review. It sounds as if you are well traveled, so your kind words carry great weight. It was our pleasure to provide a perfect stay, and we would be delighted to welcome you back for another in the future.

Summary: A comfortable and relaxing place to retreat from busy business life. Beautiful room with marble bathrooms. Gorgeous ocean front. Quiet walk along the beach. Watch sunset over the horizon. Heated Pool is lovely with 82F water. Heat up yourself in the whirlpool then o back and forth with the pool. Gym is clean and has a great beachfront view. Can watch surfers lined up in the water from dawn to dust. It's pet friendly as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to paint this lovely picture of your experience. We are delighted you were able to enjoy such a perfectly relaxing retreat. It makes us proud to know your expectations were exceeded in so many areas, from our stunning views to our comfortable pool area. Should you wish to travel next holiday season or sooner, we would be delighted to welcome you back.

Summary: The Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel is a wonderful hotel from its spectacular views of the Ocean to the service provided by the entire staff. You will not be disappointed with this Hotel.  As you drive to the front of the Ritz-Carlton you are greeted by the valet service and immediately asked if you require bellmen service. From there you are escorted to the front desk where there is little to no wait.  From start to finish we were in our room in ten or less minutes. Once we unpacked we went to the Market Place for lunch and coffee. Food was excellent and hot coffee hit the spot.   After my first meeting, went for a walk along the beach to think about business. The tranquility of the ocean is relaxing and helped me to develop a clear action plan for the next few days.  The facilities
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to review your luxury experience. It brings us great joy to read your kind words. We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed everything from our stunning views to our efficient valet service. We are proud to host many business travelers and are delighted you were able to focus on your meetings and tasks thanks to our relaxing atmosphere. Should you find yourself in Dana Point again, whether for business or leisure, we would be honored to provide another perfect stay.

Summary: Hallways, lobby and restaurants all cold, necessitating the need to wear a jacket. Food a little above mediocre. Couldn't eat in the good restaurants although they were mostly empty when we arrived at the hotel.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your honest account of your experience. It troubles us to hear your luxury stay was anything less than perfect. If you would like to further discuss your comments, please do not hesitate to contact us directly. We hope you will consider a return visit, as we would be proud to restore your faith in our hotel.

Summary: Totally classy place. We were treated to ocean view room with an outdoor fire pit .  Recommend this option!  The bar was under construction, but the staff was great as you would expect at the Ritz...  Totally festive Christmas atmosphere
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share you feedback. It is fantastic knowing you enjoyed such a lovely experience this holiday season. We promise a festive atmosphere each year and hope to see you back for more holiday celebrations in the future.

Summary: A pristine hotel with a beautiful private beach. Helpful and friendly staff. A yummy restaurant and cafe. Room was a delight.. Spacious and perfect. Overall a great pleasure to definitely be repeated in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for detailing your luxury experience. We are delighted you appreciated each aspect of your visit, from our comfortable accommodations to our various dining options. Next time you are in the area, we would be proud to accommodate you again.

Summary: Right on the beach, this location is the best in Orange Co. by far for views and access to downtown Laguna Beach. Book your reservation at their steak place well in advance since it fills up fast and even though you are staying there you might not get a table. I didn't rate it five stars but would rate it 4.5 only because since its not a brand new hotel, it's impossible that the rooms are in perfect perfect condition. But it's still as luxurious as you can get. Marble bath, double vanities etc. Also, you can rent electric bikes and the fitness center is smack overlooking the ocean with a beautiful view.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate the time you have taken to share your review. It is marvelous to hear your expectations were met in terms of our outstanding location and guest room amenities. We are pleased you were able to take advantage of our fitness center while you were here as well. Should you find yourself in Dana Point again, we would be honored to welcome you back for another perfect stay.

Summary: Great Hotel.  Wish there was self-parking.  The view of the beach is wonderful.  I wish I had more time to spend looking at the sights and the area.  The staff is very attentive.  Will surely attend another conference in this hotel.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback. It is fantastic to hear you enjoyed so many aspects of your luxury experience, from the courteous service exhibited by the ladies and gentlemen on our staff to our breathtaking views of the Pacific Ocean. We are thrilled to hear you plan to return, and we look forward to providing you with another perfect stay in the future.

Summary: Now, that the SPG St Regis Monarch Beach Resort is no longer and Marriott bought out SPG...this is now our So Cal go-to resort. It did not disappoint. Sunday brunch at Rayas was amazing w svc, food & views. Great multi screen tv for Sunday football nearby while you wait for ur window seat. SPG lifetime platinum status transferred over to Marriott/Ritz Carlton. Using 60k pts & $300 cash for ocean view, was upgraded to 4th Club Floor (like Rm 4018). Food & drinks on this floor are great. Platinum members don't pay resort fees & get $60 credit on breakfast. Prefered old St Regis grounds, pools, beach, SPG pts, big rooms & bathrooms, but Ritz Carlton made up w its great personnel & location closer to ocean. Always love driving 25mins up to Mastro's Ocean Club (wagyu Australian
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to detail your luxury experience. We are honored to be your new destination for anniversary celebrations. We promise to provide many perfect stays for this wonderfully special occasion. If we can assist in booking your next visit, please do not hesitate to contact us directly. We look forward to seeing you next year.

Summary Heading: Great hotel in a great location
Summary: Everything at this hotel is great:  staff, service, food, and location. Staff anticipates your every need and takes care of them without being asked.  The bellman outside the hotel noticed I was walking down the entry hall toward the front desk to check out.  The bellman came in, took my bag, asked for my car number, and had my car with the bag inside ready when I walked outside after checking out.  This is true Ritz-Carlton service. The design of the rooms and view of the coastline is fabulous. The food is wonderful.
Manager Response: It brings us great joy to read your kind words. We promise exceptional service from the moment you arrive until your departure, and we are thrilled you experienced just this. It is fantastic to know you were treated with care by the ladies and gentlemen of our staff. Your kind words will surely be passed along to our bellman. We greatly appreciate your recommendation and hope to welcome you back for another perfect stay soon.

Summary Heading: Great hotel and location. The food is incredible.
Summary: Awesome place to stay the Staff and hotel were great. Have stayed here before loved the Christmas decorations were nice. It made our Christmas party here great. I would recommend this Ritz Carlton. To any body who Likes to Have fantastic service
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your five-star review. It is marvelous to hear your expectations were exceeded in so many areas, from our festive holiday décor to the courtesy extended by the ladies and gentlemen of our dedicated team. Next time you are in the area, we would be thrilled to serve you again.

Summary: Booked with a wedding block, felt like service was scaled down to the below market rate we recieved. Clean and spacious but many parts look and feel dated. The hotel layout is awkward for friends in multiple rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. While we are pleased you enjoyed our spacious accommodations, we are concerned you felt uncomfortable at any point during your experience. It is our sincere promise that every guest receives equally exceptional treatment, and we regret any lapses in service you may have noticed. If you find yourself back in Dana Point, we would appreciate the chance to restore your faith in our hotel.

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel regularly since it was built 30+ years ago. It is true to the Ritz brand delivering great service though at a premium price. I know that I can count on a premium experience every time I visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and for your loyalty to our hotel. It has been our pleasure accommodating you over the years. We sincerely hope each visit is as perfect as the last. Please let us know if we can be of assistance in booking your next luxury experience. We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: This is a truly beautiful resort in an amazing location. Our room had gorgeous ocean views and was extremely comfortable. The restaurants and service were terrific. The pools were never over crowded and there is a golf cart shuttle available if you don't want to walk the short distance to the beach. The staff seem to take so much pride in the resort and are extremely helpful and nice. In particular, Josh Di Guido in reservations went above and beyond to help us. It is one of the most enjoyable and relaxing hotels we have ever stayed at.
Manager Response: Thank you for your glowing review. We are proud of our wonderful Dana Point location and are pleased you enjoyed it so thoroughly. It is magnificent to hear your expectations were exceeded in so many areas, from our spectacular views to our comfortable guest rooms. We promise an exceptional stay to each of our guests, and we are thrilled you experienced just that. On behalf of Josh and our entire team, we would love to see you again soon.

Summary: Wonderful and attentive staff. Impeccable property. Amazing spa. I would highly recommend to anyone. Planned a pruvate party in under 2 weeks and everythung was perfect. Thank you everyone at the Ritz Carlton!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to review your experience. We are thrilled to hear the ladies and gentlemen of our dedicated team treated you with care. It is wonderful knowing you were able to take advantage of our spa while you were here, as well. Should you find yourself in need of an event space in the future, we would be honored to host another perfect party. We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: One would have expected more from a Ritz in such a great location.  The place felt like a high-end Disney hotel.  Heavy traveled by all sorts of groups so felt like a convention center...Not private or special feeling.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share your review. While we are proud to host many large groups, this should never negatively impact the quality of your luxury experience. We regret any areas in which you did not feel completely comfortable during your visit. If you would like to further discuss this feedback, please do not hesitate to contact us directly. We hope to welcome you back for a much-improved stay in the future.

Summary Heading: Lovely hotel with a couple bumps
Summary: Spent 5 nights here last month for our anniversary. Overall we had a nice stay. We like the luxury and attention the Ritz brand offers, and after having a stellar experience at their Naples, FL property last year we decided to pick a west coast property for this year's trip. On almost all points they did well. The hotel is clean and modern, has an easy layout and amazing ocean views. The staff are friendly and accommodating.  The food was fantastic and the drinks were generous.  I toured the gym and spa, both clean and well appointed, but chose to exercise outside in the beautiful weather each morning. Our room was clean, nice modern bathroom, comfortable bed and a large balcony overlooking the ocean with stunning sunsets each night. Specifically, our room was on the " Main"
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to detail your stay. It was an honor to welcome you for your anniversary. We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed so many aspects of your stay, from the relaxing atmosphere of our rooms and public spaces to our beautiful surrounding area—perfect for outdoor exercise. We are disappointed by the areas you describe as below par. We hope you will consider returning for what we promise we will be an improved stay. In the meantime, we invite you to contact us directly to further discuss this helpful feedback. On behalf of our entire staff, we would be honored to accommodate you again.

Summary: Friendly staff, easy check-in.   As I was here for my firm's retreat, I was able to experience more of the hotel than I normally would if traveling for pleasure.  We used a small meeting room for a photo shoot, a larger room for a meeting, we held a small cocktail reception at 180Blu and had dinner in an even bigger room with a patio and private bar.  We also had a small meeting room as our 'war room'.  For each 'event' the service provided was excellent and the hotel staff was very accommodating.    Also - the hotel smelled really good.
Manager Response: It brings us great joy to read your kind words. We delighted to know you enjoyed every aspect of your stay, from our comfortable meeting spaces to our friendly team of colleagues. We are proud to provide each guest with a memorable experience—even down to the smell of our lobby! It was our pleasure to accommodate you, and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Don't Stay anywhere else! This place is a gem!
Summary: I wrote a lengthy review for this hotel already but just know their service is fantastic and well worth the cost. The entire resort staff are so warm, welcoming, attentive, and friendly.  I could tell they really enjoy their jobs.   Visit the Spa, it is a must! The food is fantastic! The views are breathtaking and you feel as though you are in another world there. It's hard to leave once the stay is over. I will definitely be returning and highly recommend this location to anyone who is in the Dana point area!
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your glowing review. It is our promise to ensure each guest has an exceptional stay, and we are delighted you enjoyed your time with us. We are elated to hear you were able to take advantage of our Spa as well while you were here. Thank you for your kind recommendation. We hope to accommodate you again soon.

Summary Heading: This is quality in so many ways!
Summary: For quality of life that extends beyond your home, this is quality in so many ways: decor, location, view, food, and staff.  All staff pay attention to detail and pay attention to you and your needs. Do not think twice about another property if you are in the area.  As a world traveler, I must say I enjoyed this property immensely..from the Eco-Garden Walk to the spa service and restaurants. You will not engage in a more superior experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback. It is fantastic to hear you enjoyed the perfect stay. We are thrilled your expectations were exceeded in all areas, from our lovely Eco-Garden Walk to the courtesy of our attentive staff. It sounds as if you have stayed at many hotels, so your kind words carry a great deal of weight. We are already looking forward to welcoming you for another exceptional visit in the future.

Summary: We received a nice room upgrade at check-in. Thank you Ritz. The staff was very attentive and on 'Ritz point'. Decorated nicely for the holidays. Especially loved the HUGE live tree out front! The complimentary hot chocolate in the front lobby was a nice touch. Room was a little small but for a water front room that's to be expected. The disappointing thin walls were a nuisance. Both nights we were awaken by loud guests, some carried the party into the room across the hall that went on from midnight to 3:30a.m. While security came by 3 times, they were unsuccessful in taming the bunch. Trying to nap the next afternoon to recuperate from the sleepless night, a large and loud Indian wedding broke out. No nap. In room dining was well done (breakfast). Valet staff ran smoothly.
Manager Response: We appreciate the moment you have taken to detail your experience. We were delighted to provide you with an upgraded room, and it is lovely to hear you enjoyed it. We often host large groups and events, but this added traffic should never negatively impact your experience. We regret any discomfort you may have experienced due to the actions of other guests. If you would like to further discuss your comments, please do not hesitate to contact us directly. We would love to have you visit again in the near future.

Summary: Amazing customer service, food, decor, and atmosphere.  A must visit hotel if you want luxury, restfulness, and a Southern California adventure.  The view of the ocean from your balcony is second to none and the beach is clean, beautiful and peaceful.
Manager Response: Thank you for your glowing review. It is flattering to know you enjoyed your stay so thoroughly. We are proud of our sweeping ocean views and are thrilled you were able to appreciate them from your personal balcony. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: This place is stunning.  Perched on a cliff above the Pacific Ocean - the views are spectacular. There's a nice walkway down to the ocean but if you're out of shape the walk back up could be a bit taxing.   Go to the Spa, enjoy the pool and have a few drinks at the bar while gazing at the ocean and the surfers below.   Rooms are very nice - most have balconies overlooking either the pool or the ocean.   The staff are attentive and friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for your five-star review. We are thrilled you were able to enjoy not only the views from your guest room, but our beautiful beach and relaxing spa facilities as well. It is wonderful to know you felt comfortable from the moment you arrived until you checked out. If you find yourself in the area again, we would love to welcome you for another perfect stay.

Summary: Everything, down to the smallest detail, about my stay was exceptional. I loved coming back into my room to find fresh flowers or the other small touches that shows that the staff goes above and beyond to ensure that their guests are comfortable.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to write your review. It is spectacular to hear you enjoyed the personal touches that make a stay at our hotel so special. We are pleased you found our staff to be courteous and attentive. It would be our pleasure to welcome you again in the future.

Summary: Had a pleasant stay. Gym had an excellent view of the ocean. Staff were courteous. Check in was quick. Having coffee pot in room is appreciated. We were there for a wedding and everything was done well. Thanks for the excellent service
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. We are thrilled you enjoyed everything from our stunning ocean views to our efficient check in process. It is lovely knowing you felt comfortable throughout your visit. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Hands down, the most luxurious stay we have ever experienced. First time at a Ritz and hopefully, will not be our last! The staff was so attentive and friendly, couldn't have asked for better customer service.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your kind words. It is wonderful to hear your expectations were met in terms of our exceptional service. Should you find yourself back in Dana Point, we would be thrilled to welcome you back.

Summary: This is a delightful property in a dramatic and beautiful setting. The grounds and views are breathtaking. I found the staff to be very very nice and accommodating.   My rub with this property is that they nickel-and-dime you at every turn. And it's a 'destination resort' where it is completely isolated and set apart from everything. There are no other options for eating/drinking other than on hotel property.   I just stayed in a 5- star resort where they took special pains not to charge for small things and the restaurants were reasonably priced. I appreciated it- they probably charged a bit more for the room rate, but I didn't feel like I had to be careful every time I utilized a hotel service. Not so with the Ritz-Carlton. Here's the prime example- my little girl is
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review. We are thrilled knowing your expectations were met in terms of our attentive staff and beautiful grounds. However, we are concerned you felt uncomfortable with certain areas of your visit. Your comments have been noted and will be used when making future improvements to our hotel. It was a pleasure to welcome your family for this memorable stay, and we hope you will consider a return visit.

Summary: We stayed at the Ritz bc we got married in laguna beach and we wanted our wedding party to have a place to rest after the ceremony. The overall experience was fantastic, especially their staff Andrea Romo who went above and beyond to make sure our group dinner reservation, our vegan guest needs and cake order was perfect.
Manager Response: First and foremost, congratulations on such a special occasion! We are honored you chose to stay with us after your wedding ceremony. It is fantastic knowing you and your guests enjoyed each aspect of your stay, from your dining experience to our comfortable accommodations. On behalf of Andrea and the rest of our team, we look forward to accommodating you again.

Summary: The service was excellent and the location was absolutely beautiful.  This is a great resort for locals as well - wonderful rooftop bar overlooks the ocean.  The Platinum Club room and concierge service was amazing.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. It is fantastic to hear you enjoyed each aspect of your visit, from our exceptional service to the views from our bar. We always enjoy welcoming locals for either a quick meal or a well-deserved staycation. It would be our pleasure to accommodate you again in the future.

Summary: The hotel and staff were fantastic however the reason I gave them a four is due to a lack of communication. During our visit, there was a planned community tree lighting that shut down the entrances to the hotel. This made me miss an important business meeting (one of the reasons for my visit). Disappointed that they didnt communicate this so that I could have planned better.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. It was our pleasure to welcome you for your business-related stay. We are concerned knowing you experienced any level of miscommunication during your visit. It is uncharacteristic that our various staff members are anything but completely clear when it comes to special events and closures of this sort. If you would like o further discuss your comments, please do not hesitate to contact us directly, as we would like to rectify this situation as best we can. Should you find yourself back in the area, we would be honored to welcome you for an improved visit.

Summary: Our first time. Went for coffee and spent couple of hours because of the view and tha amazing staff  The food amazing.  Gourmet and fancy menu to taste with the nice environment  We where inside but it was ausome also.  We repeated a second time and even though we spent a couple of hours to be seated (because the guest attendant) we enjoyed again  She was not the best in service as the rest of the staff, considering where were  familiar at the place
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share your review. It has been a pleasure to welcome you for multiple visits. We regret any lapses in service you may have experienced, but we are delighted this did not negatively impact your overall experience. It is fantastic to hear you appreciated our stunning views as well as our extensive menu. We look forward to welcoming you back for more five-star visits in the future.

Summary: With so many stylish, boutique hotels opening, many of which are affordable or at least reasonable, it is easy to be swayed by aesthetics and forget that a hotel is part of the service industry.  Momentarily after arriving at the Ritz, one is immediately reminded of this.  Every employee goes out of the way to make life easier and more comfortable.  The property itself well perched with amazing views and sunsets.  The facilities are all top notch, including the fitness center that looks out over the ocean.  Unfortunately, so does the bar, two flights above so choose your poison.  Yes, it is expensive and yes, it is old fashioned in style.  It's the Ritz.  But it's worth every penny.  We took our two small dogs and even they were welcomed by everyone we passed.  That's a good
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate the time you have taken to share your review. It is marvelous to hear so many aspects of your stay exceeded expectations, from our breathtaking ocean views to our incomparable level of service. We are delighted to know you were able to enjoy both our fitness facilities and our bar—balance is always key! It was our pleasure to welcome both you and your four-legged family members. We look forward to serving you again soon.

Summary: Dog haven  Beautiful property, but lacks the elegance of the original Ritz.  Oceanfront room had a beautiful view; service was excellent and staff members were cordial and accommodating. Only complaint would be the barrage of dogs on the property. The hotel hosts a monthly charity event for dogs and their owners. Great for them - not so great for guests paying $800+ a day.  It was quite disconcerting trying to maneuver around all the dogs and their owners in the lobby and lawn areas.  A suggestion - a separate area and entrance for dog owners and their pets attending these events.
Manager Response: We appreciate your detailed feedback. While we are thrilled to hear your expectations were exceeded in terms of our excellent service and comfortable rooms, we are concerned by the other challenges you describe. We often host various groups and events, but this should never impact the quality of your stay. If you would like to further discuss your comments regarding the canine event, we encourage you to contact us directly.

Summary: This is an amazing hotel with amazing views. We went for Sunday lunch. With flowing champagne. Was fabulous. Would definitely wish to return some day. The views of the beach and ocean below are amazing.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us.

Summary Heading: Kicking myself for not reserving an oceanview room!!!
Summary: Just checked in for a 3-day conference. This is the most amazing location ever! Gorgeous views, but not from my sad little room under a bunch of trees at the corner of the pool.  As other reviewers have mentioned, rooms are smaller than I anticipated, though it seems from the reviews that there are larger rooms elsewhere, plus club rooms available somewhere as well. I echo the complaints about labyrinthine hallways. I also disliked how the hallways are narrow and dark. I could barely navigate around housekeeping's carts, which packed the hallways at 4 p.m. when I checked in.  Room is nicely appointed and updated. However, a good chunk of my room is taken up with two odd-looking boxes that contain a fridge and the HVAC. Bathroom marble is a bit overwhelming. Beautiful, but a bit
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your comments. We are pleased that you enjoyed  your stay. Should you find yourself back in Dana Point, we would be thrilled to welcome you for another visit.

Summary: My husband and I had the best time at our November 2016 stay! We particularly enjoyed the club level accommodations and the excellent service from the staff. Thanks to Andrew Fernandes and his great hospitality!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your review. We hope to welcome you back to the resort soon.

Summary: We had the best experience at the hotel. It was so much fun to stay there. The staff was very welcoming and made sure we had everything we needed to enjoy our trip. Would stay at the hotel again in a heartbeat.
Manager Response: Thank you for your genuine feedback. We are elated to hear you were treated with such care by our dedicated staff. We hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: This is a one of a kind Ritz as the location is superb.  The attention to detail is remarkable and the quality of service unsurpassed by any other hotel we have visited in recent years.  From the moment you drive up you feel special.  The warm smiles and exceptional service from the staff is consistent from the time you arrive to departure.  The grounds and common areas are first class and the amenities unsurpassed.  Rooms are well appointed with every imaginable comfort feature.  Spolied rotten is what you become very quickly and you hate the thought of leaving.  This Ritz is one to cherish as it is truly special.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are pleased to hear you were treated with such care by our dedicated staff. Next time you find yourself in California, we hope you will consider returning for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: From the moment we walked in the door, we were treated like honored guests.  Roy was very attentive and interested in how he could make our stay memorable.  In celebration of my husband starting a new job, he put us in the most lovely room with a view.  We were so smitten with the surfers and crashing waves, we opted to stay on property, and enjoy the restaurants and amenities.  With a place this spectacular, and the authentic, unpretentious service, there really is no reason to go anywhere else.  We plan to come back every December to enjoy this incredible place.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your review. It is marvelous to hear you enjoyed so many aspects of your experience and that Roy helped make your stay memorable. Next time you are in Dana Point, we would be delighted to accommodate you again.

Summary: Had a recent business and pleasure stay for 2 days and it was outstanding.  Great service, excellent facilities, and wonderful staff.  And the location is phenomenal. Would gladly stay here again, and maybe longer next time!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your review. We hope you will return for a longer visit soon.

Summary: The room overlooking the ocean with a fire pit truly made our stay unforgettable. It was our honeymoon and the evening of our arrival we were surprised by champagne and chocolate covered strawberries! It was so special.
Manager Response: First and foremost, congratulations! We appreciate the time you have taken to share your review. It is fantastic to know you appreciated unique amenities such as our fire pit and specialty chocolates. We wish you all the best in your marriage and look forward to seeing you again.

Summary Heading: Wrongfully accused and charged for smoking
Summary: Was charged for smoking in the room when we didn't. We don't even smoke and had a 2 yr old with us.  Staff treated us like criminals and were disgustingly rude, banging on our door as our baby tried to nap
Manager Response: We are troubled by this incident and are thankful you brought it to our attention. At your earliest convenience, please contact us directly, as we would like to rectify this situation as best as possible.

Summary: My boyfriend took me here for our anniversary, and it was nothing short of pure luxury and relaxation. From beginning to end, our stay was effortless. The  rooms are certainly expensive, but for a special celebration it's certainly worth the spend.
Manager Response: First and foremost, happy anniversary! We are thrilled you chose to spend such a special occasion with us. It is magnificent to know your expectations were exceeded throughout your stay. We hope you will return for another visit in the future.

Summary: The Ritz Laguna Niguel may be my favorite hotel anywhere. The location, rooms and staff are simply the best.  Upgrading to the club level is worth every penny, especially if you like Champagne. This was the perfect stay-cation.
Manager Response: Your kind words mean so much to us. It is an honor to know we rank among your favorite locations. Whether you are traveling from near or far, it is always our pleasure to welcome you with open arms, and, in your case, a sparkling glass of champagne. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: This hotel is amazing. Club level experience is exceptional. Wonderful place to stay. Stop your search, this is the best. They charge my Tesla while I'm asleep, and they anticipate your needs/wants. Views and location are as good as they can get.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your review. It is marvelous to hear you enjoyed so many aspects of your experience, from our exclusive Club Level to our attentive service. Next time you are in Dana Point, we would be delighted to accommodate you again.

Summary: Made me feel like i belonged. The staff was very attentive. I feel like they catered to me. Outstanding! Never had the care , concern and attention dedicated to. Me, the customer. Rooms, food nand professionalism was impressive.
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your feedback. It is our goal to ensure each guest feels at home throughout his or her stay, and we are delighted to hear you experienced such attentive care. Next time you find yourself in Dana Point, we would love to accommodate you again.

Summary: Visited the Ritz Carlton at Dana Point and was not disappointed  We enjoyed drinks on their terrace watching a beautiful sunset.  Afterwards we enjoyed a wonderful dinner in their Raya Restaurant  We had black cod and Korean bbq chicken both delicious  Accompanied by a white Sauvignon blanc Finished off with coffee and cognac  The lobby has a wonderful Christmas of the world scene created by the chef and his staff all edible. Lovely service and atmosphere with a warm welcome from all staff for visitors Good value for superior service Highly recommended
Manager Response: Thank you for the time you have taken to share your review. It is marvelous to hear you enjoyed so many aspects of your visit, from your exquisite dinner at Raya to the festive décor in our lobby. We greatly appreciate your kind recommendation and hope to welcome you back for another memorable visit in the future.

Summary Heading: Awesome view, great service - good for a celebration or splurge
Summary: Splurged on a quick getaway using Marriott reward certificates. Super location and view. Really great attentive service. The rooms and dining options are really expensive... so I can't say the value for the money was good - but great for a splurge.  Example of personalized service: I had talked to Concierge a few days before to inquire about activities in the area and vegetarian friendly restaurants. She discussed and sent me comprehensive info. I also mentioned this was our 15th Year Anniversary getaway. Upon checking in - we were upgraded to an ocean view without asking, and congratulated on our Anniversary (so Concierge set this up). Also - some complimentary champagne and chocolate strawberries sent to our room as anniversary sentiment --- without me asking for it! That was
Manager Response: To begin, happy anniversary! Thank you for your review and for your loyalty to Marriott hotels. The personal touch you describe is a wonderful example of the attentive service we are so proud of here at The Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel. It is marvelous to hear you enjoyed this as well as so many other aspects of your stay. While we regret any disturbance you may have encountered, we are delighted your room change was handled quickly and efficiently. On behalf of our entire team, we look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable visit in the future.

Summary: This hotel is in a fantastic location - cliff-side over the Pacific, near Laguna Beach.  We stayed on the club level, and the service and food -- 4 presentations a day -- were outstanding.  Our reservatons were not what we expected and the front desk was able to accomodate us, which we appreciated.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your review. It is magnificent knowing you enjoyed so many aspects of your stay, from our professional and efficient service to our wonderful views of the Pacific Ocean. Should you find yourself back in Dana Point, we would be thrilled to welcome you for another visit.

Summary: Pros - the property is nice, beautiful views, and appear to be well maintained. The check in was easy, room was ready early and staff were helpful.   Cons - the guest rooms are extremely dated for a several hundred dollar a night rooms. I rarely stay in hotels this expensive and I can only say that I have stayed in much nicer, way more modern rooms at a fraction of the price. Limited outlets available for devices, lighting is terrible, fixtures in the bathroom were rusty, HVAC annoyingly loud, clocks set to the wrong time in the rooms (and I don't mean they were 5 minutes fast - it was off by hours and minutes),  the shower pressure was ridiculously low, perhaps the worst part of the experience. It was as if there was a kink in a garden hose, the water literally came out as a
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share your review. It is wonderful to hear you experienced an easy check in process as well attentive service from our staff. However, we are concerned by the other uncharacteristic challenges you describe. We regret any shortcomings you may have noticed in your room. Please know we take your comments seriously and will relay them all to the appropriate departments. If you find yourself back in Dana Point, we would love to welcome you for a stay that more closely meets our standard of excellence.

Summary: Flew in from Texas to visit family over thanksgiving break. I am so glad we stayed here. Not only is the hotel kid friendly, but the staff is superb. Never did I feel that we were an inconvenience. The room was clean, bed was comfy, shower pressure was amazing, and of course the ocean. Jew was to die for. Everyone at the hotel was nice, I can't stress that enough, Joel at Raya was superb. Thank you so much for making our thanksgiving stay wonderful.
Manager Response: We are honored you chose to spend your holiday weekend with us. It is marvelous to hear your expectations were exceeded in so many areas, from our comfortable accommodations to our breathtaking views. Your kind words are much appreciated and will passed along to Joel and the rest of our dedicated team. We would be delighted to welcome you back for more holiday visits in the future.

Summary: The hotel forgot to clean are room not sure if they were short staff or what. Called and told operator because no one answered at house cleaning and told operator the room had not been cleaned. So grabbed towels from pool to take shower to get ready for are Thanksgiving dinner. Hotel is pretty and great location you pay a lot for this hotel you would think house keeping would be on top of there game.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your review. While we are delighted you enjoyed our Dana Point location, we are troubled to hear about your experience with housekeeping. Although our hotel is indeed popular during the holidays, this should never impact the quality of your stay. We regret any shortcomings you may have noticed in terms of service.
