If you would like to further discuss your comments, please do not hesitate to contact us directly. We hope to welcome you back for an improved stay in the future.

Summary: The Ritz always delivers. Club Level is the best way to stay. Gorgeous property. Fantastic staff. Close to any desired SoCal destination but secluded enough to provide a private getaway. I would definitely visit again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. It is magnificent to hear you have experienced consistently enjoyable visits at Ritz-Carlton properties. It would be our sincere pleasure to accommodate you again.

Summary: A beautiful location and gorgeous view of the ocean. Easy access to local areas. Our room was nice but a little small and old. House keeping wasn't fabulous at replacing necessities (toiletries, towels, glasses). It is on the small side- but is very pretty and pleasant,
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate the time you have taken to share your review. It is magnificent to hear your expectations were exceeded in terms of our beautiful Dana Point location. However we regret any areas in which you did not feel completely comfortable. If you find yourself in the area in the future, we would love the opportunity to restore your faith in our hotel.

Summary: Upgrade to the Club lounge rooms!!!  This one is worth it!  Not your average hotel club lounge.  This one has a private entry and round the clock snacks and small meals with top shelf cocktails and plenty for kids too.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your review. We are delighted you were able to take advantage of the amenities offered in our Club Lounge. Should you find yourself back in the area, we would be thrilled to accommodate you again.

Summary Heading: Thanksgiving Stay at the Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel
Summary: Beautiful location with amazing views on the cliffs over the beach.  Friendly and helpful staff.  Excellent food, however the service at dinner in the Raya restaurant was surprisingly poor.  Had an upgraded  room with a coastal view and a balcony however partial ocean view would be more descriptive since we could see a little bit of water but no coastline and the balcony on our room was so small we could just open one of the French doors and only by ~18 inches.  To get out onto the balcony we had to slide the table and a chair out of the way and squeeze through the partially open door.   Nice hotel but given the cost for what you get I would not consider it a great value.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate the time you have taken to share your review. While it is wonderful to hear your expectations were exceeded in terms of our wonderful location and helpful staff, we are disappointed you faced any challenges during your visit. Your comments have been noted and will be used when making future improvements to our hotel. We hope you will consider returning for an improved stay.

Summary Heading: Fabulous Time at Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel
Summary: I celebrated a milestone birthday at this fabulous hotel and the staff made my visit extra-special. The ocean-side setting was gorgeous and I am taking home many happy memories. The food in the restaurants was extremely good and the staff was excellent in meeting my gluten-free needs. I especially liked being able to view the ocean while we were dining. My waiter, Dean, was extremely good at helping me choose gluten-free foods from the menu. I would go back to this hotel in a minute!
Manager Response: We would first like to wish you the happiest of birthdays. We are honored you chose to stay with us for this special occasion. It is magnificent hearing your expectations were met throughout your stay, from our many dining options to our spectacular views. Your kind words will be passed along to Dean and the rest of our dedicated staff. Next time you are in the area, we would love to see you again.

Summary: This is our third stay here in the last two years, and we can't wait for our next. Very high quality operation, great staff and facilities. Both days we were there had large events, so the house was jammed. But everything was handled very well.  We were there for the Saturday event, a very large, sold out charity event. Yes, the place was jammed. But all in all, a very classy event, handled very well by a extremely hardworking staff, and hosted very enthusiastically by the Hotel General Manager. Can't say enough about how well this place is operated, throughout.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for your loyalty to our hotel. It is always exciting to host large events like the one you attended. These events can indeed increase traffic in our public areas, but we are thrilled to know the busy nature of the event did not negatively impact your stay in any way. Next time you are in town for an event or simply for leisure, we would love to welcome you back.

Summary: Do not miss an opportunity to spend time at this property. The views are mesmerizing and the rooms are as comfortable as they are beautiful! The food is to die for and the drinks are perfection! I promise you'll won't want to leave.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words. We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay and greatly appreciate your recommendation. Should you find yourself back in Dana Point, we would be honored to accommodate you again.

Summary: The employees have a high level of pride in providing the best service. You are treated with respect and courtesy.    The employees provide thoughtfulness in providing assistance and they exceed expectations.
Manager Response: Thank you for your genuine feedback. We are elated to hear you were treated with such care by our dedicated staff. Next time you find yourself in California, we hope you will consider returning for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: This hotel was wonderful from their spectacular view to wonderful restaurants to friendly and incredibly accommodating staff.  Morning yoga in the pavilion was a great way to start the day or a walk along the beach watching the surfers.  We initially had a pool view room which was really nice but asked it we could be upgraded for the weekend to an ocean view room.   Apparently they had called my cell mid morning letting me know that my new room was ready but I didn't pick up the message until late that afternoon so they had given that room away.   Due to the mixup even though it was my fault,  they upgraded us to an ocean view with a fire pit, sent up a s'mores kit and champagne!  Their restaurant 180 Blue was awesome for lunch, drinks or just hanging out.  Loved it!
Manager Response: We are incredibly grateful for your detailed review. From our sweeping ocean views to our wonderful staff, it is marvelous to hear each aspect of your stay exceeded expectations. We regret any miscommunication that may have occurred regarding your upgrade, but we are pleased the situation was handled professionally. It was our pleasure to accommodate you for the duration of your visit. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Beautiful resort with  excellent service. This is a resort is impeccable and we cannot wait to return. Unbelievable views of the Pacific ocean and surfers Paradise. Excellent ecology program for children.
Manager Response: We appreciate your kind words. It is fantastic knowing you were able to take advantage of our Eco-Adventure program while you were here. Next time you are in the area, we would be honored to welcome you back for another memorable experience.

Summary: Let's start with the fitness center.  One entire wall of the fitness center is huge floor to ceiling windows overlooking the Pacific and the surfers in the waves in front of the hotel.  Then there's the fully-equipped facility itself - lots of machines, free weights, mats, bozu balls, etc.  Move now to the bathrobe in the room.  I've never felt a heavier, more luxurious bathrobe.  Given its weight, just wearing it gives you a workout.  All in all, I'm not used to Ritz-Carlton kind of  luxury, but what a wonderful opportunity to experience it.  If you're anything like me, you'll need an excuse and conference rates to be able to afford it, but go for it if you have a chance!
Manager Response: We are grateful for the lovely picture you’ve painted with your review. It is spectacular to hear you were able to take advantage of our state-of-the-art fitness facilities while you were here. There is nothing quite like hearing the waves crash on the shore while you get in a morning workout. We are delighted you could enjoy this as well as the luxury of sitting for a moment in a comfortable robe. Should you be in the area for a conference or for pure leisure in the future, we would love to welcome you back for another 5-star stay.

Summary: Understaffed and the tea was just ok. I did not feel that it was a luxurious experience.  Views: amazing, beach walk/pools:fantastic. I would have much rather stayed at a lower priced location in order to have quicker check in and check out service. Also, the bell staff were not able to pick up our luggage so we had to take it all down ourselves. It was a little underwhelming.
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest review. While we are thrilled to hear you enjoyed our stunning views and wonderful pool facilities, we are concerned by the challenges you describe regarding your experience checking in and out. If you would like to further discuss these comments, we encourage you to contact us directly. We would love to welcome you back for a much-improved stay in the future.

Summary: I am a fan of beachfront properties and have stayed at many.  From the moment we walked into the lobby of this Ritz Carlton, I knew we were in a special place.  Greeted with champagne, the short wait for check in disappeared.  Our front desk gentleman was thorough and unhurried in her explanation of the hotel and surrounding amenities.  The view is spectacular!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review. From your champagne toast upon arrival to our breathtaking views of Dana Point, we are delighted you enjoyed each aspect of your stay. Next time you are looking to enjoy time at a beachfront property, we hope you will consider a return visit.

Summary: The place was fabulous, ocean view, nice walking area and the staff was very accommodating. I give high marks to the front desk and lounge personnel who help make our stay relaxing! The only real issue we had was the need for an exhaust fan in the bathroom made staying in the room sometimes very uncomfortable due to odor from toilet area.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your honest review. We are thrilled you enjoyed our wonderful views, friendly staff and relaxing atmosphere. Your comments regarding in-room amenities have been noted and will be addressed with the appropriate department. We hope to welcome you back for another memorable visit in the future.

Summary: If you head to the California coast, you have to stay at the Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel. The views are spectacular and the service equally spectacular. The staff, including folks like Wade, Devon, Orion, Corrine, made our stay at the Ritz very memorable. And we cant wait to get back. The food, the amenities, the location and as we mentioned, the views and the service make the Ritz Laguna Niguel one of the very best we have ever stayed at.
Manager Response: Thank you for your glowing review of our property. It is spectacular to hear your expectations were exceeded in each area, from our lovely Dana Point location to the attentive service of our staff. On behalf of Wade, Devon, Orion, Corrine and the rest of our team, we appreciate your kind words. Should you find yourself back in the area in the future, we would be honored to accommodate you again.

Summary Heading: Trip of a lifetime of the Ocean!
Summary: We have a fabulous time at the Ritz Carlton in Laguna Beach.  The ocean views and beach were spectacular.  The service was top notch and the accommodations were very nice.  We both had wonderful massages in the Spa.  We would definitely recommend it!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your review. From our sweeping ocean views to our comfortable accommodations, it is fantastic knowing you enjoyed so many aspects of your stay. Should you find yourself back in the area, we would be thrilled to accommodate you again.

Summary: This 1s a beautiful hotel.  Our view was of the beach, which was lovely. I was mislead about the room.  I asked if i could walk right on to the beach and they said yes there was a little walkway.  The "little walkway" was actually a long trail, that had a shuttle.  I was disappointed that this dog friendly hotel would not let my dog on the beach. That was very disappointing.The cuisine at Raya was different.  I've never had a desert with cornflakes in it.  My biggest problem was with house keeping.  The did not do a good job at all
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest review. While it is lovely to hear you enjoyed our beautifully appointed grounds, we regret any miscommunication that may have occurred during your visit. If there is ever anything we can do to make you more comfortable, we encourage you to contact us directly. We hope you will consider a return visit, as we would love the opportunity to restore your faith in our hotel.

Summary: The Ritz-Carlton brand stands for excellence....everyone should know that.  The team at the Laguna Nigel property lived it!  From the moment of arrival in the valet drive to time of checkout, the team delivered on every promise.  Even when my room wasn't up to par, Caesar (Front Desk) made it right immediately and went the extra mile to make sure my inconvenience was corrected on my final statement.  In was there for a private party and stayed 3 nights.  The food at our events was great, the banquet staff was friendly and the entire experience was just what the Ritz-Carlton brand represents.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your thoughtful compliments. It is wonderful to know you felt well taken care of from the moment you checked in until the time of your departure. While we regret any miscommunication that may have occurred in terms of your room, we are thrilled the issue was resolved quickly and professionally. On behalf of Caesar and the rest of our team, we look forward to welcoming you for another exceptional stay in the future.

Summary Heading: WoW! My choice for every vacation!
Summary: Exceeded expectation on all levels! The best view! Exceptional people! Delectable cuisine! Spa is paradise! Cleanliness is superb! I can't say enough about how wonderful the experience is hear. Too good to be true....
Manager Response: Your enthusiastic review is greatly appreciated. It is magnificent to hear your expectations were exceeded in each area of your visit. If you plan to return to Dana Point, we would be thrilled to accommodate you again.

Summary: As a Platinum Marriott member we had high expectations for this hotel.  My husband and I were visiting to celebrate our anniversary and relax.  We requested an upgraded room view and early check-in.  Since the hotel was not very busy, they were more than happy to accommodate.  We received an "ocean view" room on the third floor.  Most hotels would call this room ocean front, because it is completely facing the ocean.  The room was a little small, but the view and balcony made up for the room size.  Although the hotel is on a bluff, we could hear the ocean and enjoyed spending many hours on the balcony.  Beach access is a steep walk but paved and they also provide a shuttle.  Since we were there to relax, we spent most of our time at the hotel and visited all of the restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review and for your loyalty to Marriott brands. It sounds as if you and your husband are well traveled, so your positive feedback means a great deal. It is truly a compliment to hear that our resort is a highlight in what I am sure is an incredible 17 years of marriage. We are thrilled your expectations were exceeded in terms of your view, our dining options and the service you received. It would be our pleasure to welcome you and your children for another visit in the future. We look forward to being a part of your family’s future memories.

Summary: By far one of the very best in luxury get away. Stongly recommended!!! Friendly staff, clean accomodations. An incredible view of the ocean and sunset. The pool and grouds are meticulously cared for. The beach is marvelous
Manager Response: It brings us great joy to read your genuine review. It is spectacular knowing you enjoyed everything from our views to our pool facilities. We look forward to serving you again in the future.

Summary: This was a quick visit for one night only. Hotel was busy with a great "buzz" due to a major function that night. Club was exceptional as always: friendly, experienced staff with a real focus on the customer. The setting of the property is incomparable.
Manager Response: While we wish you could have stayed longer, it was our pleasure to welcome you for a quick visit. It is wonderful to hear the busy nature of out hotel was a positive aspect of your stay rather than an inconvenience. We greatly appreciate your kind words and hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary Heading: I Tried Hard To Love It, Have To Admit Fail
Summary: This was my second stay at RC Laguna Point. The location is absolutely spectacular, and that and the warmth of the Raya servers and housekeepers passing in the hall, are probably enough. The setting is truly that stunning. But, why is a Ritz Carlton failing so miserably with front desk staff, spa, cleanliness and valet?  Last year we visited with a Costco special package. Despite gold status, there was no attempt at a warm welcome. This year, armed with transferred SPG platinum status, we booked the base room, expecting at least a one category upgrade. We had requested an early check in of 2pm on our reservation, knowing we were checking out by 10 am. We arrived promptly and were vaguely told, "you can wait and we will call you when your room is ready." When asked when that was
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for choosing to stay with us for a second visit. While it is fantastic to hear you experienced impeccable service from our team in Raya, we are disheartened by your description of our service elsewhere on property. Your experience should be nothing short of perfection from the moment you check in until your departure, and we regret any uncharacteristic shortcomings you may have noticed. If you would like to further discuss your feedback, we encourage you to contact us directly. Next time you find yourself in the area, we do hope you will consider a third stay, as we would love the opportunity to restore your trust in our hotel.

Summary: The views are amazing.  We were here for an event and the staff was cheerful.  There were several fining venues with great views of a perfect surfing beach..  The food was excellent and you could even find local beer.  The in house deli was nice in the core of the complex for those wanting a light option.  Try and get an ocean view room.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share your review. It sounds as if you enjoyed each aspect of your stay, and we are delighted to hear it. It is marvelous to know you were impressed with everything from our dining options to our stunning views. Thank you for your positive review, and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: You can't beat the location for this wonderful Ritz Carlton property. It is one of the best places – romantic, beautiful, well appointed for business meetings, and great food.  If you're in Southern California, don't stay anywhere else
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your kind review. We are elated to hear you enjoyed each aspect of your stay at our Dana Point resort. If you return for either business or leisure, we would be honored to serve you again.

Summary: We attended a CCI event and also stayed at the hotel.  Service, location of the property (unbelievable view), food, room comfort & amenities were outstanding.  We would highly recommend this hotel to anyone!!
Manager Response: We are honored by your choice to spend time with us during The Diamond Ball. We are elated to hear each aspect of your stay exceeded expectations, from our wonderful location to our comfortable guest rooms. Thank you for your recommendation. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Beautiful setting on the cliffs of Laguna-Niguel.
Summary: The Ritz was a wonderful place for our business event.  We had a group of about 40 people, and the hotel offered all of the services for a variety of interests.  The location of the hotel offers stunning views of the Pacific, and the staff provide excellent service.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate the time you have taken to share your review. It is marvelous to hear your expectations were exceeded in terms of our courteous service and wonderful location. Should you find yourself back in Dana Point, we would be honored to welcome you for another memorable stay.

Summary: First time staying at the Ritz-Carlton and it was nothing short of amazing. I live in Southern California and I was still so impressed with the location and the treatment from all of the staff. Thank you for an excellent little get away.
Manager Response: We appreciate the moment you have taken to share your review. It is always a pleasure to welcome our guests—whether they come from across the world or from within our same state. Should you desire another staycation in the future, we would love to welcome you back.

Summary: The Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel is a superb hotel experience.  The physical beauty of the property can not be overstated.  The staff is extremely friendly and helpful.  I was waiting to ask a question at the front desk and seeing I was waiting one of the bellmen asked if there was anything he could help with which he did.  Probably the friendliest staff I've encountered at a hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your review. We are thrilled to hear our staff was both friendly and attentive to your needs. It was our pleasure to welcome you to Dana Point. If you find yourself back in the area, we would be thrilled to accommodate you again.

Summary Heading: The best views I have ever seen
Summary: Traveled here for business in mid November, first the weather was perfect, the skies were crystal clear and it was so warm. The property was very well maintained and it was obvious how well the rooms were cleaned on the daily basis. The staff were very professional and accommodating. The restaurants were all located where you could experience the beautiful views and the food and drinks were amazing. I didn't wanna come home!
Manager Response: Thank you for joining us during your business trip this month. How wonderful that our weather was so beautiful during your stay! We’re delighted to read your compliments on the cleanliness of our guest rooms, professionalism of our staff members, and the views offered at our dining outlets. We hope you’ll be able to return for another stay again soon.

Summary: Absolutely spectacular! This property is superb! The staff, accommodations, venue and food is 4 STAR! Easily reached from John Wayne airport. Easy beach access. Wonderful restaurants nearby. It's nice when the staff goes out of their way to know you and make your stay personal and pleasant.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your kind words with us. We’re thrilled you enjoyed every aspect of your stay, from our vast dining options offered to our convenient location. It’s wonderful to hear that our staff went out of their way to make your time with us so special. Should you return to Dana Point in the future, it would be our pleasure to host you once again at your home away from home.

Summary Heading: Party on one side porn on the other
Summary: A late night flight. An hour's drive. My wife and I were seriously ready for some shut eye after arriving at the Ritz Carlton in Laguna Niguel. We were on East Coast time, you see. Unfortunately for us, the party next-door to our room was just getting started. Now there's nothing wrong with laughter and having a good time, but when chairs start hitting the wall you start to wonder what's going on.  My wife called the front desk to report the noise and destruction going on next-door. She was assured the front desk would contact "loss prevention," whatever THAT means. The only result was that my wife and I continued to lose sleep. Nothing  changed with the noise level after that,  and it finally stopped around 3 AM. Keep in mind that 6 AM our time. Fast forward to 9 AM this
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to provide us with this thorough feedback. We understand how frustrating it must be when your neighbors are being disruptive, and we apologize for what we believe was an extremely uncharacteristic experience at our hotel. That being said, we are pleased that Rory was able to ensure that your neighbors were checking out the next day and that he was able to refund your points. Please know that we are confident that we can provide you with an improved experience should you choose to stay with us again.

Summary: Wonderful stay.  Outstanding staff -- pleasant, courteous, eager-to-please -- in all areas. From the moment we arrived, staff aimed to please.  Housekeeping offered bottles of water and chocolates.  Restaurant wait staffs were extremely helpful. Etc., etc.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your review. It is fantastic knowing you felt well taken care of throughout the duration of your stay. Next time you are looking to travel, we would be thrilled to welcome you for another wonderful stay.

Summary: Ocean views from the hotel terrace are unbelievable. Its just a 5 minuntes walk down to Salty Creek beach which seems to be a surfers hot spot. The hotel rooms are spacious, most of them with a nice balcony. The staff was very friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your feedback with us. We are delighted to hear our breathtaking views and attentive service met your expectations. If you find yourself back in Dana Point in the future, we would love to accommodate you again.

Summary Heading: The View. The Surf. The Ambience.
Summary: Spent last weekend at this beautiful resort.  While the hotel is wonderful in every respect, it is the staff that takes it over the top.  From the moment you arrive, you are treated to exceptional service that is never self-serving or cloying but genuinely well-intentioned and sincerely provided.  And then there's the view.  Perched cliffside overlooking Dana Point and the Pacific, it's hard not to drift to the windows, the terraces or the grounds as you walk through the facility.  Definitely take time—lots of time—to sit outside.    If you're a surfer, the waves are great here and the hotel loves its surfers.  There are surfboards and surf art throughout the facility.  The beach is wide and sandy so a day spent lounging down by the water's edge is a must.  The rooms are quite
Manager Response: It brings us great joy to read your positive review. We are thrilled you enjoyed every aspect of your stay, from your time dining at Raya to the careful and attentive service from our staff. It is fantastic to hear you were able to take advantage of our wonderful Dana Point location as both a surfer and a beachgoer. We are grateful for your recommendation and are thrilled you plan on returning. We look forward to accommodating you again.

Summary Heading: Beautiful views, but not my room
Summary: I had some really high expectations for this hotel. It was the first RC property I've ever stayed at AND it was on the Pacific coast. I will say that I was mildly disappointed in the hotel facilities. The view was gorgeous. Can't beat that, but overall, the rooms were old and showed wear. My room had two outlets in it and one of them was covered by the AC unit, so it was only half usable. Then, the other outlet was down the wall, so I had to drag the desk to be able to charge my laptop and my phone without one of them having to hang off the desk/wall. There were no plugs that I could find around the bed. My husband insisted there had to be a plug since there was a lamp, but when I looked all I saw was a yarn ball-like mass of cords covered in dust. I wasn't about to touch it and
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are delighted you enjoyed our your meal in Raya and we certainly agree that the Poke bowl is exceptional. However, we are concerned to hear that you experienced a few issues in your guestroom. We strive to provide each guest with an exceptional experience, and we regret that yours did not live up to your expectations. If you would like to further discuss these comments, please do not hesitate to contact us directly. We hope you will consider a return visit, as we would love the opportunity to restore your faith in our hotel.

Summary: Please read my communication within the survey. I would like to sit with and discuss further the possibility of creating a sustainable presence service culture allowing all individuals to radiate. Thank You
Manager Response: Thank you sharing your feedback with us. We will look out for your responses within our survey and will be in touch. If you would like to discuss your comments in the meantime, please do not hesitate to contact us directly. We look forward to speaking with you.

Summary: Great place to stay!  Beautiful resort and wonderful service.  I wish we could have stayed longer to take advantage of their amenities.  There so much to do for couples, or families with children.  Would love to come back soon.
Manager Response: It is spectacular knowing you enjoyed your time at our resort. We, too, wish you could have stayed to experience the various wonderful amenities we have to offer. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back soon. We look forward to accommodating you again.

Summary: The Ritz is not only a well appointed hotel with many options for dining but it offers some of the best views anywhere around.  We had had an ocean front room with a balcony and can't imagine staying here without it. The sound of the ocean is wonderful and the views, breathtaking! We loved watching the surfers down in the ocean below.  With all that said, the best thing at the Ritz is the customer service. From the moment you arrive, the valet service (who I think should get 10 stars) is at your side to not only to take your car but help with whatever you need. They were friendly and attentive our entire stay. Brian was especially nice.  The front dest staff call you by name and greet you with a smile.  There is always someone there to help either to carry something for you or
Manager Response: From our breathtaking ocean views to our impeccable customer service, it brings us great joy to read about each aspect of your visit that exceeded expectations. We are thrilled to hear you were treated with care and found both your room and our property to be to your liking. Your kind words are much appreciated and will be pass along to Brian and the rest of our dedicated team. If you find yourself back in Dana Point, we would be delighted to serve you again.

Summary: Very personal and most amazing stay in my whole lifetime. There were a few minor issues and they took care of it immediately.  Also, they let me arrange Scavenger Hunt to surprise my wife for our tenth year anniversary.  Many of the crews joined the activity. I gave them lots of tips for making it possible. We will come back again!
Manager Response: It was our pleasure accommodating you and providing assistance in your romantic gesture. We are thrilled you enjoyed such a special 10th anniversary celebration. It is troubling to know you faced any minor issues, but we are pleased our staff was able to resolve them quickly and professionally. We are delighted you plan to return and look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary Heading: Um - They Can't Get Anything Right
Summary: Pros: 1) nice towels 2) cool text system has your valet car brought up. But, naive valet moved seat - boo.   Cons: 1) truly run down and antiquated property. There is no outdoor space - there's one small balcony that is beyond over crowded with people all wanting outdoor patio space to catch a drink and enjoy the view.  2) first room filled with cigaret smoke .... ugh. 3) beach is horrible - if you - like us - are used to the upkeep in Hawaii or Mexico then you will be taken aback. The beach isn't groomed. It's littered with seaweed, dead birds, and smells horrible. Also tons of sand fleas ... this is NOT a beach property.  4) we moved poolside and waited 40 minutes to track down a waiter to order 5) hair found in food at restaurant 6) spa has no appointments avail ...?!
Manager Response: While we are grateful for the time you have taken to share your feedback, we are troubled by the uncharacteristic challenges you have faced throughout your stay. It is our priority to ensure each guest feels extremely well taken care of, and we regret any shortcomings in service you may have experienced. If you are still on property, please contact us directly, as we would like to do whatever we can to improve the remainder of your stay. Otherwise, we would love an opportunity in the future to restore your faith in our hotel.

Summary: Fabulous everything so first rate the cub level staff so amazing Jenny goes out of her way! All th food and beverages were the best we will always go back to this hotel we felt like we were so special and the only ones on the club level
Manager Response: We appreciate your genuine review. It is spectacular to hear your expectations were exceeded in all areas, from our impeccable service to our various dining options. We will be sure to pass your kind words on to Jenny and the rest of our dedicated team. Next time you are in Dana Point, we would be honored to serve you again.

Summary Heading: A palatial home away from home.
Summary: This is a regal property with spectacular views.  The staff is outstanding and the service consistent with what you would expect at a Ritz-Carlton.  If you have an opportunity to stay on the Club Level, I highly recommend it as the food, beverage service and staff exceed expectations.
Manager Response: We are honored by your choice to spend time at our hotel and are delighted to hear you experienced an all-around exceptional stay. Thank you for the recommendation. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The Ritz-Carlton is a fabulous hotel with incredible views of the Pacific and the hotel is stunning throughout. The staff is attentive and eager to help in any way they can. The rooms were well appointed and the food at every meal was fantastic. It was a wonderful experience and I hope to be back soon.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate the time you have taken to share your review. It is wonderful to hear your expectations were exceeded in terms of our attentive service and comfortable guest rooms. If you do return to the area soon, we would be honored to serve you again.

Summary: I booked the RC at Laguna Niguel through American Express Fine Hotels and Resorts program.  The stay was, let's say interesting. The room we were given had great views of the Pacific from the cliff tops of Laguna Niguel.  There was a mini bar which was empty! 🤔 what's the point of a small fridge in the room if you're going to leave it empty, strange to say the least. First night the towels in the bathroom had holes in the them and we had to ask for extra shower gels and body lotion, they were obviously "keeping good housekeeping". Toilet smelt of well you know what.....  The hotel clearly needs the rooms to have a major renovation as the common areas are very nice and looked after. The staff at the Raya restaurant were impeccable and nothing was too much trouble there and also
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are delighted you enjoyed our amazing views and the service in the restaurants. We are, however, disappointed that other aspects of your stay did not meet your expectations. If you would like to further discuss these comments, please do not hesitate to contact us directly. We hope you will consider a return visit, as we would love the opportunity to restore your faith in our hotel.

Summary: I visited the Ritz Carlton - Laguna Nigel for business, but it's hard to not also classify the trip as "pleasure." Food, guestrooms, banquet services, boutique, views, service - nothing left me wanting. Every staff member greets you with a genuine smile and a 'hello' - and not one waits for the question, it's like they read your mind. "Would you like a car to the airport?" as I'm walking through the lobby with my bag before even reaching the door. "Why, yes, I would, thank you!"
Manager Response: It brings us great joy to read your genuine review. Your list of positive aspects is truly flattering, and we are thrilled to hear you so thoroughly enjoyed your stay. We strive to ensure the complete comfort of each guest. Therefore, it is spectacular knowing you felt well take care of throughout the duration of your stay. Should you find yourself back in the area, we would be honored to serve you again.

Summary Heading: What a way to spend our 35th wedding anniversary!!!
Summary: What a beautiful resort!  We had an ocean view room on the third level.  The view was fantastic!  I can not find the words to describe the gorgeous sunsets.  The staff at the resort were very helpful, friendly and professional.  The servers at Rava were awesome.    My only concern was the lack of parental control of some children. There were some children running, tossing balls, screening and laying on the floors in the lobby hallways by the bar and restaurants.  When I asked some staff members if they could speak with the parents of these children, I was told they could not talk with the parents of the unruly children. They were guests of the hotel. Well, what about my husband and myself?  We were guests and didn't appreciate that we were being inconvenienced by children that
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to provide a description of your stay. We often find that the sunsets in Dana Point leave us speechless as well! It is fantastic to hear the views from your room and the service you received exceeded expectations. It is disappointing to hear about your experience with our younger guests. We regret any challenges you may have faced and hope it did not prevent you from relaxing and enjoying your time in Dana Point. We greatly appreciate your recommendation and hope to welcome you back for another memorable stay in the future.

Summary: There's not much to say about this property other than it really is spectacular. I have stayed at this hotel numerous times over the past couple of years, usually on business. The staff are outstanding. The rooms are comfortable and generously appointed. And you can't say enough about the location. It is a beautiful and relaxing respite from a very busy world. I stay in hotels more than 150 nights a year this is my favorite property in the United States.  Because this hotel is so beautiful and special it comes at a price. I realize that this property is not for everyone because it is very expensive. If you can swing it I would strongly urge trying this property at least once.
Manager Response: Your genuine review brings us great joy. Thank you for your continued loyalty to our hotel. It is marvelous to know you so thoroughly enjoyed your visit to Dana Point. We are delighted to hear your expectations are continually met when it comes to our exceptional service, wonderful location and comfortable accommodations. If you return to the area for business or leisure in the future, it would be our pleasure to accommodate you again.

Summary: Outstanding hotel with excellent service from all staff members. Looking forward to returning for a longer stay. Concierge level ocean view rooms are outstanding. Food an service in hotel restaurants excellent. Beautifully presented. Service excellent. Reasonably priced menu.
Manager Response: From the impeccable service of our colleagues to our breathtaking ocean views, we are thrilled you enjoyed each aspect of your visit. It is wonderful to know you were able to take advantage of our various dining options and concierge level rooms. We look forward to welcoming you back for a longer stay in the future.

Summary Heading: The ONLY place we stay when we go to Laguna/Newport Beach
Summary: Been to the Ritz Carlton at least a dozen times over the past decade, and it always is wonderful. Incredible rooms, great food, and great location. The Newport fashion mall is a short drive away for shopping and dining. Canaletto is our favorite restaurant there. And also close to Dana Point is you want to take a short drive and stop there as well. But, you could spend all your time at the Ritz Carlton and never be unhappy. Spoil yourself and go for it once and you'll see what we mean!
Manager Response: Thank you for the time you have taken to share your review. It is fantastic to hear you were able to not only experience so much of our hotel, but also the beautiful surrounding area. Your loyalty to Ritz Carlton hotels is greatly appreciated. We hope to continue to provide exceptional visits for many years to come!

Summary: Looking for a pampered get away in a stunning location, the Ritz at Laguna Miguel is it. From the moment Patrick took us to our room we knew this was going to be a very special vacation.  Others who made our stay so special included Stella and Lola at the spa, Keith at enoSteak and Katie at the pool.  We will be back.
Manager Response: Your kind words are appreciated. It is marvelous to know you enjoyed your stay, from the moment you arrived until the moment you checked out. Please know your genuine comments will be passed along to Stella, Patrick, Lola, Keith, Katie and the rest of our dedicated team. We are thrilled to hear you plan to return, and we look forward to seeing you again.

Summary Heading: Awesome time and experience in Laguna.
Summary: We had a great time here and the service was fantastic. The Enosteak Restaurant was wonderful. The best rib eye steak I had in years. The pool area was clean and enjoyable. Room service was great, loved the 24 hour menu. We will be back soon. Everyone took great care of us. Thank you.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your review. It is spectacular to know you enjoyed each aspect of your stay, from your time at enoSTEAK to your experience with our 24-hour room service. It will be our pleasure to welcome you for another stay in the future.

Summary Heading: Excellent Experience at the Ritz Carlton Laguna Nigel
Summary: The Ritz Carlton Laguna Nigel is a great location for a weekend get away, I can thank enough the agent at the check in desk for his kindness and superb service, Jonathan exceeded my expectations, that is the reason why when I have a choice to stay at a Ritz Carlton vs other Hotels, I always choose the Ritz Carlton every time!
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate the time you have taken to share your review. It sounds as if our attentive service was the highlight of your stay, and we are thrilled you felt well taken care of. On behalf of Jonathan and the rest of our team, we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Gorgeous hotel with spectacular views and facilities
Summary: The hotel is beautiful and the service for the most part is impeccable. Beautiful views of the Pacific Ocean and the beach below.  Easy beach access and lovely pool.  Service is responsive and personalized
Manager Response: From our attentive service to our sweeping ocean views, we are thrilled you enjoyed each aspect of your visit to Dana Point. If you find yourself back in the area in the future, we would love to accommodate you again.

Summary: Smelled fab, welcomed well, raya for breakfast was delicious every time.   Tim the bellman was exceptional, yoga teacher needed to wash her hair. Spa was fab., property was beautiful!  Trolley was a little plus.  Enjoyed the short stay !!!! Thank you
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to detail your experience. We are thrilled you enjoyed everything from your dining experience at Raya to your time in our spa. It is always lovely when guests have the opportunity to take advantage of our various amenities. Next time you are in the area, we would love to accommodate you again.

Summary: The hotel is in a beautiful setting on the seaside bluffs between Laguna Beach and Dana Point. It offers everything you expect of a luxury hotel, but something else stood out for me. Without exception, the staff consistently offered gracious and warm hospitality making the hotel feel more like a private club then a faceless resort.  If the GM reviews this, please accept my compliments and share them with your team. Also thank you for the upgrade to the ocean view room on the 4th floor. Truly everything was lovely and I would be happy to return.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your complimentary review. We pride ourselves on our exceptional team of dedicated colleagues and are thrilled you were treated with care and attention by each one. I can assure you your comments will be passed on to the entire team. It was our pleasure to provide you with an upgraded room and an all-around enjoyable stay. We look forward to accommodating you again.

Summary Heading: Obsequious follow-up doesn't make up for lousy room...
Summary: Worth about $400/by, not over $700. We used to love this hotel, but despite the many times we have visited, the front desk gave us a terrible room (for over $1,000/nt when you add in "resort fee," tax, $200 pet fee, etc,) in the "back 40" with kids jumping up and down above us. When we asked for a change we were shown dark, dingy rooms in another far off area of the hotel, which we rejected. Having expressed our disappointment after having been assured the hotel was 100% completely booked, we should have been surprised when the front desk magically discovered a better room for us, "at no extra charge," Candace had the nerve to say.  Now THIS was a lovely room in a better location and we were appreciative, [though irritated we had to go through so much time and effort to be
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your loyalty to our hotel and your honest review of your experience. While we are pleased you were eventually given an upgraded room that met expectations, we are disappointed to hear you experienced anything but courteous and genuine care from our team. It is our priority to ensure the complete comfort of each guest, and we regret any shortcomings you may have experienced. If you would like to further discuss this feedback, please do not hesitate to contact us directly. We hope to hear from you, as we would love the opportunity to restore your faith in our hotel.

Summary: We always enjoy our stay with y'all. This is our favorite trip we do out of the the year as well s our favorite place to stay. We aways visit this property in the fall of the year and the staff remembers us by name always. They treat us so well from the time we check in to the time we leave. The club level treats us like gold. We always feel so special, the service is top notch , from the cleaning staff, bar staff, and all the concerige always goes above and beyond for us to make our stay more special each year we visit your property.
Manager Response: We are flattered by your kind words regarding your various stays with us. It is an honor to host your family time and time again. From your time in our Club Level to your experience with our concierge staff, we are thrilled your expectations are consistently exceeded. We look forward to many more years of serving your lovely family.

Summary: I took my 22 year old daughter here one evening to eat and we had a great time. Before dinner we had a drink on the balcony which offered a good atmosphere and lovely views. The restaurant itself offered fine food and was a classy place to eat. I'd recommend this to anyone.
Manager Response: We are honored you chose to dine with us and are delighted you enjoyed your experience. It is marvelous knowing you not only enjoyed your food, but the atmosphere that came with is as well. If you and your daughter need another reservation in the future, we would be happy to serve you again.

Summary: Luxury at it's finest. If you want personal attention and a spectacular place to stay, this is it! Want for nothing and get everything. The beach is fantastic and they will take you by cart to spare you the hill.
Manager Response: As it is our goal to ensure each guest feels relaxed and well taken care of, we are thrilled to read your kind review. It is fantastic knowing you enjoyed careful attention from our dedicated team throughout the entirety of your visit. We look forward to serving you again in the future.

Summary: Stayed here for a conference - what a wonderful wonderful experience.  Not sure anything could be more beautiful than watching the sun set over the Pacific from the hotel on top of the cliffs.  Beach access was lovely and open, and I enjoyed watching the surfers and walking on the beach.  The rooms were great, bed and pillows so comfortable.  Everyhing was open and clean. Staff were charming.  Meeting room space, and wifi were great.   (They should think about opening up the cafe earlier for us east coast folks, and putting a hose out in the back for people coming back from the beach).
Manager Response: We are touched by your genuine review and kind words regarding your visit. It is spectacular to hear you enjoyed everything from our stunning ocean views to our meeting spaces and work-friendly environment. Your other feedback will be noted and used when making improvements in the future. Next time you are in town for a conference or for leisure, we would love to welcome you back.

Summary: Where do I begin? The hotel is on a cliff, possibly the best location in the area. Every view from every window is picture worthy. There are breathtaking vistas and many walking paths to explore, going along the beach or up into the hills. The Ritz is everything one expects in a five star hotel, beauty, comfort and excellent service from a caring and well-trained staff. We cannot wait to go back. A special shout-out to Penny and Andrew on the club level. Their concern for us was sincere and very much appreciated.
Manager Response: It is an honor knowing you enjoyed your time with us. We are delighted your expectations were exceeded when it came to our wonderful location, comfortable accommodations and exceptional staff. Your kind words are truly appreciated and will be passed along to Penny, Andrew and the rest of our dedicated team. If you find yourself in the area again, we would be honored to provide another memorable stay.

Summary: Beware of putting valuables in the safe. They are not at all secure as we found out. The hotel is excellent with beautiful views. The service is of the highest quality and the amenities are good (pool, gym and spa). The rooms are getting a little long in the tooth and need upgrading. Unfortunately, and no fault of the hotel, the beach in front is not of the highest quality.
Manager Response: Thank you for bringing this incident to our attention. While are pleased you enjoyed so many other aspects of your stay, the challenges you describe overshadow these positives. Please contact us at your earliest convenience, as we would like to rectify this situation as best we can. We look forward to hearing form you and hope you will consider returning.

Summary: I accompanied my husband on a business trip here, and we enjoyed this hotel very much.  The bed was super comfortable, the bathroom was spacious (two separate sink areas), and we had a nice balcony overlooking the pool.  My favorite perk was the little shuttle that takes you down the cliff to Salt Creek beach.  They would set up chairs and umbrellas for you, and provide you with towels and water bottles. When you were finished, you could just call them to come and get you.  You could obviously walk up and down the path yourself (less than 10 minute walk), but it was nice to not have to (especially for the family I saw with young children).  I also took advantage of their daily yoga class, and enjoyed doing yoga out on the gazebo while listening to the sound of the surf below.
Manager Response: It brings us great joy to read your kind words. We are thrilled you were able to take time for yourself during your husband’s business trip. It is marvelous to hear you enjoyed our shuttle to the beach and our relaxing yoga classes. We strive to make each guest feel as comfortable as possible, and it is wonderful to know you were well taken care of. If there is ever anything we can do to make your time with us more enjoyable, we encourage you to contact us directly. If you find yourself back in the area, we would love the opportunity to serve you again.

Summary: My wife and I enjoyed a wonderful weekend getaway at this gorgeous hotel in a beautiful setting.  From the Raya for a more casual dining experience to the Eno Steakhouse we were extremely please with the quality of our meals and the service we were provided.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your review. From our excellent service to our various dining options, it is spectacular knowing you enjoyed so many aspects of your stay. Should you and your wife return to the area, we would be delighted to accommodate you again.

Summary: Overall, the hotel is great. Property is very nice, location is unbeatable. Food is fantastic. However, I expected more in terms of service. Also, the pool is rather small for the hotel capacity. I loved the place but expected more from a Ritz-Carlton.
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest review. While we are thrilled to hear you enjoyed our fantastic location and wonderful dining options, we are concerned by the challenges you describe. If you would like to further discuss these comments, please do not hesitate to contact us directly. We hope to welcome you back for an all-around excellent stay in the future.

Summary: Laguna Niguel was a beautiful place and experience. My first time in California outside of LA The coast is beaufitful and laguna  niguel is a lovely setting. The Ritz Carlton was a beautiful experience.  Beautiful grounds and facilities and the staff was excellent
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you for your first non-LA trip to California. From our beautiful property to the stunning surrounding area, we are proud of our Dana Point location and are pleased you enjoyed it as well. Next time you find yourself in California, we would love to welcome you for another stay.

Summary: My fiancée had a work trip here & our 2 year old and myself joined.  I cannot say enough good things about our experience.  Jonathan at the front desk was so sweet to us from the moment we arrived, until the day we departed.  Chad from the cafe couldn't have been any nicer or friendlier during our many visits there. (Lots of snacks & milk) we had an amazing ocean front room that was throughly cleaned /vacuumed each day. The golf cart to the beach was the baby's favorite thing to do, and Brian was always happy and so nice about our requests for many trips. We travel a lot with our son and this was the best place for our family in terms of being high end but not to the point where we felt guilty about his sticky hands and running around like a puppy. Highly recommend staying here.
Manager Response: We are truly grateful for your review. It was a pleasure welcoming your family, and we are delighted you enjoyed your experience. It is fantastic to hear your expectations were met when it came to our wonderful views and various methods of on-property transportation. I’m sure Brian enjoyed providing golf cart rides as much as your son enjoyed taking them. We will be sure to pass your kind words on to him as well as Jonathan, Chad and the rest of our dedicated team. Thank you for your recommendation, and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: This hotel is worth every penny.  I am able to do everything that I needed to do there for business AND rejuvenate!  The service, fitness facilities and proximity to the beach are amazing.  The views are amazing and the staff is wonderful as well.  every thing you need is right there.
Manager Response: Whether you are in for important business or just simple leisure, we are always delighted to welcome each and every guest. It is pleasing to hear you were able to relax between meetings. Should you return for any reason in the future, we look forward to serving you again.

Summary: Luxurious, friendly and comfortable! I've stayed here at least 10 times over 15 years and I'm never disappointed in the food, quality or accommodations. The pool areas are very nice and bring a wetsuit if you intend to enjoy the beach! My only issue ever was a problem with the valet not charging my electric car as I had requested. It created lots of stress as I checked out because I had no time to charge it because I had a flight from LAX to catch in three hours!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review. Your loyalty to our hotel is incredibly appreciated. It is spectacular knowing you’ve continually enjoyed stays that exceed your expectations. We regret any uncharacteristic lapses in service you may have experienced with your transportation to the airport and hope you did not face any difficulty in making your flight. We look forward to welcoming you back for many more memorable visits in the future.

Summary: My wife and I came here for our first anniversary. The service was hands down spectacular. We got upgraded with our room to a fireplace/ocean view from Jonathan at the front desk for being a Starwood Gold member. It's nice to see how quick the Marriott/Starwood transition kicked in. We got a nice surprise bottle of Piper champagne and special custom chocolate strawberry dessert board in our room when we returned from the pool in the afternoon. The food/drinks were amazing, as well as the views! The only negative were the lounge chairs at the pool. Very uncomfortable, at least get some cushions. Other than that, highly recommend!
Manager Response: Congratulations on such a wonderful occasion. We are thrilled you chose to spend your anniversary with us. It was our pleasure to provide you with various amenities to ensure your experience was as memorable as possible. Your kind words are greatly appreciated, and we will be sure to pass them on to Jonathan and the rest of the team. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for many more anniversary celebrations in the future.

Summary: Stayed briefly over Christmas time. Finally earned enough points to try this one out, wow! Took the dogs along and had a ground level room complete with patio and fire pit. Furniture in room was luxurious leather, wet bar and patio with glass chips and mirrors screamed opulence! Best beds we've slept in at any hotel stateside. Quiet rooms, beautiful lush grounds with huge lawn area, picturesque walking trail along ocean and dog friendly park area next door. Inside lobby was interesting, sculptures done for the holidays were clever and fun. Great little market and coffee shop in lobby, excellent bar outside to meet friends and hang out. Staff was friendly, not pretentious. Clientele was upscale, well behaved and broad assortment of tourists and locals. Never wanted to leave the
Manager Response: We are honored you chose to spend part of the holiday season with us. It was our pleasure to serve you, and we are thrilled you enjoyed your stay. It is fantastic to hear your expectations were exceeded when it came to our courteous team, comfortable guest rooms, beautiful grounds and more. It is a top priority of ours to ensure each guest feels at home, so we are elated to know you were satisfied with each amenity in your room and in our public spaces. If you are thinking of returning for the holidays this year, please do not hesitate to contact us directly if we can help plan your stay. We would love to welcome you back for another memorable visit.

Summary: The position of the hotel is fantastic, the communal areas are good and the service was excellent. The rooms are dated, small and in desperate need of a major overhaul and do not fulfil the 5-star Ritz Carlton brand promise.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your honest review. While we are delighted you enjoyed our exceptional service and wonderful location, we are disappointed you found our accommodations to be anything less than impeccable. Your comments are taken seriously and will surely be used when making improvements in the future. If you find yourself back in the area, we would love to provide you with a much-improved stay.

Summary: We stayed last Friday night at the Ritz in Laguna Niguel on our honeymoon and it was a great experience from check-in to dinner to the upgraded ocean view room. Of all the Ritz Carlton's this hotel is my favorite. The service, decor, amenities, and hotel personnel exude the Ritz Carlton brand! I highly recommend to anyone who has never stayed at this Ritz to go there for one of the best hotels on the West Coast!
Manager Response: First and foremost, congratulations on your recent marriage! We are honored you chose to spend part of your honeymoon with us. It is marvelous to hear you enjoyed everything from our exceptional service to our stunning Dana Point views. We greatly appreciate your recommendation and hope you will return for another wonderful stay in the future.

Summary: If you want to feel special and pampered then The Ritz at Laguna Beach California is the place. We went for our honeymoon!! So romantic and so special. Spectacular views, awesome staff!! Just stunning!!!
Manager Response: We are truly flattered by your kind review. It is our pleasure to provide perfect experiences for each of our valued guests, and we are honored you chose to spend your honeymoon with us. On behalf of all of our ladies and gentlemen, we would love to accommodate you for more special occasions in the future.

Summary: An experience you'll never forget! The view is fantastic, the food is delicious, the smiles are never ending and comfort is divine! You'll never stay in a better hotel! You'll feel more appreciated and will never sleep better.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback regarding your luxury experience. It is fantastic to hear your expectations were exceeded in so many areas, from our delicious dining options to our genuinely courteous ladies and gentlemen. Thank you for your glowing recommendation. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Great hotel.  Club Level was amazing.   Views are spectacular!  Will come back.   We were upgraded to the Club level and then upgraded again to a better view of the ocean.    Room wasn't ready when we checked in early, but the more than made up for it with the club level upgrade.
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely five-star review. It is magnificent knowing you enjoyed the comfort and views available on our Club Level. When you do decide to return, we promise another exceptional experience.

Summary: Absolutely 100% great hotel, experience, can't recommend enough.  The attention to detail and personalized service is unmatched by any other resort or hotel I've ever stayed at anywhere.  Job well done, can't wait to return to another Ritz-Carlton property.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your review. It is marvelous to hear you enjoyed so many aspects of your experience. Next time you are in Dana Point, we would be delighted to accommodate you again.

Summary Heading: Fantastic hotel with stunning ocean views
Summary: I stayed at the Ritz-Carlton in Laguna Niguel for 2 nights for a conference. One would be hard pressed to find anything wrong with this property.  The ocean views are amazing. My room had a large patio with a view of the garden and the ocean.  The hotel bar had a great cocktail and appetizer menu.  The service was impeccable from the front desk to the valet who had my luggage already loaded in my car and a bottled water waiting for me in my cup holder.
Manager Response: Your kind words are truly appreciated. Whether here for business or pleasure, we strive to ensure each guest is met with exceptional service. It is wonderful to know your expectations were exceeded in this and other areas. We are delighted you were able to enjoy our magnificent Dana Point views from the comfort of your room. If you find yourself in the area for another conference in the future, we would be honored to accommodate you again.

Summary: Beautiful, well maintained hotel.  A staff that has been trained to be welcoming to it's guests.  However, it doesn't always come across as sincere, but a part of the job. From my perspective there is a lack of diversity, ethnic and gender is top to bottom functions at the hotel.  For example, few if any women in the valet area, little cultural diversity in the front office and heavy diversity in the  cleaning staff.  I don't think I met  a single African American employee.
Manager Response: We appreciate the moment you have taken to share your feedback. We are committed to providing a perfect experience to each of our guests, from our work at the front desk to everything that occurs behind-the-scenes. We are proud of our lovely team of ladies and gentlemen and appreciate your honest comments. Next time you are in the area, we would love to welcome you back for another memorable stay.

Summary: Beautiful hotel with killer views on the cliff. Terrific service. Relatively quiet. Nice alternative to The Montage. The 180 BLU lounge has some nice entertainment to enjoy, as well. Great access to walkways and the location makes it easy to visit local restaurants and shops. Highly recommend. I would return for a stay at this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to detail your experience. It is marvelous to hear you enjoyed so much of your stay, from our stunning Dana Point views to the live entertainment in our restaurants. We are thrilled you were able to experience not only our beautiful property, but the lovely surrounding area as well. We greatly appreciate your recommendation and hope to welcome you back again.

Summary: Repeat visit for couple. Wonderful stay and service. Expensive and worth it. Special thanks to concierges Amber and Francesca for custom arrangements and Front Desk team for extra service. Good Spa experience and enjoyed dinning at Bar and Market. Nice the coffee has unlimited refills till 11:30 am. Food good but priced a bit too high considering what it was. Will return.
Manager Response: We are grateful you chose to visit our hotel for a second time. It is spectacular to hear your were able to take advantage of our spa facilities and various dining options. Your kind words will be passed on to Amber, Francesca and the front desk team. We are thrilled you plan to return, and we look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Check in and reception is a cake walk. Rooms are functional. We thought that the should be a bureau in the room, not the tiny draws in the tiny closet whose door always seems to be in the  way when going to the bathroom. The mirrors in the bathroom might be a psychological experiment. Way overdone. You feel like you are in a funhouse. Don't bother with the hockey puck burger in the casual  little side restaurant. Disappointed that theTerrace resatuarant has the same style menu as the inside. Brewafast is great at the bakery right up the street and lunch next door.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share your review.  We are delighted your check in process was swift and stress-free. However, we are concerned by the uncharacteristic challenges you faced during your stay. Please trust your comments are taken seriously and will be used when making improvements in the future. If you would like to further discuss your feedback, please do not hesitate to contact us directly. We would be pleased to welcome you back for an improved stay in the future.

Summary Heading: Lives up to the Ritz name
Summary: We  stayed at what must have been one of the busiest times for this property, Valentines Day. This RC is the perfect scene for this type of getaway, with the gorgeous ocean backdrop and luxurious resort. Although check-in was unsually busy, Jonathan at the front desk was sincerely apologetic and efficient in getting us to our room. After a courteous escort to our room, we explored the property set on a cliff overlooking the beach. The trek down to the water was pleasant, and a shuttle is offered. The hotel also offers a variety of beach amenities such as towels, chairs, etc. The rest of the property is lush and inviting, with many spots to take in views of the ocean, as well as a nice pool area. Nathalie made sure my room requests were fulfilled and had everything set up as
Manager Response: It was a privilege welcoming you for Valentine’s Day, and we are grateful for your review. It is marvelous to hear you enjoyed our sweeping ocean views as well as our attentive service and various dining options. We will be sure to pass your kind words on to Jonathan, Nathalie and the rest of the team. We are thrilled to hear you will be returning. If there is anything we can do to make your next stay more comfortable, please do not hesitate to contact us directly. We look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: As far as luxury brands go, Marriott is failing with Ritz. As a long term Marriott die hard and 50+ night a year gold member and former employee it's disappointing. Better choices in LN with commensurate luxury service.
Manager Response: Your loyalty to Marriott brands is greatly appreciated. We are thankful for your review, but disappointed to hear that your expectations were not met during your visit. If you would like to discuss your concerns directly, please do not hesitate to contact us. We would love a chance to accommodate you again in the hopes of restoring your faith in our hotel.

Summary: The location and view of the ocean is magnificent. The Ritz is like no other hotel. The service is tops. Food is delicious. Rooms are beautiful. Expensive but worth the splurge. We took advantage of the complementary yoga class in the morning overlooking the ocean. Great way to start the day.
Manager Response: We are honored you chose to spend your vacation with us. We are elated knowing you enjoyed everything from our wonderful location to our impeccable service. Our morning yoga class is truly special, and we are thrilled you were able to experience it. We look forward to welcoming you back for another visit in the future.

Summary: Lovely place to relax n enjoy good times with friends . The staff was very helpful- the pastry chef even made some more of a wonderful item we had at a breakfast one morning n had a box for us the next day at no cost  Wow n we enjoyed every bite 👍 Would stay there again n also on the trolley stop which is a plus.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share your feedback. It is marvelous to know your time with us exceeded expectations. We pride ourselves on our exceptional service, and we are pleased you experienced this in such a unique way. Next time you are craving that special breakfast item, we would love to have you back for another visit.

Summary: I first must acknowledge that I was previously a Bellman/Valet at a Renaissance property so I am aware of the points for secret shoppers that each position in the hotel must acknowledge or perform at their station. That being said, my wife and I have fantastic experience at the Laguna Niguel property. We were using Marriott points for the two nights, otherwise we had no business being in such an amazing property. The room cost is well over our normal budget for travel. We arrived for check-in around 2 pm on Friday Sept 30th and our room was already available.  Austin our Bellman was excellent: ie conversation regarding the area with dining and activity suggestions, bag placement, filling of ice bucket. We informed him that it was our 5 year anniversary and he took it upon
Manager Response: It was a sincere pleasure to welcome you and your wife to Dana Point for your first California adventure. We greatly appreciate your review and are thrilled you enjoyed a perfect stay. It is fantastic to hear your expectations were exceeded each time you dined at 180blu. We are proud to host large groups and events and promise that this added traffic will not affect the quality of your stay. It brings us great joy knowing you were not bothered by the events or groups you encountered. Should you find yourself traveling to the West Coast in the future, we would be delighted to serve you again.

Summary: From the moment we arrived at the valet area to our departure we had exceptional service. The staff was friendly, personable and professional. Our balcony overlooked a popular surfing spot and my boyfriend loved watching and wishing he had brought his board.  The Club level surpassed any Hotel chain that I have been to. Excellent options for food and entertainment were available without leaving the property. The massage therapist were some of the best that we have experienced around the world. We were so surprised to have had such a special time so close to home.  Five stars and a big thank you!!!
Manager Response: It brings us great to joy to read your kind words. It is fantastic to hear you enjoyed your stay, from the moment you arrived to the moment you checked out. We are delighted you had a chance to visit The Club Level, as well as our spa facilities. If you and your boyfriend are in the mood for another “staycation” in the future, we would love to have you back.

Summary Heading: Outstanding if you can afford it
Summary: This is an outstanding luxury hotel, with an A+ location on a bluff overlooking the Pacific Ocean.  Everything was what you'd expect (including the price....).  The location is "to die for...;"  but, like most Ritz-Carlton is is pricy for "average" folks (I would not say it is overpriced, except the $40 valet fee and $30 resort fees are irksome)
Manager Response: Thank you for detailing your luxury experience. We are thrilled you found our stunning ocean views to be to your liking. Should you find yourself in Dana Point in the future, we would love to accommodate you again.

Summary Heading: Splendid hotel at a great location
Summary: The location of this beachfront hotel is absolutely great on top of the bluffs above the Pacific. Our quiet ocean view room was on the third floor in the north wing, the same floor as the lobby and the Raya restaurant for breakfast. We enjoyed the views of the ocean and beach. The upper fourth floor is mainly the club floor. The ground floor has access to the heated pools in the south wing. When we went down to the beach, beach chairs and umbrellas were provided to set up by ourselves. The beachfront location and the quiet room were for us the most important reasons to stay here - and hopefully to return. A few recommendations for dinner: the Marche Moderne in the South Coast plaza (about 45 minutes driving by toll road 73), the Basilic restaurant in Newport beach with excellent
Manager Response: We are thankful for the time you have taken to detail your experience. It sounds like the view from your room was a highlight of your trip, and we are thrilled we could provide that for you. We are thrilled you were able to enjoy a relaxing trip in beautiful Dana Point. Although we are proud of our on-property dining options, your recommendations are incredibly helpful for any guests looking to dine off property. Next time you are in the area, we would be honored to serve you again.

Summary: Nice place, exceptional staff and 100% happy with staff and service, as expected.  Baseboards and door jams need to be replaced.  We were greeted by valet and the bell hops and they were very friendly and very helpful.  Front desk and house keeping were exceptional however the rooms need updating as they are starting to show signs of wear and tear.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share your review. It is marvelous to know you were perfectly happy with our exceptional service. We are grateful for your feedback regarding our guest rooms and will certainly use it when making improvements. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back for a five-star stay in the future.

Summary: Business has never felt so luxurious as this hotel: the place, the people, the service, and the weather made it the best place for business with a pleasurable setting. Be ready for a resort experience like no other.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review. It is delightful knowing your expectations were exceeded in terms of our friendly ladies and gentlemen and luxurious accommodations. We hope to welcome you back for either business or leisure soon.

Summary: Love this property. The lobby is gorgeous and the rooms so comfortable. The pool doesn't really have a good ocean view but there is easy transportation provided by the hotel to the beach.  Lovely service. Nice get away from Los Angeles.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback. It is lovely to hear you enjoyed our comfortable accommodations and courteous service. We are honored you chose to stay with us during your time in Dana Point. We hope to welcome you back for another getaway soon.

Summary: We have stayed here before, and I have been here for meetings several times this year.  Beautiful hotel.  We especially liked the service at breakfast.  Andrew was just wonderful - he remembered her birthday and delivered a fruit plate, which was wonderful, with Happy Birthday written on it.  Shelly at the pool was beautiful and very friendly.  She was always pleasant and sent a gift to my wife which was in our room upon returning from dinner one evening.  The room was always clean and fresh.  My only area for improvement is that the chairs at the pool are so crammed together.  I had to move some things around to avoid feeling like a sardine in a can.
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely review of the hotel. We are please that you had a nice birthday celebration. We certainly appreciate your feedback about the pool area. We hope you will visit again soon.

Summary Heading: A tad dated, could use a refresher.
Summary: I stayed here for three nights while helping my friend move to Laguna and found the room to be quite dated and even musty in our specific room.  We had a ground floor, and asked for one so that we could enjoy the special Ritz fire pit.  The room is definitely large, and we had a nice partial ocean view, but the musty scent meant we had to keep the door open when we were there.  The pool is beautiful, cliff views are gorgeous!  Food and drinks were excellent, definitely typical Ritz quality.  Where this hotel falls short is the bell hop, valet, and bottom floor rooms being musty.  I tried calling bell hop multiple times before leaving and no answer.  I also drive an exotic car, so they parked it up front, but though I pointed at it multiple times Valet would still have me wait.
