Manager Response: Thank you for detailing your experience. We are thrilled you enjoyed our dining options and our beautiful Dana Point location. However, it is troubling to hear other areas of your stay did not meet expectations. Our accommodations and service should be nothing short of impeccable, and we regret any shortcomings you may have experienced. Please know your comments are taken seriously and will be used when making improvements in the future. If you find yourself back in the area, we would appreciate the chance to restore your faith in our hotel.

Summary Heading: Great service, excellent view, beautiful property
Summary: They treated us really well here and were really welcoming of our baby girl who had bibs, toys and snacks waiting for her and they comped her meals at the restaurant.    Food and service at Raya was spectacular but pricey.  Pool side service a little slow though its off season.    Great grounds and amazing views of the beach/surfers.  Great location to the cities - 10min drive to Laguna beach, 3 min drive to Dana point.
Manager Response: Thank you for the time you have taken to write your review. It is spectacular to hear you had a comfortable stay. We were honored to welcome both you and your daughter, and we are delighted we could make traveling with a young child a little easier on you. It is wonderful you were able to see so much of the beautiful surrounding area while you were here. Next time you find yourself in California, we would love another chance to accommodate you.

Summary Heading: Ritz Carlton Laguna Nigel has slipped
Summary: Average service overall, and poor dinner service at Raya left a mediocre feeling about Ritz in lagniappe Nigel.  Hole in room curtain, gouged paint in hallways.  Nowhere near Ritz standards.  Gorgeous location but needs better care, of property and guests.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are delighted you enjoyed our beautiful Dana Point location. However, we are troubled to hear other aspects of your stay did not meet expectations. We strive to provide each guest with an exceptional experience, and we regret if you faced any lapses in service during your visit. If you would like to further discuss these comments, please do not hesitate to contact us directly. We hope you will consider a return visit, as we would love the opportunity to restore your faith in our hotel.

Summary: Over priced for outdated room. No fridge, no coffee, no tea. Toilet door would lock itself due to loose hinge. The shower handle is about to come off. I took the cover off the comforter so it is easier for housekeeping to clean and found a huge stain (wine? blood?) underneath.   Great location and view, I would recommend staying elsewhere and come by for the restaurants and bars with spectacular views. It will still save you over $800 for two nights stay.   Service and entrance, food at restaurant is pretty good. It's pretty much a hotel that had a face lift on the surface with old age showing everywhere else.   The staffs were all courteous and personable. Only the infrastructure is aging and priced inappropriately.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your review and regret our delayed response. While we are delighted your expectations were met in terms of our stunning views and various restaurant options, we are troubled by the uncharacteristic challenges you describe. It is unacceptable that your room and its amenities were anything but impeccable, and we apologize if you were not completely comfortable. If you would like to further discuss your feedback, please do not hesitate to contact us directly. We would love nothing more than to improve upon this experience and restore your faith in our hotel.

Summary: I was here for two nights on a business trip and added a night for personal. I cannot rave enough about the service, the beauty of the entire property, and the spectacular views.  Every single person working at this property is friendly, accommodating and helpful.  The beach and tide pools are terrific for kids and adults, plus there is a beach shuttle to take you down and/or back. We preferred to walk down and ride back.  Everything you need for an amazing vacation is right here on property!  The event team is superb and way beyond any I have worked with before.  From the minute you arrive to the minute you leave it is pure relaxation and enjoyment.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Your kind words are much appreciated, and we will be sure to pass them on to the events team and the rest of the staff. We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed our beautiful property and its many amenities. If you find yourself in Dana Point in the future, we would love another chance to accommodate you.

Summary: Had a wonderful stay at the Ritz in Laguna Niguel! The service was fantastic and the property was amazing! Panoramic views of the ocean were everywhere as surfers hit the waves all day and into the evening. The exercise room was incredible with 2 story windows overlooking the ocean. The omelette and blueberry pancakes were some of the best. Surfboards and fresh flowers lined the halls. A true SoCal experience and would highly recommend. We will be back!
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to share your review. It is marvelous to know you enjoyed so many aspects of your stay, from our fitness facilities to our many breakfast options. We are delighted you were able to enjoy our sweeping ocean views from different areas throughout our hotel. We are looking forward to the opportunity to serve you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Amazing!!!! Cannot wait to go back!
Summary: Visiting a good friend and we stopped here for drinks and the sunset.  From the time we arrived, the staff was amazing, the decor of the hotel gorgeous and the service was exemplary!  We sat on the balcony and watched the sunset, had their amazing swordfish tacos and delicious drinks, and told stories, laughed and had a BLAST! When it became chilly, the waiters brought us some blankets!  I cannot imagine a more perfect time!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. Your comments are certainly appreciated. We always enjoy hearing that our guests enjoyed their visit. If you find yourself in Dana Point in the future, we hope you come back and visit again.

Summary: Came back for a quick 2 day getaway with my family for hubby's birthday.  Another exceptional stay with top notch service whether it was going to the beach or the pool.  Disappointed the pool restaurant was closed on Monday and we had to order room service but they at least brought it poolside.  Will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: It was nice to see you again!  Thank you for your loyalty!

Summary: I love Ritz Carlton properties for a number of reasons, specifically, their level of customer service and the presentation of their facilities.  Pros: The property itself is perched atop a beautiful hill overlooking the pacific with breathtaking views. The interior design feels like old Hollywood charm. The staff was friendly and extremely helpful. We chose the club level and the menu was great with an extended breakfast menu and an exceptional lunch. Our executive room was definitely up to standards.    Cons: We arrived mid- morning on  Tuesday, normally not a busy check in day, and our room was not ready. It happens, we are not unaware of the issues surrounding early check-in at a popular destination. However, it took nearly three hours before we could get into our rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for your celebration.  We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you and hope you will choose to return again soon.  We apologize there was a delay in checking in to your room.  We try very hard to ensure this does not happen; however there are time when we physically cannot honor an early check-in.  Thank you for understanding.  We appreciate you letting us know about the cleanliness of your guest room.  This is certainly not acceptable and your feedback will help guide us as we provide coaching to our ladies and gentlemen.  If we can assist you further, please do not hesitate to contact us.  We would be delighted to speak with you any time. Thank you for sharing via TripAdvisor.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, not sure it's worth the price.
Summary: Of course the view is just fantastic, it would be hard to top it anywhere else. The hotel is very nice but not worth the price. The rooms are quite small and although they are comfortable, they seem to be lacking a little. It's a bit like they tried to take an average hotel room and make it upscale. I'm certainly not complaining it's still better than 90% of the hotels out there, I'm just not sure it's worth the money. Some of the positive notes - the food was excellent and the staff very friendly and helpful. The pool bar does close at 2pm which was odd especially for a resort of this scale. For a base price of $500/night a person could do much better. Maybe not in Orange County, but certainly elsewhere.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton. We are delighted to know you enjoyed your overall experience and we are appreciate your feedback.  We have numerous enhancements scheduled and we are excited to share them with you. If we can assist you in any way, please contact our executive office any time. Thank you!

Summary Heading: Did Not Meet Our Five Star Expectations for a Ritz-Carlton
Summary: When one thinks Ritz-Carlton one thinks over-the-top quality and service. This property did not meet those standards. Our stay wasn’t bad – it was just not what one would expect from a five star hotel. We’ve stayed at Four Seasons, Belmond and Fairmont properties and this Ritz-Carlton did not meet the level of quality or service we’ve experienced at those properties  The location is outstanding and is perched on a cliff overlooking the Pacific. The property however is a bit worn and in my opinion due for a complete makeover. Our room was fine but it was a bit outdated.  This property is very busy. It hosts a large number of weddings and business conferences that seem to take over the common areas (plenty of guys in blue blazers and khakis with name tags). The hotel restaurant,
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We enjoyed having you as a guest and your feedback is taken seriously and constructively.  We hope you had the chance to share your concerns with one of our leaders while here on property, but if you did not have a chance and would like to speak with us, we would welcome the opportunity.  Our executive office can be reached at (949) 240-2000.  We want you to be proud of our resort and service, and we look forward to welcoming you back one day soon.

Summary: I was very excited to visit this property with a friend.  The Ritz Carlton name certainly conjures up visions of elegance, sophistication and excellence.  It was sophisticated and the lobby area was quite elegant, beautiful and comfortable.  The views are SPECTACULAR.  But the rooms are VERY tired. Part of the problem is the age of the hotel.  But with rack rates of $700+ they should deliver more than they do.  Our double bed room was small.  The handle on the closet came off in your hand (!) and nobody ever came to fix it. The bathroom is small and badly arranged.  There was a constant drip in the tub and a slight sewage smell in the toilet.  It is nearly impossible to figure out which light switch goes to which light and when you do figure it out they are unusual and take many
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your extremely valuable feedback.  We appreciate your time in providing it.  Our highest mission is to always provide exceptional accommodations and service.  We are continuously working on maintaining all areas of the resort on a daily basis, and have many forthcoming enhancement plans.  We look forward to sharing them with you.  If we can be of assistance by phone, please don't hesitate to contact us at any time.  We value your patronage and loyalty to our resort and our brand.  Thank you for staying with us.

Summary Heading: 2/3 star hotel with a 5 star price.
Summary: I came here for my birthday, first time at a Ritz so I was excited and had high expectations. The service was great all around but quality standards for the hotel itself are low. I've had  cleaner rooms at the Marriot.   We stayed in a fireside ocean view room. I felt like I was in a cheap and rundown hotel room.   There are red wine stains on the wall when u enter, the bathroom light switch was sticky and had make up on it, there rust on the embellishments of the chair, stains on the chaise, hot sauce stain on the carpet by the bed, dinged up furniture and even the remote had a disgusting brown residue on it. Shower mat had some mildew on the bottom side and the tub drains too slow when you're taking a shower (most likely clogged with hair from prior guests).  I'm sure other
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your comments with us and thank you for your feedback regarding the overall condition of your guestroom and the resort.  We take your comments very seriously and will be sure to share this information with our staff.  If we can be of assistance in the meantime, please feel free to contact our Executive Office any time at (949) 240-2000.

Summary Heading: Nice stay but there are watchouts
Summary: This is a beautiful property on the water that looks stunning in pictures and in person.  Next to Laguna Beach, this is a lovely location and peaceful area.   I stayed 9/17-9/19/16.  The ocean breeze during this time of year was so nice!    My watchouts for staying at the Ritz are the following: -This is a 5 star hotel.   I would say that it's an inconsistent 5 and closer to a 4.   The lobby is gorgeous and full of these amazing floral arrangements.  Then you walk down the hall and more bunches of roses - amazing.   The rug on that walk however is old and dirty.   As for the rooms, the standard base room is nothing special.   If you want to come here as a treat, you will be disappointed especially with a price tag of $500/night or more + taxes + $40 daily valet fee (where they
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback. It has been shared it with our executive commitee. We are delighted you chose The Ritz-Carlton as your luxury destination. We have many future enhancement plans that are forthcoming in the near future and we hope you have a chance to return and enjoy them soon. We are more than happy to assist you with future reservations when we may be offering lower rates or packages that provide greater value than during our summer/peak months.  Your comfort and safety are our highest missions. Our valet parking is underground and extremely safe. The other option is in the public beach parking area of Salt Creek beach. We thank you again for your review of our property and service and we look forward to welcoming you back. You are a very special guest!

Summary Heading: Best sunset on the OC beach
Summary: Well, make sure u there earlier than the sunset time, oder Your champagne and make sure your beloved one have good seat and enjoy great starters and best view, ever if it's not cloudy ( which is most is the time in CA).
Manager Response: We couldn't agree with you more that we enjoy the best sunsets!

Summary: Having a ocean front room with own fire pit looking sun setting on Pacific Ocean it does not get better than this! Walk to the beach. Gym has a great view to Pacific Ocean. Great location close to Laguna Beach. Great customer service it is like heaven on earth! This is a best hotel to stay at Dania Point.
Manager Response: Thank you for your visit!  We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you!

Summary: The Ritz-Carlton resort in Laguna Niguel/Dana Point, California is as ritzy as it gets. The hotel offers wonderful accommodations and service, and the property has spectacular ocean views. There is a beach access.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing The Ritz-Carlton for your luxury experience.  We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary Heading: Words can not describe this place
Summary: Quite simply put, this gorgeous hotel is located on one of the most beautiful spots on Earth.  The hotel is kept up very well both inside and out.  The service is also top notch.  There is always a smiling and friendly face ready to help you.   The rooms are very well appointed and spacious.  We loved the aroma and the site of the many fresh cut flowers in the lobby and around the hotel. The views on the bluff where this hotel is located out to the ocean are absolutely spectacular.  Please take some time and watch as the sun sets into the ocean. There is not a bad seat to view this incredible experience. The beach is very nice and is full of energy as you will find many surfers catching the next wave.  If you are not able to relax and enjoy yourself at this romantic luxery
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for your lovely review of our resort, facilities, and our team.  We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you and we look forward to you "moving in"!  If we can be of any future assistance, please don't hesitate to contact us any time.

Summary: This hotel is just terrific. I cannot say enough about how much I enjoyed my stay. Everyone could not have been nicer. The place is beautiful. The hotel is perched on a cliff overlooking the Pacific. There is very easy beach access and there are also two lovely pools. Breakfast is great  with large windows with views of the ocean. A very professional and friendly staff makes this hotel very special.  I certainly would look forward to staying there again.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for staying with us and providing your comments. It was a pleasure having you as our guest and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: So awesome and gorgeous! It's a must at least one time in your life! Staff is friendlyamd rooms are so clean. Most comfortable hotel bed I have ever stayed in. Restaurants expensive but it's a Ritz. Dana point is gorgeous!
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel!  We enjoyed having you and look forward to welcoming you back to the resort and Dana Point soon.

Summary Heading: A Utopia for Views and Service
Summary: Beautiful from moment of check in. True Ritz style with laid back Cali vibe. Excellent hiking and good beach. Set on a cliff, you do have to hike a little to the beach but with weather in the low 70's it was not a problem. First rate gym overlooking ocean. Amazing views all around and grass to play. They made my birthday special! Good eco conscious kids program but disappointed no Ritz Kids Club. Ted in customer service was lovely! My sone became very sick and staff bent over backwards. Restaurants and bars were very good.Treasure not to be missed!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We enjoyed hearing from you!  If we can assist you in any way, please let us know.  We look forward to creating another meaningful and relaxing experience for you soon.

Summary: Stayed here for a conference for 6 nights. The view from this place was absolutely spectacular and the conference facilities were very nice, including the catering. However, once you get over that, it's fairly stock-standard for a chain hotel, but somewhat more disappointing with the hotel decor and facilities.  The rooms, at over $700 a night normally, are NOT worth that much. They're a good size, but nothing special, and the interiors are very outdated. Also, there was no mini-bar in the room, just an empty refrigerator.   The swimming pool on one side of the hotel was quite nice, but the second pool was extremely disappointing. Similar to a backyard pool but with a big empty space around it which has not been used to its full potential.   Location-wise is great for the view,
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding the overall condition of your guestroom and the resort.  We appreciate hearing from you and have taken your comments constructively. We look forward to welcoming you back soon and sharing our upcoming property enhancements with you.  In addition, we would be delighted to add your preference of a stocked mini bar to your profile and any other specific requests you may have so that each of your Ritz-Carlton stays are exceptional ones.  If we can be of assistance in the meantime, please feel free to contact our Executive Office any time at (949) 240-2000.

Summary Heading: Fantastic, pay attention to type of room booked
Summary: As you would expect, the Ritz service was exceptional. Friendly, helpful, positive at every interaction. The grounds and views are spectacular. Easy access to the beach, they have multiple areas to sit and watch surfers below. The beds are best in class. They have a lot of conferences, and every morning/noon/night have tables and events on the lawn areas - so for our room, the sight from our beautiful ground level porch/balcony (which has a built in outdoor gas fireplace) was a dozen tables with conventioneers eating, drinking and milling around. The sheer curtains are sheer, and easy to see thru as a caution. A beautiful place, I'd reco getting an ocean view and upper floor to mediate the convention table/gawkers if you plan to use the porch/balcony.
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed your overall experience at The Ritz-Carlton and hope you took home some wonderful memories.  Thank you for sharing your feedback via TripAdvisor.  We love hearing from our guests!

Summary Heading: Came for 2 days for anniversary visiting from Manhattan beach
Summary: Beautiful property set on a cliff top overlooking 2 beaches. Upon arrival at 11:30, (we asked for early check in when we made our reservation) and unfortunately our room was not ready because it was Labor Day weekend. We had reserved a king full ocean view. Devon @ check in had a partial ocean view on the 3rd floor available, so we took that and he credited us more than the difference for the inconvenience. We weren't thrilled at first, until we saw the view of the room and it was fine, see pictures. Room was fine, balcony was great. We were really thrilled they remembered our anniversary and sent us chocolate covered strawberries!  I suggest walking all the way down both beaches, and also walking all around the property. We saw dolphins from the Dana point look out at the top
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience via TripAdvisor.  We love hearing from our guests!  Your photos are beautiful.  We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you, and we hope you will be back soon for another "staycation".  The holidays are a great time to visit!

Summary: Our son's wedding was held here and we stayed for a full week and things could not have been more idyllic! From group sales to the porters, to the front desk, housekeeping, car hops - all friendly, helpful and kind. The view from the ocean side is breathtaking and was the backdrop for the wedding....at sunset.   We had events in nearly every space the hotel had and all was great - excellent service, food and magnificent property. I was afraid there would be a snooty aura here - but was very wrong.... a veritable UN of guests and all very happy to be there.....  All our guests loved the weekend and their stay here - we will return!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to celebrate with The Ritz-Carlton.  We are honored to have your business and your trust.  We look forward to creating more memories for you soon!

Summary: If it weren't for the stunning scenery and structure, I would have given this hotel a 1-star review.   We reserved a "coastal view" room, but when we checked in, there was a balcony with an obstructive arch from which you had to strain your neck to the left to get a small glimpse of the coast.  The hotel appeared to be far from full, so I was surprised when the front desk gave pause to move us. After some negotiating, we were moved 2 full rooms over. Fortunately, there was no arch so we could see some of the beach and ocean. I consider this a partial ocean view room, but what do I know?  We next went for a walk of the facilities. There is a path to the beach that is supposed be serviced by a shuttle. We saw the tail end of it once. It runs quite infrequently. We were also told
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback. On behalf of our executive committee and all our ladies and gentlemen, we are disappointed to hear that your experience did not meet your expectations. We appreciate and have shared each of your concerns with our team.  Our highest mission is to provide extraordinary service and facilities at all times.  Regarding the kelp at the public beach, Salt Creek Beach; we are not able to remove or reposition the kelp as it is part of the ecosystem and we are under strict ordinance from the City.  We hope you had a chance to speak with one of our leaders while on property to work through all your concerns, however if you did not have a chance and would like to share more with the Executive Office, we would welcome the opportunity to speak with you. Please feel free to contact us at (949) 240-2000. We hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: My husband and I came here for 4 nights for the Labor Day weekend for a couple's getaway. The property is very pretty and the lobby lovely. A slight hiccup upon check-in (what is it with Ritz? Check-in never goes well for some reason) but we were finally assigned a room and we got settled in. Nice sundry shop right across from the lobby FYI (we weren't told anything when we checked in, so we had to figure everything out on our own). Huge windows everywhere to make the most of those amazing views. I can't count how many times we got turned around - not an easy place to navigate. I booked Ocean View and that was a real stretch - if I stood on my tippy-toes and tilted my head 45 degrees I could see what I think was water. I really wish the rooms advertised were more accurate. It
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we are delighted you enjoyed your overall experience at the resort and we always enjoy hearing positive comments about our team.  Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding the overall condition of your guestroom.  We appreciate hearing from you and have taken your comments constructively.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon and sharing our upcoming property enhancements with you.  If we can be of assistance in the meantime, please feel free to contact our Executive Office any time at (949) 240-2000.

Summary: We stayed here recently for 3 nights on a business/pleasure trip.  As in any resort, this is a beautiful location with great and friendly service.  However, it lacks privacy unless your room faces a wall.  If you're lucky to have an ocean view from your room, you will be exposed to other public activities.  We prefer the Half Moon bay location over this one.  There's a path that takes to to the beach for a ice morning walk, and make sure we catch a ride back uphill.  Overall, can't beat a resort lifestyle like this place.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We appreciate it!  We look forward to welcoming you back and we are always here to assist you prior to placing reservations so that we have all of your preferences and expectations addressed.  Thank you.

Summary Heading: Excellent Stay with a panoramic views
Summary: Just got back from a weeks stay with the family. Hotel was nice and the staff was very accommodating. Would not say Excellent for the following reasons: For the price, i felt that the rooms could have been a bit more modern. we had an ocean front room which had amazing views but need to be updated, The carpets had some minor staining and over all the room itself had no "WOW" factor. I have stayed in lesser hotels that were better appointed. The pool was nice with a very over priced pool menu ($26 for a burger). We usually stay at 4-5 star properties and over all this one did not impress us. There were some positives that i can point out, such as the view and their beach service which were both amazing. I would stay here again, but wish they would step up the finishes in the
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback.  We hear you and agree with you.  We are currently working through enhancement plans and delighted to share them with you.  We hope to welcome you back soon for another excellent service experience, however if we can answer any questions for you in the mean time, please feel free to contact our executive office at (949) 240-2000.

Summary: Leading up to our visit at the Ritz Carlton in Dana Point, I was concerned due to some of the reviews I had read.  Maybe this ended up being good thing, because I had lower expectations about our trip.    From the time we walked in, I was blown away.  The level of service I expect from a Ritz was there.  People remembered our names, we received a smile from all staff, and they went above and beyond for my daughter who lost her special bag in the lobby.  The food and drink were exceptional, but pricey.  The views were unbelievable.   Brian, the recreations manager, worked to make our trip very special.  He gave us a set of chairs as they were putting them away for the evening.  I had read a review about their strict 6pm policy, but his service was kind and understanding.  He is
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton!  We are delighted you enjoyed your experience and we look forward to creating many more for you in the future.  If we can be of any assistance, please let us know (949) 240-2000.

Summary Heading: There's nothing more beautiful than this spot
Summary: I've been going to the Ritz at Dana Point every year for the last six years and it's always one of the year's highlights. The view from the 3rd floor outdoor patio is fantastic and hanging with colleagues having a drink and apps is one of my favorite things to do at this space. Watch the sun set over the pacific.
Manager Response: It's always a pleasure having you with us!  Isn't 180blu phenomenal? We look forward to welcoming you back soon for another unique and memorable experience.

Summary Heading: Wonderfully beautiful location, great service, a few wrinkles starting to show
Summary: Stayed for 3 nights with my husband and son.  The location is wonderful - especially for an east coaster that has never had the opportunity to stay at a Pacific Beach resort.  Service levels were phenomenal.  Pool servers and servers in Raya restaurant were exceptional remembering from one day to the next who in our party had a gluten allergy, etc.  The room was comfortable and well appointed.  The crew that works the beach was great with setting up chairs, running the shuttle back up to the pool, etc.  We did notice a few things that did not seem stereotypical of the Ritz - for example the arm on the door closer on the door between the beach shuttle drop off and the pool was loose and hanging down - could literally have hit someone on the head.  There was also the occasional
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel as your west coast luxury experience.  We enjoyed having you!  Thank you for your feedback.  We greatly appreciate it.  We look forward to welcoming back one day soon and if we can assist you in any way, please contact us at (949) 240-2000.

Summary: This property is like heaven on earth and just perfect to have a getaway or plan an event like I was there for.  Our planner, Rebecca, was a dream to work with and all our guests have a great time.  Already thinking of how I can get back to this property.  The views alone are worth it!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: Had a fantastic week at the Ritz Carlton. Staff are wonderful; always friendly and helpful. The location is spectacular can't beat the sunsets! The only negative is that the rooms are not very sound proof. I could hear the TV and people talking loudly next door.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We appreciate it!  On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, it was our pleasure creating a memorable experience for you and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: My husband and I stay at the Ritz Carlton fairly often - it is our local getaway.  This is the first time that I have been very disappointed.  Unlike some other reviewers, I dont' find the rooms overly small - but they are very worn.  It does not look like the Ritz Carlton of yester-year. The hotel was busy.  Phones went unanswered, front desk staff appeared harried and quite unfriendly. Our room was not ready on our arrival.  We were tired and had something to eat on the premises.  They called my cell to say our room was ready.  No offer to have the bellman go up to our room and meet us or to bring us the key.  I traipsed back to the front desk and was faced with lines triple deep.  I quietly approaced the side of the reception desk to ask about the key.  I was very rudely told
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for your valuable feedback regarding the service inconsistencies you recently experienced.  We strive at all times to operate the resort in a first class manner with exceptional service and follow through.  We are saddened to learn we let you down.  If you would like to speak with one of our leaders regarding your stay, we would welcome your call at (949) 240-2000. Thank you and we look forward to hearing from you and welcoming you back.

Summary: First, it is undeniable that this property is situated ideally; on a cliff/bluff of ideal height, about 150 feet above the Pacific Ocean, angled perfectly westward to catch the entire progression of the sunset from full flaming orb glinting off the waves to the warm yellows, oranges and reds as it sinks lower in the sky, and the final deepening purples and blues as it dips below the horizon, saving the deepest crimson hues to be shot back up into the sky just as the dusk falls.    At its heart, the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel is, like its siblings, bred from the highest hospitality standards.  The greeting in the porte cochere was warm and sincere as expected at a Ritz Carlton property; helpful, but not intrusive.  Check-in was equally smooth and cordial.  The lobby is likewise
Manager Response: We are grateful for your very detailed feedback, and have shared it amongst our leaders.  We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your overall Ritz-Carlton experience.  We look forward to creating more unique experiences for you in the future.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton.

Summary: The Resort will take your breath away but the free yoga class with Cynthia Neilson will bring your breath back ........she is trained in Iyengar so she has all the details and knowledge but adds the positive, kindness that brings you to the Ritz-Carlton!  Thanks for a week of great yoga, Cynthia!
Manager Response: Thank you for your gracious feedback about Cynthia!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: For my recent birthday I wanted an escape, but didn't want to travel. Someone recommended the spa at Ritz Carlton to me and I am so glad they did. I called before the spa opened at 9 AM to make an appointment and Esmeralda was incredibly helpful in finding an available appointment. She answered all of my questions and was able to confirm the treatment and appointment time I wanted although there was not a spa representative available. As a rule, I never mention my personal situation but told her it was my birthday. When I checked in at the spa Holly wished me a Happy Birthday and was very gracious. Before we went to the locker room she answered all of my questions and went as far as to offer to order lunch for me after my treatment. The spa itself was clean, has great amenities
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed your Ritz-Carlton Spa experience.  It was a pleasure celebrating with you!

Summary: This is a high quality hotel in some aspects but for the room rates being charged, it did not feel like good value. Rooms were small and dated. The hotel overall felt like it needed a bit of work (eg the pool). None of this is the fault of the staff, and indeed they were high quality.  Pros: - balcony for my room had a great view of the beach. In fact, some of the common areas had this great view - great access to the beach - top quality staff - executive lounge was small but I thought pretty good  Cons: - bedrooms are small and in need of an update - the pool and surrounding area wasn't attractive at all but I guess people are encouraged to go to the beach - biggest factor really was the room rates. For their rates, you would expect more than what felt like an outdated entry
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We certainly appreciate your feedback and the complements about our ladies and gentlemen. We hope you will return again someday and if we can assist you in any way, please feel free to contact our Executive Offices at (949) 240-2000.

Summary: They did some updates in the rooms since I've last been here. It's more a subtle nautical theme. Please see photos. The room may not be very big but they're ample sized and the views make up for the smaller rooms.  The views are breathtaking and the lawns well maintained. Service continues to be exceptional. Everyone is friendly and accommodating. They offer before you even ask. There's a feeling of staff pampering the guests. There are a lot of restaurants around if the hotel restaurants price stickers come with a shock. Love the beach butler! There's a golf cart that can haul you and your beach items to the beach. They set it up and you can borrow beach and pool items for the kids. There are also activities specifically for different age groups.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for your luxury experience. We enjoyed seeing your photos!  Our ladies and gentlemen look forward to creating more meaningful memories for you soon.

Summary: We stayed at the RZ for a few nights and really enjoyed our stay. However, the food is overpriced and unfortunately not very good, but the staff is super helpful and the rooms are lovely.  Actually, the reason we're giving this review 5 stars is Austin from the bell desk team. He was awesome and people like him make hotels like the Ritz Carlton special hotels.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  It was a pleasure having you with us!  We appreciate your business, as well as your comments about our ladies and gentlemen, especially Austin.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: We recently stayed 6 nights here on a combined business/pleasure trip. Our ocean front room was beautifully appointed and had amazing views, but it is the outstanding service that distinguishes this hotel.  Everyone - from housekeeping to spa team - went out of their way to accommodate us.  Our group had a small glitch at dinner one evening (in terms of timing and meat temperature) which was swiftly and appropriately dealt with by the restaurant management.  Linea in the hair salon had already left work when I requested a last minute appointment, but she cheerfully returned and cut and styled my hair beautifully. The spa itself is lovely and Mikki gave me the best massage I've ever had.  Joel in the restaurant provided outstanding service, as did the team in the steakhouse who
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed your business/pleasure combined visit to the resort.  Thank you for providing your comments regarding our ladies and gentlemen.  They sincerely appreciate it.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon and creating more memories for you.  If we can assist you in any way, please contact us at (949) 240-2000.

Summary: The Ritz in Dana Point is a wonderful hotel that sits atop Salt Creek Beach and The Strands. It is a classic Ritz with a wonderful staff and especially the Concierge Michelle who will bend over backwards to help you in any way.  Families love the beaches, the long walks. Watching the great surfing and the shuttle that takes you either to Laguna Or Dana Point.  We love it over and over.... Rob
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again! We value your loyalty and enjoy creating new and unique memories for each time you come.

Summary: This hotel is beautiful. To eat overlooking the Pacific Ocean is priceless. The service is amazing and the amenities are perfect. Highly recommend attending. Perfect for families with kids. There is plenty to do and plenty of bars and restaraunt's here. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: It is such a pleasure having you with us!  Please let us know if we can assist you in any way.  Enjoy our magnificent surroundings and stunning facilities!

Summary: Good location, comfy beds, but underwhelming  The room rates are phenomenal (700 $ plus per standard room), almost everything is extra, so you expect a lot, like:  -To get seated for a meal without a long wait. We did not get dinner seats at all on two evenings and breakfast took well over an hour & 20 minutes! Horrible!!  -Large up-to-date rooms with all amenities. Rooms were less than average size. OK, but aging.  -Staff that gets out of its way to please the guests. The beach staff refused to let us borrow towels and a boogie board, because it was past 6 (and 'we close after 6', 'rules are rules').  -No disturbing conventions. But the hotel was awash with conventioneers. We could not sit on our porch without being in full view of a huge crowd having drinks & meals. Having
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We pride ourselves on a 32-year legacy of service excellence, and are saddened we fell short of fulfilling and exceeding your needs and expectations.  We hope to have the opportunity to assist you again in the future to find a better time to visit us, perhaps out of our peak season so you can experience our Ritz-Carlton mystique.  Please feel free to contact us anytime directly at the resort and it would be our pleasure to assist you.  Thank you for providing your feedback!

Summary Heading: One of the best family vacations
Summary: My family and I had a wonderful time at the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel! We were upgraded to an ocean-view room which was amazing! The staff gave us the best service, and they made our son so happy with all the toys given to him. Pacific Dream Photography with Paige captured such beautiful family pictures of us on the property overlooking the stunning landscape and on the beach!  We loved every minute of our stay at the Ritz and we hope to visit again!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We are delighted you enjoyed the complimentary room upgrade, and the service provided to you by our ladies and gentlemen.  We know that these types of family memories are so special, and our Pacific Dream Photography wants to make sure we are capturing every moment for you.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: After going for years around the corner at the St. Regis Monarch Beach, we decided to check out the Ritz Carlton (I'd been for meetings, but never stayed).  We used points, 60,000 Marriott Rewards, for the room.  Here are the highs and lows:  1.  Great location, friendly staff, spectacular views.    2.  Upgraded, without prompting, to a Coastline view, though IMO, it was more like a full on ocean view...really nice.  3.  Nice gift of Macaroons for my wife's upcoming birthday.  That's the good stuff...now on to the bad:  1.  Really pricey...our room would be over 1000/night normally...stay at the Montage instead.  $40 mandatory valet/$33 mandatory resort charge annoying, but no different than St. Regis...would be nice if hotels would include parking in resort charge....$73 for
Manager Response: We appreciate you feedback, thank you!  Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  We hope to welcome you back in perhaps a slower season so you can experience our Ritz-Carlton mystique.  If we may assist you in any way, please feel free to contact our Executive Offices at (949) 240-2000.

Summary: We spent a week at the ritz Laguna and it was amazing.  Staff was incredible. A special thanks to Andrew in the club level, who demonstrated such a high level of professionalism and kindness, reflected the ritz Carlton values and what it stands for.  Also, want to mention Dora, Jenny, Mary, Colleen, Gabby, and Carmen, thank you for guaranteeing that our vacation would be perfect!  We were lucky to stay at a club level room and if you are contemplating it...its worth it... They had the continental breakfast which included eggs and bacon ... For lunch they had salads and lite sandwiches.  For hors d'oeuvres in the evening they had cheese, olives, pasta dishes, sushi and dessert later on at 8:30, not to mention drinks, coffee, etc. Candy bar is a nice touch. The staff is wonderful
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton.  It was our pleasure creating memories for you.  We love your feedback...thank you for posting it.  If we may be of assistance, we are always here for you at (949) 240-2000.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: This hotel sucks. The setting is nice but it is completely overpriced for the service quality. The facilities are not enough to accommodate the hotel guests. We stayed at the hotel and attempted to eat at Raya 3x but each time was told the wait was very long, including for breakfast. I called 30 mins before asking if I need to make reservation, and I was told I can just walk in. Then when I showed up at the restaurant, I was told there was a wait again. I have never been to any other 5-star hotel where you can't even eat at the property. When we checked in at 7pm no one could help us with our luggage and we had to bring them to the room ourselves. We were told the butler only works until 6pm. I travel often and have stayed at many 5-star properties. This is by far the most
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback. On behalf of our executive committee and all our ladies and gentlemen, we are disappointed to hear that your experience did not meet your expectations. We sincerely apologize and we would like to make this right for you. If you would like to share more with the Executive Office, we would welcome the opportunity to speak with you. Please feel free to contact us at (949) 240-2000.

Summary: Paradise from start to finish. The hotel and staff are outstanding, and the views are truly amazing. The weather was a breath of fresh air and very refreshing. Everyone should visit at least once or more if you can an stay on the club level.  The Ritz absolutely understands service and best in class customer service.
Manager Response: Thank you for your visit. Welcome to paradise!

Summary: We stayed at this property the first week of AUG and the location and view really are spectacular.  I loved the oceanfront gym – it is large, well-equipped and the view is just incredible. The Raya bar (the indoor bar versus the 180Bleu Terrace) is wonderful and Kelly the bartender is an absolute GEM.  We ate at EnoSteak the first night and it was fine – not fantastic.  Dana Point does not have many nice restaurants, we ventured out to the Marina District but it was very touristy and we opted to drive north to Laguna Beach for our meal.  The service overall at the resort was excellent.   Now for the room – we stayed in a Firepit room on the first floor with an incredible view.  The room itself was extremely tired and out-of-date and I will say that if I had paid the going rate
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We value your patronage and loyalty as a Ritz-Carlton rewards member. We will always strive to provide you with the value you are seeking, along with luxury service and facilities. Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate it, and look forward to welcoming you back for a truly memorable experience.

Summary Heading: So sadly difficult to like this hotel
Summary: A wonderful opportunity squandered by the owners his hotel, with its spectacular position on the cliffs overlooking the beach in a gilded enclave in California.   In some respects it feels unfair to take a shot at a hotel which clearly needs an update and (on the basis of our family stay in the second week of August 2016) exists primarily to serve the business conference trade.   At least two such conferences happening simultaneously as I write this, so if you're planning to holiday here you'd better be comfortable with sharing the hotel with the blazer and grey pants brigade. They'll predominate in restaurants, bars, lifts and public spaces, and as you lie in your room you'll probably be able to hear their musical entertainment through the windows - as I can now.   Let's get
Manager Response: On behalf of all ladies and gentlemen, thank you for providing your detailed feedback about your recent vacation to the resort. We certainly appreciate you taking time to let us know about your experience and please know that we take all feedback seriously.  We truly care about your satisfaction and wish all your memories were extremely positive ones. We hope you had a chance while on property to discuss your experience with one of our leaders; however, if you did not have a chance to do so, and would like to, please contact our Hotel Manager at (949) 240-2000. We would be grateful for the opportunity to assist you.

Summary: Gorgeous ocean views - book ocean view room. Great beach and pools. Attentive service. You get what you pay for. Regular rooms not huge but gave great bathroons,refrigerator and in room coffee. Restaurants are fine . Better eating off site. Fitness center nice with ocean views. Every changing floral arrangements throughout hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel as your luxury destination. We enjoyed having you with us and lol forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: This place is really fantastic, they have the best views, friendly staff. Pool area is great as well. You can take the little shuttle down to beach to hang out and they are happy to bring you back up.  Good food and drinks, overall we really enjoyed this place.
Manager Response: We enjoyed having you and look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Great ocean view but no space for a table and 2 chairs!!
Summary: The ocean view room is just that but the balcony is sooooo small that you have to open the doors and bring the table inside so that you can open the doors fully and then replace the table, this became annoying every time we wanted to sit on the balcony. The closet was also very limited especially if you stay any length of time. All restaurants have a very limited menus. The worst part of this hotel is the terribly uncomfortable lounger beds around the pool. These are certainly not worthy of a 5 star hotel. They are very dated and are just woven plastic with no cushions for comfort. If you go to the beach they offer only chairs to sit in so no comfortable sunbathing there either. when we checked in I was wished a happy birthday but that was it!!! In other hotels when we have
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you very much for providing your feedback via TripAdvisor.  We are saddened to hear that your experience at the resort was anything less than memorable and exceptional.  We wanted nothing more than for you to enjoy every aspect of our service and facilities.  Happy Birthday!  We hope you will consider staying with us again in the future so we may provide you with an extraordinary experience.  Please contact our Executive Office for any future requests. Thank you again for providing your feedback.

Summary: The hotel is a little tired and the staff seemed the same way (except for housekeeping).  Putting aside the price (which is in the range one would expect to pay at the Ritz, Montage, St. Regis), this resort isn't up to the standard.  Here are some details: There is a beautiful patio for drinks, dinner and breakfast -- but it is like going to the buffet room on one of those packed cruise ships -- standing around waiting for a table that you need to bus yourself before sitting down.  Service at the pool was attentive but the food was similar to what you'd get at a cheap amusement park (e.g., cheese whiz on greasy chips).  The rooms lack furniture to comfortably sit and read a book.   The coffee in the room and lobby) is pedestrian at best (think watery Folgers -- where is the Sbux
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for sharing your detailed feedback about your recent Ritz-Carlton experience.  We appreciate your concerns and have shared them and taken them seriously.  We intended for your stay with us to be unique, relaxed, refined and memorable.  We are disappointed to learn otherwise.  We hope you had a chance to speak with one of our leaders while here on property about your experience, however we are still here for you.  Perhaps you could contact us directly so we can learn more and regain your confidence in our brand and resort.  The executive team can be reached at (949) 240-2000.  Thank you again for taking the time to post your review on Trip Advisor.  We look forward to hearing from you.

Summary Heading: Absolutely Beautiful Spot But Not Ritz Service
Summary: Just finished a 3 night stay at the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel with my wife. The location and facilities are first rate and what we expected. The service at Raja and the Raja Bar was very poor. We ate dinner Friday night at Raja, service was very slow and food was good but not what we expected. Breakfast the next morning, service with Miguel was good but eggs Benedict  arrived cold.  The outdoor cafe overlooking the Pacific was unbelievably slow and not well managed. ( Dirty tables, people looking for service, food was adequate but definitely not Ritz quality )   We love Ritz Hotels and select them when we can worldwide. This stellar location needs better management to bring the Ritz Standard we all pay and expect.  Hoping the hotel addresses these points so the hotel can return
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for sharing your experience through TripAdvisor.  We rely on our guests' comments and take all feedback seriously and constructively.  We apologize for the service inconsistences in our food and beverage areas and are working through these issues currently.  We certainly hope you will give us another chance and return soon so that we may provide you with a true Ritz-Carlton experience.  We are here for you and would be delighted to assist you any time (949) 240-2000.  Thank you.

Summary Heading: Biggest Plus Location, service & management poor
Summary: As most of the reviews here already described, this place biggest advantage is it's gorgeous location closeby the ocean.  Unfortunately, it has some really negative aspects and, however, an all in all poor value for money.  Here are some points: - The staff at the front desk was absolutely not friendly and seemed more than stressed out. We felt like we were rather bothering them when we arrived.  - We had an issue with our booking and talked to the front desk and, again, were treated in a derogatory manner. We furthermore talked to the manager, who also was not friendly and courteous at all. The whole conversation felt as if they saw absolutely no need to treat their customers in a way you would expect for a 5 * location of that price. - The place was overcrowded - The staff is,
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback via TripAdvisor.  On behalf of our executive committee and all our ladies and gentlemen, we are disappointed to learn you did not have the unique and memorable experience that we intended for you to have.  We sincerely apologize for not meeting and exceeding your expectations, and we would like to make this right for you.  It is important that you trust us and regain confidence in us.  If you would like to share more with the Executive Office, we would welcome the opportunity to speak with you (949) 240-2000.  Thank you again for taking the time to share your experience.

Summary: We got married here 13 years ago. We have been back periodically to celebrate. We love the grounds,service, food and the luxury of a Ritz Carlton. We went today to celebrate our anniversary and planned days ago to enjoy a day at the spa with booked services, plans for lunch and cocktails at the end of the day. When you book a spa service you are able to enjoy the outdoor pool right near the spa. We decided to walk out of one of the entrances to the pool area to enjoy the grounds and see again where we were married. We walked down a slopped path that eventually led to the beach. At the end of the walk way there is a tented area where the  Ritz Carlton staff pass out towels and chairs to enjoy the beach. We were told after signing a liability form we did not qualify for chair
Manager Response: Thank you for your extremely valuable and detailed feedback. It has been taken seriously and we hope we have the chance to speak with you so we can better understand our service inconsistencies and make this right for you. We value your loyalty and want to regain your confidence in us. We look forward to speaking with you, thank you.

Summary Heading: Very relaxing spot on the California coast.
Summary: We stayed fr just a couple nights and were very relaxed when we were leaving. We ate at Eno Steakhouse the first night.  Great food and service.  I had a 1 1/2 hour massage with Donna.  She was outstanding.  Then I had a very nice facial.  What a 3 hour relaxing treat.  This is an older hotel, but the service was tops and the room amenities were perfect. Very comfortable bed, pillows and linens.  Hope to return again.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting our resort, restaurants and spa.  We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: We stayed here on a recent family vacation. This place is spectacular! Beautiful grounds, incredible views and friendly staff. We were fortunate to have been upgraded to an Ocean View Suite. All I can say is WOW! The room and its view (see pic) were fantastic. Definitely plan to return here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your delightful feedback and photo.  We are so glad you enjoyed the suite and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: My husband and I have stayed here multiple times throughout the years. The rooms are absolutely gorgeous! The bathrooms are all marble tiled, the beds are plush and comfortable, and the hotel staff always treat you like royalty.  We love coming here and will continue to do so whenever we're in Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty!  We promise to continue surprising and delighting you each time you visit us.

Summary: Unbelievable!! Gorgeous Hotel. Very pricey but well worth the money spent. Loved the beach and the photo taking moments. The food in the hotel was 5 star and the service was stellar. If I could afford it, I would live here.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you!  We hope you departed with some wonderful and unique memories, and we look forward to creating more for you soon.

Summary: Grand and healing. Lovely people. I will always stay here. They treated me like family. This was a luxury retreat. I felt special and cared for. No other place like it. Anywhere. Everyone is customer service oriented. They understand luxury service.
Manager Response: Thank you for your delightful feedback.  Our ladies and gentlemen take great pride in creating unique and memorable experiences for our guests.  We are glad you enjoyed our warm, relaxed yet refined ambiance.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Simply luxurious! Staying on the 4th floor club level really takes the cake for making the hotel experience top notch: included breakfast, lunch, and dinner appetizers, as well as a bar, not to mention lovely concierge service with personalized attention. The hotel grounds are pristine and gorgeous. Tip: actually go to (yes, on!!) the beach and into (yes, into!!) the ocean.  They were both delightful.
Manager Response: We are delighted you had the opportunity to experience our exclusive Club Level.  It is truly one of a kind.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: The Ritz, As it should be!
Summary: Obviously an outstanding property with a remarkable location. We had a room on the upper floor, ocean view.  It was very quiet, and smacked of California chic luxury. We never left the grounds. No need.  Friendly staff, good security, nothing went wrong.  This is how it's done and yes, the best resort probably of all of the Ritz's. Well done gents!
Manager Response: Thank you for your glowing review!  We enjoyed having you and look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: We stayed here the first week of July.  The property is gorgeous.  We had an amazing stay as we enjoyed the wonderful service and amenities provided by RC.  The location is the best around and so many walking paths to be taken.  Our room was perfect and opened up to the pool area.  We loved it.  the outdoor bar should no be missed.  alt Crek beach is not to be missed.  Highly recommend
Manager Response: It was wonderful having you as our guests and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Although the Ritz has gorgeous views, well appointed rooms and top of the line service by most employees, a few things were troublesome on a recent visit.  The main bar closed at 10 pm which was way too early if you are returning from a night out and want to continue to socialize and drink.  I ordered room service for my last lunch, pricey as expected ($21 pizza for one), but I was told in my conversation there was a 20% service fee and a $5 delivery fee too.  When I asked what a service fee is, I was told  it was for service.  When pressed, the employee grudgingly said it was a gratuity.  It matters because if they are already adding the tip and a delivery fee, I'm not going to add another tip when the food is delivered. A small matter you might think, but clarity and not
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing your feedback.  We greatly appreciate your comments and have shared them with our food and beverage leadership team.  We are delighted you enjoyed your overall experience and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  If we can answer any questions for you or assist you in any way, please feel free to contact us any time.  Thank you!

Summary: We stayed over Memorial Day weekend in a club-coastal view room and it was amazing!!   We travels with our 7 and 3 year old boys.  The room was a little small and aging, but It felt very clean and was still very comfortable.  The balcony was very helpful to keep the kids busy watching the beach.  The club level was out of this world--everyone was super friendly, they made sure our kids always had great kid good and the adult beverages were nice.  The beach setup was easy.  Since the Ritz doesn't own the beach, they have made it as easy as possible to setup spots for resort guests.  Pool area and food are also enjoyable.  We really had a nice time here and are headed back over Labor Day.
Manager Response: Thank you for keeping us top of mind when choosing your holiday getaways.  We strive to always provide the finest level of personal yet relaxed service, and we look forward to creating new memories for you soon.  If you have any questions about your next visit, please do not hesitate to give us a call.  We are delighted to assist you.

Summary: I have stayed in other ritz carlton but the personalize service this hotel gave me was outstanding starting from the check in point to check out. one of the best breakfast in the Raya restaurant with the most beautiful view of the ocean. I really enjoyed my two days and my kids loved it. I highly recommend this hotel and I will be staying here again for sure. syed hasan
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to providing you another exceptional experience soon.

Summary: This is our second trip to this property, the first being our honeymoon back in 2002.  We felt like we were so young then that we didn't really appreciate the beauty of the hotel and wanted to see it again through more experienced eyes.  We were so right to do so!  The hotel has been renovated since back then and it is phenomenal.  We booked a regular room and were given a room with a coastline view.  You could sit out on the balcony and see the ocean.  If those rooms are available, by all means, ask for one.  We spent most of our days at the hotel taking in everything it had to offer.  Our first day checking in we had appetizers and drinks at 180Blu.  Next morning we did breakfast in the restaurant with the arched windows and amazing view of the beach below.  Service was
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel and Happy Anniversary!  We look forward to creating more meaningful memories for you each and every year!

Summary: I stayed here for my birthday for a couple of days and it was just perfect, which I dont say often.  The views are spectacular and the beach is a private one.  You have lots of restaurants to choose from as well that are right on the property.    Our room was always clean and had a balcony with a great view of the beach and water.  I would recommend this to anyone, its a special home away from home!
Manager Response: Welcome home!

Summary Heading: What happened to that Ritz service?
Summary: We scheduled our vacation and selected the Ritz-Carlton based on previous experiences at other properties (Ritz, Four Seasons).  My rating of two stars for the experience and five stars to the people who took care of our issues.   We arrived early and we're told our room was not ready but a guaranteed 4pm checkin and would call my mobile when the room was ready. We decided to grab lunch at the 180Bleu which had amazing views but that is where it ended. We had to track down a server or anyone to clear the table, then ask someone to wipe down the table, ask someone to take our order and then remind the server what she forgot. Needless to say it was her first day and she wasn't getting any air cover from anyone else. There was none of that exceptional Ritz-Carlton service.   At
Manager Response: Please allow us to personally and sincerely apologize for any disappointment we may have caused you and your guests during your recent stay with us.  We greatly appreciate your time in posting your experience via TripAdvisor.  We have shared your detailed feedback with our executive team and we have taken it seriously and constructively.  We strive at all times to operate our resort in a first class manner with precise and excellent service and follow-through.  Although we cannot change your experience, we hope to have the opportunity to regain your faith in our resort.  We realize you have many choices in luxury hotels and wish to reassure you that you have chosen the best with The Ritz-Carlton.  Please feel free to place any future reservations through our Rooms Executive.  He can be reached at (949) 240-2000. We look forward to welcoming you back and providing you with an exceptional experience.

Summary: There is plenty to do here at this property. The tennis courts, swimming pools, spa, and beach are just to name a few activities. Let's start at the beginning though check-in took a surprisingly long time (30 minutes), that may not seem long, but we had completed the on-line check-in the day before. Check-in time is 4:00 pm, check-out time is 12:00, so one disadvantage is you are there 20 hours or less.  We ate at the poolside restaurant which had excellent food and service, you are at the Ritz so yes expect to pay $11 for a very tasty fish taco.  There were a lot of kids at the pool, this hotel not only accommodates families but is dog-friendly. We saw a lot of dogs in the hallways and elsewhere on the property. I only heard one dog barking as we walked by in the hallway.  The
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton for your summertime visit.  We enjoyed having you and look forward to creating new memories for you soon!

Summary: Located within the Ritz Carleton - across from the gift shop is their best kept secret:  Pacific Dream Photography.  In a 1 hour photo shoot, Brent gave us spectacular photos and an amazing video.  The results were beyond our expectations.   Brent guided us through a multitude of locations - we did one wardrobe change.  It was fun, creative and well worth the money.  Don't think of this as an expense ...  this is an investment in memories locked in quality photography for life.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback regarding Pacific Dream Photography. We can't agree with you more that Brent and his team do a phenomenal job at capturing the most interesting and intimate moments for our guests. We are so glad you had a chance to have a session with them. The photos and videos they produce are exceptional!

Summary: We came to the Ritz Carlton YappyHour Party last Thursday. What a fun event with food & beverage proceeds going to animal charities. Free biscuits & flavored water for the dogs! Beautiful views from the cliffs and a very tasty margarita!
Manager Response: We are delighted you had the chance to experience our amazing Yappy Hour! We really enjoy hosting this monthly event. We hope you can join us again soon! More information regarding Yappy Hour and our efforts to give back can be learned by calling our resort direct.

Summary Heading: What an embarrassment to the Ritz Carlton Name.....AVOID!!!
Summary: When my husband and I travel w/o the kids, we always stay in 4+star hotels for the SERVICE and LUXURY. This Ritz should lose their franchise, they disgrace the name of the Ritz Carlton 5 star Luxury Hotel chain.    First of all, they are not interested in even trying to accommodate their customer.  We booked thru our platinum american express fine hotels package for the room upgrade that we almost always get when available at other locations...nope not at this location even when they had plenty of rooms available.  I get that it is high season, however, checking in on a sunday night and leaving on thursday when there is plenty of rooms available to upgrade to but they won't do it unless you pay for the upgrade is "penny wise but pound foolish".  In fact, the manager was even
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for your feedback.  It has been shared with our executive committee and taken seriously.  We are very sorry to have let you down, and we would greatly appreciate the opportunity to speak with you to learn more about your experience. We look forward to speaking with you, thank you.

Summary Heading: May Be One of the Best in the World
Summary: Stayed here for part of July 4th weekend. We stayed on points, so can't comment on price except to say it is spendy-spendy for sure. Because it was a holiday weekend and full, we didn't get a room upgrade. It did not matter one bit. We had a lovely, quiet room overlooking the gardens and with a balcony with partial ocean view.  Very luxurious and modern amenities. Service here is beyond excellent, from valets all the way up through managers, this is deluxe hoteling done right. It's spotlessly clean. There are only 2 minor criticisms, which maybe on a non-holiday weekend would not have arisen: 1) Line to check in was long, and while offering champagne is a nice gesture [3 concierges walking around with trays], it doesn't cloud the fact that having only 2 people at the front desk
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you.  We love your feedback and welcome it!  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: First class! Great ambiance, top notch service.
Summary: Awesome hotel in every way! Perfect ambiance, top notch service. Everyone that works there goes out of their way to make sure that your stay is perfect. Have stayed in and been to a lot of great hotels, this Ritz is top one or two for me.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you and look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: We came here for a 3 night stay with our two teenage grandsons and were very very sorely disappointed . Our expectations were very high having stayed at Ritz Carlton properties before. Firstly when we checked in at 4 pm(normal check in time) one of our rooms wasn't ready as we were told previous guests were given a late check out! At 5.15 when I still hadn't heard anything I had to go back and ask for the front desk Manager who gave me my key and said he would offer $200 which was appreciated but no financial gesture makes up for bad service . When we got to the room one of the duvet covers had a stain on it and one of the bathrobes had a stain on the collar. Service in the lunch restaurant and bar were not good. First morning we were told we would Need to wait up to an hour and
Manager Response: On behalf of all ladies and gentlemen, thank you for providing your detailed feedback via TripAdvisor.  We read and take all feedback seriously, and we are most appreciative of you taking the time to do so.  Of course we are very saddened to learn you did not have the most memorable and unique experience possible while being our guests.  It is our staff's highest mission to provide warm and refined service.  We truly care about your satisfaction and wish all your memories were extremely positive ones.  We hope you had a chance while on property to discuss your experience with one of our leaders so that they could better assist you and anticipate your needs.  However, if you did not have a chance to do so, and would like to, please contact our Hotel Manager at (949) 240-2000.  We would be grateful for the opportunity to assist you.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel and we hope to welcome you back one day soon to enjoy a true Ritz-Carlton experience.

Summary: If you want a hotel where the quality of service is only outdone by the location and views, you need to select and stay at The Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel.   The rooms are spacious, warm and beautifully appointed. The attention to detail and responsiveness by the entire staff was impressive. From the moment you walk in the front door to the moment you check out, detail, detail detail in service is what you receive from all staff members.   You can tell whomever is running this hotel has a very specific philosophy in place as it relates to details in service because it's pretty incredible.   Make sure you have lunch poolside and you check out the on premise restaurants. Also, take the beautiful stroll along the beach just below the hotel. Again the location will blow you away.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure creating a memorable experience for you.  Our ladies and gentlemen take great pride in the "details" and enjoy learning about each of our guests' preferences.  We hope to welcome you back soon for another unique and relaxing visit!

Summary Heading: Great place for smokers - even in the patio restaurants smoke as much as you want!!!!
Summary: The website and all ads claim a non smoking resort - that is a lie!! You can smoke everywhere - balconies, patios, pools, the patio and outdoor restaurants - smoke al, you want - cigars , cigs, vapors, and who cares about the health of others who don't smoke, especially children and pets!  Second hand smoke is blown into your face whether you like it or not - as long as the smokers keep paying and tipping, why restrict them?  It's so disgusting to be outside on a beautiful day enjoying the ocean views and having a bite and a cocktail and some creep blows a big puff of cancer vapor into yor face!  Shameful
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We certainly understand your frustration.  At The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel, we strive to provide a relaxing environment for all of our guests, and are disappointed that you did not feel that way while visiting us.  We appreciate you letting us know of your experience and trust your next Ritz-Carlton experience will be a true Ritz-Carlton experience.

Summary Heading: Beautiful View - not just for rich
Summary: The beautiful patio bar area is perfect for drinks and appetizers.  Looking for a special place to spend the day and feel like a queen, this is the place to go.  You can relax and take in the view and experience the life of luxury.  It's not to expensive if you just have an appetizer and a drink. Give it a try!
Manager Response: Thank you for joining us at 180blu.  We enjoyed treating you as a queen!

Summary: Visited just 3 days on our way back to the US from a week in Cabo. Award winning customer service and attention to every single detail always make the Ritz stand shoulders above the rest. Never disappointing. We were surprised at the number of young children this visit and the noise that accompanies them. However, overall the Ritz is always an excellent experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for stopping by!  We are delighted you enjoyed The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  Summer time is always a popular time at our resort.  We look forward to welcoming you back again soon one day.

Summary Heading: This place is worth a visit.
Summary: This hotel is basically on a cliff overlooking the ocean. Great spa/gym.  Nice pool. Good walk down to The ocean ( 5 minutes ). The service is great . The area is a bit of a bedroom community , but for a day of sun and pool on the property is good. The hotel itself is a nicer upper tier Ritz Carlton. If your goal is "LA" it's a good hour alway.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Another Ritz Carlton great experience!   This is a beautiful property with great service and friendly, efficient staff.   We were fortunate to have an ocean view room. Fun watching all the surfers. We had dinner plans elsewhere with friends, but breakfast in the restaurant was yummy. Wish we could have stayed longer to be able to enjoy more of this wonderful hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We are delighted you enjoyed your experience with us and we look forward to creating more memories for you soon!

Summary: This could be our favorite hotel anywhere.  It was an amazing couples weekend that we will never forget.  The views are stunning and you feel relaxed from the minute you walk in this resort.  The grounds are perfection with so many wonderful spots to enjoy the pacific ocean view.  From the beach, firepits, pool, restaurant, bar, and lovely rooms....we were extremely satisfied. My only complaint was I didn't have a few more nights to enjoy this amazing property.
