Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed our warm, relaxed, yet refined ambience.  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon. Thank you for staying with us!

Summary: We love to go to Ritz Carlton for lunch. It is a beautiful hotel with oceanview. The restaurant is very good food with the beautiful view of ocean. The location is very near Orange County and not far from San Diego. It is nice place for relax or doing business
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Well the water looked amazing but there was such an under tow that we were not able to go past our knees due to this.  The life guards were amazing in keeping us safe and informed of the events.  By the time we were about to leave the waves were up to our blanket and towels.....beach front property....lol. Watch out for the rocks and please listen to what the lifeguards have to say to keep you safe.  It was not what I thought a day at the beach would be like here.  A little disappointed in the beach day.
Manager Response: Salt Creek Beach is an amazing, world re-known beach, and we couldn't agree with you more that you have to be safe and informed when in the water.  If we can help you in any way, please let us know.

Summary: We spent July 4 weekend at the Ritz Carlton in Laguna Niguel after a several year hiatus without enjoying this resort.  Overall, our impression was fantastic.  The hotel has recently been renovated and upgraded to a much more modern light decor that brings this remarkable property into the 21st Century, The rooms are sleek, clean and chic, which was rare in the past for Ritz Carlton and the common areas are equally contemporary and yet still inviting.  The location on a bluff above an incredible beach and view of the So Cal coast is beyond equal.  We are world travelers and forget how absolutely beautiful our California coastline is.  The Ritz Carlton is one of the best properties to take advantage of it.  The resort does have some shortcomings, the most obvious being that it
Manager Response: Thank you for returning!  We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you.  We agree that we wish we had more ocean front facing room to build upon, but we certainly hope you enjoyed our warm, relaxed yet refined personal service.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: My wife and I just had another wonderful stay. The views are amazing. Terrific food and the ladies at Club Level always exceed expectations. Thank you Colleen and Miss Penny we wish we would have got a chance to see you as well This is a must stay venue if you are in the OC.
Manager Response: It was wonderful having you back with us again.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel!

Summary: I have never written a review but feel that after our family experience at the Ritz-Carlton, Laguna, I must spread the word. Typically one would review the rooms or property, but I want to highlight its onsite photography service. Because Laguna is known for its scenery and sunset, and with the optimal backdrop being the Ritz, I booked a last minute photo session for my family with Pacific Dream Photography, located in the hotel lobby. James Hoot, a talented and charismatic photographer, took our family photos on the beach at sunset. He interacted with my children, made us laugh, and within 30 minutes, James captured over a 100 breathtaking images and family memories we will forever treasure. James, thank your professionalism and beautiful photos! Our vacation will not be
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel as your luxury destination to spend your special family time together.  We agree with you that our property is known for our incredible scenery and exceptional service, but we are thrilled to learn of your outstanding experience with our photography studio, Pacific Dream Photography.  We know how precious family time is and to have James capture that forever for you is priceless.  We look forward to welcoming you back one day soon!

Summary: I don't know where to begin it was such a phenomenal experience I'm left speechless.   The most stunning views I have ever experienced in California,  a daily delicious smoothie,  simply Devine food and the most sophisticated staff I have ever experienced.   Bravo!  By far the most comfortable bed I have ever had the pleasure of sleeping on in my travels, simply yet incredibly appreciated touches that no other hotel has ever provided to me.  A chef even made me a special order of broth based soup just for me to assist with a very upset stomach.  I was treated like family and would return in a heartbeat.
Manager Response: You are family!  It was a pleasure having you stay with us and we hope to welcome you back very soon.

Summary: We stayed at the Ritz for the second time and loved it so much!  The views to the Pacific are breathtaking, and the service is exactly what you would expect from the Ritz.  It is a great place for all ages except be warned some rooms are very far away from the main center, and it is a huge hill to walk up from the beach.  The Ritz offers umbrellas, chairs, and water bottles down near the beach, and there is a shuttle up and down from the resort to the beach.  The beach is public, so it can be crowded. It is not just for Ritz guests, and the restroom facilities are public as well.  Just note that your rate will include a 30.00 resort fee, and parking is 35.00.  There is a great trail down by the beach where you can walk for miles. The fitness center is small, but it has great
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel!

Summary: Great restaurants and excellent facilities.  We were here at Christmas so my mother in law didn't need to cook etc and hosted some friends.  We found it when looking for places to get married and if we hadn't eloped we would have done it here.   The staff are great pools are perfect and the location by the beach awesome. It's a bit if a walk down then back but golf cart service is available no problem and beach equipment (towels etc) all available at beach level so very accessible.   Was awesome to have a great brunch outdoor on the cliff then walk in shorts barefoot on the beach Christmas Day!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel!

Summary: Every summer Laguna Beach hosts an amazing event called the Pageant of the Masters. I won't use this review to describe it other than to say it is indescribable (and I never thought I would say that when I first heard the event explained). You definitely want to see this   The Ritz-Carlton in Laguna Niguel is a great place to stay while in the area. The service, as you would expect, is impeccable.  The restaurants are wonderful.  And there is a little known secret about this property that is the icing on the cake -- their concierge level.  The only item that this level doesn't serve is cake.  Other than that the food and liquor is all first class. This concierge level is one of the best that I have ever experienced -- service, food selection, atmosphere.  It is well worth the
Manager Response: We are delighted you were able to experience The Pageant of the Masters in Laguna Beach.  We couldn't agree with you more that it is indescribable and one of the most unique and jaw-dropping displays of live art.  We are so fortunate to have the  show in our local community each year.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel, and we look forward to welcoming you back to our exceptional Club Level soon!

Summary: The location, property and views of this hotel are magnificent. Staff and service did not appear to be on par with other Ritz locations I frequently visit such as NYC and Charlotte.   From the moment I walked into lobby, problems with my room assignments (I booked two rooms) became apparent after being told a suit was not initially available.    Service in both the "grab and go" as well as the restaurant less then desirable. I waited 45 minutes in an empty restaurant for breakfast and was then challenged by the manager who pointed to the receipt which indicated a time of 9:36 am and yet it was 11:00am when we received our check. Certainly not the Ritz experience I was expecting.   The front desk folks also were not friendly.  In fact, I was told that others were spending
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel as your choice in luxury accommodations and service.  We pride ourselves on a tradition of excellence, and our highest mission to provide a warm, relaxed, yet refined ambience.  Your comfort is of the utmost concern. We hope you had a chance to speak to one of our leaders while on property to work through the items mentioned and have them resolved to your satisfaction.  If time did not allow, we would be delighted to speak with you at your convenience so we can make sure we have a chance to make this right for you and regain your confidence in us.  We hope to speak with you soon and welcome you back to the resort.  Thank you.

Summary Heading: Ritz Laguna - Can't beat the location, views or service; the hotel is a tad dated
Summary: I spent one night at the Ritz in Laguna Niguel with my wife in June to celebrate a birthday.  The public areas, like the lobby and bars, are updated and very attractive.  The front desk gave us an upgrade (upon request) from a resort view room to an ocean view room, which was very appreciated.  The rooms (and other less public areas, like hallways and stairwells) are nice, but somewhat dated and look like they will need a major overhaul in the next several years.  The pool area is also a little dated. The location is incredible - the hotel is high on a bluff and has beautiful views in both directions.  Guests can access the beach with a short walk (unlike some other hotels in the area, like the St. Regis) - I ran on the beach twice and it was awesome.  The gym has spectacular
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed your experience!  We value our rewards members and enjoy creating memories for you and all of our guests.  We hope you have a chance to return over the upcoming months to enjoy the enhancements we are continuously working on at the resort.  We appreciate your feedback!

Summary Heading: Birthday visit to see Pageant of the Masters
Summary: LOVED this hotel and the staff, beach, pools, rooms. Time of our lives there. Loved the outdoor bar/restaurant overlooking the Pacific Ocean. Our room overlooked the beautiful pool area. Each and every member of the staff accommodated our every need. The lady in concierge gave us beach bags and scheduled dinner for us as we arrived late from Las Vegas drive after traffic. It was a flawless stay. Excellent food and drinks. Literally felt 10 years younger from the ability to completely relax and unwind while being pampered.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure creating a unique, relaxing, and memorable experience for you.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: From the moment we pulled up and entered the resort, we felt instantly relaxed. The resort is very welcoming, a comfortable luxury that suits its Southern California location. My room was spacious and although it did not face the ocean, it seemed to be nestled in the trees that overlook the garden and felt like a bit of a tree house. The bed was very comfortable, and the bathroom nicely appointed, if a bit old. The stunning view of the Pacific Ocean is truly unparalleled, and I could sit in the Adirondack chairs and contemplate that view for the rest of my life. The outdoor bar is not to be missed, particularly on a chilly night when the lamps are lit and blankets are in abundance. Fantastic experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We are delighted you enjoyed just about every location of the resort; especially our outdoor adirondak chairs and of course our ocean front lounge 180blu.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: We traveled with large corporate group of over 100 people.  The hotel did a wonderful job with all areas from check in to check out.  The rooms, the meals and the atmosphere was the best.  We loved sitting in the outside bar for drinks and lunch.  Great beach area to take walks
Manager Response: We are glad your business travels brought you to the fine Southern California coast and The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We hope to welcome you back soon perhaps this time for a much needed visit of r&r.  Thank you!

Summary: We visited The Ritz Carlton after staying at the St Regis the year before.  The views were outstanding!  The staff could not be more accommodating.   The rooms were nice.  Not oversized. However, the bathroom left much to be desired.  There was no fan and the room completely fogged up everyone someone showered.  It also was not very bright.  There was a small walk in closet that hold a few drawers, but not enough for all your things.   There is a shuttle service that will take you down to the beach and very helpful staff that will set up your beach chairs and give you towels and water.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing your feedback.  We greatly appreciate it! We would welcome the opportunity to add your preferences to your profile so that we have what you need in your guest room the next time you join us i.e. extra lighting etc.  If you would be so kind to call us at (949) 240-2000, we can confirm your name and preferences.  Thank you.

Summary Heading: The service, the service and the views
Summary: Stayed for three days at a conference and the service was superior.  I was used to staying on the forth floor (club level) but was on the ground floor with a room that opened to the grass area.  This room had an individual patio with two chairs and fire pit.  I was the last room on the hallway so I actually had a door to exit the building right next to me.  The hydrangeas were in bloom and were so beautiful. Look for lots of little bunny rabbits running around at the edge of the rooms by the cliff.  Do take advantage of the wooden chair set out on the grass area and watch the sunset overlooking the water.  The view is actually the best up on this level than waking down on the path or the actually beach sand.    One small pool I never saw one person use and the larger pool was
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed your experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  It was a pleasure having you join us for your conference, and it sounds as if you were able to sneak in a little R&R too!  We look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Excellent place to celebrate Anniversary or birthdays
Summary: We celebrated our childrens anniversaries,chef coocked special dishes for us,cake was prepared and decorated very well.Service was authentic and decor was beautifu.Family enjoyed very much and they all were very polite and courteous.
Manager Response: It was an honor celebrating with you!  We look forward to creating many more unique memories for you soon.

Summary: This is a wonderful experience but as the economy has recovered the demand for this plan has increased. The Ritz has expanded the number of people allowed but not space or staff. Truthfully it doesn't feel like a 1,700 per night experience. If you choose to enjoy this package I suggest you spend up to ocean front rooms and enjoy food at end or the very beginning of each service. If any things offend you speak up. The concierge staff is wonderful.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us and providing your feedback.  We hope your overall experience was a wonderful one.  We intended for your visit to be extraordinary and we sincerely apologize if we let you down in any way.  If you would like to share more, please feel free to contact our Executive Office at (949) 240-2000.  We would welcome the opportunity to speak with you any time.  On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to welcoming you back for an exceptional experience.

Summary: Overall, I would say that we had a nice visit.  The property is very beautiful but I would say the proximity to the beach is both good and bad.  It was nice to walk down to the beach and see the tide pools.  We even spotted whales from the path on the way down.  Unfortunately, it seems that there is a problem with locals and teens coming up the path and using the facilities that are for hotel guest.  Because of this, some of the staff can be very aggressive towards guests.  We had a terrible encounter near the pool with an employee who questioned us for using the facilities.  On another occasion, someone from the security staff was in the club lounge and was questioning guest to see if they were in the surf competition and if they had a surfboard.  It was very odd.  The club
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We hope you enjoyed your overall luxury experience with us and were able to take away some very fond and unique memories of your time spent here.  Our highest mission is our guests' care and comfort.  We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  If we can answer any questions for you or assist you in any way, please feel free to contact our Executive Office any time.

Summary: Beautiful property overlooking the beach on cliffs. Magnificent views! Great service and friendly staff.Ocean view room is a must. It's worth the splurge.Just note that if you are placed in a room on the left side of the property near the open grass that overlooks the water be prepared to have company parties, and networking events going on from mid afternoon until about 8pm.It wasn't a big deal to us but others might be annoyed by it. Plenty of Restaurants on site and at the pool. Nice place.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We hope you enjoyed a very unique, personal and memorable experience with us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: It's a Ritz on a cliff overlooking the Pacific
Summary: The property and views from the hotel are spectacular. Dare I say the most stunning view from the dining room and main bar than any other hotel. The pool is secluded and kills all the wind, perfect for relaxation. The beach is a short walk down the cliff. The only downside to this hotel is the shared rooms' central door; it allows FAR too much noise into the rooms from the adjoining room. Most, if not all, of these shared rooms should be converted to close off the central door. The rooms without the door make for a great stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback.  We greatly appreciate it!  We are delighted you enjoyed your overall experience and look forward to creating more memories for you in the future.  Thank you for staying with us!

Summary: This is one of my favorite Ritz Carlton locations but the last stay left us feeling like something was missing. One morning we decided to walk to the beach and the tram didn't seem to be running so we walked down the hill - the path to the beach was full of broken glass bottles that had not been cleaned up from the night before. The bill was not correct at check out. No room upgrade offered (platinum premier) even though there were plenty of available options. We were told the room would be ready so we waited, and waited, and waited...Lots of little things that went wrong and the expectation is that the Ritz should be flawless, especially this very pricey location.   That said, the club lounge - both the staff and the food - continues to amaze. For proximity to the ocean the
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for taking the time to share your most recent Ritz-Carlton experience.  It sounds as if we failed to meet your expectations and that saddens us.  We assure you this was not our intent.  We hope you had a chance to speak with one of our leaders while you were on property, but if not we would welcome the opportunity to speak with you directly.  We take our guests' feedback seriously and we strive to provide the best service and facilities every day.  We can be reached at (949) 240-2000.  Thank you.  We hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: When you check in, stop at 180 Blu for a cocktail and light sushi and enjoy the view.  We celebrated my birthday weekend at The Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel and were treated to a weekend of great weather!  The "Beach Butlers" will set up your chairs and umbrella on the beach while you watch the surfers and boogie boarders play in the ocean.  Get down to the beach around 9 a.m. to get the best location.  Dinner at Raya was delicious - loved the Lobster Tacos and the Raya Salad was a perfect dinner choice.
Manager Response: Happy Birthday!  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for your celebration.  We hope you took home some very fond memories!

Summary Heading: Check it off the Bucket List
Summary: Staying at this hotel has been on my bucket list for several years.  We have visited the property several times, but had never stayed overnight.  I finally was able to stay June 16-19 with my two daughters.  Staying here was everything I wanted it to be, and more!  We were upgraded to Club Level, and I have to say, this is the best club lounge of any Ritzes we have stayed in!   The beach shuttle and beach equipment set up is such a great amenity.  We utilized it every day of our stay.   The staff is top notch, and go above and beyond to please their guests.  The only 2 cons that I found during our stay were 1) the walls in the rooms are paper thin.  I don't mean you can hear loud noises coming from the next door rooms, I mean you can hear entire conversations at normal volume.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we are delighted you enjoyed your first Ritz-Carlton experience.  It was a pleasure having you with us.  Thank you for your feedback regarding the walls and shower of your guest room.  Your comments are very much appreciated.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Thank you!

Summary Heading: Travelling on Business - Upgrade is always out of your pocket(unless complimentary)
Summary: Ritz carlton and Marriott properties will bill with separate line items for upgrades. If your company policy is not to pay for upgrades than it will be out of your pocket at all Marriott properties. We went through this and as a person who travels on business, Marriott does not work for me. Only exception is if they offer complimentary, these days this happens much less.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We appreciate it and we are here to answer any questions you may have about our resort's upgrade procedures.  Please feel free to contact us at any time (949) 240-2000.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Unbelievable resort right on the cliff overlooking beach and salt creek.  Beautiful rooms, excellent customer service and fabulous restaurants.  Have stayed in 2013 and will again in the future.  A pleasure just to walk the grounds. The workout room is breathtaking and the hotel offers a shuttle to the beach down the cliff.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  We enjoyed having you!

Summary: Great rooms great gym great views great service! The hotel says Laguna niguel but it's actually Dana Point /Monarch Beach. There's a free Trolley Service that started June 25 and runs to downtown Laguna every 15 minutes. Otherwise with no traffic it's about a 12 minute drive from the hotel to Laguna Beach downtown area. Th trolley pickup is right outside the Main Street-ask valet for specific directions.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It was a pleasure having you.  Thank you for posting the trolley service information.  It is a great option during the summer!

Summary: Overall experience was excellent.  The staff was polite and very quick to attend to your needs or anticipated needs.  The gym is amazing--good equipment, free weights and machines.  Lockers in the gym to store your things, water and towels (and headphones.)  Raya has amazing dishes--you can't go wrong having dinner here!  The room was comfortable, impeccably clean with a comfortable bed & furniture. The room was spacious & also very quiet.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  It was our pleasure creating a memorable experience for you, and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Excellent Hotel - Very well located and GREAT food
Summary: This hotel is incredible... from their lounges to their location, pool, gym and food - everything was excellent.  I do not think I've had better seafood at a Southern California resort... their gym has one of the best views you can imagine .... Definitely the best place to stay if you're in the Dana Point / Laguna Niguel area.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel!  It was a pleasure creating a special experience for you and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Fabulous! Pacific Dream Photography with James Hoot
Summary: We had a wonderful experience at The Ritz Carlton, Laguna Niguel. Everything was perfect! Our photo session with, James Hoot, of Pacific Dream Photography was nothing short of amazing. James did a fantastic job capturing our special moments as a family. His wonderful personality coupled with his photography skills made our session a time to remember. Thank you!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Pacific Dream photography experience.  We will be sure to share your feedback with James.  We are delighted he is part of our family here at the resort.  Those special moments are so important!  We look forward to sharing more memories with you in the near future.

Summary: I made the reservation for a ocean view room. They gave me a garden view and told me it was an ocean view one. Buffery! Here are the pics. Tell me if this is an ocean view room!!! And the hotel was booked so it was impossible to change and they never offered not even a discount!
Manager Response: On behalf of our executive team and all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for sharing your feedback.  We appreciate it and have taken it seriously.  We are saddened to learn you were not fully satisfied with your Ritz-Carlton experience.  This is definitely not how we intended your stay to be.  We would enjoy speaking to you further about our room types so that we may avoid any unpleasant visits in the future.  Please contact the Executive Office directly.  We welcome the opportunity to speak with you and note all of your preferences for future visits.  We look forward to your return and providing you with a true Ritz-Carlton experience.

Summary Heading: Amazing views. Love it. My favorite hotel. Well, one of my favorites.
Summary: There is a breakfast table that looks over the Pacific where I sit every time at this hotel. I get there early to make sure no one else takes it. And I set for at least a couple hours each time and watch the sun come up and light up ocean. Love it. Just love it. Coffee is good and I sit. And sit. For a long time. It's one of my top favorite coffee drinking spots in North America.  The hotel is beautiful. My only beef is that the rooms are a bit spartan and need some attention and love. There have been no updates in the eight or ten years I've come here and they're due. The suites may be magnificent but this humble cat can't come close to affording a suite there. Love this hotel. Nice folks.
Manager Response: We love having you!  Thank you for your feedback regarding our guest rooms.  We have exciting plans forthcoming and we look forward to sharing them with you soon.  Thank you for your loyalty.

Summary Heading: It's All about your priority list here!
Summary: This hotel had amazing public spaces, killer views and outstanding service. If these things are high on your list, book it!   Loved: Amazing vistas from the grounds and restaurants  Beautiful lobby Staff that pays attention to details of service  Beautiful gym Relaxing pool $11 uber ride to Laguna beach area  The rooms here were not bad by any means. I had a more standard room, facing the pool so I'm assuming that was the reason it was a bit underwhelming, but it was extremely cleaning had everything you need. 2 full size beds, not queen size. We had a room on the pool level. It's convenient, however not so fun when private events are going on at night, by your room.  If you can swing it, get an ocean view, and I'm SURE, based in the views the room will be superb    So it's all
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We are delighted you enjoyed your experience at our ocean front resort.  We look forward to assisting you again in the future, and please feel free to contact the resort directly if you have any questions about our rooms sizes and view categories prior to your visit.  We want to make sure we have the perfect accommodations for you when you arrive.  Thank you!

Summary: We were promptly greeted by valet as we pulled up.  Very friendly and knowledgable.  He knew what floor we were on before checking in.  We were offered champagne and assistance with our luggage.  Check in was prompt and the front desk agent patiently explained where are room were located.  The property is gorgeous and views are outstanding.  As we were walking down the pathway to the beach, Tyler stopped in the cart to ask if we would like a ride.  He said the hotel offered Beach butler service which was not explained or mentioned at checkin.  Initially, the rooms looked impeccable.  After awhile, you started noticing the problems.  The hallway near the 30-50s had a urine smell, the beds were very uncomfortable and top sheets were used for the mattresses.  Why would a $500 night
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your extremely helpful feedback.  We greatly appreciate it!  We wish we would have known during your stay so we could have ensured your stay was exceptional.  Our team enjoyed welcoming you and we look forward to the opportunity to do that again very soon.  Please don't hesitate to contact our Executive Offices any time.  It would be our pleasure to answer any questions you may have and assist you in any way.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary: My wife and I stayed here for two nights for our anniversary. We've stayed at a lot of nice hotels, including Ritz Carltons elsewhere. In fact the Ritz @ Half Moon Bay is probably the nicest hotel I've ever stayed at.  I'll start with the positive. The property is gorgeous. The views are unparallelled. The staff is friendly and helpful. Check in was fast as was the valet service. They have charging for my Tesla and the valet knew exactly how to do it, so huge praise for that. The restaurant was great, incredible views, friendly service, and prices were actually fair for a 5 star hotel.  Now the bad. I deducted 2 stars for the room. We had an upgraded ocean view room. The view was amazing. The room was not. It was about 5 years past it's expiration date in terms of renovation. It
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you, and we greatly appreciate your detailed feedback.  Thank you for sharing it.  We couldn't agree with you more that our service and facilities and surroundings are exceptional, and we are excited for our continued enhancements taking place in the near future.  If we can answer any questions for you, please always feel free to contact our Executive Offices.  We would be delighted to speak with you any time.  We look forward to welcoming  you back soon.

Summary: Stayed here for a weekend. It's my first time at Ritz Carlton and it was perfect. The room we had was with a fire pit overlooking the ocean. Easy access to the beach right from the balcony. Room was a little small but sweet. It had bathtub and separate toilet, two taps. Outside pool and Jacuzzi are perfect and was empty at around 8.30 pm. Nice outside lounge and bar overlooking the ocean and Raya restaurant. Great room service, even separate menu for dogs.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel!  Our ladies and gentlemen enjoyed creating a unique and memorable experience for you.  Thank you for providing your feedback.  We look forward to being of service to you in the future.

Summary: Attended a conference at the Ritz.  Took advantage of the trip and brought my wife to enjoy this beautiful resort.  Rooms are good size and the bathrooms are beautiful.  Two sinks, nice shower, separate water closet. Service was phenominal which you expect from the Ritz.  Location is breath taking.  Overlooks and has easy access to a beautiful beach.   Restaurant has beautiful view of the beach and surfers.  Night club and equally nice view.
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed your experience with us! We hope to welcome you back soon whether it be for business or pleasure, and we look forward to creating more memories for you.

Summary: We went to Disneyland for business event & had 1 day to head over to the coast. We booked a suite at the Ritz and it was absolutely amazing.   They were not up and running 100% so not all the fun was available. The concierge staff was great. It took a little long to get into our room but we were taken care of well.   The beach is stunning. We wanted to stay another day. Club level is where it's at!!   Would have moved to a 5 if they had things staffed and worked me into the Eco tour. Other than that awesome place.
Manager Response: We look forward to welcoming you back and providing you with an exceptional experience.  We are delighted to answer any questions for you ahead of time to ensure all of your expectations are exceeded.  Thank you for staying with us!

Summary: This hotel brings everything you'd want Ina 5 star plus the beach and sunset views! The property has large grassy areas to walk or sit and watch the sunset...or the beach if you choose. Rooms could be a little larger but was there for business so didn't spend much time in the room. The spa was fantastic and the pool was private... But would have spent more time there if it had a beach view.
Manager Response: We enjoyed providing you with a memorable experience and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: I have been fortunate to stay at a few Ritz Carlton's, but this was the pinnacle.  I was there on someone else's dime.  I loved the comfortable discussions I witnessed between staff which help's clients feel more comfortable.  The view of the beach was spectacular.  The beach seems to be mostly a surfing beach and is small in size.  There is a public grass park right next door that seemed like a nice place for playing with kids.  I heard their club level room had drinks and food available.  From the moment you check in you get a feel for the ambiance ( i don't know where I pulled that word from, but it fits).  The room was nice with a little balcony and that view!!  All marble bathroom with separate toilet.  We had dinner with the company at the site.  It was extremely well done
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  Whether for business or pleasure, or a combination of both, we will always ensure your expectations are met and exceeded.  We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel!

Summary: The Ritz Carlton, Laguna Niguel is a beautiful hotel.  The views of the beach are great, the rooms excellent and the pool really qaint.  There are basically 3 restaurants.  Rayna has awesome views of the beach and ocean.  The breakfast is exceptional.  Eno steak is very good, but not as good as expected for the price.  The ocean front rooms have great views.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  It was a pleasure having you with us and we hope to welcome you back very soon.

Summary: This is a lovely hotel that has been here for years. I haven't been for quite some time and it still is as it was with a few changes.  The restaurants are great, views spectacular and I loved my room. We were attending a convention and it was a fantastic venue for what we were doing. Turn downs are performed here, which is nice. I am very relieved with the security staff as I had left something at the front desk and it was in the Lost and Found department. I was a little surprised that the woman checking me in failed to grab my attention though to grab it after I was with her. I had another 2 interactions with her and did not find her very suitable or helpful as a front desk person.  Amber in the concierge department was wonderful. She helped me with a request instantly. Lots of
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We enjoyed having you and hope to welcome you back soon.  Thank you for providing your feedback.  It is extremely valuable!

Summary: I was invited to the Laguna-Nigel Ritz-Carlton Hotel in a Sales Convention.  Should I have to pay, I would never be there.  However, I was there for 4 days and enjoyed  greatly.  Temperature wasn't perfect but I didn't suffer any rain.  I was surprised by the number of surfers on the beach, even though I couldn't get any deeper than my knee in this cold sea. The gardens of the Hotel and surrounding parks and trails was just a step away from heaven.  All the flowers were gorgeous, I even met a 'Pepper Tree' wich Pepper corns were perfectly odorific in a closeby neighbourhood.  Food was oversized portionned but so gooood.  I had 2 sandwiches on the 1st day there.  They were pretty good, but a bit expensive.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Beautiful  hotel. My room  was a garden view but you could clearly see the ocean  from the balcony.  Very dog friendly. The room  had a safe and a fridge to store your snacks in. No mini bar to fuss with. Small tube in the bathroom with a shower.  Nice beach access.
Manager Response: We hope your experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel was a fantastic one.  We look forward to creating more unique memories for you soon.

Summary: This is the best hotel within a 50 miles radius. Spectacular scenery. The rooms are nothing to rave about but the actual property is very nice. The grounds are nice. The food is great. The service is average. Lots of excursions available off site.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  Our ladies and gentlemen will always strive to provide the best possible service experience.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: It starts and ends with the view at this hotel.  Regardless of the time of day, it is simply amazing.  Add to that, lovely rooms, excellent bedding, great service and an amazing gym, this places fires on all cylinders.  Highly recommend.
Manager Response: We couldn't agree with you more that we are so fortunate to have such incredible surroundings.  We are delighted you enjoyed your experience with us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Idyllic Setting on Monarch Bay with Excellent Service
Summary: Although this hotel may show age in some rooms, the setting on Monarch Bay with the beautiful rocky and sandy beach with surfing activity is sure to delight. Public areas are large and attractive with many places to sit and relax. The staff aimed to please us at every turn. If I wanted a hot tea where none was served, the server would go and find one for me. I was greeted by name multiple times at the front door. If I looked as if I was confused about where to go, staff stopped what they were doing to give me directions. The Bedding was comfortable and room temperature and lighting were good. The WiFi worked well. Shower had good pressure and the soaking tub was appreciated. Room included turn-down service each evening with chocolates. I felt very comfortable here and would
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  We look forward to many return visits in the future.  Please allow us to assist you with any questions or planning needs you may have.

Summary: We were able to use our points to book three families for a family vacation with young kids.  We are returning to the property later this month and hope for the same great experience.  The beach butler is a nice touch.  Very family and kid friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty!  We look forward to welcoming you back, and if we may assist you with your activity planning please feel free to contact our Concierge Desk at any time.

Summary: The rooms were very nice, but they would not deserve a 5 star. The view of the ocean room brings all the glory. The service of this hotel is exceptional and deserves 5 stars. EVERY employee we encountered made it their job to make us feel pampered. From the basics to the smallest of details this is what customer service should be at a hotel.  My wife scheduled a Mani/pedi at the salon and it wasn't what one would expect at a high end salon.  I encouraged her to talk the the manager and the manager took care of it right away. Hopefully they have rectified that for others. Masseuses are hit or miss but the atmosphere before the massage is inviting. This is the second time I've stayed here. If you can, stay on the Club Level, but I warn you... This Ritz and their Club Level will
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, it was our pleasure serving you.  We hope your experience was a unique and memorable one, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Thank you for your valuable feedback.  We appreciate your time in posting your review.

Summary Heading: Wonderful property with a definite need for staff training
Summary: Exceptional location on the Dana Point coast.  Rooms are well sized if a bit dated.  Gorgeous ocean view.  Valet, doormen, housekeeping were fantastic.  Pool area is fine.  Definite need for customer service training on the front desk.  A hint-Make absolutely certain that everyone in your party that needs a room key is named in their system.  Otherwise they will not be able to obtain a replacement key without a named person being present per  "Corporate Policy", no exceptions.  Find it interesting that a group with the Ritz's reputation has moved so far away from their customer service reputation towards the "Policy" answer.  Will be interesting to watch how that works for them with many other alternatives at this price level.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We greatly appreciate your feedback and have share it with our Executive Committee and Corporate Office. We take all comments constructively and seriously. We are certainly disappointed that we fell short of meeting your expectations regarding access to your guest room, but assure you that your safety is our highest mission. We are delighted that we were able to provide an overall excellent experience for you and we would enjoy welcoming you back again in the future. If we may be of assistance, please contact the Executive Office at (949) 240-2000. Thank you.

Summary: Best hotel in California! Everything was perfect, the hotel, the service, the food, the vibe, the pool, the location, the view...the best best best! Can't wait to return! Laguna beach also a great spot with cute little shops.
Manager Response: It was fun to have you stay with us!  We are delighted to know we are the perfect resort for you!

Summary Heading: Still a Ritz Carlton, but Not What It Used to Be
Summary: The views, service and food remain outstanding, but this Ritz Carlton is a bit tired. Sleeping rooms have very little light.  The light is so bad in the bathroom that putting on make-up is a real challenge.  I had to twist my head around the corner of a floor to ceiling mirror so that I could use the shower light to put on make-up because the bathroom lighting was so inadequate.  No mirrors elsewhere in the room, so could not find any spot with adequate light for make-up. When I arrived in the room, I found a soaking wet spot about a foot in diameter that smelled in the closet.  Maintenance did come quite rapidly after my call, but could not eliminate either the spot or the smell. The maintenance men suggested that I change rooms.  I asked them to have the front desk call me so
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your extremely valuable feedback.  While it sounds as if you enjoyed your overall experience at the resort, it seems we fell short of fulfilling some of your expectations.  Although we do have over all resort enhancements forthcoming, we would still like to hear more about your specific guest room so that we may ensure we provide any immediate attention to the room as necessary, and correct any service issues that need to be addressed as well.  Kindly contact the Executive Office at your convenience.  We look forward to assisting you and welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Ritz is the Ritz for a Reason!
Summary: Amazing hotel, Amazing staff and great restaurants! If you have the opportunity to upgraded to Club level then do it! It's a hotel in a hotel and well worth the extra spend. The services will more than cover the upcharge
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for allowing us the opportunity to provide a unique and memorable experience for you.  We look forward to creating more memories for you soon!

Summary Heading: Amazing view, perfect beach and wonderful stay
Summary: We stayed here for five nights in April, with our three year old boy, who still asks about when we can return to this resort.   On the plus side: - perfect location. The Ritz-Carlton is set on a cliff overlooking Salt Creek beach. The oceanfront rooms are pricey, but the view is truly amazing. There is a beach butler who will give you a ride down the cliff to the beach, and set you up with beach chairs, umbrella and some beach toys for the kids. We've done the walk by ourselves too. Took us about 5-8 minutes with the little one.  - Our boy spent all day on the beach, building sand castle and running to water's edge. It is very relaxing and not crowded at all -Nicely appointed common area and friendly staff, as expected from the Ritz - The rooms are not big, but well appointed
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, it was a pleasure having you with us!  We truly hope you enjoyed a unique, memorable and personal experience.  We greatly appreciate you feedback.  We welcome, read, and share every guest comment in an effort to always provide the best possible service and facilities.  We look forward to return in the future so you can enjoy the enhancements we are continuously working on.  If we can answer any questions for you, or assist you in any way, please do not hesitate to contact our Resort Services team at (949) 240-2000.  Thank you!

Summary: Few Resorts can compete with this quaint picturesque and luxurious retreat. If you're not hypnotized by the lovely scenery and enchanting Beach you need to visit your physician. You will have tremendous difficulty departing from this wonderful Resort
Manager Response: We are so fortunate to be located in such a phenomenal area surrounded by incredible scenery.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Visited Ritz Carlton at Laguna Niguel for my husbands 50th birthday. We decided to stay there because of the beauty of the coast and it wasn't far to fun day trips for the family. We relaxed and also did Disneyland with ease. Less than 45 minute drive to Disneyland and coming back to this beautiful resort was amazing after being at the busy parks all day. The staff at the Ritz is amazing they couldn't have been more accommodating to us and the Club access room is a must! The food that they put out daily was so good and lots of choices. We had breakfast a few times in their restaurant and the staff was so welcoming and friendly! We even saw whales while having breakfast and also when having a drink on the terrace bar! Couldn't have been a better stay. Well worth the money!
Manager Response: It was our pleasure celebrating with you!  We look forward to creating many more unique memories for you soon.

Summary Heading: Beautiful resort but shows age in some regards....
Summary: My husband and I just spent 2 nights at the Ritz in Laguna Niguel.  It's a beautiful hotel and the staff and service are both top notch.  They are the reason its a 4 star review and not a 3 star.  We were disappointed that the rooms were quite noisy.  Albeit we just had their basic room on the second floor with a pool view, we could hear every conversation coming down the hall and every door that closed.  I guess one would expect if you paid Ritz prices that wouldn't be an issue.  I think we both assumed it was due to the design and age of the hotel, and perhaps the location of our room.  Nonetheless, the room was still not on par with a 3 or 4 star hotel prices, so we expected more.  There was nothing spectacular about our room.  It was clean tho and the decor was pleasant.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel as your luxury destination.  We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you and your husband.  We greatly appreciate your valuable feedback and we have taken it constructively and seriously.  We have noted your preference for a quiet room for the next time you stay with us and we always strive to provide our guests with the exact accommodations they are looking for.  We look forward to welcoming you back and we are delighted you enjoy our incredible surroundings as much as we do!

Summary Heading: Location just a dream - service with big question marks!
Summary: This hotel has everything to get highest ratings - location just a dream, park and the beach simply perfect. Gym the nicest I've ever seen and modern equipped! Rooms tastfully furnished, quiet, clean and spacious, pool beautiful. But... it might have been the wrong weekend - there were too many parties, receptions, celebrations going on. Staff was totally focused on these events. Many places and passages were blocked. I just simply felt not welcomed enough, taken care of and did not receive the appropriate attention. And the worst - when I mentioned this during check-out not a single word of apolgies or regrets - the receptionist did not even wish a nice day anymore!
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for your candid feedback.  We greatly appreciate it and it has been taken seriously.  We intended for your stay to be a unique and memorable one and we are saddened to learn that we failed to meet your service expectations.  It is certainly our highest mission to provide an extremely high level of personal service and we would welcome the opportunity to speak with you further so we can fully understand the breakdowns.  Please contact our Executive Office at (949) 240-2000, thank you.

Summary: I tagged along with my husband to his recent work meeting at the Ritz in Laguna Niguel.  We have been to this property a few times before, most recently 2 years ago and just love the breathtaking views and casually-elegant ambiance. On our trip 2 years ago, we didn't have the best experience.  My husband had communicated with the general manager about our issues and we were assured that the situation would not happen again.  My husband is a Marriott Platinum Elite and when we travel at Marriott's we thoroughly enjoy the perks and upgrades that go along with spending 150+ nights per year in a hotel.  We know that the Ritz does not typically give any perks to Marriott Platinum Elites.  It was very nice to receive a letter upon arrival saying that Platinum Elites would receive the
Manager Response: It was an honor to have you back with us again.  We value your loyalty and will always provide you with our exclusive Platinum Rewards status amenities.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel!

Summary: Excellent Service, great bar, comfortable rooms, beautiful bathrooms, great room service.  I honestly have nothing except positives to post about this property. The restaurant is fantastic, especially for breakfast and the view cannot be beat.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure having you experience The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: The service, the facility and location was top notch but  smoking being allowed in the room balconies ruined the experience for me. My friend and I were enjoying the fresh air and night sky when the smell of marijuana from the balcony below us obnoxiously reached us.  What if I had children with me or if I had asthma? Why is the 13-15% of the population being catered to when majority of the US are non-smokers? I asked the front desk and got no help from them.  So disappointing.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your feedback and we are so sorry the actions of other patrons disturbed you.  We certainly would not intend for any of our valuable guests to have an unpleasant experience.  We hope you will return one day soon so that you can enjoy a memorable visit.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary Heading: Beautiful property with amazing views; food and soundproofing could be improved
Summary: I'm a Marriott Rewards Gold member and stayed at this property for a conference. I a room facing the ocean with a fantastic balcony with a view. It was a pleasure to wake up every morning. The main pool area is also great and is mostly protected from the wind. I was able to enjoy it even when the weather was only in the high 60s. The gym faces the ocean as well so it's a pleasure to work out. The staff is fantastic all around as at most Ritz properties. You can ask anyone you encounter for anything at all and they all try to be as helpful as possible, even if it's not their direct role.  The two things that could be improved are:  Food - for a hotel in this class, the food is very mediocre. We had dinner at enoSTEAK one night and had to send back the steak tartar as it was
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  It was a pleasure creating a memorable experience for you.  We thank you for your feedback and have shared it with our executive team.  We actively welcome our guests' comments so that we can ensure we are always providing the best possible service and facilities.  We are grateful for your loyalty and hope to welcome you back very soon.

Summary: We stayed one night for a wedding and I would say that our expectations were high but we were slightly disappointed.  The rooms were in need of an update and were not what I had expected them to be, and the room had a musky smell to it. We didn't spring for an ocean view which you would want at this hotel, but we weren't planning on being in the room for very long.  Check in time is at 4:00pm but they were able to get us in a room by 1:30pm which was nice.  The wedding itself was beautiful due to the views but I also was slightly disappointed in the food quality for such a well respected hotel. We were told they had 4 to 5 weddings that day so maybe they are sacrificing their product for the larger numbers.   Overall would stay somewhere else for the price,but the convenience
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we hope you enjoyed your overall experience and you will return in the near future.  We appreciate your feedback and it has been taken seriously and constructively.  We are grateful to hear from our guests so that we may ensure we are striving to provide the best possible service and facilities.  If we can assist you in any way, please contact our Executive Offices.  Thank you.

Summary: We enjoyed the amenities of this hotel so much we extended our stay!  Our room with an ocean view was very comfortable and had spectacular sunset views! The club lounge offered tasty treats all day long. A walking trail is nearby for convenient outdoor exercise. The staff is friendly as well.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you!  We look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Beautiful views, dated rooms and overpriced.
Summary: My husband and I spent the weekend here, April 23-25th.  We have the Ritz card and have 2 free nights each year and needed to use them.  We had high expectations being that it was a Ritz, however we understood that our vouchers wouldn't get us an ocean view.  Upon check in, we were greeted with champagne.  It is very clear that customer service is their forte.  Our room wasn't ready and the only room available didn't have a great view, a staircase to be exact.  Mind you, this room with a limited view would have cost $499 per night.  We were offered an upgrade to an executive suite (with no ocean view) for an additional $300 per night.  Not really a deal in my opinion.  We decided to wait it out for the room they suggested.  3 hours later we inquired at the desk and the only room
Manager Response: Thank you for your incredibly valuable feedback.  On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we hope we created a unique and memorable experience for you overall.  Of course we are saddened to hear of your disappointment with your accommodations.  It is our highest mission that each of our guests departs the resort with a sense of genuine care and well-being.  Thank you for letting us know about your experience.  We would welcome the opportunity to speak with you further if you would like.  We can be reached at (949) 240-2000.  Thank you.

Summary: Went to the outdoor bar for food and drinks and to watch the sunset. You are on a cliff overlooking the beach. Lots of surfers catching the last waves as the sun goes down. Drinks are great and the good is good. But the view is awesome.  Hotel has valet parking. But getting a good seat can be challenging because everyone wants to get the best view. The place gets crowded.
Manager Response: The sunsets are absolutely breathtaking!  We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: I absolutely cannot say enough about this property! We booked last minute for a one night stay. We had been at Disney for four days prior and really wanted a nice relaxing day at the beach. The Ritz delivered! The Beach Concierge was such a huge benefit. They shuttle you down and take care of chairs, towels, and umbrellas.   Our room was immaculate. The bed was comfy and the bathroom was gorgeous.   The club level was wonderful, and the ladies who were hosting the concierge there were superb. They remembered all of our names (even our kids' names) and greeted us personally each time we walked through. The food was delicious.   The views here were unreal! The only regret from our stay is that we couldn't stay longer. We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: We can't wait to welcome you back!  If you need any assistance, please feel free to contact the Executive Office.  We are happy to assist you!

Summary: If you are going for the views and the service at their restaurant Raya - then go because there is nothing like it! Views and service at Raya are outstanding!  If you go expecting a typical 5* Ritz Carlton, you'll be very disappointed!  They get an "A" for effort, but really it is just a glorified Marriott brand hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback.  We greatly appreciate it!  We would be grateful to know what we could have done better in order to provide you with a unique and memorable five-star experience.  We would enjoy hearing from you (949) 240-2000.  Thank you!

Summary: Just attended a conference at the Ritz.  The hotel is beautiful, the views are spectacular and the staff is one of the best I have ever seen at a hotel.  Their attention to detail is outstanding.  If you have a special occasion you want to celebrate come here you will not be disappointed!!!  However, don't look at the prices.  Be prepared to pay big prices if you eat or drink at the property.  But then again its the Ritz
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel!

Summary: Great location for business meeting in the OC.  Meeting rooms nice.  Banquet staff 1st rate.  Best view and beach of the luxury resorts in the area.  Staff friendly and efficient without being too stuffy.  Been before, be  back again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again!  We are delighted you enjoyed your experience and we look forward to creating more unique memories for you soon whether it be for business or leisure.  If we can assist you in any way, please feel free to contact our offices.

Summary: Service was very good, as expected from the Ritz. The physical plant and rooms appear to need a refresh and updating, especially compared to the St. Regis, which is nearby and we also stayed before. Hallways appeared dark, rooms were clean, but again dated. Great access to the beach though.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We really appreciate it.  We hope you enjoyed your experience with us and we look forward to sharing our forthcoming enhancements with you.

Summary: This is a beautiful property. I enjoyed everything about it from the wonderful lunch at Raya (Liz and Nick were spectacular ) to the incredible service by every member of the staff. The views of the Pacific are breathtaking.  This is truly a first-class experience.
Manager Response: We enjoyed having you!  We promise to deliver a unique and memorable experience for you each time you visit us.

Summary Heading: Nice view expect to pay for that
Summary: Recognize where this brand sits on the experience and service and expect the costs to be high but in this instance I'd say the property is all about the view and you pay for that The only choice for parking is valet at $35 per night - that just seems completely unwarranted given the high cost of staying and felt like the old style excess telephone. No resort charge and the Internet was included which was a pleasant surprise 50% of the rooms don't have an ocean view (rough guess on my part) and look out onto the inner courtyards and pools. If you've paid for the sea view excellent. If not the additional cost is high and there are no status (Marriott) upgrades - I was offered but for an additional fee. So there were upgraded rooms available but there is no acknowledgement of
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing your valuable feedback.  We have shared it with our team.  We would enjoy the opportunity to speak with you further so we can provide clarity over the confusion of the running trails and the rewards upgrades.  Please contact our Hotel Manager at (949) 240-2000 so we may ensure all of your concerns are acted upon.  We look forward to speaking with you.  Thank you again for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary: You can spend more at the Montage, but bang for the buck, it is hard to beat a night at the Ritz in the OC.  Over the last five years I have been here four nights per year.  The location is awesome, with stunning ocean-view rooms.  You might hike a bit up and down to the beach, it is a great beach for kids and surfers alike.  Sunset dinners in the dining room are killer.
Manager Response: It is always a pleasure having you stay with us and we hope each of your experiences are unique and memorable!

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel, the way a hotel should be!
Summary: This experience at the Ritz Carlton, Laguna Niguel was fantastic!  We had a 5 nite stay from March 31 through April , 2016.  We started with a great suite directly adjacent to the Club lounge and what a treat this was!  I highly recommend spending extra to get a Club room, the food  and beverage was fantastic!  We were then moved to a fantastic Ocean View Suite.  What a spectacular view and amenties to wish we had every time!  This room was so comfortable and had so much space, we truly felt like we were in the lap of luxury!  I would highly recommend paying a little more and getting a club level room and the amount of food and beverages available more that pays for the difference, I even believe that you're saving money by using the Club.  I would not hesitate to recommend this
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you with us!  We are delighted you enjoyed your exclusive Club Level experience.  It is definitely the way to go when staying with us.  We look forward to creating many more unique and personal memories for you in the future.  Please feel free to reach out to the Executive Office if we can assist you in any way.

Summary Heading: Everything, especially the view, was Perfect
Summary: The grounds, beach, service, room, food, wine, everything we had here was immaculate. We've been here twice for extended weekends. I love sitting outside at the balcony restaurant, drinking wine and having seafood while watching the sunset over the ocean. We barely left the hotel! Would definitely stay here again and again.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, it is always a pleasure having you stay with us!  We enjoy creating unique and memorable experiences for you and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: I really enjoyed my 4 night stay at the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel! The hotel is situated at the top of a cliff, and a short walk to the beach. Excellent paths for long walks or runs, either near the beach or the golf course. The views are breathtaking from many vantage points on property (including the fitness center!), and my favorite place to dine was 180Blue. Sushi and salads were very good. I ordered room service breakfast once, but actually preferred the delicious breakfast burrito and green smoothie at the Market Place. The rooms are very nice and bathrooms were large. The only thing about the bathroom I would change are the showers, as prefer glass shower doors vs shower curtains. Overall, a very beautiful property and I would definitely return.
Manager Response: We can't agree with you more that we are so fortunate to have such amazing view of the ocean!  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us and hope to welcome you back very soon.  Thank you for your feedback concerning the showers. We agree with you and are keeping the idea top of mind.

Summary Heading: Get a room with a vew and small balcony.
Summary: I have been here 6 to 8 times for business conferences--usually getting rooms with views of the pool or on the lower levels where you look out to sky. Due to the fact that it is a large resort (very capable of handling large business meetings), if you get a non-view room, you could almost be anywhere (you could be in Palm Springs looking at a pool)--you really don't know you are near the water from your room---to remember you are on the ocean you must go to the common spaces----such as the bar.  In addition,  I have made the mistake the few other times I have stayed there personally to not focus on my room, as I was usually there for late dinners.  Up until this last visit, my poor room selections have left a very mediocre impression of the property.  Yes the food was decent,
Manager Response: We appreciate your loyalty and are so glad you had the chance to stay in an ocean front room this past visit.  If we may answer any questions for you in the future prior to booking, please let us know.  It would be a pleasure to work together on securing the perfect accommodation for you.  Thank you!

Summary: This is the best hotel in Orange County. The grounds, the rooms, the restaurants and the view. Everything is wonderful. We were upgraded to a wonderful ocean view room from our original garden view booking. Very nice space with good storage, comfy beds and a great bathroom.  Also a beautiful but petite balcony with a small table and chairs. I could've stayed out there all day. I had breakfast at the Beautiful restaurant facing the ocean. It was expensive and delicious. The valets were friendly and efficient and the beach was wonderful. Not really a good swimming beach and I didn't see any chairs set up by the shore but so many great places to sit and enjoy the view from above.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel!  We are delighted you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to welcome you back very soon.  Next time, allow our beach butlers to whisk you away to the beach via our beach shuttle and set up your beach experience with chairs, umbrellas, towels, fins and sunscreen.  It's our pleasure and is always available for our guests.

Summary: For our October stay-cation, my fiancee and I chose a suite on the south side of the hotel. The suite was large, luxurious and featured all the lavish decor, ocean breezes and superb service you'd expect.  The suite itself featured a long, narrow balcony that spanned from the living room to the bedroom suite, with magnificent french doors and sheer drapes to welcome cool ocean breezes.   With two bathrooms (one for the living room area) and the other being a full bathroom with large walk in shower, rain heads, a tub, big closets, a vanity area and marble floors, we had plenty of room to relax in style.  Food at the Ritz is always superb, with multiple options on the property. The patio lounge is exceptional, not just for the food, but for their drinks and of course, the views.
Manager Response: What a lovely review of your experience!  We are delighted that our ladies and gentlemen created a memorable experience for you.  The suite you chose is absolutely divine.  Perhaps we could send you our "sleep experience"?  It is available online at www.ritzcarltonshops.com.  Enjoy!

Summary: A quick review for a quick stay Spent one night for a business seminar, but still found this property to be fantastic! Conference facilities where great, the banquet dinners served where very good, breakfast and breaks on the terrace overlooking the pool area were great. The gym area has one of the best views a gym could have overlooking the Pacific! As usual the service was top notch throughout the Hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for our nice feedback!  We look forward to welcoming you back for a much more relaxing and lengthy visit.

Summary Heading: Somewhat Improved but Still Far from a Five Star
Summary: A great view but still room service trolleys and trays left in my corridor for hours.  The food at the conference I was attending was a little better than on my previous visit.  The problem is that the hotel charges five star prices so expectations are high but they are not delivered.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your feedback an we hope your overall experience was a positive one.  We have shared your feedback with our executive team and take it seriously.  We apologize for any lapse in service you experienced and will use your feedback constructively.  If we may be of assistance, we would welcome the chance to speak with you by phone to fully understand the breakdowns.  Thank you.  We may be reached at (949) 240-2000.  We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: Stayed here for 2 nights in early March. Fantastic location on a cliff overlooking the Pacific. The thing that really stood out was the attitudes and friendliness of the staff. They were absolutely awesome. Every staff member we came in contact with was very friendly and helpful. The room was really nice/ very comfortable bed. We got up in the mornings and walked the walkway down to the beach, and there is seriously no better way to start the day. It is a great hotel, with a great staff! We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We enjoyed having you and look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: I had the opportunity to visit this property during our recent visit to the Laguna Beach/Dana Point area.  The Ritz is a beautiful property in a stunning location. The views from the outdoor bar, main restaurant and walkway to the rooms all face the Pacific Ocean. The resort grounds were well maintained, with beautiful sweeping views available from the cliff the hotel is perched up on.   We arrived early for check-in, but they were kind enough to offer to take our luggage into our room once it became available. Bell and check-in host were friendly. There is no self-parking, only valet and that at times takes a while to get to your vehicle. During your wait for your vehicle, you were offered complimentary water.  Rooms are spread out and there is one elevator.   Once we arrived
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We realize you have many choices in luxury and appreciate your business and loyalty.  We are delighted that you enjoyed your overall experience with us, and we enjoyed creating it for you.  We have taken your feedback regarding our rooms seriously and have noted your preferences in your profile.  Please know that if you return, we would be glad to install additional lighting for you.  Kindly place your future reservations directly through the Executive Office and we will ensure you have a wonderful stay.

Summary: The Ritz is a beautiful property in a stunning location.  The views from the outdoor bar, main restaurant and walkway to the rooms all face the Pacific Ocean.  The staff is well trained and friendly and the food and drinks are top shelf.  If it's in your price range this is the place to stay in Orange County.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We hope we were the perfect choice for you.  It would be wonderful to welcome you back soon!

Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights with my husband and our children for their spring break.  One of the best resorts we have ever stayed in-we stayed in a suite where we were surrounded by ocean views.  It felt like we were floating on the ocean.  Service was impeccable and personable with everybody remembering our names.  Excellent proximity to Salt Creek beach-a 5 min walk or you can take a shuttle if you don't want to walk down.  Will definitely be our go to place for future visits to Laguna!
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you!

Summary: Spent 3 nights on the Club Level, for our second visit. Have already booked a return trip in November. Beautiful beach/cliff side hotel, with excellent personal, attentive service. Our first visit was great, but left with the thought (expressed by others as well) that the building could use a refresh. Well, the refresh has been done, and our room , as well as the rest of the compound, was great!  Staying at the Ritz is everything you would expect from a 5 star operation. Not a single complaint.
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty and welcome home! We look forward to creating another unique and memorable experience for you soon.

Summary: If you want to go to a lovely location and be pampered, this is the place.  Beautiful grounds, exceptionally attentive staff.  Vistas , walking path, nearby attractions, it is all here.  Price is what you would expect for the quality and amenities.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We look forward to being of service to you again soon.

Summary: Lovely hotel tucked away in what appears to be a residential area.   Right on the ocean with lovely views.  Rooms are pretty spread out and I noticed only one elevator.  So prepare to walk unless you request a room close to the lobby! My room was at the end of the hall on the 4th floor so I got a view of the ocean and a cul-de-sac!  Pool area looked nice- didn't use as pretty chilly when I was there.  Rooms were nice and well appointed- safe, small fridge, coffee/tea maker, robe, sewing/shoe shine kit. Also had a good size closet. Balconies are not private and pretty on top of each other. The heater kept kicking on and was pretty loud so I woke up several times during the 1st night.  Bathroom had double sinks, shower and separate toilet.  Nathan at the front desk was lovely and
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel!  We hope your experience was a memorable one and we look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: This is a Ritz, after all so you expect quality.  Our room was lovely, with an ocean view and had a really cool patio with a fire table. There is a wonderful long walking path starting on the hotel grounds that provides spectacular views of the ocean and the adjacent golf course. Food was great.  The ocean view from the breakfast room was amazing, (we actually saw a whale!), and breakfast was delicious, albeit pricey.  Where the hotel missed the mark a bit (so four stars, rather than five) was that, as an older property, it didn't feel like it was being maintained to a Ritz level.  The spa had iron stains around the decorative faucets, the hallway walls and doorways had chips, and several areas could have used a fresh coat of paint.  Nothing major - just not fabulous Ritz
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We greatly appreciate your feedback and are delighted you enjoyed your experience with us.  We look forward to creating more meaningful memories for you in the near future.

Summary Heading: Best Ritz We Have Stayed In!
Summary: This hotel is absolutely phenomenal!  From the rooms and the service to the food and the location, you could not ask for a better stay...they even rushed us to the car rental place on a busy Saturday morning so we could get there before it closed. Everything was taken care of when we got to Enterprise thanks to concierge. The restaurants, bars and shops are all unique and wonderful in their own way.  You are RIGHT next to the beach so grab some food and picnic at the ocean! We cannot wait until our next stay...already planning it!
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, it was a pleasure creating a unique and memorable experience for you.  We are excited that you will be returning soon and we promise to provide you another excellent adventure.  If we may assist you in your planning, please do not hesitate to contact us.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary: I had the opportunity to visit this property during a recent visit to the Laguna Beach / Dana Point area.  Bell and check-in hosts were warm and friendly and got me squared away quickly with check-in formalities and I was off to my room.  The room was on the small side, but featured nice decor ...and a comfortable, sumptuous bed. Mirrors in the room made it feel larger than it was and also allowed some of the sunlight from outside to shine inside.  The bathroom was tight but really took advantage of mirrors here; it felt like walking into a house of mirrors! Lighting was good in the bathroom. Hot/cold water was prompt.   The room was comfortable, temperature-wise; AC worked fine and quietly.  The resort grounds were well maintained, with beautiful sweeping views available from
Manager Response: We are so glad you had the chance to experience our property, surroundings, and service!  We hope to welcome you back very soon for another unique and memorable experience.  It is our pleasure!
