Summary Heading: High end exquisite hotel, room and service
Summary: My nephew was married in Dana Point recently, and the reception was held at the Ritz Carlton. As a Marriott Rewards member, we had enough points to stay at the Ritz Carlton for one night, so I made the reservation for the night of the wedding.  When we arrived we were pleasantly surprised to hear that we had been upgraded to the club level on the 4th floor. The staff at the hotel and club level were exceptional - they are focused on customer service and have received the training and have the demeanor to offer it.  From the valet who checked us into our palatial suite, spent 10 minutes showing us the room features and then remembered my name the day afterwards, to the club concierges and staff manning the bar, we had a wonderful experience and felt pampered every moment of our
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your Ritz-Carlton experience and we hope we created unique memories that will last a lifetime.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Beautiful setting but really a business hotel
Summary: The hotel is beautiful and the views of the Pacific stunning.  The rooms are nice, but on the small side for a luxury hotel.  The food in the restaurants is excellent, and the service is friendly and efficient.  The hotel is so large that there's no sense of personal attention, and it's constantly filled with the business meetings/retreats.  It isn't ideal for a family vacation as there are few other families there (perhaps different at a holiday/school break time).  Both pools are set in internal courtyards, so you cannot enjoy an ocean view from the pool.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We appreciate your extremely valuable feedback.  It is very important to us and we take it constructively and seriously.  It sounds like your visit was during a heavily occupied conference, however you and your family should always receive the utmost personalized and memorable service.  We have tremendous family programming here at the resort and are disappointed you didn't experience that.  We would love to welcome you back any time so we can provide you with a truly unique family vacation.  We are happy to assist you personally through the Executive Office at (949) 240-2000 or at rcln.gm.office@ritzcarlton.com.  We have so many types of experiences to offer to you and your family!

Summary: We stay here last week for an awards trip for work. The view were off the charts. Unfortunately the weather was not warm enough to take full advantage of the pool and the beach. The food selection was limited, but everything we had was really goos. I especially liked the smoked salmon eggs Benedict. Anyway, probably not a great place for kids, but more for a relaxing getaway. The staff was excellent and the rooms were clean. We had a ground level room w a gas fire pit, which was awesome.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience.  It was a pleasure having you with us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  If there is any assistance we can provide, please let us know.

Summary: The Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel is excellent for its locale and breathtaking scenery featuring an almost panoramic view of the California coastline from its Cliffside location.  Beautiful for weddings and those special events. As can be expected from Ritz-Carlton, this location has large well-appointed rooms/suites with all the comforts you expect from a luxury hotel.  Laguna Niguel is a great location for a getaway, but it is not as centrally located for out-of-town guests.  If you want a similar resort and coastal view, the luxurious Newport Coast hotels also offer a similar experience but is close to shopping such as the world-famous Fashion Island and dining.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We hope you enjoyed a most memorable experience while staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: I expected so much more, does not live up to the ritz name
Summary: I will start by saying, I travel the world, producing events for my clients. One thing I hear all the time is about Ritz Carltons legendary service. so many companies reference their training programs, and how amazing the staff is and how great ritz cartlons are. and for the most part I agree 100%, I usually like Ritz for their service, I rarely care for their design. So with all that said. this hotel should not be called a Ritz, it should be a marriot, or hyatt. I would love to say the staff was amazing but they were anything but. From the minute I arrived in my black car and the valet open my door and muttered a hello as he ran by to the car, to the waiting in line at the front desk, to the absolute minimal conversation or anything at all from my check in person. Sent on my
Manager Response: On behalf of our executive team and all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for your extremely valuable, detailed feedback.  We have shared it and taken it constructively.  We apologize for not meeting your expectations.  What you have described is certainly not typical for the normal level of luxury service that we provide, and we would greatly appreciate speaking to you further.  We would like to understand more about our breakdowns so that we can make sure we are better immediately.  Most of all, we want to regain your confidence in our amazing property and staff.  We would like to make this right for you.  Please contact us at your earliest convenience at (949) 240-2000.  Thank you.

Summary: From the moment we stepped out of our rental car, we were greeted with exceptional service. The valet were always friendly with a "welcome back" greeting each time. The front desk staff were polite and helpful. I witnessed them staying calm under pressure. Our room, #2016, was an oceanfront with spectacular sunsets. The balcony was smaller than I would have wanted but it was adequate. We ate at the Raya and Terrace restaurants. They were ok. This is a wonderful resort with beautiful views of the ocean. If you want luxury, stay here!
Manager Response: We enjoyed creating a unique and memorable experience for you and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!

Summary Heading: ritz carlton experience has a new meaning
Summary: if you want a chain hotel experience, here it is.. it used to be that the ritz would take customer service to a new level.. well that just isnt true anymore.. simple requests and commonsense accommodations are just not honored. we checked in and asked for an upgrade, we got a snippy front desk person with an attitude.. the rooms are dated. the hotel is getting old and there are better choices all around.. when we called the director of customer service to complain about the areas where we felt slightly he basically told us "that is the policy of the chain"  so if you want the experience of a chain hotel with average to poor service, stay here... i would take the $900 i spent for the night and definitely try somewhere else....i was aghast at the experience.. the two hiltons i
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback.  It has been shared with our executive leadership.  We are saddened by your comments and want to make this absolutely right for you.  Could you kindly phone our Executive Office at (949) 240-2000?  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We hope to welcome you back soon for a much more memorable experience.

Summary Heading: Lived up to the Ritz reputation
Summary: Hotel and staff were near perfect. The setting on top of the cliff overlooking the beach and ocean was spectacular. If you look closely, you might see some signs of aging on the buildings, but why would you do that when you can just grab a cocktail and look out at the age-less Pacific.
Manager Response: Thank you for your visit.  We hope you enjoyed an extraordinary experience!

Summary: This hotel is in such a beautiful location. I have to say I was expecting more based on this being the Ritz Carlton. Service was hit and miss, some was truly amazing and others missed the beat. The room seemed like it could use a little touch up. Again, Getty hotel, beautiful setting, just would have expected more.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback, thank you!  We would be interested in hearing more about your stay with us if you would be so kind to give us a call at (949) 240-2000.  We are delighted you chose The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for your luxury experience and we want to ensure you are fully satisfied with this visit and all future visits.  We look forward to speaking with you and welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: The Ritz Laguna Niguel is Elegance
Summary: We stayed at the Ritz Laguna Niguel two weeks ago.  The hotel is elegant from the moment you enter.  The gorgeous flowers throughout, the decor, combined with the beautiful beach location is incomparable. Our room complete with private outdoor fire pit and ocean view was quite romantic.  The room itself was lovely and immaculate. There is a large pool on the property with a restaurant/bar adjacent and a small quiet pool in a second location. The gym has direct ocean views and there are numerous restaurant choices.  The hotel is located a few miles from Laguna Beach and close to Dana Point.  There are also numerous walking trails around the hotel.  This is definitely one of my favorite hotels. I am looking forward to our next stay.
Manager Response: It was wonderful having you stay with us!  We look forward to creating another memorable and unique experience for you soon.

Summary Heading: Slightly outdated old Luxury at perfect location ...
Summary: One has to say, the location of this Ritz-Carlton is amazing. The view to the open sea at different times forces one to make pictures every-time. But one can easily end-up in rooms with a view to the pool providing close to zero natural light. The room itself was dated and not really clean, hence it was the first time I did not use the coffee machine because it was definitely not clean at all.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for your luxury needs.  We enjoyed having you.  We appreciate your constructive feedback and would appreciate if you could contact us to discuss the room you stayed in.  We can be reached in the Executive Office at 949.240.2000.  We look forward to welcoming you back an providing an experience for you that is truly memorable.

Summary: As a first time visitor to Laguna Niguel, I was blown away by the Pacific. The view from the Ritz is unsurpassed. Our room was in unit 3 which had the best view on the Ritz grounds. Our room was nice as well (somewhat outdated in the bathroom though.) The grounds are beautiful as well and the service from the Ritz team was as good as anyone could ever ask. They were all outstanding.
Manager Response: Congratulations on your first visit here!  We hope we were the perfect hotel for you.  We look forward to welcoming you back many more times for years to come.

Summary: I was here for a business trip and had an amazing experience. I was very pleased with the rooms and the service here. I ate at the restaurant in the hotel and was craving a fillet. It was not on the menu however they were able to make me an amazing fun way for dinner. You can't beat the ocean view by the way.   -Scott Biddick
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear that your expectations were exceeded and that you enjoyed your experience!

Summary: This hotel is absolutely stunning! It is right on the beach, but you have to walk a ways to get down the mountain! Food is delicious and drinks are great. Would love to go back. Beautiful views from the room! Great bathrooms and bedding.
Manager Response: We hope to welcome you back very soon!

Summary: From top to bottom, this place is the most gorgeous hotel you will probably ever see in your life.  Or at least the most gorgeous one I will stay in.  Despite my raggedy suitcase and my yoga pants, I was treated with the best customer service I have ever received anywhere. My bags were delivered to my room as I attended to some business in one of their gorgeous ocean-facing conference rooms, my bed was set up (even with the stuffed animals I travel with) every evening, and my clothes were hung in the closet.  I was taken care of in a more VIP way than I am accustomed to and am now spoiled for every other hotel I will probably ever stay in.  Will come back when I win the lottery.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Loved this hotel. The staff and the amenities were spectacular. The room was well appointed and the outdoor fireplace was extra cozy. The hotel was very busy due to the holiday weekend, but all the staff greeted us with a pleasant hello everywhere. Only complaint was the valet service- they were consistently very busy.
Manager Response: Your feedback is greatly appreciated, thank you.  It was a pleasure having you as our guest!

Summary: This is a gorgeous setting with a property and staff that aims to please. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. I strongly suggest getting a club floor room, ocean side if possibly. The club floor puts any other previous experience to shame. The food is really good, plentiful, and flowing till 10:30pm. You actually needn't eat out at all if you don't want to. From specialty coffees in the morning to an open bar from afternoon till closing, the club lounge is great. And the women who staff it - Mary, Colleen and Vickie can't do enough to please. The pool is nice though lap swimming can be challenging if it's not done in the morning before kids show up. Beach is very pretty and there is a beach valet to transport you should you not wish to walk back up the hill. Lovely place in So Cal!
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope we were the perfect hotel for you!

Summary: A marvellous location for a relaxed luncheon overlooking the Pacific. A refined dining room staffed by friendly, professional personnel offers nicely presented unique dishes with light or regular sized options. Well worth a stop if you are in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your support!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Still one of the most beautiful hotels ever!
Summary: This is the last year the conference i have been attending here for the pat years will be here.  Its a Ritz Carlton so everyone is polite and helpful.  However this trip the weather was horrible and the hotel was cold and windy inside.  Hopefully i will return here some day.  I will miss it!
Manager Response: We will miss you as well!  But we hope to welcome you back for a non-business related visit one day soon.

Summary Heading: Possibly my favorite hotel of all time!!!
Summary: I have had the pleasure of staying here twice in the past two years and hope I can return again  soon. From my check in to departure this hotel knows the true meaning of customer service and luxury. Even with a full house nothing is overlooked and one is never made to feel unimportant or rushed. The sheer beauty and views of the place are enough to satisfy even the pickiest of travelers, but the resort offers so much more. The dining is fabulous even in their convenient cafe as is their selection of activities for the kids and adults alike. The spa is awesome and the fitness area is like none I have seen elsewhere.  The rooms are very comfortable and like everything else, beautiful. The staff truly goes above and beyond and you won't be disappointed. I, for one, cannot wait to
Manager Response: It was our pleasure creating a memorable experience for you.  We are delighted that you enjoyed our warm, relaxed yet refined ambiance.  We are fortunate to have such an incredible location and our ladies and gentlemen take great pride in ensuring each of our guests' expectations are exceeded.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: You owe it to yourself to visit.
Summary: Its a Ritz Carlton so service is the name of the game here.  I mean isn't that the reason you stay with them.   Rooms are nice, grounds are better.   The view is fantastic and worth the price of the room.  We had a fire pit room which was really cool.  We were on the far south end so the view of the ocean was limited.  If you can,  stay on the west side or north side.  This way you can at least see the mountains.  Pool is nice, enclosed so that cool ocean air doesn't chill you.  Get out and explore the area, lots of great places to eat just north on the PCH.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We hope you took home some wonderful memories and will return soon!

Summary: I was fortunate enough to stay at this property with my husband  during a business conference, absolutely breathtaking!  We enjoyed a garden view room but none the less it was beautiful. We enjoyed the ocean view many times while eating lunch or having cocktails. It was quite relaxing every morning to run on the boardwalk, ocean side, while observing the early morning surfers.  The workout room also has a beautiful Pacific view. The absolutely gorgeous views of the Pacific from this Ritz-Carlton is astounding!
Manager Response: We are so fortunate to be located amidst such beautiful nature!  Our surroundings are magnificent and we enjoy sharing them with our guests.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Everything You Expect From The Ritz Carlton
Summary: This is the second time I have been at the Ritz in Laguna Niguel.  The first time was for Drinks over the bluffs. This time for a 2 night stay.  Had an ocean view room on 2nd floor.   Everything about our stay was flawless; from check-in to check-out.  The resort was lovely, well manicured and situated on one of the best points imaginable.  The town of Dana Point is lovely.  The service is what you would expect, plus the vibe is laid back which means you feel just as comfortable in jeans, business casual or dressy.
Manager Response: We are delighted you have been able to experience our warm, relaxed yet refined ambiance.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Stayed at this property for 3 nights for a business event.  Our room faced the pool, so we didn't enjoy the view of the Pacific as we should have upgraded.  Rooms were well appointed, but not to the normal Ritz standards.  Views of the ocean from the gym were amazing and from the terrace bar/restaurant.   Staff was excellent and common areas were decorated with fresh flowers and comfortable furniture.  Very kid friendly as we brought our 2 youngest with us.  They enjoyed the heated pool, basketball court, tennis court and hot tub.  You can walk down to Salt Creek Beach easily, but not much else around the property as it mainly residential.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to sharing an ocean view room with the next time you stay with us.  It would be our pleasure!

Summary: I've stayed at several Ritz's before but this one tops its off.  Overlooking the beach set on top of a cliff the views were mesmerizing.  I stayed at the property for 4 days 3 nights.  I liked the location of my room facing the ocean so every morning waking up looking at the surf was tranquil.  The fitness center is amazing as well since each piece of cardio machine is against the windows overlooking the ocean.  Can't get any better than that.  We ended up having a cocktail reception on one of the lawn's which was nice with a full bar and heat lamps so no one gets cold.  The bar is the focal point of the hotel where everyone can meet and have a great time.  I could probably stay here and make it my home.. The rooms were big enough and had double sinks.  They have a restaurant on
Manager Response: We enjoyed having you!  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We look forward to creating more meaningful memories for you soon.

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for the first time using our Marriott points. There is only valet parking here.  There is also a $30 resort fee. We were pleasantly surprised by an upgraded OceanView room. The property and rooms are quite lovely. The room appointments were plentiful and wonderful. The bed and sheeted were luxurious.  The marble bathroom was amazing. The toiletries were wonderful. They had very nice robes in the room for us to wear. We truly felt spoiled! I think what I was most impressed with was how nice all the employees we encountered were. I expected them to be a bit snooty because of this being a wealthy property. There was no feeling of snootiness at all. We requested a late check out which was at 2:00 pm.  My husband was able to surf in the morning while I
Manager Response: Thank you for your visit!  We look forward to creating another unique and memorable experience for you soon.

Summary: The Ritz Carlton Dana Point, in Laguna Niguel California is a spectacular resort hotel. In fact of all the Ritz Carlton Resorts, at which I have stayed, this one and the one in San Juan, are my favorites. Situated right on the Pacific Ocean, with a serious spa and an Eco Adventure Center. Marble marble everywhere and lots to drink at the lobby bar, Raya, with views out to the Pacific. EnoSteak is a really good Steakhouse and California wine bar. 180 Blu is a very clever and romantic, small-plates, ocean front dining on the outside terrace, overlooking Salt Creek Beach. Market Place is the Coffee shop, RC style, and the poll has a bar, as well. The suites are magnificent, with the RC Suite clocking in at a massive 1500 sq. feet with magnificent ocean views and access to the Club
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel - where your dreams come true!  We are excited that you were able to experience our newly enhanced suite.  Isn't it spectacular?  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Please let us know if we can assist you in any way.

Summary: This is our third time visiting this incredible property. Somehow it keeps getting better every time. SPA is great. Fitness center is unreal....facing the beautiful ocean. The breakfast is ALWAYS amazing. The club lounge was very nice. Management is super quick and very fair to fix or settle any problem or issue. This property has really got it together. Even for a Ritz they still stand out, Nice tennis courts , pools and lounge chairs. You can even catch the trolley into town. Left with a nice surfboard that was auctioned for charity.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  We are delighted you purchased one of our unique surfboards in honor of Surfers Healing.  We hope you can return soon. We look forward to it.

Summary Heading: Wonderful getaway with perfect views, hospitality and location!
Summary: First of all, best mattress EVER! Great room, very nice amenities and a nice balcony with the perfect view of the coast line. Everyone was very friendly and helpful. The location is close to Laguna Beach and Dana Point, so plenty of quant shops and local restaurants to visit. Uber and Lyft are available in the area and the rates were reasonable. We had perfect weather and a fantastic time!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you!

Summary: It's a Ritz Carlton.  This was our second business trip here.  Location is amazing. Food is awesome.  Place is huge.  My suggestions--ask for a room with a view. Both times I felt like they did not want to give to us but our friends who were more persistent got upgraded.  Also, have someone show you how to use the showers in the spa.  After a relaxing spa trip, I spent 15 minutes trying to figure it out and ended up taking the coldest worst shower ever.  3 other people had same problem. Someone later said there is a trick to only turn on bottom sprayers and wait a few minutes AND you cannot use all shower heads at once---really!  But it is the Ritz!
Manager Response: We are glad to hear you had another successful conference at our resort!  It was a pleasure to have you with us again.  We hope we are the perfect hotel for you for either business or leisure needs, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: This Rtiz Carlton is right on the coast at Laguna Niguel. My room had breathtaking views of the ocean. I loved the roar of the waves and watching the surfers. This is surfers paradise. The hotel has a gold course. The rooms are beautiful. The hotel is decorated in colorful flowers whose color scheme is changed every three days. We were there as part of a conference and everyone enjoyed it. I wish they had complimentary coffee at the front desk in the morning when you return from a walk. They only have one small pot until 6am when their cafe opens and they have coffee for sale. Every other Ritz that I stayed at had complimentary coffee.Ask for a room with an ocean view!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: This is in my top 2 places that I have ever stayed. Loved the room location, overlooking the water. The concierge floor is amazing. Not the cheapest place to stay (1500.00 per night when I stayed there), but honestly the best!
Manager Response: Thank you!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Breathtaking views, beautiful property and great service
Summary: We visited for a couple of days before heading up to LA and had an incredible time; wish we could have stayed longer. We will be back.  The location is just phenomenal.  All the views of the ocean from this cliffside resort are mesmerizing, but the fire pit room we had was the bomb.  Yes you may have some interlopers outside in the chairs overlooking the ocean, but aside from a short period of time we mostly had the area to ourselves.  The sunset here cannot be beaten - pictures do not do it justice.  You can even order food and drinks from the chairs.  Once the sun went down we really enjoyed the fire pit.  Very cool.    The rooms have been recently renovated and the decor matches the overall character of the resort much better than the Ritz Naples, which also recently
Manager Response: We are delighted you noticed even the smallest of details.  We strive to ensure every inch of our property is used efficiently and beautifully.  The look and feel of the resort compliments our surroundings with subtle hints of the ocean and Mother Nature.  Our ladies and gentlemen truly enjoy servicing our guests and we enjoy hearing that you felt the same.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  May we suggest a summer visit?  It is a wonderful time to be a guest.

Summary: We came for a conference.  As one of just a few families, we were a little nervous with how we would be treated upon arriving with children.  Granted, our kids are older and very well-behaved but upon walking into the lobby, being greeted by several staff, we felt comfortable and less worried.  Our conceirege was very kind and offered us a room with a fire pit and a view of the ocean.  He also sent us a complimentary sleeve of graham crackers, chocolates and marshmallows directly to our room to help make the children more comfortable.  He also made sure that we had close proximenty to the pool and that we knew how to find the path to the beach - and to our conference rooms the following day.  The room was perfect!  Spacious, small fridge and even had enough luggage racks for us
Manager Response: Thank you for your delightful comments.  Nothing means more to our ladies and gentlemen then knowing our valuable guests have enjoyed a true Ritz-Carlton experience.  Welcome home!

Summary: We were on business North of this place and looking for a different beach view. Well this is THE place to go!! The ocean/beach view is fantastic as the hotel sits on a bluff overlooking the beach!! FYI, The hotel policy will not offer free upgrade to the club level rooms. The standard rooms are done to the Ritz standard (very nice), but ours was a little small. The room's balcony overlooked the grounds to the left and the beach/ocean below. FANTASTIC!!! There was a wedding on the grounds with the ocean backdrop. That all looked to have gone well. There is an onsite outdoor cafe that we dine. It was very relaxing and super views as it also overlooks the ocean. The indoor restaurant has tables next to a wall of windows that also overlooks the ocean(we did not dine there) Hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a try!  We enjoyed having you.  We look forward to welcoming you back and spoiling you with another unique and memorable experience.

Summary Heading: An elegant hotel with sweeping ocean views
Summary: The hotel itself is beautiful but what makes this property so special are the views and the outdoor spaces that overlook the ocean.  The service is very good, with a special shout out to the room service folks who were so prompt and pleasant.  The food is quite good but expensive.  Overall an excellent place to stay. My one caveat is that a Ritz Carlton used to feel like a very special place to stay -- where they knew your name when you arrived -- and while still a really nice stay at a very nice hotel -- that special feeling no longer exists.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you.  We agree with you that our location is phenomenal!  We value your loyalty and promise to always recognize you when you return.  In fact, we would welcome the opportunity to speak with you so that we may update your profile with all of your likes/dislikes.  Thank you!

Summary: We were lucky enough to stay here again this past December.  It is a wonderful place that we come back to every year.  It is decorated for Christmas in bright purples and silver.  There is a terrific display of gingerbread and candies made up by the chefs.  The staff here are some of the best that I have ever come across in the industry.  I couldn't find a bad thing to say about any of them.  Always professional, always helpful and always friendly.  Our room was spotlessly clean and well appointed.  We were at the end of a long hall overlooking the pool this year and found that the room was very quiet and peaceful.  I used the spa every day -it is an oasis of calm. We enjoyed sitting in the lobby with a drink at night by the cozy fireplace. Free yoga classes every day that I
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty!  We always enjoy having you and creating a unique experience for you each time you visit us.  Come back soon!

Summary Heading: Fine elegance with an unbeatable view
Summary: This hotel has all the amenities and service you expect from the Ritz Carlton with the added bonus of location in Southern California.  It is a little out of the way but perfect for couples or celebrations.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  We are delighted you chose The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel as your luxury experience.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I guess, maybe, my expectations were pretty high. I visited recently for a conference and knew I was getting a deal on the rooms - so was expecting an A+++++ experience for what the rooms regular prices were.  My check-in experience was not great - as the attendant was not very accommodating when there were issues with my reservation. I had not personally made the reservation - someone at my work had made the reservations for everyone traveling to this conference. I found out later that there were others who had a troubled experience at check-in. I shook it off as I was tired after a long day of travel and needed to get something to eat.  I ordered room service and that was very nice - the attendant who brought my food was extremely helpful and even went to get extra ice for me.
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback.  We greatly appreciate it and use it constructively.  We are delighted that your overall conference experience was a wonderful one and we hope to welcome you back soon whether it be for business or leisure.  If we can assist you in any way, please feel free to contact our Executive Offices at (949) 240-2000.

Summary: GOOD: cool beach  great running trails  great gym  nice people good bar snacks   LESS SO: food was really good and prices not too bad.   what I didn't expect was 5+ tea and coffee.  drink water.    this is a personal thing.   no flat pillows option.   neck pain from sleeping on 9 inch tall pillows.  asked for different option, was told they'd be brought down and never got them.  don't think they'd have been any better.   room 1523 is next to the hotel washing machine.   noisy and vibrations all morning.
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback.  We greatly appreciate it, and if you have a moment to contact our Resort Services team at (949) 240-2000 it would be extremely helpful so we can ensure all of your preferences are entered into our database so each of your visits are personal and exceptional. Thank you!

Summary: Instead ion the relatives for the holidays we went to the Ritz.  We went to Disneyland for a full day (about 30 minutes away) way to cold but that is another review).  This Ritz is super child friendly, the guest where all very social, we made new friends and had a REALLY relaxing time.    We reserved a base room (apparently everyone reserves base rooms) and we where promptly sold an upgrade at check in.  I'm glad we upgraded the suites are fabulous about 1300 sq ft but only face the inner court yards.  If you want a ocean view you have to go into smaller room (still plenty big).  We will definitely be back this is a much better approach to the Disneyland experience!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are delighted you enjoyed your trip to Southern California and Disneyland.  It is indeed a magical place! We look forward to welcoming you and your family back soon for another unique and memorable experience.

Summary: What an amazing location and place for our 3 day romantic weekend. We loved the fire pit balcony room, overlooking the Cliffside and beach views. The lobby and grounds were simply beautiful. Will for sure go back
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel!  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary: Best view...beach's are woow .  Romantic place for honeymoon..highly recommended for relaxation and a weekend getaway..rooms and breakfast are good..breath taking gym view and amazing spa...staff are nice.but service takes a bit of time to reach your room.over all good experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  We hope you had a chance to truly unwind, relax, and enjoy the wonderful scenery Mother Nature has given us.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Looking for a relaxing couples retreat? Go somewhere else.
Summary: I booked four nights at the Ritz to celebrate my wife's birthday and to spoil her with a 5 star experience. We have stayed at many luxury properties around the world and this was by far the most disappointing. I would like to think we are not extremely high maintenance and we rarely complain. But given the expectations we had (and prices we paid), we checked out a day early and will not be returning.  I will start with the PROs:  - The views. Simply put, there are likely few other hotels in the world that can compete with this location.  - The service. We've had no issue with the staff. Everyone was friendly and attentive....nothing spectacular but more than adequate.  And now the CONs: - Paper thin walls. We were kept up (literally) all night by two sets of neighbors. You can
Manager Response: On behalf of our executive committee and all our ladies and gentlemen, we thank you very much for your detailed feedback.  We have taken it seriously and shared it with our leadership team.  We strive to always maintain the finest facilities and exceptional service and are surprised and disappointed that you may have not experienced our true Ritz-Carlton mystique.  It appears your stay with us was during a very popular time and we hope you will consider joining us again during a slower occupancy period. Please contact our office directly and we will personally oversee your future visit.  We have man enhancements coming this year and we can't wait to share them with you.  Thank you again for posting your review.

Summary: Could have rewritten the previous reviewer's review. Stayed at the same time over New Years. Unlike the previous reviewer - who seems to accept average service because of the busy holiday - I do not. The busy holiday weekend included a healthy increase in the room rate - that increase should be used to ensure the level of service is not compromised as it certainly was  -or perhaps this locations service is always sub par.  Service issues - not huge deals but not reflective of the room cost and associated service fees:  Valet - for the valet and parking cost there should be a valet to assist you when you drive up and one to get your car that you can see within minutes. Small things that add up even if we had no place to we had to be - deliver on service you promise.  Bellman -
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your detailed feedback.  We greatly appreciate it.  On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we sincerely apologize if your experience with us with anything less than exceptional.  Our highest mission is to provide the finest of personal service and facilities.  We would welcome the opportunity to speak with your further to learn more about our service failures and how we can ensure your next Ritz-Carlton experience is a true Ritz-Carlton experience.  Please contact our Hotel Manager at your convenience.  He can be reached in the Executive Office at (949) 240-2000.  We hope to have the chance to welcome you back so we may provide you with the level of service you have become accustomed to and deserve.

Summary: We have stayed at many different Ritz Carlton properties over the past 20 years and have come to expect a standard of luxury.  Unfortunately, this property was a disappointment.  The location is spectacular - on the bluffs overlooking the ocean - with amazing views and sunsets but the property is tired.  We were fortunate to be upgraded to an oceanfront room but it was small and really showed its wear and tear.  Even the door to the room was pretty banged up.    The outdoor holiday decorations were as expected - beautiful and tasteful.  Unfortunately, the indoor decor was average.  The Space Age holiday confection was quite unattractive and if there weren't explanations you really wouldn't know what you were looking it.   The concept was interesting but execution fell short.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your busy schedule to provide your feedback.  We value your loyalty. We have some wonderful enhancements coming soon in 2016 and we can't wait to welcome you back so you can experience them.  If we can answer any questions for you, please contact our office direct.  We would love to hear from you!

Summary: We come to stay here every year or every other year.  It is a nice place to escape to for some pampering close to home.  The restaurant is excellent.  We tend to stay on the Club Level which is wonderful, our four girls are spoiled by it.  The food on this level is excellent.  The kids love the free candy.  The pool is large and never crowded.  We enjoy the tennis courts as well.
Manager Response: We enjoy having you and your family with us each time and we promise to continue to "wow" you each time!  Thank you for your loyalty.  Please feel free to contact our office directly if we can assist you.

Summary: Came between Christmas and New Year's to celebrate 50th.  Had reservation made with points but was able to upgrade to Club level on the 4th floor (Thank you Jonathan!) and ended up with Coastal View room which was lovely.  Highly recommend the Club level not just for the exceptional service (service was amazing throughout hotel) but the complimentary food and drink, 16 jars of candy for the kids as well as a club room complete with gas fireplace and completely renovated rooms.  We had a king bed room and had a roll-away for our daughter.  Marble bathroom had double sinks and a tub/shower combo.  Balcony had two chairs and a table.  Sunset was amazing from the main level as they had adirondack chairs and some couches and tables set up on the lawn.  Had lunch at Raya which was
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you and your family join us during the holiday season!  We are delighted you enjoyed your unique and memorable experience.  We agree with you that our location is phenomenal and our ladies and gentlemen as well.  We hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Spectacular location, beautiful common areas, dated rooms, very disappointing service
Summary: We typically travel to the Dana Point area at Christmas time for a multi-generational family vacation. In the past we have stayed at the St. Regis, but in view of that hotel’s extensive renovations this year, we decided to try the RC instead, and booked several rooms. We had a nice time in the area, but were disappointed with many aspects of our stay at this RC property, particularly at this high end price-point. All-in-rate (room, resort fee, parking fee, tax) was around $800 USD /room/night.  The hotel’s location on the cliff directly above the ocean, with its stunning ocean and beach views, is its key strength. Hotel common areas are large, spacious, and attractively decorated. Standard room layout has small balcony area. Inside the room is an enclosed bar area and
Manager Response: On behalf of our executive committee and all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for providing your detailed feedback.  Our highest mission is to provide exceptional luxury experiences and we are very disappointed to read your comments.  We have shared your feedback with all of our leadership team and are very sorry to have let you down.  This is truly not the Ritz-Carlton experience we normally provide.  We are here for you, our valued customer and want to ensure you feel very good about staying with us.  If you do decide to visit the resort again, please contact our Hotel Manager directly at (949) 240-2000 and we will ensure we are back on track for your next stay.  Thank you again for taking the time to share.

Summary Heading: Couple of fun nights with my sweetie
Summary: We have visited Orange County many times and wanted to stay at the Ritz- Carlton. It was lovely to just chill out and enjoy California's best. Our next door neighbors however spoke very loudly or the walls were thinner than I had expected. So our first night was not a grand experience as I had hoped. We did speak to the front desk and they compensated us for our displeasure. It was a sure way to keep me satisfied as I like to stay at the Mandarin-Oriental Hotels, prefer boutique brand hotels and other five star resorts when I travel. We dined at the hotel and found the food to be delicious and prepared to our tastes. The most spectacular part of our brief stay was watching the sun set while enjoying a lovely bottle of bubbly and just chilling out. Our room was comfortable, did
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed your overall experience at the resort!  The next time you stay with us, we would love to have you stay in one of our newly renovated suites in which the tub/shower combo has been eliminated.  We would be happy to assist you personally with your future reservations at (949) 240-2000.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary Heading: Not everything is up to standard
Summary: Let me mention what is not up to a standard of a hotel in this category (and price)  - slippers are not provided, bring your own if you do not want to go barefoot on the carpet. - chair had stains and pen markings - water did not run fast enough from the shower tub, and as a result you have to leave the shower quickly and hope not to get anything from the water that accumulates in the tub. -everything else is pretty much an average for this category of hotel, nothing outstanding other than the view if you get an ocean view room.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your valuable feedback.  We welcome and act upon all of the feedback we receive.  If you would be so kind as to contact our Resort Services team at (949) 240-2000, we will ensure you always have slippers in your room when you arrive at our property or any of our sister properties worldwide.  We would enjoy knowing the room number you stayed in during your last visit so we can ensure the proper maintenance has been completed for the guest room chair and the water pressure.  Thank you!

Summary: This hotel provides a first class relaxing stay.  The pools are laid back and verdant.  The property is large and spread out.  The cliff view is superb.  Don't miss cocktail hour on the back patio to enjoy the sun setting into the pacific.  Set on a cliff overlooking the rugged coastline, nothing is more romantic.  The fireplace bar is cozy with velvet chairs and overstuffed couches to sip a drink before dinner in their excellent restaurant.  Stay in the club level and you will have fresh buffet breakfast, finger sandwiches and snacks all day long and mini deserts to take back to your room at the end of the night... not to mention free flowing wine for happy hour and beyond.  No complaints!
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing our ladies and gentlemen to create a memorable and personal experience for you!  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary: Once again we return to the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel to celebrate the new year 2016. We return from last year's trip with promise of a great stay. Well we were not disappointed, we had a beautiful ocean view room, the hotel is dog friendly. You just can't beat that beautiful Pacific Ocean view. The staff is very friendly and accommodating, things you would expect with this five-star hotel. Let's not kid each other, it's expensive here so bring your wallet, but you won't be disappointed! Please enjoy your stay.
Manager Response: It was wonderful welcoming you back for the holiday!  We promise to do our best to never disappoint you, and to create unique experiences for you.  If we may be of assistance, please do not hesitate to reach out any time.

Summary: For my Birthday, my husband took me on a 3 day getaway to the Ritz Carlton in Laguna Niguel. WOW! is the only word I can think of that sums up how I feel about this beautiful place. Starting with the beautiful holiday decor in the hotel to the impeccable service and warmth felt from all staff members to the quality of food I was floored. I have never been treated and spoiled this way in any other venue. If you want to impress her/ him, this is your place. Absolutely the best !
Manager Response: Happy Birthday!  Thank you for choosing to celebrate this momentous occasion with our ladies and gentlemen.  We enjoyed creating a unique experience with you!

Summary Heading: A Beautiful View High on the Cliffs Over the Sea
Summary: We had the pleasure of hosting a business event at this location in early December.  The hotel, believe it or not, was under 30% occupancy during our stay according to the staff so we had the run of the place.  It is located high above Salt Creek Beach and it does take a little effort to make it down to the beach.  We hosted an event outside and were treated to an incredible sunset and some incredible food.  The staff was incredible as they were attentive to our every need.  I stayed in room 301 (I believe) which faced into a courtyard with a pool.  It was very quiet and had a balcony.  We spent time in the various bars and restaurants at the hotel and enjoyed everything that we got the chance to sample.  I would definitely consider this hotel if we have another event here in
Manager Response: We are delighted your business meetings were a huge success.  Our ladies and gentlemen strive to create unique and memorable experiences whether our guests are visiting on business or pleasure.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: On our trip in November, we got to stay on the Club level -- and it was spectacular.  The food, the service, the accommodations, the staff...all of it was superior.  The facility was beautiful, too.  We loved the pool area, and we made daily access to the walking trail.  The view of the coast line and the sunsets were gorgeous.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  We are delighted you enjoyed our exclusive Club Level experience and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Thank you for posting your comments about the resort.

Summary Heading: Horrible service. Old hotel with snotty staff
Summary: I never write reviews but my very uncomfortable check-in experience at this hotel is worth sharing. I have stayed at dozens of American Express Fine Hotels & Resort hotels all over the world but never had such horrible experience. Jonathan from the  front desk refused to execute the complimentary upgrade when there are many available rooms, instead he tried to "force sell" the upgrades available. The on spot aggressive upgrade sales experience felt like I wasn't a guest to begin with. We woke up at 4am to travel and when we got to the hotel at 10am this sneaky sales person attitude is what I had to deal with. I was told that the upgraded club level rooms are available to purchase at $300-$1500/night. I kindly refused and ask if we could upgrade to the initial complimentary
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience on TripAdvisor.  We are saddened to read about such a negative visit, and it is certainly not indicative of our normal luxury service.  On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we apologize for having let you down.  We hope you were able to share your frustration with one of our many leaders at that time to ensure we made every attempt to turn the situation into a positive and memorable one for you.  If you did not have the opportunity to do so, we would welcome that to happen now.  If you could contact our Hotel Manager at your convenience, we are most certain we can make this right.  Our Hotel Manager can be reached by phoning the Executive Office at (949) 240-2000.  Thank you for your time!

Summary Heading: I've always wanted to stay the the Ritz Laguna Niguel
Summary: I made reservations for the RC Laguna Niguel through American Express Fine Hotels and Resorts, which offers really great amenities.  The stay at Laguna Niguel would be my 16 RC property, so easy to compare and contrast to other RC properties.  Arrival was standard, with a wonderful greeting by the valet staff.  Orion directed us to the front desk for check-in.  At checkin we were greeted, but the young lady didn't seem very familiar with us, the FHR package or the fact we had status with Ritz Rewards.  She promptly got us checked into our room and then I asked about the FHR upgrade (one room category).  She said it would be an additional charge and then I explained it was part of the AMEX package.  She said she could upgrade me based on my Ritz Rewards status.  Ultimately, we
Manager Response: Thank you for your very detailed feedback.  We greatly appreciate it and have shared it with our team appropriately.  Our guests' comments really do help us in our continuing efforts to be the worldwide leader in luxury experiences.  We are delighted you enjoyed your overall visit with us and we thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel during our very popular holiday season.  You are absolutely correct in that your Front Desk experience was certainly not to our standard and we promise not to let that happen again.  Your loyalty to our brand is of utmost importance to us and we hope you will allow us a chance regain your confidence.  If you decide to stay with us again, please place your reservation directly with our Hotel Manager who will oversee every aspect of your stay.  He can be reached in the Executive Office at (949) 240-2000.  Thank you again for staying with us and providing your comments.

Summary: Our family visited the resort in 2012 and my daughter stopped there on her honeymoon trip. This hotel is amazing with unbelievable coastal views. Food is excellent and the pools are great. One of our favorite resorts ! Highly reccommend.
Manager Response: Your loyalty means the world to us and we promise to always provide unique, memorable and personal experiences for you and your family!

Summary: This is our 4th visit to the Ritz at Dana Point.  We simply LOVE this Ritz.  Diane always goes above and beyond to make our stay extra special, thank you!!  The kids were able to bake in the chef's kitchen!!  This is something they will always remember!  That alone, is priceless!  Thank you Diane, Penni, and Mercedes for going the extra mile.  See you next summer!
Manager Response: We enjoyed welcoming you "home" again!  Diane, Penni and Mercedes loved seeing their names in lights, thank you.  We are already planning surprises for you this summer.  See you soon!

Summary: I had such a nice chat with Karyssa at the front desk about a week before our trip,but upon arrival the place was cold, literally and figuratively. It was Christmas night at 10pm after a cross country flight and the front desk clerk wouldn't let me check-in because my husband was in the car out front dealing with luggage and two sleeping kids. Your husband's name is on the reservation, he said, only he can check you in. "Sexist" said my half-awake 11 year old under her breath. The rooms were very nice but every staff member we've encountered is cold and unfriendly. Our kids even think we should leave early and stay elsewhere. It seems a bit snotty to say the Ritz isn't nice, but it has a totally different feel than other hotels in the chain. We left to eat because the breakfast
Manager Response: Oh goodness this review greatly upset us.  This is definitely not indicative of our normal execution.  Would you be so kind as to contact our Hotel Manager at your earliest convenience?  We need to hear more and make this right for you!  Thank you very much for your assistance.  He can be reached in the Executive Office at (949) 240-2000.

Summary: I stayed here with my wife for a few nights in May for a good friend’s wedding. Overall had a great experience.  Hotel is beautifully located on a bluff overlooking the Pacific Ocean. Banquet facilities are lovely as well. The physical property is well-appointed to Ritz standards, as one would expect. The amenities are typical too.   The only odd thing about this hotel is that it’s clearly been added onto several times. The result is a very large hotel that has a choppy layout. There’s a slightly confusing central area that’s supposed to feel like a lobby but doesn’t.   Also, nowhere to get a drink on the property after midnight, which seems a bit silly to me.   Overall, had a great experience at this place.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your feedback.  It is taken constructively and we appreciate your thoughts.  We have definitely tried to utilize every inch of space of this incredible coastline space that we are so fortunate to be located on.  We feel very proud that we have such a fantastic property and wonderful guests after 31 years!  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary Heading: Cordiality and fine cuisine are first rate
Summary: The smile at the door never ceases -- through housekeeping, food service and geniality while ambling through the inviting grounds and breath-taking ocean views. The food at Raya and the Marketplace exceeds expectations. A couple of improvements would heighten the experience -- the room furnishings are a tad old, especially the carpeting. The hallways are long and drafty. During a two-day visit, a cleaning glove and an unretrieved food cart sat in the hallways. And the scent of solvent hung in the air. Too bad. Look forward to another visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for your gracious comments regarding our ladies and gentlemen.  They truly enjoy ensuring our guests have incredible memories to take home with them.  We appreciate your feedback regarding our room furnishings and the lack of debris removal from your hallway.  You are absolutely correct this should never be the case.  We will use your example with our team in hopes of ceasing this lapse of service in the future. Thank you for sharing!  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon for another exceptional experience.

Summary: It's been a year since my friend Marybeth and I sat at a table overlookig the ocean inhaling the soothing deliciousness of a Christmas Tea at the Ritz Carlton in Laguna Niguel. The memory tantalizes still. First a Bellini, followed by a delicious array of unique tea sandwiches and tea of our individutal choice. Watching the surfers, joggers and others enjoying the peace of the ocean on a day when the sun covered the beach with its warm glow was like being in a movie theater. Not to many people, but each enjoying the specialness of the day. At our table we watched the small figures from up high, munching happily on our repast. Afterwards, back home the peace and serenity of the afternoon lingered well into the night.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your lovely comments about your experience at the resort.  We hope to welcome you back this holiday season.  Please let us know if you need any information or reservations.  We are always delighted to assist you.

Summary: I stayed here (first time) for two nights over Thanksgiving.  Deciding to splurge a little, I booked a Fireside Ocean View room (patio has a fire pit which lights with the flick of a switch).  The room was amazing, and my stay was very relaxing overall, well worth the extra $$ over the standard room.  In addition to the comfy bed and glamorous bathroom with two sinks (lots of counter space!), I appreciated the unobtrusive fridge (hidden behind a mirrored wall) and the easy-to-operate thermostat.  Aside form occupying prime oceanfront property that dazzles, the Ritz rates 5-stars in terms of staff effort to make sure everything is up to par with top resort hotel ratings.  Everyone from the front desk personnel to the house cleaning staff acknowledged me every time I walked by.  I
Manager Response: Thank you for the lovely review of the resort.  Our highest mission is to ensure you are always completely satisfied.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon and creating another unique, memorable and personal experience for you.  Please feel free to reach out directly should you need any assistance.

Summary: My daughter and I recently stayed here for a fun getaway. We were visiting friends in the area and decided to splurge by staying at this 5 star hotel which was supposed to be a real treat.  The pros: Very comfortable beds and bedding, a beautiful and quiet room. The room was clean and the turndown service was wonderful.  The view from the bar and restaurant is wonderful.  The cons: Valet parking was annoying to say the least. We had to wait in a 40 minute line on Friday night just trying to get back to the hotel. I guess there was a holiday party at the hotel so most people in the line were visitors, not paying guests. I would have never left the hotel on Friday evening had I known how long it would take to get back in.  The breakfast food at Raya restaurant was extremely
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience.  We are delighted you and your daughter chose to stay with us and we hope you both took home some wonderful memories of your time together. We are so sorry you didn't enjoy RAYA.  We hope you were able to provide your feedback to our manager at that time so we could have made it right for you at that time.  If you did not have the chance, please give us a call directly so we may ensure your complete satisfaction.  In addition, anytime you visit us, we are more than happy to expedite the parking of your vehicle.  It would be our pleasure!

Summary: The property is amazing!  The view from our room was truly beautiful.  The room itself was small but hey its Laguna and every square foot is expensive . . . but at almost $1,300 a night I would have expected a room large enough that we didn't have to move chairs and a table around to get the door open to our porch.  While I can accept the small room I do have to comment on housekeeping.  We were not ready to leave our room one morning when they knocked so we told them we would be out in about an hour and they said they would return.  They never returned and at almost 9pm that night we called and someone offered to run clean towels down to us.  The onsite restaurant was also a disappointment.  We told the hostess we were a party of 2 for lunch.  She was having a conversation with
Manager Response: Thank you very much for providing your detailed feedback.  We have taken it very seriously and appreciate you taking the time to provide it.  Of course, we are very disappointed that you did not have a completely wonderful experience and we would enjoy the opportunity to recreate your stay with us.  We want you to have only the fondest of memories from our resort and staff.  Please contact the Executive Office to further discuss your previous visit.  Thank you!

Summary: My husband and I spent an amazing four nights and five days at this amazing hotel.  We came to witness our friends getting married.  Our experience was unforgettable. From the views to the hospitality of the staff we were blessed with it all.   1) room- our room had a pool view.  clean and roomy.  Loved that they always supply water with turn down service. Love the slippers, robes and chocolates at turn down.   2) gym- one of the best I've used in a hotel. Great view. Loved the machines. Appeared new and clean. Plenty of cardio machine, weights, weight machines, kettle bells and more.  Someone was always in there cleaning. They provide disposal ear phones if you had forgotten yours, cold wet towels, dry towels, and plenty of bottled water.   3) the grounds- amazing views and
Manager Response: How fun to have you experience your own personal memories, but also your friends'.  We enjoyed having you all and can't wait for you to return!

Summary Heading: Priceless Location with a Few Bumps
Summary: As you sit on the terrace perched above the crashing surf in shirt sleeves, feeling the warmth of the sun's last rays as it plunges toward the sea's horizon for a perfect December sunset, drinking a well-crafted cocktail and munching on ahi appetizers while the glitterati around you adjust their expensive sunglasses and casually brush their coiffed locks out of their eyes in a tug of war with the breeze, it's hard to imagine a better venue. This is a reasonably posh place that occupies a near-perfect setting, with steps down to a fantastic beach and views that extend up the coast.  The rooms are fitted with the comfortable beds, skin-coddling linens and marble-crusted bathrooms that one expects from the brand. My upper floor ocean-view room had a balcony for taking in the
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you with us and we hope you choose to return soon.  Thank you for your wonderful feedback!

Summary Heading: Everything a Ritz hotel should be
Summary: First,  the location of this hotel is amazing,  definitely go out for a walk along the beach or park system path. The hotel is sprawling and my room was far away,  but i didn't mind personally. My room was beautiful with a gorgeous bathroom I would like to bring home.  The staff was very helpful and consistent with the Ritz brand.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you with us and we hope you can join us again very soon!  If we can assist you in any way, please feel free to contact us any time.

Summary: Stayed 2 nights here in October 2015. Left from LA on Fri afternoon, and its probably the worst time to drive out of LA. The traffic was bad and took about 2 hours to reach. But once at the Ritz, everything was great! Its a nice property right on the cliff overlooking the beautiful Pacific ocean. The staff is very courteous and efficient. Checkin was smooth, and so was the welcome drink of champagne! Rooms are large and mine was overlooking the lawn and to the left was the view lovely blue ocean. The property is quite large and well maintained. Food was excellent. Don't think the Ritz would give any reason to complain.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, it was a pleasure having you with us!  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We look forward to being of service to you again soon.

Summary: St Regis is under renovation so I returned to the Ritz. Nice surprise. Looks great and service is top notch. Love the new fire place coffee room to watch football on big screen.  Dusted off the formerly stuffy lobby and made it family fun. Views off the outdoor cafe in main level is breathtaking.  Rooms are smaller than St Regis and similarly decorated but hard to decide which place is more deluxe.  For views the Ritz wins by far. Facility wise it is close.
Manager Response: Thank you for your return visit!  We are delighted you enjoyed your experience and we hope you choose The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel's exemplary service and facilities again in the near future.

Summary: My husband and I spent a weekend at the Ritz in October.  It was heaven! We had the most beautiful room with a balcony overlooking the ocean.  We never left the hotel.  The restaurants were fabulous, service impeccable, sunsets breathtaking. We were greeted by everyone from the front desk to housekeeping with a smile and the same question, "Can I help you?" We highly recommend you find a way to spend at least one night at the Ritz Dana Point.  It will be one of your finest memories.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing to stay with us.  We enjoyed creating a unique, personal, and memorable experience for you.  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary Heading: So this is how the other half lives...
Summary: ...and I was mostly impressed.  Was here for a business conference, got a 'reasonable' rate.  Was amazed with the views of the pacific, the easy access to the beach, the incredible views of the area...  The amazing cars parked out front...  It's remarkable.  Not cheap, but remarkable.  Rooms were comfortable, but not luxurious.     High point was watching sea animals just off shore, and the surfers out from sun-up to sun-down.  Recommended, dude.
Manager Response: We are so glad you were able to experience our resort and the Southern California coastline all the way from Germany!  Thank you for staying with us.  We look forward to welcoming you one day soon

Summary: I was lucky enough to stay at the Ritz with my daughter over the columbus day weekend.  What a gorgeous spot in a gorgeous hotel…although it does come with a price to match!  So many things to like: The service at the front desk was very efficient and we were even allowed to check in a bit early.  We paid to upgrade to an ocean front room and it had the most spectacular views!  A special shout out goes to the concierge service and how well they took care of booking our dinners and our excursion to Catalina island. The meal we had at Raya was yummy and I highly suggest the lobster tacos. We also at at Enosteak.  The food was good there as well, but the Raya and it's views are the way to go!    A couple of things to make note of: Although this is a beach hotel, access to the beach
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  We are delighted you enjoyed your experience here and that our ladies and gentlemen created some wonderful memories for you.  Thank you for your detailed feedback.  We really appreciate it.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: During our stay at the Ritz-Carlton, we experienced several issues, but the staff won our hearts with their dedication to making things right.  We checked in and upgraded to an ocean view room.  Unfortunately, we were put in a room that was so close to the outdoor rooftop bar that we had no privacy.  Sitting on our balcony was like being part of the table next to us.  When we called to ask for another room, we got moved right away and the bellman who helped us was wonderful.  Later, when someone on a balcony above us had an accident and covered our patio with broken glass, the hotel manager himself inspected the situation and ensured that everything was cleaned up.    The property itself is situated above a beautiful beach, and the hotel grounds are well maintained.  The spa and
Manager Response: It is great to hear that our ladies and gentlemen recovered promptly from the issues  you experienced and made everything right for you.  It is our highest mission to ensure all of our guests depart the resort with wonderful and unique memories. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary: The property was beautiful.  The only reason I didn't give 5 stars was because room service was tremendously overpriced and the rooms are a bit dated.  Otherwise, it was a wonderful experience with very helpful and gracious staff.  Location was amazing and the rooms facing the ocean had amazing sunset views.  Great business trip that we turned into a holiday.
Manager Response: We are delighted you had the opportunity to experience our resort even for business.  We hope you return in the near future for a leisure visit.  Thank you for your feedback.  It is very helpful!

Summary Heading: Meh...stay at the Montage Laguna Beach up the street
Summary: Let me first explain a 3 star for a usually top notch property.  I am rating this versus other 5 star accommodations...and other Ritz properties I have stayed at.  This one is the most disappointing.  From the hotel, to the staff, to the amenities...all in all...this one lacks the requisite 5 star experience.  My recommendation...stay at the Montage Laguna Beach up the street.  Much nicer property, location, staff, amenities, etc., etc.  Of course...the Ritz is located in a beautiful location.  But...you wouldn't know that unless you have a room facing the ocean.  You get what you pay for....so don't stay in a resort view room.  In fact, if you stay in one of those...use the pools...don't use the restaurants...you may never see the ocean.  The hotel has an antiquated layout with
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing your detailed feedback.  We have shared it with our management team and have taken it positively and constructively.  We hope you were able to speak with one of our leaders during your stay so we could assist you at that time and ensure your visit was exceptional.  If you would like to share more with us, please contact our Executive Office and we will be delighted to speak with you.  It is our desire that every guest departs our resort with unique and personal memories, and that they return in the future.

Summary: Service and location cannot be beat! I always stay on the club level- food is always available and the bar is open. The club floor is private with it's own elevator and concierge. I love the Ritz Laguna as much as I love the Montage and that's saying something!
Manager Response: It is always a privilege to have you stay with us.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We couldn't agree with you more that our exclusive Club Level experience is very special.  Our team enjoys creating unique and personal memories for all of our guests.  We look forward to welcoming you to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: My wife and I stay at the Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel at least once a year for a recurring conference I attend for my work. My wife enjoys the mini-vacation while I am in meetings and we typically extend our stay by a night or two for leisure. I have stayed at several other Ritz-Carlton properties, and while all are nice, this particular hotel seems to even surpass RC's high service standards. Every staff member (valets, bellhops, front desk, concierge, restaurant staff, etc.) truly seems dedicated to creating a pleasant experience for guests. It is unbelievable how consistent they are in their delivery - and it always seems 100% genuine.  Top notch. The hotel grounds and the property's location atop the bluff/cliff are simply beautiful. The rooms are standard RC fare - perfectly
Manager Response: It is always a pleasure having you with us!  Thank you for your thorough review of the resort.  We always enjoying our guests feedback and take it seriously.  We have many enhancements forthcoming in 2016 that we are so excited to share with you and all our guests.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The hotel is in a beautiful location, directly on the beach with a stunning view of the ocean, our room was perfect, a king size bed and a sofa bed for our kids. The bathroom was huge and we also had a spectacular terrace. Simply perfect !!
Manager Response: It was wonderful having you!  Will you be returning soon?

Summary: One of my favorite west coast hotels.  The hotel property is intimate, and is just the right size -- not too small and not to large.   The view of the coast from the property is amazing.   I have been visiting this property for the last 25 years (dinners, stays, conferences, etc.).   The rooms are very nice, the atmosphere is awesome, and the dining is delicious.  My one suggestion that I advised management about is the need to improve their booking reservation system specific to AAA rates.  For some odd reason, the hotel is unable to electronically verify my AAA number although they can verify my credit card in advance.  Because the hotel cannot electronically verify my AAA number in advance, I learned that their policy requires a hard copy of the card at the time of
Manager Response: First, allow us to thank you for your loyalty over the past 25 years.  You are a valuable part of our family and we enjoy each and every time you come.  You bring up a very valid point and we certainly do want this process to be streamlined and effortless moving forward. We have taken your feedback to our executive team and will work to improve the process.  Thank you again for taking the time to let us know!

Summary: My wife and I decided to spend last weekend at the beach and so we booked a garden view room at the Ritz, which was the nicest they had available on line with a wheelchair roll in shower (which my wife needs).  We arrived early, and the assistant at the front desk said she was going to upgrade us to a coastline view room.  I told her that was fine as long as the room had a separate roll in or walk in shower.  She frowned, and asked if we could give her a few minutes and she would get us an upgrade that worked for us.  I told her that was fine also as we were early anyway. We went outside to enjoy the ocean view from the cliff at the back of the resort, then went to have a drink at the bar near the pool. We returned to the front desk after a call and were told they were upgrading
Manager Response: It was such a pleasure having you join us for your last minute stay-cation!  We enjoyed surprising you and we look forward to many more wonderful memories with you in the future.

Summary: The location is priceless.  Situated on a high bluff facing the beach and Pacific Ocean.  Beautiful sunsets.  Clean spacious rooms.  Hotel was very crowded.  Pool staff attentive.  Wonderful meals by the pool.    The tennis courts were poorly monitored.  Many kids playing without the requisite tennis sneakers, which can mar the court.  No towels or water.  A bit disappointed by this.
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback.  We greatly appreciate it and we understand.  We hope you enjoyed your overall visit and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for your luxury experience.

Summary Heading: Hair Conditioner, hair conditioner, hair conditioner!
Summary: I had a number of issues with my stay at this hotel over the past four days. Let me start by saying that I've been staying at this property for about 20 years or so and really haven't had any problems up until now. Of course its quite elegant and charming to be there, the room had a delightful view of the ocean coupled with it being neat, clean and very spacious--of course as expected from a Ritz. However, there were also many troubling concerns as well! For example, when house keeping made up my room (twice daily) they were obsessed with leaving what appeared to be COUNTLESS tiny squeeze plastic bottles of CONDITIONER with each visit. Shampo, body location, shower gell, etc was lacking but you could count on crazy amounts of useless conditioner, of which I don't even  use. On
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your detailed feedback.  We greatly appreciate it!  We certainly hope you enjoyed your overall experience at the resort, and that you had an opportunity to discuss your concerns with our leadership team while on property.  We would also be delighted to further speak with you if you could call us direct.  We want to ensure you are fully satisfied and will return soon.  We would like to secure all of your preferences so that the next time you stay with us, everything is perfect!  Thank you again for taking the time to post your review and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: This hotel has it right, they highlight the beautiful, unobstructed views of the Pacific at every chance. The bar, restaurant, and accommodations.  I loved the fact that I could sit on my own balcony and watch the surfers in the morning and throughout the day.  The beds are comfortable, the bathrooms are amazing and stately and the entire vibe is luxury relaxed.   I happened to run into a famous actor in the bar, and because the atmosphere is so down to earth yet comfortable, he was relaxed and we had a chance to actually speak for a moment.   Bonus!   Tip:  take an Uber to the property from SNA  - it was cheaper than a taxi by more than $50.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great tips!  We hope to welcome you back again very soon.

Summary: I have stayed at several Ritz-Carlton properties. This was the first to disappoint.  When we arrived, the line was four deep and there was one person working at the desk. We had to wait at least 15 minutes for our turn. Once we got our turn, it took at least 15 more minutes before we were on our way. We have no idea what all the work was about.   The property is difficult to navigate - long hallways, not enough stair options for a 4 floor hotel and the stairs come out in obscure places.  The lighting in the room was inadequate. There was very little lighting and all along the edges of the room. With the placement of the outlets, it was almost impossible to iron a shirt after dark.  The AC was almost load enough to wake the dead and woke me several times each night. Further, we
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your extremely valuable feedback.  We appreciate hearing from you!  Having a beachfront property keeps us busy with continuous maintenance and enhancements, and we always want to provide you with an exceptional experience. If you wish to return to the resort in the future, please contact our Executive Office for personal assistance.  Thank you.
