Summary: We had the pleasure of staying at this resort for 3 days. The views of the ocean are amazing. The property itself also, has beautiful landscaping and scenery. It's the Ritz, so what is there to complain about?? The only 'glitch' I found is getting to the beach. You are on a cliff, so obviously it takes time to walk there, and the walk back is difficult, especially with small children.
Manager Response: We enjoyed having you as our guest and hope you had an incredible experience.  It would be a pleasure to welcome you back.  If you do return, please inquire about our beach shuttle service. We are always available for rides to and from the beach, as well as setting up your beach chairs and umbrellas.

Summary: I was here on business, with a "side" ocean view room.  It was fabulous with a gorgeous balcony!  We had breakfast out there, it was such a treat!  The room itself was beautifully decorated, and had lots of different lighting-which was very nice.  The bathroom was pure marble!  Up, down, everywhere was that beautiful marble, and WOW was that tub big!  I almost thought it was a pool -- it was so DEEP.  It felt "special" to be there!  I had asked about an upgrade to an ocean view room when we arrived.  They said it was $220 MORE per night (eek!).  Honestly, the "side" ocean view was spectacular enough.  You go outside away from your room to walk on that fantastic path anyway!  It's very entertaining to be outside catching that fantastic view and in addition to that, you get to
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you here and we are glad your travels brought you to Dana Point.  We have a fantastic location and our ladies and gentlemen are eager to ensure your experience is flawless.  We look forward to welcoming you back. Surf's up!

Summary: Stayed at this hotel over a weekend in late September. Highly polished, gleaming lobby. The initial feel continues on for the rest of the hotel.  Most of the public areas have beautiful views of the coastline and the Pacific Ocean. We were fortunate it was also great weather. The dining room, inside bar and the additional outside bar offer very impressive scenery. We had one of the less expensive room with balcony which looked on to an inside courtyard with a large pool.  Not noisy at all.  Oversized room very clean, king size bed very comfortable with top of the line toiletries. I usually carry my own, so that's not that important, however the generous sized bathroom had anything one might ever need. Definitely one of the better Ritz Carlton. Great night sleep in a quiet,
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel!  We look forward to being of service to you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Perfect hotel location and perfect Sunday brunch, to boot!
Summary: While living in Orange County, CA, I spent several nights over the years for Christmas, usually Dec. 25 and 26 nights. Why not? Just a brilliant and beautiful location and view and wonderful Christmas decor throughout. Highly recommend, even as a locals' holiday getaway or any day getaway from the rush-rush of Orange County and LA...
Manager Response: We are thankful for your loyalty!  Will you be joining us this year for the holidays?  It is a wonderful time of the year to be our guest.

Summary Heading: Magnificent, breath-taking. Loved ever minute of our stay except saying, Good by.
Summary: We arrived on 10-20-15 and stayed in room 1001. We fell in love with the decor, especially the carpeting, paint color and trim and would really appreciate any information on the carpet manufacture.  The hotel services, dining and spa were wonderful and the staff was so helpful as we needed to ship toiletries from the gift shop and spa home. Only wish our stay was longer!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and enjoying our unique and subtle touches.  We would enjoy sending you some of our waterfall scent.  Contact our Executive Office and let us know if you are interested.  We hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: Beautiful views and great restaurant overlooking the ocean.     Had an issue with hotel not giving us the room we reserved for a special occasion but they upgraded us to the concierge level and made good on the room - all in all, great views in great location.
Manager Response: Thank you for celebrating your special occasion with us!  We are fortunate to have had the chance to create a memorable experience for you and we hope to welcome you back very soon.

Summary: The Staff was very helpful and respectful, however the guests staring as if African-Americans weren't and aren't expected to experience the Ritz-Carlton is  a bit too much. If I had any input in were to stay when booking a retreat, it wouldn't be there.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we value your business and hope to be of service to you again in the near future whether for business or pleasure.  We enjoyed having you experience our resort and its offerings. Thank you!

Summary Heading: Is the club floor worth the additional expense?
Summary: We returned to the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel15 years later to celebrate our anniversary with our friends and family And weren't sure if we should reserve our rooms on the club floor.  To our amazement the staff on the club floor made the additional expense well worth the it!  In every aspect the staff excelled and accommodate our needs.  Our only disappointment was our dinner at Eno's Steak Restaurant where the customer relations was so outrageous that we would never return but otherwise our memories of our wedding day were perfect.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback and happy anniversary!  Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  It was an honor to have you back.  We hope we have the chance to continue making memories for you for years to come.  However, we would like to learn more about your enoSTEAK experience.  Would you be so kind to contact our Executive Office and share more details?  Thank you.  We can be reached at (949) 240-2000.

Summary Heading: Gorgeous Hotel with Stunning Views above the Pacific
Summary: We had the opportunity to visit this hotel over spring break.  We are very frequent guests at Ritz Carlton properties all across the country and this location is high end even by RC standards.  It's absolutely gorgeous from the minute you drive up the long entryway to the hotel.  The marble lobby is stunning.  It was a bit of a "stuffy" environment though for children and my kids are extremely well traveled.  It's spot though, perched high above the Pacific is amazing.  The beach below is also very beautiful.  It is a long and very steep walk down, thank goodness they do provide transportation both to and then again from.  Overall, we very much enjoyed our time at this property, I hope someday to return.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you and we look forward to being of service to you again in the near future.  If we can assist in any way, please feel free to contact us any time at (949) 240-2000.

Summary: We stayed here for a little business and pleasure in June.  Great location as we love the OC.  The hotel is very nice an the views are great.  I had meetings in the convention center and it was really nice going outside to the view off of the cliff to the ocean.  Our room was OK, nothing special.  The fitness center has got to be one of the best of any hotel strictly for the view alone.  I was disappointed in the pool area as it was set back in the hotel and surrounded by rooms.  They missed a great opportunity to have the pool over look the ocean with a view.  The service was OK, some great some not so great which was disappointing for a Ritz as I hold them up to a higher standard than your normal Marriott or Westin.  I liked the hotel and had a good experience but I don't
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing to stay with us.  We intended for your experience to be nothing short of memorable and amazing.  If there is anything we can do for, please let us know.  We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: Hotel beautiful? Yes.  Landscape great? Certainly. Value added services? Not too good. 1. Got out of my car, no assistance unloading 2. Called a day prior and even the day of early that we were flying in from NY, long flight..No room till 4pm 3. Large pool. Surrounded by hotel with zero view of the Pacific. you're on the Pacific. Are you kidding? Pool could have been anywhere, in any State. 4, no one greets you to help in seting u your pool chair, offer some water. 5. Pool bar closes at 4 in off season.  Even though.. 6. Food services need to be ordered at pool by phone. No servers walking around helping  Sorry, for the price I am payimg for my suite and room, other high end properties close by in Laguna, for example, go above and beyond. If Ritz makes some support changes, they
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your feedback.  We have shared it with our executive team.  It is always disheartening to learn we fell short of exceeding our guests' expectations.  Of course we did not intend for you to experience any service failures.  We would welcome the opportunity to make this right for you and we hope you choose to visit us again soon for a true Ritz-Carlton experience.  Feel free to contact our Executive Office any time at (949) 240-2000.  Thank you!

Summary Heading: Great location, right on the Pacific.
Summary: I recently stayed in room 1015 from 10/19/15 to 10/23/15 for a business conference.  The best part of this large property is that it sits on a bluff over the Pacific and the views are spectacular.  The worst part of this property (at least for me) was the room.  It was small, dated, worn, smelled musty, and was located on ground level.  I know another couple I was with complained about this and were upgraded.  However, I will say that I paid a discounted rate because of the convention and was not in the room often.  The property is older; but is well maintained.  I ate some small plates at a couple of the hotels restaurants and was not impressed.  Plus, it was expensive.  However, the food served at the convention was very good.  The staff is friendly and approachable.  The
Manager Response: We enjoed welcoming you as our guest for your business travel and hope to welcome you back one day soon for a relaxing, leisure visit.  Thank you very much for letting us know about room 1015.  We have placed this room out of commission until we can ensure it is absolutely flawless.  We greatly appreciate your feedback, thank you!  If we can be of assistance, please feel free to contact our Executive Office directly any time.

Summary: Our pre-experience started with a  a pre-stay email which provided information on the experiences at the hotel.  It was followed by a reach out from Guest Relations.  It was fun working with Ryan and others on ideas.  Our on-site experience started with smiling and efficient valets and front desk personnel. The rooms have phenomenal views of the coast, ocean or gardens.  The location on the bluff at Dana Point offers amazing views.  This is definitely not a hotel that should be touted just for the view.  The personnel are customer-focused.  The rooms are luxurious and comfortable.  There's no need to go offsite.  The restaurants are over the top.  The spa ensures that you unwind.  Another way to review the hotel is to talk to the people who work there.  We talked to employees
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  It was a pleasure creating a unique, memorable and personal experience for you and we look forward to doing so again very soon.

Summary: Reserved a King bed room for our anniversary. Got here and received a double beds room.  It would have been fine if the beds are queen size but they are full size. Very disappointed on how this hotel treated Platinum member.
Manager Response: We are so sorry to hear this!  Thank you for letting us know that this occurred.  We hope you enjoyed your overall anniversary experience at the resort and we thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  Please contact our Executive Office directly so we may hear more about your stay and how we can ensure you are fully satisfied.  Thank you.

Summary: This property has the best location and incredible views. I host a group here almost every year and we are never disappointed. Food is great, staff are friendly and the property is what you expect from the Ritz.
Manager Response: We are delighted that we continue to shine in your eyes year after year!  Our team of extraordinary ladies and gentlemen strive to do just that.  We hope to see you over the upcoming holidays.  We have some special activities planned.  Thank you for your business.

Summary: My only mistake is that I only spent one night. This hotel is perfectly placed on the bluff at Dana Point with incredible views of the coast line, ocean and surfers. The only criticism is when we ate breakfast at cafe there must be a secret menu.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel!  We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you and look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Beautiful property.   Excellent staff.   Unbeatable views.    The entire hotel is well done and feels like a true 5 star property from the minute you arrive until the moment you leave.    The gym is amazing.   Hangs over a hill and has full ceiling to floor windows with an upfront view of the pacific.   Never did cardio feel so relaxing and good.   FIVE STARS!!
Manager Response: It was wonderful to have you with us and we are delighted you enjoyed your experience.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Stayed here during my cousins wedding Excellent service, gorgeous views, great room service options.  Lovely pools, and comfortable beds. Plenty of amenities. Very welcoming and friendly staff.  You definitely get what you pay for.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting a review of the resort!  We hope the wedding was unforgettable and that you have the chance to come visit us again soon.

Summary: This hotel has many things going for it.  The location on a cliff overlooking the ocean being number one.  Would we go there again? Probably not.   The good things - great places to walk outdoors, tennis courts, nearby golf, spa, workout room, it has a beach, 6 places to eat, friendly staff, comfortable bed The rooms - the rooms are on the small side for the price.  The bathroom is good except the tub/shower has a WIDE marble ledge to straddle when getting in and out.   The restaurants - the Bar, Raya, and 180blu all have the same lunch menu and the night time Bar menu is the same as the lunch menu.  Not much variety if you are there for a week.  Breakfast in Raya was good as was the Market Place.   Ate at the pool bar several times and thought it was very good.  180blu is roof
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  It was a pleasure having you with us and we greatly appreciate your valuable feedback.  We hope you have a chance to visit us again in the near future so you can experience our new menus in all of our outlets.  Our executive chef and his amazing team rotate our menus every three months with careful thought and creativity.  We look forward to having you sample some of their new creations during your next visit.  They would love to hear from you!

Summary Heading: Beautiful property, friendly and accommodating staff!
Summary: We occupied a lovely room facing the Pacific Ocean.  Nice accommodations and our patio had a gas fire pit.  The hotel provided us with a microwave upon request because I am on a medically supervised diet and brought my own food.  The Ritz has a wonderful mattress for getting a good nights sleep.  Every morning we would walk outside on the cement path along the ocean.  It was fun to watch the surfboard riders.  The exercise room faces the ocean too and even has a crystal chandelier!  My husband golfed on the nearby course.  I enjoyed swimming in their saltwater pool.  The Ritz has wonderful Restaurants and their open air cocktail lounge has the best sunset views!  A nice touch is when they offered us water bottles to go, when we would take our car out from valet.  We loved this
Manager Response: It was wonderful to have you with us and we are delighted you enjoyed your Ritz-Carlton experience.  Thank you for posting your beautiful photos.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: An Amazing property for so many reasons
Summary: The Ritz Carlton Laguna Nigel is one of the best places I have ever stayed for several reasons.  One- The location.  “The Ritz” sits on a cliff overlooking the clear blue waters, on the boarder of Laguna Nigel and Dana Point. On a clear day you can see Catalina Island, and the Sunsets are breathtaking. The sound of the ocean is hypnotizing and the breeze (whether warm or cool) feels wonderful. The grounds of The Ritz are lush and inviting, and the beach is accessible via The Ritz shuttle down the steep hill or by your very own “foot power”. There are two pool areas; one for adults and one a bit bigger for families. Both are great for relaxing and sunning. There is a Spa and workout room with the best views I have seen for a hard workout. The Ritz also offers daily outdoor Yoga
Manager Response: WOW what an incredibly glowing review of our resort, our surroundings, and our ladies and gentlemen.  Thank you!  It was a pleasure creating a memorable experience for you and we promise your next visit with us will be just as unique and personal.  We know you have much more beach to see, more food to eat and more activities to enjoy!

Summary Heading: Stunning views and excellent place to get away
Summary: this hotel was very nice but for such an expensive hotel I was hoping for a bit more in terms of front desk service. When I arrived I had an issue getting into my room as it was booked in another family member's name who could not go at the last minute. Even though I had the matching credit card and had the exact same name they told me I could not get into the room without the other person's verbal permission to the desk clerk. I had to call the person who was working on the other side of the country and luckily he picked up. I've traveled a lot and stayed in many hotels worldwide and never ever faced this issue before and it has happened before that the other person could not make it. The staff was friendly about it but was completely unbending in their policy which could have
Manager Response: Thank you for your extremely valuable feedback.  We are grateful that you enjoyed your overall experience while you were at the resort.  That is truly our intention and what we strive for.  We apologize for the frustration at the front desk and we appreciate that you understood our policy.  It is great to hear how you felt as our customer and we will definitely take a look at this process moving forward.  If we may be of assistance, please contact us at (949) 240-2000. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: We enjoyed a pleasant and relaxing weekend stay-cation at the Ritz Carlton Laguna.  The staff were all pleasant and friendly. The room was great- I highly recommend the fire-pit rooms... that really made our stay that much more special... sitting out on the patio with the fire-pit going watching the sunset was awesome.  We did not dine in the restaurants, so I can't comment on that. We did however, dine in the market/bistro... it was just ok.  I would love to see improved recipes for their iced coffee drinks and smoothies.  And they do not automatically offer you milk for cereal, you have to ask for it.  The pool was nice, pool staff all very helpful and friendly.  I don't recommend eating lunch out by the pool.  The food was very mediocre and was the cost of a 5 star dinner.  I
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for your stay-cation.  We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you and your family.  We greatly appreciate your very detailed feedback and have shared it with our executive team.  We do hope you have a chance to join us over the holidays and in to the coming year as we have many enhancement projects scheduled and we know you will notice the difference.  Thank you again and we hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Best sunrises and sunsets in the west
Summary: Being right on the ocean was a huge plus for the fabulous Ritz Carlton. The resort was immaculate, the staff was friendly, and everything  related to our business conference was top shelf. Catering was spectacular meeting room locations were awesome. Will definitely consider the Ritz Carlton for future conference needs. A+ all the way
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you and your group. We couldn't agree with you more that our surroundings and location are magnificent. We look forward to assisting you in the future and would welcome the opportunity to discuss future business with you. You are welcome to contact the Executive Office anytime at (949) 240-2000.

Summary: We had our company managers' retreat here and were so well cared for.  The rooms were outstanding with breathtaking ocean views and wonderful amenities .  All meals for the 14 of us were outstanding. The conference room experience was excellent. Have already recommended the resort and will definitely return.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you and your group with us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Typical Ritz Carlton excellence with a gorgeous location!
Summary: Sitting on a coastal bluff, the property overlooks the Pacific Ocean!  Enjoy gorgeous sunsets from anywhere on the property.  While I'm always after a good value and don't like spending a lot of money on a hotel, I never regret the price points to stay at this hotel!  It is lovely, the staff is excellent and all of the facility has an attention to detail which I always appreciate.  When you have a very special occasion or just want to spoil yourself...go here!
Manager Response: We appreciate your kind comments and your loyalty to our resort and brand.  Thank you for truly enjoying the experiences our ladies and gentlemen create.  We want you to sit back, relax, and let us take care of you!  We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: Stunning location, nice property. Very poor staff and management.
Summary: We booked for 4 nights (with the 4th night free) and checked out after 1 night it was that bad. Its the worst luxury hotel experience we have ever experienced. The straw that broke the camels back was the arrogant and rude front of house manager. In summary we think this property has become totally arrogant due to demand. Its an excellent location and the public areas are nice. The room we were given was the wrong room and it was tiny. I tried to meet with a manager to find a solution and the meeting was a disaster. It made us want to leave immediately which we did. They changed their story three times to try to cover the fact that they had not delivered what they should have. We and many other guests were refused entrance to Breakfast at 10am with the server saying the kitchen
Manager Response: On behalf of our executive committee and all our ladies and gentlemen, we apologize for not meeting and exceeding your expectations during your recent visit to the resort.  The satisfaction of our guests is our highest priority and our team strives to create unique, personal and memorable experiences.  Your feedback has been heard, shared with our team, and taken seriously.  We hope to have the opportunity to speak with you further so we may fully understand the details of your experience.  At your convenience, kindly contact the Executive Office at (949) 240-2000.  Thank you for providing your comments via TripAdvisor and we look forward to speaking with you direct.

Summary: This is a wonderful property--probably along with Half Moon Bay the best the Ritz offers.    LOCATION---VIEWS are incredible--does not get any better.  The hotel is located along the cliffs of Dana Beach with wonderful views of the beach and surfers.  Its a great place to walk.    Raya restaurant is excellent --delicious sea food--my only concern is that the Sunday brunch is basically the dinner menu--I also would recommend that they offer 1-2 specials each night--after a few nights we had eaten everything on the menu.  The staff in the Coffee Shop were extremely friendly.    Service is above average (better than Marriott but not Four Seasons) -- for example at the Front Desk --while we received most of the Amex Benefits they told us on checkin that we had been upgraded to an
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed feedback.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and look forward to welcoming you back one day soon!  Thank you for posting your photos as well. We are so fortunate to be amongst such beauty.  We hope you will have the opportunity to experience our ongoing and upcoming resort enhancements in 2016.  If we can be of any assistance to you now or in the future, please fee free to contact us directly at (949) 240-2000.

Summary: This review is only for breakfast-we stopped in on a Saturday morning and sat down for breakfast at Raya. I had excellent breakfast tacos that were beautifully plated. The view from our table was just breathtaking, prime real estate property. We did not get to stay here as they were all booked up but I hope to come back and stay for a night so I can give more of a review!
Manager Response: We are delighted you had the opportunity to enjoy breakfast at Raya and we hope you get to stay longer next time.  Our ladies and gentlemen look forward to creating a memorable experience for you.  If we many assist you with any future planning, please reach out to us at (949) 240-2000.  Thank you for stopping by!

Summary Heading: This Ritz hits every sense you have from the moment you step in the door!
Summary: This was the 5th time we have visited in the last 3 years & cannot wait to go back!  From the moment you step through the doors there is something to satisfy every one of your senses: the unmatched artistic floral display, the signature fragrance that is heavenly, the staff has to be one of the most attentive of any Ritz-Carlton anywhere in the world, fantastic restaurants steps away, and one of the most beautiful views of the Pacific Coast ever to be seen.  Rooms are appointed beautifully & well attended to.  The service & venue on the club level are everything you want!  Looking forward to our next visit already & we just left!
Manager Response: We are grateful to have you as such a loyal guest!  Our ladies and gentlemen look forward to creating unique, memorable and personal experiences that touch all of your senses each time you stay with us.  Thank you for your wonderful feedback and photos.  We are counting down the days until we welcome you "home" again.

Summary Heading: A wonderful break at the ritz
Summary: We spent a few days Thursday thru Monday at this property. It was glorious. A beautiful beach with all services, gorgeous flowers everywhere,excellent facilities. Service was top notch. It is well located to go into town or you can spend your time here. It has everything you could wish for to make a beach get away with many options. If you need a short break,think of coming here. We've been a few times and hope to return. It never disappoints!
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you with us again.  We are delighted that you keep us top of mind when in the Southern California area.  We promise to never disappoint you!  We hope to see you soon.

Summary: Of course a Ritz-Carlton Hotel is elegant and luxurious. This particular one is in such a beautiful location, it cannot be beaten in California. The view of the beach and ocean is fabulous. We stayed on the club level which was a real treat. The staff there is outstanding. The food and drinks offered all day and into the evening was terrific. It is a great getaway for anyone in Southern California and a great destination for people drawn to the West Coast.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you as our guest and we hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: Everything is awesome. Location, accommodation, staff (shout out to Samantha of Reception for being extra awesome), amenties and food. Can be your romantic or family get away for a weekend.  Location, accommodation, staff (shout out to Samantha of Reception for being extra awesome), amenties and food. Can be your romantic or family get away for a weekend.  I'm gonna say it twice as it is that awesome.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words.  We have shared them with our ladies and gentlemen.  We look forward to being of service again to you in the near future.

Summary: Beautiful hotel with wonderful views. A tremendous staff that takes care of your every need. It is a very family friendly hotel with apparently a robust wedding business. We were there for three nights and saw at least five weddings. I would spring for the ocean view rooms rather than the ones either facing the pool(s) or the coast line. you are somewhat captive there, but the restaurants are very good albeit can be noisy. But if you are going to be in this part of the world, it is a can not miss, even if you do not surf!
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed your overall experience with us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Great staff and location is gorgeous!
Summary: Location is stunning.  Staff is very helpful and service oriented.  I will say don't stay on the 1st floor on the south side of the property as there's an area where weddings happen and people are in hallway at all hours and loud.  Bath has a bit too much marble and very slippery.  Gym has an absolutely amazing view as well.  Valet staff is very efficient and you never have to wait.
Manager Response: We enjoyed having you stay with us and we greatly appreciate your feedback.  Thank you!

Summary Heading: Outstanding beyond amazing service, you must go!
Summary: All I can say is wow! The service is unbelievable from the car valet to management. Steve the manager went above and beyond with a minor issue we had. Can't say enough about this place. The views are outstanding the room was clean and very comfortable
Manager Response: We enjoyed having you stay with us!  Thank you for the photos.  We love seeing them.  What a sunset!  We hope you will be returning soon.

Summary Heading: One of the Best Hotels in the World
Summary: I can't say enough about this hotel. The hotel itself is luxurious, sophisticated and is RC at it's best. The staff is not just helpful and friendly, but engaging and always seeming to anticipate your next need.  The food (the bar, room service and Rayan) was all incredible.  The hotel and room itself was impeccably clean.  But, what stands out most is the incredible view.  Opt for the ocean view for one of the most beautiful sights you've ever seen. A few nearby (nameless) 5 star hotels  are set back so much, it's a stretch to call it "ocean view".  This is not the case here. The ocean view balcony literally feels like it is suspended above the ocean.  I felt like I was back in Taormina.  The Laguna trolly's last stop is in front of the hotel and is a fun way to explore Laguna
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel and sharing your feedback and photos.  Our ladies and gentlemen enjoyed creating a warm, relaxed, personal and refined experience for you and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: I was looking for a venue to propose to my girlfriend of 6 years and I ended up choosing the Ritz-Carlton because the staff was so incredibly helpful. I knew my girlfriend wanted a beautiful picture against a beautiful backdrop, and she wanted it to be a surprise.   I hatched an intricate plan and worked with Ryan Harton from Guest Relations and Donya Rezayat of Pacific Dream Photography. After 40+ emails and numerous phone conversations Donya set up an amazing experience that involved a large rose petal heart on the lawn, a bottle of champagne, a professional photographer, and a story that required the Ritz-Carlton Raya staff to play along.  There were so many stressful hurdles that Donya had to jump through to make this perfect (it started storming 2 hours before our
Manager Response: We are so happy for you!  Congratulations!  The proposal was flawless, beautiful and heartwarming.  We are over the moon that you chose to celebrate with us. We wish you all the best and hope to welcome you back for every anniversary for years to come.  Perhaps even for your wedding!

Summary Heading: Wedding for locals: poor F&B and service, but still a tremendous location
Summary: My husband and I attended our niece's wedding at the RCLN last weekend. As locals living in Newport Beach, we've been many times for drinks to the property but this was the first time for a major event.   The hotel location is spectacular, sitting right on the cliffs over a great beach looking out onto the Pacific.   But the actual building is weirdly and poorly laid out, with very narrow corridors where the rooms are located, no bathroom facilities in some areas (we had to go from the 1st floor banquet/dining room to the 3rd floor to find the nearest bathroom!), and just a very odd configuration as you move throughout the hotel. That this was renovated recently suggests that the hotel really did a poor job in our opinions. The interiors of the major public spaces were lovely,
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your feedback.  It has been heard, shared with our executives, and taken seriously.  We would enjoy speaking to you in further detail by phone if possible so that we can learn more about your experience.  Please contact our Hotel Manager at (949) 240-2000 (in the Executive Offices).  We look forward to speaking with you.  On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we hope your niece had a wonderful celebration with us and we wish her much happiness.

Summary Heading: one of the nicest hotels we've ever stayed at
Summary: Maybe our experience was not typical, but everything seemed just about perfect for our three-day stay.  The room (third floor, coastal view) was comfortable and clean.  Our balcony was excellent, with a beautiful view up the beach and of hilly Laguna town.  Most of our meals were off premises, but the bars were great and all the appetizers wonderful.  We found the staff to be very genuine and personable, and we were comfortable wandering around in our bath suits or gym shorts.  Unless you're filthy rich the costs do start to add up (close to $200 / day on top of the room rate, when you add some fees, parking, taxes, tips, etc.), but for a three-day stay we were able to relax and forget about the large bill accumulating at check-out!  The beach service was great; they brought us
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We enjoyed creating a magical and memorabe experience for you.  We appreciate you feedback and thank you for sharing it.  We have noted your preferences and will gladly ensure they are adhered to on your next visit.  We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: Had to stay here for several days due to a business meeting.  The hotel staff were incredibly nice and helpful.  The restaurant has a perfect ocean view and the food was exceptional - dined there breakfast, lunch, dinner several times.  The spa facility and message are heavenly.  I would even consider going there just for the spa.  Of course, the location is such a paradise for ocean lovers.  It has the perfect view of Newport Beach and the area is secluded so there's not as many people which is terrific.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback and beautiful photos.  Welcome to paradise!

Summary: Spent a few days here on a business trip.  Overall, I enjoyed my stay.  My bedroom was well appointed - if very slightly dated.  Service very good.  Location on cliffs overlooking the sea - excellent.  Food/wine a bit over - priced.
Manager Response: We enjoyed having you stay with us for your business needs and look forward to welcoming you back for some r&r soon!

Summary: This property is gorgeous, and serene.  The pool was fantastic, quick access to beaches, room was top notch and of typical Ritz-Carlton quality!  The bar was a scene, great service and drinks!  We woke up early to take a Yoga class, which is exceptional - and doing it against the sounds of the ocean was amazing.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for your quick staycation.  We enjoyed having you and we look forward to spoiling you again soon!

Summary: The location of this hotel is amazing! We had an ocean front room on the third floor. Slept with the doors opened at night so we could listen to the sound of the ocean. Karyssa Heggie, front desk, went out of her way to make sure we were happy with our room location and contacted us the next day to see if she could do anything else to help. While unpacking I found out that one of my cats had peed in my suitcase. Everything smelled!  Housekeeping came right up took my clothes and had everything back in three hours. Never charged us. That may have been an oversight but know they know!!! Overall it was a wonderful experience. The staff from the pool, the bellmen, housekeeping, consierge and the front desk could not have been more helpful. Our room was clean and comfortable. There
Manager Response: It's our pleasure!!  We hope you return soon!

Summary Heading: One of the best Ritz properties.
Summary: The views are stunning, the sunsets are amazing, the service U.S. impeccable, the food is scrumptious, the drinks are delicious, the beds are comfortable, the rooms are stupendous and I love spending time at this location every time I am here.
Manager Response: We couldn't have said it better ourselves!  Thank you!

Summary: I would not have thought of staying at this hotel if I didn't have a conference to attend, but this Ritz manages to live up to its name without being snobbish. To wit: when we returned from a bike ride one afternoon, the door staff welcomed us back and invited us to wheel our bikes right through the lobby. Our room was not large but was comfortable and had a nice view of a leafy courtyard, and the public spaces of this hotel are airy and have gorgeous views of the ocean. We did not eat in any of the restaurants, but had all three meals as part of our conference. The food was uniformly excellent and better than I would have expected at a large function. The only annoyance, as at so many other hotels in Southern California, is that you must use a valet, a monumental waste of time
Manager Response: We are delighted you had the chance to relax while on business and we hope you have a chance to return soon to fully recharge your battery.  Thank you for taking the time to provide a review.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Beautiful property with outstanding views and staff. Delicious food. Roof top bar with live jazz was a bonus. Stayed at the Club Level, which was extraordinary. Everyone on the property does everything they can to make this a great time for guests. Lovely rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel!  We are delighted you enjoyed your experience and we look forward to creating many more unique and personal memories for you soon.

Summary Heading: Poor service and extremelly old hotel
Summary: The rooms are antique, the carpet from the room was so dirty that after walking few minutes on it I had my foot black from dust. The carpet was also partially wet near the winows. We checked in at night and after we went to our room we noticed that the sheets from the bed had dark red spots and we called guest service 3-4 times to ask them to come and change the sheets and we had to wait over one hour until someone finally came to change the sheets. Hotel staff was very unfriendly and they were answering to each demad very slowly.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback.  We are very disappointed and find it to be completely out of character for our resort and team.  We would greatly appreciate it if you could  please contact our Hotel Manager directly so we may find out more about your experience.  Thank you and we look forward to speaking with you and learning more.

Summary Heading: Fantastic stay and amazing photos from PACIFIC DREAM PHOTOGRAPHY to help us remember our visit
Summary: My husband, daughter and I stated at the hotel last weekend and loved our visit. The rooms were fantastic, the staff was lovely, and the views/grounds were stunning. Easy access to the beach an absolute plus! Our daughter recently turned one and we decided to book a photoshoot for the family using Pacific Dream Photography, a studio that the Ritz offers to guests during their stay. The actual shoot was complimentary and we LOVED our photos. The video they made was an absolutely surprise. Although the photos and video purchase was quite expensive for our budget, I do believe it was absolutely worth it.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel as your luxury destination.  We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you and your family and hope you return again soon.  Thank you for the feedback about our in-house photography and video provider, Pacific Dream Photography.  We are so excited to have them on board with us and they create incredible images and surprises for our guests.  It is great to hear that they surprised you with their creative talents.

Summary Heading: Best place on the southern Orange County coast
Summary: Awesome hotel with impeccable service! Rooms are spacious, beautiful and modern. Views are fantastic throughout the property, which is extensive and worth exploring. No one does service like this Ritz. Prices are reasonable, restaurants are wonderful and room service is spot on. Highly recommend this place for romance and family gatherings. My idea of a perfect hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for enjoying and experiencing all our property and magnificent surroundings have to offer!  Our ladies and gentlemen truly enjoy working at the resort and we are glad it shows.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon for another unique, personal, and memorable experience.

Summary: As others have said, if you rate this hotel just based on location it would get 10 stars.  However since its not just based on location, that's why I give it 4 stars.  This is a beautiful hotel, but its not 5 star quality when it comes to the hotel itself.  You are paying for the location, staff, and amenities.  My husband and I traveled with our 2 kids - 4 & 1 years of age.  Its a great hotel to stay in with kids as they have pool toys available and at the beach, they set up umbrellas and chairs for you and also have beach toys available.  Also, there is a golf cart that drives you from the hotel to the beach and back.  When you have kids, all these conveniences count.  The food is also great.  This was probably the best poolside food and drinks I have had anywhere.  We also
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed your overall experience with us and that your children did as well. We are continuously enhancing our property and appreciate your feedback. We look forward to creating more meaningful memories for you again soon.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary: This is an excellent hotel with gorgeous views and incredible restaurants! The staff was very attentive and accommodating. I enjoyed the hotels workout facilities and the pool area, absolutely gorgeous views of the Pacific Coast!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel!  We couldn't agree with you more that our surroundings are magnificent!  We are so fortunate to have such an amazing location.  We hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: I am baffled by some of the glowing reviews of this property. Those reviews led me to put this on my "must visit" list two years ago, and thence to me being sorely disappointed and regretful that I included it in our two week holiday to California in August. Did my family stay at the same place as these people? There are much better options.  If it's only about location, then The Ritz Carlton is just the ticket. But there's so much more to a 5* experience than the location. The views are beautiful, and if you have an ocean facing room you get to enjoy them a lot more. I'd have hated to be in one of the dark rooms overlooking the main pool or inner courtyards.   The staff are also generally excellent. I say generally because the lady on the front desk who checked us in was a
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking time out of your busy schedule to provide such detailed feedback regarding your stay at our resort.  We are equally as baffled as to why their were as many service failures as you have stated.  This is certainly not indicative of our normal exceptional service, care, and follow through.  We have shared your feedback with our leaders and are as disappointed as you.  We greatly appreciate your thoughts and concerns, and have taken them seriously.  Our executive team would enjoy speaking with your personally so we may ask you a few more questions in order to provide clarity and resolution to your experience.  If you could contact our offices, it would be much appreciated.  Thank you for choosing and trusting The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We hope to have the chance to make it up to you and regain your confidence in our resort and brand.

Summary Heading: A room overlooking the Pacific is incredible
Summary: I have stayed at every Ritz Carlton in the US and this is by fr the most incredible and beautiful due to its high position looking over the ocean  All of orange county has a beautiful climate and there is another one in Marina Del Rey  its nice view of ll the docked boats   but this has got t be seen to be believed
Manager Response: You are fortunate to have been able to visit all of our properites!  And we are very fortunate to have your trust and loyalty in our brand.  Thank you!

Summary Heading: Gorgeous Ocean Views from this Elegant Resort
Summary: Location, location, location --- this is the strongest point of this hotel.  The grounds and views of the Pacific Coast are absolutely gorgeous.  Salt Creek beach, a short walk down the bluff from the hotel, is a great for walking, swimming, and surfing. The Ritz provides a shuttle down to the beach for those who don't want to make the trek and they will set up chairs and umbrellas for you too.    The resort is great for active people.  We loved the daily morning yoga classes held at the gazebo.  We also played tennis on their very nice courts. While the equipment in the fitness center is very high end, the panoramic ocean view from the gym is so stunning that I couldn't focus on working out on machines.  Instead I headed to the ocean and exercised there.  While the exterior of
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We hope you took home some wonderful and meaningful memories. We greatly appreciate your feedback and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: We had a business conference in this hotel. This is one of the best luxury hotels I have ever stayed in. Rooms are top quality, each has a balcony with a gas fire. Amenities were plentyfull. The most spactacular part of the hotel is the views, and the convenient access to the beach. They have a great bar for sunset drinks and food was great everywhere in the hotel.  Definitely a memorable experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your beautiful photos.   We enjoy seeing them!  We are delighted you enjoyed your Ritz-Carlton experience and we look forward to creating more memories for you soon.

Summary: This Ritz property is outstanding.  From the moment you enter and view the beautiful lobby and exquisite cliff side ocean views  you will be smitten.  Penny on club level makes you feel like family.  One of our families nicest Ritz stays ever...
Manager Response: You ARE family!  Thank you for staying with us and providing your feedback.  We couldn't agree with you more that our exclusive Club Level experience is amongst the best in the world.  We look forward to creating more unique memories for you soon.

Summary: When your enter the lobby you are greeted initially by an amazing aroma. I kept saying "I want my house to smell this good." The Staff was amazing and helpful. We had a package delivered before we arrived and the Concierge had it ready for us.  It was my wife birthday and they provided a complimentary cake in the room.   This hotel is on Salt Creek Beach which is picturesque and enjoyable. There is a shuttle that can take you down the steep path to the beach.   There are two pools. One is small and was empty for the most part. We spent our time at the large pool. Again the staff was great.  Overall I had an amazing experience during our stay.
Manager Response: We love that you noticed our fragrance.  We have the scent for purchase in our Gift Shop if you are interested in taking it home.  Thank you for choosing our resort for your luxury experience.  We enjoyed having you!

Summary: My husband and I spent 3 wonderfully relaxing nights at the Ritz. First impressions are important and the bright modern lobby and public areas with their exquisite floral arrangements make a very good one. The rooms are nicely furnished and the bathrooms were immaculately clean and spacious with an assortment of lovely toiletries. The entire staff could not have been more attentive and gracious. I think this is probably the hotel's greatest asset. They never hesitated to offer their utmost help or to engage in conversation. We did not dine in the restaurant but we did have lunch and cocktails in the outdoor bar. Be forewarned that the small plates are actually huge and it is very tempting to try to finish them completely. The spa experience was excellent and my signature massage
Manager Response: It was such a pleasure having you!  We are delighted you enjoyed your Ritz-Carlton experience and we look forward to creating many more unique and personal memories for you soon.

Summary Heading: Very good but not the best
Summary: I stayed here with family for week while on vacation.  The hotel has its strengths and weaknesses.  The staff lives up to the Ritz-Carlton standards.  Everyone was really nice and helpful.  The location is beautiful.  The fitness center overlooks the ocean -- it's a beautiful view during your workout.  The valet service was outstanding.  My car was always ready by the time I came down to the lobby. That might sound like a minor thing, but it can be annoying to wait a long time just to get your car.  There is a minifridge in the room, which is handy for keeping light snacks.  These are all the good things.    What about the cons?  Although the location of the hotel is great, the rooms are a bit dated.  The bathroom does not have a separate shower stall.  Sometimes the service was
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your experience with us.  We greatly appreciate it!  We hope you choose to visit us again soon.  It was a pleasure having you as our guest!

Summary Heading: Elegant hotel with great service & beautiful ocean views
Summary: Elegant hotel with great service & beautiful ocean views.  I gave it 4 stars because a bit pricey for such an average pool, but location & grounds are beautiful. Pricey I guess is normal for the ritz, especially in Laguna.   Btw Get the ceviche at Las Brisas downtown
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We are delighted you enjoyed your experience and hope it was a memorable one.  We are excited to share our new pool enhancements with you soon!

Summary Heading: Premium Hotel, but not as nice as other RC's we've stayed at.  I prefer the Montage for this area.
Summary: The service is great as expected, we only had a chance to have a light lunch and breakfast at the hotel, and those we good.  Access to a very nice beach is convenient.   The last time we were in Dana Point, we stayed at the Montage and we preferred that to the Ritz - the rooms were nicer and the pool is amazing.  For me, the Ritz is over-priced in comparison - just not the same "WOW" factor. A big disappointment was not being able to sit out and enjoy the view from our deck as they allow smoking outside and every time I went out some old farts were smoking up the area. We were supposed to get a room upgrade with AMEX, but they didn't do it - said it wasn't available, but then offered it for $200/night.  Kind of a bummer.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you with us!  We greatly appreciate your feedback and have used it constructively. We hope every time you visit our resort that you leave with incredible memories.  If we can assist you now or in the future, please contact our Executive Office directly at (949) 240-2000. It would be our pleasure!

Summary: This hotel has AMAZING views....Whether sunrise or sunset the beach view is simple impressive. Hotel staff was friendly, service was great from start to finish on our 4 day stay. My family traveled with 2 adults, 2 tween kids and 1 year old baby, even in the double room with a crib in it, we still decent space to move around. It actually rained on one of days of  our visit and the beach closed, then the hotel put on movies and popcorn in a room for our kids entertainment. Service was friendly, fast, and great from the valet, bellhop, bartenders, servers & housekeeping. It's the Ritz Carlton so it'll be a little bit more pricey than your average hotel, but I definitely believe it was worth the money.
Manager Response: It was wonderful to welcome you and your family!  Our ladies and gentlemen take great pride in creating memorable experiences for our guests.  We hope to welcome you back soon for another vacation soon.

Summary: We stay at Laguna Niguel for one night and enjoyed it a lot! The rooms are very nice. My friend felt the rooms where a touch feminine ...  Anyhow the view if you have ocean view is amazing! We enjoyed our beer watching the sunset from our balcony so ver much! The whole atmosphere of the hotel is very nice! We will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  We enjoyed your photos and we hope you return soon.

Summary: Stayed here August 15th and 16th for girls weekend out. It was to celebrate our friend's 40th birthday and a perfect place for it.  We started our stay with a complementary glass of champaign offered at the check in.  Our room wasn't ready so we spent some time exploring the resort and the going out to lunch.   The room was supposed to be a garden view room but we got a good view of the ocean from our room which was fantastic.  The room had everything we needed and the front desk service was excellent whenever we needed anything from them... wine glasses and so forth.    Though bit expensive, the dinner at the hotel's restaurant Raya was so worth it with the view of sunset over Pacific Ocean. The workout room overlooks the ocean as well and is a state of the art facility and
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for such a momentous occasion!  We can't wait to be your annual getaway destination.  Please let us know if we can assist you in any way.

Summary: Hello -  I stayed here in late June of this year and have been meaning to send this for some time. Edlin Tapia in 180blu - blew my mind with exceptional service during my stay. I was by myself outside enjoying a cocktail and a snack and rather involved in a very good book. Her service was great but she was also respectful of the fact that I was enjoying my book. Later that night I received a bag in my room with a note and a new book. The note read "Looks like you were almost finished with that book. Enjoy another one. I hope you enjoyed your tacos and margarita." I did enjoy the tacos and margarita - and I was finished with the book! Working in customer service I am familiar with your service gestures but had never been a recipient of one like this. This is why I love staying at
Manager Response: Tacos,margaritas, and a good book at 180blu is a wonderful experience!  We are delighted to hear our ladies and gentlemen are paying attention to our guests' expressed and unexpressed wishes.  That is truly what our legendary service is all about.  We look forward to welcoming you back for another unique experience soon.

Summary Heading: One of the best hotels in the world
Summary: This hotel is so special that many of us have been coming for three decades; the grounds and overall aspect are close to perfect. This hotel is one of the first Ritz-Carlton properties in the group's modern iteration as it opened in 1984, and not planned as a five star hotel. So the bedrooms have the limitations of the era in which they were constructed. In every other aspect this hotel wins on service, the beauty of its public areas, it's view of the Pacific Ocean (impossible to better) and the "nothing is too much trouble" mindset of the ladies and gentlemen who work for the Ritz-Carlton Hotel Company. The Club Floor is the most elegant and best staffed in the group and the exemplar of what a Club floor should be: led for 25+ years by the indefatigable Penni Garcia the Club is
Manager Response: It is an honor to have you call us your "home".  Thank you for embracing what The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel truly stands for.  Our iconic location, our valuable company foundation, and our ladies and gentlemen come together to provide legendary service and facilities.  We will never stop creating memorable experiences for you and we are counting the days until your return!

Summary Heading: Great Location!  Amazing Ocean Views! Nice Beach!
Summary: The best feature is the beach location.  Hotel is a little dated compared to other Ritz-Carlton Hotels, but you can not beat the location. The Hotel provides beach chairs, water, and umbrella as well as a cart to take you up and down the hill.  We ate on the premises all three days of our stay and not once were we disappointed.  Excellent food and service.  The only reason I give it a 4 rating is the facilities needs some restoration compared to other Ritz-Carlton Locations.  If you prefer newer, stay at the Montage in Laguna Beach just up the road a few mile.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting!  We are sure you will enjoy our upcoming enhancements when finished soon.  We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: My husband and I just returned from a business trip where we stayed at the Ritz. The views here are stunning. The staff are very friendly. We did have a few problems with wi-fi and housekeeping, however once brought to the managers attention, he was most gracious in correcting these matters. I would and will stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for including the photo.  We hope you were able to see lots of dolphins while you were with us.  We are delighted to hear your service hiccups were handled quickly and professionally.  On behalf of all our team, we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: We stayed here for a romantic weekend getaway.  The ocean views at sunset and sunrise were breathtaking.   The hotel has everything you need for relaxing including a world class spa.  With easy access to the beach, exceptional facilities and service we will stay again.
Manager Response: We agree with you in that our location, service and facilities provide the utmost romantic experience.  We look forward to creating more unique memories for you again soon!

Summary: We have stayed at many RC around the U.S.!  This one by far was the most disappointing!  This was our second trip to this resort (in July). The first time was very pleasant.  This time around was just awful!  The hotel location is ideal. The hotel lobby is very pretty and the restaurants are nice.  The rest of the hotel is not Ritz Carlton standard! When you are paying top dollars to stay here, you should have a great overall experience! Upon check-in the girl at the front desk was very snobby. She barely looked at you and had a puss on her face!  We were brought to our room.  We were shocked at the state of this room!  It was smelly, scuffs on the walls, the bathroom smelled like mold and there was hair on the floor!  We were then brought to another room that was not much
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, and our executive leadership, we thank you for your generous feedback.  It has been shared and taken seriously and constructively.  You are absolutely correct in that every Ritz-Carlton experience should be a true Ritz-Carlton experience.  Please contact our Executive Office directly at (949) 240-2000. We look forward to learning more from you then and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back soon.

Summary: I hate to give this hotel three stars but it was so noisy I can't give it more. Loud guests by the pool until midnight (and we were on a high floor). More loud guests slamming doors at 2:30am, 3:30am. .. But the worst was when the cleaning staff started talking with each other loudly in the hall about 8am. I think they need better soundproofing materials.
Manager Response: Thank you for your extremely valuable feedback.  It has been heard and taken constructively.  We appreciate hearing from you!  We hope your next Ritz-Carlton experience is a truly memorable one.  If we may provide assistance for your next stay, please feel free to contact our Executive Office at any time.

Summary Heading: Gorgeous ocean views, steps from the beach
Summary: This resort is beautifully situated with an incredible view of the ocean and easy access to the beach.  The property is elegant and all the common areas are well-appointed. As far as dining goes, the service was gracious, but rather slow. However the food was fantastic. The property was fully booked for the weekend so that could account for the speed of service. While the room was very comfortable and had all the expected amenities, it could use a style update to match the charm of the rest of the property. But if you want to spend time on the beach and tool around nearby Laguna and Newport, the Ritz-Carleton is a fantastic luxury choice.
Manager Response: Thank you for your visit and we look forward to creating another memorable experience for you soon!

Summary Heading: AAA 5 Diamond for 30 years!  Easy to see why!
Summary: The RC Laguna Nigel is the recipe for success:  incredible setting, top notch rooms and facilities, and top of line service excellence!  We stayed 4 nights while I attended a meeting on site.  As regards the conference facilities, they were superior, as good as I've seen anywhere.  The rooms are elegant, quiet, and well outfitted. Although we stayed in a garden room, I can only imagine the ocean view rooms.  The Pacific Ocean vistas are magnificent and the on site bars and restaurants are fantastic!  The Beach access is a great plus, and the entire hotel is family friendly - for all ages.  After we checked in, there was a 2 hour delay in getting our room.  Recognizing this issue,  management spontaneously offered us a nice credit, without our having voiced a complaint.  THAT is
Manager Response: We are so proud of our AAA status and fortunate to have obtained the recognition since the first year we opened our doors and for the next 30 consecutive years.  Our ladies and gentlemen take great pride in the level of service they are providing every day to our valuable guests.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We hope to welcome you back real soon!

Summary: Everyone at this beautiful hotel has been exceptionally accommodating to my stay with my 86 year old mom.  They have made every effort to provide top notch service to make her dream of experiencing the beach possible.  Tyler at beach station encouraged her everyday to ride the boogie board and McClinton in management assured we had exactly the view room we had requested.  I love that there is no additional fee to set up chairs and umbrellas on the beach, or to attend the morning yoga class overlooking the ocean. Spectacular property and the restaurant is great too!
Manager Response: We hope your special family time was incredibly memorable.  We enjoyed having you!

Summary: We enjoyed our visit to the Ritz! We have stayed at many RC's, and this one lived up to the RC standards.   Pro's: Complimentary access to steam room/sauna, comfortable beds with free wifi and waters, gorgeous outdoor patio with views over the cliff, loved the "deli" to get a quick sandwich or breakfast without breaking the bank Con's: We weren't overly impressed with the pools - just didn't have much to look at (no ocean views, and the pool seemed a bit dated in decor.  We enjoyed the beach instead
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback!  Salt Creek Beach is incredible and we are delighted that you were able to experience it.  We hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: 50th birthday at the Ritz and the Pageant of the Masters
Summary: Arrived after brutal traffic coming in from Las Vegas. Arrived to a exceptional concierge named Lucinda who made EVERYTHING, just perfect. She got us a room right away and one overlooking the pool w a terrace, gave us all complimentary beach bags, directions and suggestions for dinner before and trolley transport to and from the Pageant show in Laguna Beach. My daughter treated herself to a mani pedi while my youngest and I relaxed by the pool and had lunch and swam. ALL staff were SO kind and made this stay so special. The manicurists walked my 16 yr old outside to where we were with a chocolate mousse cake that had chocolate drizzled with "Happy Birthday". Literally - 24 hours there or less and it was the most relaxing and pampered stay during the trip. Amazing what a top
Manager Response: We hope your birthday was magical!  We enjoyed creating a unique, memorable and personal experience for you and your family.  Time is precious and we are delighted your day together was an unforgettable one.

Summary: Spent the night at this great hotel.  The staff was outstanding, the service was great and the view was one of the best in all of Southern California.  I will definitely be back in the near future.  Keep up the great work.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your busy schedule to post a review of your experience at the resort.  We enjoyed creating memories for you and look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Beware- not a Five star or luxury hotel
Summary: If you are looking for a five star luxury hotel do not stay here. The hotel rooms are dated and shabby.   I reserved two rooms with ocean views months in advance and requested early check in. I called the day before to confirm. I was told we had great ocean view rooms but may not get check in until around 2:30 or 3. We actually did not get a room until 4 and were told we were lucky even though that is guaranteed check in time. It had at best an obstructed ocean view. I asked for what I had reserved and was told they had nothing else. We got our second room at 5. The restaurants and food are limited - only bar lounges and one restaurant have ocean views. The menus are the same and are not good in the bar lounges and one water view restaurant. We ordered nachos which were made
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we thank you for staying with us and providing your valuable feedback.  It has been taken seriously and constructively and shared with our executive leadership.  We strive to always provide the best possible service and facilities for our guests and feel saddened to read your review.  We of course would like to make this right for you and look forward to speaking with you further.  At your convenience, please feel free to contact our executive team at (949) 240-2000.  We would welcome the opportunity to ensure your next Ritz-Carlton experience is a true Ritz-Carlton experience.

Summary Heading: Loved the views from our room
Summary: Waking up every morning to see the ocean & watch the surfers was such a nice way to unwind. The rooms were fairly clean, & outrageously small, and I had the bellman keep our suitcases so that we had room in our room.  The bad- the pool area was a disaster. Food, cups, dirty towels everywhere. The chairs were rock hard & we were to place our own towels on the chairs, no pool "butler." The wait staff was attentive & orders for drinks and some food came rather quickly. Out of 7 days, we went to the pool once. It was loud, obnoxious & far from relaxing. The music was ridiculous & it felt like a tacky Vegas hotel at the pool.  The Ocean side restaurant/bar area was odd. Communal seating, SLOW food service and a terrible menu. The menu at this hotel is great if you love beef. We do
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We are delighted you enjoyed your overall experience at the resort, and we thank you for your valuable feedback.  We strive to operate the resort in a first class manner with excellent and precise service and follow through.  It is our desire that each of our guests enjoy a truly unique and memorable experience.  We would enjoy the opportunity to speak with you further about your stay and ensure we regain your confidence in all areas.  Please contact the Executive Office at your convenience at (949) 240-2000.

Summary: Great location, beautiful grounds.    All of our needs were taken care of in the true Ritz Carlton manner.   Ocean view rooms are worth the price.   Friendly and courteous staff.  We will definitely return.    From a business perspective, location offers everything you will need and ocean view meeting rooms are outstanding.
Manager Response: We couldn't agree with you more that our ocean view meeting rooms are phenomenal!  We thank you for joining us and look forward to your return.

Summary: Could see the ocean clearly from our room  there is a long stair going to the beach and a big square where you could enjoy the most beautiful sunset They have a wonderful service, rooms are clean and comfortable
Manager Response: It was wonderful sharing our magnificent surroundings with you and we hope you return soon!

Summary: Stayed for 3 nights. Our first night we were placed in a garden room which was in heavy need of a makeover.  The roomy was also smelled of mildew.   The staff are fantastic as the next morning we were upgraded to a partial ocean view. This was greatly appreciated.   Overall the hotel rooms do need to be updated to ritz standards.  The view from the hotel is spectacular   Food was great and staff at resort first class
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback.  We greatly appreciate it and we are excited to share our upcoming room enhancements with you as soon as they are completed.  Thank you for staying with and we look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: The hotel is extremely busy during peek weekends. Although the staff do their absolute best to try and make your stay enjoyable, if you're looking for a more relaxing resort explore the Montage Resort a few miles north.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for your luxury needs.  We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you.  Southern California is a wonderful destination anytime, especially during the summer months.

Summary Heading: Great service, disappointing and pool beach service
Summary: The property is classic Ritz - beautiful. Service is spot-on.  Overall a bit old school on the California beach. We arrived on a Friday in August and the place was teaming with two large wedding parties and families galore. We are a couple without children and don't travel to hotels that cultivate families, so this was surprising and disappointing. More importantly, however, the "butler service" at the beach is really an attendant who carries your chair to the sand for you.  But there is food/beverage services.  The main pool was perfect for families and a nightmare for someone wanting to relax by the pool. There is a second "quiet" pool, but you have to call the concierge on your phone for food/beverage service.  Frankly, we felt like family weekend getaway business is more
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for staying with us and providing your valuable feedback.  Your loyalty and satisfaction are very important to us.  Please feel free to contact our Executive Office directly for any future assistance.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Perhaps the grande dame in its category south of LA, the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel never fails to deliver. The service is what really sets this monarch beach jewel apart from the rest. In every department--from the pool to checkin to room service to valet -- it's clear there is a profound service ethic -- indeed an instilled can do attitude -- so refreshing in this day and age in an American property. Even before arrival, Ritz wanted to know if we were celebrating any special occasion. My daughter celebrated her birthday during our stay and received a birthday cake waiting in our room at arrival. A really nice touch. But the place needs a face lift -- the finish is tired and in need of revival. But don't let that deter you!!
Manager Response: Thank you for celebrating with us.  We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you.  We are very excited to share with you many of our forthcoming enhancements in the months to come.  You won't be disappointed!

Summary: We went to the Ritz on an anniversary trip and the whole experience was fabulous!  The hotel is very stately and perched in a magnificent location on a cliff overlooking the Pacific.  Beach chairs and towels were available for guests and they could be set up on the beach too if you wanted.  We had breakfast in Raya which was very indulgent.  We also enjoyed the Marketplace which was a lighter breakfast.   We had a wonderful time at the rooftop bar watching the sunset. The drinks and appetizers were perfect and we loved the whole vibe.  It was great being able to get to Laguna beach so easily.  One night we took the free trolley to Laguna beach that picked us up on the street right outside of the hotel.  We hope to make a trip back to the Ritz one day!
Manager Response: Thank you for enjoying are outlets and our beach offerings.  We are delighted you enjoyed your Ritz-Carlton experience and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: This is by far the best hotel I have ever stayed in. Great food. Great rooms. Views are spectacular. And the staff is very friendly and accommodating. The beach is wonderful they shuttle you down and then you check in with a beach butler who will carry your stuff down and set it up.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  It is hard not to enjoy our magnificent surroundings and we are delighted we provided an effortless outing to the sand for you.  It is definitely worth it.  We hope you return soon!

Summary: Beautiful property, can't find better views, only negative would be that the rooms could be a more luxurious.  We splurged on a Firepit room, assuming we would have a bit nicer accommodations but it was a regular room with the Firepit on the patio.   Still amazing hotel, food and service were great and it has it's own beautiful beach.  Would definitely go back!
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback!  We look forward to creating many more unique, memorable, and personal experiences for you soon.

Summary Heading: Great end to a summer vacation!!
Summary: After spending a week at a beach house in Newport Beach, we wrapped up our California trip by adding two nights at the Ritz Carlton!! The location is amazing and our service at the Club Level is always outstanding!! Penni, Mary, Mercedes and all the other helpful concierge do their very best at making our stay so memorable!! We will always be back because of their service and the beautiful location of this resort!!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to add us to your vacation!  It was wonderful to have you and we look forward to welcoming you back to our Club Level very soon.

Summary: this is a beautiful property! great food/very kid friendly !  i wish the beach wasn't such a trek but it's worth it once you're down there   the spa is beautiful   beware the water is cold in the pools and beach...they said pool was heater but it did not feel like it BRRRRRRR
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed your experience at our resort.  We enjoyed creating memories for you and hope you will be back soon to enjoy our magnificent surroundings.

Summary Heading: gorgeous property and views, but hard to navigate
Summary: Of course, since it is a Ritz Carlton, one has certain expectations when staying here.  The staff is extremely friendly and polite; for example, they stand to the side in the hallway when you walk by, but smile and say hello. The grounds are simply fabulous with lush well maintained plants everywhere.  There are ample places to catch the spectacular view of the beach and cove if you are not fortunate enough to have a view from your room. That said, there are some areas needing improvement that would help people enjoy their stay more.  I was not able to get cell phone reception from my room - no phone, no text, only e-mail. This is not OK in 2015. Our room had no view worth seeing, but that did help with privacy when we were on the balcony.   There are not enough places to hang
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  It was a pleasure having you with us and we are delighted you enjoyed your overal experience.  Our team is dedicated to creating unique and personal memories that we hope last a lifetime.  Thank you very much for constructive feedback.  It has been taken seriously and shared with our leaders.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Please feel free to contact the Executive Office for assistance.

Summary Heading: True 5 star property inside and out.
Summary: It's an older hotel..no question. Bite marks on the corners but I was happy.  Stunning views from the deck bar/resteraunt. Energetic staff that wouldn't let me move my umbrella 4 feet over by myself.   Truly good management and staff was shining while I was there. Food was awesome and I will be back.  Great job.   eye candy out front ...lots of Lamborghinis ...,my Toyota from Alamo had way more trunk room and better fuel economy but the valet chose to not highlight that.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: For a Flagship Hotel, This One Was Just Mediocre
Summary: First and foremost, this hotel is beautiful.  The grounds are beautifully manicured and the setting of the hotel on a cliff overlooking the Pacific Ocean is breathtaking.  We were graciously upgraded to a large suite and the suite was fantastic.  The room was clean and the Guest Relations team did a great job recognizing our kids' birthdays.
