Where the hotel fell short is the Club Lounge.  The variety was lackluster and substandard.  The food offerings were not replenished timely and the Club staff didn't do a great job of ensuring we had something to drink.  For example, I went into the lounge one evening for a drink, but not a single associate acknowledged me.  I was frustrated and left.  I know that many love the Club service at this hotel, but for me it was subpar and well
Manager Response: We are delighted that you enjoyed your overall experience at our resort, and we thank you for your candid feedback regarding our exclusive Club Level staff and offerings. We take these comments seriously and have shared them with our executive team.  Thank you again for staying with us and please feel free to contact the Executive Office for assistance.

Summary Heading: Incredible location, but rooms a bit dated
Summary: Location: Amazing. Pictures are accurate.  Check-in: Efficient and friendly.  Room: Smallish for a resort location and the price. The two full beds (which felt smaller than normal) took up the majority of the room. There were a few outlets in strategic locations but some details (exposed power strip by the bed) were lacking for RC.   Patio: Incredible ocean and flower view, with a really nice electric fire pit. with two very comfortable chairs.  Bathroom: Well-lit. Two sinks with small counters and no shelf space for any additional items. The extra towels were in the separate toilet area, which was weird. Shower was adequate. Wouldn't expect torrential waterfalls in the drought.  Service: Staff were extremely friendly but little glitches (I was called twice from the poolside
Manager Response: Thank you for your very detailed review of the resort and our services and facilities.  It was interesting to read and share with our team.  We hope you enjoyed your overall experience and we look forward to creating more meaningful experiences for you in the future.  Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: The setting and public areas can compete with any property in the world. Throw in Ritz sevice and you have a sublime experience. I was privileged to sit in on the conception of this project and am amazed at the realization of that original dream. Have a brandy at the bar and watch the sunset.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words, support and loyalty.  Our ladies and gentlemen take great pride in creating memorable experiences for our guests.  We enjoy having you!  Please let us know if we may be of future assistance.

Summary: This hotel is such a complete oasis of calm and pure beauty.  The staff could not be more accommodating and friendly, and they always have a smile.  I love being welcomed by the artistry of blooms in the lobby, and seeing the generous bunches of fragrant roses throughout the hotel. There is a rich, spicy crab dish I had at Raya that I still can't get out of my mind.  I like to drive down for the hotel's Yappy Hour, a once-a-month picnic on the lawn for dogs and their owners, during the warmer months.  Somehow with all the different breeds, it's always peaceful.  Hope this isn't a secret, but Debby Carman, whose exquisite, hand-painted dog bowls and treat jars are featured at the hotel, keeps a stash of sliced hot dogs for pooches at her booth.    When I was there in May, I had
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely review on our resort, staff and offerings.  We enjoy having you here for Yappy Hour and are amazed at its huge success.  Thank you for coming!  We are equally excited for our new partnership with Pacific Dream Photography.  Having them onsite is a wonderful option for our guests.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Perhaps we will see you at our Diamond Ball as well.

Summary: I come here from time to time to have a drink in the open ocean view cafe in high rise above the ocean with marvelous view and cool air.  It is the best place to have a drink and sweet on the ocean.  I have never stayed here though.
Manager Response: We are delighted you have had a chance to visit 180blu on several occasions.  Isn't it magnificent?  We certainly hope you will have the opportunity to stay the night with us soon!

Summary: An amazing experience. For a property to be as special as this it must be a total experience and this is just that. Views, service, food, and overall attitude of the people who work here are really what make the Ritz at Laguna the 5 star property it is. Brie, Deanna and Rocco in Sales, Francis at concierge, Cynthia the yoga instructor, Stela at the Spa and Ruben at Raya restaurant made this trip the special time it was!
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel as your luxury destination. We are delighted you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope you departed with a few lifelong memories. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Superb family vacation at the beach
Summary: I'm a platinum member at Marriott and very often use Ritz-Carlton to redeem points. I took my family many times to this hotel and it's fantastic. This hotel is in a superb location on Monarch Beach and the beach is gorgeous. I always pay extra for rooms facing the beach ... it's worth the money if you are beach person. The view is incredible. The rooms are luxurious but relatively small as compared with similar hotels -- location is a factor here! Drinks at night at the bar on the observation deck are priceless. If not a beach day, the pool is very nice, but food there takes forever to get ... As in any other Ritz-Carton, expect to pay extra for everything but it's what you get for the luxury. This is definitely a great hotel for a beach vacation in SoCal or for a romantic
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed feedback.  We appreciate your concern about food and beverage service and timeliness at the pool and have taken it to heart.  We always enjoy creating a unique and memorable experience for you and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Drinks on the observation deck - PERFECT
Summary: It's impossible not to love this hotel. It's on one of the most beautiful pieces of real estate compared to ANYWHERE in the world. The views are spectacular. The property itself is beautifully  maintained, including the grounds. The ocean view rooms are gorgeous, and the staff is genuine and friendly. The service couldn't be better.  My fav, the Observation Deck, is a nice comfy place to have a drink, and you never know what nice people you might meet from all over the country and world. I live nearby, and I plan on going more often. It's a treasure.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for joining us at 180blu.  We couldn't agree with you more that our surroundings are magnificent and we enjoy hosting our guests from all over the world to take in our ocean front view.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: There is a lot to like about the Ritz-Carlton.  In general, the staff is attentive, professional, and helpful.  The location for access to other points in southern California is excellent, and the views from several points overlooking Salt Creek Beach are spectacular.  If price point is NOT a concern for you AND you are willing to put up with some of the less than exceptional features, this might be the place for you.  That being said, buyer beware because you are paying premium prices for a less than premium experience.  For example, when we registered, we were told that we might upgrade our room to a partial coastal view or even an ocean view for two different amounts only to be told moments later that the original prices quoted were inaccurate, and upgrading was going to cost
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing your extremely valuable feedback.  We appreciate your concerns and will address them right away.  We hope you had a chance to share them while you were at the property as well.  If we can assist you further, please contact our Executive Office directly so we may review your experience with you.  Thank you again and we look forward to welcoming you back for a most memorable stay.

Summary Heading: Amazing...but less room for the money.
Summary: We had 2 rooms and I will review both. First off...upon arrival we were greeted by the amazing bell staff. The front desk staff was able to get us checked into all rooms and had us escorted to the rooms promptly by the bell staff. The hotel is BEAUTIFUL!!!!! It reeks of luxury!   Room 1: the Ocean View Suite...The bedroom and bathroom were beautiful, well appointed and perfect. The suite living room was lack luster. The furniture was decent but a bit worn. The wall with the TV on it was practically empty and had a very small TV on it. For the amount paid per night...it was not worth the money.   Room 2: Garden/Pool Guestroom...It was perfect! Worth every penny! Perfectly appointed and beautiful. Even the pool/garden view was great. I would definitely stay here again but I would
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your photos.  They are always fun to see!  We enjoyed having you as our guest and reading your review of our guest rooms and suites.  We are so excited to share with you that our suites are currently undergoing a product and decor enhancement and they will be ready very soon.  We hope you have a chance to stay in one again soon.  If we may answer any further questions, please contact our Executive Office directly.

Summary: We (whole family) don't usually stay in a place like this - but we may start staying at places like this more often.  WOW.  Got there early on a Sunday morning and our room was not ready, which we expected.  Finally about 4PM we got our room(s) . . . my company paid for us to have 2 rooms connected to accommodate our family.  The minute we walked in, the phone rang and due to them overbooking, they offered us an upgrade to their Club Suite level.  We said yes . . . and just WOW.  Three days & Three nights of their Club Suite Level was incredible.  Food, Drinks, Games, Views, anything that we needed, they got it for us.  We would probably never ever stay at this high a price of a room - but if you do and you are looking for one, the Dana Point Ritz-Carlton is incredible.  But,
Manager Response: We are delighted you were able to experience our exclusive Club Level.  It is certainly a treat!  We would be happy to work with you on the availability of value dates in which at selected times of the year our prices may be more flexible than other periods.  Thank you for posting the beautiful photos!

Summary: Beautiful grounds, superior customer service, terrific food and glorious rooms.  When I found I was too short to get in and out of the plush but very high bed, a step stool was immediately delivered.  No one snickered (except for me).  It is a large and beautiful resort.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  You step stool awaits!

Summary: This was such a treat!  Even though we had a few hiccup with the reservation at check in, the front desk rep. - Natalie- always had a smile on her face and did everything to make sure that our rooms were straightened out.  Hotel staff was friendly and helpful.  Our rooms had beautiful ocean view.  One of the room was close to the path to the beach and to the pool.  After couple of hours on the beach, we didn't  want to mess with the sand anymore, so we chilled by the pool, which we were the only ones there at the time.  It was nice, kind of like having your private pool.  Hotel supplies umbrella and beach chairs, and shovel and bucket for kids, and boogie boards!   We had dinner and breakfast at Raya. Beautiful view! Overall, it was a beautiful stay.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you and we are so glad our ladies and gentlemen created a memorable experience for you.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Beautiful beach front property.  Rooms are small or maybe too many furniture in the room.  Food in the hotel was great.  Housekeeping was great.  Lots to do and lots to see.  Gym facilities were great.  Spa was alright. The steak restaurant in the hotel is excellent - great steaks cooked to perfection, great wine list and service was excellent. Very cosy. Did the dolphin watching with my daughter, she enjoyed it.   We were there Feb/Mar 2014, the hotel was very busy that time.  Lots of people in the lobby, bar , coffee shop and beach.  Still found quiet spots to read.  Would love to go back off peak.
Manager Response: It was wonderful to have you with us!  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We would be delighted to assist you with your reservations in the future to ensure a less occupied time of year.  Feel free to contact the Executive Office anytime.

Summary Heading: Great hotel. Great place to stay for the fourth of july fireworks
Summary: Stayed here during the 4th. It was the perfect place to watch fireworks all the way up the coast. We saw them going off on at least ten beach/locations up the coast. The only problem was we asked a bunch of staff where we should go and no one would tell us to "just stay here"  Im not sure if they were nervous to say that or if thats the policy. It was just dumb luck that I saw them tow a barge into the harbor and anchor just outside our room. They could tell us the best place to go anywhere around for anything but just not a viewing location.
Manager Response: We are so glad you were able to enjoy the holiday with us!  We hope to have you back again for another special occasion.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary: My girlfriend and I frequent the RC brand and are never disappointed.  The Laguna Niguel RC lived up to all expectations and more.  The spa is a perfect place to heal your wounds after a wedding reception, or just having a little too much fun the night before.  Ocean view rooms were amazing.  Close to golf, surf, bars, restaurants, really anything you could want
Manager Response: It was wonderful having you as our guest and pampering you!  We have a fantastic location and excellent service, and were excited to celebrate with you.  Welcome home!

Summary: My wife and I frequent the Ritz Carlton and are never disappointed! The lounge is excellent and the Club Level is fabulous! They greet you at the front door and really go out of their way to make certain your visit or stay is the best it can be!
Manager Response: We can't thank you enough for your loyalty to our resort and brand!  We are delighted you enjoyed your recent Club Level experience and we promise to always provide you with new, unique, and personal memories that will last a lifetime.  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: There is a lot to love about this hotel. We arrived there around Valentine's Day and the entire hotel was decorated with extravagant red bouquets. The use of space to maximize enjoying the views is very well done: multiple opportunities especially from the restaurant/terrace/happy hour rendez vous spot which serves excellent drinks, snacks and has unparalleled sunset views. You can also sit outside on very comfortable lounge chairs and even ask for a picnic. Joggers will enjoy the beach run not far.
Manager Response: We love your photo, thank you!  We enjoyed your feedback and appreciate your visit. We look forward to spending many more holidays with you in the future.

Summary Heading: Ritz makes you feel like family
Summary: We just finished our 3rd stay on the Club Level at the Ritz at Dana Pointe.  The concierge staff on the Club Level goes above and beyond to make guests feel like family.  The combination of food offerings, beverages and reservations exceed all expectations.  The only slight blip this year was how crowded the club level was. At times it was hard to find a seat. We did talk to team on the club level and they tried to make accommodation. Several club guests had what seemed to be non club visitors at peak times which overcrowded the facility. This has not been the case in prior years and it was probably due to holiday weekend.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your loyalty to our resort and brand.  We always enjoy having you and will continue to provide unique, memorable, and personal experiences for you each time that you visit us.  As you can imagine our Club Level is extremely popular and we strive to always keep the experience there as exclusive as possible.  We apologize if you were inconvenienced in any way.  We would enjoy talking to you further by phone if you would be so kind to contact our Executive Office directly at (949) 240-2000.  We look forward to assisting you and welcoming you back very soon.

Summary Heading: Can't Beat the View and Location!
Summary: Stayed there a couple times for business. Have taken the wife along as well. I haven't been anywhere else that would compare even close. Views are are our of this world. Food at restaurants on site is magnificent. Weather is always good in California!
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and genlemen, thank you for your loyalty to our resort and brand.  It is always a pleasure having you with us.  We love your photos!  Thank you for your lovely review and we look forward to welcoming you back and creating more unique memories for you soon.

Summary Heading: Tough to beat the views from the bar, restaurant and common areas
Summary: Stayed here during a conference and was generally impressed. The staff and common areas exceeded my expectations. Elements of the rooms themselves seemed a bit worn or aged but still far superior to most other hotels of four or five star quality. Gorgeous views of the ocean and easy access to several good restaurants/bars not on property, too.
Manager Response: We are grateful for your feedback and appreciate your visit to the resort.  We are continuously enhancing our 30-year old gem and promise to always provide excellent services and facilities to our guests. If we can assist you in any way, or answer any questions for you, please feel free to contact the Executive Offices directly.

Summary Heading: Five Star Hotel, Five Star Sunsets!
Summary: My husband surprised me with a getaway weekend. He told me to pack for spring-like weather and to bring my bathing suit.  We would be gone for 4 days, 3 nights. We drove about 45 minutes and as we approached I had an idea but didn't want to ruin the surprise. It was the Ritz-Carlton!  We were greeted by our names as "prior guests" upon arrival which immediately makes you feel at home.  We always love ocean-front rooms when we travel and this was no different. The room had an ice bucket of champagne and one dozen red roses waiting for me upon arrival that my husband had requested in advance.  The stay was as expected, five star!  From the beautifully decorated ocean front room, private beach and all or any amenity at your fingertips if you only ask.  The staff excellent and the
Manager Response: It was a pleasure to welcome you back!  We are delighted to be your choice for your "staycation".  Thank you for your lovely review of our property, offerings and staff.  We look forward to seeing you again and providing you with another unique, memorable, and personal experience.

Summary: Lovely first class hotel in a superb location. Great amenities that you would expect from a world class property. The conference rooms and food services were excellent. Staff was friendly and accommodating.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you at the resort and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Amazing hotel on a great beach
Summary: Despite the fact that our gorgeous room was overlooking a construction site (unfortunate view!) the hotel makes up in amenities what it lacked in the room problem. The bathroom is awesome - a huge walk in shower - a separate tub and tons of amenities. The pool is fabulous and the restaurants are just wonderful. We ate twice in the hotel restaurant and breakfast twice on the lovely outdoor patio. If you are walker - this is really a great place. a path leads from the hotel down to the beach and a long walking path. Definitely a fun time. The spa is also worth a visit - great therapists and is equipped with hot tub and wet and dry saunas.
Manager Response: Thank you for your visit!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon and sharing our enhancements with you.  If we may be of assistance, please contact our Executive Offices.

Summary Heading: Amazing ocean views of Catalina Island
Summary: I recently stayed at the Ritz-Carlton And had a wonderful experience. What an incredible view and access to a great beach for both swimming and surfing! The staff is wonderful and enjoyed everything about it.
Manager Response: We couldn't agree with you more that our surroundings are magnificent and we take great pride in ensuring we protect them to best of our abilities.  Thank you for staying with us and we hope you enjoyed your Southern California, ocean front experience.

Summary Heading: The service is what makes it.
Summary: Oh my word, the only problem was there was a mix up with our room one night which left on of us three traveling in a cot for the first night... However, just because of this minor inconvenience we were moved and treated like royalty for the remainder of the trip. The people and food was out of this world. I highly recommend it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your patience and understanding.  We are glad to hear the situation was handled promptly and to your liking.  We hope to welcome you back soon for a wonderful experience.

Summary: We just got back from our third trip to this property and it never fails to impress us.  From check-in to check-out, we had a fantastic experience.  The service we experienced was always fantastic with employees that are nice and responsive to any needs.  Penni, Alice and Beth were terrific to us and our children, making for a memorable family experience at the beach - we can't wait to go back soon.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback!  We enjoyed creating another unique experience for you.  We promise to make each of your visits a memorable one.

Summary Heading: Dog Gone It! Still Nice Rooms
Summary: On checking in, I was not notified that this Ritz Carlton was a pet friendly hotel, so I was quite surprised when I heard dog(s) barking throughout the day when I was trying to get some rest.  If I had been made aware of the pet policy, and realized that I was in the section where people had pets, I would have requested a room in a different section of the hotel. I was very disappointed.  That aside, I can see why any dog would love the room with its marble floor (good for cleaning up an accident) and bark with joy for the flat screen LG TV, but why isn't the screen bigger and where is the DOG TV station? :-)  The staff at the Ritz Carlton was a big plus and they are very "people" friendly :-)
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you with us!  We hope you enjoyed your overall experience and will return soon.

Summary: Possibly the best hotel I've ever stayed in.  Great service, beautiful rooms with a balcony overlooking the ocean, great pool.  My favorite experience was ordering room service for breakfast and eating breakfast on the balcony overlooking the ocean.  I also loved that you are able to text the valet parking to pick up your car ahead of time.  The hotel sits on a cliff overlooking the ocean and offers amazing views throughout the property.  I also love that the beach is in walking distance and you have access to towels, chairs, umbrellas, and boards via the Ritz.  This is the Ritz, so it is very expensive, but you get what you pay for!
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you with us.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We are delighted you enjoyed your experience and we look forward to welcoming you back and creating many more unique and personal memories for you.

Summary: I had read some unfavorable reviews amongst the many good ones prior to my arrival and was somewhat concerned.  However, immediately upon arrival I was incredibly impressed by the sheer beauty of the place and location.  Brooke at check-in greeted us and made us feel right at home.  She was professional and knowledgeable and made our arrival, after a long day of travel, very peaceful.  The views are indeed stunning, the service was exactly what one would expect at a Ritz, world-class.  Dinner at enoSteak was a most enjoyable experience.  Dolce and Keith were terrific and offered great food and wine suggestions.  Room with balcony with ocean views offered us front row seats to amazing sunsets and moon sets with perfect views of Jupiter and Venus on the Solstice.  Couldn't have
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel!  We enjoyed creating a unique, memorable and personal experience for you.  Thank you for mentioning our ladies and gentlemen.  They take great pride in the service they give.  We look forward to celebrating with you again soon.

Summary: The resort was fabulous in every way! Grounds were impeccable, rooms luxurious and F&B was devine! The only disappointment was leaving to go back home :( Definitely will go back and next time want to stay on the bottom floor - normally don't prefer ground level but at this hotel all the ground level rooms have a private patio with a fire pit...perfect for a romantic evening or roasting marshmallows with kiddos. To top it off, we had a great photo session with Pacific Dreams Photography located right on property - so convenient and hassle free! The photographer (Brent) was patient and so fun to work with. The images were available the next day along with a surprise video - we were THRILLED with the pictures and the video made us cry tears of joy. Thanks to everyone at the hotel
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We are delighted you enjoyed your experience.  It was a pleasure capturing your stay with Pacific Dream Photography.  We are excited to have them as part of our team.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: The view of the Pacific Ocean from this hotel is amazing.  It sits high above the beach, right on the coast. The room we stayed in was somewhat outdated.  The plumbing wasn't working properly.  The outdoor fire pit was also non-functional.  For a property of this caliber, one would have expected a little better.  That said, the staff and property are top-notch and the food was delightful.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for staying with us.  We appreciate your feedback regarding the firepit and we are delighted you enjoyed your overall experience.  If we may be of assistance, please conact our office directly at (949) 240-2000.  Thank you!

Summary: My wife and I visited the Ritz recently for a work/leisure trip.  The hotel is very nice.  The moment you check in, there is a real time screen showing you the beach.  They also have a bowl full of delicious salt water taffee.  Our room was very nice, clean, and had a nice view of the pool.  The views around the hotel are amazing, especially the ones from the hallways and restaurant overlooking the Pacific Ocean.  Absolutely breathtaking.  The food in the restaurants is very good too.  I recommend the shrimp tacos with sweet potato fries (lunch) and the California burrito (breakfast).  Lastly, the staff, especially the beach staff are very accommodating.  They will take you to the beach in a shuttle although the walk is not bad. They also provide chairs and umbrellas which is
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your beautiful photos.  It was our pleasure to provide you with a memorable experience and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: We had an Executive Suite (Family of 5) overlooking the garden and pool area - loved the view; ocean views of course more expensive.  If you are looking for 6-star customer service, stunning views of the ocean, atmosphere and elegance then this is your place. I cannot say enough about the service at this resort, yes the room rates and food are pricey but the service is in my opinion without a doubt was by far the best service I've ever experienced. We love Southern California vacations and The Ritz Laguna will not disappoint.   The "Must Do" is sitting at 180blũ and having a drink and/or appetizer, take in the views of the ocean! Spectacular! The Manager Richard Mancuso and the staff there are just incredible!  We did not rent a car but that's just us, we never do on vacation,
Manager Response: Your photos are beautiful!  Thank you for sharing them.  We are delighted you enjoyed your experience at our resort.  We enjoyed having you!  Our team prides ourselves on providing a warm, relaxed yet refined ambience.  Of course our location is second to none as well!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: We recently attended a business conference at the Ritz. The hotel is fantastic - the normal Ritz hospitality you would expect.   The location is incredible; we sat one day on the outdoor patio of the restaurant and watched whales breach offshore, surfers on the waves and the general serenity all around.   The hotel did a great job with all the evening meals as well no was thoroughly impressed and look forward to returning with my family.
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us despite being here with business needs.  We will always ensure you have a tremendous experience whether it be for business or pleasure.  Welcome home!

Summary: Wish we could have stayed longer! We stayed one night on a long layover before our flight to Tahiti. It was truly an experience. The views are incredible and the staff is extremely accommodating! Hope to be back for a longer stay in the future.
Manager Response: We can't wait for you to return so you can fully experience everything our property and surroundings have to offer!

Summary Heading: Wonderful 5 day getaway thanks to the Ritz Carlton team of employees!!!!
Summary: We had an over the top wonderful 5 days at the Ritz Carlton in Laguna Niguel.  Our experience was highlighted by the unbelievabley awsome employees at the hotel.  Derek would not rest until he was sure that we were in a room that exceeded all expectations.  We upgraded our planned room and he put us in a suite that fit our needs perfectly.  We needed a quiet room to relax and enjoy and 4055 was perfect.  The concierege and hostesses (prob the wrong term) left no need unmet.  The food was delicious and they went out of their way to make sure we were well fed and pampered.  The upgrade was not inexpensive but was worth every dollar.  Thanks Derek for your concern for our comfort and special needs.  We hope to return soon. Steve and Susan
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed the suite and our exclusive Cluv Level.  We couldn't agree with you more that our Club experience is amongst the best in the world.  We look forward to welcoming you back again very soon.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel as your luxury resort of choice.

Summary: I stayed here in early June for a 2 day conference. The views and location of this property are sensational. There are moments looking out through some of the public area windows you would think you were on a cruise ship! I remember coming here as a young adult many years ago when the Ritz Carlton brand was almost opulent, antiques and large open fires. Times have changed. I found this Ritz Carlton to be a little "tired" (certainly our pool view room - which was also small and dark for US standards). It's a nice property, don't get me wrong, but I'm finding myself drawn more frequently to boutique style accommodation as these larger high end chains are loosing their edge in the level of unique quality accommodation and personal service. The views are exceptional. The outdoor
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We enjoyed having you!  Thank you for your feedback, and if there is anything we can do for you, please do not hesitate to contact the Executive Office directly at (949) 240-2000.

Summary: We were visiting relatives in laguna niguel after travelling down the coast from San Francisco.  We are Marriott Platinum members and have stayed in many Marriotts and Ritz around the world.  We were staying during a busy Easter weekend this year and were using points for a room - and were very pleased when we were offered an upgrade upon check in without asking.  We had just come from the JW Marriott in San Francisco where we paid for a very average stay in a very average room.The service and location of the Ritz Laguna Niguel exceeded all our expectations.  The views and grounds were beautiful and our room was spotless.  Beds were comfortable and location was convenient for beach - with the only exception that the beach trolley and chair service wzx sporadic as the weather was
Manager Response: We enjoyed having you and it was a pleasure surprising you with a complimentary upgrade!  We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: From the moment we checked in on Friday night until our happily granted late check out on Sunday afternoon, we enjoyed every moment. From the fabulous valets to the front desk staff, our bellman, Matthew and the incredible staff on the Club Level~stellar service! It felt nothing short of "your wish is our command" and with pleasure. We loved sleeping with our door open and hearing the surf. We spent 2 days poolside and the pool was especially nice because it was protected from the chilly air off the Pacific. Located in a beautiful courtyard area next to the fitness center (views for days) and spa.  Thank you to the incredible staff who contributed to making our stay in room 4040 the best experience. We cannot wait to come back for a longer stay.
Manager Response: It was wonderful to welcome you to the resort. We are delighted you enjoyed a memorable experience and we look forward to creating more memories for you soon. A fireside room for your next visit is a must!

Summary: Billion dollar views save this hotel from complete mediocrity.  I attended a conference for a week and enjoyed the grounds, the views and (mostly) the SoCal cuisine, although all food servings were excessive (par for the US).  However the service was lacklustre and little things like absence of international power plugs or adapters made business difficult at times.  The gym was okay but there were no steam rooms, showers etc as you would expect, and neither pool was very inviting, with no views or real ambience (a little background music perhaps?). In need of some TLC, this hotel has potential, but falls short in value
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you very much for your detailed feedback.  We have taken it seriously and constructively.  We always appreciate hearing from our guests and are continuously listening and acting upon our guests' thoughts, wishes, and needs.  We have exciting enhancements forthcoming at the resort and we look forward to welcoming you back when they are complete.  Our team strives to provide the finest memorable service as well as the finest facilities and we are continuously evolving and updating our offerings.  If we may be of service to you in the future, kindly contact the Executive Office directly.

Summary Heading: Tired rooms saved by views and location
Summary: The resort is in a great part of town with full ocean views and direct access to the beach. Service was also very friendly and generally of a high standard, though I was surprised that a hotel of this calibre (and price range) does not provide guests with international adapters and instead makes them pay $25 to purchase one from the gift shop. The rooms are clean and well maintained, but not your typical Ritz Carlton standard. As observed by other reviewers, they are long overdue for a refurbishment. This has potential to be a great resort, and the location is unbeatable. Pity about the room conditions and lack of consideration for international visitors' needs.
Manager Response: On behalf of our executive team and all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel as your luxury destination. We greatly appreciate your patronage and your feedback. We have taken your constructive comments seriously. Thank you as well for letting us know about the adapters.  We have them available in several areas of the hotel and we apologize you were not informed correctly.  We would never willingly made your experience less than easy and relaxing.  If you would like us to add this to your profile for future visits, please contact the hotel directly and we will take care of it for you.  In addition, we have many exciting enhancements taking place in the resort this year and next year.  We look forward to sharing them with you upon completion.

Summary Heading: Stunning View, Impeccable Service But Tired Old Room and Slow Wifi
Summary: The property is located on the cliff overlooking the beautiful Salt Creek Beach and Dana Point. Definitely 5 stars for the location, the view and the service. Wonderful easy access to the beach and may offerings of activities. But the rooms and wifi were in dire needs for an update.   We arrived on a Friday evening on a very busy weekend. The hotel was hosting several conferences/corporate retreats over the weekend. The check-in took quite a bit longer than expected as the hotel ran out of the room/bed type we requested in our reservation.    We got a modest room, which we were fine with until shower time.  The moldy grout (not terrible but was there nonetheless) was a real turnoff and should not be seen at a hotel like this. The wifi went in and out and was unreliable, making
Manager Response: On behalf of our executive team and all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel as your luxury destination.  We greatly appreciate your patronage and your feedback.  We have taken your constructive comments seriously.  There is no excuse for our phones and wife not working properly; nor mildew in the bath area.  You can rest assured that these issues will be addressed asap.  We are delighted you enjoyed your overall experience and all that our magnificent surroundings and our team have to offer, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Maybe its me, but I wasn't impressed.  The problem started when I  wanted to check into a room at 1:00 p.m.  However, a room was not available until 3:30.  I was there only for one day.  Further, when I asked for a late check out, I was only given 1:00 p.m. the next day.  Now, had this been a Hyatt Place hotel or a Courtyard by Marriott I wouldn't mind.  However, at the extremely high price the Ritz charges, one would expect to get at least 23 hours.  Further, they automatically add on high resort and parking fees ontop of the room rate. The room itself was not particularly large although the bathroom was.  The bed was comfortable. I attended a banquet there and the food was good. The staff was very friendly and helpful, but not particuly polished. I had trouble getting wifi
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  We greatly appreciate your business and your feedback.  Your comments have been shared with our leadership team.  We are continously striving to provide the best possible personal service and excellent facilities for our guests.  We apologize that a late check out was not available on the weekend you stayed with us. We hope to have that available for you the next time you join us.  Please contact the executive office prior to your stay and we will make note of your special requests.  The spottiness of our wifi access has been taken care of.  Thank you!

Summary: The hotel notes is the oldest resort on the OC Coast and this is apparent in the rooms and not in the service.  Its so nasty went the plastic shower curtain blows against my body because this hotel does not have showers, but instead just a showerhead in the bathtub and those nasty plastic blow inwards shower curtains that have touched the naked bodies of hundreds of others.  Plus, the rooms are small and dated and none of the swimming pools have an ocean view.   Plus there is only one small outside sitting area to see the ocean, not what one expects from a hotel situated near the water.   The St. Regis, a much newer hotel, is where to stay, and not the Ritz-Carlson that has no comforts more than a Holiday Inn.  Plus, forget extended check-outs.  I'm a Marriott life-time Platnum
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we were saddened to read your comments about our legendary resort and service.  Our team takes great pride in providing unqiue and personal service, as well as pristine and clean facilities and rooms.  We sincerely apologize for letting you down, and we would enjoy talking to you personally so we can attempt to regain your faith in us.  If your schedule allows, please contact the executive office directly to discuss your recent visit and possible future visits.  Thank you for taking the time to provide your review on TripAdvisor.

Summary: 7 days of bliss in at the Ritz Laguna Niguel. The property is stunningly beautiful, Ritz service is incomparable and the food was good. We had a suite on the Club Level and especially appreciated the warmth of the Club Level staff. Our daughters are asking to go back!
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed your Spring Break experience at our resort!  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We hope you return soon so we may create more memories for you.

Summary: This place was amazing!! The views are gorgeous!! We had a room on the first floor with a fireplace on the patio which we enjoyed every night with a glass of wine 😊. I was able to enjoy a cup of tea every morning overlooking the ocean  from the chairs on the lawn. Don't forget to bring your tennis shoes! You can walk down to the beach to take a nice peaceful walk while enjoying the beautiful view. The rooms are nice,but not as nice as I expected, it was smaller than I expected. The staff was very friendly. If you are looking for a nice romantic vacation,this is the place for you!
Manager Response: Aren't our outdoor fireplaces awesome?  We enjoyed having you stay with us as you did enjoying your experience at the resort.  We hope you return soon!  There is so much more exploring for you to do.

Summary: What a blissful and beautiful resort. We enjoyed our stay, we had a beautiful ocean view. Good food, Good service, typical Ritz' s service, however the greetings is a bit too much, though we appreciate the effort. Overall, we are pleased and will be back again for sure
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  It is very helpful!  On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to creating another unique and memorable experience for you soon.

Summary: Perfect location to relax, watch the sunrise and sunset.  Panoramic view of the beach.  A little pricey but worth every penny to splurge on a very special occasion, worth coming back.  Staffs are friendly and helpful, excellent service.
Manager Response: We couldn't agree with you more that the sunrises and sunsets in Dana Point are extraordinary.  We are delighted you enjoyed your experience with us and hope you choose to return soon

Summary: Second best club room ever been to of ritz properties . The best part is you enter off elevator right onto club room, no special rm to go to . They are smart , because in room they have empty cooler to bring back beverages .also requested refrigerator to keep things colder, was no charge.  The naples beach resort in Florida is the best, but this comes close.  Property and views of ocean great. Surfing really big there.  Close to laguna beach, Newport Beach . Only 1/2 hr from Disney. Highly recommend , was our 2nd stay there.
Manager Response: THank you for your valuable feedback.  We enjoyed it and will share it with our team.  We are always looking for ways to innovate our guest experience and we rely on our guests' comments.  Thank you for choosing us as your luxury destination while visiting Southern California.  We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary Heading: Loved the Decor of the Room!
Summary: Loved the refreshing style and decor of the room!  While we did not have an ocean view, the room itself made up for it.  We stayed only one night but had a chance to explore the hotel and grounds and enjoy the pool for a short time.  Didn't care for the pool area as it was surrounded on three sides by the hotel and the other side was a storage/work area.  You had no idea you were only yards from the ocean.    The interior of the property is stunning!  The ocean front area of the hotel is nice, just not much of it.  You can walk or be taken down to the water and spend time on a public beach.
Manager Response: We are delighted you had the chance to experience our resort and magnificent surroundings. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: What a lovely place to stay!  Great rooms, incredible views, excellent restaurants and exceptional service.   I can't say enough wonderful things about Lucinda in concierge.  She handled every aspect of entertaining for my husband's company.  The restaurant recommendations were first rate and she arranged for everything, even before we arrived at the hotel.  Just wonderful!  Also one of the best spa experiences I have ever had.  The facialist was excellent and the facility was comfortable and spotless. Would I go back?  IN A HEARTBEAT!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words about our ladies and gentlemen and our property.  We are delighted that you enjoyed a memorable experience and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Stayed here with family.  Gorgeous location and great service. Very family friendly. Room service food was fine; weekend brunch was average but the service was commendable. The beach was nice - a slight trek with stroller but there was pretty much nonstop (free) tram rides between the beach and hotel. Would definitely return.
Manager Response: We are delighted your experience at our resort. Thank you for choosing us as your luxury destination.  We hope to be of service again to you soon. Please let us know when you are planning a return visit and we will ensure all of your needs and preferences are in place prior to your arrival.

Summary: Your classic luxury resort woth spectacular views and exceptional service. My room, a standard garden view, was comfortable, quiet, and big enough. While i lacked a see view i could enjoy a pleasant little outside patio. Obviously not the best room but nice enough. The fitness room is incredible with a view on the bay that is simply spectacular. I stayed only one night so didn't have time to live the full experience of the hotel but the pool seemed pleasant. The only negative will be size: this is a very large hotel. So if you are looking for a quaint little place to spend your vacation: this is not the place!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  Next time, we hope you get to stay a bit longer.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel as your luxury destination while visiting Southern California.

Summary Heading: Great ocean views and excellent location
Summary: Love the Ritz-Carlton!   Pros: excellent place for a gorgeous ocean view.  Located along a beautiful (and long) walking path overlooking the Pacific Ocean.  Great for a romantic and semi-active getaway.  Cons: The greeting staff was excellent but a little too much "breathing down your neck" for my personal taste.   Tips: Visit the cafe/coffee shop downstairs for breakfast.  Great selection of delicious foods. Dog friendly location, if you're into that.
Manager Response: Thank you for your beautiful photos!  We are delighted you enjoyed your experience here and we look forward to your return.

Summary: My two best friends from childhood and their wives meet here for our annual eat out and meet. This place is so pretty I almost booked a room before my friends showed up. Of course my wife talked me out of it. The dining experience was wonderful. The view of the Pacific was just as spectacular. Can't wait to return.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for your luxury dining needs.  We hope you have the chance to stay overnight with us one day soon.

Summary: Fabulous location and the usual outstanding Ritz Carlton service make for a wonderful stay. The club level is amazing. Great food, wonderful concierge.........everything you could ask for in a luxury vacation.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure creating a memorable experience for you.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel as your luxury destination.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: When we arrived it was like paradise. We got upgraded to a ocean view suite which was everything we could've asked for. Amazing views, great service, awesome food and beautiful rooms! Definitely recommend to anyone.
Manager Response: We love surprising our guests with complimentary upgrades when we are able to.  We are delighted you enjoyed your experience with us.  Isn't our view incredible?

Summary: I stayed here for three nights in May. The rooms are beautiful and beautifully maintained. The view to the Pacific is absolutely spectacular as the hotel sits atop Dana Point. Every meal was delicious-even the boxed lunches were good. Plenty of  beach to walk and great beach access.
Manager Response: Thank you for your delightful comments.  We are pleased you were able to experience our property, service, and magnificent surroundings.

Summary: Last week after surprising my husband with his 50th birthday party of friends, I then added to his evening surprise with an overnight stay at The Ritz in Laguna Niguel.  The idea was for a memorable day together, this time without kids. We were pleased at the service and appreciative efforts taken as we celebrated his day.  We were able to walk the beach together after our ocean view breakfast.  Upon return, I got a Chia Latte at the cafe and we returned to our room where we sat and watched the waves for awhile.  It was a very relaxing stay that we enjoyed but not on the reasonable side from a price perspective.  We have stayed at similar quality locations for half the price in N CA.  That said, it was our vacation day not far from home in OC so we enjoyed it and the staff was
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing our exclusive, Southern California ocean front resort to celebrate your special occasion.  We enjoyed having you!

Summary: First visit to this Ritz and the location is breathtaking.  Request Ocean view room as it is worth waking up to that view.  Many choices of activities from Eco friendly to surf lessons and a great fitness center and spa.  Rooms are on the small side so traveling with a family of four is snug but the location is worth it.  Definitely a hotel to visit if you want to visit the California coast.
Manager Response: Thank you for your delightful review of our property and magnificent surroundings.  It was great having you as a first time guest and hope you returned home with some wonderful memories.  We look forward to creating more wonderful experiences for you in the near future.

Summary: Breathlessly gorgeous.  One of my favorite time to come is around the Christmas holiday.  The decoration is dreamy.  Five Stars all the way from dining to services.  Love the grounds and my morning walk around the property.  One of my top place to stay when I'm in SoCal.
Manager Response: We are proud to be your home away from home in Southern California.  We promise to always provide you with a new, unique, and memorable experience.  Thank you for your loyalty.  We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: As is evident from other reviews, this beautiful property sits atop a bluff overlooking the Pacific Ocean.  We had a third floor room overlooking the ocean and the views were amazing. The property has two swimming pools, three restaurants, a snack bar and beach access.  The property is self contained and you need transportation into town, which is a positive for some travelers and a negative for others.  The staff was very efficient and friendly.  The rooms are somewhat small and not as luxurious as other Ritz hotels we've stayed at.  We were travelling as a family of four and the two double beds were a bit tight.   All in all, a wonderful stay at this Ritz.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and enjoying our magnificent surroundings.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: This Ritz Carlton has everything you want in a luxury vacation. The service is attentive and friendly. The location is breathtaking. You can spend your entire visit walking around the property and soaking in the views of the ocean. Try outdoor yoga overlooking the water...incredible!
Manager Response: It was a pleasure sharing our magnificent surroundings with you!  We hope you departed with some fond memories and will return soon.

Summary: Stayed here a few times and have yet to be disappointed.   Attentive staff, comfortable rooms and an overall prime location in Southern CA (South Orange County) for business or leisure. Salt Creek Beach Park is below property and one of the best beaches in the county.   Only drawback for The Ritz Laguna Niguel (which might work as a positive) is that you are resort bound due to the lovely location preached atop the beautiful Pacific Ocean.  Overall, a wonderful resort & must see if you are in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  It was a pleasure having you here and we hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: We stayed here for a conference and just found the property and the staff to be exceptional. We had a room with a balcony that had a gorgeous view overlooking the Pacific, and what a great spot to take that morning walk or jog as the property sits on a cliff and there is a paved path that takes you down to the beach and from there you can go for miles, just remember to conserve enough energy to make the ascent back to the top of the cliff after you run.
Manager Response: We enjoyed having you and hope you have the opportunity to return soon!

Summary Heading: Views views and more views of the Pacific Ocean
Summary: The hotel is perched on a bluff overlooking the ocean.  A beautiful beach with easy access to swim, surf or just walk along.  Our room wagon the third floor facing the ocean and had a lovely view.  Rooms are quiet and nicely decorated.  We dined multiple times in two of the three restaurants and cannot say more good things about the food, just hands down delicious!  Enjoyed the jaquzzi and workout facility which overlooks the water.  It is a easy drive from John Wayne Airport aka Santa Ana Airport.  The town of Laguna Beach is a quick drive and fun to walk around and dine.  The hotel staff was amazingly friendly and efficient.  I would of given this hotel a 5 star rating but there were landscape people using blowers which just ruined the ambience of the hotel.
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed your experience with us and we look forward to creating more memories for you soon!

Summary: We stayed at the Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel as part of a conference group that was occupying the whole hotel.  The resort sits on a cliff overlooking the Pacific and the views from most of the public spaces are breathtaking.  We used to live in the area and there are not many hotels that can offer those views and access.  The amenities are top notch, the restaurant first class and the service wonderful.  It is everything you would expect from a Ritz Carlton.  I'm not giving it an excellent rating, however, as the room was good but not great.  It was smallish and had some awkward configurations in the bathroom.  The quality of finishes are there, but overall the space doesn't wow like it should given the price and the rest of the resort.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and we are delighted you enjoyed your overall experience at the resort.  We are continuously striving to ensure our 30-year old facility is in top-notch shape and relevant to our guests needs.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Very comfortable stay in a ground floor garden room
Summary: We stayed here for a few days to attend a conference - and extended our stay an extra night because we found it so enjoyable.  We had a ground floor garden room with a patio and a fireplace.  We truly enjoyed sitting out on the patio enjoying our morning coffee and a glass of wine before dinner in the evening.  The bed was very comfortable and the room was reasonably spacious. The staff readily provided a set of wine glasses and a microwave oven when we made plans to host some colleagues in the room (actually at sunset on the patio). It was a very nice stay and we found the staff very attentive.
Manager Response: We promise to always provide exceptional service.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna NIguel.  It was wonderful to have you with us!

Summary: When we arrived, Jonathan placed us in a room overlooking the sea and beach-- what a breathtaking panoramic view!  The patio fire pit was beautiful, and we left our door open all night to listen to the surf. The room is lovely but small with a teeny, weensy closet--to be fair, Jonathan had asked us whether size or view were more meaningful to us-- but the VIEW, the sounds of the surf, and the kindness of everyone who answers the phone, whether room service, spa, or front desk, (friendly and REAL, not robotic like some top hotels...) create a welcome that can't be matched by many top hotels around the world. We LOVE this hotel. Our only complaints?  No mini bar, tiny closet, and a cringe-worthy room service steak from Eno that would have been immediately returned had my husband
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed feedback.  We enjoy it and use it constructively.  Our fireside ocean view rooms are extraordinary and we are glad you were able to stay in one.  We enjoyed having you!

Summary: Stayed at this hotel for one night while attending a conference in April. Great location on a bluff overlooking the Pacific Ocean. Not far from Laguna Beach and all the restaurants that town has to offer.  Very attentive staff and a great place to sit with a cocktail and enjoy the views.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back for a much longer visit next time.

Summary Heading: Empty mini bar and view of the valet parking!
Summary: I had hoped for a view of the ocean after an 11 hour flight. What I got was a 3 hour delay to access my room at 4pm and a room with a view of the valet drop off in the car park. Returning after supper I found a mini bar devoid of even water. 25 mins til room service dropped off a bottle.   Was thinking of booking a family trip to Abama RC in Canaries but now thinking again. Shame.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know.  We greatly appreciate this very valuable feedback.  We can certainly note this preferences in your profile so that we have all of these requests in place prior to your arrival.  Our sister properties would be able to share these requests as well.  Thank you and we look forward to welcoming you back so we may create a truly memorable experience for you.

Summary: I've stayed in some pretty unimpressive Ritz-Carltons, so I was pleasantly surprised at how gorgeous and comfortable this Ritz is. The hotel is perched on a cliff above a beautiful, classic Southern California beach. I stayed on the club level which felt very cozy and comfortable, if a bit labyrinthine. My room was on the small side but very clean and nice. All the rooms on the West side seem to have balconies that give out on the ocean, which is lovely. The club lounge food was tasty and drinks good. There were some events (weddings, etc) going on in the hotel but being on the club level meant that I could avoid them pretty easily. The best perk of the hotel is being able to walk down to a beautiful beach and walk for a mile in either direction. I am planning to return whenever
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments.  We look forward to you being our guest again soon!

Summary: Wow, what an outstanding hotel and staff! We stayed at the hotel to celebrate our mother's 81st birthday (and an escape from a brutal Boston winter) and Laura H. at the front desk made it feel so special for her -- she's a true class act. The grounds, the ocean views and of course, that exceptional Ritz Carlton service were all fully on display. Laguna Nigel is a pristine property with the best staff I've ever encountered and a jewel in the Ritz crown. Thank you for exceeding our expectations!!
Manager Response: We are delighted we were able to provide some much needed relief and sunshine to your brutal Boston winter!  Thank you for celebrating with us.  We look forward to celebrating more special events with you in the future.

Summary: From the moment you arrive you are treated like royalty.  Valet and belldesk were quick and professional.  Our room keys were ready when we arrived and we were escorted to our room by James who was friendly, knowledgeable and professional.  The room was beautiful with a balcony overlooking the pacific ocean the california coastline.  With access to the beach, a nice selection of restaurants and bars and close to the many attractions that Southern California has to offer.  Obe of the most memorable experiences.
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed your experience at our resort and we look forward to creating many more meaningful memories for you soon.

Summary: This is a gorgeous property.  The ocean and coastal views were amazing.  The rooms are on the small side and somewhat tired.  We stayed on the club level, which was not as good as other clubs in the Ritz collection.  The service was somewhat spotty, but problems were resolved by management.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting a review about the resort.  We look forward to being of service again to you in the near future.

Summary Heading: Amazing experience at an amazing resort!
Summary: I just returned from the best resort stay I have ever experienced!  The location is second to none with the most incredible vistas.  From the moment my husband and I arrived, we knew it would be a stay to remember.  The lobby is beautiful, elegant and clean - SO clean.  The staff is friendly and helpful.  Our room was just perfect and the housekeeping staff came in twice a day to make sure everything was just so. There are beautiful trails for hiking, biking an running that are directly accessible from the hotel -  I can't wait until I have another opportunity to visit this beautiufl property.
Manager Response: Thank you for truly enjoying the experience we created for you!  We promise to provide you with another unique and memorable visit the next time you return.

Summary: We stayed over spring break for one week. We've stayed at many Ritz properties but find this one in particular to be the best. The staff goes above and beyond in every way.  They are so nice, helpful and accommodating.   The hotel is gorgeous! The room we stayed in opened directly to the grass which was great for kids to go play.  You don't feel stuck in your room at all. Our room had a firepit which was great to use at night when the little ones had fallen asleep. This is a great hotel for families.   The pool was so child friendly and fun.  The beach was beautiful.  There are many walking paths right outside the hotel too.  We have a large family and everyone was happy here. We were blown away by the properties beauty and the staff here.  To Joel, Nora, Courtney, Luis and the
Manager Response: Thank you for your delightful post and photo.  We are so glad you enjoyed our many offerings and personal service.  We strive to make sure all of our guests of any age have a unique and memorable experience with us. We look forward to welcoming you and your family back soon.  If we can prepare anything prior to your arrival that would enhance your visit, please reach out to our Guest Relations team any time.

Summary: This is such a gorgeous property situated on cliffs overlooking the Pacific Ocean! I slept like a princess the two nights I stayed here.  The service and staff was impeccable.  I wish I could only have stayed longer.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  Your sleep experience is very important to us and we are delighted you enjoyed it.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: This is one of the best hotels and locations that I have ever been to.  It looks out over the Pacific.  The staff was very friendly and helpful.  I was there on business, so I didn't have as much time as I would have liked to enjoy all the amenities, but I can't wait to come back with my family someday to enjoy it even more!
Manager Response: When will you be returning?  We can't wait!

Summary: Such a beautiful property. This is a true destination hotel. It almost feels like you are in Hawaii there.   The lobby is beautiful and has lots of comfortable seating, tons of bouquets of roses,  the restaurants and market are great.  There are 2 pools.  We spent most of the day at the larger pool which has chilled water, sunscreen, pool noodles and kick boards available. There were plenty of comfortable lounge chairs and some fun circular lounge chairs with pillows. There was drink service at the lounge chairs but we preferred to eat at a table and had a nice lunch at the poolside tables- hot dog for my daughter, chicken caesar salad for me and a sandwich for my husband. The umbrellas at the tables were perfect.   One of the best features of this hotel is the "beach Butler
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for staying with us.  We are thrilled you enjoyed your experience while with us, and that you were able to enjoy many of the wonderful amenities we have to offer.  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon so we can create more unique memories for you and your family.

Summary: It's been about a year since I stayed on the club level at this hotel with my family.  It was out of this world and worth every penny.  The service was amazing and staying on club level kind of ruined me for the typical business travel that I do.  I've been fortunate to stay at a few RC's and Four Seasons and this may be the best hotel I've ever stayed at.    This is a truly memorable place and experience.  As the title mentions I didn't want to leave, but I would have been bankrupt in about a month if I'd stayed.
Manager Response: We couldn't agree with you more that our exclusive Club Level experience is one of the best in the world.  When you combine that with our service excellence and our tremendous location, you are in for a wonderful experience.  Thank you for staying with us.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Just got back from a 3 day conference hosted at the RC  - I simply found the atmosphere, service, food, facilities and of course the location outstanding. I had a garden room  close to the resort center - it worked well for me as I like to be in and out of my room using all the facilities.. The room was amazing - unfortunately my wife was not with me but the room, the room facilities and the double bathroom would have made her day. Having the bathroom cleaned and freshened while at dinner was a nice touch too. I was a conference attendee and I was impressed how it is set up such that the attendees did not seem to detract from the holiday / relaxing feel of the place. The restaurants looked well attended and are brilliantly located and with stunning views.  I live in LA and will
Manager Response: We enjoyed having you and are delighted you will be returning soon!  Thank you for taking the time to experience our resort and our incredible location.

Summary: I visited this hotel by chance just to check out different Ritz-Carlton's within the United state and let me the pleasure of testifying that this Hotel is actually ranked one of the finest resorts in the world where I was surprised that they have basically a beach two mile long for our enjoyment of water sports as well as their two heated pools plus few tennis courts. The resort is also over looking the Pacific Ocean since it is located halfway between Los Angeles and San Diego. This is a must visit recommended 👍👍👍
Manager Response: We are delighted you visited us!  Thank you for your loyalty to our brand.  We definitely have some amazing properties around the world.  We look forward to welcoming you back to Southern California soon.

Summary: My husband & I often book a “staycation” at our local Ritz Carlton. We were fortunate enough to be situated in 'Club', I booked our 'Club' stay through Platinum AMEX  & we happily got a wonderful upgrade to ocean view there.  I must say 'Club Level' at the Ritz................ does life get any better?  We have over the years been very dedicated fans of the Ritz Carlton & have vacationed at South Beach, St. Thomas, Key Biscayne, San Juan & for many years the Ritz in San Francisco while our children attended Berkeley.  We actually had our daughter’s graduation from college there, it was indeed a "Ritzy" weekend to remember.   Our experience over the years has been perfection, primarily due to the incredible Club Concierge ladies Penni Garcia & Mary Wiesen, who went above & beyond
Manager Response: Welcome home!!  We couldn't agree with you more that our exclusive ocean front Club Level experience is so unique, relaxing and memorable.  We are delighted you had the chance to stay with us for your "staycation" and we look forward to welcoming you back very soon. Thank you for your loyalty to our resort and our phenomenal brand.

Summary: I stayed there with my family for a few days, we truly did have quite a great stay. The best aspect about the hotel is the property and location. It is just absolutely breathtaking. The service is also very good indeed and so is the food. Every restaurant we ate at was very impressive. The only downside however would be the rooms, as they are smaller than expected. With that being said however, room service, housekeeping and cleanliness is great.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  We enjoyed having you and hope to welcome you back for another memorable experience soon.

Summary: This hotel is amazing.  From the valet runners to turn down service at night.  We were amazed at how customer service is number one in this hotel.  They truly strive to provide the best.  My kids and i spent our Spring Break and had the best time of our lives.  The view is stellar and everything is just spectacular!!  I will definitely recommend and am a returning guest, no doubt.
Manager Response: Your pictures are beautiful!  Thank you for sharing them.  You summed it up best in that our ladies and gentlemen strive to provide the finest, unique and memorable personalized service to each of our valuable guests.  We are delighted you enjoyed your Spring Break and we look forward to welcoming all of you back soon.

Summary: My family and I came to this hotel for Easter. We had three ocean view rooms, all on the club level. We stayed for three nights, and had an average nightly rate close to $1200 for each room. I had high expectations because of the hotel's name, legend, and ratings. When we walked into our rooms, they were very small. However, the decor was nice and the room had just been updated. It was the bathroom though that made me disappointed, and almost angry. The bathroom was extremely outdated and consisted of a tub/shower combo, double sinks, and a separate toilet room. The tub had so many scratches and it looked like it was at least 20 years old. The shower head was old too, and in my opinion it used too much water to for California. I do appreciate the new Asprey toiletries, though.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you very much for your extremely valuable feedback. We greatly appreciate your time in posting the review of your experiences at our resort.  While we know you enjoyed many of our offerings and service overall, we can see we fell short of exceeding your expectations. Please know that our team constantly strives to provide meaningful, unique and personalized memories for every guest that stays with us.  When we learn we have not done so, we take the matter seriously.  We want you to feel good and confident about the resort, and we wish to make this right for you.  Could you kindly contact our Hotel Manager in the Executive Office at your convenience?  Thank you again for your feedback.  We look forward to speaking with you.

Summary Heading: One of the nicest hotels you can ever stay at
Summary: My wife and four kids stayed for Spring Break and had a fabulous time.   The hotel is gorgeous and situated on a cliff overlooking the Pacific and several miles of beach.   The pool was medium sized with excellent service/food with plenty of chairs.   All on sight restaurants or cafe's had great food and excellent service, although Eno Steak was pretty expensive.  The staff and service overall was outstanding and the fitness center has all the equipment you need and is situated for one of the best views for a fitness center I have ever seen.   They have shuttle service to the beach below which was always very prompt and they had chairs, umbrellas and anything else you would want for a day at the beach.   The hotel is located in a great spot to visit other beaches and to visit
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed your experience at the resort.  We hope you left rested and refreshed, and with many memories.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel!

Summary Heading: Small rooms, people can smoke on balconies causing smoke to enter your room.
Summary: I wanted to like this hotel but it isn't a Four Season. Pros, beach is great, food is good. Cons, smokers can smoke on their balcony causing the smoke to fill our room. To me this is extremely annoying. Gym is small. Rooms and bathrooms are really small.  Never coming back.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your feedback.  We are so sorry to have let you down.  We inteded for your stay to be magical and memorable.  We hope you enjoyed our magnificent, ocean front surroundings and our personalized service.  On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to your return.  Please contact our Executive Office if we may be of further assistance now or in the future.

Summary: My wife and I went for Sunday brunch at Raja. The food was very nice and the view is amazing. The service at he table was a little slow and we had to ask a couple of times for our drinks to be refilled. After our brunch we asked to have our desert on the terrace in 15 minutes, as I write this it has been an hour and 15 minutes with 2 requests to the restaurant and we are still waiting. Looks like the St Regus next time.
Manager Response: We would enjoy speaking to you personally for furthr clarification of your experience at Raya.  Please contact our Executive Office at your convenience.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We look forward to hearing from you and welcoming you back soon.

Summary: I had stayed at this property several years ago for a business meeting-- and i always maintained that it was one of the best hotels O'd ever been to (i love all Ritz properties that i've visited but the location is hard to beat).  That ocean view!  So on a recent trip to San Diego (also  business, but my husband came along), although the time didn't allow for a stay I made a point to get us back here, even if just for dinner. We had reservations at Raya but found our way to the outdoor terrace and ended up drinking, eating and soaking up the view for a wonderful evening outdoors. The drinks were perfect, the 'small plates' were wonderful and just right, and the service was friendly and accommodating even under the very crowded conditions that would be expected on a Friday night
Manager Response: Sounds perfect!  We couldn't agree with you more that 180blu is a fantastic venue with exceptional service, phenomenal view and outstanding ocean front surroundings.  We are delighted you enjoyed our food and beverage offerings and are glad you snuck away for a quick visit.  Come back soon!

Summary Heading: This luxury hotel has stunning views and is a great place for holidays and innovation events
Summary: We stayed at this hotel during a startup event. What makes this place unique is its location and fantastic views. As I remember the Ritz in Moscow for its fantastic Spa this one gets my award for the best views ever! This hotel is designed with convenience in mind. In the market place you can grab your granola or coffee and go for a walk on the beach. Highly recommended for both family holidays as well as business conferences.
Manager Response: We can't argue about our incredible location!  It is truly magnificent.  We are delighted you enjoyed your experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel and look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: My husband and I had the distinct pleasure of staying at this property last week for three nights... It is truly a beautiful place! The service is second to none! Everyone who works here goes above and beyond! They are über polite, they are incredibly customer service orientated from the chamber maids to the valet guys, any hotel can learn a lesson from this amazing hotel! The views are unbelievable! We were attending a conference and the food at ALL of our meetings was terrific, and beautifully presented! Thank you RC for a lovely relaxing stay!
Manager Response: We sure hope you can return soon whether it be for business or leisure!  We enjoyed having you and are delighted you had a memorable experience.

Summary: Quality luxury and exquisite property overlooking the blue Pacific and Catalina in the distance. Nice getaway for the romanticist in us all. Great for that special occasion when only the best will do. Club level is a nice touch with continual culinary presentations as well as full hosted bar. Additional top notch restaurants on the property and full service spa. Treat yourself to the pampering you long for!
Manager Response: We couldn't agree with you more that our exclusive Club Level Experience is exceptional. We enjoyed welcoming you and look forward to creating more memories for you in the future.

Summary Heading: Enjoy it - but set your expectations appropriately
Summary: I stayed here in March for 3 nights while attending a conference.  Rooms were not ready at check-in, the conference started at 2pm.  I did not expect that they would be ready by 1:30 - but at 4:30 not everyone in the group had a room yet, and I would have hoped that by 4:30 this would have been resolved.  The staff are for the most part incredibly gracious, and go out of there way to make sure your stay is enjoyable.   This is an older hotel, and my room was relatively basic.  It had a small mini-fridge, no microwave.  It did have great closet space.  The heating/ac fans were a bit on the noisy side, but acceptable.
