When I went to my room on check out day housekeeping was in the process of cleaning the room.  I tried to ask the attendant to leave for 10 minutes so that I could
Manager Response: Thank you very much for our valuable feedback. We completely understand and will continue to work on our processes. We look forward to welcoming you back soon for another exceptional experience.

Summary: Came here for a few days on business and extended for a break. The views, walkways, etc are majestic truly breathtaking. After landing at the John Wayne airport close by - smaller, nice, and extremely convenient / easy to navigate compared to LAX - we wanted a little cocktail and snack. At the Ritz, we went to the outside bar and watched the sunset and had wine with delicious sushi and already felt relaxed. There is s mini frig in room where you can keep sandwiches etc for beach snacks from the grocery store within walking distance (also CVS and Starbucks). The hotel also has an on premises trolley that runs to Laguna and back if you decide not to rent a car. Staff lovely and caring plus the Ritz chocolates on bed each night! There is a shuttle that takes you right down to beach
Manager Response: We enjoy "thinking of it" all so that you don't have to!  We hope each of you Ritz-Carlton experiences are easy, relaxing, rewarding, and memorable.  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary Heading: Another Fantastic Stay at a Ritz Carlton!
Summary: We spent 3 wonderful nights at the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel, with our teen/tween boys.  The hotel is in an outstanding location, sitting on top of a beach that looks like Hawaii.  We stayed on the Club Level which was the highlight- we had our car parked and didn't leave the resort for 3 days!  This was a very relaxing mini vacation in which we walked on the beach, did some yoga, ate great food while enjoying the beautiful ocean view, and went to the beach.  The service, just as all of the Ritz Carltons we have stayed at, was superb in all of the departments.  I highly recommend staying here.  There seemed to be a lot of guests that had stayed there in the past, and we will be back as well!
Manager Response: We enjoyed creating meaningful memories for you and we hope to do so again and again.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  Welcome home!

Summary Heading: Nice spot for a long relaxing weekend
Summary: This hotel is very luxurious and the staff is very friendly for the most part.  We did have trouble with one staff member in 180blu but I think the poor girl was just having a bad day.  There are two pools and two hot tubs, one on each side of the hotel.  One is larger than the other and the smaller one is more shaded.  The outside areas are limited unless you sit by one of the pools or go down to the beach, which is short walk down a paved path but be aware it is steep coming back up.  There is a shuttle that will take you down and back that is included in the resort fee.  There are a few Adirondack chairs out on the lawn but it is not a very comfy area, just sitting in the grass by the sidewalk.  There is one small patio area with a few couches and the 180blu has outside
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We are delighted you were able to take in our fantasic surroundings.  We hope you enjoyed our magnificent location and our personalized service.  We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary Heading: First trip to the West Coast
Summary: Not sure how the hotels are in California but this one had no faults.Friendly staff,great clean rooms and one of the best views I've seen. I would recommend this hotel, Oh, and the food was fantastic.
Manager Response: We enjoyed having you and we hope your first trip to the West Coast was a memorable one.  Please come visit us again soon!

Summary Heading: Classic elegance with a casual feel
Summary: The location of the Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel is drop dead gorgeous, built along the bluffs near Dana Point. The landscape and activities give a much more casual take on the usual Ritz experience, but that's not to take away from the impeccable service that is expected but still a joy. Great food and beach service are just two of the reasons to make this your hotel of choice.
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed our warm, relaxed, yet refined approach to luxury.  We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you!

Summary Heading: Great View From The Deck Lounge
Summary: We stopped by for a drink after walking the beach and were welcomed to enjoy the view form the deck overlooking the Pacific and Catalina Island.  The hospitality was great and the view terrific.  Whether your a guest or not, I recommend a stop.
Manager Response: Please stop in any time!  We have the most gorgeous location for either a quick visit or an overnight stay.  We look forward to your next visit and providing you with another unique and memorable experience.

Summary Heading: Stunning location. Great Service. So so rooms.
Summary: Amazing location with stunning ocean views. Easy walk to the beach or take advantage of free hotel shuttle. Legendary Ritz Carleton service at all times. The staff pride themselves in answering your every question themselves and not passing you on to others. We found that to be true on every occasion. Our room however was not ideal. It had no view (other than a concrete wall) and was on the small side. Everything worked fine, it just felt more like a motel room than a Ritz Carleton room.  There are however some very nice rooms, including ones with a walk out balcony/outdoor fireplace and great views. Just be sure to specify what you want (and are willing to pay for) at the time of booking.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing your feedback.  We are delighted you enjoyed your overall experience and hope you had the opportunity to take in some of Mother Nature's many offerings.  You are correct, we have many room types and are always happy to answer any questions you may have about them.  Our ladies and gentlemen look forward to your return soon.

Summary: Love this place! I come here time to time to have a after moon tea or go for a walk with my gf  on the beach since I live near by.  People here are always nice and the view always relax me up.  There is a self parking right in front of the hotel, self paid type just look for a parking ticket boot.
Manager Response: We enjoyed seeing your photos!  Thank you for your loyalty.  Please let us know if there is anything we can ever assist you with.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: First, I need to say that this trip was a business trip, so it was free for us. As a result, it is difficult to complain, but easy to be objective.  The good: The property is beautifully sited high above the beach. Our bed was comfortable, the property was spotlessly clean, and the food was fairly good. The public spaces have a "wow" factor. Very nice lobbies and pools.  The not so good: The rooms are small for the price and some of the "balconies" are comically small (two people could not sit on ours).  The resort feels crowded-more the layout than the size.  The property is isolated and you cannot walk into town. You also cannot really enjoy the beach, as it is a trek down the hill from the property.  If you are searching for something peaceful that is actually on the water,
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We greatly appreciate it.  We hope you have a chance to return to the resort for business or pleasure.  Our beach butlers are awaiting your arrival!

Summary: Beautiful location and well maintained hotel. However I found their reservations and cancellation policy deceptive. There staff at multiple levels were unaware of their own policies and after stating to me at check in that I would be only be charged for the nights  I stayed at the hotel as long as I was there for at least two nights, the manager reversed course at check out and insisted I pay for an extra night- a night that I was not using. I would not even expect this from a small time operator- no less The Ritz Carlton.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for your valuable feedback. We will definitely review this process with our team right away. If we can assist you or answer any questions, please contact the Executive Office directly at (949) 240-2000. We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary Heading: Not a "Ladies and Gentlemen Serving Ladies and Gentlemen Experience"
Summary: I live nearby to this hotel and try to frequent it as much as possible. However last evening at about 7:30 p.m. there was a loud concert going on in the parking lot at this hotel that was deafening to me as a nearby resident.  I called the hotel to see if there was a concert going on as I suspected it was coming from this property and the operator answering the phone was quite rude.  She said she could not tell me what was going on, but yes, there was live music.  When I noted that it was extremely loud and a disturbance of the peace for those of us who lived nearby, she dismissed me by stating in a very snotty tone that the city of Dana Point had approved it, it would be going on until about 10 or 10:30 p.m. and there was nothing I could do about it.  I was shocked to say the
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your feedback.  We greatly appreciate it.  On behalf of the City of Dana Point, we apologize for any inconvenience the group's entertainment may have caused you.  We will continue to work through these types of issues with the City moving forward.  We hope to welcome  you back to the resort very soon.

Summary Heading: A Very Beautiful Southern California Experience
Summary: We stayed at this hotel for a work event, but it felt like a vacation.  The staff and the hotel are lovely.  The traditional design is appropriate to the space, and we enjoyed our room.  The beds are fantastic!  For this stay, we were on the concierge level, so we took advantage of the Concierge Lounge, which offered breakfast, lunch, afternoon snacks, coffees, and beverages of all kinds.  It was definitely a treat.  For the work portion of our experience, we spent several days in the ballroom, and it was very comfortable.  There was really only one hiccup in our overall experience, which was when we ordered room service for lunch one of the days.  We ordered salad, but they did not bring any forks on the tray!  (Luckily, we had some in our travel bags.)  Other than that, the
Manager Response: We enjoyed having you and are delighted you were able to enjoy some down time while on business.  We look forward to creating many more memorable experiences for you in the future whether you return to our Laguna Niguel property or any of our other amazing properties worldwide.

Summary: OMG! What can I say,  it's the Ritz Carlton!!!! Enough said!  Just kidding!  I loved my stay here for a conference Dec'14.  The hotel and staff were phenomenal!  The views and the hotel itself were awesome!  Great gym or you can taking the walking/jogging trail right outside the hotel!  The beach was really nice right outside hotel also! The staff were wonderful and so hospitable!  I can't really speak on the hotel food because it was a little pricer than I wanted to pay so we ate food provided by conference or the couple restaurants right outside hotel. We also walked to a nearby shopping center for extra food and snacks for room.  It was right before Christmas so the hotel was decorative wonderfully for the holidays along with a very big xmas tree right outside (forgot how
Manager Response: Thank you for your delightful review of your experience at our resort. It was a pleasure having you and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Great views. Great food. But it's the level of service that makes this resort shine!
Summary: I was at the Ritz for a work event to start and I finished with a few days of vacation. The views from Raya are amazing...tremendous, fresh produce for lunch and breakfast. Gina was the bright spot of my morning each day and her support staff. She greeted me by name and even remember my 'green juice' order each morning after I finished my breakfast. Even though the rooms are a little more compact than other Ritz properties, they were very well maintained with comfortable and soft bedding and linens. For dinners, Eno Steak is the place to go...make rezis if you can. The in-bone Ribeye was delish and the secret STK sauce was a delectable addition to add to the meat. Tyler waited on my table 2 nights and his service and smile was impeccable. Raymond & Steven in guest services
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel and providing such wonderful feedback about our property and our ladies and gentlemen.  We enjoy creating memorable experiences and look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: My husband and I have been coming to a conference held here for 3 years.  The first year we stayed at the St. Regis, the second year at the Marriott and this year we finally got to stay at the Ritz where the conference is held. The view from the workout room is amazing.  But of the hotels, St. Regis is still the best.
Manager Response: We are delighted you were finally able to experience The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We couldn't agree with you more that our fitness center has an incredible view.  We appreciate your feedback!

Summary Heading: If I had to choose one hotel on the planet to return to, this would be it
Summary: For those of you who are looking for a quick review and not interested in the minute details, please refer to just the summary.  The remainder of this extensive review is for those who are interested.  :)  Summary:  I don’t give a lot of five star reviews, even to properties that are considered “five star”.  My husband and I usually attend several business conferences and a handful of trade shows a year, meaning that we get to stay in five star hotels and resorts at least a half dozen times per year in areas like Napa, Sonoma, SoCal, Phoenix, Las Vegas, and Chicago.  Of the five star properties, I would place Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel in a class on its own.  On paper, the amenities list may appear similar to other hotels of a similar class, but in execution, this hotel
Manager Response: What an amazing review of our property!  Thank you for taking the time to write about your experience.  It was a pleasure having you and we look forward to creating many more unique, memorable, and personal experiences for you on future visits.

Summary: Beautiful, accommodating and friendly. Prompt room service and wonderful food. The Restaurant has an incredible view. With easy access to the beach and local shopping i was able to relax and enjoy everything. our rooms and bed were very clean ,comfortable and with the balcony it was romantic and private.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel!

Summary Heading: One of a kind view and property on the ocean
Summary: We stayed at the Ritz recently for a conference.  This is a beautiful hotel, with a location you can't beat in Orange County.  Access to the beach is easy, and if you go north and south on it, mark 5 miles on your fit bit!  Rooms are roomy, but food is pricey.  Starbucks is nearby as well as a great BBQ place.
Manager Response: We hope you have a chance to return soon!  There is so much more for you to explore!

Summary Heading: Beautiful location with great public spaces
Summary: The hotel is what you would expect from a Ritz with the very attentive staff and beautiful public areas.  I have been fortunate to have been a guest at this hotel several times.  You will find a variety of rooms.  All well maintained and clean but some are more up dated than others.  This is a beautiful location with a very nice hotel.  If you have an opportunity to visit I would highly recommend it.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for your loyalty!  We look forward to creating many more unique experiences for you soon.

Summary: Walk into a lobby with hundreds of flowers--roses and several varieties of orchids.  Bouquets of roses line the corridor into the main hotel and dining room area.  Arriving early, we were greeted by Stephanie with an upgrade and a room ready for occupancy.  The room boasted a gorgeous view of the Pacific Ocean from our cliff.  The fire pit on the balcony added a welcome warmth in the evening.  Our requested down pillows were on the bed, which was extremely comfortable. When making the reservation, we were asked if we were celebrating a special occasion,  I replied that it was my husband's birthday.  We were offered a choice of wine, chocolates, cookies.  I said anything would be lovely.  That afternoon, a beautiful chocolate mousse cake was delivered to our room! We had lunch on
Manager Response: We really enjoyed having you with us!  We are delighted you took advantage of our magnificent surroundings and our many offerings.  We hope to become your new home away from home.  We will always provide you with a new, unique and memorable experience.

Summary: My wife and I spent five days at the R-C Laguna Niguel this past week. We paid for a standard room but they generously upgraded us to a room on the ground floor Oceanside with a private fire pit. It was a beautiful and comfortable room and the fire pit made it all the more interesting and enjoyable. In addition they left a welcome treat of chocolate cookies and a bottle of red wine for me and my wife.   The property has the most beautiful views around. Right on the ocean overlooking a gorgeous beach and an ocean full of surfers. There are miles of walking paths through the nearby Monarch Bay golf course and the adjacent beach.   The staff was friendly and helpful. Unfortunately, the group dinner I attended on Saturday night was one of the worst meals I have ever had at a R-C.
Manager Response: Thank you for your visit and providing your feedback. We enjoyed hearing from you and have passed your comments along to the appropriate leaders regarding your banquet experience.  We would like to update your preference profile with your bath requirements.  If you could kindly contact our Resort Services team at 949-240-2000 and provide your full name, we will take care of that so that your next stay with us has all of your favorites included.

Summary Heading: So pretty- best view- good service
Summary: We only had a short weekend here, though the view is enough to make you take a moment from your everyday life and just enjoy!  The place was beautiful!  The staff were so caring. Even at dinner the waiter was overly nice noticing i was not feeling well, offering to bring me a tea etc.    We saw a wedding that was going on while were were there. it was so pretty! breathtaking!   room service awesome! as expected!   Had Lunch looking over at the ocean! probably one of the best nachos i ever had. service wise.. maybe not.   Everything was great!  Though after being at other ritz carlton's the beach service they call a service is not much when you have to lug a chair on your back  yourself!  And on top of that when you call for pick up, they take you half the way back up due to the
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you.  Thank you for staying with us!  We enjoyed seeing your photos.  We apologize if our Beach Butler Service failed to meet your expectations and we appreciate your feedback.  Our normal standard is to always take and pick up all of our guests while providing everything you need at the beach.  You should never have to ask for anything!  We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: Ritz as Laguna Beach is one of those places that you must stay at when in California.    Its setting is spectacular and the whole aura of this place is filled with the purpose of having a great fun-filled vacation.  Excellent staff and great food.  Captures the essence of California.   Have stayed here twice and would not hesitate to go back.
Manager Response: We enjoyed having you back with us again!  It is our highest mission to always provide a warm, relaxed yet refined Southern California experience filled with unique and personal memories.

Summary Heading: Excellent place to stay for a few days - though bring your own soda!
Summary: The view of the ocean is to die-for, as is the quality of the staff.  The price is high -- it is a Ritz Carlton -- but the rooms are nicely appointed and as I said the view from the restaurant and some of the rooms is just beautiful.  The pools are nice, as is the pool menu (although the menu is a bit small).  Perhaps the biggest problem is the lack of a good minimart.  The cafe-place is nice but way overpriced for such basics as soda, etc.  So, if you are addicted to any type of non-alcoholic drink, make sure to bring your own!
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed our magnificent surroundings as well as the service provided by our ladies and gentlemen.  We certainly do not want you to bring your own favorites, so please let our Resort Services team know of your favorite snacks and beverages and we will have them waiting for you for your future stays.  It's our pleasure!

Summary: This hotel is in a wonderful location.  I have stayed here before, years ago, and it was lovely and elegant.  Now.............not so much.  My room was spacious, but very dated.  Old furniture, walls and carpet not maintained well, out-of-date shower fixtures.  Second, room service was terrible - delivered the wrong meal and the wait was exorbitant.  Third, service was spotty - some people were very nice, others were just rude.  Fourth, soundproofing is not good - could hear entire conversations in the hallways.  Finally, the hotel seemed like a playground - as others have mentioned - for children and dogs.  There are a number of beautiful hotels in this area - the Ritz needs to make some significant improvements to compete.  I'm surprised that Ritz hasn't invested in renovating
Manager Response: On behalf of our executive team and all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for your detailed feedback.  We enjoy hearing from our guests as it helps us in our continuing efforts to provide outstanding facilities and service excellence.  Our resort has some exciting enhancements scheduled for 2015 and we look forward to sharing them with you.  If we can assist you with future reservations, please contact the Executive Office directly.  Thank you again for staying with us and providing your feedback.

Summary Heading: Great location with quite some room for improvement
Summary: To start with the good things, the location is great, overlooking the bay. Surf, run on the beach, watch the hummingbirds and Pelicans and listen to the waves. This is just great. All the staff is super friendly and attentive. The rooms are spacious and the the garden level ones on the ocean side facilitates even a gas chimney, which is great if it gets a bit chilly during in the evening in February.  So far so good, even though you almost see it, the place is quite old, somebody told me they had 30iest anniversary some time back. So some cracks in the marble are totally acceptable, a shower head not even reaching my chest in top position is a bit outdated. If you stay close to a lift, you will also here the bell, every time a lift arrives, you will here it move up and down and
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for staying with us and providing your valuable and detailed feedback.  We are delighted you enjoyed your overall experience and our fantastic location.  We are currently working on many of the details you noted and hope to have the chance to host you again in the near future.  We hope you enjoyed our unique and personalized service.  Thank you again for your business.

Summary Heading: Beautiful views, hotel, and outstanding service.
Summary: We had a wonderful experience here! My husband had a conference here and I tagged along with our two children (one being a 5 month old). The hotel staff were more than welcoming. They brought us a little gift bag for the baby! I also do not eat diary, soy, eggs, or red meat. They were more than helpful about this and I ate very well. Patrick, our bellman, was incredibly polite, helpful, and eager to assist. We hope to return soon!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for tagging along!  We enjoyed having you and are delighted you enjoyed your experience.  Thank you for sharing your feedback!

Summary: My husband, my 13-year-old daughter, and myself checked into this property for a five night stay. We upgraded to the Club Level and were astounded at the level of service we received. All of the staff on this level went far beyond what we could have imagined. All staff on the property site were friendly, courteous, and did everything they could to make our stay exceptional. Having said that, I have to say that our room was very nice but not anything exceptional.  It was clean and well appointed but did not compare to properties such as the Bellagio in Las Vegas. All in all, we truly enjoyed our stay at this property and would return.
Manager Response: We are delighted that you had the chance to experience our exclusive Club Level.  We couldn't agree wtih you more that our Club Level is one of a kind.  We hope you enjoyed our ocean front resort and magnificent surroundings!  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel!

Summary: We had the most amazing time at this gorgeous resort!  First off, the views are unbelievable.  Pair that with the kind of service that only the Ritz Carlton offers and this place can not be beat.  We had lunch while lounging around at the pool and while the gentleman that helped us was really busy, he still refilled my iced tea.  And when we wanted to go down to the beach we called their Beach Butler who set up chairs and an umbrella for us.  While we could have taken a shuttle down (they run every 15 or so minutes), we decided to walk down and everything was ready for us when we arrived.  After hours of playing in the sand, we were exhausted, so that golf cart shuttle came in really handy;)  Few tips to those that are going to be staying here: 1) They have a beautiful and
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we are are delighted you enjoyed your "staycation" right in your own backyard!  Thank you for staying with us and providing your detailed feedback. We enjoyed having you and your family experience our resort and we look forward to creating more memories for you in the future.

Summary: I attended a conference here and stayed 2 nights. Wish it could have been longer. It was simply the most luxurious hotel I have ever been in. I had a room on the ground floor on the ocean side. I thought I would not like that as I usually prefer a high floor but it was wonderful to just open my door in the early morning and step outside to have my coffee while watching the ocean. Very relaxing.
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed your ocean view experience. We hope you also enjoyed the service from our ladies and gentlemen, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: This hotel is a must go! Its on top of a clif overlooking the ocean the view is absolutely breathtaking!!!!!  Everything at this hotel is beautiful...the flowers in the lobby (changed weekly), the paintings, the rooms.. Etc  The staff is very kind and helpful they even place and turn your lounge chair so youre always under the sun at the pool... The food is absolutely delicious... Huge wine selection... Bar overlooking the ocean.. I rarely give out perfect scores but this hotel  well deserves it.. I had coocking lessons there went put on a surf trip ...the hotel arrages everything for you even the transportation and the surf borad rental...
Manager Response: We enjoyed creating a unique, memorable and personal experience for you, and we look forward to doing so again soon!  Thank you for staying with us.

Summary Heading: The Beautiful View takes you out of this world
Summary: The view is to die for! The weather is fantastic! The food is wonderful. The staff is friendly and helpful. The location is so beautiful. There is no way you can not relax here. When you walk in the hotel you feel like you are going to be treated wonderful and you are.The room is sunny and quiet.If you want elegant surroundings and a view that is unparalleled stay here!I would stay here again and highly recommend!
Manager Response: We are delighted you had the opportunity to experience our warm, relaxed yet refined ambience.  It was a pleasure creating memories for you!  We hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: Start with the most spectacular views one can imagine. Waking each day to the beauty of the morning Sun glistening on the Pacific Ocean along with the most perfectly manicured grounds I've ever witnessed and you've discovered the Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel. Without a doubt one of the finest properties under the Ritz label.  The hotel sits on a cliff nestled away from everything else. Very tranquil and romantic Simply magnificent!!!
Manager Response: We enjoyed helping create life-long memories for you!

Summary: My husband and I spent 4 nights here and sadly left unimpressed, in several aspects.  I would like to disclose that our stay at the Ritz was just about a year ago.  I distinctly remember writing a review for this property, and noticed just today that it was never posted.  Not sure what happened, but nevertheless felt compelled to go ahead and submit my review again.   Upon arrival, our check in went smoothly and quickly and we were off to our room.  The room was unimpressive, in my opinion.  We expected more from the Ritz.  While our bed was quite comfortable and the size of the room was decent, the rooms could definitely use some upgrading.    Mid February last year, it was unseasonably cold for this area!  So, my next comments are noteworthy.  We were only able to enjoy the
Manager Response: Thank you for remembering your stay with us and providing your feedback.  We look forward to welcoming you back someday soon.  We will ensure you have a unique, memorable, and personal experience.

Summary: I had an extraordinary experience at this hotel. My clients frequently house me at high end hotels, but this one is way beyond the luxury norm. The rooms are lovely as expected, and quite roomy. The food is excellent, as are the conference facilities. Many rooms have ocean views. The staff is unusually helpful. And, if you're staying on the Concierge Level, you'll meet an incredibly helpful staff that is informal, full of good information, and willing to accommodate schedule demands. Both Penny and Beth were amazing and were able to help me at odd hours (I was presenting at a meeting in the hotel), so I got to eat and rest my jet lagged self. Great job! Can't recommend it more highly.
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed a comfortable and memorable experience at our resort!  We promise to always provide you with personal and caring service.  We look forward to your return.

Summary: Tagged along on my husbands business trip and was so happy I did.  This was a beautiful property with top notch service.  We could open the doors of our small balcony and de the crystal ocean and sit and feel the warm sun.   The staff was very attentive and polite.   The food was very good.  I would def return
Manager Response: Thank you for tagging along! We enjoyed having you. We are delighted you will be back again and we promise to provide you with a unique, memorable, and personal experience.

Summary Heading: Great Setting But Rooms Need More
Summary: Unbelievable setting overlooking the Pacific with a beautiful beach.  Facilities are very nice but rooms are average for this type of property.  Food was excellent.  No beach service in winter and spa is on the small side.  Good for romantic weekend getaway but rooms will take some of the shine off of the stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your visit and thank you for providing your valuable feedback. We are looking forward to welcoming you back soon and sharing our upcoming enhancements with you.

Summary: Stayed here for a company conference. Overall the hotel is in good condition and very clean. Having a balcony to sit outside was nice and the bed was comfortable. Work space was limited and connectivity was odd but I guess you don't come here to do a lot of work. Wireless was ok but had trouble with hard wired access. Tv was very small for the size of the wall and type of hotel. Would have expected something much larger. Good overall was good. The location however is spectacular. Set up high on a hill and overlooking the ocean - the view is breath taking. The sunset one night might have been the coolest thing I have ever seen. Would definitely love to take my fiancé here next time for a weekend getaway.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we would be delighted to welcome you back for a personal leisure visit anytime.  Thank you very much for your feedback.

Summary: Staying at the Ritz Carlton in Laguna/Dana Point was one of the best weekends I have experienced in years. My boyfriend and I went for a romantic getaway and were there in one hour. The food was so superb that we never left the hotel.  We booked the trip through the American Express Fine Resorts program and were happy to have been upgraded to a room on the ground floor with our own fire pit and a view of the water. We were able to have s'mores on our patio and watch the sunsets. The spa was clean and very relaxing. I had a stone massage that was one of the best I've ever had.  If you're looking for a romantic getaway, this should be at the top of your list.
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed your "staycation"!  We couldn't agree with you more that The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel is a very romantic and special place with an incredible location.  We enjoy creating unique, memorabe, and personal experiences and hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary Heading: You can do a lot better
Summary: I am staying here because my conference hotel (St. Regis) was overbooked.  I'm not paying for it so should be indifferent.  Nonetheless, as a seasoned traveler, I understand quality and this dated gem is lacking in service and quality.  My interior courtyard (no water view) room cost $500 per night.  For that I would expect a very modern room but it is really no different than an average Marriott or Courtyard.  The bed was nice but again at this price point it is to be expected.  Service in general was poor.  Room service was slow and late in the mornings and when I arrived at the hotel late, there was no room service available late night except for cold cuts and non-prepared items - really unacceptable for what is purportedly a five star resort. The main floor outdoor bar is
Manager Response: Thank you for your extremely valuable feedback!  May we assume you are still on property?  If so, could you kindly contact the Executive Office at your earliest convenienc?  We wish to make this right for you.  We intended for your stay with us to be excellent.  We would enjoy learning more and we care about you.  If we have missed you, we still welcome the opportunity to speak to you (949) 240-2000.  Thank you for staying with us.  We hope to have the chance to welcome you back and regain your confidence in The Ritz-Carlton.

Summary: Great staff, restaurants, views.  Only drawback was menus were limited for people with allergies.  The gym is fabulous with views of the ocean while you work out.  The decor is pretty.  2 pools to use with hot tubs.
Manager Response: We enjoyed having you!  The next time you have a chance to visit us, please call our Executive Offices prior to your arrival and we will create wonderful menu options for you.  It would be our pleasure!

Summary: Putting on the Ritz was what the Ritz Carlton Dana Point did. From the moment we drove up to the Hotel everyone greeted us with smiles and helping hands. The hotel sits up high on a bluff overlooking Catalina Island and the Pacific Ocean. When you entered the hotel there were beautiful floral arrangements lining the foyer and a  live-feed of surfers riding waves on the ocean below the hotel. We got to the hotel before the normal check-in time, and they said our room was not quite ready.  My husband unfortunately was not feeling well, so I asked if they could get us in asap. Within 5-10 minutes we got a page saying the room was ready.  The Bellman, Adam was more than helpful going over the property map and location of The Spa, Restaurants,exercise facility, tennis court usage,
Manager Response: On behalf of our entire team, thank you for your glowing review!  We are delighted that you enjoyed a unique, memorable and personal experience while being at the resort.  We are excited to welcome you back so we can create more life-long memories for you.

Summary: I was here for a conference. The staff, the rooms, the grounds, the conference facilities, and most of all, the OCEAN VIEWS make the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel worth a long weekend stay. Parking is expensive, but no more than that of a typical luxury hotel. Savvy traveler hint: across the street from the hotel's driveway entrance is public parking. A short walk, and with weather like SoCal's, who minds a stroll to save a little money for other fun?
Manager Response: We enjoyed having you and hope your conference was a huge success.  Thank you for your feedback and photos!  We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel but paper thin walls
Summary: I'm here for the second time and I'm not as impressed as I was the first time.  Yes, it is perhaps one of the most beautiful views of any hotel I have ever stayed at.  It is a typical Ritz Carlton all the way.  From its unique fragrance to the marble bathrooms.  One thing though, I couldn't get a good nights sleep here!  Between babies crying, dogs barking all morning (they let dogs stay here and there was a very big one in the next room) and doors slamming its very upsetting especially at 400+ a night.  I complained a few times but nothing appears to have been done.  Can't wait to go home and get some sleep.  By the way,  as you can see from my profile pic, I am a dog lover.  My dog however stays home and is well trained in public.  Other then that, everyone was very nice and
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for staying with us.  We trust your meetings were successful ones.  We enjoyed having you here for your business needs; however we are disappointed that your sleep experience was interrupted.  We certainly did not intend for that to happen.  Please contact our Executive Office if we can assist you further with this issue.  We look forward to welcoming you back one day soon for a wonderful Ritz-Carlton experience.

Summary Heading: Hotel property a little dated, scenery incredible!
Summary: Well, first off this place is located on a bluff over looking the Pacific Ocean. One of the most incredible places in America. The beach below is one of my favorites in all California. You will be hard pressed to find a more incredible place to put a resort.   Staff and service were incredible as well- as you would expect.  We ate at many of the places here, food was awesome as well. Rooms clean.   But on the physical nature of the property, especially the rooms and hallways - they have to renovate this place. It is old. The lobby and common areas are fine - but it defiantly is showing its age.  I guess the location of this place lets them get by with not putting money into updating some of the areas.   You are at one amazing place - even if walking through the hallways makes
Manager Response: We couldn't agree with you more that we are incredibly fortunate to have the world-renowned Salt Creek Beach below us.  The Southern California coast is amazing scenery and we take great pride in embracing and protecting our environment.  We thank you for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back.  We are continuously enhancing our resort and hope you have a chance to enjoy it again soon.

Summary Heading: It's tired and lack of attention
Summary: I gave it 4 stars because the view trumps everything else. The property must be 25-30 years old and it shows. I will share the plus and drawbacks as bullets to make it easy. I am sure the hotel will respond with..."on behalf of the ladies and gentlemen we are so sorry to hear blah blah" but listening to the voice of customer will bring people back.   Great Things:   Views are impeccable and overall genuineness of the staff is above average. The lobby filled with flowers is a wonderful look and smell. Bryan in the gift shop was amazing to my daughter and what you would expect from a 5-star property. The gym is facing the beach and has some of the best views you'll ever see (almost makes one want to work out). The valet staff is top notch as well.   Not So Great Things:   The beds
Manager Response: We couldn't agree with you more that we are fortunate to have such amazing views from the resort.  Our surroundings are magnificent!  We greatly appreciate your business and your detailed feedback.  Thank you for sharing it on TripAdvisor.  We hope you have a chance to visit us again during our summer season when our beach butler program is functioning full time.  Our beach experience is extraordinary.  Please let us know when you are returning and we will ensure you have an excellent sleep experience as well.  Thank you!

Summary: Our group had a terrific experience here!  The staff is so nice and attentive, and the location is spectacular.  It's wonderful to listen to the surf from your room, watch the sunset and generally relax in a beautiful setting.  The staff is exceptional - they could not be more accommodating.
Manager Response: We enjoyed having you!  Will you be returning soon for some rest and relaxation?  We look forward to it.

Summary: We stayed here for a few days pre cruise. The hotel property is absolutely beautiful - stunning ocean and sunset views from ocean view rooms, surfers out on the water, seagulls fussing with each other, the sound of waves hitting the rocks at Dana Point , two beautiful pools to lay around - but what made our stay truly exceptional was the service and care of the staff on the Fourth floor, "Concierge-level" accomodation. if you come to this hotel, absolutely make your reservations on the Concierge level. I'm sure it will cost a little more, but they will spoil you horribly there. The staff there attend to every guest need, from food served free at breakfast, lunch and heavy hors douveres for dinner, wine and cocktails, pressing a shirt or slacks. We have never experienced service
Manager Response: We are so excited you enjoyed your experience at our phenomenal resort.  We look forward to creating many more unique and personal memories for you soon!

Summary: This is the most beautiful hotel we have ever stayed in.  The flowers throughout the property were stunning, as was the view.  The service was exceptional.  The concierges who helped us, Beth, Colleen, and Diane, went out of their way to make our visit special.  After two days we felt like family.  We ate dinner in the enoSteak restaurant one evening and the  sweet onion parmesan  soup was amazing, as were the  beef dishes we had. I can't wait to return.
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely comments.  It sounds as if you enjoyed many of our resort's offerings and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back soon.  Our exclusive Club Level awaits you!

Summary Heading: One of the greatest places to stay
Summary: This hotel gives a whole new meaning to luxury. It's breathtaking views and service are excellent. I would highly recommend this hotel for anyone who is visit Southern California. The ocean view rooms have a balcony where you can watch the sunrise and set each day. The surfers come out early to catch a wave. The restaurant overlooking the beach is a MUST do.
Manager Response: Your photos are beautiful!  Thank you for sharing them.  We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you and hope we have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: not the best but not the worst Ritz
Summary: I've stayed at a lot Ritz Carlton's and the one in Orange County is not the best one I've been in but it's not the worst.  The service , interiors, rooms, food area all just fair.  Really nothing that stands out and makes that extra effort.  If you are going to be staying in the area you will get a lot more bang for your buck at the St. Regis right up the street.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we can't thank you enough for your valuable feedback.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and intended for your stay to be flawless and beyond your expectations.  We hope to have an opportunity for you to stay with us again and enjoy a true Ritz-Carlton experience.  If we may be of assistance, please contact the Executive Office directly.  Thank you.

Summary Heading: Just OK hotel, coasting on location & brand
Summary: This is an OK hotel that's coasting (pardon the pun) on a beautiful location and their brand name.  Hotels at this price point that I've visited in the past are usually more attuned to an impressive, luxury, comfortable experience with every single detail.  You walk through the hotel or look around your room, and you think, “Oh, wow, they thought of everything.”  Not the case here.   For example, the bedrooms are not well lit at all, unless you have the curtains open for natural sunlight.  Which is fine during the day, but if you’re a business traveler wanting to do some work at night — or even if you just want to iron your clothing at night and be able to see the wrinkles —  very inconvenient.  Room overall was underwhelming - dingy chair upholstery and decorative pillows,
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, and our executive team, we thank you for your detailed feedback.  Thank you for taking the time to share you experience via TripAdvisor.  It has been shared with our executive team in an effort to gain insight on how we can better improve our services and offerings.  We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back, and we invite you to contact our Executive Office to discuss your experience in person.  Thank you again for your feedback.

Summary: Before I get into detail about this resort, let me say I'm not a Ritz-Carlton kind of guy when it comes to hotels. I usually prefer boutique hotels or, if funds allow, I prefer the high-end yet approachable atmosphere of The Four Seasons (specifically Santa Barbara). I tagged along with a family member who was staying at the Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel for a work conference as I desperately needed some beach action. The views of Salt Creek Beach are absolutely stunning. It happened to be a little cloudy/drizzly over the weekend but even that didn't deter from the beauty of the beach. If this property weren't right on the beach, it wouldn't have too much going for it, especially with the price tag that comes along with it. The main lobby and restaurants are nice but the rooms
Manager Response: Thank you very much for this wonderful feedback.  We greatly appreciate it.  We care about you and your experience, and we have shared your comments with the appropriate leadership.  We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to enjoy the resort, the service experience, and our magnificent surroundings.  Please feel free to make your next reservation directly with the hotel at (949) 240-2000 ext 5070.

Summary: From the grand entrance to the views, this property is hands down one of the best!  Beautiful, attentive, almost has a royalty type feel from the minute you walk in.  I hosted several events here from Conference size to 10 people and the staff remember not only my name, but my clients names, their cars, their drinks... simply superb!
Manager Response: We enjoyed having you and are looking forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: Amazing views, great service, highly recommended!! Spacious rooms! Wonderful place to take the family to. All my needs were met, money well spent! Hope to visit soon. Good surfing close by. Great for long walks along beach.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, it was great to have you!  Will you be returning soon?  We have more exceptional experiences waiting for you.

Summary: between dec 26th and jan 2nd stayed with kids, and grandkids on the club level--super luxurious suite at one end of hall, adjoining rooms at the other end. club service outstanding--food offerings to meet our dietary needs, champagne and other drinks always available. very comfortable.  pricey but well worth it. wonderful beach for surfing and walking. near lego land. excellent kid activities. good gym, good spa, good outside pools. beautifully maintained a+ property.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us for the holidays. It was a pleasure having you and your family with us.  We hope our younger guests enjoyed themselves as well, and had an opportunity to explore our beautiful surroundings and learning about our environment. We look forward to becoming your annual visit!

Summary: This ritz is beautiful. Walk through the lobby with fresh flowers daily and people waiting to help. Many cool restaurants, one inside and one outside both with beautiful views.   Make sure to get a bottom room facing the ocean and enjoy the fire pit and watch the sunset. it even comes with a s'more kit. If you have kids or even are just there on a romantic getaway you can never go wrong with s'mores.  I went for a birthday and everyone in the hotel knew it was her birthday. They sent champagne and chocolate covered strawberries to the room and everyone helped make it a birthday to remember for years to come  Thank you for a great stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for your special celebration.  We enjoyed creating a unique, memorable and personal experience for you.  We couldn't agree with you more that an ocean facing room with and outdoor fireplace and s'mores is the only way to go!  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: My husband treated me to a coastal view at the Ritz for my birthday, complete with dinner and breakfast.  The dinner and breakfast at RAYA were excellent.  The food is the best thing they have going for this hotel.   We found the ambiance a bit stuffy, and were shocked that the "first come first serve" rule applied to those patrons paying exorbitant prices to stay at the hotel.  We asked to be seated by the window for full views and in both instances, they would not reserve.  Views were actually exceptional regardless of where you sat, however, for the rates we paid, going out of their way to please the customer is not a menu item.    The hotel room was average.   I stayed at the property across the street, St. Regis Monarch resort  earlier in the year and found the staff more
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We greatly appreciate your detailed feedback as it helps us in our continuing efforts to be the worldwide leader of luxury experiences and unique memories.  We hope you choose to visit us again in the future, and if you do please contact the Executive Office directly and we will ensure you have the best possible value and room.  Thank you again for taking the time to provide a review of our resort.

Summary: This hotel is not for a leisure guest.  I write this as I am sitting in a lobby bar full of over served, intoxicated business travelers.  In the past hour, I have seen over five drinks be spilled/broken and one 'lovely lady" run to the bathroom to vomit.   Having said that, the hotel is absolutely stunning and the staff could not be any more polite.    Groups should pay an "above bar rate" as the ruin the experience of those who are trying to have a relaxing vacation. Unfortunately, this is the worst Ritz Carlton experience I have ever had......
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your feeback regarding your recent stay at our resort. While we enjoyed your comments regarding our facility and staff, we are disappointed that your overall experience was not exceptional.  We strive to provide the finest personal service to all of our guests whether their travels bring them for business or leisure.  We would enjoy the opportunity to speak with you in person if you would be so kind as to contact the Executive Office directly.  We want to make this right for you.  Thank you!

Summary: Excellent service, excellent staff, great restaurants.  180Blu is a fabulous place for an evening cocktail with friends.    This place would rate a 5 except for one major negative issue. They host a lot of corporate meeting events.  And with that comes all of the necessary set ups and tear downs for breakfast lunch and dinners.  They do a great job EXCEPT....  The walk-ways are all tiled cobblestone.  at 6 AM they begin the parade of dragging the carts with tables, chairs, dishes, silverware and what-not.   They need to at least put in some smooth pathways for these workers or at minimum upgrade to balloon type tires.    If you don't mind waking NOT to the sound of surf, but to the sound of clattering, rumbling carts, this is your place.   And if you are thinking "no problem, I
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful comments about our ladies and gentlemen.  We appreciate your feedback!  Of course we are very sorry that you were disturbed by function preparation and teardowns.  There are definitely some options for you the next time you should visit us.  Please call the hotel direct and we will ensure you have a quiet room for your next experience.

Summary: My friend and I had a wonderful stay for a week-end celebrating her Birthday in December.  Fun to see the Holiday decorations.  The guestrooms were roomy and just perfect.  The ocean view rooms were well worth the upgrade.  Watching the surfers in the morning from the deck was a real treat.  Although we didn't bring our husbands on this trip, it is also the perfect place for a romantic, quiet and relaxing getaway.  We loved the Bar in the afternoon with it's great vibe and thoroughly enjoyed our visit.  Friendly staff and great service all added to a great stay!
Manager Response: We couldn't agree with you more that leaving your guestroom patio door open and listening to the crashing of the waves is most memorable.  Whether you stay on business or pleasure, a girls weekend or a romantic getaway, our ladies and gentlemen will ensure you have an exceptional experience.

Summary Heading: Right on the beach and always top notch
Summary: There are other hotels that folks mention perhaps first in/near Laguna but the Ritz always delivers.  Rooms overlook the ocean with a balcony or on the ground level a gas fireplace.   There is a club level that has drinks and snacks which is nice.  Staff is excellent and helpful.  Restaurant overlooks the break where you can view surfers sun up to sundown.  Walk down to the beach is a major plus or catch a ride via the shuttle.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.....we will never let you down!  We hope to see you and your family soon.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, definitely worth the stay, could use some improvements!
Summary: I reserved and paid for 4 rooms for my family over an 8 day period.  The rooms were nice, but could use some extra care, like caulking around bathroom as well as some walls need touch ups.  The housekeeping staff didn't do the obvious things like throw old flowers dropping petals on the tables away like they should have.  Several little things that make a "Ritz" experience were lacking and need attention.  I did bring this up to management and would like to see improvements before returning again, which my wife and I will do.  We appreciate the Ritz Carlton hotels because we know what to expect and service we appreciate.
Manager Response: We appreciate your wonderful feedback, thank you!  We will ensure all of these areas are addressed immediately.  Please allow us to assist you in booking your next reservation personally.  We look forward to creating a memorable experience for you soon.

Summary: We stayed at this property and were amazed at how positive and motivated the staff was, in order to help make our stay very pleasant.  The bell captains, the concierge, guest services, cleaning, pool, beach and restaurant staff...everyone went out of their way to be genuinely helpful.  We will look forward to coming back again soon!
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton in sunny Dana Point for your holiday travels.  Isn't our winter weather wonderful?  We look forward to creating another memorable experience for you soon.

Summary Heading: Was very good, but not great
Summary: I loved our stay at the Ritz in Dana Point.  The service was very good and rooms were small, but nice.  The views from the room were unbelievable.  I could have stayed out on our balcony all day and the vacation would have been a success.  Once during our trip we saw a whale go by off shore!  We did not try many of the restaurants except a quick breakfast from the Market.  The pool area was also nice, but the service was very slow.   There were several small things that bothered me during the trip, but none to big to mention.    Would I stay there again, yes, but mainly for the views and not the hotel.
Manager Response: We certainly enjoyed having you as our guest and intended for your experience to memorable and exceptional.  We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back so you can truly enjoy the level of luxury service that you have become accustomed to at The Ritz-Carlton.  We greatly appreciate your feedback.  Please feel free to reach out to the resort directly if we may be of assistance.

Summary: I have stayed here several times.  The property itself is beautiful BUT if it's the beach or pool you're coming for don't stay here.  The hotel is situated on a bluff overlooking the ocean with spectacular views.  The pool is SURROUNDED BY FOUR WALLS OF ROOMS ... absolutely no view or breeze --- ridiculous!  The beach is down the hill, where you can either walk or take their shuttle, but it has NO amenities affiliated with the hotel and we were COVERED IN GNATS!!!  There are way better places to stay if you're into "tanning."  Oh, and P.S. - they are now dog friendly and have a "Yappy Hour" on the south lawn of the hotel.  Don't stay over there unless the smell of dog poop doesn't bother you.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel as your luxury destination.  We greatly appreciate your feedback.  Of course we are saddened that your overall experience wasn't flawless, but we do hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back soon.  Please contact the Executive Office directly for any future visits and we will ensure your next experience is exceptional.  Thank you for providing your review on TripAdvisor.

Summary: Our family of ten including members from age 19 months to 72 years old had a wonderful stay at this family friendly yet beautiful and luxurious resort.   I did a ton of research before booking the Ritz but ultimately chose it over a few other surrounding resorts in Southern California because of its proximity to the water and the most majestic views from almost any door or window in property. The rooms are not large but beautifully furnished;  the gym has the most incredible view of any high-end resort gym we've visited; food was excellent including a custom vegetarian plate I ordered from their ocean view restaurant Raya;  the grounds are absolutely supreme - so many places to just sit and enjoy the view or throw the ball around with a child. For oceanfront in SoCal, you can't
Manager Response: Thank you for your nice photos!  It was wonderful having your family with us and we look forward to spending more special occasions with you.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary Heading: Great location, but below average service and food
Summary: The hotel is in a great spot, overlooking the pacific ocean on the bluffs.  That's the selling point.  The rooms are nice but nothing spectacular.  I've stayed in many other Ritz-Carlton's and the rooms here are nothing to write home about.  The food and service were the real problem.  The staff was nice enough but undertrained and overwhelmed.  We were there for three days and they clearly didn't have enough people working for a very full hotel.  We had a 7 pm dinner reservation at Raya, but didn't get seated until almost 8.  At breakfast, we waited almost an hour for the food to come, and by then the eggs were cold.  The food at the pool was no better, cold, late and ridiculously expensive, although the lone attendant made a valiant effort.   Check out was strange too; the
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your valuable feedback and have shared it with our executive team.  We take full responsibility for any service failures you encountered.  We prided ourselves on providing exceptional servcie and are saddened to read your review.  If it is convenient for you, we would like to speak with you further.  Please contact our Executive Offices at (949) 240-2000.  We will make this right for you.  We care about your well being.  Thank you for staying with us.  We will ensure your next Ritz-Carlton experience is a true Ritz-Carlton experience. We look forward to speaking with you.

Summary: We booked a last minute get away for my wife's Christmas Birthday and it would be an understatement to say that our expectations were exceeded in every regard.  All staff were polite with the trademark Ritz "my pleasure" exemplified.  We stay at many premium facilities, and this resort is one of our favorites.    Ocean view room is highly recommended as the panorama of the beach below, blue Pacific Ocean, and off in the distance, Catalina Island is without comparison.  Grey wales were putting a show just off shore, and the sunsets were stunning, followed by the rising crescent moon over clear, starry skies...perfect.    If you really want an upgrade, that I think is well worth the expense, opt for the Club Level, which includes complimentary bar and four servings daily.  The
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We are delighted you enjoyed our service, resort, and magnificent surroundings.  We care very much about what Mother Nature has given us.  We enjoyed celebrating with you and look forward to many more events to come!

Summary Heading: Wow!  Spectacular setting for a business conference! Will be back with famiy!
Summary: Dana Point is a wonderful property in OC!  The picturesque views of the ocean are breath taking and the hotel is top notch.  Service and food is wonderful.  The conference was in ballroom and snuck by pool a few times  - Pool would be A+ if it were facing ocean so I preferred the shuttle service to beach front.  They set you up with towel, chair and brelly - luxe and relaxing.  Going back with family for sure
Manager Response: It was wonderful having you with us for your business needs and we look forward to welcoming you and your family back soon for a memorable experience.

Summary Heading: Wonderful hotel with an amazing ocean view
Summary: This hotel is a California classic--the usual Ritz Carlton elegance with the added attraction of a cliff top view of the Pacific ocean.  We've been here four times and the hotel is clean and elegant, with service which is always impeccable.  My favorite hotel in the Laguna Niguel area!
Manager Response: We always enjoy having you!  We promise to make each of your visits truly memorable and unique. Happy holidays!

Summary: The moment you walk in the front door you will see beautiful flowers. The property is on the ocean and had magnificent views of the Pacific Ocean. The staff is well trained and always at your service. I look forward to my next stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our resort as your luxury destination.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Happy holidays!

Summary Heading: Impromptu Surf Contest In Front of Ritz Was Cool
Summary: My wife and I got a chance to have grandma care for our young son for a night en route south to visit the San Diego Zoo. Normally, we stay at Pelican Hill but we had miles with Marriott (long story) and decided to return to the Ritz for the first time in 10 plus years.   The property sits atop a cliff and has some wonderful views towards Laguna Beach and the ocean. We upgraded to a big suite on a higher floor but lacking a killer view. It was pretty well appointed but the bathrooms lacked a good tub or shower. The toilet was installed in a narrow spot thus we used the hallway one. You don't see that at Four Seasons.   The fine dining restaurant was suitable but noisy. The view is great. The service is solid. The property is updated, clean and luxurious. Its a solid 4-star spot
Manager Response: We enjoyed having you and hope to see you again soon!  Thank you for staying with us as we celebrated our 30th anniversary.  There are many more good things in store for The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel in the near future.

Summary Heading: Beautiful location, Dog friendly and outstanding service.
Summary: If your looking for value don't look here this place is expensive, however if your looking for that high end experience you have arrived. Perfect oceans views and sunsets, with an unmatched level of service and yes pet friendly with as much attention on your pup as I you. Laguna beach awails your arrival.
Manager Response: We pledge to always provide the highest level of personal and unique service for our guests, and even our furry friends too.  We have many more wonderful experiences in store for you.  Come back soon!

Summary: You will be pampered & pampered & made to feel like royalty.  That's what I love about Ritz properties.  I don't get to stay nearly as often as I'd like.  Everything was as expected except my scallops one night ordered from room service.  They promptly credited tho.  The carrot-squash soup is to die for!!  If you're lucky enough to get Patrick Dykstra as your Bellman, you're in the best hands & will be pampered immediately upon arrival!  Very warm, welcoming & informative.
Manager Response: We enjoyed spoiling you and look forward to your return!

Summary: I went with my husband to attend the recent Opal Conference and stayed at the Ritz in Dana Point. What a lovely place. I am definitely returning soon.   From the time you park your car at the front ...till you end up in your room, the service is excellent every step of the way. Great staff! Everyone is so polite, smiling, attentive, courteous and helpful.   I loved the ocean view from our room....lots of surfers out there. The sun sets are absolutely gorgeous so make sure your room is facing the ocean.   Ladies, if you're going to have your hair done at the salon, make sure to try their deep conditioning for your hair. It's one of the best I have ever had. And the lady that does them keeps you entertained with interesting conversation plus we talked endlessly of our travels
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we are delighted you enjoyed your experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We enjoyed creating memories for you!  It is great to know you received your passport promptly and safely.  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: I was lucky enough to accompany my husband on a business trip so I was just able to relax and soak in the California sunshine.  We were very lucky to have had 5 glorious days of sun, not too hot, around 70, but beautiful.  This Ritz is in a truly remarkable location sitting high above a cliff overlooking the Pacific Ocean.  The view from the property is magnificent.  Lots of walkways and easy access to go down to the beach, The hotel provides a free shuttle service down to the beach if needed.  Salt Beach is a beautiful sandy beach to walk along.  Looks like a great surfing area as well judging by the amount of surfers there were in the water - from sunup to sundown!   We had great meals at Raya.  For breakfast we purchased yogurt parfaits and toasted bagels and coffee in the
Manager Response: It was a pleasure welcoming you to our iconic seaside resort!

Summary: I just stayed here for a conference last week. I've stayed at this location before and didn't have some of the issues I encountered this time around. This site is beautiful. The grounds are gorgeous to look at and if you have an ocean view room, you can take in the beautiful views. Upon check in, I was placed in a room right next to the elevator. I tried to deal with it, but the constant dinging drove me insane within the first hour and I asked to be moved, which was accommodated quickly. I was moved to the other side of the building, which was much better. All the staff I came across from the moment I pulled up were very friendly.   The room itself was nothing spectacular, but the bathroom was very spacious. The rooms do not have many outlets and it was frustrating not to have
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to post a review of the resort.  It is much appreciated!  We enjoyed your feedback and take it seriously.  We are currently working on all of the areas you suggested.  We are delighted you enjoyed your overall experience and we look forward to creating more unique memories for you in the future.

Summary: Took a mini girls vacation here in November with my mother and sister. If it weren't for the beautiful sunny and hot weather, this may have been a bust. I expected more from a Ritz property. The bathroom was nice, but the rooms themselves are showing wear. The view is stunning - especially from the restaurants overlooking the beach and ocean. The pool was nice - partly because it was pretty quiet and empty (we were there mid-week into Saturday). Service at the restaurants was top notch but lacking in other areas. No towel service at pool. Bartender wasn't very attentive either days we were at the pool. Concierge not very helpful/knowledgeable. Two of my phone calls to room service were just never answered. I don't know if they were short staffed or if it was a factor of being
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for your girls getaway.  We are extremely disappointed you were not fully satisfied.  Our highest mission is to provide a unique, memorable and personal experience for each of our guests.  We thank you for your feedback and look forward to making this right for you.  Please contact our Executive Offices directly.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon for a true Ritz-Carlton experience.

Summary Heading: Carlton is in the name, but this is not the Ritz
Summary: I stayed at the Ritz Carlton in Laguna Niguel for a conference.  I have stayed in other Ritz Carlton properties and I was truly looking forward to this visit.    Let me start with what I discovered at the end of my stay.  It had been raining for much of my visit to Laguna Niguel and, as a result, opening the door to the little patio area outside my room wasn’t something I’d even thought of until the rain had subsided.  On the last morning I opened the door to my first floor room that looked out on the yard overlooking the ocean.  I enjoyed a quick whiff of the morning sea breeze and upon closing the door I tried to lock it.  The door would not lock.  The door would not even latch.  I tried several times to lock the door, each time trying to confirm the door was securely locked
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for your detailed feedback.  We greatly appreciate it and it has been taken with utmost respect and sincerity by our executive team.   Your safety and comfort are our highest missions and we are devastated that you did not enjoy your overall experience while being our guest.  We hope you have a moment to speak with us directly so we can ensure we turn this around for you.  It is our desire that you have fond and long lasting memories of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  Kindly contact our Executive Offices directly at (949) 240-2000.  Thank you again for your constructive comments and we look forward to assisting you personally.

Summary: This resort is in an amazing location, right on the beach. I can't say enough about the gorgeous view and the sound of the ocean from my room.  Long walks on the beach and watching ocean wildlife was the highlight.  Staff were extremely friendly and the food at the restaurants was great.  I love this resort and would definitely stay there again the next time I'm in the area.
Manager Response: We enjoyed having you as our guest and hope you choose to return soon!

Summary: Ritz Carlton prides itself on its customer service and it fully deserves it. The wait staff, concierge, front staff et al were always helpful and friendly during our four-day stay. A difficult task to say the least as we were a corporate retreat of nearly 500 people during American Thanksgiving. Our thanks to the staff who gave up time with their families to serve us!  The views and grounds are stunning. Without a car, it's about a 20-minute taxi ride to Fashion Island or the Shops at Mission Viejo. (Fashion Island and South Coast Plaza are definitely the nicer malls) A quick bus ride to Laguna Beach though.   Banquet food was typical fare. Drinks at the bar were delicious!
Manager Response: We always enjoy creating memorable experiences for our guests whether their travels bring them on business or pleasure.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: We were here for 3 nights total. The staff and service are best in the industry. Lovely location overlooking a beach and bay area. Great for hiking. The restaurants and spa services were excellent. It can be a bit pricey, but give  yourself this treat. You deserve it.  :)
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful feedback.  Our ladies and gentlemen enjoy receiving it.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: No wired Internet to the rooms (necessary for reliable business Internet connectivity) despite their being ethernet cables connected to a wall jack in every room. After wasting considerable time with management and a maintenance worker, the company who handles the property Internet had to be called only to confirm they only offer WiFi at the hotel.  I went down to the beach almost every day which was littered with seaweed along with the mosquitoes flying all around it. No visible staff were near or on the beach to provide towels or any kind of food or drink service.  I paid over $10,000 for a 5-night stay because the only ocean-view rooms that came up on the Ritz website was the massive corner suites at $2000 a night. I later found out others booked an ocean view room for as low
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your detailed feedback and have shared it with our executive team.  We would enjoy speaking with you in more depth if you have the opportunity.  We can be reached at 949 240 2000.  We hope your overall experience was a memorable one and we look forward to personally assisting you in the future.

Summary: Felt warmly welcomed by staff and even a surprise birthday cake waiting in my room.  I can't think of anything that they could have done better; everyone was professional and truely attentive to detail.  A genuinely relaxing mini- vacay from a busy work week.  Very impressed.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we enjoyed creating unique, memorable and personal experience for you.

Summary: I stayed at the property for 3 nights, the facility is very well (Traditionally) appointed. With sweeping views of the sea. Had a great room, double beds (sharing), lovely all marble bath with separate sinks. My only complaint about the room is there weren't enough outlets and the ones that were there weren't all in easy to reach locations.  Food at the hotel bars is good (Though unsurprisingly, a bit pricey). This facility has a GORGEOUS gym with the aforementioned views. I do wish it had a steam or sauna attached, these options are available in the spa, though I never inquired, I think a spa appointment was needed to use those facilities. Beautiful grounds with easy access to the beach. The property is a little off the beaten path if you want to shop or dine off site, but cabs
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed your experience at the resort and we look forward to welcoming you back very soon.   Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: Spectacular service and warm welcome from the ladies and gentlemen working there.  We enjoyed a romantic dinner on the terrace over-looking the water with the genuine care in the service provided.  Room service for breakfast was prompt and sitting out on the balcony together was delightful.
Manager Response: Welcome home! Happy holidays!

Summary: From the moment I arrived to the end of my visit, the comment " My pleasure" repeated by the staff felt genuine. Very respectful, professional but not invasive. Greeted with a smile and often asked if I needed anything.  The service and food at the rooftop bar was prompt, tasted fresh and offered one of the best views in the world. Dinner in their main restaurant was the same. One of the best steaks I've ever had.  Of course it's expensive but I found a place where I actually got what I paid for and more.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We look forward to always providing you with a warm, relaxed, yet refined approach to service excellence. Come visit again soon.

Summary: I stayed at this property for 5 nights while attending a conference in October.  The views are just amazing, the hotel sits on a cliff and the Pacific ocean just goes on forever (great sunset views). Perhaps the best view of the whole property is from the gym, with its 2 story windows overlooking the ocean. We stayed on a main floor room with a fireplace on the patio, which was nice. However, you don't get the ocean views you get from the higher floors. But since we were there in October, the fireplace was well used. I used it in the morning while I was working on my laptop and evenings. Since Marriott took over the Rtiz, the service and quality has steadily declined.  This property for sure is no longer a 5 star property.  One very frustrating event was that at 7am on Thursday
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed feedback. It does not go unheard. We agree with you and will continue striving to be the best. We hope you enjoyed your overall experience and that our ladies and gentlemen created a lifelong memory for you.

Summary: I stayed here for 2 nights as part of a work function in room 3511 which had views of the pool.  That said, the property is situated on a cliff with magnificent views of the ocean.  For example, you can watch the waves while working out in their gym or while drinking wine on their outdoor terrace.  The room itself was spacious and I appreciated the small walk-in closet.  Yet, the room wasn't overly opulent nor was I blown away with the linens.  Its hard to describe, but it seemed 'adequate' or just met the minimum standards of a Ritz property.    My only complaint was that there was a 15min wait at check in as there was only 1 person working the desk at 6pm.
