Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback.  We take it constructively and seriously.  We are delighted you enjoyed your overall experience and look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary Heading: Great hotel in a beautiful setting
Summary: This hotel has been recently renovated and it looked beautiful.  The public spaces and the rooms all have been re-done and look amazing.  There's a long walk down to the beach, but the hotel does offer a shuttle for those that have mobility issues.  This is a perfect location to stay if you want to visit Newport Beach or Laguna Beach, both nice beach towns that are worth checking out.
Manager Response: We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you and look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel with a cliff top location
Summary: We stayed at the Ritz-Carlton for 3 nights, we really enjoyed our stay there and the view from our room was stunning especially at sunset. The hotel offer a buggy shuttle service to and from the beach (invaluable when it really hot as you don't really want to walk back up the hill with your gear) and the staff were very helpful in setting us up on the beach. Obviously a popular place judging by the amount of corporate events and weddings etc. they were hosting. Note you need a car here as there's not much else within easy reach unless you're only going to the beach.
Manager Response: Beautiful photos!  We are delighted you enjoyed your experience!

Summary Heading: Beautiful Hotel in a Beautiful Setting
Summary: This is an incredible property.  One of the most beautiful places I've stayed.  The main areas of the hotel are immaculate and quite up to date as one would expect at a Ritz Carlton.  Our favorite spot was the 180Blu outdoor bar area high up overlooking the Pacific Ocean.  We went there every night for drinks.   The service throughout was amazing.  The staff is top notch. There was nothing that they could not do, often before you asked.  The rooms were a bit dated, but nice.  For the price they could be a bit larger.  We had a pretty tiny closet.  It looks like this is probably an older property that was renovated.  We had a view facing the pool, though we could not really see it as there's a bit of a jungle in front of the very small porch.  Nonetheless, it was pleasant to sit
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and photos.  It was a pleasure having you with us and we look forward to your return.

Summary: Fantastic stay at the Ritz.  The service is impeccable and the views to die for. Joel, our server at the Raga Restaurant was excellent.  And Susan Husbands from the Sales department was awesome. Wish we could have stayed longer to enjoy all that this resort had to offer. Will definitely be coming here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for joining us!  We look forward to creating many more memorable experiences for you soon.

Summary: My first stay at this property and I was not disappointed.   Understand that what you are paying for is the incredible view, so my advice is spend the additional $130/night and book an ocean view room with the outdoor fire place, after all who wants to look at the “garden”, you can get that anywhere. Also, don’t waste your money on anything other than ground level. Note. The outdoor fire pits are only on the ground level rooms and you’ll have the ability to take five steps and be literally at the cliffs edge overlooking the ocean. I completely enjoyed sitting on the Adirondack chairs taking in the sun. You can’t do that from an elevated balcony.   First the rooms. Yes they are a bit dated, after all the property is 30 years old, but if your goal is to spend all your time in the
Manager Response: We could not have said it better ourselves!  We are delighted you enjoyed your experience with us.  We agree....the sunsets are out of this world.  Welcome home.

Summary: Beautiful location with small,dated rooms and tiny patios This chain of hotels is known for customer service. Over the years the service has turned to arrogance. One recent example. We had a bed and breakfast package. Still, they wanted to charge us for breakfast. We pointed that out to the waitress and even wrote a note on the bill that we had already paid. It took three people to come by the table before anyone agreed to take care of it. After we checked out, we realized that they had snuck the charge back on the bill. We called them, but we were told that we were braking up. The next time the system was down. We called again, and they denied that the system had been down. Since then we have been bounced around among front desk, reservation, accounting and finance. We have
Manager Response: On behalf of all the ladies and gentlemen of the resort, thank you for sharing your constructive feedback.  We greatly appreciate it as it helps us continue our quest for excellence.  Our Executive Office would like to ensure you are completely satisfied with your experience.  Please contact them directly at (949) 240-2000.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon for a memorable experience.

Summary: The location is beautiful and the staff are top of the line.  Spent three nights here due to a work conference.  Thoroughly enjoyed my stay.  Public Transportation provides an cheap and quick way to get into Laguna Beach where there are great food options and shopping.  However, the food at the Ritz is very good.  Rooms are spacey and very quiet and clean.  The turn down service and nightly chocolates were very much appreciated!
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you with us!  We hope your travels bring you back again soon.

Summary: This is the place to get the royal treatment, in a very friendly atmosphere, and experience fine dining.  The hotel staff are professional and friendly.  The views of from the hotel are amazing, and the dining room overlooks the Pacific Ocean and is breath taking.
Manager Response: What an incredible sunset photo!  We enjoyed welcoming you and look forward to future visits.

Summary Heading: Location, location, location - can't beat the view
Summary: My favorite feature of this hotel is the gym. Huge floor to ceiling windows overlooking the ocean. In the morning you can watch the surfers while doing cardio. The gym is adequately stocked. The service at this hotel is what you would expect from a Ritz - excellent. The hotel sits on a cliff overlooking the ocean. Beautiful view from all vantage points on the grounds. I was there for business and the food for the most part was better than most conference food and the conference rooms were not overly cold. Many of my colleagues had dinner at the hotel and gave the restaurants high marks. The room was a little dull and the location is not close to anything however Uber comes to the door in a moment to take you to the marina (very cool) or the town of Dana Point or Laguna.
Manager Response: Thank you for exploring our property and our magnificent location.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: We had a wonderful stay at the Ritz in Dana Point.  The location is beautiful and the beach gorgeous. (Morning walks on the beach were the best part of my stay.) The rooms are a bit dated, but clean and comfortable.  The staff were friendly and accommodating. Unfortunately, we were there during a conference, so the public spaces and pool were crowded with business people and lacked the luxurious vacation vibe.  Overall, nice stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you and look forwarde to your return.

Summary: Everything about the property is beautiful.  All is run with professionalism and the site is clean.  Restaurants abit pricey but the experience great. Staff friendly and accommodating!  Rooms comfy after their recent remodel.  For the size of this resort,nit very nice!
Manager Response: It was a pleasure welcoming you! We hope you return soon!

Summary: We had a room on the ocean side on the main floor with an outdoor fireplace. We were at the Ritz mid Oct. for 4 nights and the fireplace was fantastic. It allowed us to sit outside in the morning and evening when it was cool. Watching the sunset over the ocean was wonderful.  As far at the room. It was nice. Not really my taste. It was not as clean as it should have been. The carpets had stains in the room and the bathroom had some dirt along the top of the tile. The gym is fantastic. You have a view of the ocean and surfers while doing the elliptical... makes you almost want to work out!! Staff were nice. Food was good. I didn't use the spa.  I usually have so much to say about a resort, but not really this time. I felt like my stay was nice, not amazing, not bad. Just nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback. We enjoy hearing from our guests. We look forward to assisting you again in the future. Please let us know if we can answer any questions for you.

Summary Heading: You can't beat the views and the service
Summary: I went to this hotel years ago and really did not like it much.  It's in the most beautiful setting but the hotel decor was as if you were in a Boston hotel in the winter with heavy carpets and drapes covering the California sunshine and the view.  They finally came to their senses and redecorated the hotel and it's very beautiful and relaxing.  The service is excellent and I was  lucky to end up on the 4th floor with exceptional service and food.  The spa services were also very good especially the massage.  The views and the sunsets can't be beat.
Manager Response: Thank you for joining us!  We are delighted you enjoyed our warm, relaxed and refined ambiance.  We look forward to welcoming you back for years to come.

Summary: The Ritz was the most memorable of all our vacation stays by far...!!   Beautifully landscaped and well kept including the room.....Beautiful view out into the ocean, restaurants were exceptional as well.! Having breakfast overlooking the Ocean each morning was breathtaking, while watching the surfers hang ten. !  Staff was very courteous, helpful and friendly too..  Our room was poolside view, it was great walking out to have coffee every morning sitting by the pool. We rented a car to visit several places along the southern coast, but always looked forward to coming back to the Ritz. !! My daughter and I had the most awesome and memorable vacation stay at the Ritz Carlton, Laguna Niguel...
Manager Response: We are thrilled you enjoyed every aspect of the resort and we look forward to creating many more memorable experiences for you soon.

Summary Heading: Lost a little of its luster - but still exceptional
Summary: Follow up - I stayed at the Ritz - Laguna Niguel last March - It was exceptional and you can read my review. I was back at the Ritz Carlton for a business meeting. I few things stood out this time that I should point out. My room  - especially the bathroom was not as clean as it should have been. I noticed long hairs on the floor in the bathroom that should have been swept or vacuumed up. The furniture in this room looked old and had wear marks on them and the desk had a little layer of dust on it.  The carpet in the room and the wing looks like it needs to be replaced. With that said - the hallway is a main route to the pool and probably receives more traffic than other hallways. Otherwise - the hotel is amazing. The staff is friendly and helpful and the hotel and grounds are
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again.  We greatly appreciate your valuable feedback.  You have our word that we will improve immediately in the areas mentioned.  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: This was one of 3 stops on our Southern Cal vacation.  Unfortunately, check in was a bit hectic and they had trouble finding the connecting rooms that we had been guaranteed at booking which were supposed to be on the club level.  After much searching they found connecting rooms, but not on the club level.  The hotel lobby and setting are beautiful.  The rooms were a bit disappointing.  They were somewhat dark, had very little drawer space, a closet with barely any hanging space and no drawer space in the bathrooms.  The rooms seem to be in need of an update.  The beach was great for catching waves, but got quite crowded as a popular local surf beach.  They didn't have beach service on the beach, but they would come and set up chairs and umbrellas for you if needed.  They had
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel as your luxury destination.  We are delighted you experienced our exclusive Club Level and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Enjoyable stay-have lots of dollar bills.
Summary: My wife and I stayed there for our anniversary in Sept 2014. We stayed 3 days, 2 nights. It was very enjoyable. They upgraded us one night to an ocean view. It was gorgeous. My wife was thrilled. They moved us into a garden/pool view for the second night. It was nice. Their steak restaurant was good, not great. I am not sure I would recommend having a steak at the Ritz. The staff was most accommodating. I must admit that once you are at the pool, having drinks and a snack it could be any nice hotel. There really was no dramatic difference in that situation. There is an outdoor bar/dessert place overlooking the ocean which is enjoyable. One final thing we waited an excessively long time for them to bring our car around on the day of departure. I find it interesting that another
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and happy anniversary!  We enjoyed creating a unique and memorable experience for you.  Thank you for your feedback regarding our restaurant, enoSTEAK.  We appreciate you sharing it.  If we may be of any assistance, please contact our Executive Offices in the future.

Summary: Lobby and views are stunning.  Main restaurant is excellent. I strongly recommend booking a window table at lunch and lingering over a glass of wine.  It's just that kind of place.  The property is well maintained and is often used for corporate meetings.  Those events often spill out into the lawn and interior courtyards.  Ocean view rooms (at a premium) avoid the associated noise.  Spa is nice, albeit small. Treatments are ok, but no bargain.  Regular rooms are well appointed, but tiny.   Bathrooms offer "purple rain" products, which are delightful.   All things considered, a nice tranquil stay with the highlight being a special lunch.  Staff were very attentive.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.   Our highest mission is for you to always enjoy a unique, memorable and personable experience each time you stay with us.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: VERY DISSAPOINTED. NICE VIEWS, MEDIOCRE SERVICE, EXPENSIVE, NOT CONVENIENT LOCATION.
Summary: I was in the hotel in October, 2014 during four days to attend a small international business meeting in the same hotel. As a repetitive Marriott customer, this review tries to be a constructive feedback   The arrival date was a Sunday and the hotel was too crowded; during the week-days the flow of people was better.   THE LOCATION The hotel is by the beach in a nice bay, with facilities to beach activities. Some views from terraces are spectacular. Located at 60 miles from Los Angeles Airport (LAX) and a similar distance to San Diego, it is not a convenient location. To go from LAX you need two hours or more in the airport shuttle ($ 80 per couple each way, without the tip) and at least one hour with a car (services for a couple could reach $ 160 each way). There are better
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for your extremely valuable and constructive feedback.  It has been heard and shared with our team.  We strive at all times to provide excellent service in a warm, relaxed, yet refined atmosphere.  Whether our guests join us for leisure or for business, our highest mission remains the same...your care and comfort.  We are saddened you departed the resort without the best possible memories, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future to enjoy a true Ritz-Carlton experience.  Please contact our Executive Office directly.

Summary Heading: Vintage Ritz Carlton in beautiful surroundings
Summary: When you approach the Ritz Carlton at Dana Point California, you know you are somewhere special. From the moment you are greeted in front of the hotel, until the moment when you leave, you are treated with courteous and painstaking detail.  The rooms are a little dated, but are exceptionally clean and are serviced well each day. As is the case with many older hotels, our room was lacking in adequate electrical outlets for everyone's phones, cameras, etc. This was only a minor inconvenience.  The view from the hotel was exceptional. The restaurant, overlooking the Pacific, served wonderful food with wonderful service in a picture book setting.  The outdoor facilities were excellent and relaxing. There were plenty of places to sit on the lawn, around either of the two pools, or
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  It was a pleasure having you with us and we hope to welcome you back soon.  We have many more unique, memorable and personal experiences to create for you!

Summary Heading: Wonderful service in a beautiful setting.
Summary: Staff were very helpful from check in, to valet, to waitstaff: room service even offered to make a special meal for my niece. Spacious room w/a stream and koi pond of the balcony. I had an amazing sunrise run along the beach and there are spectacular ocean views from all over the property.
Manager Response: We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you and look forward to your return!

Summary: The place is spectacular from the drive up to the hotel to the outstanding check in service. Once you get to you room and see the view you'll be I love. The service buy the pool was terrible and also at one of the restaurants. I guess because its the ritz the can get $30 for 2 eggs just not for me when they are so many other hotels in the area with the same views and service it's just not for me. But I have to say the spa was amazing if anything that would bring me back. I'm on the fence so go give it a try you will not be disappointed and make your own decisions.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for allowing us the opportunity to have you as our guest. We enjoyed having you. Thank you for posting your photos. We hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: I enjoyed this hotel because it has stunning views, It is right on the ocean where you can watch surfers all day long, and its service was terrific.  One person in particular, Kyle Barton, the car valet who went above and beyond.  He drove us into Dana Point where there was a Chart House.  We mentioned it was at a Chart House in Aspen where we had our first date. The next day, he sent us a lovely note with a Chart House card, "in case we want to relive our first date".  The hotel's room was smallish, but very clean and the welcoming balconies extended the room.  I loved the salt water taffies on the front desk, where I made several visits.
Manager Response: We were delighted to have you and glad you had a most memorable experience!  We look forward to your return.

Summary: This was a surprise from my sweet husband while we were visiting family out in Cali.  We were promptly greeted and walked into a lobby that had the most gorgeous, fresh flowers displayed.  After we checked in, we went to our super adorable room with a great view of the grounds and the ocean.  Our room was clean and the temperature was just right and we settled in quickly.    We got dressed and went to check out 180 Blu to catch a view of the sunset.  It's open seating, so  get there early for your sunset view spot!  We had great drinks, amazing service and due to the open seating, fun conversations with the couples near us!  Shortly before the sunset, they had live music.  It made for a wonderful atmosphere.  Romantic and fun!  After the sunset and drinks, we went to have a late
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel as your luxury destination!  We couldn't agree with you more that our property and surroundings are romantic and magnificent.  We are delighted you enjoyed your first experience with us and we look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary: We looked forward to staying here after 2 nights at Pelican Hill in Newport Beach.  We wished we stayed at Pelican!  Overcrowded/overflow of non-hotel guests and feel was more "chain" and franchise-y….front desk was very pushy and not too welcoming (with the overwhelming number of folks checking in/out - it really felt like we were "bothering" them).    Our room was surprisingly "dated" - not at all a "beach" feel - more believe it or not "Liberace".  Because we had a room near the hotel lounge - it constantly had a "cigarette smoke" smell - as well as noise from the lounge.  Room unfortunately never felt clean.  Bathroom toilet was also loose and not connected to floor.  In short, we've stayed at a number of Ritz Carlton's (New York, Chicago, San Fran, Atlanta & LA) - for the
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we are saddened to read your review of your stay wtih us.  We strive to provide all of our guests with unique, memorable, and personal experiences.  We thank you for your valuable feedback and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for a truly incredible experience.  Please contact the Executive Offices directly.  We want to ensure you feel good now and in the future.  Thank you.

Summary: We stayed here on a business trip and were treated to spa treatments and hotel activities. The service from the valets to restaurant staff was superb. Even the repair staff bent over backward to make sure we were pleased and comfortable. We ate as a group at catered events as well as in the hotel restaurants. Everything was delicious and beautifully presented. What a treat!!!
Manager Response: We are delighted your work travels brought you to the resort and we look forward to perhaps welcoming you back for a vacation someday soon!

Summary Heading: Love the hotel; problem with valet service not charging my electric car
Summary: I'm a Ritz-Carlton member and have come to count on a distinct quality of service. The rooms, meals, lobby, etc., were all lovely -- just what you would expect from RC. I checked out on a Thursday night at 10:30PM. When I checked in on Wednesday at 11:30AM, I tipped the valet and asked that my electric car (Tesla) be charged. The "yes, m'am" reply was swift and sincere. Imagine my dismay when I retrieved my car to depart for a 1 hour and 20 minute drive to LAX to catch my 1AM departing flight. My car had never been charged!!!! Drivers of electric cars are generally very happy with their vehicles and keep them charged and running. As a female driving alone in the dark, I was most concerned that my car didn't have the charge I expected. I don't know where the charging station is
Manager Response: Thank you for your generous feedback.  On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we apologize for any confusion regarding your car.  We certainly did not intend to inconvenience you in any way, and we care very much for your safety and well being.  Your feedback will be used constructively as it is very important in our efforts to provided excellent service.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: I stayed here 2 nights using Marriott points.  I was upgraded to a coastal view.  The room was very comfortable, with a large marble bath, big closet, french doors that opened to an enclosed balcony with table & chairs and very comfy bed with a beautiful coastal view.  I've stayed in many Ritz hotels, and I find their rooms comfortably elegant - not over the top indulgent.  The real beauty at this resort is the property.  It's beautiful!  It's quiet and peaceful, dramatic views with crashing surf, private and relaxing.  Every night I slept with the french doors open to listen to the surf.  It's a big property and there were many events going on.  A bartender told us they were at 100% capacity, but I would have never guessed as there was never an issue getting any type of
Manager Response: We are delighted you had the opportunity to enjoy our warm, relaxed, yet refined ambiance.  We look forward to creating many more memories for you in the future.

Summary: We spent four nights at the Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel and had a fabulous time! We were there for a business trip, but the time coincided with our anniversary.  From the wine/cheese/fruit that was delivered to our room to the 7 buckets of ice that were delivered (for an ice bath) after our 10 mile run, the staff gave us great service and ensured we had a great weekend.  We also were treated to a quiet ceremony on the beach at sunset where we renewed our vows with one of their staff members who is an ordained minister---this was a great surprise from my wife! We were also fortunate to stay in a room with an outdoor firepit and had breakfast each morning overlooking the ocean.  We only eat gluten-free food, and the hotel accomodated our request each time.  Great views, great
Manager Response: We are delighted you had the chance to enjoy our warm, relaxed, yet refined ambiance.  We look forward to welcoming you back many more times in the future.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary: This hotel is truly a five star facility.  Overlooking the ocean from high above the sea.  Service is flawless, the food is wonderful, and the entire staff goes all out to accomadate guests.  This hotel is pet friendly.  An awesome experience!
Manager Response: We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you!  Welcome home!

Summary: We spent our wedding night at the Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel and it was absolutely perfect.  The bedding and atmosphere and even the fragrance of the place was just beautiful, clean, luxury feel.  It was the perfect place to spend the first night as husband and wife.  The R'ya restaurant was just a romantic peaceful view of the ocean for breakfast and the food - DELICIOUS!  We loved the crab cakes.  Excellent service everywhere we went.  I love this hotel.  It has a special place in our hearts - definitely going to visit for future anniversaries!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for such a momentous occasion!  We are excited to welcome you back for years to come.  Congratulations!

Summary: The location of this Ritz is incredible. The views are stunning. The service is excellent just like you would expect at a Ritz Carlton. There is a shuttle that you can take to the beach; however it is only a short 10 minute walk down the hill. There is also a  walking/bike  trail that we took on our morning walk which winds along the beach and then loops through the canyon and Monarch Bay Golf course. We had dinner at their signature restaurant Raya. I wrote a separate review on Raya. It was excellent. We had lunch at the 180 lounge which was also very good and had a spectacular view. This Ritz  is not new but has been updated and is very well maintained. It is an elegant hotel which is not pretentious. It was a lovely experience, and I hope to return.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to enjoy our propety and magnificent surroundings.  We enjoyed having you!  The next time you stay with us we hope you experience a room with an outdoor fireplace.

Summary Heading: Not a bad office view for the day...
Summary: We had a business conference at the Ritz Carlton and for one day my view from the "office" was blue skies, surfers and crashing waves!  We actually had to shut the doors of the conference room due to the sound of the waves crashing (oh the irony!).  The staff was on point and they did a great job assisting with the set-up of the conference room.  We opted to have the lunch outside on the terrace and that was the most amazing set up... jaded business men were actually enjoying themselves (shocker!).  The food was top notch and a great selection to choose from.  After the conference we moved upstairs to the bar and the lobby area. Wished we were still out on that terrace, but the bartenders/staff were great and we enjoyed the sunset from the bar.  I would definitely recommend this
Manager Response: We are delighted to know you had a chance to enjoy a little r&r while working!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Loved it.  Spent 2 nights for a business meeting and couldn't have asked for anything more.  Even their buffet food was excellent.  The restaurant right in the Ritz was REALLY good....rooms pretty.   the views fantastic.  Five stars!
Manager Response: We are delighted you were able to enjoy some down time while being here for a conference.  We hope you can join us again in the near future for a relaxing, leisure visit.

Summary: The Ritz-Carlton is in the beautiful city of Dana Point, CA.  It is miles away from Laguna Niguel.  The name is confusing.  The name was apparently assigned by the first manager, while he still lived in New York.
Manager Response: You are correct that the resort is located in Dana Point, CA.  Many years ago, the resort was officially a tenant of Laguna Niguel prior to city zoning revisions.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for your luxury experience.

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel with a Great Location
Summary: My wife and I stayed at the Ritz in Laguna for one night on our trip up the coast. I used Marriott points for our room and we were upgraded to the Club level. However, there was some confusion at check-in as I had confirmed a King room, but the desk agent insisted I booked a room with two double beds. I showed an email from my phone, which she asked to take in the back with her to show her supervisor. Not a huge deal and she was able to resolve it. I inquired about paying to upgrade to an ocean view room, non-club level room I was informed I could for $450. I knew there would be a premium, but $450 seemed way too steep. The room was nice, as was the bathroom. The club lounge had good food and drink offerings and the attendents and consierge were very friendly. I thought the
Manager Response: We are delighted to know that our team was able to resolve any questions or confusion regarding your room and bed types, and we are grateful you chose The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel as your luxury destination.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future so we can provide you with another unique, memorable and personal experience.

Summary Heading: Not what you'd expect from a Ritz Carlton
Summary: Ritz Carlton's are supposed to be 5-star hotels, and the RC Laguna charges 5-star rates at $745/night for their Coastline view room which we booked. Having stayed at all the other local 5-star resorts (Montage, Pelican Hill, St.Regis), the Ritz was our least favorite. Would return only if none of the other 3 are available. The hotel is in dire need of maintenance. Everywhere you look hardware is corroded, paint is chipping, rust spots covering tiles, etc.  The rooms are simple, nothing special. Shower/tub combo with a shower curtain, small, and the walls appeared to be very thin as we could hear our neighbors talking in the next room. Service was hit or miss, which to me is a miss since it should be consistent at this level of hotel. For instance at check-in a bellman was not
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for your luxury needs.  We enjoyed having you.  Our highest mission is to always provide superior service and genuine care and comfort to all of our valuable guests.  We sincerely apologize if your Ritz-Carlton experience was not a true Ritz-Carlton experience, and we would enjoy welcoming you back so that you can enjoy a much more satisfactory stay with us.

Summary: I took my wife here for her 50th birthday and the location is spectacular.  In addition, everyone is extremely nice and helpful, greets you at every turn and truly desires your stay to be special.  So why not five stars then?  Well, one reason was within their control and one is not.  We stayed on the third floor in an Ocean View room with a king bed.  Although the room itself was very nice, the balconies overlooking the grounds and ocean are very open to your neighbors on all sides and levels so there is no privacy.  This is a bad design flaw so you should be aware.  The only other complaint was I specifically requested a nice welcome basket with goodies on our arrival and even confirmed the day before but it was not there when we arrived.  Bummer but we received it later that
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for such a momentous occasion.  It was a pleasure having you with us!  We hope to celebrate more special moments with you in the future.

Summary: While we did not stay at the hotel, I rate it excellent for the incredible experience of a Pacific sunset on the patio cocktail lounge. Drinks and service were flawless as you would expect but the stunning view will never be forgotten.
Manager Response: We look forward to welcoming you back and hope you have the chance to stay with us overnight.  We couldn't agree with you more that our surroundings are magnificent!

Summary: I absolutely love coming here. My wife and I enjoy coming to lounge all day in the bar and then have dinner at EnoSteak. The service everywhere is simply the best. At EnoSteak we had Nikki and Alex as our servers and they both rocked the house, Ritz Style. If you want to have an excellent day, evening, etc. then take yourself to The Ritz Carlton.   BTW, it was the best carrot cake presentation and taste that either of us had ever had in all our travels.
Manager Response: We are so glad you continue to enjoy enoSTEAK's service and offerings!  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Tip: Wake up early and watch the surfers and see the sunrise.  It will improve your perspective on life.  Also close your eyes and just breathe in the air. Awesome.   I spent Saturday night before a conference at the Dana Point property and then the rest of the week there.  The conference was also at the property from Monday through Wednesday.  For a conference this place can't be beat.  Lovely rooms with the ability to sneak out and catch some sunshine in between meetings.    180 has to be one of the my favorite bars and restaurants in the world . Spent Saturday night and Sunday watching Battle of the Paddle while eating lobster tacos and enjoying great margaritas.  This was before the conference ...  For a family vacation I would spend a few days but it is a very public hotel.
Manager Response: We are delighted you had the chance to breathe in the wonderful ocean air and relax.  Thank you for extending your stay past your conference dates.  We look forward to welcoming you back whether it be for business or leisure!.

Summary: Our stay was exrtremely pleasant.  We were on the club level which is always a big plus.  Still don't love the size of the rooms.  The staff was very attentive but not intrusive.  It's hard to beat a Ritz Carlton.
Manager Response: We enjoyed having you as our guest and hope we created some wonderful memories for you!

Summary: I am a huge fan of the Ritz Carlton Hotels.  I have stayed at many of their properties throughout the United States.  This was the first time that I have stayed the Laguna Niguel location.  The weekend that we chose to stay there was for pleasure and it was in August, which means they were at full capacity.    Valet and Check In: As we pulled up to the valet, there was a line of cars waiting to get in.  However, I did feel that car attendants handled the crowd quite well and with efficiency.  Upon entering the hotel it was apparent that we had entered the world of a Ritz-Carlton.  The lobby was beautiful with floral arrangements that sing “You are at the Ritz”.  Again, we were met with quite a large crowd in the lobby area and there were lines of customers waiting to check in.
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty to our brand.  We are delighted you had the chance to visit our property and we hope you returned home with some wonderful, unique memories.  We look frward to welcoming you back again in the near future!

Summary: We took our 'baby-moon' here for a weekend escape from LA, having been once before. The ocean-view room is spectacular, and very relaxing.  HIGHLY recommend the restaurant Raya. It may be Richard Sandoval's best restaurant!
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed your "stay-cation" and we look forward to creating more memorable experiences for you soon.

Summary: My wife and I just spent 3 wonderful nights in Laguna Niguel.  Firtst of all, the hotel is absolutely wonderful.  You could not ask for better views.  The service was exceptional.  Pros: 1. Great location 2. Awesome views 3. Great service 4. The grounds were awesome 5. The fire pit rooms are a must with the ocean view.  Cons: (1-3 are nit picky) 1. The rooms are small 2. No shower (tub/shower) 3. The hallways need a face lift.  You could see rotting wood that has been painted over multiple times. 4. The throw pillows in our room were not clean (foreign stains). 5. The beach is awful.  Maybe it was the time of year that we went, but there was kelp all over the beach and millions of flies.  The smell was not pleasant.  The kelp attracted the flies.  I'm not kidding when I say
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We enjoyed seeing your photos. We are delighted you enjoyed our exclusive ocean front fireside guest room.  We hope you have a chance to return to the resort soon.   We appreciated your feedback on the world renowned Salt Creek Beach.  Due to California state law, the natural items and habitat found there are not allowed to be moved or removed to protect their environment and surroundings.

Summary Heading: Could not have picked a better spot for our honeymoon!
Summary: Tranquility, peace and pampering!  After the business of wedding planning the Ritz-Carlton not only provided us quiet and serenity in an incredibly beautiful environment, but they also pulled out all of the stops to ensure our stay was utterly unforgettable.  The room and all the surroundings were immaculate and impeccable.  The food, whether from the quick grab cafe or the signature restaurant, was always a delightful surprise of wonderful flavors.  And the staff surpassed all our expectations of courtesy, attention to detail, and going out of their way to take care of our every need.  Clearly the Ritz-Carlton staff work exceptionally hard every day to earn their reputation of being a world-class resort.
Manager Response: Congratulations!  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for your very special celebration.  Our ladies and gentlemen enjoy creating intimate and memorable experiences for our guests.  We hope to see you for another celebration soon!

Summary: This is a Ritz-Carlton location you must stay at atleast once in your life.  The location is awesome and the sunset and ocen views are amazing.  The food and service are the hotel are the best.  The hotel has that luxury feel with all sorts of places to relax and feel like royalty.
Manager Response: We couldn't agree with you more that our surroundings are spectacular.  We are delighted you enjoyed our experience with us and we look forward to creating more memories for you soon.

Summary: I wanted to send you a note of appreciation for our recent stay at the Ritz Carlton and acknowledge the incredible service from the staff.  Our expectations were truly exceeded by the ladies and gentlemen of the Ritz Carlton.   We originally expected to bring our Labrador on our vacation but sadly he recently passed away from cancer.  Upon checking in the front desk learned of our dogs passing.  Later that afternoon, we arrived in our room to handwritten note with expressed condolences for the recent passing of our family dog along with some wine and cheese.  The sentiments were heart-felt and were received like that of a friend...not just a hotel employee.  The Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel staff were truly outstanding & it was important for me to share our positive experience
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We enjoyed creating a special, memorable experience for you.  Our thoughts are with you and hope you can visit us again soon.

Summary Heading: Beautiful views. Nice rooms. Service good but not ritz standard
Summary: The location and the views are stupendous. The resturant had really creative food and was a fun place to be in. The service was overall excellent except for a couple of  hiccups. We checked in last Saturday with suitcases and carrying golf bags and there was absolutely no one to greet or help us. Usually when I check into a ritz they exude service and friendliness which I missed here.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We enjoyed having you has our guest and hope you enjoyed an overall memorable experience.  Thank you for your valuable feedback.  We take it seriously and constructively.  If we can be of further assistance to you, please do not hesitate to reach out to our manager on duty at (949) 240-2000.

Summary Heading: Ritz Laguna Nigel "adds to the area's penchant for pampering..."
Summary: This luxurious Ritz is truly a gem because of it's location, sitting high on a cliff with spectacular coastline views of the Pacific. And fitting true to the ritz-carlton frame, it's staff puts this hotel over the top. Our short and picturesque weekend vacation certainly started off at the right path by already choosing to stay at this Southern Cali Ritz. Upon arrival, the warm and welcoming; fast and courteous valet/bell-services were excellent. Much kudos to Adam and Orion for their extraordinary help during our stay. From the lobby, to the common sitting area, to the 4rth floor's club lounge, all seemed very elegantly appointed. The decor throughout is beautiful, bright and sophisticated without being stuffy.     Although our club lounge room on the 4rth floor felt slightly
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for your luxury experience.  We enjoyed seeing your photos and your detailed feedback.  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope we created some lifelong memories for you.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Place is Heaven - our favorite ritz carlton
Summary: The Ritz Laguna is amazing.  You walk into all senses of luxury - beautiful white lobby, delicious candle scents ( which we purchased ) pretty smiles and friendly faces.  The Hotel itself is stunning.  Views are amazing, restaurant is excellent, staff is super nice and the location is perfect.  Located up on a cliff, with a private section of the beach below, good waves if you are a surfer but get up early because it gets busy with some really good surfers… and seals!
Manager Response: It was truly our pleasure creating a memorable experience for you. Welcome home!

Summary: Stayed over Labor Day weekend with husband and our two young sons.  Overall, I wasn't impressed.  The property is older, but you really can't tell that from the common areas.  Those areas look fine for the most part.  The lobby is nothing spectacular -- it's a bit underwhelming actually.  Views of the ocean are fabulous.    Once in the guestroom hallways, that's where you can really tell the age of the hotel.  The change in climate from the lobby to the guestroom hallway is drastic -- the hallways are stuffy and humid, the lobby is freezing cold and dry in comparison.  The units in the room are loud and the vent is positioned so that it blows on one side of the room (and bed) so that person is freezing, while the other side of the room feels stuffy.    Guestrooms are small.  The
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We are saddened to hear our property and services did not meet your expectations.  It is always our highest mission to provide unique, memorable and personal experiences for our guests.

Summary Heading: Wonderful hotel, among the best in the country
Summary: I've stayed at this hotel several times over the past 15 years. It has wonderful staff, great conference coordination and an amazing location. The various dining options have always been good, the fitness has an awesome view overlooking the surfers, the pools are relaxing. The rooms with a fire pit offer a nice way to relax outside. I had a bad experience checking out when the bellman gave my reserved taxi to another guest...and it took 25min for another to arrive, at 5am...other than that, it was a great experience.   The rooms are nice but it doesn't appear that they've been updated in the past fifteen years. The common areas, bar, eating establishments and spa have been upgraded, maybe twice, over the same period.
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty.  We value you as well.  We appreciate your feedback regarding the taxi and will ensure we follow up internally.  We look foward to welcoming you back soon.  We have many enhancements scheduled in the near future and can't wait for you to experience them.

Summary: Breathtaking view of Pacific from room, easy access to walking path along coast, staff willing to do anything to help you. Was so sorry that I was only there for two nights and had to spend most of the days in business meetings. Oh, and the food for the meetings was terrific!
Manager Response: We hope to welcome you back for a much less busy trip next time.  It would be our pleasure!

Summary: Recently stayed at this luxury Hotel paying a premium price for a ocean front view. Obvious the Hotel is old, but well kept, narrow hallways, dated rooms, at same time I did enjoy the nostalgic look. Well kept manicured grounds, the staff is amazing, they are  alert to every customer and their needs. I observed several staff members wearing bandage wraps, I assumed it must be a covering a tattoo policy, being the curious person I am, I did ask and was correct. If staff members have a tattoo, they must cover it up. My opinion is the Ritz is fighting a loosing battle. as long as the tats are not offensive then "tats are better than wraps" as far as restaurants I only ate at the ocean view restaurant. You are paying for the ocean view, as the food is moderate and small portions.
Manager Response: We enjoyed having you as our guest and hope that you returned home with a very memorable experience.  We look forward to serving you again soon.  Thank you for your feedback.  We greatly appreciate it!

Summary Heading: CAUTION: there are some highly undesirable rooms here
Summary: So I think we got the worst room in the hotel. This was confirmed by speaking with an employee who asked about our stay. I told him that I thought we were probably in the crummiest room in the hotel. He asked me which room, I told him the number and he uttered some sounds that confirmed my feeling.   It's funny. I had read about a Marriott Platinum member who was given a similar room. He complained and they changed him. I asked the front desk if we could have something better—I was not asking for a better view, just something better in the patio and pool view category. She could not do anything other than offer us a partial ocean view with fire pit for a fee. I did not wave around my husband's Marriott Gold status, not sure that means anything anyway. We have only stayed in Ritz
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing your valuable feedback.  We would enjoy speaking to you further by phone at (949) 240-2000.  Seeking more details from our guests allows us the chance to customize your profile so our ladies and gentlemen know exactly what you like when you visit us.  Thank you!

Summary: This was my second stay in two weeks. And this stay was better than the one right before. The service is amazing. The staff doesn't know the word "no". The venue itself is old and has the old smell, but they do everything they can to make it smell fresh. The view is one of the most priceless views in Laguna. My suite had views of Salt Creek and Strands Beach.   The manager Kasey was also very attentive and went above and beyond.   In a word...Amazing!!  The entire experience was...Amazing!!
Manager Response: We enjoyed having you stay with us twice recently, thank you!  We hope to be of service to you many more times in the future.

Summary Heading: Breathtaking hotel but less perfect service.
Summary: Overall I was very pleased with my room.  I was a little displeased with the location of my ocean view room. I paid a premium price for the worst ocean view.  We were given the room on the end. I was not very pleased about that.  Also the valet brought   us the wrong car, 3 times on Saturday evening as we were trying to make it to dinner, yes it was a common car for the location but after the 2nd time it was a little tedious.  Thank goodness we were honest.   I also had to ask a waitress to bring my change after lunch on a separate occasion.  I still left her a substantial tip but the point was she was not going to bring my change back and she said, "I am sorry I forgot."  Those are not the things I expect from a Ritz Carlton.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We are delighted you enjoyed your overall experience with us, and we are disappointed to hear about the service inconsistencies.  We hope you let us know at the time so we could correct the issues.  If you did not have time to do that, we would welcome the chance to speak with you anytime.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: The Ritz Carleton Laguna Niguel is a wonderful resort with many things to recommend: the breathtaking views and excellent restaurants. This may be viewed as an overly critical observation, but we came away with one glaring criticism of the hotel. The housekeeping staff did not replenish our soaps and shampoos and we were forced to track down a housekeeping cart or call housekeeping to deliver more. Moreover, turn down service was provided around 6 p.m.--much too early if one intends to relax and dress for dinner. One evening our turn down service was provided before we returned from a day trip to Catalina. We called housekeeping to replenish our towels while we were at dinner--this wasn't done. All this may appear to be a very nitpicky criticism. However, when one pays nearly
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for your luxury experience.  We enjoyed creating memories for you and apologize for any housekeeping inconsistencies you encountered. We look forward to providing you with excellent service the next time you have the chance to visit us.

Summary Heading: Fiery views, large pool, usual amenities.
Summary: Laguna has 3 competing properties that all offer a different feel. The Ritz and the Montage are beachfront while the St. Regis is slightly inland on the other side of PCH, but in my mind its level of class, amenities and service take the cake.  We stayed in a room facing the beach with a small firepit patio. There are a handful of these units and they all face an open grass area that is protected from your room with a small fence (easily hoppable to reach the wooden beach chairs should you wish to layout and socialize).  There's a nice outdoor patio dining area to the south where Lauren Conrad's sis waits tables. Food's not bad. Inside it's a bit stuffy. The main dining area in the lobby has pretty solid cuisine but there's too much blue blood blue blazer vibe a Cali resort. For
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We hope you returned home with unique and personal memories.  We enjoyed creating them for you!

Summary: Location perfect. Lights give great Christmas feeling. Great restaurants. Great bars. Exemplary staff from front desk, concierge, room cleaning staff.  What an ocean view. As expected room was perfect . check in was quick and car service is quick.
Manager Response: Thank you for joining us for the holidays last year.  Will you be joining us again this year? We look forward to celebrating with you.

Summary: We live fairly locally and decided to drive to the Ritz Carlton for a one night getaway. This is a truly beautiful property! The grounds are exquisite; the rooms good sized with amazing views; restaurants are excellent (although a too long wait and the coffee breakfast bar); service wonderful, as well as the exercise gym. Can't wait to return!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  We know you have many choices in luxury experiences and we are delighted you enjoyed your visit!

Summary Heading: Spectacular views and the hotel is superb...
Summary: This was a business trip so I didn't eat in any of the restaurants but all meals were catered on property.  The food was wonderful.  The room was very nice with a great sleeping bed.  I had a view of the pool which was very nice.  As with most Ritz Carlton's the staff were all very accommodating.  I did have room service breakfast twice and can say they serve the best coffee I've ever had in a hotel--very strong and delicious.  The grounds of this property are what make it so spectacular--the view is breathtaking.
Manager Response: We enjoyed having you as our guest for your business needs and look forward to providing you with a wonderful leisure experience soon!

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel, spectacular hotel, friendly staff
Summary: My family and I were privileged to spend a week's vacation at this beautiful hotel.  Interestingly enough, we had last visited a few years after the hotel opened decades ago, and we were very pleased to see the hotel was looking as good and fresh as ever.  The setting, on top of a cliff overlooking the Pacific Ocean, is just as spectacular as the hotel website's photos make it appear.  The rooms are spacious and well appointed.  The spa is terrific and the fitness center (with a view of the ocean) makes you want to work out more often.  There are two pools - a tiny one near the north end of the property and a much larger one adjacent to the spa.  During our recent visit, the surf was way too rough to consider swimming in the ocean, so we spent a lot of time at the large pool.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for your luxury experience.  We enjoyed welcoming you and your family and creating memories for all of you.  We most certainly look forward to your return visit.  We will always ensure your experiences are unique and memorable.

Summary: Our second stay at this incredibly beautiful destination and we are still impressed with the service, rooms and amenities! The views are worth the price tag and we certainly make use of the balcony and fresh sea air. Food is exceptional so unlike most hotels, we will dine in! We will find our way back here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again!  Every time you visit The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel, we will provide you with an exceptional experience.  See you soon.

Summary: What a special place.  We stayed on the concierge level with an ocean view.  If you want privacy, you don't have to leave the floor because it has everything you need.  The hotel itself is incredibly beautiful, the art work, lounge, food, staff -----  I could go on and on.  I highly recommend if you're looking for a romantic getaway -- if even just for the night.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your photo...it's gorgeous!  We are delighted you enjoyed your experience on our exclusive Club Level.  We hope you relaxed and let us take care of all of your needs for you.

Summary Heading: A Magnificent Resort with Stunning Views and Charming Hospitality
Summary: We recently stayed at this hotel and had an incredibly beautiful sea view room.  We were treated very kindly by Ms Lytle during our stay and wish to thank her for her trouble.  This is one of the best hotels in America and the views from their sunset bar are magnificent as is the food/drink selection on offer there.  We shall certainly return again to this wonderful hotel.
Manager Response: We can't agree with you more that our ocean front guestrooms are simply stunning!  Thank you for staying with us and enjoying our property and staff.  We look forward to welcoming back soon.

Summary: My wife and I celebrated our 35th anniversary at the Ritz Carlton. It was a fantastic stay and we wanted to recognize exemplary service. We arrived a little early, but no problem, Patrick took care of delivering our bags and setting up our room when it was ready based on some special requests.  Surprisingly we ran into him several times and each time he remembered our names.  Michele greeted us at Enosteak for our dinner reservation and was very gracious and attentive.  We saw her the next day at brunch and she addressed us by name and continued her super service. We also received excellent service from Kayleigh at our Enosteak dinner.  We ended our stay with cocktails from Alfonso at Raya bar.  We were mesmerized with the view. Great place to celebrate a special occasion.
Manager Response: Happy 35th Anniversary!  We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you and look forward to creating many more for you soon.  Thank you for the glowing comments about our ladies and gentlemen.  They will be thrilled to receive your feedback.

Summary: I was frantically trying to decide between this property and the Montage where I stayed last year. I decided to splurge on this property, and whilst it is definitely not cheap, it was definitely worth it. I booked my room through whatahotel.com so it came with some added benefits, such as a room upgrade (not available) and late check out at 4pm. Room booked was a garden view club room which was located on the 4th floor. The room itself appeared remodelled with plush furnishings, a large comfortable bed, and a smallish balcony. What really made my stay, however was the treatment that I received in the club. The staff went out of their way to help and even greeted you by name as you passed through. Had the option of dining in the club (buffet) or in Raya (a la carte), which was
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed at the Ritz for my 40th birthday by myself and was in complete heaven. I have traveled a lot of places as well as many islands and there was something about this place that I still have it as my #1 vacation spot. I was upgraded to the Concierge Suite for a little more when I told the front desk I was there for my birthday. Adam greeted me and showed me up to my room and was wonderful with answering questions about things in the area. (I have even had friends stay there and told them to ask for Adam which he met them and gave exceptional service). Even though there is a walk down to the beach, I enjoy working out and the walk was gorgeous along with there is a walking trail along the beach which I took a jog after my arrival. Upon returning from my run, there was a card
Manager Response: We had so much fun celebrating with you and look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Amazing...just like every Ritz I've ever been in
Summary: I recently stayed here on business and the property and service was up to the Ritz brand standards.  Beyond all of the normal Ritz niceties, the property is perfectly placed overlooking a beautiful beach.  It would definitely be worth paying for or asking for an upgrade to an ocean view room.    The only little hiccup was with room service, which they immediately corrected.  I will most certainly return.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  We hope to welcome you back for a visit on your own filled with rest, relaxation and wonderful memories.

Summary Heading: Very nice but not worth the price
Summary: Spent two nights here on business. Great food and service. Room overlooking the ocean was comfortable and offered a great view. Beach was OK but nothing special. Water was great at 74 degrees and the waves were very enjoyable. Overall, no complaints but I would never pay $500 a night. A real waste of hard earned money.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing your feedback via Trip Advisor.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and we hope you enjoyed our facility, staff, and magnificent surroundings.

Summary Heading: Super ROMANTIC & Iconic So Cal luxury!
Summary: We love this resort for the quality, supurb details, and romantic ambiane! Always a great place for a getaway, but just to sit and soak up the so cal sunsets is great...with a glass of Califirnia Merlo, of course.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure welcoming you back for another romantic experience!

Summary: My husband and I spent 6 days at the Ritz Laguna celebrating our first anniversary and enjoyed every minute. From the moment we arrived to the moment we left, the staff was always friendly and accommodating (they even surprised us with champagne and chocolate covered strawberries!) We were upgraded to an ocean view room on the third floor and had a gorgeous view. The room itself was small, but it was nicely updated and the bed was extremely comfortable. Our room was cleaned twice a day, which was great.  The overall views from the hotel are incredible. They have chairs set up on the lawn so you can take in the beautiful views as well as the sunsets. The beach is a short walk from the hotel, but they also offer a complimentary shuttle. The surf was pretty rough so unfortunately
Manager Response: Happy Anniversary!  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for your luxury experience.  We enjoyed creating a memorable stay for you filled with added surprises and touches.  We look forward to celebrating with you for years to come.

Summary Heading: Excellent location for a conference,  meeting or wedding.
Summary: I attended a conference for a national non-profit organization.  The meeting facilities were excellent and comfortable.  I thoroughly enjoyed the location and guest room.  Would consider hosting an event at this venue,  especially a wedding.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  We enjoyed having you.  Please let us know if we may be of assistance to you in the future either for a pleasure visit or business.

Summary Heading: Amazing stay at the Ritz Carlton Laguna
Summary: A cancelled trip abroad resulted in a last minute plan to spend time in Southern California.  The week spent at the Ritz Laguna was truly a highlight of our vacation.  We reserved a double room on the 4th floor to enjoy Club level services.  We were not disappointed!   The food presentations and beverages were outstanding.  Penny, the head concierge, and her staff were exceptionally good and by the end of our stay they felt like family.  The hotel is definitely a top notch Ritz.  The pool is not outstanding but the hotel setting atop a cliff overlooking the beach is spectacular.  Hotel restaurants and outdoor lounge with firepits and cozy/comfy seating are very good.  Day trips to Newport, etc are easy.  We hope to visit this hotel again some time soon.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you with us!  We can't agree more that our exclusive Club Level facility and staff are exceptional.  We look forward to creating more memories for you again soon.

Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights for my wife's birthday in a standard pool-facing room. The room was beautiful, recently remodeled. Even with the rollaway bed for our 5-year old, the room didn't feel too cramped. Service was great, greeting my wife with a birthday cake delivered to the room. We also had dinner at the Raya restaurant which was excellent, window table with perfect view of the sunset and ocean. Even if you don't get a table by the window all tables have an amazing ocean view.  Beach equipment (complimentary) was very nice, even the boogie boards and fins were of good quality. We ended up leaving our own gear in our room... The staff by the beach is very helpful, they even set the beach chairs and umbrella up for you.   Overall a great experience! The pool was great for
Manager Response: It was wonderful having you for your special occasion "staycation" and we are delighted that your little one left with a memorable experience as well.  We look forward to creating more memories for you in the future.

Summary Heading: NICEST PEOPLE ON EARTH WORK AT THE RITZ-CARLTON
Summary: The employees at the Ritz-Carlton go to the max to make your stay perfect. All you have to do is ask and they will find it for you. They filled the ice bucket in my room 4 times a day without me asking. The food in all the restaurants was incredible, including room service.
Manager Response: Thank you for the nice feedback! Our ladies and gentlemen are phenomenal and they truly enjoy proving unique, memorable and personable experiences for all of our guests. When will you be returning? We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: My husband and I stayed one night to celebrate our 15 year wedding anniversary (real celebration to follow in Maui).  What a remarkable property!  The service was excellent as well.  I guess you get what you pay for.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our resort for your quick getaway.  Happy Anniversary!  The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel is a wonderful place to enjoy a romantic celebration.  We hope to have you back with us for many more to come!

Summary: This hotel has some of the best views of any hotel we've been to. And this ritz is better than the St Regis...hands down. And I'm a St Regis fan...it just can't compete with the location. The view deck terrace is perfect, has comfortable couches and good food and, if I had the time, I would stay there all day until sunset. And did I mention the sunsets? Absolutely gorgeous over catalina...with the surfers below. Really cool gym with all huge windows that feel as if you're hanging over the ocean. Rooms aren't huge...but honestly, doesn't take away anything. This is a first class hotel. Only potential issue is service at the main restaurant...but not a big enough deal to make it 4 stars.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We can't agree with you more that our sunsets are absolutely incredible. We enjoyed having you and look forward to welcoming back again soon!

Summary Heading: Platinum Review: Singular the worst room ever
Summary: As a Marriott Platinum member I stay in a lot of hotels. In the last three years I have never once needed to complain even once, but the front desk service at this hotel is horrible.   Upon check-in, I was informed we had a double instead of a king room. When I questioned this, the front desk person stated that is all they had available, and the king bed was only a request. (note: room type is guaranteed for platinum members). When I stated that I thought it was guaranteed, she went to the back to check. She then told me that they were able to find a king room and it would be available in 15 minutes, so we waited.   Upon entering our new room, I was struck by the fact that it was the worst room I had ever seen at a resort. It was on our with a Fairfield Inn. The room was on the
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your extremely valuable feedback via Trip Advisor.  We greatly appreciate hearing from you.  It is our highest mission to provide each of our guests with a unique, memorable, and personal experience, and to create memories that will last a lifetime. We are deeply saddened to hear we let you down.  We are determined to make this right for you and regain your confidence in our resort and brand.  Please contact the Executive Office at your earliest convenience so we may speak with you directly.  Thank you.

Summary: We stayed at the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel as part of a weekend getaway in late July. Upon late checkin, we received a standard garden room which was quite nice for a basic room. It was on a high level facing the pool, directly in the middle of the wing.  The room was both modern and spacious though the bathroom needed to be updated from a tub with curtain to an actual shower stall with door. The resort had a fantastic location directly on the hill over looking the beach which seems like the main draw for this hotel. There were quite a few weddings scheduled for the weekend. The food for breakfast was quite good with an amazing view of the ocean. We did spend part of the day at the pool which was uneventful as the main draw for the property is the beach and surrounding area.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We enjoyed having you!

Summary Heading: Very good service, pool was overcrowded with small children
Summary: Excellent rooms. Nice ocean views with a downhill walk to the beach.  Porters down there set up chairs and umbrellas so that is nice.  The outside bar is nice for sunset drinks and sushi.  I did not rates 5 because the pool area was way overcrowded with small children. Granted it was a busy weekend, but I think this hotel could use a special kids area pool
Manager Response: We enjoyed having you stay with us for the holiday weekend.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: This hotel is a very luxury hotel situated in Laguna beach cailf in Orange County.  This hotel is a luxury upscale hotel and and various amenities. Also perfect location for meetings or banquets.  Hotel is about an hour from LAX or 30-45 min drive from Orange County airport depending on traffic. Disney is also about a 10-15 drive.  Unless you have a car, taxi is available
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for your luxury experience.  We look forward to providing you with another unforgettable visit soon.

Summary Heading: Fabulous Views, everything you would expect from Ritz-Carlton
Summary: The views are fantastic, especially from the gym.  Makes working out much easier.  Staff was friendly and helpful.    Note that they have hidden the electrical outlets in the corridors so that guests can't sit on the chairs and charge their phones/tablets.  Instead, they have a snack shop/coffee shop area with seats and outlets.  It's nice, but i would rather have the option of sitting in a chair in the corridor, but I guess the idea is to generate food/drink sales.  I have just one real complaint, and it may seem trivial, but it shows the cookie-cutter approach they take, rather than actually making each guest feel special.  If they are going to charge over $20 (after tip and other charges) for a hot fudge sundae delivered by room service, at least include enough to hot fudge
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and thank you for your detailed feedback.  We appreciate you taking the time to share it.  The next time you have a chance to visit us, please contact the Executive Office direclty and we would be delighted to offer you a very large and complimentary hot fudge sundae!

Summary: We stayed here for a little get away and chose the Ritz based on their top line service and property.  When we told everyone where we would be staying we received the same response of "it's a phenomenal property", "love that place" etc. Upon check-in you realize it's everything you expect from the valet greeting you warmly, to the bellman welcoming you and asking your name while collecting your things from the car. The lobby is beautifully adorned with bouquets of flowers and an aroma that is calming and inviting. Check in was great and Juan who helped us recognized our loyalty and made sure he accommodated us to the best he could.  Patrick assisted with our bags while welcoming us, telling us about the property and the surrounding areas we could and should visit.  Our room was
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely review of our phenomenal resort!  It was a pleasure having you with us.  Thank you for taking advantage of the many resort activities and amenities.  When will you return for another memorable experience?

Summary: Great hotel!!! We upgraded to a ground level room that included its own patio with fire pit and it was an amazing upgrade!! Definitely worth it and if we were to go back I would request the same room. I did feel that the hotel bar lacked in ambiance but the staff was amazing and made up for it. . The Hotel had some of the most beautiful  views to watch the sun set. Hotel has a short path that walks you directly to California's famous surf spot SaltCreek if you are an avid surfer.  It was a great time.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are delighted you enjoyed your experience and we look forward to your return.

Summary: great place !! amazing view  on Laguna niguel beach. The hotel rentals on the beach ( surfboards, transats, umbrellas ) are a must, so is the little car to drive you back to the hotel. Just too bad  they do not allow day visitors to use those amenities. The hotel property , gym, restaurant are world class . A must stay while in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel!  We look forward to provding another memorable experience for you in the near future.

Summary: This Ritz has an unparalleled location. The views are simply spectacular. Typical for a RC, the general areas are beautiful with lovely fresh flowers throughout. The service is exceptional. I was at a business meeting and the catered food was excellent. On the downside, the rooms have gotten long in the tooth. My showerhead was loose from the wall and the surface on the tub designed to prevent slipping was so worn that I almost slipped two different times getting in and out of the shower. None of the lights in my friend's room worked and neither did her online checkout. In a general bathroom, there were permanent stains in the marble counter. It's things like this that make it less than the top end experience you expect from RC.
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback.  We are continuously enhancing the resort on a daily basis and we have made note of your suggestions. We enjoyed having you as our guest and look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Top Notch and Oh the Views!!!
Summary: We stayed for our anniversary and everything was perfect.  The service was incredible, the room immaculate and the view breathtaking.  180Blu at sunset was so beautiful and they made my favorite strawberry infused martini that was not on the menu. A guest said she was cold and out came blankets for everyone. Lunch and cocktails at the pool were so tasty with very attentive service.  Chairs and umbrellas at the beach below were a nice touch. Breakfast at Raya was delicious. Our window seat overlooking the ocean made for a relaxing setting. Thank you to everyone at the Ritz for a very memorable stay.
Manager Response: Happy Anniversary!  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We are delighted you enjoyed a unique, memorable and personable experience with us.  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: We now live in Santa Barbara.  In the past we lived near the  Ritz, approx 2 blocks away,  for 15 years.  Our family events were very formal and our visits to the Ritz were always very special.   Our last visit back to Orange County was a big change.  We planned on going to the Ritz for a very relaxing day at the Ritz Carlton we have known for over 20 years.  Things have changed.  When we arrived we  had to wait behind a big bus that blocked the entrance to the resort.  A convention  group was exiting the bus.    We had asked for an early check in ( and the web site does not guarantee an early check in).  We arrived late and our room was not ready at 4pm.  Our dinner at the fine dine restaurant Eno Steak  was the only reflection of true Ritz. The food was over the top.  The
Manager Response: Thank you for always keeping our resort close to your heart.  We greatly appreciate your loyalty.  August is our peak month and many families choose us at their luxury destination.  We hope to welcome you back again in the future at perhaps an off-peak time.  Our ladies and gentlemen are eager to provide you with a memorable experience.

Summary: With any ritz carlton experience, there's rarely anything bad that can be said. Would absolutely stay here again, but I'd be quicker to speak up about my accommodations.   I got the end room. Which is fine, don't mind walking, but had issues with water pressure, shower head, tv cutting in and out, and a noisy gate outside.   Business meeting staff and AV guys were stellar, food was good, will definitely come back.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your feedback.  It is extremely valuable.  We look forward to creating many more memories for you in the future!

Summary Heading: Beautiful location but disappointing service and sleep for a Ritz property
Summary: The property and location were beautiful up on a bluff overlooking the ocean.  Our dinners in Blu180 and Raya were both delicious with good service.  The ambience of Raya was like being on a cruise ship with the huge windows open to the ocean.  Both dinners were at sunset so we were treated to a colorful view during dinner.  Blu180 is first come, first served so I suggest arriving as early as you can.  We called for reservations at Raya first thing in the morning and had no problem obtaining a 7:00 reservation to enjoy the sunset during dinner that evening during the week.  The service of Blu180 and Raya  was not continued elsewhere.  One afternoon when the Dana pool was not busy, I settled into a lounge chair by the pool.  I was thirsty and hungry, but no waiter came by after
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing your detailed feedback. We enjoy hearing from our valuable guests and strive to always provide the most memorable experiences. We are delighted you enjoyed your overall experience and we hope to have the opportunity to regain your confidence in our pool, beach, and bed offerings on a future visit.  Please let us know if we can assist you in any way.

Summary: Great service, beautiful scenery, wonderful area.  Resort is immaculate and staff smiling and happy to serve. Rooms are large with the most comfortable beds a Hotel could offer.  Deserves 6 out of 5 stars.
Manager Response: It was wonderful having you!  Welcome home!

Summary Heading: Great place to just chill out!
Summary: Impeccable service, great rooms, perfect location and a wonderful staff.  On site dining is all great and the spa is terrific as well.  Club level is perfect if looking for a place to hang and not leave--endless beverages and food. Staff was great.  Although there was construction going on--they were installing gas firepits in lower rooms which was annoying, the front desk and concierge aimed to please and made all good.  Would go back again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to providing another memorable experience for you soon.

Summary Heading: Doesn't get any better than this!
