Summary: I recently had a 4 night stay at the Ritz for a business meeting.  Although the property is fantastic, what really stands out are the personnel.  Their attention to detail and professionalism are rare these days.  We had a lovely ground floor room with a fire pit.  The room was clean and spacious.  The bathroom had two sinks which is welcome when traveling with family.  There were three of us in a room, my husband, myself and my 19 year old daughter.  We had a rollaway for her and there was still plenty of room.  Instead of a minibar, there was an empty refrigerator which was a welcome addition.  I think most hotels should offer this instead of the ubiquitous overpriced minibar.  My daughter has celiac disease so it's nice to be able to go to the grocery store and stock up on
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you and your family, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: I had not done much research prior to my trip. Upon my arrival for a 5 night stay I was floored when I entered the lobby area with the great service and gorgeous look of the hotel. The bellman brought our bags to the room and we had a gorgeous oceanfront room with a firepit I was again floored. the bellman went out of his way to help me out with everything got fresh ice for me and returned shortly with some forgotten items from home. The entire staff at restauraunts and all around the staff was second to none. We stayed here for first part of our journey with work then ventured on to explore more of California.   Only drawback room prices very high compared to other locations with ocean view, however never had own firepit and enjoyed the balcone and view each day and night
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We are delighted you enjoyed your experience with us and we look forward to creating more memories for you again soon.

Summary: always the best in service and superior luxury. this is an absolutely awesome resort and what makes it truly is the staff and service. If you stay at a Ritz often you more than likely have a file for what you like and don't like and they really do try to follow that to the max. The people always smile say hello ask how your day is and remember your name. Valet can be hit and miss with some of the kids working but overall trust me you have nothing to worry about at this hotel! you will enjoy your stay to the max. i would definitely recommend the club floor and lounge or of course a first floor ocean view with a fire pit with your lady and the rooms can be on the smaller side for a standard room but no amenity is missed and the bathrooms are very clean and bed extremely
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again!  We are delighted you enjoyed the resort and our fantastic surroundings.

Summary: This hotel follows the Ritz model to a tee - wonderful lobby, great pool, nice bathrooms, and good service, but thoroughly average room.  This is a picturesque place.  The ocean views, the immaculate lobby, and the great pool are all huge selling points.  Another bonus is that this is a great hotel for kids.  Lots to do, and plenty of families with kids there.  The fitness center overlooking the ocean actually made me want to exercise.  I just think the rooms are huge disappointments.  The A/C units are loud.  The decor and carpet are drab and need to be updated.  If I'm paying $1,000 a night, then give me a spectacular room too.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel and thank you for providing your feedback regarding your experience. We are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us overall.  We hope you have the chance to join us again in the near future to enjoy some of our many forthcoming enhancements to the resort.

Summary: Recently stayed for a corporate event.  Was so excited and then quickly disappointed.  I called ahead to find out if we were in an ocean view or courtyard view and was told an ocean view.  Arrived and it was a corner courtyard with no view.  OK, brush it off.  Speaking of brush off, the hair that was never cleaned around the rim of the bathtub was gross and I'm not altogether certain came from my head.  The ladies underwear that had been left in the drawer from the previous guest, was interesting to find while unpacking.  Paper products in the bathroom not refilled one day.  Don't ask the hotel staff because you will be told they don't live around there and don't know.  If you need to get an important cellphone call it won't happen on the lower floor with a courtyard view as
Manager Response: Thank you for your extremely valuable feedback.  We greatly appreciate it.  It has been used constructively and positively.  We hope you have the chance to revisit us so we may provide you with the experience you expect.  Please feel free to reach out to the Executive Office for future assistance.

Summary Heading: Mostly great service and great location.
Summary: The hotel sits on a bluff overlooking the beach and pacific ocean.  It is truly a beautiful setting.  We had some glitches however during our stay that required a slight downgrade of our review.  First, we were traveling with our two young children and asked specifically for a double room.  When we arriveed we were told that the hotel was sold out and only a king room was available.  So we were left with two kids in a king bed and a roll  away.  Not a great start.  Luckily, my brother lives nearby and my son spent the night with his cousins.  The following day, I went back to the front desk and they found was a double room but only after showing them my reservation email that clearly stated 4 to a room, which was made by central reservation.  The front desk person blamed central
Manager Response: Thank you staying with us and providing such valuable feedback.  We greatly appreciate your comments.  Please be assured that we are very environmentally aware.  We have several recycle bins visible throughout the property, and our ladies and gentlemen are trained to recycle all eligible products that may end up in the wrong bins.  They do so in our back of the house areas. We hope to have the opportunity to have you visit again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Average Hotel with Above Average Price
Summary: The view from the hotel was stunning, there is no doubt about that! We were on a trip sponsored by my Mother's company, and I tagged along. Every morning we would have breakfast on the Dana Lawn, and there is no complaining about that view or the weather. What I am annoyed about is that the hotel had cracked paint and scuffs along the walls in our room. But even that didn't annoy me as much as the fact that our room never got cleaned one day! And no, we did not have the "Do Not Disturb" thing on the door knob. We left the room to go whale watching at about 10:00 am, and got back at 3 p.m., and our room had not been cleaned. We didn't think it was a huge deal, but had a gala that evening so we decided to sneak in a nap before the maid showed up, and we were relegated to the
Manager Response: We are delighted you had the opportunity to visit the resort and we hope you enjoyed the gala.  Thank you for letting us know of our service inconsistency.  We have taken your comments constructively.  We hope you return again soon.  We are confident your next Ritz-Carlton experience will be a true Ritz-Carlton experience.

Summary Heading: Stay away! Ants in the rooms
Summary: We recently stayed at the Ritz Carlton for a conference. The rooms are very high priced, however, we were plagued problems in our room the minute we checked in. It started with a refrigerator that did not work that took over 24 hours and multiple phone calls to customer service until they replaced the fridge. We also delt with ants in the room, by the bed and by the refrigerator. Multiple calls to housekeeping resulted in them coming and wiping up the area however, the ants persisted resulting in an engineer being called to treat the room. Upon return from dinner, there were STILL ants crawling on the table and baseboards! There was no food on the table and only food was closed and placed in cabinet to limit chance of ant attraction. At this point we personally visited the
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We would welcome the chance to speak with you further.  Kindly contact the Executive Office at the resort so we can ensure we regain your confidence in us.  Thank you again for staying with us and providing your review.

Summary: We went for one night to get away last month and came away pretty disappointed.  I'd agree with the recent reviewer who said that the hotel needs a facelift.  I'd also say that it needs some friendlier front desk people.  Our first room smelled of stale cigarette smoke, so we asked to change rooms.  We eventually changed to another, which had the same smell.  The staff advised us that because guests are allowed to smoke on the terraces, the smell drifts inside.  The carpet was old and the bathtub had rust and a yellow-tinted bottom.  Definitely not what I deem appropriate to use to bathe my toddler.  Kind of a depressing room.  The pool was nice, although the water was chilly.  So chilly that my son and husband were shivering, and yet, when we asked whether the hotel might
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We strive at all times to provide an exceptional experience for all of our guests.  We are disappointed to hear you did not leave the resort with wonderful memories.  We hope to make it up to you and regain your confidence.  Please feel free to contact our office directly so we can make this right for you.

Summary: This is our 3rd summer staying at the Laguna Niguel Ritz and it does not disappoint!  We stayed on the club level (can't go back to the regular floors now!).  It is fantastic!  It feels like going home.  From Diane to Penni, these ladies at the club level is superb!  The view is magnificent.  This is by far our favorite Ritz!
Manager Response: We couldn't agree with you more that our exclusive Club Level service, staff and facilities are priceless.  We enjoyed having you with us again and we look forward to creating more unique memories for you soon.  Welcome home!

Summary: My husband & I stayed at the ritz in Dana Point & loved it. The service was impeccable, rooms were large & very clean. The front desk check in process was quick & the bellman were very helpful!! The pool was relaxing & the beach ( complimentary chairs, umbrella, towels) were beyond a plus. They even brought them down the hill for you & picked them up at the end of the day.
Manager Response: We are so glad you enjoyed your experience with us!  Will you be returning soon?

Summary Heading: Great location on the beach but it is outdated an needs a face lift.
Summary: The location is fabulous and the beach is fantastic but we paid $1,000 for an ocean front room that was very small and outdated.  The room actually had an odor and when I opened the closet to hang a dress, I would not hang my dress there because of the smell.  The carpet is old.  The bathroom looks to be someone updated with two marbled top sinks.  The bed was comfortable.  The balcony is very small and needs a good paint job or new plaster.  The hotel is also a bit loud as people are shouting at each other on the balconies.  This hotel was a gem in the 80's but needs an all new facelift.  Room service was good but food was fair.  This hotel is not worth the money what so ever.  There are much better hotels.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We greatly appreciate your comments and they will be used constructively.  We hope to welcome you back in the future so you can enjoy the many enhancements we have forthcoming.  Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: This is the best Ritz we've ever stayed at. The facility is fabulous, perched on a cliff over the ocean. Staff are attentive, helpful, and friendly. The food was outstanding if a bit pricy. It is a Ritz though. Beds were comfortable and when you close the door to the balcony, you close out all ambient sound. The room environment was easily controlled.  Five-day stay, I say they earned a star for each day!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are delighted to know you enjoyed your experience with us.  Our ladies and gentlemen strive to create life long memories for all of our guests and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary: We stay at a lot of Ritz Carlton properties and I must say that the staff and management is very impressive here. The property, although older, makes up for its age with the exceptional service. The rooms were recently renovated in 2013 and look fresh, clean and modern. We moved here for 3 nights after a very disappointing stay at the Fairmont Newport Beach. We wanted to book a suite which was not available as the hotel was sold out. The Front Desk Manager (MC) graciously upgraded us to a Coastline view upon check in and we then moved to a suite the next day. There were some small challenges at the pool but the pool supervisor "May" (I don't think I am spelling her name correctly) apologized and took care of my beer, which was unexpected but much appreciated. She even went to
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for your luxury experience.  We greatly appreciate your loyalty to our resort and brand.  Thank you for the nice words regarding our ladies and gentlemen.  As you know they take great pride in providing a level of service that exceeds our guests' expectations.  We look forward to creating another memorable experience for you soon!

Summary Heading: We LOVED being here , wish we could have stayed longer!
Summary: We were quite miraculously upgraded to a suite about the size of our home, complete with its own firepit (see pix!). We were at a conference here, and the food was exceptionally good , given the number of people being served. excellent salads and fruits.Also the beach was far enough away that , while you could hear the sound of the waves, the bathers seemed far enough away so as to not intrude on the calm setting. We will extend our stay the next time
Manager Response: We enjoyed surprising you with the suite upgrade and are glad you took advantage of the outdoor fire place. Next time, please stay longer! Thank you for sharing your photos. They are great!

Summary: the views were absolutely stunning!  The rooms are very comfortable and well appointed as one would expect at a ritz carlton.   The beach is accessible by foot or transportation, offered by the hotel, as are the beach chairs, umbrellas, sand toys,  boogie boards. This was perfect for my kids. It is a busy hotel, and although the concierge services are not up to par with other ritz carltons ( cayman, dallas, sf, and toronto), everyone is friendly, and professional. It was a splurge but we thoroughly enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Thanking for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for your luxury destination. We enjoyed having you!

Summary: We stayed 2 nights at the property. Although it's an older property, we found it to be well maintained. The view from our room was breathtaking. We walked down to the beach, but decided to take the hotel's shuttle back up... trust me, it's a long way down the cliff to the beach:)
Manager Response: We can't argue the fact that our view is absolutely magnificent!  Thank you for posting your photos!

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 5 nights as the relaxation part of our holiday before travelling round. The staff were all incredibly helpful and friendly and the service was impeccable. We even had a beach butler who carried chairs, umbrellas, body boards etc to the beach for us and set it all up. The food was excellent and the restaurant had a great view over the beach. We would tell the restaurant that we were ready to eat and then go to the cocktail bar and they would ring us when a window table became available. This was usually within about half an hour. As to be expected from a hotel of this quality, it was quite pricey!
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Great views, good food, excellent service.  Stay on the club level for even more of a expierence.  The food they serve all day can satisfy your needs.  Great activitties for the kids.  Good Spa with excellent staff.  Really nice fitness center overlooking the ocean.  Only down side was public beach tends to get a little crowded.
Manager Response: On behalf all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are delighted you enjoyed so many of our offerings and hope you took home some wonderful memories.

Summary: I recently stayed at the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel for a conference.  First of all, the property and location are beautiful.  Stunning views of the ocean.  The hotel itself seems a little dated, but was kept very clean.  I received a conference rate for this hotel and the price seemed reasonable, but the regular rate is $700-$2000 per night, and I certainly don't think this hotel is worth that price.  There is more to an excellent hotel besides scenery.    Here are some of my observations:  I like that the bathrooms have two sinks and have plenty of space.  I also like the built in makeup mirror.  However, the marble floors and walls seem very dated.  The shower head in my room was broken - you couldn't move it or adjust it, it just hung sideways.  All of the food I tried was
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for staying with us and providing your feedback.  It was a pleasure having you as our guest and we hope you took home some wonderful memories.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: We got married here 11 years ago and went back for the day to enjoy cocktails and lunch. I called in advance to make a reservation for lunch at Raya and indicated it was our anniversary. We enjoyed spending some time checking out the new design of the hotel.  I was very pleased with one exception, the tree located where we had our ceremony was no longer there. I will assume it was removed for the view. We made our way to Raya after a stop at 180 Blu. Our lunch was lovely. We were surprised at the end with a special dessert acknowledging our anniversary. After lunch we went to Bar Raya and  took our drinks outdoors over looking the ocean where we had our wedding. The weather was not terrific yet we still enjoyed the spectacular view. When we went to valet parking we were told it
Manager Response: Happy Anniversary!  Thank you for keeping us as your special place to visit.  We always enjoy creating memorable experiences for our guests and we look forward to your return soon.

Summary Heading: Stunning location but very poor service, not the RC we love at all!
Summary: Our arrival was very poor, barely got spoken too, no drink on arrival, none to take the bags to the room, so we did ourselves and then the trolley stayed outside the room for the next 18 hours.. next evening we had a reservation at 7.30 in the Raya restaurant in the window to which we were early, we were told table ready in 15 minutes an hour and a 1/4 later we were still waiting and still being told 15 minutes so we gave up and had food from the market place.. we asked to see the Food and Bevergae manager but he / she never appeared. Today we arrived at the Dana Pool at 9.30 there were empty plastic cups around the pool from the previous day, cutlery and serviettes under the beds, discarded food on beds . We had to ask for the pool area to be cleaned, which was duly done but
Manager Response: Thank you very much for letting us know of our service inconsistencies.  We need to make this right for you right away.  We strive at all times to operate our resort with excellent service and follow through and would like the opportunity to speak with you directly.  May we ask that you phone our Executive Office at your earliest convenience?  Thank you.

Summary: This is a fantastic property. I was there for business and enjoyed everything from the room, the food, the facilites etc. The service was great - nothing bad to report. My only complaint was I happened to be in the VERY end room of the hotel and all the business activities were on the other end of the property. So in high heels - it started to hurt! :)
Manager Response: We enjoyed having you as our "business" guest and look forward to your return to experience a much more relaxed and rejuvinating experience.  Thank you for sharing your feedback.

Summary: We stayed here for five nights  in July and it was the best.  From the food to the flowers to the yoga classes it was great. The beach is very special and the attention to detail is wonderful.  All of this and not that much more expensive that  other beach front hotels.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel as your luxury destination.

Summary: My stay was as expected for a Ritz-Carlton-comfortable, great service, clean room, striking location situated on a cliff above the Pacific.  The food was pretty good, everything else was outstanding.  It was a nice stay.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure providing you with a memorable experience.  Our ladies and gentlemen strive to always provide a warm, relaxed and refined ambience for all of our guests.  Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: We stayed as a family for 3 nights in March and had the best time. We arrived early off a long flight from Brisbane and they let us check in early. We relaxed so much we did not want to leave to go to Disney! The team in the club lounge are excellent Penny, Gaby and Mercedes were superb. Penny went out of her way to help us to organise activities and helped me to move rooms when I wanted to surprise my husband with a sea view. We are going to book again when we visit the US over Christmas.
Manager Response: Thank you for joining us all the way from Australia!  We are delighted to know you were able to relax and rejuvenate. We will always take care of everything for you.  We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary Heading: Exceeds Expectations!  Not sure what others are thinking!
Summary: This property is not brand new, but the grounds are immaculate and beautifully landscaped.  The pool areas are clean and well groomed.  The staff could not be nicer and they are always trying to make you feel comfortable.  Yes, the food and drinks are pricey, but if you don't want them, they go to a grocery store and get your own.  They have small fridges in the rooms.  My husband was here on a conference so my daughter and I tagged along.    My 8 year old daughter took on the Pacific Ocean today and it won with pieces of her teeth missing and some nice scrapes on her face.  The staff was immediately helpful by taking up our chairs and towels, getting our car ready with directions, offering to go to Urgent Care with us, getting my daughter ice, etc.  When we returned, we thanked
Manager Response: We sure hope your daughter is feeling much better!  Thank you for joining us as we celebrate our 30th anniversary this summer.  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary: We spent a couple nights at this beautiful Ritz Carlton.  From the beginning of our stay to the end it was great.  The service and accommodations were fantastic.  The rooms were clean and roomy.  The views were outstanding.  With a nice walk to the beach the hotel provides chairs, umbrellas, towels and water bottles.  They have a shuttle to take you back to the hotel since the walk will be all uphill.  The staff is very attentive and the coffee in the room is great.  We will definitely be back to the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We enjoyed creating a unique and memorable experience for you and your family.  We hope you return soon.

Summary Heading: OH NO! NOT THE RITZ CARLTON AGAIN
Summary: Because of the service issues I had during my stay I gave this resort a poor.  Why? Where do I start?  Once again I have had issues with this particular Ritz.  This year they have disappointed me again.  The communication and service at the Ritz has left a lot to be desired. Starting with Housekeeping not showing up when they said they would-I stayed out of the room just for this reason.  Then they show up and I have to sit on balcony while they clean since I really didn't have enough time to do my original plan.  When I go "into" the room where the toliet is the light is out and it is a very dark space.  How could housekeeping even know if they did a good job cleaning?  They couldn't see and they didn't call anyone to fix it.  They left that up to me. I also left a note for
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your detailed feedback and it has been share with our senior leaders here at the resort.  Of course we want to ensure that we thoroughly understand our inconsistencies and make this right for you.  To that end, could you please phone our Executive Office at the property so we can speak with you further?  Thank you and we look forward to regaining your confidence in our resort and staff.

Summary: We stayed at the Ritz June 15-21 of 2014.  We loved rooms 4012 and 4014 that joined on the consierge (fourth) floor.  We were appreciative of the rooms.  They kept the adjoining room vacant, at our request, for a couple of days until our son and mother came and were ensconsed in it.  The ladies serving on the floor and everywhere throughout the hotel were genuinely helpful, kind and sincere in their efforts to make us happy.  Our view was the most special view on the website of the ocean and the beautiful park next door.  We loved walking to that park, as there are sidewalks all along the ocean. You can walk up to the St. Regis also on that sidewalk past the delightful landscaping and golf courses on the ocean.  The consierge food presentation three times a day was absolutely
Manager Response: Thank you for your warm comments.  It was such a delight to read your review of our resort and we have shared it with our ladies and gentlemen.  They strive on a daily basis to create the best, memorable, unique and personaly experiences for each of our many guests.  We are delighted to know you enjoyed your stay with us and we definitely look forward to your next visit.

Summary: I am lucky enough to get to travel with my husband when he has a business trip somewhere worth me taking time to go, and the location of this Ritz Carlton is great. Located just above a beautiful beach with fantastic ocean vistas and situated between Dana Point and Laguna Beach there is lots to do and see nearby. The hotel itself is lovely, although the room we had did not have a view, it was just fine as it was located near a pool and had a secluded patio. Fantastic views from most other places in the hotel except the pools. The view from the gym is fantastic. Nice bathroom and all the housekeeping staff did a great job. There is a refrigerator in the room, but it is empty. So you can get snacks and drinks from a store in the lobby or you can venture across the street where
Manager Response: We are delighted that you were able to enjoy our property and surroundings while your husband was on business.  We hope to welcome you back for a vacation soon!

Summary: We had a wonderful experience at the Ritz. Wonderful staff and the location is breathtaking.  You can walk down to the beach and the staff will provide you with everything you need for a the day !!  The kids had a ball. Full service hotel and resort with a exceptional staff!!!!
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed your Ritz-Carlton experience with us and look forward to creating another memorable experience for you soon!

Summary: This hotel was absolutely magical.  The views were breathtaking.  The service, perfect - from the wait staff to the front desk to the valet to housekeeping.  We spent one night at this hotel on a girl's trip - my sister and our teenage daughters.  The weather did not cooperate but the hotel more than made up for the lack of warm sunshine.  At every turn we were gasping in delight. The partial view rooms were more than acceptable. The location, while not in town and accessible to walk places, was perfectly placed for stunning views of the beaches below and the amazing sunset.  We left our doors open at night to listen to the waves crashing on the beach far below.  The beach is a hike but the staff is willing to drive those less inclined for the steep walk.  The beach staff will
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed feedback.  We enjoyed having all the "girls" and hope to welcome you back soon!  We have many more memories in store for you.

Summary: We were going to Hilton Anaheim CA. it was overbooked so they send us to the The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It was so fun. The view from our balcony was great. Partial view of the ocean and great view of the sunset. It was on a cliff over looking the ocean. We saw dolphins swimming from the cliffs. They were also having  a surfing contest on the beach.  They also had a golf cart to take you up and down to the beach. The grounds were beautiful. The food was good but very expensive. I would come to this place again but too expensive.
Manager Response: We are delighted you had a chance to experience our resort!  Thank you for staying with us and enjoying our property and magnificent surroundings.  We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back.

Summary: Ok, who admits this?...Me! I recovered at the Ritz from elective surgery during the first week in July. From the moment I called to make reservations to the moment of departure The Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel was the ultimate recovery location. Reservations selected a well appointed room on the first floor by a small pool that attracts readers and loungers. The double french doors opened onto a private patio surrounded by lush greens, ferns and the faint sound of a distant luscious fountain. The service was the most of the Ritz. Thank you to Joshua (valet), iphone finder and restaurant reservation changer, Mike (concierge), Laura (front desk) and Sylvia (housekeeper). And yes...Fully recovered and ready for summer fun.
Manager Response: We enjoyed having you and are glad your recovery was successful!  The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel is a fantastic and tranquil place to enjoy rest and relaxation.  You are so close to us we hope you choose to visit us more often!

Summary: Beautiful hotel with outstanding service. You can't beat the view of the ocean from the fitness center - it makes the workout go fast. Be sure to catch the sunset and take advantage of the beach butler service. My only complaint is that it's a great place for families, but the dining options for kids are very limited. The lobby was full of families (including mine) eating on couches outside the bar area where kids aren't allowed. The market has limited options and is overpriced even for a high-end hotel. But overall one of the best hotels I've stayed at in Southern California.
Manager Response: We gratly appreciate your feedback and we always want our younger guests to enjoy their experience with us too.  We are delighted you enjoyed your overall stay with us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Not overly impressed this time around
Summary: We stayed at this property a few years ago and were very happy there. This time around it did not live up to our expectations. It was a couple's weekend getaway to celebrate our wedding anniversary, longing for peace and quiet away from kids. Unfortunately on our first night there we were placed in a (stunning view) room between two groups of partying young adults who were staying at the hotel for a wedding. So the stunning view room turned into a nightmare of a night with drunk people laughing and partying until 4:30 am despite our repeated calls to security AND me sticking my head out into the hallway (yes, they made their way there at some point and decided to discuss current world issues at 2 am) telling them to shut up. Needless to say the first night we got NO sleep. So
Manager Response: We value your feedback and can't thank you enough for sharing your experience.  Our highest mission is for our guests to always enjoy a warm, relaxed, yet refined ambiance.  It is always disheartening to hear that our guests have not fully enjoyed their stay with us.  We would enjoy the opportunity to discuss your experience futher.  Please contact our Executive Office directly.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary: Ritz Laguna Niguel is a fantastic property.  Even before arrival, I had email communications from the concierge and manager to make sure if I needed anything for my stay.  I mentioned that it was for my step-daughter's 16th birthday, Samantha P. was in charge of this pleasant surprise for her.  The smile and look on her face was priceless.  Thank you so much.  We stayed at the club level and the ladies who worked there were very courteous and professional.  I do realize that there is many repeat guests.  From valet, front desk to bell man, everyone was very kind and professional.  The yoga and pilates instructor Cynthia was also very good and friendly.  She makes you feel welcomed and at ease.  The emails after checking out to inquire about improvements were very good follow up
Manager Response: We enjoyed creating a wonderful memory for you and your family. Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for your special occasion. On behalf of Samantha, Cynthia, and all our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary Heading: Idyllic hotel to taste the wealthy SoCal lifestyle
Summary: I was here 5 days during a business trip, and would come back again for a vacation. The property is absolutely beautiful. The hotel sits on a cliff above a cove, between two points that just out into the ocean and create a very private "frame." As crowded as Southern California can be, it feels isolated and quiet. There are several lawns, terraces, and an outdoors bar that overlook the Pacific. On one side of the hotel there is a large public park leading to the beach, and on the other is a heavily landscaped hill. So it's very private, although you can easily see the expensive private beachside homes up and down the coast. If you don't want to feel isolated, Laguna Beach, Dana Point, and even Newport Beach are short drives and have plenty to do. Each of these towns has beaucoup
Manager Response: Whether you join us on business or pleasure, our ladies and gentlemen take great pride in providing a level of personal yet relaxed service that is sure create memories for a lifetime.  Of course our magnificent surrounding definitely play a role as well.  We enjoyed having you and we look forward to your return.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary Heading: 5th visit, another absolutely perfect long weekend getaway!
Summary: Perfect place to hold a party.  The service will exceed all of your expectations!  We've been coming here for the past few years and each and every visit has been stellar.  Close to shopping and town, yet secluded enough to do absolutely nothing but lounge all day long.  The staff are wonderful and the amenities are great.  We were able together one free night which was really nice!    Dana Vigilante Nutley, NJ
Manager Response: We can't thank you enough for your loyalty!  We are delighted that you once again fully enjoyed your experience with us.  Our highest mission is to always provide you and your guests with unique and personal memories.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: The Ritz-Carlton is set on a hillside overlooking the water. The views are as beautiful as the hotel. The staff couldn't do enough to help you out. The location is convenient to the beach and near by towns.  There is nothing not to like about this hotel!
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us....at your "home away from home".  We loop forward to creating many more unique memories for you soon.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary Heading: Fabulous experience from start to finish
Summary: I had the pleasure of holding a C-level conference at this property and it met all my expectations and then some.  I had tried 3 times to get out for a site visit but due to snow  storms back east, my flights were cancelled each time.  So I was going into the event with sort of a blind eye having not physically been to the venue prior to my event.   It didn't matter.  The venue was amazing, the service level was top notch and the attendees for our conference could not stop telling me how much they loved the event and venue.   I am very fortunate to stay at the hotels I've gotten to stay at around the world, both personally and professionally - this was one of the best.   My husband joined me for part of the trip and he even said that everyone must stay at a Ritz Carlton at least
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed your experience with us.  We pledge to always provide the finest personal service and facilities for all of our guests whether they are joining us on business, pleasure or both.  We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary Heading: 5 star location and grounds - 4 star rooms, excellent staff
Summary: It's hard to beat the location of the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel (which is really in Dana Point).  You are literally perched on a cliff above the ocean in some of the most prime real estate in the country.  There is no slow season in Orange County so I was lucky to use a "free" night from the Ritz Rewards for this property, which is usually about $600 (or more!) a night all year long.  For free, it was a stunning and amazing experience, but for $600 I would have left feeling that I paid too much.  There are much nicer properties in the Ritz portfolio but again...location, location, location.    If you are arriving on a Saturday, you can almost be assured that there will be some elaborate wedding going on.  The valet line was gridlock as we attempted to check in in the early
Manager Response: Thank your for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for your luxury travel needs. We enjoyed having you with us and we look forward to creating more memories for you in the future.

Summary: I had a business engagement and brought my wife along for what we thought would be a fabulous weekend get-away.  The property is fabulous with beautiful views overlooking the Pacific. The great experience ended there.  I could hardly believe we were at a Ritz Carlton.  We stopped at the outside bar for a drink on our way to the room.  Only 5 couples were there but the server kept walking by us and never acknowledged our presence.  Finally after about 10 minutes I went to the bar and got a server to come over.  The next morning we waited 90 minutes for room service breakfast and even after calling twice never received an apology.  The restaurant was booked for dinner and the hotel was so over crowded that along with terrible service our hopes for a great peaceful weekend were
Manager Response: Thank your for your extremely valuable feedback. It has been heard and taken seriously.  We intended for your stay with us to be a wonderful experience. We look forward to speaking with you directly if possible. Please contact our Executive Office so we may assist you personally.

Summary: A beautiful hotel overlooking the Pacific Ocean.  My room had an ocean view and could sleep to the sound of the waves.  Staff is probably some of the friendliest and most helpful of any hotel I've ever stayed in.  During the night I usually keep orange juice or cola nearby since I'm a diabetic.  Didn't realize I didn't have anything until I was ready for bed.  Called room-service, a large glass of orange juice delivered compliments of the hotel!!!  (that's never happened anywhere that I remember.)  Our conference rate was very good for the hotel and the food served, again, was some of the best I've ever had.  If you can - this is a wonderful place to stay.
Manager Response: It is our pleasure to bring you juice or soda anytime!  Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back.  The ocean waves are calling you....

Summary Heading: Feeling Ritzy? Come to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel!
Summary: I just can't believe my eye when I saw a "terrible" rating for this hotel. It is impossible. Not only this hotel is one of the best Ritz-Carlton hotels in America, it is one of the best internationally. Beautiful property, excellent location, and wonderful service offered. The money you spend for the room is totally worth it. Love their lawn, their pools, and their staff. Couldn't ask for more!
Manager Response: It was a pleasure creating a memorable experience for you. We look forward to many more in the future!

Summary: While in CA for a bridal shower with my daughters, we decided to splurge and stay at the Ritz. The view is breathtaking. A beautiful wedding occurred outside our window. We slept with the door open listening to the sound of the ocean. Breakfast at Raya was delicious and worth the cost. The pool and spa were both of excellent quality. Room service was expensive (what do you expect?) but delicious. This is my first choice for a SoCal luxury hotel. Will return!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for your Southern California luxury experience.  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to creating many more memories for you and your family again soon.

Summary: The Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel Resort is where I chose to celebrate my birthday; far enough away from home (in Marina del Rey - about 60 miles south); and close enough for a quick 2 night luxurious stay.      Felita's Favorite Things and Tips:  * Talk to Guest Relations when they email you your confirmation and let them know what you're doing, anything special, celebrations, etc.  I connected with Carly Kinsman, and she was utterly fantastic!  A great professional!    * Incomparable Ocean Views and personal fire pit overlooking the perfect sweep of the beach.  Imagine waking up to this in the morning - it's a perfect way to unplug and be one with the ocean, the sky, nature.  * Beautiful surroundings energize me and relax me.  It's elegant and gorgeous but also comfy and relaxed.
Manager Response: We couldn't agree with you more that our ladies and gentlemen strive for excellence every day they come to work.  It is their highest mission to always provide a warm, relaxed yet refince ambiance to each of the valuable guests they touch each day.  Thank you for truly immersing yourself in to our amazing surroundings and beautiful property.  We look forward to your return!

Summary: ….what more can I say?  OK, its at Dana Point, so the view is amazing.  It´s a gorgeous property.  Nothing much to say about the service, its typical high class service.  The funnest part for me, honestly, was sitting on the balcony at night and seeing rabbits running around on the cliffs.
Manager Response: Thank you for enjoying our resort, our surroundings, and our "wildlife".  It was a pleasure having you with us!

Summary: This resort is absolutely magnificent. The view from my balcony was just amazing. I really wish that I would've spent a full week here. I didnt think much of the resort when I saw it online but it was really great. Some problems I had with it was the halls are very loud with wedding party's on the weekend. The food here was very overpriced for the quantity. But other than that everything was perfect. This resort deserves a hell of a lot more credit. Extremely beautiful, stay here if you are planning a trip to California.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and we thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are delighted you enjoyed your overall experience with us and we look forward creating many more memories for you again soon.

Summary Heading: Not a true Ritz Carlton experience
Summary: We stayed at the Ritz Carlton because we wanted a guaranteed relaxing and comfortable stay. The service was excellent but the accommodations were cramped and not the typical grand, elegant feel of a Ritz Carlton.  We heard people next to us and above us so we didn't feel like we were in a luxery hotel.  The beach was beautiful and the excellent, attentive service of the staff that brought chairs and umbrellas to the beach was appreciated.
Manager Response: Thank you for your compliments and constructive feedback. We greatly appreciate your time in letting us know of your experience. We enjoyed having you as our guest and we look forward to the opportunity to creating an unforgettable experience for you during your next visit.

Summary: This hotel is beautiful, and the service was excellent. Really nice fitness facility and salon, and the yoga and Pilates classes (held outside!) were great. Only two complaints - no fan in the bathroom, so it got extremely hot in there, and not enough lighting in the room. Minor issues, but for the price we paid, it was annoying. I would go back here in a heartbeat.
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback. It has been heard. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to welcome you back very soon.

Summary: location-location-location. . .    this is a special property on a spectacular piece of California coastline.  staff is very friendly and helpful beginning from the time you pull up to the front door.   check-in was quick and easy.    rooms are nice - not over the top but clean, enough room to spread out and work and still have a place to relax.    great pools, the beach and ocean, nice bar and restaurants.   this place has it all.    great place to go read a book and unwind, perhaps do a little surfing, or simply walk on the beach.    great place for business or romance.
Manager Response: We couldn't agree with you more that whether you choose The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Nigel for your business or pleasure needs, there is not a more fantastic location.  Thank you for your visit and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Service was wonderful, room was beautiful and the location was perfect.  I had 2 dinners on the premises and both were amazing.  I did not want to leave.  The health club has 1) great equipment and 2) the BEST VIEW EVER!!!!!  Also, I was pleased with the decent (yet overpriced) cigar selection in the pub.  Kudos to the Ritz and their staff for a wonderful visit.
Manager Response: We are delighted that you enjoyed our resort and some of the fabulous amenities we have to offer.  We hope you choose to join us again soon.  Thank you for your visit!

Summary: There aren't enough words! The property is gorgeous. It's not ON the water, it sits on a bluff above the water. Bit of a wrangle getting to the water, other than that, it is a sumptuous hotel experience. Everything is lush and lavish and caters to your every wish. We only had a king room overlooking the pool, and it was fantastic! Room service was better than most restaurants!  Each dining area and bar was fab. We stayed for a week and never wanted to leave. They make you feel like a king! Can't wait to go again. Soon. Worth every nickel you can save up!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We enjoyed having you!

Summary: my client and i loved this hotel.  we had a vip group of 150+ on site and the service we received was more than perfect.  from the time you step out of your car to the time you leave there this hotel will take care of all your needs.  the food is awesome and the views are amazing.  definitely a top notch hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for your business needs.  We realize you have numerous choices for luxury meeting facilities.  We hope you have the opportunity to return for a more relaxed vacation visit next time.  Either way, we promise to create a memorable experience for you!

Summary: The views from the hotel were amazing!  We stay here for only one night and everything about it was great!  Very friendly staff, amazing views, and some of the best nachos.  You must go to the bar/lounge that is outside on the 2nd floor.  This was out first stay at Ritz Carlton and we enjoyed it.  The bar/lounge near the entrance was mediocre.  Dessert was good, drinks were pricey of course.  I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your photos.  We loved seeing them.  We are delighted you enjoyed your experience with us and hope to create many more memories for you in the future.

Summary: My wife and I spent the first weekend of May at this remarkable property. We were warmly greeted, and I noticed that this was the case for all the guests. They do this with ease, despite a rather large influx of guests that afternoon. We splurged for the Club level, and the service/attention to detail was remarkable. Tip for those staying on the club level at any Ritz, take advantage of the drink/food spread that's placed throughout the day.  Overall, a beautiful property, and definitely recommended.
Manager Response: We couldn't agree with you more that our views are to die for. You simply can't beat our exclusive Club Level experience.  We are delighted you were able to visit us on Club.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary: A bit (a lot) pricey, but also super classy without being ostentatious!!    Stayed two nights for our anniversary in May and will definitely make it an annual event!!  Wonderful room, great (and accommodating staff), and that amazing view!!!     We've stayed at some pretty nice hotels, but the Ritz Carlton in Laguna takes the cake!!  Arguably, the best hotel we have ever stayed at!!    If you can afford it, even for one night, stay there!  It's that nice!!
Manager Response: Happy Anniversary!  We look forward to creating another memorable, unique, and personal experience for you again next May.

Summary: My family and I keep coming back, but I never take time to write a review.  We love this beautiful property, well managed, has wonderful staff and simply everything works.  This hotel has an amazing view, and it's set right above a beautiful beach.  The staff is very helpful in setting you up at the beach if that's how you would like to spend the day.  Besides the cafe in the lobby (great) we only dined in the main restaurant.  The food was only nice, not dramatic, and it has only a casual feel at night. My favorite space is the deck restaurant. Great view, great energy and great food and drinks.   Ritz Carlton staff, thank you so much for making our weekends special!  You are amazing!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your loyalty.  It is our desire to continue to provide you with unique, memorable, and personal experiences each and every time you visit us.  We couldn't agree with you more that Salt Creek Beach is phenomenal.  See you soon!

Summary: After staying at the Ritz in Chicago my standards were very high- and this location did not dissapoint. We arrived early and the check in process was very quick, unfortunately there was not a room available so we decided to have lunch at the hotel while we waited. We ate on the outdoor deck, the view was breathtaking! The food and service at the restuarant were wonderful as well. When we got our room I was a bit dissapointed as there was no crib and the baby proofing was not done as I had asked- however this was remedied within 10min. We spent a lot of time at the pool, there was not shortage of fresh towels and cucumber water. When we wandered to the beach there was a golf cart to take us (we had a toddler with us so walking would have been cumbersome) and there is a beach
Manager Response: We loved your photo thank you!  We always want to ensure our littlest Ritz-Carlton guests are happy too.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon and we promise to have your room set just as you requested.  Thank you for choosing The RItz-Carlton, Laguna NIguel.

Summary: The amazing views! The Ritz was beautiful but the views were amazing! Last time we were here we stayed at the St. Regis. Another beautiful resort. The Ritz seemed alot busier. We did go on 4th of July weekend, so what can you expect. The rooms did seem a bit older but we were fine. The beach was quite a walk, and with 2 little ones it was a bit of a challenge. At the beach they let you borrow beach chairs and towels - again - a good walk to the beach. The beach was very crowded.  The water was a little too cold for us. We did use the pool and kids had fun. Not too crowded. The food was great. Breakfast had a good variety. Lots of waiting time as again it was July 4th weekend. We took a day trip to Disneyland and our little ones loved it. We love California and will be back!
Manager Response: The 4th of July holiday is a fantastic time to be a guest at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna NIguel!  Thank you for staying with us last year and we hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Exceeded my expectations on every level
Summary: From check-in to check-out and from valet parking to the cleaning crew and everyone in between, I felt so privileged to be here!!! I flew my grandmother and myself out to Cali as a surprise bday trip for her. During booking I was asked if I had been to the property before and/or if we were celebrating any occasion. This was both of our first trips to Cali and we celebrated a bday and a job promotion. Upon arrival, valet service was attentive, professional, friendly, and efficient. You could tell the employees were loving their jobs which speaks volumes about the company.   My grandmother and I were promptly escorted to the main desk to check in and were questioned about our flight and wished us a happy weekend for celebration. Once we arrived in our room (standard with two
Manager Response: Your photos are stunning....we really enjoyed seeing them.  Thank you for your trust in our property.  We are delighted you had a memorable experience while here and we look forward to many more in the future.

Summary: Stunning property! The views from the hotel are breathtaking and the hotel itself is gorgeous.  Rooms are beautiful and spacious, as well as the lobby, restaurants, pools, and all public areas.  The service can't be faulted.  We had breakfast at the hotel and it was delicious.  This is how every Ritz should be!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  We enjoyed seeing your photos.  Will you be returning soon?

Summary: One of the best Ritz Carltons there is...have been visiting for a number of years now.. ocean view rooms are fantastic, the service impeccable and attention to detail amazing. Once you go down the bluff to the beach below the view is great and the water just amazing. Beware the big waves though as you may scrap your skin once pushed on the seabed by the shore.... Great activities for the children, and amazing areas to lounge and relax. Best in Orange county...
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us.  Thank you for your continued business and loyalty!  We look forward to creating many more unique, personal and memorable experiences for you soon.

Summary: What more can I say about this place that hasn't already been said? From the moment you pull up to the beautifully landscaped front entrance, you're greeted by a kind and professional staff ready to tend to your every need. The rooms are very clean and well-decorated and the views are simply breathtaking. The pool area is great for the kids and the outdoor bar/grill has great food and service. All in all I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a beautiful, care-free, and relaxing vacation.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words. We are delighted you enjoyed your Ritz-Carlton experience and we look forward to creating more memories for you in the future.

Summary: This place never disappoints. The scenery is unparalleled in Southern California. Period. The service is good, but not as great as it used to be before they changed some of the management. Still, you will not go 5 feet without someone saying hello to you. Good concierge service for alternative dining/OC activities, private beach to take the family, laid back atmosphere, and breathtaking views will keep you coming back as I have. The only caveat I have: GET A ROOM FACING THE BEACH. Whoever books your room will be able to tell you this information and these rooms are worth their weight in gold. You're already spending quite a bit just to sleep on the property, go the extra mile so that you wake up to the beautiful coast instead of a pool or parking lot.
Manager Response: Great advice! Staying in an ocean front room at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel is an amazing experience. Will you be joining us again soon?

Summary: For my birthday celebration, we stayed for 1 night in a Oceanfront room with a special package, The Pearls of Inspiration with a Club Level admission. Everything is what you can expect from the Ritz: comfy bed, nice quiet room with enough space, gorgeous balcony view and bathroom is very comfortable indeed. The service is impeccable, just the most wonderful stay. Let's not forget the very helpful front desk staff and the manager, Samantha P.  The grounds are beautiful, clean, fresh flowers all around, friendly staff.  We arrived early in the morning, and even though our room was not ready yet, we were able to change and visit the beach located right in front of the resort. In the evening, after we had our dinner, we noticed a package delivered to our room, and to our huge
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed our exclusive Club Level experience!  Congratulations on winning the beautiful Mikimoto pearls. Aren't they wonderful? Happy Birthday to you....hope to welcome you back very soon.

Summary: I have stayed here numerous times on business and it is exceptional!!! I would recommend this property anytime. There are numerous restaurants a short drive away and plenty of beautiful sights along the adjacent beach.
Manager Response: We are delighted you have enjoyed our resort for both business and pleasure.  We enjoy creating memorable experiences for you.  Thanky you for noticing our "green" efforts.  Of course, protecting our environment is a top priority.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon,

Summary: I had initially booked at the St. Regis but my husband insisted on changing to the Ritz.  I wish I hadn't.  We requested a room with 2 queen beds & walked into a room with 2 full beds. Then we settled on a king room. The view was a wall. Finally, the man who brought our luggage to the room called the front desk& got us a king room with a pool view.  The gym was very small.  The kids videos were out dated and the selection was poor. The pool area rarely had towels and was not kept clean (cups & used towels cluttered the area).  With several events at the hotel,  parking was sometimes a hassle. The room was smaller than expected. It wasn't what I had expected at all. The turn down service & taffy were the positive aspects. I would not stay again.  I've had great experiences with
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your very valuable feedback.  It helps us in our continuing efforts to provide service excellence.  We intended for your stay with us to be a memorable one and we hoped for your return. On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we apologize for any disappointment you experienced.  If we can assist you further, please do not hesitate to contact our Executive Office at (949) 240-2000.  Thank you.

Summary: My feelings toward the Ritz are heavily biased, because it was the site of two of the most amazing days of my life - including a spectacular nine hour lunch overlooking the Pacific.  The Raya restaurant features a floor to ceiling view of the ocean that cannot be beat.  The staff is wonderfully friendly and accommodating (which is essential when you're still at the same lunch table at 6pm and they want to set for dinner...).   The rooms are beautiful, and those with an ocean view are truly special.  We had breakfast on our balcony overlooking the water, and it is an image that will stay with me forever.  There is a lovely walk down to the water that lets you stroll through the sand on an uncrowded beach.   I could go on and on.  Perfection.
Manager Response: It sounds like you had a magical experience at our resort!  We look forward to welcoming you back for many more long lunches and memorable experiences.

Summary Heading: Words cannot convey beauty of this place
Summary: This hotel was a highlight of a visit to the west coast. Absolutely wonderful views. Set dramatically on cliff and the beach is superb. This is not a place where I would ever stay without the help of my daughter. But a million thanks Beth for a once in a lifetime experience.
Manager Response: We enjoyed having you!  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: First of all, this is not a place I'd pick for myself (or myself and my husband).  I was here with a group and they like to stay at primo spots.  And since all my expenses were being reimbursed, I'm not going to complain.  We got a reduced price on rooms for our group and I wasn't expecting a great view, so I was pleasantly surprised to find that I could see the ocean if I looked to the left on my balcony - couldn't see the beach, but I could see the water, so points there.  Points also for the most comfortable bed and the best pillows I've ever had in a hotel.  Nice big TV too on the wall.  But somehow the overall decor is too ornate (especially the marble look in the bathrooms - yikes).  I also liked that you could get your own ice - I've been to resorts where you have to call
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback.  We are delighted you enjoyed your overall experience with us and hope to be of service to you again in the future whether it be for business or pleasure.

Summary: It was a totally beautiful stay.  The hotel is set dramatically over a cliff, and the view is simply spectacular, either from your room or looking up from the beach.  There's a nice walk down to the beach and around.  All the staff are pleasant, attentive and courteous.   The room is very comfortable.  I really like the his-and-her sinks in the bathroom, though the marbles with all the mirrors create too busy a pattern on the eyes.  And the water closet is a bit tight in space. But I am just nick-picking here.  This is truly a top notch hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback.  We look forward to creating more memorable experiences for you in the future.

Summary Heading: disappointed with house keeping and maintenance
Summary: Room 4517 shower had not been cleaned. Several long hairs were stuck to side of the marble shower which I didn't notice until it was too late. The concierge was apologetic and credited our party with a $200 resort credit. Additionally, used gum is stuck behind elevator handles and under tables.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for letting us know about our housekeeping service inconsistencies.  Your feedback is extremely valuable and has been acted upon.  We hope you enjoyed your overall experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  Please contact our Executive Office at (949) 240-2000 if we can assist you further.  Thank you again for bringing this to our attention.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future for a much more memorable stay.

Summary: This is the best hotel I've ever stayed in down to the service, attention to detail and staff. The views are absolutely breathtaking. We stayed in the presidential suite ocean view and it was stunning. One of the best hotel memories was shared here - a luxurious breakfast delivered via room service right to our own patio overlooking the ocean. We ate breakfast in our plush bathrobes and sipped coffee over the ocean. You can see the surfers early in the morning. The gym is a must see, it's a view overlooking the ocean. We had some drinks at the bar at night, they were delicious. The restaurant is also great, you must try the chocolate croissant. It's worth it.
Manager Response: The most exclusive room in the house!  We are delighted you enjoyed your experience with us and we look forward to creating many more memories for you in the future.

Summary: "All you could ask a hotel. Nice views, close to the see, kind staff, tasty and rich meals, amazon rooms full of every confort. Price is steep, aligned to the offer but this hotel with his sightseen it's a must for the place. I strongly raccomend it, perfect choice.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel as your luxury destination.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel with beautiful beach views
Summary: I attended a conference here and was very impressed with the hotel.  The view from the lobby-level restaurant and bar is incredibly beautiful.  The pool is attractive with a nice adjoining bar and there are great walking trails nearby, in addition to the beach of course.  The plants and flowers around the hotel are very nice, but the trails are a bit hilly.  If you are in poor health you might have a hard time with the trails.  If you are travelling with a group and trying to figure out transportation you should know that there is a free shuttle to and from Laguna Beach and the stop is in front of the hotel.  Laguna Beach is about six miles away.  I find the water to be much clearer from about Redondo Beach south so keep that in mind if you are trying to choose your location.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  It was a pleasure having you and we look forward to be of service to you again in the future.

Summary: My wife and I enjoyed a fantastic business/pleasure get-a-way during the first weekend in May. We opted for an ocean view room on the club level. The room, though nice, couldn't compete with the coastline views it provided. The service throughout the property was exceptional, like all the RC properties we have enjoyed. Best advice for club level guests: eat/drink there as much as possible, otherwise you will not get the most for your money. Definitely would recommend this property.
Manager Response: What a beautiful photo! Thank you for sharing it. We can't argue with the fact that our ocean front guest rooms on our exclusive Club Level are pure heaven. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: The service is as good as the location is magnificent!
Summary: We looked all over the region for the right ocean front resort experience for a week of R&R. This place surprised us at every turn. In every way, our expectations were exceeded. Our family had two fire pit rooms--perfect for the cool spring evenings. We won't stay anywhere else now but the Ritz in Laguna Niguel, and we hope to be back soon!
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed The Ritz-Carlton mystique. Our ladies and gentlemen pride themselves on creating unique, memorable, and personable experiences for our guests. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay at this hotel.  The hotel overlooks a gorgeous beach that is very accessible for walking or jogging.  The hotel restaurants and fitness center have some of the best views I have ever seen.  We went to the Steak House there and had absolutely fabulous service from Kayla.  The service, views and location cannot be beat!  We really enjoyed our stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for your visit and for recognizing Kayla. We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you and look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Outstanding stay - wish it were for more than 1 night
Summary: We were greeted and taken care of extremely well throughout.  Everyone was attentive and helpful.  Property is beautiful with many dining and drinking options.  A long walk down (and worse, up) to/from the beach was the only slight negative but that's the price for such great views in a beautiful area.  The pool wasn't as upscale as I would have hoped - seemed to me to be an average hotel pool.  Food was outstanding and the staff attended to every detail.  All around a great stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Stayed 2 nights in an Oceanfront fireplace room.   We had the family with us, 2 adults and 2 kids, ages 5 and 3.  Overall the location and views from the hotel were amazing.  The room had an outdoor fire pit and provided an amazing experience during sun set.  On Fri/Sat, expect to have a wedding outside your room.  The room itself was well furnished and pretty much what we expected.  The beds were nice and we didn’t hear any outside noise (even though both nights had multiple weddings going on).  The pool was great as it is surrounded by the hotel, so it’s not windy and it was heated.  Service at the pool was fantastic.  We also had breakfast at Raya and the food there was great and so was the service.  Any type of hotel like this will have pricey drinks, food etc.  We were
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback.  We enjoy hearing from our guests and are grateful for your comments.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel and we hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Quick breakdown:  Location: phenomenal, stunning view of Pacific from Lobby and many rooms, sits atop bluff. Short walk to beach. Beach is not private but not overly crowded. Lots of surfers, but the water is too cold for swimming anyway. Very pleasant for walking. About $20 cab ride to the town of Laguna, about 10 minutes.   Minor negative: comparably, the Montage Laguna offers a free car service within 3 miles, which includes the town of Laguna Beach. Here you are taking a cab and round trip with a tip you are at $50 round trip each time.   Lobby and resort space: very nice, not overly opulent but very very nice. Two good restaurants, bar, small gift shop, place was hopping with events but it didn't seem to detract from the experience.   Gym: best part about the gym is you get
Manager Response: Thank you for your extremely valuable feedback.  We listen to all of our guests' comments and take them constructively.  We are delighted you enjoyed your overall experience and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: I have stayed at this property probably 6-7 times over the 20 year period it has been open, and it is always great, but the last time was especially great. Total renovation, contemporary furniture throughout, instead of the Ritz Carlton old English look. I was upgraded to the club floor for a very small price, the food and drinks the first day paid for the upgrade. Beautiful views, weather , exemplary service. Immaculate rooms with new furniture. Complimentary internet at least on the club level. Asprey of London bathroom amenities. One of my favorite hotels in the US, defititelt California. Only better Ritz is San Francisco, but a different animal
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for your loyalty.  We are so glad you enjoyed the ambience of the resort.  We couldn't agree with you more that being a part of our exclusive Club Level experience is such a treat.  We hope you have the opportunity to return soon.

Summary Heading: Beautiful location, room, and view! Our dog loved the beach access!
Summary: We stayed in a ocean view room, and it was a glorious full ocean view. The furnishings are impeccable, service is fabulous, and the hotel is simply beautiful. You must go to the rooftop restaurant (well behaved dogs are allowed) during sunset, and enjoy a drink and take in the warmth of the fire pit and amazing views of the ocean.   We don't know how accommodating the hotel would have been with us taking our dog to the pool area (officially it's a no-no). We were able to spend alil time with our dog on the beach, and though umbrella service is offered, we didn't take advantage of it. There is a large park nearby that one can walk leased dogs around, and obviously the hotel grounds are pet friendly.   You must have a car, restaurants and shops are a few miles away.  We will
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you and your dog stay with us!  We hope he enjoyed his stay as well.  Was he able to take advantage of our Posh Pooch program?  Please check our website for information about all our pet friendly events.  We hope to see you all again soon.

Summary Heading: Perfect Setting in a Great Location
Summary: We stayed at the Ritz Laguna Niguel in early May and were lucky enough to experience 3 days of great California weather including two in the 80s which to me only enhances the beach experience offered with this property. I began a love affair with California 2 years ago and this is our third trip back continuing south down the coast and the Laguna area is definitely a favorite. It was a splurge for us though my husband would have happily spent our 4 nights at the Ritz.. The staff, from the valets to the welcome staff to the front desk are friendly and absolutely not in the least bit pretentious.   I have read reviews on TA stating the rooms looked "worn"...this is absolutely UNTRUE. Our bellman explained all rooms had recently  been updated and the decor and color scheme of
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel!  We enjoyed seeing your photos as well.  On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we hope we created a unique, memorable and personal experience for you.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: The location here is unbelievable.  We stayed there this weekend and had a great Ocean View Balcony room.  It was on a bluff overlooking the ocean and the view was fantastic. The other aspect of our stay that stood out was the service.  It was extraordinary.  The nicest most courteous  group of people you would ever hope to find on a property.  My wife actually dropped an earring down the sink and they sent someone right over to get it out of the trap. As for the room itself, it was nothing spectacular.  It was rather small and the bathroom was a little tight.  Also, it was a "shower/Tub" combo which I would expect more at a Courtyard and less at the Ritz.  But remember, you are not going to this resort for the room!  Only complaint I have is that on Saturday we were having
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your photo....what a great shot!  We are delighted you enjoyed your experience over all and we look forward to creating many more memories for you in the future.

Summary Heading: One of the Best Experiences you will ever have
Summary: Have stayed at this Hotel a number of times and have always been impressed with the amazing service from the whole staff at every level.  It is truly one of the most scenic locations you will ever find. The restaurant Raya has a very consistent food quality, while showing off the amazing view. The variety of menu items covers a wide taste range for most diners. The rooms are spacious and have always met the tough cleanliness test.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful comments.  We are delighted you enjoyed our property, service and facilities.  We enjoyed having you!

Summary Heading: Dream Hotel for Business and Romance
Summary: I've stayed at the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel many times for business but also was able to add in vacation time and all I can say whether you are go there for business, romance or vacation it's incredible.  For the Wealthy - Incredible, for the Romantic Getaway - Stellar but a little pricey - For the Budget conscious - Look for deals they offer and you can't lose!  The grounds and location are just Wonderful and each time I've been there I stayed for a week with great courteous, nice efficient helpful service by the staff each time.  Beautiful décor of hotel both inside and out with lush landscape, pool and Jacuzzi.  It's top of the line all the way and the staff makes you feel important no matter your station in life.  Finally the food and Spa are AWESOME!!! with great room
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna NIguel!  We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you and promise to create more unique, different and personal experiences for you again in the future. Whether you choose to stay with us for business, pleasure or both, we look foward to welcoming you back.

Summary: This is a beautiful hotel in a fabulous location - at the top of a bluff overlooking a fantastic beach and the ocean. We used Marriott points for our stay, and then paid to upgrade to an ocean front room. We had a little balcony, and the view was absolutely spectacular! The beach below is wonderful for taking a nice long walk, and although we chose to walk to and from the beach as well, the hotel has a shuttle to take you down and more importantly back up the steep path if you so desire.  The location is really the best feature of this hotel, and the reason that I'm rating it as high as I am. Our room was nice enough, but very small and poorly laid out. The bed took up most of the room, and I had to move the arm chair to a location where I could watch the TV.   The service was a
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We enjoyed having you as our guests and intended for your visit to be flawless and full of memorable experiences.  We would enjoy the opportunity to speak with you further about your stay with us.  It is our highest mission to ensure you have the most favorable impression of our resort.  Please contact the Executive Office at your convenience at (949) 240-2000.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Great Location, Wondeful Staff made my visit an enjoyable experience
Summary: Stayed at the Ritz for a conference.  When I arrived Sunday night I was informed I had been upgraded to the Concierge Level which is on the 4th floor.  Check in was swift and easy.  As soon as you get off the elevator for the Concierge Level you have at least one person, if not more welcoming you.  The entire staff on the Concierge Level were wonderful.  All day they have light food set out for you and at night they have a Happy Hour for you which includes light snacks, liquor, wine and beer.  Water and soft drinks are available 24 hours a day.  Also you have free Wi-Fi on this level as well.  The room itself looks a little old, but the furnishings have been updated.  The only thing I was slightly disappointed with was the bathroom.  I had expected a large shower with a rain
Manager Response: Your photo is gorgeous, thank you for sharing it.  We are delighted you enjoyed our magnificent property and excellent service.  Our exclusive Club Level is a special treat and we hope you choose to stay with us again soon.

Summary: This is one of my favorite Ritz properties mostly because of the location. The public areas of the hotel were nicely decorated and well maintained.
