The highlight, though, was the ocean view from the back of the hotel. The outdoor areas were also well maintained and beautiful. The landscaping and attention to detail were very impressive.   After this wonderful first impression, the actual room was anticlimactic but it was as good as almost any room in a five star hotel. The bed was particularly comfortable. Bathroom products were very nice. Housekeeping was very good.   Hotel food was excellent but of course pricey. I appreciated that there was at least the more informal 24 hour cafe in the lobby. I did not use the spa but the fitness center had a very good selection of cardio
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  We greatly appreciate your loyalty.  We look forward to creating more lifelong memories for you soon.

Summary: This is truly a 5 star property. We stayed for 2 nights for a meeting and had a first floor room with an ocean view off the patio. The grounds are spectacular and immaculate.  The property is on a bluff with spectacular views that are to die for. There is a shuttle down to the beach below with lots of walking paths. They also provide chairs, towels and umbrellas for the beach. The beach itself is long and wide, has lifeguards,  and whales can be seen close to the shore. We were lucky to have spectacular weather and see fabulous sunsets.  The meeting rooms are varied each with views and great décor. The lobby area has numerous places to sit and relax, a busy bar scene, both indoors and outside. The pool area is large and well maintained, there are fire pits as well. Our room had
Manager Response: Your photos are great!  Thank you for your glowing review of our property and ladies and gentlemen.  We hope you have a chance to return soon.

Summary Heading: A glimpse to me of what Heaven must be like...
Summary: I organized a meeting with about 100 broadcasting executives from around the world back in September 2011 and this review comes a little bit late but this is one of those properties that deserves a huge shout out for their exceptional service, spectacular views, amazing food and..and...and. I knew I was in good hands when planning for this huge meeting from the get go as calls were returned within the second, there was a collaborative effort and my ideas although quirky were somehow incorporated into our meeting and everything was done with a smile. I did bring goody bags for the meeting coordinators I worked with which is unusual since I was the client...but that is how good I enjoyed working with the wonderful staff at this property and I would highly recommend this property
Manager Response: We enjoyed working with you as well!  Thank you for your business and please reach out if we may be of any assistance.  We look forward to your next visit whether it be for business or pleasure.

Summary: When you arrive at The Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel, you know you have arrived at a pretty special hotel!  The sweeping drive and reception entrance are beautiful and perfectly manicured.  The greeting from staff was warm and inviting, especially after a long flight from London.  We were registered quickly and there was no pushy service trying to take bags for us when we were happy to deal with them ourselves.  It was around 11pm when we arrived and unfortunately the only food option is room service when we were ravenous and wanted to sit down for a meal.  Never the less, the meal ordered from room service arrived in good time and was warm and tasty.  The public areas of the hotel is really beautiful and I did feel that the room we were allocated didn't quite match the quality of
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We enjoyed creating memories for you and hope to have the opportunity to do so again soon. We greatly appreciate your very detailed feedback.  Thank you for sharing it on Trip Advisor.  Please feel free to contact the Executive Office should you wish to seek assistance in the future.

Summary: For the most part, we had a wonderful experience for my wife's birthday celebration from check in to check out. Just a few issues though. We ate at Raya in the hotel. The food was OK but the service was overzealous. We did not have 2 minutes of peace without someone coming over to ask us if we were enjoying ourselves. There is a fine line to good service. On another note, we enjoyed our couples massage and were well taken care of. Prices, however, were quite steep in comparison to other fine hotels we've visited. My biggest gripe though has to be about getting charged $35 for valet parking when paying very high room rates. Come on people, this is really pushing the envelope. We had breakfast in our room and the food  and portion size were great. The staff went out of there way
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback.  We have shared it with our leaders and are always continuing our quest for service excellence.  We couldn't agree with you more that The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel is a wonderful choice to celebrate a special occasion.  We hope to celebrate more with you in the future.

Summary: 5 stars all the way.  Beautiful hotel, breathtaking views, wonderful customer service on club level.  I believe it was just totally renovated.  The decor is absolutely beautiful.  we were given a suite and the bathrooms are huge, all white marble, surprised they had a typical tub with shower curtain but it really didn't matter, everything else was wonderful.  Room service food was excellent as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We hope you took home some life long memories and you will return soon.  We loved seeing your photos!

Summary: This is a hotel that is worth the price! We stayed in  a small room because all the fire pit rooms were small. It was so worth it!!! Firepit was unbelievable! My kids were awed! The staff, service, grounds. What can you say, first class!  Make sure you splurge on ocean view only. Well worth the extra cost! My favorite meal was room service breakfast on our terrace with the fire going against the Pacific Ocean as our backdrop. Forget the weird fees. Don't get mired in the petty small costs. This hotel is a must stay for bucket lists!
Manager Response: We enjoyed having you and your family experience our fireside ocean front guest room.  Isn't it wonderful?  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary Heading: A Lot To Consider In This Area
Summary: This was second stay at the property and first time back since 2008.  The lobby, common areas, and setting are second to none.  It is an older property but is well maintained.  The guest rooms had soft renovations last year and are very nice and clean.  Since it is an older property there are no walk in showers in the bathrooms and  tub shower combo has a shower curtain.  The bathroom does have a double vanity.  This is not exactly what you would expect from a resort of this caliber.  The rooms types vary widely.  I would highly recommend an ocean front room.  Beware, the coastline view rooms on the fourth floor are very shaded due to the overhang from the roof and make the rooms very dark.  We originally booked a coastline suite but moved to standard oceanfront room since it
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for staying with us and providing your detailed feedback.  We greatly appreciate your time in sharing your experience.  We couldn't agree with you more tha our exclusive Club Level provides a level of elegance and service excellence that is rare to find.  We are delighted you enjoyed your experience overall.  We value you and are looking forward to creating more unique and personal memories for you again in the near future.

Summary: When you enter the Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel, you see one of the most beautiful lobbys that you will ever see in your life.  Smell, look and feel is very professional.  The service is great and the staff are somewhat pleasant.  I ran into a few staff members who were not that nice.  The balcony had a beatiful unforgettable view of the ocean and I loved the beach.  The toughest part of staying here was the dated rooms.  The rooms were old and had a mildew smell that seem to get stronger as the days got hotter.  I don't know if it was coming from the rug or the furniture but everything in there needed a steam clean.  The bathroom was old as well and had a few cobwebs in them.  As soon as I walked in bathroom I was meant by a unknown bug crawling back and forth looking for food
Manager Response: Thank you for your very detailed feedback. We greatly appreciate it. On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we are saddened to learn you did not have the best experience possible while being a guest at our resort. If you would like to discuss your feedback further, we would be delighted to speak with you.

Summary Heading: Pretty property, but didn't live up to its name.
Summary: My husband and I stayed at the Ritz for 3 nights.  The rooms are simple, understated and clean.  Many have beautiful views overlooking the beach.    Unfortunately, in some specific cases, the service we received was very mediocre.  Our room service breakfast was 15 minutes late (after the 30 minute window) and then they forgot the coffee.  We had an early appointment so it was quite inconvenient to have to wait.    On the third day of our stay, we arrived back at our room after being out all day to quickly get ready for an event and our room was locked.  Even staff wasn't able to get in. We had to return to the front desk twice before they realized that they had 'locked us out' because they didn't have a credit card associated with the room, even though we had given them one
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for staying with us. We truly intended for your stay to be magical in every way. We apologize for the inconveniences you have mentioned and we look forward to providing you with an exceptional experience the next time you choose to stay with us. If we may be of assistance, please contact our executive offices.

Summary: This hotel is so wonderful - what's not to love? The view - amazing. The beach - perfect. The service - fantastic. If you stay on the club level - so relaxing and fun. Tennis courts and gym are great, too, if you have the time to play/use. I've stayed here many times and love it every time. Excellent resort!!  Personal opinion tip - The restaurant has a beautiful view, but the food is expensive and just okay. I prefer to grab breakfast or lunch at the more reasonably priced cafe and then head to the beach for a walk, etc.
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed your visit with us again. We hope each of your experiences is a unique, personal and memorable one. Thank you for your loyalty. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Exceptional Customer Service in a Gorgeous Setting
Summary: I will start with the service because it stood out. Every staff we encountered established eye contact, initiated and engaged us in conversation without being intrusive, offered help and ensured we had what we needed, even anticipated our needs. We were able to check in before 8AM and check out at 3PM.  The hotel itself has luxurious finishes in the public areas and rooms (please see photos). The room (we had a coastal view) was on the smaller side, but was simply yet well appointed. The bathroom had marble floors, walls, and vanity, crystal lights. The word opulent comes to mind. The gym has floor to ceiling windows facing the ocean. The grounds and setting are breathtaking! With the bluff, the Pacific Ocean... (See photos.) There is a path to the beach but you can use the
Manager Response: We enjoyed your photos. Thank you for sharing them. It was a pleasure having you with us and we look forward to creating more memorable experiences for you soon.

Summary: This hotel is over the top gorgeous! It even smells good when you walk in the door! The flowers, the lighting, the decor, it was all done so right.  We had a room that opened out to a porch area with a fireplace and chairs overlooking the ocean. It was so beautiful!  The only negative thing I have to say is the bathroom was extremely small. We only stayed one night so it wasn't a big issue for us. The bed was comfortable, the view was stunning! I didn't have time to go by the spa or the fitness center but I walked past it and it was breathtaking.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for your feedback. We hope you have the opportunity to experience the rest of the resort on your next visit.

Summary: We have been to many Ritz's and the staff here is just plain amazing.  Every person we encountered went above and beyond.  The hotel itself is beautiful.  Great pool! Walks on the beach were a great plus.  All the restaurants have great views.  We went to the steakhouse for dinner which was superb.  Breakfast at Raya was delicious as well.  High quality food.  Very relaxing place to be. We will definitely be back!!!
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you with us! We hope your experience was unforgettable and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: My husband and our 3 daughters and I went to the Ritz for a mellow weekend away (we live in San Diego). It was fabulous. The staff could not have been better and they truly made a point of making us feel special and sincerely welcome to the hotel. We appreciated the service of Diego at the Dana pool, Liece (sp?) and Alex at Raya, and the entire team at 180 Blu (especially Matt). We spent our first night enjoying the fabulous view overlooking the ocean while enjoying great food and drinks at 180 Blu. They have an incredibly talented singer, Ryan, who plays the guitar and sings there almost every night and he truly makes the hotel evening experience an unforgettable one.   We ended up not leaving the resort once all weekend- there was no need to as we felt so happy and content to
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you with us for your staycation!  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  Our ladies and gentlemen look forward to welcoming you back soon.  We have many more experiences awaiting your return.

Summary: We just moved from NY to LA and we were searching for a regular weekend getaway place that meets our high standards in travel...luxury, tranquility, great service, great restaurants and bars...so all you have to do is walk-in and pamper yourselves. We usually stay at high end places so there was little to pick from! We were pleasantly surprised that the hotel was everything we hoped for. Starting with the very friendly staff to the beautiful setting. The rooms were clean and bright and we had a beautiful balcony overlooking the ocean. We had drinks at the outdoor terrace bar served by Garrett who was a hoot! The cocktails were very creative - try the OC Martini. We also had drinks at the lobby bar and the service was attentive and the view picture perfect. The best part of our
Manager Response: It sounds as if you enjoyed your overall experience at the resort.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We look forward to creating many more wonderful memories for you in the future.  Welcome home!

Summary: Perched on a bluff above one of Orange County's nicest beaches is the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel. My Southwest flight took me in to John Wayne Airport, where I received the surprise upgrade to a convertible Camaro. Forget the freeway! I dropped the top on the Camaro and trekked through Newport Beach to the PCH. The drive was longer, but the scenery was worth it. Arriving in the motor court at the Ritz, I was certain that I had hit rush hour. No matter, the valets got the car and bags squared away and my carefree holiday had begun.  I had booked through Amex Fine Hotels. There were no upgrades available, no surprise on the holiday weekend, but my pool view room on the lobby level left me nothing to complain about. The setting in relaxing and I was just fine to sit on the balcony
Manager Response: Thank you for your glowing review of our resort and ladies and gentlemen.  It was a pleasure having you with us.  We are delighted you enjoyed many of the wonderful services and facilities our resort has to offer.  We hope to welcome you back very soon....we have many more memorable experiences awaiting you.

Summary: Me and my wife were here for 3 nights for our honeymoon. We booked a garden view room. On arrival we we're pleased to know that we were upgraded to ocean view room. Laura Haupper from guest services was excellent with all the info we needed to make our stay special and also with things to do around Dana point. We were surprised with tray of chocolate covered strawberries waiting for us in the room. We had great service at the Raya restaurant. Except for one waitress who treated us as if we wandered off a third world country into Ritz, Raya has excellent staff. Plus they have some exquisite food and wine combinations. I can't talk enough about the excellent view from the restaurant and from our room. Beach is easily accessible and less crowded, making it very cozy. They have
Manager Response: Congratulations!  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel to celebrate your marriage.  We enjoyed creating an experience for you that will last a life time.  Laura is an exceptional employee and we will share your kind words with her. On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: The hotel is luxurious and we have stayed there in the past and utilized the restaurants and bars, all of which were wonderful experiences. We had lived in the area and enjoyed the hotel from the day it opened. We have moved out of state now, but go back every year when we visit former neighbors who are still locals. We couldn't wait to go and enjoy the setting and have a drink and watch the sunset.   The hotel sits on a hill above the beach and the ocean views are incredible. It was a perfect 75 degree winter day and the view from the outdoor bar was breathtaking. The service was outstanding, as usual. All the staff are friendly and nice. The drinks were good but very expensive, as expected in such a facility, in such a setting. The complimentary homemade potato chips were very
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It was a pleasure having you stay with us.  We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience overall and we thank you for your feedback regarding cigar smoking at our outdoor lounge 180blu.  Your concerns have been heard and taken seriously and constructively.

Summary Heading: The Ritz writes the book on service!
Summary: From the moment you arrive through the departure time, the service is second to none.  This property is amazing.  The location is just incredible and the service is more than I ever expected.  Every single person on staff treated us like royalty.  One needs to realize the prices at the Ritz can not be questioned, because the level of service and commitment from the staff is exemplary.  I've stayed at four different Ritz locations many years ago and do not remember the service being at the level of Laguna Niguel's. We ate at 180 Blu and RAYA on a few different occasions over the 4 day stay and the meals were awesome.   My son was able to surf a few days while we were there.  It's a quick walk to the beach or you can take a shuttle down to Salt Creek. The gym has an amazing view
Manager Response: We can't thank you enough for your glowing review of our property and ladies and gentlemen.  Mother Nature certainly makes it easy for them to love what they do.  We enjoyed creating this amazing experience for you and we look forward to creating many more for you in the future.  Welcome home!

Summary: My partner was exhibiting at a conference taking place in the hotel, I just had to gate crash and relax whilst he was working!!! Fantastic location, staff were so attentive, rooms were lovely.  The highlight for me was seeing the dolphins swimming in the bay whilst I was on treadmill in the gym, it had a fantastic 180 degree aspect of the bay, what a way to workout! I will be saving up and visiting again.
Manager Response: We are so glad you got to tag along!  Aren't the dolphins wonderful?  We hope to welcome you back soon....hopefully for R&R this time.  Thank you for your visit.

Summary: Great hotel in a great location. Just 10 minute drive from downtown Laguna Beach area. Hotel has it sounds private beach and nice pool. Staff was wonderful. We actually won a trip here through the Berghoff Chicago Octoberfest raffle to benefit the Mercy Boys Home. Gonna bust open my piggy bank in 3 years and go back!
Manager Response: Please don't wait three years!  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us.  We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you.  Welcome home!

Summary: Some of this hotel is very tired and need of some TLC, especially with the prices it charges.  I had previously stayed here approx. 15 years ago, and it has been updated to a more modern theme since then, but common areas are in need of attention (ladies rooms had doors/jambs that were completely beat up and just painted over, main bar, small pool area and breezeways very tired) and it did not have the “wow factor” I had experienced on my first visit.  The location is of course amazing, but I think overall it is overpriced - especially the dining experiences (in-room and at the onsite restaurants).  The service, however, is over the top.  From the moment you arrive, everyone (from management to housekeeping) seems truly intent on making your stay a pleasant one.  That is worth a
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We enjoyed having you as our valued guest. Our ladies and gentlemen take great pride in the exemplary service they provide and they will enjoy reading your compliments.  Your feedback has been taken seriously and we hope to welcome you back very soon.

Summary: This is hotel/resort is amazing.  From the moment you check in to the minute you leave, the staff treats every guest with impeccable service.  We asked the concierge Tucker about places to eat and we asked if there were any good sushi restaurants close by.  Tucker recommended Gen Kai - about a 5 minute drive away.  Tucker made the reservation for us and then asked us where we were from.  Found out we had both spent a lot of time living in Boston.  By the time we got back to our room, Tucker had sent us beautiful flowers and a card.  Over and above service.  The food is excellent and the view is amazing.  Cant wait to go back.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your memorable exprience on Trip Advisor.  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us.  Tucker is an asset to our team and we will be sure to share your post with him.  He will be thrilled.  We love your picture.  Thank you for sharing it.  When will you be returning?

Summary: Beautiful view is about all it has to commend it.  A shabby property, holes in the wall in the rest room where the clothes hook should have been.  Broken grids on outside where outdoor room heaters expel fumes etc.  As to the service uncleared tables were in the pool area 15 hours after the event ended.  The food at the event I attended was largely execrable.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for staying with us and providing your feedback related to your experience.  We greatly appreciate it and have shared it appropriately.  We apologize for failing to meet your expectations.  That is certainly now the experience we intended for you to have and we hope to have the chance to regain your confidence in the near future.  Kindly contact the Executive Office directly at (949) 240-2000 at your earliest convenience.  Thank you.

Summary Heading: Outstanding location, wonderful views, and great service
Summary: We've stayed here a few times and they never disappoint.  This last visit we wanted a 'coastal view' room.  We were originally put in a room on the south, but we weren't too happy with the room, so we called and they were able to switch us to a room on the north side which we loved.  The gym at the Ritz has the best views of any gym I've visited in the world.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  We are delighted you enjoyed your Ritz-Carlton experience. We have noted your preference for the north-facing coastline view rooms and we hope to welcome you back very soon.

Summary Heading: "And she said..." More than we wanted to know.
Summary: We stayed on the Club floor at this lovely oceanfront hotel property recently and our ocean view room had walls so thin you could hear all conversation from the guests next door.You have to keep tv on so you can drown out the noise.To add insult to injury,the room rates were above rack rate at above $1000 a night because of the conference we were attending. The service at this hotel has always been the very best and with a full house never seems to miss a beat. Too bad the smallish rooms and noise from the neighbors has not been addressed... These improvements would make this hotel a perfect destination on a perfect stretch of California beach.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We are delighted you enjoyed your overall experience on our exclusive Club Level.  The exemplary service and unique amenities are in a class of their own.  We thank you for your valuable feedback.  Please know that it has been heard and acted upon appropriately.  We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary Heading: Wish I could give it MORE than 5 stars! :-)
Summary: I can't say enough about how wonderful my stay was here last month!! My husband and I drove down to the hotel from Los Angeles on business, and it was like they rolled out the red carpet for us from the SECOND we drove in! I've never seen anything like this, and we've stayed at a few 5 star hotels at this point. Everyone, including the valets, the front desk, the bell staff, the restaurant hosts and servers, the business conference attendants, and housekeeping, were INCREDIBLY first rate! In addition, they VOLUNTARILY upgraded us to a gorgeous ocean view room overlooking the beautiful Salt Creek beach below, for no additional charge. The beds were heavenly, the sound of the surf at night was mesmerizing, the food was delicious (breakfast, lunch and dinner), the hot tub was
Manager Response: Thank you for your glowing and heartfelt review of our property and staff. We are delighted you took home a lifelong memory, and we look forward to creating many more unique and memorable experiences for you in the future.  What an incredible sunset you were a part of!  Thank you for sharing your photos.  Welcome home!

Summary: This hotel is off the chart beautiful!  It is regal and elegant with views to die for.......Unless, you happen to get a garden view room. I didn't reserve an ocean view, so I knew we weren't getting that.  But, at over $500.00 a night I figured the Garden View would be pretty spectacular.  I  called before we arrived to take care of some arrangements.  The view I reserved came up on the phone and I was told our view would be "lovely".  So, we get to the hotel, we enter our room, look out the glass doors and.....there was a 10 foot high YELLOW CONCRETE WALL, that was length of ten hotel rooms, not kidding! It honestly felt like we were in someone's basement.  We had to go outside on the patio (that was shared with the ten other rooms, NO PRIVACY) and look straight up, head cocked
Manager Response: Thank you for your very valuable feedback.  It has been heard, shared, and taken very seriously.  We cannot apologize enough for any hardship your stay with us caused you.  The next time you visit us, we will be sure to accommodate your request for a room on a higher floor.  We hope you enjoyed your overall experience with us and we look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary Heading: My favorite hotel in the country
Summary: I'm fortunate to have stayed in some great properties all over the country. Without a doubt this is my all time favorite hotel. The views are second to none. The service is stellar. The weather and location are both ideal. The prices on site can get a bit steep but in the case of the Ritz Laguna they are worth it. I highly recommend catching a sunset from 180 Blue while you're here.
Manager Response: Thank you for the glowing review of our property.  We enjoyed creating memories for you and look forward to many more to come in the near future.  We couldn't agree with you more that the sunsets from 180blu are absolutely breathtaking!

Summary: I am a young professional and was staying here for a conference Mar 1-4. I have never experienced a hotel like this. The service was outstanding. Whether it be valet, front desk, or in the restaurant, we were treated extremely well. My room was very clean and elegant with a wonderful view of the Pacific Ocean.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  We are delighted to know you enjoyed your experience and we hope to welcome you back for some R&R soon.

Summary: My husband and I spent 5 luxurious days that the Ritz! We have been looking forward to this trip for awhile. My husband had won a Presidents Club trip through work and we were beyond excited at this years location. We have stayed at the Ritz before in different cities but this takes the cake.   We had a "Garden" View room which was not really the case. We could see the Ocean and hear the Ocean from our glorious balcony! The rooms was nicely appointed with usual gorgeous marble bathroom, wonderful little coffee and fridge nook. Turn down service with the chocolates was also wonderful.   We loved just wandering around this gorgeous resort. There were great little fire places all over the place. Since it was cool when we went it was nice to hang in front of the fire. Very relaxing.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  We are delighted you were able to enjoy the sand between your toes and the warmth of the fireplaces. We are so fortunate to have such a fantastic location! We look forward to creating more memories for you again soon.

Summary: Outstanding location on the beach where you can enjoy the beauty of Dana Point.  This site is a favorite for local surfers who tend come every morning and afternoon to catch some waves.  The service is standard Ritz (very good).  The rooms are nice.  Probably the only downside is that the lounges seem to be understaffed to handle more than a small number of patrons.  Definitely a great place to stay.
Manager Response: We couldn't agree with you more that our location is incredible.  The Cities of Dana Point and Laguna Niguel are extraordinary places to visit; especially Salt Creek Beach.  We hope you took home some wonderful memories with you and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Thank you for staying with us!

Summary: We recently stayed at this property. Upon arriving, we were exhausted and just wanted to relax and hear the ocean from our room. We took showers, got in comfy clothes, opened the balcony doors and what did we hear? A yip yip dog barking! Ugh! It was a nightmare! Once I realized that yip yip was going to continue to yip yip and it wasn't a solo yip, I called the front desk and spoke to Casey, the front desk manager. The net net to this review is that Casey was exceptional and he turned a very tired, unhappy customer into a very HAPPY one. His reaction was fast and we were moved to a cozy room that satisfied our every desire. The property was exceptional - we dined at Raya - amazing food and lunched at Bar Raya overlooking the fabulous beach, again delicious. Can't say enough good
Manager Response: Thank you for your visit!  We are delighted to know that Kasey helped turn your negative experience into a most memorable one.  Our ladies and gentlemen strive to provide service excellence every day for each of our valuable guests.  We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary Heading: Best hotel I've ever stayed in!
Summary: The title really says it all. Our family planned a very special trip to California for my Dad's 60th birthday. From the moment we arrived, staff at the Ritz did everything in their power to make the experience unbelievably special for all of us, but especially my Dad. The staff were so friendly and welcoming and really provided the best service I have ever received. Every time you passed by a member of staff, they said hello and always had a really genuine smile - it seemed like they really enjoyed working there.  The rooms were beautiful, so clean and there was even a bottle of wine waiting for all of us on our arrival. The setting of the hotel is incredible - right above the beach with gorgeous views. My parents' room even had a fire pit out on their balcony which was a really
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for such a momentous occasion.  It was our pleasure creating memories for you and your family.  We hope to welcome you back again and again!

Summary Heading: A special place for a 25th anniversary
Summary: We spent several days at the Ritz Carlton to celebrate our 25th wedding anniversary and we loved it. A couples massage at the spa was wonderful. We were treated by everyone like royalty and even the restaurants were spectacular. We enjoy long walks on the beach.  All in all it was a typical Ritz Carlton experience.
Manager Response: Happy 25th Anniversary!  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for such a momentous occasion!  We are delighted you enjoyed your experience with us as much as we enjoyed creating it for you.  We hope to welcome you back very soon.

Summary: I am prefacing this review with the fact that I am comparing this hotel to the Ritz Carlton in Naples that I previously reviewed and said was the best hotel I have ever stayed in.  So knowing that hotel is the paradigm...We stayed on the Club Level and one thing that seemed odd is that the elevator drops you off...right in the Club lounge.  No foyer you are just bang! in the Club lounge.  And you have to pass through there any time you want to come and go.  The layout of the Club lounge seemed a bit odd-- kind of L shaped-- and it also seemed cramped.  The food selection seemed sparse compared to the Naples Club lounge. But the staff there was very friendly and helpful.  Speaking of staff, overall great service as usual at a Ritz.  We did have a bartender in the main lounge who
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide such a detailed review about your Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel experience.  We enjoyed your photos as well!  We are delighted that we were able to anticipate your needs overall.  Our ladies and gentlemen's highest mission is to provide an excellent level of personalized service.  It is our desire that you will return again and again so that we have the opportunity to create many more memories for you in the future.

Summary: I am not sure how you can make it any clearer. This is the place to go and just unwind for an afternoon by yourself, or with a loved one. The service is impeccable, the ambiance is luxury at its best, the scenery and views are straight from the Divine, and the little touches in elegance will make you smile as you walk around the hotel. Grab lunch, take a stroll down to the beach, hang out on the cliff overlooking the ocean and then come in for a cheese and wine tasting. I wish I could live in the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel as your home away from home even though you are located very close to us.  You can live here anytime!  Nothing makes us more delighted than to know our valuable guests have completely enjoyed their experience with us; whether it be an overnight stay or a day visit.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon for another memorable, relaxed and refined experience.

Summary: This is our 6th time there.  It is consistently going downhill.  Positives:  The view is spectacular from the restaurant and outdoor bar.  The sunsets are to die for.  Laguna Nigel is a great artsy village and is a California must see.  The Spanish themed restaurant is great.   Negatives:  Mildew/ mold in the show.  Food crumbs (large) outside someone else's suite that stayed there for 2 days.  Waits 8, 15, 14 minutes at the market to order a latte with 4 staff members buzzing around with no one else in line to wait on.  Steak house is a disappointment.  Food is average for a high end steak house.  Vibe is flat.  Service door needlessly left open (true for 4 other areas of the hotel- close the doors- we don't want to see stored junk in the middle of a supposedly luxurious
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed feedback.  We greatly appreciate it and have used it constructively with our team.  The service failures you have mentioned are certainly not indicative of the exceptional experiences our ladies and gentlemen strive to provide.  Again we thank you for making us aware.  If you would like to share any further details with our management team, please contact our Executive Office at (949) 240-2000.  Thank you very much.

Summary: From the moment we arrived we felt welcomed. The valet staff was so friendly and attentive.  We arrived early and our room was ready. Even received an upgrade for being a lifetime platinum Marriott member.   We had a partial ocean view with a nice size deck. Room was very quiet, only suggestion would be more lighting.   We spent time in the lobby bar, the market place, and 180blu. Staff was extremely knowledgable and courteous.   Also enjoyed walks on the trails outside the hotel.  Breathtaking views.   We did spend a day by the pool and wished the pool bar would have been opened.   Overall great 5 day get away. A very relaxing atmosphere and exactly what we were looking for. Would definitely recommend.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you!  Will you be returning soon? We are delighted you enjoyed the beauty of our magnificent surroundings, as well as the relaxed yet refined ambience of the resort.  Thank you for posting a review about your visit!

Summary: I just returned from 3 perfect nights at this fabulous resort.  The beauty of this resort is breathtaking.  My wife and I stayed in an ocean view Club level room.  The service was outstanding and the room was very nice with an amazing view of the Pacific.  We went for long walks along the ocean and golf course every day.  The fitness center overlooks the Pacific and the spa is top notch in every way.  The resort has absolutely everything you could possibly want for a perfect getaway. I can't imagine anyone complaining about this property.  It is just beautiful in every way.  It is definitely a 5 star resort that has incredible beauty everywhere you look! We are already looking forward to our return to the Ritz!!!
Manager Response: We are delighted to know you enjoyed a perfect getaway! All of our ladies and gentlemen strive to provide memorable experiences to each of our valuable guests.  We hope you choose to return soon so we may provide another personal, memorable and unique experience for you.  Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: The biggest disappointment about this hotel was our depressing room. I get that it's small but we paid $800-plus for an oceanfront room with patio and firepit and for that kind of money i really expected a beautiful, luxurious and comfortable room but in actuality the room is muted, drab and depressing, the bedding wasn't soft at all, the furnishings are average and it was just nowhere up to par with a typical Ritz/Four Seasons/other five star resort. In order to maintain a constant temperature the air cond kept going on/off all night which was very annoying. Another big negative is our room included breakfast so Sunday morning we arrived at the restaurant, saw that it was about 3/4 full but were told the wait would be 30-40 min due to reservations for their $65 per person fixed
Manager Response: Thank you for your extremely valuable feedback.  We have used it and shared it appropriately.  We greatly appreciate you taking the time to provide a detailed summary of your recent stay with us.  We would welcome the opportunity to discuss your stay further.  Please contact our Executive Office directly at 949-240-2000 so we may ensure you we work through your concerns together. They are ours as well.  We are grateful for your positive comments about our ladies and gentlemen and will recognize them accordingly.  Thank you for staying with us.

Summary Heading: Switching ocean view room with coast view..
Summary: Paid extra in hotels.com for ocean view room ended up with coast view room.. Room was dirty.. Someone food was left over in the room..noisy Ac unit.. Beds not comfortable at all.call in for the error about the room was told that it was error on the part of expedia or hotel.com websites.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know of the confusion with your reservation made through hotels.com.  We greatly appreciate your feedback and have acted upon it promptly.  If we can assist you in any way, please contact our Executive Office at (949) 240-2000.  It is our highest mission to ensure your complete satisfaction.  We look forward to serving you again in the near future.

Summary: Exceptional rooms and service -- basically everything you could want on the resort grounds (such as tennis and basketball courts, ping pong, lounging areas, etc.) , and literally steps away from the beach.  I could not ask for more.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  It was a pleasure having you with us.  When will we have the opportunity to create another memorable experience for you?

Summary: Five stars doesn't begin to describe this resort. The view itself would be enough to make anyone want to stay here, but as always, the Ritz Carlton staff go above and beyond. From check in, to help finding something (always a personal escort rather than just giving you directions), they are incredible.   There is nothing not to like about this hotel. Rooms are comfortable (the bed was perfect), the pool was nice, and the decor in the common areas was really cool. The fresh flowers were just beautiful.  Only got to eat at 180blu (the bar above the cliff), and it was superb. Live music on Friday night was just perfect - a guy with a guitar who was excellent.   Overall, if you're looking for luxury and a true break from reality, this is the place.
Manager Response: We love your photos...thank you for sharing them!  We are delighted you enjoyed the resort.  It is a special place and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  We have so much more for you to experience.

Summary: From the moment we arrived, the people at this Ritz Carlton treated us to a lovely experience. Everyone was consistently focused on helping us in any way possible. The decor is beauty to soak in and everything has been thought of. We stayed at the club level which was extra special. The rooms and views were amazing. This is a wonderful treat for anyone that is fortunate to stay here.
Manager Response: We enjoyed having you and we hope you returned home with some wonderful memories of your stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Stayed for 2 nights with my wife. Location is great. the Hotel is located on a bluff overlooking Monarch bay with stunning vistas. Here is the thing; the rooms and bathrooms are very small and dated for such a brand name-we stayed in the most expensive one-. The hallways are narrow,dark and confusing. The food is mediocre and very pricy. and so are the drinks. The immediate area has no beach-side cafes,restaurants, bars or other places to WALK over to. One must drive in order to seek another venue beside the hotel's fare. It is a huge endless facility which requires a good hour to familiarize with - at night, it felt like a scene from "The Shining". The staff is courteous and attentive and did their best to please. We stayed in one of the best suite full oceanfront. However I
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our iconic resort as your luxury destination.  We strive to provide each of our valuable guests a unique and memorable experience.  We are saddened to hear that we did not meet your expectations.  Please contact our office to provide additional feedback.  We would love to hear from you (949) 240-2000.  We hope to have the chance to welcome you back soon as we celebrate 30 years of service excellence this year.

Summary: Loved my stay at this hotel.  We stayed here for a Valentine's / Anniversary stay, and the room was awesome. We overlooked the panaramic view of the ocean.  We had a nice stroll down the walkway to the beach / surrounding neighborhoods.  The room was top notch, and it felt like we were on an island every time we sat out on our balcony and enjoyed the the slight breeze.  Can't believe we didn't know about this hidden gem since we live just 30 mins from this place...Definitely coming back!
Manager Response: It's hard to believe that this was your first visit!  We have so much more in store for you for your future visits.  Welcome home!

Summary: I choose to stay here for a quick surf and romance get-away.  The views can't be beat but make sure you get an ocean view--not a coastal view.  Stayed in an ocean view room (well worth it), patio with fire pit (not so worth it).  Never used the surf cart as it's only a 5 minute walk to sand & surf.  Service by all the staff from valet,bell, front desk, maid service, wait staff, etc. are excellent.    Property condition is generally good...The problem is with "generally". Problems: shower ceiling had the start of mold, paint over paint over paint over paint on doors. door jams hallway corners is unacceptable.  Maybe ok in a motel but not a Ritz.  It's the details that make a resort.  RC Laguna Niguel is missing are critical property maintenance that can't be overlooked.  I woulda
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  It was a pleasure having you.  We cannot thank you enough for providing us such valuable feedback.  We rely on our guests comments to ensure we are always striving for service and product excellence.  We coulndn't agree with you more that an impeccably clean and maintained resort is crucial in meeting and exceeding our guests' expectations.  We look forward to the opportunity to speak with you further; as well as welcoming you back for a truly memorable stay.

Summary: stayed for 3 nights. payed 600usd. not worth. location...very nice looking the ocean service....they did their best to please room...very disappointing. pictures online are deceiving. Balcony window was tiny. room furniture in some areas it was cheap. Bathroom.....old, bath/shower was terrible with plastic curtain. Breakfast....they can not cook a decent breakfast. bread was terrible, the room was so cold that guest were with jackets on. public areas...cold, so unpleasant that one could not enjoy the dinner in either restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you for your extremely valuable feedback.  We greatly appreciate it and it will be shared appropriately.  We strive at all times to provide service excellence on all levels and we are sadly disappointed that you did not have the best possible experience.  May we ask that you contact us at (949) 240-2000 so a member of our leadership team can speak with you further?  We look forward to the opportunity to learn more about your stay.

Summary Heading: Lovely, delightful hotel at the top of its game
Summary: I can't say too much about this lovely place, though be forewarned that it is on the pricey side for everything you do.  But if you are OK with that for whatever reason, you won't be more comfortable or find a more beautiful location on the Southern California Pacific Coast.  The beach that it is above (way above) goes on for a long stretch and is quite beautiful.  The sunsets to the west are breathtaking.  The gym offer spectacular beach views.  We were staying at a conference and, though our room was not one of the grand ones, either in size or view, was lovely and incredibly comfortable.  The service is outstanding, and the ambience of the entire hotel was beautiful.  The one dinner that we had at the conference, though served in mass as in any large business gathering
Manager Response: Whether you visit us for business or leisure, our ladies and gentlemen pledge to provide the finest level of personal service and genuine care. We are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to experience our fantastic resort and magnificent surroundings again soon.

Summary: Haven't been to this hotel in about 10 years. My wife and I would go more regularly before we had kids. Revisited with my son for a surfing weekend at Salt Creek State Beach. Made a reservation thru Amex Fine Hotels and Resorts. Upon check in, without asking, was upgraded to a Club Level Oceanfront King room. The Club Level is phenomenal. Breakfast fare is truly amazing. Complimentary Cocktails and Hors d'oeuvres are plentiful and amazing. Great location! Great Beach! Great family vacation OR couples retreat.
Manager Response: Welcome back! We are delighted you returned after such a long hiatus. You can't best our surfing location ... one of the best in the country. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon. American Express is a wonderful partner of Ritz-Carlton with some exceptional value packages. Please let us know if you have any questions about our rates and or resort activities.

Summary: Stayed here in November 2013.  The property has spectacular views.  Everything about this place is top notch with the exception of the standard room size.  I've stayed at many hotels in this class and this one has one of the smallest standard rooms.  The room was very nice, but small.    The food at the restaurants was very, very good.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. It was a pleasure creating memories for you. We hope you return soon to experience our 30th anniversary of the resort.

Summary Heading: One of the best hotels we have ever stayed at!!
Summary: We have stayed at this property several times and are never disappointed! The flowers in the check-in area and leading down the corridor away from check-in are always exquisite. The staff is helpful, you just have to look like you are lost and someone is there to assist.  On our first visit, my husband and I were enjoying drinks and appetizers in the bar perched over the ocean and noted that the fire pits were something that we would enjoy at home. A manager overheard our conversation, got my email address, and I had an email with link information to buy them, the furniture and the pyramid type heaters...before we left the bar!! Very impressive service!!  The views are fantastic, the property well maintained, the food and drinks wonderful and the service beyond compare!! We are
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us .... we enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you. We couldn't agree more thar our fireside oceans front rooms are exquisite. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. The Pacific Ocean awaits you!

Summary: First time in October and what a fabulous resort - even better than many of the Ritz resorts I have been to.  Would highly recommend to anyone who wants a scenic holiday with ocean views from so many spots (rooms, restaurants, gym, etc).
Manager Response: We couldn't agree with you more that our views are absolutely breathtaking.  It was our pleasure having you as our guest and we hope you took home some wonderful memories.  We look forward to your return visit soon!

Summary: I attended a company leadership summit at the RC Laguna Niguel and stayed for a week. The hotel is located on a cliff just high above the great beach and provides the standard you expect from a Ritz Carlton Hotel. The Gueast Relation Manager (a Lady with an "European-Sounds" name) surprised me with a nice wellcome gift in form of 4 differend beer bottles in a ice pot. May my daughter, who just worked at RC in Beijing for a half year as an intern did use here connections ..... however, the beer did not survived for that long. Beside all the luxuary the hotel provides, the location is ideal for a walk at the strand after the meetings or what ever. Watching the sunset from the terrace of the hotel is an other great experiance. Staffs are friendly and proffesional. The only "minus"
Manager Response: It was wonderful to have you as our guest!  We hope you have an opportunity to visit us again soon for your own personal rest and relaxation.  We promise to continue to create unique and memorable experiences for you each and every visit to the resort.  Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: We stayed for a week a Thanksgiving. The first night we were there the hotel was crowded for the Christmas event. We reserved two rooms. The second night we were sitting in the restaurant bar and were asked to leave because my daughter was not 21 years of age. This same bar area that was full of children and families the night before. We went to see the manager and told him we wanted to watch the football game and have something to eat. He told us we should just watch it in our room and order room service. Rude. Paying for two rooms for a week and this is how they treat us. I looked up the California law and it stated that if the bar area is part of a restaurant, which it was, Rebar restaurant, Rebar Bar, under age people are permitted to sit in the bar or eat.  Left hotel and
Manager Response: We are very disheartened to hear of your experience from November, 2013.  We certainly hope you will give us the opportunity to speak with you personally so we can ensure your complete satisfaction.  We have shared your experience with our leaders and will use it constructively.  Please phone our Executive Office as soon as possible at (949) 240-2000.  Thank you for sharing your experience.  We greatly appreciate your feedback

Summary: The resort is amazingly set on a cliff above the pacific ocean, the gym is a dream to be starring at the ocean and on the treadmill.  The dining was ok at the resort.  The service was really good and the rooms were very nice as well.  The beach is nice lots of surfers come to go surfing there so its fun to watch
Manager Response: Thank you for staying withus!  We trust you returned home with some wonderful memories.  Our ladies and gentlemen look forward to creating more for you in the near future.  The ocean awaits you.

Summary: We traveled to California for an after Christmas vacation.  The views are amazing!  We booked ocean front rooms which I highly recommend.  The boys surfed at the hotel and traveled to other locations as well.  The hotel is in a great location.  Hotel recommendations for dinner varied, some were good, some were not.  I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We are delighted you enjoyed our fantastic surroundings and we enjoyed sending you and your family home with fond memories. Come back soon!

Summary: Great property on the beach, incredible ocean views (even from the halls), access to the beach,  incredible restaurants, and of course, incredible service. Would recommend in a heartbeat. Felt like we were in another world! Stayed on the 4th floor, interior room facing pool (no complaints!). Great location...just minutes south to Dana Point and minutes north to Laguna. Would highly recommend and hope to come back, but next time in summer. Definitely, Ritz Carlton treatment in everything at this location. In my opinion, rivals the Ritz in Kapalua. Traveled as a couple, but seemed family friendly as many kids were in the pool, football fans catching NFL playoff games in the lobby bar, and many families at the tidepools and beach. Very cool place, but wish we could've stayed longer!
Manager Response: Summer is a wonderful time to be a guest of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We hope to see you then.  We have so much more for you to experience. Welcome home!

Summary Heading: Very good but not up to Ritz standards
Summary: The property is in very good condition and the views are unmatched, but something about this Ritz left me wanting more. I was here for work, not play, and the conference facilities, food and service could have been better. I'm sure if i was here just for fun my opinion might be different.  Don't get me wrong, this is a fine hotel, but not the best "Ritz" experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing your valuable feedback. Our Executive Office would enjoy the opportunity to talk to you further about your experience. It is our highest mission that all of our guests depart the resort with the fondest of memories despite the nature of their visit. We look forward to welcoming you back soon to enjoy a true Ritz-Carlton experience.

Summary: We booked this Ritz Property using our Marriott Platinum points for Spring Break......SO worth it!!! Make sure you take advantage of book 4 nights, get your 5th free.  Upgrade your (already freebie room, when using points) by a mere $200/night for Club Level...enjoy your cappuccinos on the oceanside balconies every morning while watching the surfers below....grab your evening champagne and head on down with the kids to the oceanfront lawn and watch the sunset together......awesome! Mary in the Club Lounge was AMAZING! By calling ahead, she arranged for Gluten Free food for my Celiac daughter....as another amazing treat, she led both of the children on a scavenger hunt to their pirate treasure chest room to pick out toys.  Be sure to ask for children's amenities at
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We enjoy creating family memories that will last a life time. We hope to welcome you back for your next Spring Break. The fun awaits you!

Summary: The Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel has the perfect position on the Southern California coast.  Sitting on a cliff over looking the Pacific Ocean, you will be able to sip a glass of wine or enjoy a delectable meal as the sun sets.  And, if the Pacific Coast sea fog lifts, you will have a spectacular view of Catalina Island!  My room was on the north side, 1st floor, opening up to a lawn and garden. I sat on my "patio", listening to the birds chirp, the waves crash, and worked on my laptop...yes, this was a business visit.  But, if you are not going to stay in your room long, an ocean-side upgrade is unnecessary.  There are plenty "public" vantage points on this property to take in what the Southern California coast has to offer.  I was pleased with my room's size and accommodations.
Manager Response: What an incredible sunset you were able to experience!  We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for more rest and relaxation soon.

Summary: The most gorgeous view I have ever seen! The beach and sunset views are spectacular. The view from the workout room is awesome. The service was excellent and the rooms were very comfortable and clean. The food at the restaurants  and bar very delicious. I have only high marks for this hotel. Plus the lobby smells delicious with the Ritz's signature scent. You can buy a candle or spray in the gift shop! Would definitely stay here again!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  We couldn't agree with you more that our sunsets Arne views are breathtaking.  We are delighted you enjoyed our location, offerings and service. We look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Sadly it has gone downhill a bit....hope they get back their mojo!
Summary: It is with great sadness that I have to "downgrade" my initial rating of a full five stars for this hotel which i have loved and stayed in many times. The one thing that will never change is the setting/view/location which is SUBLIME. It is truly priceless and one of the most beautiful views I have ever had the pleasure of enjoying. The property itself is wonderful. It has all the California charm and warmth with a slightly modern touch. The public areas are the strongest points, both outside and in, they are welcoming, elegant and beautifully maintained.  The rooms however are where the hotel falls short. The rooms have always been small, that was a drawback but before and right after the renovation what they lacked in size they made up for in elegance, luxuriousness and
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again and providing your very valuable feedback. We greatly appreciate your attention to detail and have taken it seriously. You have our word that we will do whatever it takes to ensure each of our valued guests has an incredibly meaningful and unforgettable,experience in 2014.

Summary: This is one of the best Ritz Carlton properties! The views are spectacular and hotel has great amenities  We stayed on the club level which was really a nice experience.  Breakfast, snacks, apps, beverages, desserts, etc and available throughout the day.  The concierges on the club level are friendly and quite helpful; Beth & Diane in particular.  We've never experienced such outstanding service as we did from these 2 great ladies....they really made our stay extra special.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and experiencing our exclusive Club Level; ranked amongst the best in the world. We are delighted you enjoyed our stunning location and personalized service. When will we be welcoming you back?

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights during the New Years holiday.  I booked using points and then paid the extra $200 per night to upgrade to an ocean view room which was WELL worth it. Our view was fantastic and I loved watching the surfers and sunsets from my cliff-top balcony.  All staff members were very courteous and helpful (as you would expect at a Ritz property).  Room service did seem a bit slow but the hotel was fully booked so I guess that's understandable.  To their credit, the wait times that the room service staff quoted us when we ordered were accurate so they didn't raise our hopes by quoting an unrealistically short wait. If we visit Orange County again in the future, we will definitely stay here.
Manager Response: We are delighted that our ladies and gentlemen created a wonderful memory for you. Happy New Year!  Will this be a new annual tradition?

Summary: Stayed in an ocean view room. Room is not the largest but the balcony and view make up for that. Super crowded. Many weddings and kids everywhere. Staff was decent.  Front desk tried to put us in a handicap accessible room, which is much smaller than other rooms. Bellman gave us this info.  We were moved to another room.  Valet was awesome. Ate on the outdoor deck next to Raya.  Food was good but pricey. This is the best hotel on the entire SoCal coast.  Its all about the location.  Views views views.
Manager Response: We couldn't agree with you more that our panoramic view of the Pacific Ocean is breathtaking! On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. It was our pleasure to create a memorable experience for you.

Summary Heading: This is one of the nicest resort Ritz-Carlton properties I've been to
Summary: We stayed at the Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel for just one night (unfortunately not longer!) at the end of December 2013. This is truly one of the nicest Ritz-Carlton properties that I've stayed at (and I've been lucky enough to test out many of their properties around the world). The resort is perched atop a bluff overlooking the Pacific Ocean. The views are spectacular.   At a Ritz-Carlton you always expect outstanding service. This was the case here, although it seemed that the front desk was either a little understaffed at the times I had to talk to them or, perhaps, not as well organized as other departments at the resort. For both check in (at an off-peak time) and check out (at a peak time) there was a lengthy line. Wait times were okay, but they had only one (check in) or
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing us as your luxury destination. We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you. We look forward to your next visit....perhaps another private and romantic dining experience overlooking the Pacific Ocean is on the agenda?

Summary: I stayed there with some friends over this past Thanksgiving.  The room was lovely, the service was incredible and the views were breathtaking.  It is a very nice hotel, but there is not much privacy.  We had a beautiful balcony room, directly overlooking the ocean, but you are sitting there, admiring the view, along with every other neighbor, up and down on both sides.  The Spa is FANTASTIC!  The women there are skilled professionals who are tops in their field.  From the minute you walk in the door your are pampered and delighted!  I would certainly return.
Manager Response: We couldn't agree with you more that our sunsets are extraordinary.....sought out by many.  Thank you for your holiday visit. We look forward to the next one.

Summary: An absolutely gorgeous hotel situated   Oceanside with beautiful views. Rooms are small but that not the problem, it's the restaurants and the service by hosts. Pathetic, uncompromising, and unaccomodating to a family of five. Absolutely horrid. There is more to complain about, but enough.   I was left waiting at the airport for a scheduled(one month in advance ) limo.   You get the idea, what a shame.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your very valuable feedback. We have taken it seriously and would like to speak with you for further information. Kindly contact (949) 240-2000 at your convenience. We enjoyed having you as our guest and wish to reassure you that your next Ritz-Carlton experience will be a true Ritz-Carlton experience.

Summary: A first class resort in an area known for it's laid back vibe. Fron the minute you step into the gorgeous lobby you know your not in your typical SO Cal resort. Although it looks from the ads that it's ON the beach it's actually above the beach on a cliff..  The grounds are exquisite. Start with cocktails at sunset on the outdoor terrace. Dinner at the hotel is very pricy but do it if you have the $$. Nothing much happening in the way of nightlife. You may want to splurge on an oceanfront room on the ground floor with its own private fire pits and enjoy it for the evening.   The snack bar has great lite food for breakfast, get it to go and enjoy it on one of the many outdoor chairs.  Try yoga at the outdoor pavilion overlooking the ocean. The exercise room is well equipped and
Manager Response: Aren't our poolside rooms wonderful?  We are delighted you experienced many of the fabulous offerings we provide at the resort. Thank you for exploring our resort grounds and surroundings. Our playful approach to luxury awaits you and we look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: My husband and I stayed here this past weekend and overall, had a great experience.  The hotel itself is beautiful with gorgeous views and reminds me a lot of the Ritz HMB property. The room was clean and adequately sized with its greatest asset being the views from the balcony, however it is definitely not the most extravagant or luxurious room I've stayed in. We especially loved working out in the gym which had, unexpectedly, one of the best views in the hotel. One negative part of our stay was at check-in...the girl at the front desk was not friendly at all and seemed to lack the class and politeness I expect from the Ritz brand. We were shown a club level room that was dark and dingy, so I asked if there were any rooms that got better light. The girl was kind of curt and
Manager Response: Thank you for your very valuable feedback. We have taken it seriously and have shared it with the appropriate leadership. We welcome the opportunity to speak more in depth with you if you can spare the time out of your busy schedule (949) 240-2000.  Thank you for staying with us. We look froward to welcoming you back.

Summary: When visiting California, I usually don't stay in resort style hotels.  Ritz has a good operation in Laguna Niguel, about halfway between San Diego and Los Angeles.  The good:  - location, - grounds, - common areas, - rooms, - food.  The bad: - noise level, - stuffy atmosphere.  The clientele is too "blue blood" for me, and the staff re-inforces that behavior.  Once they realize you are not one of the old-money blue bloods, they show their human side.  Won't return.
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest feedback.  We love hearing it and we share it accordingly with our leadership team.  Thank you for visiting and we certainly hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again one day.

Summary: My family and I love this hotel. The views from the gym and restaurant are incredible. We've stayed here twice and will be back. Definitely worth the extra investment for a room with a view. Love the early morning beach walks.
Manager Response: We couldn't agree with you more that our views and surroundings are magnificent.  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.  Thank you for your visit!

Summary: We had the experience of our lifetime at the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel! It was our daughters wedding couple of weeks ago and there is not one single negative thing I can think of writing about this resort. Stunning views Fabulous customer service outstanding rooms, and the service we received from the coordinators at the Ritz......Susan N, Hailey E, Maie, it was simply outstanding, I will surely  treasure the memories forever!  we requested and it was taken care of promptly and efficiently The guests attending the wedding party were blown away with the service, it was a wonderful weekend and memorable experience for everyone.. we could not have had a better venue for our daughters wedding. Best experience ever!
Manager Response: Congratulations!  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for such a momentous event! We look forward to creating many more special memories for you and your family in the years to come.

Summary: I did not stay at this hotel but have been here twice walking through the property with my daughter who lives nearby.  The views are breathtaking and the lobby is understated elegance.  The floral arrangements change and they are all artistically created but not in a gaudy manner.  Clearly money is no object here so they could have done anything but I appreciate the simplicity and elegance of the place.   The restaurant overlooks the ocean and the cliffs, and is a real distraction to anyone lucky enough to dine there.
Manager Response: Thank you for stopping by!  We hope to have you as our overnight guest soon.  We are delighted you enjoy our warm, relaxed yet refined ambiance.  We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary Heading: Gorgeious view, excellent staff, and all around great stay
Summary: We stayed here for two nights in early September. They automatically upgraded us when we told them that we had just been engaged. Our room had an ocean view, a fire pit, and they threw in a complimentary s'mores kit. We were very happy. All of the staff were excellent and friendly, everyone smiling and genuinely seeming to enjoy their job. The room wasn't huge, but it was adequate. The bathroom however, WAS huge!! The view was gorgeous, as was the room. Being so close to the gorgeous beach was excellent, as were the shopping and restaurants nearby. You need to bring nothing to the beach, the hotel provides chairs, towels, boogie boards, water, and some more. I would return in a heartbeat, had I the expendable income ;-)
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for such a momentous occasion! We are delighted that memories were created for you.  Your photos are stunning, thank you!  Isn't Mother Nature wonderful?  We hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: A little dated, a little noisy
Summary: We stayed in the Ritz Carlton in Dana Point for our honeymoon. We didn't receive any special attention because it was our honeymoon. Oh well. The hotel lobby and restaurants are very nice but our room was dated. The plumbing was old and the paint and carpet needed to be redone. Everything was clean, you can just tell it was older. The only fantastic thing about our room was that it was on the bottom floor with a fire pit on the patio overlooking the ocean. We enjoyed sitting out on the patio with the fire lit listening to the waves crashing. Unfortunately our room was near an elevator and you could hear the elevator noises! We had to keep the fan on the air conditioner running on high to drown out the noises and my husband needed ear plugs at night. We stayed at the St. Regis
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We greatly appreciate it.  Congratulations on your marriage!  We hope we get the opportunity to welcome you back for another special occasion one day soon.  Please let our Executive Offices know when you plan to visit again and we will ensure you have the best accommodations possible.

Summary Heading: Room with a View!-  They're not kidding!
Summary: This RC situated atop Dana Point with knock out view of beach. Wow!  Hotel maximizes the views from most public areas. Kudos. Love: nice room, good food. Especially like Peet's Coffee outpost in lobby with top-quality grab'n go healthy snacks, not the usual "junk food fest" others hotels might have. (The citrus salad is so healthy you don't feel that guilty throwing in a brownie!) And, waitstaff were great about letting me request extra-healthy variations on  my breakfast orders each day. Thanks.   Walking exceptional, thanks to oceanfront paths in either direction, either to Salt Creek State Park/Dana Point harbor or other scenic destinations.  First-rate.   Only pick: Gym area was unstaffed and had to make 2 trips to spa to get help with balky equipment. (Please fix the TVs on
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel!  We are delighted you took advantage of many of our offerings; as well as our local area.  Dana Point is a special place and we hope you have the opportunity to visit again soon.  Thank you for letting us know about the fitness center equipment. It has been taken care of.

Summary: Had a chance to stay here after Thanksgiving.  Check-in process was great except for the sticker shock of $150 pet fee per night.  Good thing we have friends who live nearby that were more than happy to watch our dog.  Whew.    This hotel is situated beautifully on the Southern California coastline with great views from the dining, cocktail and even the gym.  I tried so hard to fall in love with this hotel, but I just could not.  The rooms are just ok.  Mini bars are empty.  Not stocked at all.  I would expect a five-star hotel to have a full stocked mini bar.  Bathrooms are what you expect, but no "wow" factor.  Our view was of the pool, which in my honest opinion, is one of the most boring pools I have ever seen.  The cocktail area outside has a beautiful view and the
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  We are grateful for your business. Thank you as well for your valuable feedback.  It has been shared constructively with our team.  We would enjoy welcoming you back and hope you choose our resort as your luxury destination in the future.

Summary: I brought my wife here for her birthday getaway.  The surprise in the room for her birthday was a huge hit with her!  Thank you!!  We booked a surfing lesson through concierge and it was one of the best excursions that I have ever participated in.  Ian was fantastic and I would highly recommend Ian if you want a surfing lesson.  All of the equipment is included and his patience with us was amazing.    The good and the bad: Good: * The property is one of the finest that I have been anywhere in the world.  Overlooking the ocean and walking on the beach and watching the surfers was incredible.  It is an easy walk down to the ocean and listening to the waves and watching them was a highlight. * 180Blue with the view in the evening was a great experience.  It was a little chilly but
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel and thank you for your valuable feedback.  We have noted the issues and appreciate you letting us know.  It is gratifying to hear that your experience overall was excellent and we look forward to creating more memories for you in the future.

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel..... If You Like Weddings
Summary: My wife attended a conference at the Ritz-Carlton and we stayed a few extra days to check out the area. We found the hotel to be very nice. The employees are friendly and accomodating, our room was very comfortable, and the grounds are beutifully landscaped and well kept. The hotel sets on a bluff overlooking the Pacific, with views of Catalina Island. We booked a Whale Watching trip thru the Eco-Center and our personal naturalist, a young woman named Leslie was awesome.   All that being said, there were some disappointments as well. This hotel is somewhat of a wedding factory, and during the numerous weddings being held, guests not participating in the events are reduced to second-class citizens. It seems that most of the weddings are held overlooking the Pacific, with the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  Your photos are beautiful.  We are delighted you enjoyed your experience overall yet some of the activities taking place at the resort during that time may have hindered your full experience.  We certainly did not intend for you to be inconvenience in any way.  Please feel free to call our executive office so we can further discuss your visit (949) 240-2000.  Thank you!

Summary Heading: No Peace or Rest at Ritz Carlton
Summary: I booked my room a month in advance and arrived the day before Thanksgiving.  I checked in after dark and couldn't really see the view.  I had booked a Coastline View because I prefer that to an Ocean View.  I called room service to order dinner and the said we have to call you back there are 3 people ahead of you.  Well they never called me back and when I called them they said their phone wasn't working and they could not dial out.  Hmmm.  I was the first guest this happened to.  Interesting.    When I woke up in the morning I opened the curtains to check out the coastal view and saw the lawn, the parking lot and someone's backyard.  The only way you could possibly see a coastal view is to walk out on the balcony.  I was so disappointed.  I had planned a two day getaway and
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your feedback.  We are devasted that your experience with us was anything less than flawless.  We certainly would like the opportunity to make it up to you and have you enjoy a true Ritz-Carlton experience.  Please give us a call at your convenience at (949) 240-2000.

Summary: What a night!  I called ahead to let the hotel know I was going to propose to my girlfriend during our stay and they took care of all the details.  They made sure our room had a memorable view, the details were executed perfectly.  We checked in early and hit the beach.
