By the time we were ready to wash off the sand our room was ready and luggage waiting for us.  After dinner and a walk on the beach I surprised her with a ring.  By the time we returned to our room the staff had set up another surprise perfectly.  Thanks Ritz!
Manager Response: Congratulations!! Thank you for allowing us to assist you with your special surprise. We look forward to creating many more surprises and memorable experiences for you in the future.

Summary: This hotel was awesome.  The service was great, the views amazing, and the massage inspiring.  I would recommend this place to all of my friends and love ones.  They allow pets and even have a pet menu to choose from.  I am grateful for the wonderful weekend my finance and I spent here.  We will be getting married here next fall, and we are stoked to have found such a beautiful location.  We had a spectacular view of the sunset from our room and enjoyed it while snuggling together eating chocolate dipped strawberries.  Absolutely Amazing!
Manager Response: Congratulations! We are so happy for you!  We are so excited to welcome you back soon. Your photo of the sunset is beautiful. Thank you for allowing us to create lifelong memories for you.

Summary: Stayed on club level.  Excellent service and hotel staff were professional and eager to serve and make our stay pleasurable. I highly recommend staying at this hotel.  Excellent and polite staff!!  Loved it!! Colleen the club level concierge went above and beyond to ensure we had a great time! Thank you Ritz Carlton!
Manager Response: It was our pleasure!  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  On behalf of Colleen and our entire team, we look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Will go back again and again!
Summary: The Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel was an awesome experience!   They made our anniversary get away so special with lots of unexpected touches. The property is like an art gallery in so many ways. The staff is genuinely friendly and extremely helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for such a momentous occasion!  We are delighted to hear that we created a unique and memorable experience for you.  Will this be an a new, annual tradition?

Summary: My husband bought a package at a Chicago Boys and Girls Club benefit auction that included a stay at this resort. What a treat! We had a garden room, but it faced the ocean. Lovely. We watched whales and dolphins from our patio. An elegant brunch, beautiful beach, delightful spa and the best massage I have ever had. Monarch bay, and Torrey pines golf close by.
Manager Response: Your trip sounds wonderful!  We are delighted you were able to experience many of the fabulous offerings we have at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  Will you be returning soon?

Summary: My wife and I spent a week there. It offers beautiful views of the ocean, along with amazing service. It is conveniently located to a number of different regional tourist attractions. We would definitely go back.
Manager Response: It was wonderful having you!  We are delighted you enjoyed your experience. We hope to see you again soon!  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary Heading: "We're happy to accomodate if you are willing to pay an upgrade"
Summary: Spent 2 nights here, first on company and extended for second to experience what I missed while in conference.  First night's room was on the inside facing pool.  Lights in room are small direct downs and with trees from outside and very little lights on inside, made for a dark and dreary experience.  When I went down today to request another room, I received the same welcome from front desk staff when I arrived - "we are happy to accomodate if you are willing to pay for an upgrade"  I was not.  Please sort it out and when the conference is finished, I'll come get keys.   When I treked to the room, I discovered I had been banished to almost the last room in the complex whereupon I discovered the keys didn't work and had to trek back to the front desk to ask for new keys.  I
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel and providing your valuable feedback.  Hearing that you did not enjoy your experience saddens us and we hope to have the chance to visit with you by phone to ensure we reach a satisfactory solution for you.  Please contact our Executive Office at your convenience.  On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to assisting you.

Summary Heading: When you stay here, you feel like Mr. Hearst himself
Summary: This must be one of the very grandest and greatest hotels in the world, really. Its clifftop setting overlooking the Pacific, expanse, regal architecture, ocean breezes and ocean-wave soundtrack make it spendid, sumptuous and patrician. It is expensive, but if you are in the mood to be indulged and to feel special, there is no place quite like this Laguna Niguel hotel. Once you get comfortable here, which will happen the first night, it is emotionally quite hard to leave.
Manager Response: We couldn't agree with you more.....the sound of the ocean waves are definitely hypnotic.  We are delighted you enjoyed your experience with us and we look forward to creating more memories for you in the future.

Summary Heading: Beautiful Hotel and Beach; Sub Par Service
Summary: This is a beautiful hotel atop a cliff overlooking a wonderful beach. There is easy beach access and the sand appears "combed" to keep it clean of most ocean debris. Lots of surfers, but not over crowded.  I am a Marriott Rewards Platinum Elite, and booked the one night stay using 50,000 Marriott Rewards points. We were booked into a garden view room but given an ocean view (one level upgrade as is standard). I was not greeted as a Platinum Elite and when I inquired about if the 1,000 points of the welcome gift would post to my account, the check in clerk looked at me like he had no idea what that was.  I requested a late checkout as is standard for a Platinum Elite, but was told I could not have one. When I clarified via the Marriott Rewards Terms and Conditions, the concierge
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna NIguel.  We enjoyed seeing your photos and are glad your overall experience was satisfactory.  We would enjoy speaking to you further about your Platinum Elite status and benefits.  Kindly contact the Executive Office directy so we may assist you. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Wow.  WoW. WOW!  I can't say enough about our recent 5 night stay at the Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel.  We had a suite in the club level and would love to have never left!  Upon checking in, we upgraded from our basic room reservation to a suite on the club level and that was the BEST decision we could have made.  You must use your key card in the elevator to get to the 4th level and upon arrival, you walk through the club lounge to get to your room.  We were in suite 417 which looked out over the area surrounding the smaller of the properties two pools.  The only thing that could have improved upon this was if we had an ocean view.  The suite had: (1) a half bath off of the entry foyer  (2) a spacious living space with: - a large L shaped couch - mini fridge and safe tucked away
Manager Response: We enjoyed having you as much as you enjoyed being here!  We are delighted you had the chance to experience our exclusive Club Level.  We couldn't agree with you more that it is worth every penny. Thank you for your visit and we hope to welcome you back soon.  There are pizzas to be made!

Summary Heading: Another Fantastic Stay on the Club Level!
Summary: I’ve written reviews about the Club Level of the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel in the past and I’m thrilled to report that, if anything, it’s only gotten better!  Director of Guest Services, Clarita Parra, made sure we were set up in wonderful accommodations in early October and although she was off during our stay, she provided a number where we could reach her should there be any problems or concerns.  Club Supervisor, Penni Garcia greeted us like we were family coming home for a visit. It’s not a surprise to know Penni was awarded the Ritz Carlton 2013 Gold Standard Award!  Whether it’s the great food and drink presentations throughout the day, offering to make dinner or golf reservations, securing tickets for an event or recommending activities in the area, the  ladies of the
Manager Response: Thank you for another wonderful review of our resort.  We couldn't agree with you more that Clarita and her Club team are outstanding!  We are delighted that you left with more unique and personal memories and we look forwardt to welcoming you back.

Summary Heading: One of the best resorts in the world.
Summary: Atop the cliff with a vast oceanview to endless skies, greenery surrounding, beach below. Its quiet and beautiful. Perfect way to lay back and enjoy. The bar with the view set the mood perfectly. Weathet was neither hot nor cold. It was pleasent just adds to the settings. Staff were very friendly. Will definitely go back.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel as your luxury destination.  We enjoyed having you and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  The ocean awaits!

Summary: We spent 3 nights in a club suite with a garden view which was absolutely beautiful.  We also hosted a luncheon during our stay for 20 people at the Raya Restaurant, which overlooks the beach and ocean.  Everything from the initial planning stages of the luncheon to the time we checked-out of the hotel was perfect.  The Speciatly Dining Coordinator, Michele Canatella, as well as Erin Snider, the Food and Beverage Manager were professional, personable and helped to make our event one of the best ever.  The Guest Relations Coordinator provided us with a special gift in our room at check-in.  The gym in this hotel has floor to celing glass windows overlooking the coastline and it is so beautiful it is difficult to tear yourself away from your workout.  In general, the service at
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel!  Michele, Erin and all of our ladies and gentlemen take great pride in creating unique, personal and memorable experiences for our guests.  We hope to celebrate many more special occassion with you in the future.  Welcome home!

Summary: Didn't stay at this hotel, but did attend a catered cocktail hour and dinner.  The hotel grounds and lawns over the beach cliff are beautiful and expertly maintained.  The common areas of the hotel are also equally impressive.  The wait staff was extremely professional and the table setting and dining room were also top notch and very well appointed.  Best chimichurri steak I have ever had!
Manager Response: Thank you for the nice feedback.  We enjoyed having you even if it was just a short visit.  We hope you choose to stay overnight with us soon.  We have so much more for you to experience!

Summary: I spent 3 nights at the Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel with my wife.  The hotel is situated above the ocean with phenomenal views of the ocean and surrounding bay.  It was amazing to see the surfers down at the beach from sun-up to sunset.  The hotel itself is very beautiful, but the hotel staff is what makes this resort fantastic.  From the moment we pulled up to the hotel to the time we left for the airport to come back home, the professionalism exhibited by the Ladies and Gentlemen at this resort was none other than perfection.  Although I didn't have a chance to dine at any of the restaurants in the hotel, I can assure you that they were always full and the comments from other guests indicated that the food was absolutely splendid.  In fact, the restaurant that overlooks the
Manager Response: We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you!  Welcome home!

Summary Heading: Loved the view. Loved their bar overlooking the ocean.
Summary: We lodged here for 4 days and our favorite things were the view and the "180blu" bar that overlooks the ocean. This location is truly beautiful and relaxing. The hotel had great service for the wedding we attended here -- the dinner following the wedding was excellent and the outdoor courtyard location was just perfect. The front desk was very helpful and all the staff always greeted you -- very nice.  Our room was very comfortable and pretty but not very large though (narrow hall where closet opens; two people can't pass each other) and it was a long ways from the lobby and other venues of the resort. Good for quiet.   The valet service was the one service that could not keep up with all the demand. The resort has a set daily fee for this and you have no other choice. I liked
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We enjoyed having you.  We hope the wedding was a very memorable experience for you and all of the guests.  Thank you for your constructive feedback regarding your valet and breakfast service.  We would like the opportunity to talk to you further about your experience.  Please contact the Executive Office at your convenience.

Summary: What a truly beautiful resort.  A perfect place to just relax and be pampered.  Beautiful beach with an amazing trail to walk; a terrific spa; and lovely restaurants onsite.  You don't have to leave the grounds, but if you do, Laguna Niguel is an absolutely beautiful little town, and the whale watching trip from Dana Point harbor is exceptional.  In the ocean front rooms, even with the windows closed, you can hear the waves.  Perfection.
Manager Response: Ahhhh perfection!  We strive to provide a perfect experience for each of our guests and we delighted that we succeeded with you.  When will you return?  We are looking forward to the opportunity to surprise you with more memories soon.

Summary: If you're lucky enough to get a west-facing room, you'll find yourself spending a good deal of time savoring in the beauty of a warm sunset or delighting in the passing of a pod of dolphins.  The rooms are very nicely appointed and include almost every bathroom amenity one would need.   My favorite area of the hotel is the lobby.  Although not very large, the fresh floral designs nearly transform the lobby into a work of art.  The level of service is true to the Ritz-Carlton brand and the staff goes out of its way to ensure your stay is an excellent one.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We enjoyed having you and hope to welcome you back soon.  The dolphins are waiting for you!

Summary Heading: When too much is too much
Summary: If you are looking for a really big resort style vacation with lots of attention by the staff this is probably for you. I was looking for neither! The property is too big to easily find one's way around and the lobby and restaurant area were incredibly crowded most times, which resulted in a rather impersonal atmosphere. What this hotel lacks but seems to long for is true style and taste. All is made and geared towards a rich but unsophistication cliental. The staff is attentive in a very robotic and indiscrete way. Each waiter, maid or front desk person asked me the same three question in the exact same order every single day > Where are you from? What brings you here? How long will you stay? On the better side of things > The beach is beautiful and the views magnificent. The
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  If there is anything we can assist you with in the future, please contact the Executive Office directly.  We enjoyed having you as our guest.

Summary: The food, view, and ambiance are second to none.  We stayed for 4 nights and could not have had a better experice with a standard ritz (hotel type not reserve) location.  The food as it always seems to be was worth the price of addmission.  The hotel it self was well appointed with just the right mix of modern and tradtional style.  The rooms were well apointed and spacious.  I would have to say however the best part of this hotel was the view at sunrise or sun set.  It would take your breath away!!!  This is a cant miss for a Ritz location.
Manager Response: Isn't Mother Nature incredible?  Our surroundings and view are out of this world.  Thank you for taking it all in.  We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: We had a coastal view room on the club level.  Our view was great, could see the water, surfers and hear the waves at night.  The club level was worth the extra price.  They were extremely helpful with our off property activities and on property dining.  The breakfast was more than adequate each morning.  They had food and drinks throughout the day.  We arrived at 10pm our first evening, after the restaurants stopped serving and the club level put some food together for us.  They even sent down some drinks to our room while we unpacked.  We were celebrating our anniversary and they made the entire visit a special celebration for us.  Raya was delicious, we had a dinner and brunch there.  Service was excellent.  We ate in the steak restaurant one evening and has a very nice
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  Our ladies and gentlemen take great pride in providing service excellence.  Happy Anniversary!  We hope you took some wonderful memories home with you.

Summary: The bar and appetizers at 180 blue are excellent and you can't beat the view.  They have live music and show surfing images on the adjacent wall.  Tuesday is Taco night.  Just walking through the lobby is an experience.  Its beautifully decorated with live flowers and the aroma is wonderful.
Manager Response: We couldn't agree with you more that 180blu is a fantastic outdoor lounge with a magnificent view.  We are delighted to know you enjoyed your service experience as much as we enjoyed creating a memory for you.

Summary: Concierge Level in Ritz Carlton on the Ocean in Southern CA.   It doesn't get much better than this!   A wonderful staff made our stay just about perfect.   We've been staying in the Laguna Beach area for several years and would recommend this hotel over any other in the area.   Excellent views and outstanding service.
Manager Response: We are delighted that you enjoyed your exclusive Club Level experience and we hope to welcome you back again very soon.

Summary Heading: Luxury sunsets views over amazing martinis!
Summary: Traveling around the world lets you select certain places that are really special to watch the sunset.  Without a doubt, The Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel provides amazing luxury views for the sunset along with top class service and one of a kind martinis!
Manager Response: Stellar service, magnificent martinis, and sensational sunsets are three of the many reasons why our guests enjoy The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  Thank you for staying with us!

Summary: Though you better bring some extra money to eat, this hotel is beautiful and has a fantastic view above a surfing area and tide pools.   There is a nice walkway down to the beach and a grassy area to watch the sunset above the beach if you'd rather stay up at the hotel.   The meeting rooms are comfortable and spacious.  Plug ins for laptops and notebooks were provided.  The food provided for the meeting was good. Though I didn't get to experience the pool or hot tub, they were large and clean.  The landscaping is really lovely.  The room was clean, comfortable, and had nice decor.  The only thing I did not enjoy was getting 1/4 glass of wine for $16 (there were more expensive) and a mixed drink that was mostly ice for the same price that seemed to have barely any alcohol in it.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We hope you have a chance to enjoy a return visit soon.  May we suggest you try a room on our exclusive Club Level next time?  There you can enjoy private concierge service and complimentary food and beverages selections.  We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: The view from our coastal-view balcony was absolutely beautiful.  Obviously the hotel is aware of the vista as they have a huge flat panel tv behind the check in desk with a live beach-cam. From the moment we drove up the service was first class.  Brian of valet parking arranged to store our luggage including two items that required refrigeration as we arrived before check-in time.  He gave us directions to explore the harbor of Dana Point.  Matt brought our bags to the our room when it was available and gave us an overview of the resort.  Penny, the concierge in the club lounge was always helpful. The RC Liguna Niguel is obviously a wedding destination as we had the opportunity to watch two during our two day stay.  The ocean view from the gym makes the treadmill seem less
Manager Response: It is definitely paradise here and we are delighted you enjoyed our magnificent surroundings. We hope you have the opportunity to return soon and experience one of the many excursions we have to offer. Thank you for your visit!

Summary: The Ritz in Laguna Niguel is amazing - the setting, the view, the service, the room - absolutely fantastic.  We were lucky enough to get club level which added the cherry on top to our trip.  I could not think of a better setting.  A close drive to Laguna Beach Galleries, Shops and Restaurants, I cannot recommend more highly.  It is everything you think of when you envision what a stay at the Ritz should be.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  We are delighted you were able to enjoy our exclusive Club Level.  Will you be returning soon?  We hope so.

Summary: Now this is a Ritz.  After having stayed recently at the Ritzes in Key Biscayne and St Thomas, I was leary of staying at yet another one as both of those properties need some serious renovations.  This Ritz has obviously been renovated recently and it very nice.  I did have the luck to get a fourth floor room facing the ocean.  The staff was great and always there when you needed them.  The food was very good but as pricey as you would expect at a Ritz.  The cocktails were very good.  I also had a refridgerator in the room (not a mini bar) which was nice.  Very expensive but worth it if you can afford it.
Manager Response: We are delighted to read that we met and exceeded your expectations.  Our ladies and gentlemen take great pride in providing a superior level of service.  Welcome home!

Summary Heading: Ritz great for families with adult children
Summary: Excellent service.  Locked in to understanding their role as a resort and who the customer is.  Second time there.  First time was in late August '12.  This time, late September '13.  Staffing was a bit short as it was the end of the season.  But the energetic nature of the staff more than made up for minor staff delays due to short staffing.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We hope to be your getaway each year in the future.  We enjoyed having you and will always provide you with stellar service.

Summary Heading: Beautiful for sunsets, such a shame to be there on business!
Summary: I have stayed at the Ritz at Laguna about 5 times now, and every time it just gets better.  The good: The rooms are comfortable and well appointed Mostly attentive staff The bar, at sunset with a guitar player and a cocktail The garden rooms with outdoor fireplaces - perfect for a Scotch, and s'mores (and you can buy the s'mores kits there!)  The bad: the layout takes some getting used to, 3 levels, and a bit of a rabbit warren finding servers at the outside bar, seems to be a lot of people around, but takes forever to get a drink  Overall, I love staying at the hotel, and just wish I could spend more time there when not on a business trip, as it looks great for families. On the flip side there's a lot of business meetings and conferences there that take up a lot of space, so
Manager Response: S'mores and sunsets!  What a perfect combination.  We are delighted that you took a moment to relax and enjoy our magnificent surroundings.  When you will be returning for a purely non-business visit?  We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary Heading: Gorgeous location, fantastic staff, get a renovated room
Summary: Beautiful location, excellent service, amazing breakfast, flowers, attention to detail. Some rooms are older, small bathrooms but have been reno'd. Try and get upgraded to a larger room with a view. The hotel has a gorgeous restaurant with a knock your sox off view, the breakfast is amazing, the gym is huge and gorgeous, the spa looks great but didn't use it.The  pool is nice, bar menu is limited but staff are so great and will do whatever they can to make you happy. Not really a kid hotel, better for adult romantic or business.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  Was this your first experience at the resort?  We are delighted you enjoyed your visit and we look forward to creating more unique memories for you again soon.

Summary: Asked for king bed when checking in.  Was told they all had restricted views but the room with two doubles was better.  That view was of a cocktail party right outside the room window...no beach or other view.  Eventually was changed to room at far other end of hotel which had a view.   Toilet in privacy room is off center and cant be sat on straight.  Took twenty minutes and three calls to get a bellmen when departing.  All in all a very disappointing stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback.  We are so sorry you did not fully enjoy your experience with us.  We strive to provide stellar service and facilities that are magnificent.  We would welcome the opportunity to further discuss your stay.  Please feel free to contact the Executive Office directly at any time.  Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: All through out the hotel and grounds cute elephants abound.  They will make you smile. We liked this one with the Taj Mahal in its head. Had lunch at 180 blu with a view. The passionflower fruity tea I just want to take home. This hotel does a great job of hospitality.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting the photo of Mira Gulati.  Isn't he wonderful?  It has been an honor to showcase some of the many beautiful elephants of the Asian Elephant Foundation's Elephant Parade here at our resort. We have many more details about these amazing elephants and the foundation on our website.  Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  We know you have numerous choices.  We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: My husband and I went to a wedding at the Ritz Carlton and stayed for two nights.  Our first experience with this hotel chain.  The staff, from the valet to the restaurant staff to the housekeeping.... You could not ask for more friendly and helpful people.... They were very welcoming.  The hotel was immaculately clean, the rooms were nice size and our balcony was facing a garden with partial ocean views.  This hotel sits on a bluff with the beach/ocean accessible by steps and walkways.  The views from the restaurants, outdoor restaurants and walkways are just fabulously amazing.  We had breakfast two mornings and everything we had was very good and the service was excellent.
Manager Response: Thank you for your trust in providing you with an exceptional experience for your first visit.  We are delighted that you enjoyed your weekend.  We look forward to many more return visits in the future.   Please feel free to reach out if we can assist you in any way.

Summary Heading: Beautiful views and stunning flowers everywhere!
Summary: We recently finished our California road trip by spending 5 days at the Ritz Carlton.  It is quiet far out of Laguna Beach, about 7 miles but only takes 10 mins to drive in, I am not sure if they have a curtesy bus into town, if not that could be a problem.  It is a lovely hotel, our room was ocean view, although we waited several hours for our room to be ready and the desk were meant to call us to say it was ready, know one called we were just told when we went back a couple of hours later it was only just ready. We did have a broken air con unit that kept us up all night the first night and a broken balcony lock, both were dealt with though straight away.  The gym is beautiful, it faces the ocean and is very well equipped. If you don't want to sit down for a formal breakfast
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your valuable feedback. We greatly appreciate it and will act on it immediately.  We hope you enjoyed our property and staff and we look forward to your next visit. If we can assist you in any way, please contact our Executive Offices.

Summary: My wife and I spent 5 days here and loved it. We had an Oceanfront suite on the Concierge Club floor (4th floor).  From the first moment until the last, we received friendly, attentive service from every employee.  Watching the surf from our balcony was awesome.  This is an older property but exquisitely maintained.  As we drove the coastline and saw other hotels and resorts, we were repeatedly reassured that we had made the right selection.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the #1 Club Level experience in our company. Our ladies and gentlemen take great pride in offering a stellar level of refined and personal service. We are delighted you enjoyed our iconic ocean front resort and we look forward to creating more memories for you soon. Thank you for posting the beautiful photos!

Summary: My boyfriend and I went for the night, to celebrate each other. The check in was good, the room was Ok. I guess I was expecting more out of the Ritz Carlton. We had a corner room with somewhat of an ocean view. Right outside our balcony we had this very large tree that was covered in spider webs.  We did not want to have the balcony doors open in fear that a spider would get blown in, but we also wanted to listen to the waves.  I would probably not stay there again, not even for the night.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for your romantic getaway. We can't think of a more romantic location in Souter California. We hope you took with you an incredible and memorable experience, and we look forward to the opportunity to create another one for you soon. If you could please contact our Executive Office at your convenience and let us know your room number, we will ensure we have the tree trimmed right away. Thank you!

Summary Heading: Beautiful beach views, Ritz service, great for young kids
Summary: We stayed at the property for 5 nights in early July around the 4th of July weekend. I booked the American Express Platinum Fine Hotels and Resorts which gave us 1 night free and allowed us to check out at 4pm - which meant we had 6 full days on the property which was fantastic. We have 3 young kids - at the time aged 3, 4 and were looking for a luxurious but ultra family friend beach property. Our priorities were good weather, a great beach with easy access, and good food.  We found all at the Ritz.  We had booked an ocean front room with a fire pit, but decided to upgrade to a suite upon check in. The assigned suite did not have a direct ocean view, so I asked to switch to another room, which we did our second day. We ended up having a corner second floor direct ocean view
Manager Response: Making sure our younger guests have a very memorable experience is a priority for us. We enjoy making them smile and relax just as much as our older ones. It sounds like you fully explored our property and surroundings. Did you get a chance to visit the Eco Adventure Center? If not, please add that to your agenda during your next visit. You will not be disappointed! We hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary Heading: One word says it all, WOW.
Summary: Location is not always everything when it comes to a hotel location.  But when a hotel has a great location and then provides outstanding service and a top shelf experience then it's a winner.  The Ritz at Laguna Niguel (Dana Point) California is just such a place.  The lobby is stunning, the amenities fantastic and the view over Salt Creek Beach to Catalina Island in the distance is breathtaking.  Our room was outstanding with a big comfortable king bed.  The bathroom was nicely laid out and had double sinks which is great for a long time married couple.  The on-site restaurants and coffee bar were very good and the convention amenities were excellent for the conference I was attending.  The staff was attentive and the turn down service one of the best I've experienced.  It was
Manager Response: We enjoyed having you as much as you enjoyed being here! When will your next visit be? We have so much more for you to experience.

Summary Heading: Let the Surf Sing You to Sleep
Summary: What a location, high atop the beach, with gorgeous views at sunset.  Staying oceanfront is worth it, and you can leave your sliding door open day and night, and let the sounds of the surf sing you to sleep.  One of the best hotel experiences in a long time!    Attentive staff helped with valeting the car, and provided us with bottled water and fruit each time we left the hotel to explore on our own.    Clean room, fridge built into the wall, double sinks in the marble bathroom, closet had dresser built in.  A great property, and fun to watch the surfers who were out each day.  Make the time to walk the beach in each direction, but especially to the left as you face the beach.   Enjoy...you surely will!
Manager Response: Isn't the surf amazing? Thank your for truly experiencing what The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel is all about!  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Incredible views, beautiful hotel rooms, and exceptional service
Summary: Stayed for 4 nights while attending a conference in LA. This hotel is absolutely wonderful.  Set high on the hills/cliffs, the views of the beach and ocean are incredible!  The patio and walking paths down to the ocean are a great walk in the evenings while watching the sunset. The patio bar is the perfect seating area with fire places to keep you warm and the setting romantic.  The staff is incredibly friendly and helpful and are absolutely exceptional at their jobs.  A few critiques....  1) Rooms with a view of the ocean are more expensive ($100/night), and most of the rooms do not look outward, but rather look inward toward the pools.  2) Overall he restaurants are "ok"... I've spent time in comparable locations on the coast that had more variety and choices in restaurants.
Manager Response: Your photos are stunning! We are delighted you were able to experience such amazing sunsets, and even a whale!  We look forward to welcoming you back again soon. Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary: Dear hotel managers/owners of the world: Please find it in your budget to stay one night in this place. We want you to be better. THIS is better.   Thank you,  Weary travellers  Honestly, there is nothing to say, perfection on every level. Situated on a beautiful bluff above a picturesque beach, amazing service and amenities, quiet rooms....  The only thing (a very small, minor thing) that we wished for was the ability to rent a car for day trips while here. But other than that, great.
Manager Response: We enjoyed reading your post! We take great pride in our service, property and surroundings. Thank you for experiencing them all. We look forward to creating more memories for your soon.

Summary Heading: The most beautiful sunset awaits you
Summary: I went to this hotel for a meet up with friends in the area while staying in Orange County. We enjoyed cocktails in the exterior  lounge that was over the sand overlooking the Pacific. There was a native, " California dude" strumming his guitar and playing and singing tunes for the small crowd. I say that because he had longish bleach blond surfer hair and was barefoot aith sandals aside and really getting into his song! We had the most beautiful setting to enjoy the breeze, the food and drinks and the atmosphere. It was not stuffy, but a classy bunch of folks enjoying a night out. We had a blast! We were there for probably four or more hours and enjoyed the most beautiful sunset that I had ever seen. The staff was very helpful and courteous in helping us locate a seat, it was
Manager Response: Isn't 180blū a fantastic atmosphere to gather at?  Mother Nature is quite kind to us with the magnificent beach and stellar sunsets. We hope you have a chance to return soon and experience the sound of the waves crashing from your guest room patio.

Summary: I recently had a root canal and the endodontist had a picture of a beach on the ceiling above the chair. I asked what is was for and he said to help patients find their happy place. As a sat through a grueling several hour root canal, I closed my eyes and remembered my trip to the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel. From the moment I walked into the hotel lobby I felt relaxed. The views of the Pacific Ocean are just breath taking. The walks along the pacific are just simply powerful, almost spiritual. The breaking waves and sea midst are like no other beach. Every aspect of this property is designed to accommodate your every need and help you relax. The week we spent on the property we dined in the hotel for breakfast, lunch and dinner and the food was just outstanding. I’m certain
Manager Response: We are honored to be your happy place. Thank you for truly embracing our magnificent surroundings, and for allowing our ladies and gentlemen to completely pamper you. That is what The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel is all about! Welcome home.

Summary Heading: Not my first choice for future vacations
Summary: I want to be fair minded but this hotel just didn’t do it for me. My wife and I recently stayed here for four nights on the club level booked through AMEX Platinum. Frankly we just didn’t see the value. The staff is nice enough and tries to be professional, but the whole experience just didn’t add up. The interior of this hotel is way to sterile for my tastes and the rooms feel like they’re from the 1970’s. They’re well maintained, and you can tell they've been referbished, but the little things just add up; low water pressure, portable air conditioning units in the club lounge growling away all day long because the air in the hotel can’t keep up, lukewarm water in the shower, no vent in the bathrooms, a tub I’d never take a bath in, a balcony that barely fits two without a
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your subjective feedback. We thank you for visiting our ocean front resort and hope to have the opportunity to be of service to you again in the future. It's our highest mission to create long-lasting memorable experiences for each of our valuable guests.

Summary Heading: Still awesome, Just Not as Awesome as Last Year
Summary: As always with Ritz Carltons, we were welcomed and greeted graciously by the staff. Our bell person was excellent.  We were surprised to receive the same suite we had the year before, and really happy to get a reservation to Eno Steak (reviewed separately).  The view is lovely from that side of the hotel with a view of the beach closer to Dana Point.    I have to tell you that when I am paying a lot for a luxury hotel room, I am very detail oriented. I see the flaws. This is still a lovely place where the staff cannot do enough for you and is thrilled to please. You never feel like you are requesting something silly. And, it is like that whether you are in a suite or a normal room. The decor is beautiful, even if some of the soft furnishings in the corridors to the rooms have
Manager Response: Thank you for detailed and excellent feedback regarding your recent stay with us.  We enjoyed welcoming you back and look forward to creating a new and memorable experience for you in the year to come.  We love your comments and have shared them with our executive team.  Thank you very much!  We promise to be right on target the next time you choose The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary: This was my wife's first time staying at the Ritz Carlton Laguna and we will remember it forever. She grew up visiting the area to see her father as a child, and yesterday he passed away. For many years they cam to Salt Creek beach and looked up at the grand hotel. After a stressful day losing her father, we decided to spring for the Ritz to de-stress and relax. We knew this hotel would take care of us in our moment of need. We were not disappointed. From the valet, to the check-in to the restaurants and beach, all employees were considerate, polite and humble. No attitude at this 5 star resort. In particular Kayse at the check-in was the model of grace and assistance. Not only did she help us with our AMEX platinum plan, but later that night she dropped of a personal note and
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words. We are so glad we were here for you during your time of need.  We look forward to many more moments with you.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  Welcome home.

Summary: We booked the concierge level.  Our room was next to the concierge lounge where everyone gathers for food and drinks and across the hall from a bedroom that was converted to the children's club.  We asked to be moved away from these areas but wanted to keep the ocean view and found that they were fully booked.  While waiting for this first room to be readied, many guests who arrived after we did were shown to their rooms.  We waited 2 hrs. for this room from hell.   The solution was to be moved to another wing on the opposite side of the lobby, restaurant and bar.  The decision was easy as we wanted a quiet stay.  But, each day there was a wedding ceremony held in the garden directly below our balcony.  Lots of music and speeches involved.  There are 2 restaurants in this huge
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We greatly appreciate hearing from you.  Our highest mission is for you to always feel comfortable, relaxed, and pampered.  We wouldn't want it any other way.  When visiting during the summer months, we strongly recommend reservatons in our outlets prior to arrival.  Please let us know when you are planning a return visit and we will ensure you have a quiet room away from active areas  We look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: We went to the Ritz-Carlton for a wedding of a close friend. We paid a lot so we expected more than what we received. First of all, we ask to be close to the wedding party and and beach view. When we checked in we were told we had an upgrade to shoreline view. When we entered the room and looked out the door we saw a moldy patio the size of a closet and a hillside of houses. After 30 minutes trying to get in touch with reservations they told us they could move us. Another 1/2 hour and we decided forget it. The wedding was absolutely beautiful, the food was fantastic and the celebration was amazing. The Ritz does wedding perfect. The room, well we got up at 7 AM and checked out.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and we are delighted you enjoyed your experience.  The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel is a fantastic place to enjoy a wedding or special occasion.  We apologize if your expectations were not met with the view from your guestroom.  We certainly intended for you to enjoy your complimentary upgrade.  When you return to the resort, please let us know and we will ensure your view is breathtaking.

Summary Heading: One of the most spectacular destinations ever!
Summary: We just returned from our 2nd visit to the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel.  From its breathtakingly beautiful ocean views to consistently outstanding customer service, this is the place for an unforgettable vacation experience.  Watching nightly sunsets, listening to the talented Ryan Heflin play guitar & sing, and enjoying delicious small plates at 180 Blu are just some of the ways memories are made here.  The Ritz's attention to detail is seen in its ever-changing lobby décor, complete with gorgeous fresh flowers, consistently innovative and high quality food from all hotel restaurants, and staff members who proactively & courteously identify & meet guests' needs.  The hotel offers a variety of activities on-site & they can advise guests on area attractions, as well.  If you enjoy
Manager Response: We enjoyed reading your very thoughtful and detailed review of our resort.  Thank you!  It was a pleasure having you with us and we are delighted to know you took home some wonderful memories.  We enjoy creating them as much as you enjoy leaving with them.  We look forward to your next visit. We have so much more to show you!

Summary: We have been Laguna lovers for a long time but nothing equals the feeling of bring pampered and well looked after by everyone at this resort.  Excellent service wherever you are! Smiles, kindness etc. beautiful beach at Monarch Bay with all services and facilities. The setting of this hotel is so gorgeous. It is wonderful for walking, reading ( lounge chairs everywhere), jogging or relaxing. Full service spa for those who are inclined. Excellent concierge service. Would return in a minute. Money well spent. Beautiful memories.
Manager Response: It warms our hearts to know you took home some wonderful memories after staying with us.  It is our highest mission to provide the finest service and facilities while creating an experience that will never be forgotten.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: They provided excellent services, from the Valet, Pool Attendants, Fitness Center staff  to Housekeeping.  The only negative comment that I can say is, my sisters and I asked for a room close to each other. I was told that they had put us on the same floor. When we got to our rooms, sure we were on the same floor but I was on the other side of the building. We were really annoyed but since we were in a hurry and had to unpack and get ready for a wedding rehearsal , we just left it as it is.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We hope the wedding was spectacular!  We hope to welcome you back again for some rest and relaxation soon.

Summary: I travel quite a bit, and have stayed in a fair share of luxury hotels. My husband and I are in our mid-thirties and recently visited Laguna Niguel for a work trip.   The location of this hotel was amazing. But the rooms resembled any other so-so hotel I've stated in previously. Not what I was expecting for the "Ritz-Carlton". And certainly not worth what we paid for to stay there.   The service was great. The food in each of the restaurants was great. And the views were amazing.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  It was a pleasure having you.  We are delighted you enjoyed our service, facilities, and magnificent surroundings.  We hope to have the opportunity to be of service to you again in the future.Thank you again for staying with us.

Summary Heading: Top notch service at the Ritz-with a coastal view
Summary: We received impeccable service at this Ritz-Carlton, from the valet, to the front desk and on with every staff person we encountered.  People were warm, helpful, courteous.  This is a smaller hotel than at other properties.  The coastal views were lovely - with great sunsets.  The food was not as good as some of their other properties.  This is a nice location south of Laguna - and the traffic, but close enough to enjoy restaurants and beaches from San Clemente to Newport.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We enjoyed having you.  We look forward to creating more wonderful memories for you in the future.  And of course, we will always have those gorgeous sunsets!

Summary: My husband and i spent three nights at the Ritz Carlton, Laguna Niguel CA. Unfortunately a complimentary upgrade was unavailable;however, the hotel graciously wavied our parking fee and sent champage and chocolate covered strawberries to our room.  The staff went out of their way to be gracious.  My husband had forgotten to make reservations for our anniversary dinner;however, both of the upscale resturants went out of their way to accomidate us.  We chose the steak house.   We were led to a table strewn with rose petals.  The food,esp. the steaks, was outstanding.  The service and the complimentary dessert were top drawer.   The pastry chef at the hotel is incredible.  Every pastry we tried was delicious.  The food throughout the hotel was well prepared and imaginative.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and Happy Anniversary!  Our outstanding team of ladies and gentlemen thrive on provide unique, memorable and personable experiences for our guests especially when celebrating a special occasion.  We look forward to spending many more with you in the future!

Summary Heading: A fabulous modern beauty with a dreamy feel
Summary: I've stayed at this hotel twice, and it's easy to get lost in its ambience and imagine extended stays. Sitting in the outdoor lounge area overlooking the magnificent Pacific Ocean view, a drink in hand at sunset, can put you in a dreamy mood that you won't want to end.   The staff is flawless and thoughtful. Forget your smartphone or computer charger? No problem. This might seem normal in a luxury hotel, but uniformly, the way your needs are met are the best it can be. Whether you want a great place for a business conference or just the perfect southern California getaway, this is the place.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  It is easy to enter a dream-like state of minid when you are a guest at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  Our highest mission is to not only meet your expectatoins but to exceed them.  And add in our magnificent surroundings...it's a homerun!

Summary Heading: Not the level of luxury we expected
Summary: Although a beautiful located resort we were quite disappointed. The rooms are a bit out of date and the shower really needs to be replaced. But most shocking was the food. The fist evening it was almost impossible to get some food, and the food we were served was really disappointing. Beef well done (?!), over salted, coffee ? expresso not the real thing but cheap machine stuff (what is management doing in this place, penny wise, pound foolish?), later that week we experienced omelets with too much cheese, a feta salad which hardly any feta (I think it was prepared for the rabbits in stead of guests) etc. Staff is very friendly, and we got the impression they are also unhappy  what is happening in this place.  But it is possible to have dinner in place like Watermark which is
Manager Response: We thank you for your visit and your time in posting a review.  On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we strive to provide the finest personal service and facilities for all of our valuable guests and we apologize if we failed to exceed your expectations.  We hope to have the opportunity to regain your faith in our resort in the near future.  Please contact the Executive Office directly if we may be of assistance.

Summary: This hotel is pure Ritz quality. Excellent service - we reached early (at 11am) and most hotels have a policy of not checking people in till 3pm - that staff was super nice - did not for a moment say anything about us being too early etc. Simply checked to see if rooms were available, upgraded us  to junior suites at no incremental cost. Rooms are Ritz quality as well - large, tastefully furnished with a large bathroom area. Surprisingly, the lobby bar is a happening scene. Highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  We are delighted you chose The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel as your luxury destination.  Will this be a new trend for you?  Welcome home!

Summary: Sometimes you read reviews on TripAdvisor and worry that the hotel you have chosen is not going to live up to the reputation of the brand or the naturally beautiful location. In the case of this hotel, everything (and I mean everything) about this hotel was fantastic. The location is obviously outstanding, but that is natures work. Everything else is a testament to the skill of Bruce Brainerd the General Manager and his team. From the moment we checked in we were treated magnificently and in particular by Clarita in Guest Services. The rooms were wonderfully appointed (only slight criticism is that the airconditioning units were sometimes a little noisy) and the views exceptional. Meals at Raya (breakfast and dinner) were of the highest quality and the service discrete and
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful feedback.  Our team strives for perfection every day and we are delighted to know your experience was a memorable one.  We look forward to our relationship with you in the future.  Come back soon!

Summary: We were looking for a good place to relax on the southern CA coast and found just what we needed at the Ritz.  It's majestic location, comfortable surroundings, friendly service and delicious food made for a great few days.  The pool had a fair number of children so it was not a quiet place on a Sunday, but during the week it was less hectic.  We loved catching the sunset over outdoor cocktails and over dinner at Raya and found no need to leave the property once we arrived.  We would recommend the Ritz as a great place to go to get away from it all.
Manager Response: You have found your great escape!  Thank you for staying with us.  We look forward to creating more memories for you in the future.

Summary Heading: Awesome hotel and food, wonderful place to visit, like heaven on earth
Summary: After reading several of the recent negative reviews about this property, I was a bit apprehensive. No worries, this property is goregous, the service is First Class, all the way. Comfort abounds in the plush rooms, food at the restaurants is top notch, and the service staff, from maid service to valets, to front desk, to servers, to bell staff, all were top notch and had real class. I felt special. Enjoy your stay! I plan to return one day, it is paradise on earth.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing us for your paradise.  We will never let you down!  Our ladies and gentlemen pride themselves on offering stellar service and creating life long memories.  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: A spectacular setting and first class service make this a very special place. I had heard from a number of friends that this place is very special, and now I can confirm that it is. My only regret is that my say was so short. I'll be back for sure!
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you with us and we are delighted you decided to stay with us. We look forward to your next visit and we promise to provide you with another special experience.

Summary: Stayed here for a second time this summer. Beautiful property and great location, but customer service, security, and food quality should be improved. Especially consider the brand image and prestige associated with the Ritz, I would expect stellar everything. My friend traveling with me had issues with poorly cleaned bathroom. My room had a security issue - the patio door (on ground floor) was left opened post housekeeping. Luckily nothing was stolen. The manager promised to send a certificate for stay as an apology...I've been waiting over 6 weeks for the certificate and doubt it will materialize. Also dined an Raya where our party sent back 3 items for being either over or under salted. For the comparable cost, I would consider St Regis (great customer service, beautiful
Manager Response: We thank you for your very valuable feedback.  We have listened and will use it immediately and constructively.  We hope to speak with you in person if you can contact our Executive Office. Thank you again and we certainly hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: We stayed overnight at the Ritz with their Pageant of the Master's package last week.  The hotel is beautiful, service outstanding and scenery breathtaking.  Check in isn't until 4pm so they took our cell phone number and called us when it was ready.  We walked around and had a drink and snack at the 180 outdoor restaurant.  Beautiful view of the ocean and they even brought us blankets to keep warm.....August at the beach in California can be COLD.  Food was fair at best. Our room was beautiful with a great coastal view. Love the separate vanities in the bathroom.  Shower power was great but was surprised to find a shower curtain instead of a door.  Shortly before we left for the Pageant they brought us two fleece blankets and a program for the show.  What a great surprise and
Manager Response: It sounds like you truly enjoyed our resort and surroundings.  We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: My husband and I just returned from a seven day stay at the Ritz Carlton.  We had a wonderful stay.  When we checked in I was told that our reservation started on 8/17/13 not 8/15/13  Michael was able to accomodate us for those extra two nights.  He also told me we were being upgraded to a king with a costal view.  I had my heart set on a room with an ocean view but was told that there were none available.  We went down to our room and it was nice but I still wanted that beautiful ocean view.  I went back up to the front desk and spoke with Samantha who, after some checking, told me that an ocean view room just opened up and walked me over to see it.  It was room 3502 and it was perfect.  We slept every night with the doors wide open and listened to the sound of the waves
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful comments and for staying with us.  Next time, we hope you can join us for more rest and relaxation with no work.  We will be sure to share your post with Camron and his team.  Thank you!

Summary: This Ritz has it all.  Beautiful rooms, excellent service, food is wonderful and the view is magnificent.  The resort fee covers many wonderful things including the pool toys for the kids, water and beach chairs and umbrellas for the beach, all complimentary unlike other hotels.  I will definitely go back to this hotel anytime.  Every penny is worth it. Superb!!!!
Manager Response: We couldn't agree with you more that our location is amazing.  Our staff takes great pride in being the leader in guest experiences and we thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for your luxury destination.  We look forward to creating more memories for you again soon!

Summary: As others have said, this is a luxery hotel in a beautiful location.  A high-end hotel with corresponding high prices, has much higher expectations and given those expectations, some areas fell a bit short on our family's five night stay.  Check in is at 4pm and when we arrived at 3:30 we were told there would be a bit of a wait and they would call our cell phone when the room was ready.  At 4:30, no call so I went to the front desk and was told that our room was ready but housekeeping hadn't up dated their list. A "have a drink on us while you wait" would have been nice. If you are getting Pagent of the Masters tickets through the hotel, be aware that there is a HUGE mark up.  We were initially charged $115 per ticket for tickets with a $65 face value!! (Although a hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and thank you for your feedback.  We greatly appreciate when our guests provide details of their experiences.  It is nice to hear from you and we have listened and shared your constructive comments. They are very helpful.  We hope we have an opportunity to be of service to you again in the future.  Please contact the Executive Office directly for any questions or assistance.  We would be delighted to speak with you.

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel with a Beach view
Summary: My first time in Laguna beach, staff were very friendly and helpful. we booked a room with a beach view, but the view was not so good. we asked the front desk to change the room and they respond and change it for us.  They have a public beach
Manager Response: We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us and that we were able to provide you with the best possible view available.  We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: We had a five day stay here.  Location is beautiful right above the beach. Pool and pool area is huge and always lots of space. The only downside was the fact that the only way to access the pool area was via walking along the board rooms area so walking in beach wear to suddenly navigate around business people was somewhat of a weird set up.  We stayed at Club Level and Penny Garcia is such a treasure. Great cocktails at the bar and snacks. Breakfast lacked a decent choice but was ok.   The carpet in our room was old and somewhat tatty which really stood out against the new interiors otherwise a good size.  Restaurants were great and its close to Newport and Laguna Beach. Overall a great end of trip
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  We are delighted you enjoyed your experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel and we hope to welcome you back again soon.  Your nice comments about Penni Garcia will be shared.  She is a gem!

Summary Heading: Luxury hotel for couples and families
Summary: As other reviewers have commented the grounds and views are quite beautiful.  I thought the interior of the hotel complimented the landscape with a light and modern California surfer design style - perhaps not quite as formal as other Ritz-Properties.  I enjoyed the ocean and surfing related artwork along the main corridors.  My family of four (two adults/1 tween/1 older child) was thrilled with a complimentary upgrade to a jr. suite.  We had one King, an enormous bathroom and closet, a second half bath and a pull-out sofa for the kids.  Housekeeping provided turn-down service every night and the kids were quite comfortable there.  This was the last leg of a weeklong stay in Southern California so we loved having the extra space!  This part of the trip for us was really about
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel as your luxury destination.  We enjoyed having!  It always gives us great pleasure to be able to surprise and delight our guests with a complimentary upgrade when it is available.  We are glad the suite gave you the extra space to make your children more comfortable.  We hope to see you again very soon!

Summary: We have been fortunate enough to stay in many Ritz hotels and we were disappointed with this one. The view is phenomenal and the common areas are beautiful but the rooms are dated and do not have the luxurious feeling of a Ritz. The staff is wonderful and the restaurants exceptional, but I won't stay here on my next trip back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest feedback.  We greatly appreciate hearing from our guests and take all comments seriously and constructively.  We can't agree with you more that our surroundings are magnificent.  And our ladies and gentlemen take great pride in offering an excellent level of service. If you have any additional feedback, we would love to hear it.  Please feel free to contact the Executive Office at any time.

Summary Heading: Grand estate; one of the best
Summary: I have stayed here numerous times, both on buisness and pleasure, I've been in suites, garden views, ocean views, and pool views, and always had a wonderful experience.  Situated high on a cliff with extensive well-laid out and maintained grounds, this large hotel feels like a grand Californian estate, yet has a cozy and warm feeling.   Staff is superb - from the valet through the pool guys. All the restaurants are very good, the view from Raya is fantastic.  We tried the steakhouse and were quite impressed.    We will always come back here.  Love it!
Manager Response: Thank you for your visit once again.  We enjoy creating new and memorable experiences for you each and every time you check-in.  Thank you for visiting enoSTEAK...it is fantastic isn't it? We look forward to your next reservation.  Welcome home!

Summary Heading: Vacation at the Ritz Carlton Dana Point, CA
Summary: Just returned from a five day stay at the Ritz Carlton Dana Point, Ca.  We arrived late Wednesday evening (10pm) after driving from LAX and were greeted promptly and warmly by the valet and front desk.  They had our room ready but couldn't accomodate our ocean-view request (although we booked it several months in advance).  To my surprise they did place a nice chocolate cupcake, chocolate dipped strawberries and champagne in our room in celebration of my wife's birthday!  Nice touch!  The room overlooked the pool with a nice balcony and was clean, plush, and comfortable.  The bed was extremely comfortable and there were water bottles provided daily.  The only complaint was the air conditioning unit whcih kept us up all night as it was noisy and truly inefficient.  Eventually, we
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and truly enjoying every aspect of our magnificent surroundings.  We couldn't agree with you more that all of our views are special.  We look forward to welcoming you back and hope your next Ritz-Carlton experience is another memorable Ritz-Carlton experiece.

Summary: This is our second visit to the Ritz in Dana Point.  The place is more beautiful than we remembered.  We simply love it here (2 adults + 2 kids)!  The Club Level staffs are outstanding!  Diane had made our stay so memorable.  She went above and beyond to make sure we're comfortable.  What a gem!!  We’ll be returning next year!
Manager Response: We couldn't agree with you more that Diane is a gem!  We are delighted you enjoyed your return visit and that we were able to surprise and delight you again.  We look forward to creating more memorable experiences for you in the near future.  Come back soon.

Summary Heading: Wonderful location but it isn't everything!
Summary: The hotel is absolutely beautiful and the view is unsurpassed!  Our family has stayed at many other Ritz Carlton locations and we were expecting the service to be consistent with previous resorts. We were wrong... We arrived on Saturday and given a room with a king... no problem except that we are a family of four!! (2 adults,2 teens)We had requested 2 doubles and confirmed the request several times...as late as the Friday before we arrived when we received an email from the on-duty manager asking our arrival time. Off we go to our room, small but manageable, with 2 roll away beds. When the beds are set up there is no walking room so I asked housekeeping to come back and ready the beds while we were at dinner...around 9 pm, was given a yes, no problem. We returned to find the
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed comments and feedback regarding your recent stay at our resort. We intended for your your visit to be beyond your expectations and we apologize if we let you down. We are delighted to know you will be returning in the near future and we want to ensure your next Ritz-Carlton experience is a true Ritz-Carlton experience.  When you have an opportunity, we would love to hear from you.  Feel free to contact the Executive Office directly to further discuss your concerns.

Summary Heading: Excellent location for a family vacation
Summary: We stayed at the Ritz for four days on a recent family vacation. The views from the hotel are amazing and there are so many different areas to hangout and enjoy the scenery that you simply cannot get bored. Staff were very good and tried hard to remember names, but there was a lot of traffic which made it difficult. Fitness centre was ok - small for a hotel of this size and you had to pick your times to get on the machines that you wanted - but the views from the fitness centre were fantastic ... who needs to watch television when you can gaze out on to the Pacific Ocean? Rooms were spacious and our two rooms both had balconies. Spa was very expensive ... probably the most expensive I have seen at a hotel ... it meant that we didn't really bother - but it seemed very busy so I
Manager Response: Thank you for your very detailed review of your recent experience with us.  We greatly appreciate your comments and use them constructively.  We are delighted to know you enjoyed your stay, the guestrooms and fantastic surroundings.  Summer in Laguna is always a wonderful and very popular time of year to visit.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon for another memorable experience.  Thank you again for your feedback.

Summary Heading: Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel - Great Customer Service
Summary: It seems odd but I'm already writing a review of the Ritz just based on the customer service I have received.  Casey was amazing as she guided me to the perfect room for my 20th wedding anniversary.  She was patient and kind and so enthusiastic about setting up a perfect day.  Thanks so much Casey!
Manager Response: Thank you for your post.  We will take them any time you want to provide them!  We are delighted to recognzie Casey on your behalf.  Thank you!

Summary Heading: Nice but our experience was not 5 star
Summary: First off this hotel is in an excellent location with spectacular views and perched above a beautiful beach.  The rooms are very nice if a bit small as it is an older hotel that has been updated.  The lobby and shops spectacular.  Restaurants good.  Everything here is 5 star.  What wasn't 5 star was our service.  It wasn't bad but much more typical of a 3-4 star hotel.    Some examples: We went to the main pool, which is actually pretty nice and large for a 5 Star pool.    Not a sole talked to us or offered to help us.  It took me about 5-10 minutes just to find a towel.  The pool bar was in process of closing about 4:30.  Guy said they were closed.  OK but a few minutes later a group came down and he re-opened.  At least he gave us some drinks.  Second day at the pool a little
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel as your luxury destination.  It was a pleasure having you with us.  We greatly appreciate your valuable feedback.  We are delighted that you enjoyed our location and facilities, yet we are so sorry to have let you down in our outlets.  We would enjoy learning more about your experience.  If you have a moment to contact our Executive Offices, it would be wonderful to speak with you.  Thank you again for your visit and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: It doesn't get any better.  The location is amazing.  Service, including EVERY person we encountered, is obviously lavish.  They just can't do enough for you.  The views, especially from the rooftop lounge are nothing short of amazing. Will be back for vacation, this having a trip for a conference.  This hotel cannot be beaten in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for enjoying our resort!  The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel is a very special destination and all of our ladies and gentlemen take great pride in offering excellent service and creating memorable experiences.  We look forward to your next visit.....one of relaxation and not business this time.  See you soon!

Summary: Concierge Samantha took great care of us with a car, recommendations & more. Our ocean view room was spotless and taken care of perfectly. Wish the outdoor bar with fire pits stayed open past 10 PM. This is our second stay and we will be back.
Manager Response: Thank you taking the time to commend Samantha and all our ladies and gentlemen for the experience we created for you. We are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to welcoming you back again very soon.

Summary: I was at this property for a conference and it was fantastic.  The property has a very secluded feel to it despite being a short distance away from the action of Dana Point / Laguna.  Nice pathways to the beach.  Easy walk (2 miles) to the harbor.  Enjoyed the balcony that overlooked the ocean.  The design was minimalist, nothing to overwhelming.  I expected a little more decadence for being a Ritz-Carlton.  Excellent restaurants on the property.  Only complaint was I had a terrible time getting consistent cell phone reception within the room.  I would definitely stay here again hope I get the opportunity to do so soon.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you with us!  We hope you have a chance to return for a non-business related trip soon.  We are glad you enjoyed the true ambiance of our natural surroundings.  We look forward to creating another memorable experience for you in the near future.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary Heading: Beautiful grounds and views, but overpriced for the level of service that you get
Summary: While it has a beautiful building and grounds and all of the staff were very friendly; truthfully, I was not overwhelming impressed with the service. Upon check-in (and after calling previously in the week to confirm) the front desk assured me that all feather and goose down had been removed from the room (I am highly allergic). When we went to the room, none of it had been removed. We only had a bit of time to get ready before dinner so having to deal with this issue was very annoying. And speaking of dinner, we had requested a cab 45 minutes before we needed it. Upon our arrival at 5 pm for our cab, we were informed it hadn't been called, but one cab had showed up at 5:10 and we could share it with two other people - thus making us late for our dinner reservations in Laguna.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your detailed feedback.  We are always grateful to hear from our guests and we receive all comments and concerns constructively.  We apologize for our service inconsistencies and have taken them to heart.  We are always saddened to learn we have not provided the most excellent service possible.  We strive each day to exceed our guests' expectations and offer exceptional experiences.  If you wish to discuss your visit with a member of our executive team, please reach out to the hotel directly.  Thank you.

Summary: We come back every year for a conference in July and the Ritz never disappoints. For me, sitting in an adirondack chair with a book, on the grass on a cliff overlooking the beach is always the highlight of my stay.  The creative and beautiful lobby floral arrangements is something I always look forward to before we arrive.  The cliff location with beautiful beach view really makes this hotel special!
Manager Response: We enjoy having you visit us each summer!  It is so peaceful on our adirondak chairs overlooking the Pacific Ocean.  Thank you for embracing our ambience and we look forward to surprising and delighting you each time you visit.

Summary Heading: Marriott Corp is bleeding the legacy of a great Ritz dry
Summary: Been coming here, off and on, for 20 plus years.  Changes have never been anything but 'how could we generate more revenue out of this property?'  Three things make a great hotel - location, physical offerings, and service.  This hotel could not be a better location.  A+.  The hotel is dated, cold and the rooms are worn out.  No water pressure, thin walls - really thin.  Small standard rooms (we've stayed at suites before), noisy HVAC.  Overpriced and underwhelming food offerings.  Ah, but the service?  Cold from many young staffers.  Older legacy Ritz folks better but sad.  Morale is horrible.   Policies such as asking for our room and name before any meal makes you feel like another attendee at a convention.  Food trays left too long in hallways.  It goes on and on.  Like an
Manager Response: On behalf of our resort and brand, we thank you for your feedback.  It is always a pleasure to hear from our valuable guests.  Our ladies and gentlemen strive to provide the most attentive and exceptional service that we have built a legacy on.  They take great pride in working for The Ritz-Carlton Hotel Company.  We hope to have an opportunity to provide you with your next luxury experience or one in the near future.  We would welcome the opportunity to discuss your visit further.  If this is of interest to you, please reach out to the Executive Office directly.  Thank you.

Summary: After a slight stumble when we first arrived, this property proved why people rave about it.  From a marvelous greeting from the Valet & Bell staff, to Samantha at the front desk, and perhaps the greatest Club Lounge staff on the planet, including Colleen, they worked to make us comfortable.  Club floor food and beverage was great, nice breakfast selections, light lunches and dinner, and decadent evening desserts.  The staff made us feel comfortable and appreciated.  It was a bit cool for the beach, but the pool was amazing, our server Shea was sweet and prompt!  Wish we had spent our entire vacation there!  Location, location, location cannot be beat!
Manager Response: We wish you would have spent your entire vacation here too!  Thank you for visiting us. Our highest mission is to ensure your comfort and exceed your expectations.  We look forward to welcoming you back for your next vacation!

Summary: Love love this restaurant - came here in March for dinner and it did not disappoint.  The food is divine so was the service.  Was here 2 years ago and although the name has changed - the quality is still tops!  Dana Point Ritz Carlton is the best in class.
Manager Response: We hope you had the opportunity to experience each of our wonderful dining options during your visit.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel and we look forward to welcoming you back again very soon.

Summary Heading: Overcrowded and not relaxing. Better nights at a super 8.
Summary: Arrived today. Waited over 15 minutes to check in. Wasn't offered water as is usual at Ritz. Reception did not give directions to the room. The room is quite the distance. Could have used a shuttle.   Went to bar..waitress was so slow we had a chat with table next to us about slow service. When food arrived it was good but mussels come with toast points but had to ask three times for it and still never came.   Dinner at 9 was earliest reservation available. Restaurant is in an extended hallway. When sun is down there is no ambience. Food came and was so spicy it was inedible.   Returned to room. Bed was turned dow. But just one chocolate and one robe. Yeah do I split that with my wife?  Worst is I could make out the dialogue of the movie the next room was watching. So loud.
Manager Response: We are saddened to hear of your experience and we certainly never wanted to let you down.  All of our ladies and gentlemen's highest mission is provide stellar and memorable service to each of our valuable guests.  Your comments have been shared with our executive team and we hope to speak with your directly.  Please feel free to contact the Executive Office directly at your earliest convenience.  Thank you for your feedback.

Summary: We spent a night here and over all, I found the staff to be professional but a little bit on the "cool" side- The resort was extremely busy at the time and we found the whole environment to be a bit of a zoo and not so relaxing perhaps as it was over the holidays. The resort was also a little bit run down and we were not ultra impressed with the rooms. There is nothing really wrong with it but given the fairly high prices, we were hoping that the resort would be nicer. Our stay overall was decent but were slightly disappointing given our perhaps overly high expectations. The views were however lovely and overall, I think this is better for family vacations rather than romantic getaways.
