Manager Response: We couldn't agree with you more that our ocean facing rooms with outdoor fire places are extraordinary.  At The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel, we embrace the Pacific Ocean and all it has to offer.  Sitting on your patio listening to the waves crash against the shore, and watching the magnificent sunsets while toasting marshmellows has become a favorite memory for our guests. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  Thank you for your choosing our resort.

Summary: It was a memorable stay. It was a perfect celebration of life and the good things in So California. It is not cheap, but you really feel why they call it a Ritz Carlton. It is just wonderful to sit and watch the sunset or the surfers on the beach. I read, rested and forgot about work and problems. If you can afford it, go for it. No regrets at all.
Manager Response: It was wonderful to have you with us!  Thank you for truly experiencing our Ritz-Carlton mystique.  We look forward to creating many more memorable experiences for you in the future.

Summary: We had a great birthday celebration for mom last June for her 80th birthday. Family and friends just raved about last year's party so we did it again. I am not sure what makes our stay the best, the property for it's fantastic for views and ambiance or the exceptional staff and service they provide. Either way if you didn't have a wonderful stay at the property you might need a reality check. Of course it does help if you stay on the club level (and have a suite with a view), where service is just another notch above the already high standard. You can relax by the beautiful pool area or play tennis, beach, surf bike.  Sorry about the loud noise to other guests for our party in the RC suite. We had a Frank Sinatra singer come in from 8:30-9:30 and apparently some people are early
Manager Response: It was wonderful having you all with us again.  We couldn't agree with you more that our exclusive Club Level offers the best possible experience within our resort as well as our entire brand.  Thank you for your loyalty!  We will ensure every repeat visit is as good as the last. Come back soon!

Summary: We arrived about 9 on a Sunday which isn't that late and had to eat in what can only be described as a corridor- pretty much sums up our experience for the rest of the two days. I didn't think the service was very good- it was okay in the coffee shop but no better than any other Starbucks which is effectively what that is. The long barren corridor from reception to the dining area is cold and impersonal and serves little purpose.  The rooms are tired and we had to walk for about ten minutes to get to our suite. The service around the pool was a bit slow, at the beach fine and in the bar overlooking the beach really awful. On the plus side - the reception, valet and concierge staff were good but overall it was a disappointing experience and we won't go back. Probably best suited
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel as your destination.  We realize you have many choices in luxury experience and we are thankful for your business.  The feedback you have provided is very valuable and we have taken it seriously.  Thank you for your time in providing a review of our resort.  We would welcome an opportunity to speak with you directly if you have a chance to contact us in the Executive Office.  We hope to see you again soon as well.

Summary Heading: Great property, great service, but very crowded.
Summary: My wife and I stayed at the Ritz to celebrate our anniversary.  First the good;  The hotel is on a beautiful piece of property overlooking the ocean.  The views from the hotel are amazing - an abundance of marine life, surfers, sunsets, and gorgeous coastline.  The view alone is almost worth the price of admission.  I also have to give top ratings to the hotel staff; without exception the staff was friendly, attentive, and helpful.  Clearly the staff had been well-coached on providing great service.  Also, the food at the in-hotel restaurants is fantastic.  No need to travel outside the grounds for top-shelf dining.  Then the not-so-good:  Tons of kids, barking dogs, late-night party-ers, and an only-so-so room.  Our "coastal view" room overlooked the grounds where it seemed
Manager Response: Happy Anniversary to you!  Thank you for your valuable time in providing a review of our iconic resort.  We greatly appreciate your feedack.  Our ladies and gentlemen take great pride in providing an incredibly personable and memorable experience for each of our guests that enters our doors.  We are delighted you enjoyed your visit overall.  Perhaps we will have the opportunity to create more memories for you during a time of lower occupancy.  If we can be of any assistance to you in the future, please contact the Executive Office directly.

Summary Heading: Dated hotel with small rooms, dismal bathrooms, poor lighting, and untrained young staff
Summary: This hotel is not a five star hotel-- Rooms are very dated and small with terrible bathrooms (shower curtains with no separate bathtub and old toilets), older carpets and furnishings, and little lighting or natural light.  This hotel was really not 5 star hotel or 5 star experience at all.  The staff, though nice, are very young, inexperienced, and not well-trained. Shockingly, when we asked for recommendations on a local fish restaurant, the only response over and over was Chart House --how uncreative and so 1990.  When we asked about golf, they were clueless on any recommendations.  The Valet ($35/day is exorbitant) was such a crowded cluster**** with the parkers having a "domestic dispute" (their term, not mine) at one point, it was stressful and unprofessional.  The line for
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your detailed feedback regarding your recent experience at our resort.  We greatly appreciate your comments and they have been shared with our entire executive team for analysis so we may coach our ladies and gentlemen in the appropriate manner.  It sounds as if we have let you down.  We intended for your experience to be incredible and beyond your expectations.  May we ask that you contact the Executive Office directly to further discuss your concerns and recommendations?  Thank you for taking the time to provide a review of our services and facilities.  We value your opinion!  On behalf of all of our team, we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you and your family back for a much more memorable experience.

Summary: quite possibly the nicest hotel i've stayed. well worth the $$$$. wonderful views of the Pacific from several different points. hotel is very well staffed and all of them are friendly & respectful. we were there with a wedding party and stayed 2 days.... wish we had time for more! plenty of dining options.
Manager Response: We are delighted that you enjoyed your first experience with us.  We hope you choose to return year after year.  Thank you for your visit!

Summary: My wife and I stayed at this Ritz-Carlton so that we could attend the nearby Pageant of the Masters show. The free shuttle was a real plus. As always, everyone was friendly and welcoming. The oceanfront room had a beautiful view. When I asked about the not overly salted smoked salmon at breakfast, the chef came out and gave me all the information about it, along with his card. It's all the staff, especially Penny (sp?) and her staff in the club level lounge, that went the extra mile to make this a great mini vacation.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you with us again!  Thank you for your visit.  Wasn't the Pageant of the Masters show phenomenal?  Of course we will share your kind words with Penni and her team, and  we look forward to creating many more memorable experiences for you again soon.

Summary: We were there for the 4thof July long weekend . The hotel was nice , we stayed in a ocean view fireside room. room 1002, the room was alittle tired , the bathroom had duck tape holding the pipe of the sink togather. The views from are room was amazing. Beautiful sunsets . The hotel was crowded and resturant waits for dinner was long . At one point none of the resturants could accomadate us and we ended up just eating in the bar, after waiting a half hour to find 2 seats.Roomservice was very slow . service was in all slow , waited 2 hours for towels and a hairdryer. that was after 3 phonecalls practically begging for them to bring it. i cant say this is the best hotel , but it  was nice . Im not sure when i go back to cali if i would choose this hotel, but i would not rule it out
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna nIguel to celebrate the holiday.  It was a pleasure having you and your family with us.  Of course we would be delighted to welcome you back any time and ensure that you have a fantastic stay.  Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding our service inconsistencies.  We will definitely use this feedback constructively.  Thank you again for letting us know and we look forward to creating a more memorable experience for you in the future.  Please contact the Executive Office directly for assistance.

Summary: Went there for 4th of July it was perfect good value they had our room ready early could not of been happier Laguna niguel cheesed out on the fireworks show was much shorter than Laguna Huntington we could see them all from our room
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us for the 4th of July holiday.  It was a great time to be a guest of The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna NIguel.  Will this be an annual tradition?  We look forward to creating your next memorable experience and hope you return soon.

Summary: This is the place to stay if you're going to vacation in Laguna beach. I stayed here for a few nights for an event and everything went smoothly. Everything from the beautiful views of the city to the food and attentive staff just can't be beat. We had a garden view room. The rooms were always clean and the beds super comfy. Try ordering room service for breakfast and eat by the balcony while overlooking the city. Breathtaking. I highly recommend this Ritz Carlton.
Manager Response: It was wonderful having you!  We hope you have reason to join us again soon!  We look forward to creating another memorable experience for you.  Thank you for posting your feedback.  We greatly appreciate it.

Summary Heading: Fabulous Hotel with great views and service!
Summary: This is by far the best hotel I have stayed at.  We stayed club level which was worth every penny.  My kids could run down and eat when they were hungry, grab drinks, and snacks.  They were very accommodating with food for my 3 children. The service was fantastic.  I didn't feel like they nickel and dime for everything.  We attended a complimentary Thursday night movie at the pool with free popcorn which was a lot of fun.  They have boogie boards, umbrellas and chairs at the beach.  They will also drive you up and down the steep hill on a golf cart which was great for my mom.  We never left the hotel.  We had no reason to as we were in heaven.  Only mistake was not staying longer.
Manager Response: It was wonderful to have you and your family of all ages. Happy kids make happy parents!  Thank you for truly experiencing our resort offerings.  We hoped you wouldn't have to leave the property for any reason and you didn't!  We enjoyed creating memories for all of you and we look forward to creating more for you in the future.  Come back soon!

Summary Heading: Very good value on Club floor
Summary: We very much enjoyed our stay at this Ritz.  As we've come to expect, the staff are exceptional in the hospitality trade, from Naples to Battery Park to New Orleans and now the property in Laguna.  Special recognition to Diane in the Club, a true gem.  And that is not to diminish the other Club staffers, we just interacted with her more than the others.  Be aware there are some issues that preclude this from being an excellent experience.  The Club level rooms are average size as hotel rooms go, nothing extravagant here, and the Club room itself, though it has some nice balcony seating, is rather small and the breakfast offerings are limited, though the pastries are top shelf.    A shining light at this property is the catering staff, we had a number of functions on the hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel Club Level for your recent visit.  We enjoyed having you and providing you with a unique, memorable and personable experience.  We are very proud of all our ladies and gentlemen and the dedication and loyalty they have to our resort, brand, and valuable guests.  We look forward to welcoming you back again very soon.

Summary: This is one of the (if not the) best hotels we have ever stayed at - and I travel for a living. The hotel is situated on top of a cliff with spectacular views of the ocean and beach below. As you wander the resort one view is better than the next. The hotel entrance and lobby are beautiful with a stunning display of fresh flowers. On check-in we were greeted by name and then upgraded to an ocean view room. We spent extra on a club level room and it was worth every dime. The club level provides four presentations of food daily with drinks included. The food was incredible, especially the late night deserts. A club level concierge was available all day to attend to anything we needed. Penni, Beth and Colleen on the club level were fantastic and provided amazing service. The room
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  We couldn't agree with you more that our ocean front, exclusive Club Level rooms are simply the best.  Our Club Level experience ranks amongst the best in the world.  Our ladies and gentlemen will be proud to read your post.  Thank you! We look forward to creating more memories for you in the future.  Welcome home!

Summary: This was our last stop on a week long 25th wedding anniversary trip.  We spent two nights at the Cosmopolitan in Las Vegas, two nights at the Hilton San Diego Bayfront, and two nights at the Ritz-Carlton in Dana Point.  As with the other two hotel rooms we were hoping for an upgrade but we were going to be satisfied with the garden view room we booked since it was pricey enough. We did call the day before to verify our reservation, and to tell them that it was our 25th wedding anniversary and we would really like a nice view.  They said they would make a note of it, but couldn't promise anything.  We checked in on a Sunday afternoon around 2 PM.  Kasey was the manager on duty that checked us in.  He was so friendly and treated us like we were their only guests.  We were upgraded
Manager Response: We were sad to see you go also!  However we know you took some wonderful memories home with you for your 25th anniversary.  We hope to have you with us again soon.  Thank you for your delightful comments about our ladies and gentlemen.  They will be thrilled!  Thank you for your visit!

Summary: Such a beautiful property with breath taking views on the cliff at Dana Point; over looking the Salt Creek beach below.  They have a little rec stand down at the beach with all the toys for the kids, umbrellas, chairs, boogie boards, you name it and they probably have it.  This was a summer vacation and our daughters even commented to my wife and I how "nice" all of the staff was.  Because we just came from a different hotel in San Diego and my wife noticed the difference in the hospitality immediately upon arrival when the valet attendant (Patrick) opened her door and greeted her and remembered our names the rest of the trip.  Patrick was also very helpful with info on Laguna and where to get some good sushi.   They also have a super cool little joint in the RItz called The
Manager Response: Thank you for your visit!  Our ladies and gentlemen take great pride in remembering all of our guests and ensuring each one leaves with a unique, memorable, and personalized experience.  We look forward to creating more memories for you in the near future.  We would welcome the opportunity to send our seasonal eNewsletter to you.  If you are interested, please send us an email to:  donna.bond@ritzcarlton.com with the word eNewsletter in the subject line.

Summary: I've stayed at this hotel a few time's but it's been 5 years since my last stay.  Happy to say that the hotel is still wonderful.   You just can't beat the views here.  So many places at the hotel that you can sit and enjoy the ocean.   Fourth floor club level is really nice and has great appetizers and good selection of drinks.   Service is top notch, attentive staff and very friendly.  Only reason I didn't give it an excellent is because the standard rooms are small (garden view rooms are dark) and the suites need to be updated.  Overall great stay and would highly recommend, you get what you pay for at the Ritz and it's well worth it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your visit!  We hope you truly enjoyed your experience on our exclusive Club Level.  We enjoyed having you and hope to welcome you back very soon.  Thank you for your feedback.  We have heard you and will use it constructively.

Summary Heading: Stay at the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel
Summary: Outstanding hotel, it stands on a cliff overlooking the ocean, the views are incredible, surfers riding the waves on salt creek beach below. Raya restaurant overlooks the ocean magnificent sunsets and good food, very romantic. The staff are fantastic, especially in club where they are outstanding. The hotel is really worth a visit, the atmosphere is stunning.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your visit.  You were a long way from home!  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  If you would be interested in receiving our eNewsletter, please email the word eNewsletter in the subject line to donna.bond@ritzcarlton.com.

Summary Heading: Our favorite place to stay in the area!
Summary: Very classy hotel, certainly one of our favorite Ritz Carlton properties! Can't beat the location! Service, of course, is perfect. Stayed on the Club Level and our room was very large with a large balcony overlooking the ocean. The food on the Club Level was beautifully displayed and delicious, and it was nice to get a cup of tea whenever we wanted. The outside bar is the place the take pictures at sunset, such a beautiful setting. Loved the gym with the great views as we used the cardio machines. The outdoor yoga class, with the great view and the sound of the ocean, was very good and therapeutic. The yoga instructor even e-mailed me a picture of me doing a pose, very thoughtful! Will be back when we are in the area!
Manager Response: We enjoy going above and beyond to ensure our guests feel very special.  We look forward to creating more memorable experiences for you in the future.  Thank you for your loyalty!  If you would be interested in receiving our eNewsletter, please email the word eNewsletter in the subject line to donna.bond@ritzcarlton.com.

Summary Heading: One of the best hotels I've ever seen!
Summary: Perfect in every way! Every meal, including banquet meals, were great, the rooms were quiet, comfortable, and luxurious, and there are few more beautiful settings. Worth every penny, so I'm glad someone else was paying!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  It was our pleasure having you.  Perhaps you will be back again soon for some personal r&r?

Summary Heading: Service deserves the Ritz Carlton "legendary" tag; beautiful in every way
Summary: My first stay at a Ritz Carlton was in St. Louis.  The service was very nice, but frankly I wondered what all the fuss was about.  The RC Laguna Niguel made me understand.  The service is outstanding without ever being in the way.    I recently stayed at the Del Coranado in San Diego -- despite the Del's "natural" advantages in location and iconic architecture, the RC Laguna Niguel is head and shoulders above.  Although LN has resort type facilities, I never felt like I was staying in a busy resort.  Everything felt quiet and uncrowded.    I was amused to read another review suggesting that the gym was perhaps a little small.   If you use that gym and do not find it stunning, as Samuel Johnson said of those tired of  London, I think you are tired of life.    I will confess to
Manager Response: We couldn't agree with you more! Our surroundings are stunning!  Thank you for staying with us.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: I have no doubt the many 5 circle ratings are warranted.  Our stay for 2 nights as part of a business reward trip had some regretable hiccups.  Let me start with the obvious positives, facilities are first class, location is as others have described inspiring and the grounds are beautiful.  It is a little bit of walk to the beach, but they have golf cart service to assist.  Food at both our catered events and in the on-site steakhouse (enoSTEAK) were as you would expect, very good.  Hiccups- after 5 days in LA had to submit some overnight dry cleaning.  Called a few hours after it was due back.  They assured me that it was in my second closet and would call me back. I will spare you the details, but they did find it in another closet some 24 plus hours later.  A manager - Robert
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed and honest feedback.  We greatly appreciate it.  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay overall and we will ensure your next stay is flawless.

Summary: For all the hotels that wish they could say their service was superlative...this particular establishment should be considered the benchmark by which other places are graded on a percentage basis. So if you can find a hotel that can provide service, facilities and location which would come to 90% of what you will find here...book it as it will be exquisite. Just not as exquisite as the Ritz. Only other place I've stayed that would compare in service...the Waldorf Astoria in Chicago. But believe me when I say the view here is much better. Try one of the rooms with it's own fireplace on the patio. Yeah...
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words.  Our ladies and gentlemen take great pride in providing a level of personalized service that ranks amongst the best in the world.  We are proud to be a part of legendary brand, Ritz-Carlton.  We look forward to creating more memorable experiences for you in the future.  Welcome home!

Summary Heading: Beautiful and inspiring location, great gym; sometimes slow service
Summary: Spent a week at the Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel (@ Dana Point).  Pulling up to the hotel late at night, I was greeted well by both the valet and front desk and could already feel the wave of relaxation overcome me. Nice job.  The room (third floor, ocean view) was spacious and well-decorated, with sleek but not modern white furniture.  Balcony overlooked the ocean, but was not secure relative to the adjacent rooms (a miss).  Refrigerator was tucked away inside a mirrored column which was quite clever.  Bathroom had dual sinks, amenities by Asprey London.  Bed was comfortable enough for many great nights' sleep (you have to call if you want linens changed every day) and the lighting was well designed with controls throughout the room.  Besides the obvious incredible pool and beach
Manager Response: Thank you for your visit and your feedback.  We greatly appreciate the opportunity to serve you.  We are delighted you enjoyed your overall experience and you will be back with your family one day soon.  We look forward to your next arrival and will be sure to create more wonderful memories for you!

Summary: We stayed at the Ritz Carlton on Memorial Day weekend (like we did last year).  Below is our take on the resort.  1.  Sunday Champagne brunch .  Our server, Matthew Donoghue provided 5star service.  He was very attentive and personable.  I highly recommend you request him to be your server.  We couldn't have asked for better service.    2.  Room - we took our 2 Labs & the room was nice but the patio - well we were on the corner right by the public beach access, so people would look in room and/or while we were drinking our Wine some people would make a comment like I'll take a glass as they walked or rode their bicycle by.   We are social but would like a little bit more privacy.  3.    180blu - Great view - but when they are busy, plan on waiting about 5-10mins for someone to
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty!  The resort is a great place to be on holiday weekends.  How did your two labs enjoy their stay with us?  We enjoy making our furry friends as happy as they can be while they are visiting.  Will everyone return soon?  We look forward to it!

Summary: Stayed for 4 nights at the club level. Wonderful staff and great food. The spa is beautiful and the gym overlooks the ocean......just a wonderful view. You can relax on the foyer and enjoy the waves and watch the surfers all day long. Great trail for walking or biking. We had the best time. Can't wait to go back.
Manager Response: And we can't wait to have you back!  Thank you for staying with us.  Did you take a few fond memories home with you?

Summary: We had our son's wedding and rehearsal dinner at the Ritz-Carlton Dana Point, CA and many family and guests stayed at the property over 5/31-6/3, 2013.  This hotel is located on a bluff with magnificient views perfect for weddings and other events but what impressed all of us was the incredible staff.  From the moment we were greeted, they could not have done more.  With engaging smiles and accommodating willingness to see to our every need it was the people there who made the stay exceptional.  The rooms were comfortable, clean and fresh with nice terraces and quality soft goods.  Grounds were beautifully groomed.  Food and drinks were exceptionally good whether for our events or a quick meal in the bar, cafe or dining room. But, again may I say it is well run with a great
Manager Response: Congratulations once again!  It was an honor and a privilege to be the host for your son's wedding.  Our ladies and gentlemen take great pride in providing memorable experiences for each of our valuable guests, and we are delighted your stay with us was flawless.  We hope to see you again very soon whether it be for a future celebration or simply R&R. Thank you for your business!

Summary Heading: Stunning location and fantastic customer service
Summary: This stay was a surprise for my girlfriend's birthday. From the first moment I walked into the lobby and was greeted by name I knew this hotel would provide the right touch.  I advised the front staff of the occasion and was upgraded to an ocean view room.  I went back to the beach where the birthday celebration was going on, and afterwards walked up the long road to the front of the hotel taking in the spectacular view - with the pretense of going to the bar for a drink.  I ran into the same customer service manager who I had spoken to earlier on, and he had asked how we were enjoying our stay at the hotel.  To be honest this was the best way I could have thought to break the surprise to my gf that we were spending the night!  We opened the door to our room and were thrilled
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for such a momentous occasion!  We enjoyed creating a memorable experience for you.  Could this be the start of a yearly tradition?  We hope so!  You will pleased to know our sauna is now in tip top shape and we hope you have the opportunity to enjoy it again soon.

Summary: we stayed at the hotel over the memorial day weekend which might have made things worse, nevertheless, this was the poorest of the ritz carltons we experienced to date- and we've done a few. Key points: - average room, tight balcony, nice view over bay and neighbour -at same time - best western style pool: too small compared to the size of the hotel, completely full of kids jumping in the water, impossible to find a chair, annoying music in the background, completely average and overpriced food (fake crab sushi anyone?); the "other" pool was too small and too crowded. jazuzzi-full of sand and with a handicaped chair making it completely unattractive; completely unstylish, geared to the masses - car valet service a nightmare; 30 min wait (after calling for the car from the room);
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback.  We greatly appreciate it and take it seriously and constructively.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We hope we have the opportunity to provide you with a more memorable experience in the future.  Please contact the Executive Office directly for your next reservation. We are delighted to assist you.

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel but not impressed with the room
Summary: This hotel has a major wow factor. Set high, right on the edge of a bluff overlooking an active ocean and beach scene, it is hard not to be impressed with the location of this property.  The public spaces of the hotel are also very impressive. These areas are glamorous and elegant and make you feel like you are staying at a top hotel with a stunning location.  Then you get to your room and that feeling fades away.  We stayed in an ocean front room on the club level.  Although the room was a little small for a deluxe hotel, good design could have compensated for this, but that is not the case here. There is nothing truly wrong with the room.  It is just that given the look of the rest of the hotel and the price paid, the rooms are disappointing.  The soft blue and grey colors
Manager Response: Thank you for your very detailed feedback.  We greatly appreciate it.  We always enjoy seeing our guests' photos as well.  We are delighted you enjoyed your overall experience with us, and especially all that our beautiful surrounding have to offer.  We couldn't agree with you more that the Pacific Ocean is the most magnificent decor of all!  If we may be of assistance to you at any time, please contact the Executive Offices directly.

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for!
Summary: To whom this may concern,  After the experience my wife and I just had at your hotel in Laguna, I felt obligated to inform your management team of what an amazing staff you have at that location!  From the moment we stepped up to the front desk, your attendant Becca was very warm and welcoming to my wife and I.  She lined everything up for us rather quickly and in the same breath, explained to us what the Ritz had to offer and how great the room service was.  So we followed Becca's advise and ordered room service right away since we arrived fairly late; not only did our food arrive promptly but it tasted great too!  After we ate, we had a minor technical difficulty with the movie were had ordered so Becca sent the engineers up immediately.  I can't remember their names but
Manager Response: What a testament this is for our ladies and gentlemen!  Thank you!  They will be thrilled to know they were mentioned in your post on Trip Advisor.  We are delighted you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope we have created memories for you that will last a lifetime.  We look forward to welcoming you back to your new home away from home.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary: I just returned from a 3 night stay at the Ritz Carlton in Laguna Niguel, for a work incentive trip. The views/property is beautiful and it was great to be so close to the beach and jogging paths. I stayed in a pool view room and the room was nice (a bit on the small size) but the bathroom was all marble and quite spacious. The staff were in general extremely attentive and the attention to detail was excellent. There were a few challenges (ie. told that the shuttle to downtown was easy to hop on, open-air- which was not the case, it was the city bus and 20 minutes late), pool services was extremely timely as they were understaffed for a busy holiday weekend.   In general, I would definitely stay there again and worth the price.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We hope you have a chance to return for a non-business related trip so you can truly rest and relax.  Thank you for your feedback regarding the city shuttle/bus and the pool service.  We have heard you and will use this feedback for training purposes.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: We stayed at the resort May 24, 2013 - May 27, 2013 for a wedding. We cannot say enough positive things about the hotel, the service, the staff, the food, the location or the management! A couple weeks before our arrival I called the hotel and spoke with Julie in the executive offices. We were celebrating our 25th anniversary while attending the wedding and I wanted to surprise my husband with something special. After Julie gave me many options, I told her I would call back with what I wanted to choose, but I got so busy before we left town that I never did called her again. Yet when we arrived last Friday, we were met by staff and escorted to our beautiful room. Minutes later, there was a delivery at our door of champagne on ice, champagne flutes, and a plate of chocolate
Manager Response: We enjoyed having you just as much as you enjoyed being here!  Next time, please stay longer.  Thank you for the kind words.  We will be sure to pass them along to our ladies and gentlemen.  Isn't our resort an amazing location for a wedding?  We enjoyed creating a memorable and personal experience for you. See you soon!

Summary: This is a very beautiful resort with wonderful service and attention to detail.  We enjoyed our stay here but were shocked at the prices to dine on the property!  The meals were good, but not worth the $$ in my opinion.  A kid's breakfast for a 2 1/2 year old was $16 before tax and tip and there wasn't much to it.  We were finally turned on to a restaurant called Quench just outside the property that was much more in line with normal dining prices and enjoyed a very nice dinner there on our last night.   Many more options and the "side" dishes were inexpensive.  The Concierge said they didn't know it as it wasn't one of their "recommended" properties.  It would be nice if the Ritz could offer a more causal dining option especially for families with young children not looking to
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We hope your little one enjoyed their stay!  We greatly appreciate your feedback and have taken it seriously.  When you do return to the resort, please let our Executive Offices know and we will ensure we have some wonderful dining options for you and your family.  We will also ensure you have a gorgeous view from your room.

Summary Heading: Great Time, nice staff,,,Club Level is the only way to go
Summary: Remember that life is way to short, spend the extra bucks and stay on the club level at this hotel  check in was quick, our room was ready and well we had a perfect weekend  The spa is good for me , but my wife had a terrible time  5 stars plus a you bet I will tell a friend  MM
Manager Response: Was this your first time staying with us?  We enjoyed having you and we couldn't agree with you more that our exclusive Club Level is the only way to go!  Thank you for choosing our resort as your luxury destination.  We look forward to creating more unique memories for you in the near future.

Summary Heading: 5 Star - relaxation and attentive service throughout stay
Summary: We had a great family vacation on the Club level of this remodeled property.  Sitting on a cliff overlooking the ocean is a great way to start a 6 night family vacation after an 8 hour drive.   The Club level at the RC is like a home away from home.   My kids made great use of the 4 meal servings the Club offers each day.  I saw many kids show up in the PJ's for breakfast or a late night snack before bed.   Attentive staff, with positive caring service.  RC employees are the best - they know how to take care of each guest.   The grounds are very nice.  Great gym that over looks the ocean, walking or jogging path along the ocean for miles.   You can't go wrong at this property.  Oh and try out a day at the beach with the Beach Butler - everything you need to a day at the beach
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  We are delighted you and your children enjoyed our exclusive Club Level....it's the only way to go!  We hope you have the opportunity to come back this summer and enjoy another Beach Butler experience.  You must have been so relaxed when you returned home.  Could we be your new home away from home?  See you soon!

Summary Heading: Beautiful, Expensive Place by the Ocean
Summary: The view form our Ocean view room was exceptioanlly beautiful.  The hotel is on a cliff overlook the Pacific.  It maintains very well kept lawns and has many walking paths, including some down to the beach.  It rus a shuttle van down to the beach for those who do not care to walk, or who are unable to do so.  The larger restraurant serves avant guarde cuisine, which my wife and I do not care for, and they had no seating before 9:15 PM.  There is a smaller steak house type restraurant, but it was booked for the evening, so we elected to have room service deliver a nice meal for use to eat on our balcony overlooking the ocean.  The room service meals come on a small cart that can be used as a table.  The food was excellent, the whole experience was outstanding.  We had an
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your busy day to provide your feedback.  It has been heard and we have taken it seriously and constructively.  We hope you enjoyed your stay overall and you will return soon.  We would enjoy assisting you personally through the Executive Office for any future plans you may have at our resort.  Please feel free to contact us any time for assistance.  Thank you again for your valuable feedback.

Summary: This was my first time at this resort, from the moment I walked in an until the moment I left, the service was remarkable.  Any request I had, they filled it. The food on the club level along with the service from the concierge, couldn't be beat.  Every part of this hotel the employees made you feel like you were "home."   The spa was very nice and was on top of any special need I had.    I am looking forward to my next stay at the Ritz.
Manager Response: Welcome home! Your pictures are stunning, thank you!  We couldn't agree with you more that our ocean front guest rooms on our exclusive Club Level are the only way to go.  Thank you for your visit and we hope to welcome you back again very soon.  It was our pleasure exceeding your expectations and creating life long memories for you.

Summary: This is a true destination hotel. Once you enter the grounds, you don't want to leave, and there really is no reason to. First, the staff is attentive to your every need. They all go out of their way to make sure you are having a great experience.   The site is spectacular. Right on the coast, above a beautiful bay filled with surfers and a long golden beach. Every time you look out a window, it takes your breath away.  The on-site restaurants are excellent - a steak house, a modern cuisine restaurant, a cafe, an outdoor bar with an ocean view. You can also get food and drinks out by the pool, which is of course gorgeous and tropically landscaped.  My room was standard and not huge, but the bed was the most comfortable I have ever slept on. The bath was large, with marble tiling
Manager Response: Aren't you glad you didn't have to leave the resort?  Thank you for experiencing all of our unique food and beverage outlets.  We agree with you that all of our views offer a refreshing and different view of our beautiful surroundings.  Isn't Mother Nature phenomenal?  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel!  We enjoyed having you with us.

Summary: I am not sure what I can say that has not already been said about this FANTASTIC property!! The room had an amazing view from our balcony.....the bars were amazing...restaurants superb food.....the club level staff provided impeccable service. In fact the service is what really set this hotel apart from other stellar hotels I have stayed in.  We were celebrating my girlfriend's birthday and they went out of their way to add to an overall wonderful experience!  Once you stay at the property....you won't want to leave!!
Manager Response: We want you to stay as well!  Come back soon!  We promise your next experience at our ocean front paradise will be even better than this one.

Summary: Putting on Ritz.  5 star quality and service is number one here.  You will not be disappointed.   It would be great for special occasions as well.   The hotel faces the Pacific overlooking the beach.  It reminds me Positano Italy!  It is beautiful, breath taking.   The spa is great!  The fitness center overlooks the ocean.  You have to experience this hotel at least once!  It's a little far out, but super shuttle runs the hotel from John Wayne / Orange County $33 one way.
Manager Response: Thank you for your photos....we always enjoy seeing them.  We are delighted you had a wonderful experience with us and we look forward to creating new memories for you soon.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary: We had an amazing 4 night stay at the Ritz! The ocean view room was impeccable, the grounds were spectacular, and above all, the staff was attentive, friendly and overall, fantastic! Bed was a little soft for our liking, but then again, we like a really firm mattress. We loved 180Blu, the outdoor lounge area, which served great appetizers and small plates. We worked our way through practically the entire food menu as well as the cocktail menu throughout our stay, and enjoyed it all. We were laughing that we had not yet left the property on our last full day there, as everything we needed was right there, great pool, beautiful beach, delicious food and drink - all attended to with the signature Ritz service. The Market Place snack/coffee shop staff was the friendliest of them
Manager Response: Thank you for your delightful and detailed review of your recent experience at our iconic resort.  We enjoy hearing from you.  We are glad you enjoyed every inch of our resort, food & beverage options, and our magnificent surroundings.  Welcome home!

Summary: We arrived at the Ritz on a Friday afternoon with the temperature being 95 degrees.. about 20 degrees above normal. Despite the heat and humdity the staff outside and in were very courteous and attentive. We statrted the weekend being told by the front desk that we had been UPGRADED to the club suite. Boy I thought it could not get any better, but I was wrong. Penny, the conceirge in the club suites, was just plain fantastic. The grounds were spectacular and our walks on the beach below the Ritz were wonderful. We also hung out around the pool on Saturday and had a great time...it was not too crowded and the food and drinks hit the spot. No matter how hard I tried I could not come up with one negative about the Ritz at Lagua Niguel. Would highly recommend.
Manager Response: Isn't our exclusive Club Level fantastic?  We are delighted that you enjoyed your surprise upgrade and had an opportunity to experience our team's excellent service and amenities.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Will you stay on our Club Level?

Summary Heading: Great views, great beach, great food!
Summary: So many hotels in this class I've been to can't live up to their name - THIS DID.  Every person on staff we met went out of their way for us - friendly, informative, helpful. All seemed so happy to work here!   The FOOD was very good - especially the burgers.  Beautiful beach, gorgeous hotel... The gym overlooks the beach with an awesome view of the surfers!   Great place to work out, and so is the outside trail.   This was for a business conference in February, so the weather was hit or miss.... but there is much to do here even if you're not able to be out in the sun.  The resort is gorgeous.  I'd go back again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your visit!  We hope to welcome you back for a trip when you are not on business.  We have so much more for you to experience!

Summary: The Ritz is the only place to stay in the OC. I've tried the St Regis, Montage and Pelican Hill. Nothing compares to this property!!!!!! Great service, with discretion! Pay the extra money to stay on Club Level. The suites and rooms are so comfortable......the hallways can get a little noisy because of door slamming ( they need to work on that!) but everything, and I mean everything else about this property is beyond superb. Been going there now annually for 16 years and it is always magical. The Monarch pool is more quiet. Club concierge leader, Penny, is a gem....truly. It's always such a pleasure to return and see many familiar faces.   The beach and location are so brilliant! Expensive? yes  but if you can, you owe yourself a stay at this magical place!
Manager Response: We so enjoyed having you at our "magical place".  Our ladies and gentlemen take great pride in the personalized and refined service they provide.  They truly enjoy welcoming our guests in to their home.  We look forward to welcoming you back next year.  We will be waiting for you!

Summary: Went to the Raya for their legendary Sunday Brunch-   When I called to make the reservation, "Michelle" tried to pass my call off to ?no idea who- as the phone range at least 15 times and returned right back to her. She wanted to know if we were celebrating any event and I told her it was my son's 21st birthday.  Day of brunch- Got seated, nice seat by window as I had requested them- had to wait about 15 min despite request, but that is okay. Then we waited, and waited, and waited, to be acknowledged by a waiter. Except for water by the waterboy, for about 20 minutes, servers were walking past us and it was like we were invisible. I finally got up to tell one of them that the boys were hungry, would they alert our waiter that we were "here for brunch" The male waiter "Matthew"
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your very detailed feedback.  This is certainly not the experience we wanted you to have; especially for such a momentous event.  Raya is normally a fantastic restaurant experience with excellent service and we are so sorry your time with us was anything less than perfect and memorable.  We would enjoy speaking with you directly to ensure we make this right for you.  Please contact the Executive Office at your convenience.  Thank you.  We know your next Ritz-Carlton experience will be a true Ritz-Carlton experience.

Summary: I've stayed at nice hotels but this is the absolute nicest as far as design, decor, ambiance, service.  Such extraordinary attention paid to every item and detail. The only complaint would be the lighting in the rooms was crazy to figure out and even with all the lights on, it was still to dark to even put makeup on.  Staff was great and food was always incredible.    Always important is bed, bedding quality and pillows. It is the Ritz, I know, but I am picky. This did deliver. Slept great and had no complaints!  You pay the resort fee as opposed to resort fee and then exorbitant charges for every bottle of water. I was delighted to have bottles of water brought to me at my behest just as soon as I requested.    The views from this hotel are to die for. I could not get enough of
Manager Response: Thank you for your photos!  We always enjoy seeing them.  We are delighted you had a memorable experience with us and we hope to welcome you back soon.  The next time you visit us, we can add additional lighting to your guest room to ensure you have just the right light.  We look forward to welcoming you back....your bed is waiting for you.

Summary: I can hardly imagine a more iconic Southern California view than the one offered from the balcony of my room at the RC Laguna Niguel. Every morning at first light, surfers are paddling out to the waves that break just off the point below. The sandy crescent of Monarch Beach stretches to the North. You catch glimpses of the lush flower plantings. Amazing.  It's a steep climb down to the beach, but shuttles are offered, and there is a nice running trail that leads north to the neighboring golf course. I was at the resort for a conference, so didn't get to visit the beach much, but I imagine the convenience would be huge for families with young children. The various bars and restaurants with dramatic views also make the resort ideal for couples looking for a romantic getaway.  The
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting our iconic resort!  We enjoyed having you and we look forward to welcoming you back again for a restful and relaxing vacation.  Thank you for sharing your experience on Trip Advisor. We value your feedback!

Summary: We stayed at this place for a week, to attend a company meeting. Great Place to stay with nice facilities. Try to get the rooms facing the beach as these are awesome. The sight of Sun setting over the beach, from these rooms is a great experience. The restaurants offer a decent fare, although vegetarians like me found it pretty difficult to get Indian Veggie food which is pretty understandable. The swimming pools are well maintained, although we could not find too many people in the water, probably the weather not permitting, as it was quite cold. Since it was a group of around 200 people, I think they managed the event pretty well with good conference rooms, great service and fantastic ambiance at all the places we dined. Room tariffs were pretty steep, at least on the website
Manager Response: We enjoyed having you all the way from India!  The next time you visit, please let the Executive Office know and we will make sure we have many dining options for you. We hope your travels bring you back to Southern California soon.

Summary: For our anniversary, we decided to head 15 miles south from Newport Coast to Laguna Niguel.   We couldn't go out of the country this year, as my wife is near term in her pregnancy, so we decided to stay at the Ritz for a night.  We booked he club level ocean view room from the Fine Hotels and Resorts, so we could get some nice benefits such as early check in, late check out, upgrade if available, free breakfast and another resort specific amenity (here was a $100 food/beverage credit).  We checked in around 1pm, and check in was a breeze.  We asked about the upgrade, but the staff said that next level upgrade would be a garden suite, which would be away from the club level.  The club level and rooms were on the fourth floor of the north tower.   The club level was always stocked
Manager Response: Thank you for the photos.  We enjoy seeing them from our guests' persepctives.  We couldn't agree with you more that our exclusive Club Level is one of a kind.  It truly has to be experienced to understand why it is ranked amongst the best in the world.  We are delighted you had the opportunity to enjoy the Club Level and our surperior ladies and gentlemen.  We hope to welcome you back very soon.  It was a pleasure having you as our guest.  Welcome home!

Summary Heading: Complimentary  LEMONADE and Exceptional customer service
Summary: COMPLIMENTARY Lemonade and EXCEPTIONAL customer SERVICE  at the Ritz Carlton Promenade which sits about 300 feet above sea level.  The service was WOW with a complimentary Glass of Fresh LEMONADE and two of the  most hospitable servers on the universe.  Great " WOW"  factor unbelievable views with an occasional Whale sighting  Best of the best  Stunning views and amenities at the hotel  however leaving the hotel and venturing down town  was a big disappointment.    The real deal is DRIVING 18 miles NORTH to " Newport Beach"  visiting FASHION ISLAND a one of a kind destination  coastal shopping, restaurants and entertainment.
Manager Response: We are glad you enjoyed our fresh squeezed lemonade!  Did you try our complimentary fruit infused water as well?  We look forward to WOWing you again in the near future....we have so much more in store for you.  See you soon!

Summary Heading: Excellent property but make sure to check your bill
Summary: The property is wonderful.  It is an excellent location with stunning views and lovely amenities like complimentary yoga in the mornings, and highly hospitable staff.  My complaint is charging for things that I did not use.  When I checked out my invoice included valet service for my non-existent car.  The real transgression, though, was charge for a night that I didn't even stay at the hotel! At these prices, I expect equal viligance on correctly charging for the product.
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed our service, property and surroundings.  Thank you for choosing our resort for your luxury destination.  We hope to have the opportunity to create many more long lasting memories for you in the future.  Thank you for pointing out the inaccurate charges on your bill.  We apologize for the inconvenience and are happy to assist you with any further questions you have.

Summary Heading: Can't wait to go back..this is not just another Ritz...
Summary: Ritz Carlton does it again without standing service and staff... and this time the location is phenomenal. Ocean front with spectacular views of the Pacific.  Watch the surfers just below the Hotel from dawn to dusk from the lobby bar ….Nearby Dana Point and Laguna Beach offer many activities for everyone, although you won’t want to leave the property…. Check the outdoor 180 Blu bar for beautiful sunsets…  I conducted a meeting here for three days and the entire staff was great… everything was attended to perfectly… Careful what you ask for as they will accommodate every request without fail  Check out the lobster salad..or indulge in the Grilled Cheese sandwich ..,,you've never had one like this before...  and the wine list is great….  Request an Ocean view….and be lucky enough
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our resort to hold your meetings.  We enjoyed having you and we are delighted that you had a little down time to enjoy our property and magnificent surroundings. We agree with you that Andrew is remarkable and a shining star.  Will you be back soon? For business or pleasure?  Either way, we will ensure it is another flawless experience!

Summary Heading: Lulled to sleep by ocean waves in room 2010
Summary: Stayed overnight (wish it was longer!) for business meetings and it was a fabulous experience.  Ocean view, ability to leave balcony doors open to hear ocean below to lull us to sleep and then awake.  Bartender stayed late to make us cocktailsa after a very late arrival.  World's most comfortable hotel bed.   Yummy welcome cookies too.  Room service breakfast - on time, perfectly prepared (we like our poached eggs and toast just so) and delicious!  $60, but worth it.  My husband came along for this trip and enjoyed the resort facilities while I was in a meeting.  Lovely pools, plenty of nooks to hide in.   The meeting area is off to one side of hotel so you don't get the feeling that you are in the middle of a convention.  Only dings:   Because we arrived very late the desk gave
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed feedback.  We enjoy and benefit from reading it.  We will be sure to hare with the appropriate leaders here at the resort. Thank you for your visit as well and we hope you return soon for some r&r.  We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: This property is a treasure. From the creative flowers that adorn the hotel to the gracious and amazing staff (Joey from Guest Services looked like he should have been on TV), this resort beckons you to stay. I went for a girl's weekend and we never left the grounds except to walk the beautiful beach. The food at Raya (server Elizabeth and Mat from the kitchen) was outstanding. Sordfish tacos in wonton paper were the winner (and the oatmeal ice cream).  The view is amazing at sunset.  The pool offered some tasty homemade nachos served by Kaitlyn who was new and very cute, Enosteak (server Rosette and Anthony from the kitchen) were fantastic. The lavender and thyme butter was clever and decadant...not to mention the tuna tartar that was incredibly fresh. The steak was the big
Manager Response: We couldn't agree with you more that our surroundings and facility are magnificent!  We are delighted you enjoyed your Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel experience and we look forward to creating many more memories and experiences for you in the future.  Welcome home!

Summary Heading: Excellent service, beautiful grounds, average rooms
Summary: This is a beautiful hotel perched on a cliff overlooking the pacific.  The grounds are gorgeous and it is a quick stroll down the hill to the beach.  There are amazing views from virtually everywhere in the hotel.  The service is impeccable.  Small touches like the valets offering to carry small items I had in my hands or being offered bottled water while waiting in line to check in made me feel like they put an emphasis on the guest experience.  I had brunch in the restaurant, with a fantastic windowside table overlooking the ocean.  Pricey, but a great experience.    The gym is stunning.  Huge picture windows.  I could work out there all day.  The rooms are average.  Nothing to really complain about, but not any different from any mid-range sort of resort hotel.  Overall, an
Manager Response: It was wonderful having you as our guest and we hope you truly enjoyed our beach front location.  We take great pride in getting to know our guests so that their return visits our even more magical than their first.  We look forward to creating more memories for you soon.

Summary: The location of this resort cannot be beat. The hotel feels more like a convention hotel than a Ritz. The rooms are nice but nothing special and in need of an update. There are multiple pools and the service was spotty at best poolside. The bar area has an incredible view of the ocean and a nice place to watch the sunset if you can find a seat as it stays very busy. It offers good access to the beach and lots of jogging trails adjacent to the property. Don't get me wrong, this is a nice hotel in a great location but not a refined as I come to expect from the Ritz brand.
Manager Response: On behalf of all of our ladies and gentlemen, we thank you for your valuable feedback.  It greatly helps us in our continuing quest of being the worldwide provider of luxury experiences.  We hope your overall stay with us was an excellent one and we look forward to your next visit.  We love your photos!

Summary: My husband and I visited here and absolutely LOVED it! =) Please splurge and get an ocean-side room. We slept with the doors open every night we were there. The sound of the ocean and the breeze coming in off the Pacific made for perfect sleeping. There is nothing else quite like it. The views are astounding, and there is easy access to the beach. The staff is amazing! They have multiple places to eat. The staff at the cafe remembered my husband who had been there two years ago. It is a splurge for us to stay here, but we certainly think it is worth it.
Manager Response: We couldn't agree with you more that our ocean front view rooms are the only way to go!  Listening and watching the waves crash against the shore is a wonderful and unique experience.  We look forward to your next stay with us!  We will always remember you.

Summary: My husband and I stayed at the Ritz for a business trip. Our room was on the ground floor,  facing the swimming pool. The room was simple but very comfortable and spacious, the bathroom was gorgeous. I like the way they hid the refrigerator and some shelving behind a glass  enclosure, that in itself was a work of art. My only complaint regarding the room was that there was no coffee pot in it. I really like a coffee pot in the room so I can drink a cup of coffee while sitting up in bed before starting the day, that is one of the perks I enjoy when traveling. I realize they probably don't have pots in the room so you will order room service, however, early in the morning I don't want anyone coming into my room.   The resort as a whole is beautiful. The view overlooking the
Manager Response: We love your details of your experience and your photos, thank you!  We are delighted you enjoyed your time with us and we hope you took home some wonderful memories.  Perhaps you will have an opportunity to return to the resort and discover more memorable experiences.  Thank you for your visit and for your time in posting a review.

Summary: My husband and I had, overall, a wonderful, four-night stay here as part of a large corporate retreat. The location of this Ritz Carleton is outstanding, with stunning ocean views and overlooking a beautiful, spacious beach. There's an extensive walking/running/bike trail, in addition to a well-equipped fitness center, two tennis courts, a basketball court and a golf course nearby.   The public spaces (e.g., lobbies, fitness center, restaurants) are exquisitely decorated. A "must" is to enjoy drinks and appetizers at 180blu at sunset -- cheerful service, magical vistas, and they bring guests bright blue shawls if you're chilled. We had dinner at Raya one evening. The food was good (the lobster tacos, in fact, were "to die for"), and the service was excellent. We did not use the
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback.  We take all guest feedback seriously.  We are delighted you enjoyed your overall experience with us and we look forward to welcoming you back again in the future with your children.  We enjoy creating memories for all ages.  We appreciate your time in posting your experience on Trip Advisor.  We would welcome the opportunity to assist you directly.  Please feel free to contact our team in the Executive Office any time for assistance.

Summary: I checked in last night to attend a large New York's firm corporate offsite events here as a guest. Flying in from Shanghai directly I had no US dollars with me, so asked front desk if I can exchange some money. I was informed since the manager was off duty （ it was around 8:30pm) they can't do it for me. There were two staffers there. They then asked me if I would like to carry my own luggage to the room on 4th floor. I sensed they probably thought since I don't have money to tip them, they were not going to help me with my luggage. So I said ok then thinking how far can that be.  I dragged my big suitcase and a carry-on bag thru the hallway, which turned out to be hugely expansive space and long walk before I found the elevator. A few other staffers saw me struggling, and no
Manager Response: Thank you for your very detailed feedback.  We have taken it seriously and have tried to reach you in your guest room; unfortunately with no success.  You are very important to us and we look forward to speaking with you in person today. Please contact the Executive Office at your earliest convenience.  We look forward to assisting you and providing a positive and memorable experience for you and your wife for the remainder of your stay with us. Thank you.

Summary Heading: Beware of room 2027!  I left with Scabies!!
Summary: Stayed at the Ritz for 6 nights during a corporate retreat.  During my stay I noticed what appeared to look like a few bug bites on my upper legs.  I went to the doctor 6 days later and was told that I had scabies.  I have since sent 2 emails and a voicemail complaining to the hotel.  They have been extremely lazy in attempting to contact me.  I am EXTREMELY disappointed!!  Beware if you see anything that might look like a bug bite!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed feedback.  We always take our guests' feedback seriously and act upon it immediately.  We look forward to speaking with you directly.  Please contact the Executive Office directly as soon as possible.

Summary Heading: Like virtually all RCs. Pretty much perfect.
Summary: We stayed at an ocean view 3rd floor room. Just a killer view, ocean breeze coming in through French doors. I'm not sure that a non-ocean view would be worth the price, as the rooms are no better at this property than most other high end hotels. Super friendly staff, very clean, and lots if nice touches. Paris prices on everything, so prepare for the $5 coffee and the $2 orange. I understand that I am on vacation, but $65 is a bit for room service for 1 with no alcohol, right? I also really liked the on property dining and bars.
Manager Response: Thank you for your visit.  We look forward to creating more memorable experiences for you in the future.

Summary: We stayed for a wknd under Amex FHR.  We checked in early and were shown to a tiny room on the Club Floor but technically in another building. We asked if there was another room available and were told by the Front Desk that the hotel was 100 percent full. Flash forward to 20 minutes later when we were having coffee in the club lounge and were asked by be Club Mgr if we liked our room.  We told her we did not and she seem surprised that we did not get a room change as she told us the hotel was at 11percent capacity.  We were immediately upgraded to a huge suite.   The lounge service was great -food plentiful and they were happy to pour a drink at any time!!  They were great with our toddler as well! The grounds of this hotel were dated and it's annoying that you can't see the
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback, Thank you for taking time to provide it.  We look forward to welcoming you back to our exclusive Club Level one day soon!

Summary: My husband I attended this location for a business meeting.  Could not be more impressed with the rooms, location and friendly staff.  We had a problem with our television the first night we were there, the next morning it was replaced no muss no fuss.  Always greeted by the staff any where in the hotel.  Beautiful clean rooms, nice balcony. Great spa experience as well - we will return!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest!  We look forward to welcoming you back for a more relaxing, non-business related experience in the near future.

Summary Heading: Wonderful hotel with an amazing view!  Highly Recommend!
Summary: This hotel is owned by the same company as the Half Moon Bay Ritz and is equally an outstanding property!  I would very highly recommend this hotel for anyone, whether personal or business.  Excellent staff, service, amenities and rooms are awesome!  I really appreciate being able to fly into LAX and then take a short drive down the coast to this location that makes it all worthwhile!  My wife and I were spending a few days shopping for a new grandchild and this location made it very easy to travel several shopping locations from LA to San Diego.  The views are outstanding and the weather was great!
Manager Response: We enjoyed having you!  Thank you for choosing our resort and we look forward to many more memorable experiences with you in the future.

Summary Heading: It feels like a conference center.
Summary: This hotel is huge and very corporate.  But yet for a corporate hotel, it still has the feel of a vacation hotel.  The rooms are updated and beautifully, decorated.  There is no breakfast buffet.  Breakfast is expensive which is why Amex platinum guests receive a $60 credit.  It is delicious and run by the famous chef who runs Maya in NYC.  The omelets are fabulous and the server was gracious and allowed us to order a half-portion of french toast.  The free coffee in the morning should be in the lobby and you should not have to be in the know on how to obtain it by saying "Ritz coffee."  It is nice but I felt like I was vacationing at someone else's conference.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us and providing your post-stay feedback.  We greatly appreciate it!  We look forward to welcoming you back during a time that may not be quite so busy.  Any of our reservation specialists will be glad to look at specific dates of stay for you that may better fit your needs.

Summary: My partner and I were here for 3nights.  We stayed on the club level which I recommend.  The service there is excellent.  The types of beverages alcoholic and non alcoholic was great as well as the food they had.   The resort is nestled on a cliff which over looks the ocean and offers awesome views.  Don't forget to bring a camera. 180bleu lounge is nice as well.  It is located outside with an ocean view and EXCELLENT VIEW OF THE SUNSET. Its only 15-20minutes away from Laguna beach and its a great ride on the PCH. We would definitly come back to this hotel.
Manager Response: It was an honor having you as our guests!  Thank you for truly experiencing the mystique of the resort.  We have more memories to create for you in the future.  Welcome home!

Summary: We stayed here while my husband attended an on-site conference for work.  We have a one year old baby who did not come and so we were trying to catch up on much needed sleep.  I think we both slept better at this hotel than we had for an entire year!!!  The walls are so thick that I did not hear even a peep from the hall or from the rooms above,   which always bothers me!  Needless to say I was blown away.  Luxurious sleep due to comfortable beds and quiet room (by the way the hotel was booked full so I know we were surrounded by people we could not hear).   Would stay again in a heart beat.  Also the gym was very nice.
Manager Response: We couldn't agree with you more that our sleep experience ranks amongst the best in the world!  Thank you for staying with us.  We look forward to providing you with many more restful sleeps.

Summary: I went to this hotel with my husband and daughter.  We stayed there for 4 days and we were so disappointed.  I admit that the view to the ocean was fabulous and the hotel landscape was very pretty and well kept, but everything else felt like not that special for the price of the room.   The spa was so overpriced and the facility itself lacked the luxury I was looking for. The lounge area, where you wait for your masseuse, was more like a closet.  I've been to a better spa with so much more to offer. The food wasn't that great either, except for the burgers.  Everything was too expensive.  I ordered a very pricey ceaser salad at the pool area, and it took about 45 minutes (I complained to the waiter about the wait, and he said it was because the food has to come from upstairs --
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback.  We take it seriously and use it to improve our guests' experiences.  We are glad you enjoyed our magnificent surroundings and we would welcome the opportunity to have you as our guest again.

Summary: This hotel provided some of the most beautiful, picturesque views of Salt Creek Beach and the coastline. The hotel itself was gorgeous and serene...display after display of freshly cut roses lining the lobby and hallways each morning, and crackling fireplaces at night. The fitness center was amazing with floor-to-ceiling windows and panoramic views of the beach and coastline. We would happily return tomorrow, if we could!!!
Manager Response: We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We enjoyed a four night visit before Christmas 2012 with our 9 year old including a welcome gift upon our arrival! She enjoyed the incredible staff at the kids program - participaing in the cook class, boogie boarding, snorkeling and crafts! Mary in club level too such incredible care of us during our stay - including upgrading us when we had some concerns about construction noise. the rooms are beautiful and the staff is so very friendly from the valet, to the spa (Holly was terrific) and fitness, as well as the fabulous restaurants.Thank you for making our family memories so very special.  We have visited the resort 3 time over the past year and can't wait to return for spring break next week!
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed your experience at our resort.  Our ladies and gentlemen take great pride in creating memories for our valuable guests. We hope you consider us as your home away from home!

Summary: We returned to the Hotel after being there four years ago.  We had an amazing time the first time we went to the property and they didn't disappoint us this time.  We stayed on the club leve both times and all our needs were met or exceeded. It was nice seeing some of the same staff from our last time we were there .  They are very kid friendly  From the time you drive up on the property the staff is there to greet you and take care of anything that needs attention.   All the food in is delicious and the staff is there to handle all your request to dining reservations travel maps and geting the beach stuff set up.  The views from the cliff are breath taking The only negative was we had to leave and go back to reality.
Manager Response: Isn't our Club Level fantastic?  We couldn't agree with you more that you will not be disappointed with your experience when booking a room on Club Level.  We are so glad you enjoyed yourself and we look forward to creating more memorable experiences for you in the near future.

Summary: From the Location, to the lay out, service and quality, this is truly world class. How a laxury hotel should be. The breth taking views and serenity offered by the surroundings and ambience is priceless. One of the best hotels I have stayed world wide. Impeccable. Totally rjuveneted and refreshed after 4 days stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your delightful review of our service and facility.  All of our ladies and gentlmen take great pride in working for our brand and our resort.  We look forward to providing you more luxury experiences in the near future.

Summary: The Ritz Carlton never disapoints. You can expect to be pampered and waited on with unsurpassed service and luxury.  They never cut corners and will always exceed your expectations.  Dress up for dinner and enjoy the view at Raya.  We recently went back just for dinner and enjoyed the chef's menu.  The chef actually comes out to introduce herself and tells you all about each course. The rooms are always impecable.  You will never want to get out of bed. And you may not have to because they sell everything you want to recreate the same bed online and at their gift shop.  Excellent location. I always talk about the soap, I know-this time a little too perfumy for me but still beautiful! We took it home just as a little reminder. We only wish they offered more in the way of
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  We look forward to pampering you again in the near future!

Summary Heading: Luxury at the Beach, doesn't get better than this
Summary: From the arrival at the valet to the departure , not a detail was missed at the Ritz in Laguna Niguel.  This was not my first stay but every time I go here either for business or pleasure it seems to impress me more and more. The bellman Stephen made sure to explain all the perks and details of being a guest, he showed me where the shops were(which I already knew) , explained to ask for ritz Carlton coffee in the marketplace if I wanted to get complimentary coffee or if I wanted Peet's then that I would pay for He went thru the room with a fine tooth comb to make sure I know how to operate the climate control, the lights.  Showed me everything .  I was there for an overnight business meeting which was also impressively handled by the hotel The pools are beautiful, the grounds
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely review of our resort.  We loved the photos!  Whether you visit us on business trip or a leisure visit, we will ensure you leave with wonderful memories.  We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: Just returned from a stay at the Ritz at Laguna Niguel.  My husband had a meeting there so I tagged along and so happy that I did!  Upon check in we were immediately upgraded due to his status with Marriott and were given an ocean view, first floor room with a fire pit on the porch!  The room was awesome--well appointed and furnished as you would expect at virtually any Ritz but the special treat was the patio with the fire pit!!  It was heaven to sit outside in the morning with coffee and a fire while looking out over the beautiful pacific ocean!!  The service at the hotel was incredible with lots of attention to detail!  The food was great but pricey as well as the drinks but hey, what resort is not that way?  The hotel quickly became one of my favorite places to stay!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us in one of our firesdie ocean front rooms.  Aren't they incredible?  We loved having you here and we look forward to having you back when you are not on business. Our ladies and gentlemen have many thoughtful and unique experiences waiting for you!

Summary: This was my first time staying at a Ritz Carlton and now I know what the excitement is all about! Talk about "puttin on the Ritz". From the moment the front door staff opened my car door, I knew it was heaven, "Welcome to the Ritz Carlton Ms._____, Happy Birthday". Checking in I had the same welcome, was upgraded to the Club Level which had its own Concierge Staff, floor AND food/drink at your disposal throughout the day. I had a friend that joined me and she's naturally an introvert. However, I couldn't keep her jaw of the floor, her breath was taken away with the beauty of the hotel and the unparalleled service! There are several weddings here that occur throughout the day due to its gorgeous location next to the beach. Amazing time indeed! Since then, I've treated close
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your support!  We are delighted that we surprised you with some wonderful memories.  Our ladies and gentlemen take great pride in surprising and delighting our guests.  We couldn't agree with you more that our exclusive Club Level is the only way to go.  We look forward to seeing you and your friends again soon....Welcome home!

Summary: My wife and I just spent the weekend here for our anniversary/babymoon and without exaggerating I have to say it was unforgettable. The service impeccable, the resort pristine. If you are thinking of visiting trust me do yourself the favor and do it. One of my favorite things about our stay was that the staff made you feel wanted, it sounds silly but when I think about all the other hotel experiences I have had, most of the time you are just a #, another guest that will be gone soon. But at the at the Ritz it's almost as if you are returning home from being away. Anyways this place is awesome. Go there!
Manager Response: It was a pleasure to have you with us for your anniversary and babymoon!  We take great pride in providing memorable and personal experiences for such wonderful occasions.  Hopefully there will be many more in the future.  Thank you for the photo...we love it.  See you soon!

Summary: Went with my son, 12 years old,  this past February and stayed here as we are Ritz Carlton Members.  The place was extremely nice with lots of great views, especially the 180 Blu outdoor bar with fire tables and blankets.  My son and I thought this had the most  awesome view of the sunset though it got chilly quickly thereafter.  This place gets crowded near sunset so get there early.   The rooms were well appointed but nothing out of the ordinary except the spetacular ocean views.  The lobby and common areas were extremely nice and luxurious feeling.  Several food options in the hotel, but we loved the Marketplace food center.
