It allowed us to pick up food throught the day which allowed us alot of flexibility (it had bagels and salmon in the morning, sushi in the day, but also
Manager Response: We love your detailed feedback, thank you!  We couldn't agree more that 180blu is an incredible food and beverage outlet with the most extraordinary view of the ocean that does not exist anywhere else along the local shoreline.  And the whales!  They are amazing!  We look forward to having you and your son back soon....we have may more memories waiting for him.

Summary Heading: Good Service  Not So Good Light
Summary: I just returned from a three night visit.My husband and I were attending a conference that occupied all rooms.Even with a very full house and many moving parts,the staff took everything in stride and performed at a high level. From the housekeeping and maintenance to the front desk and valet parking,the staff shines. But not so for the room lighting..especially the north facing rooms.As one who likes to read,there is a light above each side of the bed but only one bedside lamp and the general room illumination is very poor. They have remodeled the rooms and the finishes are pleasing.They have removed a very large chaise but replaced it with a large club chair! Too big for the small rooms at this locale.Some but not all of the rooms have new HVAC systems.Ours was not one of
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your valuable feedback.  We hear you and understand you.  Please know we will continue to improve our products and facilities until they are perfect.  Your preferences have been noted for your future stays with us.  You name it, we can do it for you!  We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: I was blessed to accompany my husband, then on a business trip about 15 years ago, to this extremely elegant, friendly,  and service-oriented hotel, on a bluff overlooking the ocean.  Since our children were a great age to leave at home with grandparents safely, this was like a honey-moon type destination spot for us as well as a business gathering for Jim.  From our first car-door opening, to the fire a-lit 24/7 and tended by one person, to the crystal everywhere, and to the most amazing and unusually attentive staff, even for a Ritz, ever encountered, I was stunned.  And we had been traveling to various spots together for a number of years, and experienced fine hotels before.  We both noticed the way every single person working that hotel greeted and/or assisted us as we moved
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback!  We enjoy it no matter how old it is.  You must come back and visit our property soon.  Our ladies and gentlemen are still as dedicated and passionate as before.  We think you will really enjoy our newly enhanced rooms.  And please don't worry, we are still a star amongst stars!  We hope to see you soon!  We look forward to creating another memorable experience for you.

Summary Heading: Beautiful views, lavish digs - How much was that salad?
Summary: Hubby and I stayed at The Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel while he attended a business meeting hosted by his company.  Since the company arranged the lodging, we never saw the actual room bill.  I am assuming that rooms here cost a small fortune - everything else does!  The property is lovely - clean, well appointed, well cared for.  The staff is beyond courteous - if there is a word describing almost TOO courteous, that would apply here.  For a resort that costs a king's ransom for a night's stay, the rooms are just so-so, and really no larger than any good premium chain hotel.  The bathroom was quite lovely, with two sinks and a separate stool area.  The biggest "problem" to us was the cost of all the on-site dining.  Eggs benedict and coffee for two cost $54.00 plus tip at the
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed feedback.  We take all of our guests' comments to heart. We are glad you enjoyed your overall stay with us and hope to earn your return visit.  Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: The facilities, the panaoramic view and the service are all top notch.  This was my 4th visit to the property and each one has been exemplary.  Enjoy the verandas, the surfing and the trail around the area.  Lunch with a window view of the ocean is a must.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you back!  We hope we continue to surprise and delight you each and every time you choose to stay with us.  Summer is coming and it is going to be a wonderful time to be at the resort.  We hope you join us again!  We thank you for your loyalty.

Summary: We stayed here for three nights in February. It is a beautiful spot on top of a cliff overlooking the ocean. I would recommend that everyone at least see this place. The restaurants look over the ocean and the sunsets are breathtaking. The grounds are very nice. Beyond that I was not impressed.   The rooms on the lower level facing the ocean with firepits are the best location and from there you can take a few steps across the lawn to comfy charis and enjoy the view. At night you have a great view of the sparkiling coastline while sitting next to firepit. It is unique and  very enjoyable even at the price. The room itself is small. A small closet. No furntiure other than a bed and a small desk. No chest of drawers etc and a very uncomfortable chair with no light for reading. The
Manager Response: Thank you for your very detailed and honest review of our resort and service.  We take all of our guests' valuable feedback seriously and we look forward to speaking with you directly to ensure all of your questions have been addressed and that you are fully satisfied with our resolutions.  Please reach out to the Executive Office at your convenience at (949) 240-2000.  Thank you again for utilizing Trip Advisor.  We appreciate your business.

Summary: I knew the moment we arrived that we were in for a real treat.  My husband and I were here for a professional conference, but we stayed on an extra two days just to enjoy the hotel. Of course, you expect great customer service at every Ritz, and this one does not disappoint!  We had an ocean view room with a balcony - outstanding!  I think ours was one of the smaller rooms, but it was still wonderful.  Loved the marble bathroom with separated toilet room, beautiful double vanity.  The patio bar/grill became our favorite hang-out when the weather was nice. We actually spotted several whales - our first ever!  We were fogged in one day, and the indoor bar was very nice as well.  Be sure and explore the surrounding areas.  TIP: The coffee shop has free coffee, but you have to ask
Manager Response: We love your detailed description of our property...thank you!  Whether you visit us for business or pleasure, we will be sure to provide you with the finest personal experience.  We look forward to creating more memories for you in the future.  Congratulations on the whale sightings!  Aren't they spectacular?

Summary: I was at the hotel for two nights at the end of February celebrating a birthday.  The hotel property was fine with amazing views but what made our visit was the staff. From Alex, the Ecosteak hostess, who arranged my BD dinner (and who sent a birthday card and present to our car as we were leaving) to the ladies in the spa who presented special gifts to us (and who gave fabulous massages), all staff were great.  They literally could not do enough.  I would also recommend Ecosteak Restaurant--good service and excellent food.  I would agree with an earlier poster that you must KNOW to ask for complimentary coffee at the Marketplace.  Rather odd--I'm accustomed to coffee being offered in the RC lobbies.  Other than that, a great stay.
Manager Response: Happy Birthday to You!  We can't thank you enough for choosing to celebrate with us.  We are delighted you enjoyed our resort and our fantastic team of ladies and gentlemen.  We hope to be your first choice to celebrate many more special occasions at.  We are looking forward to creating more memorable experiences for you soon.

Summary: Stayed here for a business meeting and founbd it to be a really first class operation, as one would expect.  the location and views can't be beat.  there is a beautiful jogging path running from the hotel down to the beach and then inland for several miles.  The restaurant was excellent and the pool was a very nice spot to relax.  The beds were extremely comfortable.  If choosing between here and the Montage just up the coast I'd still give the edge to the Montage as I just think the service, ammenities and food are a bit better.  But, overall you'd be hard pressed to go wrong here.
Manager Response: Thank you for your visit!  We are delighted that you enjoyed our property and service.  We take great pride in offering the finest personal service and facilities that ranks amongst the best in the world.  We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back soon.

Summary: I stayed here for a business conference. Food & service was excellent. Catering people did a wonderful job. Every staff person was friendly & polite.   Property is very nice. You really cant beat the views of the pacific ocean from most parts of the hotel.    There was one strange thing: At the "Market Place" coffee shop a large regular coffee is $4.50. plus tax. After I spent $10 per day (2 cups a day) on coffee I was told that I should ask for the "complementary coffee" at the Market Place.It turns out if you order a coffee at the counter its $4.50 plus tax, but if you know to ask for a complimentary coffee from the same person at the same counter, it's complementary. They did say the paid coffee is Peet's & the free coffee is Ritz, but they both tasted good and very similar
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and enjoying our stellar service and amazing surroundings.  We are delighted you had a memorable experience with us and we look forward to creating more memories for you in the future.  We have taken your feedback constructively and are glad you shared it with us.  Thank you!

Summary: The Ritz Carlton is one of our favorites and after meeting our Guest Relations Coordinator, Lynda Castagnola, I couldnt have had a better experience for my stay there. She is one in a million and everyone should take lessons from her. I  was there for my Dad's 75th birthday and my sister's 50th. From my room to the club access level to the special cakes she had done, it couldnt have been more perfect or memorable! If you are looking for the perfect place overlooking the ocean, this is the one and she is the one to help with the perfect "proposal"..so much a book was done featuring Lynda for this couples' special day. Gave me goosebumps reading it. The staff has impeccable customer service!  From the bellman, valet, front desk, etc. You definitely want the club level too..They do
Manager Response: You may have experience goosebumps while you visiting our resort, but we have goosebumps reading your wonderful comments!  We are delighted you experienced our true mystique.  We enjoy creating memories for our guests that last a lifetime.  We can't wait for your return...we have even more in store for you for your next visit!

Summary Heading: Awesome spot overlooking nice surf break
Summary: I stayed here in April during a big swell and loved my view from the room.  I kept the balcony doors open for the breeze which was really lovely.  The room was spacious and comfortable.  The staff was very accommodating and pleasant.  I ate a few meals here and was not disappointed.  The property is huge and could not be in a better location.  The decorations for Easter were fun as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your visit!  Will you be joining us again this spring?  We would love the opportunity to create more memories for you.  Thank you for providing your feedback on TripAdvisor.

Summary: We stayed aT the Ritz Feb 20th thru 24, 2013.  We had been there many years ago and loved the traditional decor recognized as RITZ in the past, however they have remolded to more contemporary decor.  Our room was small,  no mini bar, tight bathroom and showing age.   While the food was wonderful and the views from dining area splendid we and no view. From our room The new fancy. Lighting in the room was so dark it made it hard to read  and the service was not up to RITZ standard! We will be back next winter but stay at Montage down the highway.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback an are grateful you took the time to share it.  We have taken it constructively and seriously.  If there is anything we can do for you or any answers we can provide, please do not hesitate to let us know.  We do hope to have the chance to welcome you back in the future.  Thank you again for the taking the time to share your experience.

Summary: we have been there years ago  with our kids then it was quite stuffy but nice.... now it is soo pleasant.............. we have been there the last 2 years and look forward to going back.................. we stay exective floor................. own bedroom there a fab fire place and so relaxing............... food lovely.............. the staff all know u and are so helpful....................there are 2 swimming pools one childrens much bigger and the other smaller and quiter.................. fantastic gym overlooking the sea............... it is worth going there to have a look
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty to our resort!  We enjoy hosting you on our exclusive Club Level and we look forward to creating more wonderful memories for you soon.

Summary: Everything you would expect of a Ritz Carlton and more. From the water and towels for your Morning run to the unbelievable views from the cliffside disappointed. Beth was the absolute best at the club level seeing to your every need. While the rooms were bit on the small side the bedding and amenities were terrific.  Great staff.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you with us!  We are delighted you enjoyed our property, surroundings, staff, and service.  Beth is a tremendous asset and we will share your sentiments with her.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: I spent a few days here for some well deserved R&R and it was worth it.  The property is amazing in style, layout and not to mention the location on the beach.  The fitness room view has to be in the top 10 I have ever seen.  Great views of the sea and surfers during your workout.  The food, waitstaff and outside bar area are great and I was able to enjoy the outside during some unseasonably warm days on my stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for escaping with us!  It was our pleasure having you with us.  The weather has been amazing and we are glad you were here to experience it.  When are you returning?  We have many more memories to create for you!

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for a mix of business and pleasure and thoroughly enjoyed this Ritz!   While my husband was working I utilized the fitness center, and it was absolutely incredible. It is an oceanfront fitness center with beautiful chandeliers that hang above you while you are exercising! It is by far the most serene and relaxing place I have ever worked out at. I also had a chance to take The complimentary Yoga and Pilates classes the hotel offered. Christine, my yoga instructor, was amazing! I learned so much about yoga and my body from Christine in just the few days I had with her. She was so knowledgable and passionate about what she was teaching, and I would highly recommend taking advantage of her class while you are staying at the hotel. Her classes actually
Manager Response: What a wonderful review of our amazing resort!  Thank you for staying with us!  We look forward to welcoming back again soon so we can create more memorable experiences for you.  We will share your wonderful comments with Christine....she will be thrileed!  See you soon...

Summary: This hotel is the epitome of world class service and true to the Ritz mission and brand!   Everyone there made me feel like I was a valued guest and went out of their way to see that I was happy. I will stay here again!
Manager Response: What a beautiful picture!  Aren't our surroundings magnificent?  Thank you for staying with us.  We are so glad you enjoyed yourself and we look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary: Beautiful views, clean rooms, classic Ritz experience.  The gym is great - check it out if you stay here.  They offer complimentary classes and the gym overlooks the ocean.  Such a serene surrounding and great service along with well maintained accommodations.  Highly recommend and eager for my next trip to Laguna Niguel.
Manager Response: We couldn't agree with you more....our fitness center is amazing!  Thank you for experiencing it and the rest of our resort.  We are equally as eager to welcome you back!

Summary: I took my two children here for a two day Christmas getaway. We were greeted by a warm, friendly staff who were very willing to tell us all about the hotel. There were surfboards displayed all throughout the lobby as part of an auction of Surfers who were raising money for autistic children to learn to surf. Strand Beach outside was filled with surfers and there is a rich history around these parts. The hotel boasts a fabulous outdoor restaurant on a sunny patio overlooking the ocean - I think it is called 360. Spectacular idea!   Kids can participate in the hotel's Ambassadors of the Environment program which offers various projects and "explorations" - check it out. Through this program we went on a 9:00 a.m. walk with hotel guides of the garden and the children tasted some of
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: If I could give it 6* I would!
Summary: My family and I had the absolute pleasure of staying at this fabulous resort last August for 8 nights of bliss.  We loved everything about this property and cannot wait to return.   We loved the area and spent almost all of our time either at the resort, on their beach or in charming Laguna Beach.    We had a room overlooking the pool area, and I so enjoyed sitting on our lanai and listening to the live music, a little slice of heaven.  While our room wasn't large by any means, we were rarely I. Or room.  Housekeeping was excellent and the beds divine.  One of our favorite things was having breakfast at the hotel in the morning, sitting by the window and watching the surfers and the beautiful vista.   The food was excellent and we enjoyed everything we ordered.    The gym is
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely review of the resort and attaching a photo as well.  We are so proud of our ladies and gentlemen and all they do to ensure each of our guests, big or small, all return home with lifelong memories.  Of course our environment and location make it very easy to learn about the rich history of the area and the appreciation of Mother Nature.  We look forward to welcoming you and your children back again soon to experience more adventures.

Summary: Our stay at the Ritz Laguna Niguel was outstanding.  Our first impression was the valet parking attendants.  So courteous and helpful.   They continued to offer good advice and outstanding service throughout our entire stay.   Every step after that was better and better.  Beautiful lobby with outstanding views of the ocean from everywhere you looked.   Breathtaking views.  Very luxurious.    The service from the restaurants to maid service was unbelievable.  Can not say enough about the wonderful staff.  So rare to find.  Made our stay so nice.   The room was beautiful.   Newly remodeled we heard and it showed.  Food at the restaurants was outstanding!   Did not find the hotel to be noisy at all.   I would stay at this hotel again and again.   It was worth every penny.
Manager Response: We are honored by your favorable review of our resort.  Our ladies and gentlemen take great pride in the service they provide every moment of every day to each of our valuable guests.  We enjoyed having you and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary Heading: This Is Where We Got Married!!!
Summary: We did not choose this Ritz Carlton as our wedding venue without a reason: it was the only place we both loved - and fell in love with at first sight! The location of the hotel at the top of a hill overlooking the ocean takes your breath away, as does the the luxurious hotel and its warm and generous staff. On our first visit, the management took us around and offered us complimentary lunch on the beautiful terrace restaurant. During the entire wedding preparation and on the night of the event, the staff remained available, helpful and reactive, giving us a truly memorable wedding day. We absolutely loved our suite as it was spacious, bright, and offered an amazing view on the ocean, and we wish we had had more time to enjoy the many activities offered by the hotel. All the
Manager Response: Congratulations!!  We are delighted that your memories here will last a lifetime.  Thank you for choosing our resort for such a momentous occasion.  It is so romantic and relaxing here, and we would welcome the opportunity to have you back year after year to celebrate.  We have so many more memories to create for you.  It is our passion!  We will see you soon!

Summary: I have stayed here four times, and at the St. Regis and the Surf and Sand. They have each served as a great LA long weekend get away, with unique attributes.  I must say, the views are amazing, room service is amazing, but the lobby looks cheap.  Metal gate they installed in what once was a gorgeous room with views for cocktails is just TACKY.  The furnishings, look more Sheraton/Westin, not bad, just nothing to write home about.  The gym has amazing views, but the biggest problem here is the pool service. The GM needs to take a trip to Maui FS and see what pool service is all about. You have one or two poor, harried, sweating waiters or waitresses running around doing their best, but generally it is impossible for them to hit the ratio when guests are everywhere, they really
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed feedback.  We hear you and greatly appreciate your comments.  We listen to all of our guests' concerns and take them seriously.  We pride ourselves in providing the utmost luxurious accommodations and exceptional service.  We look forward to welcoming you back to experience our new room enhancements. Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We hope to see you soon!

Summary: It doesn't get much better than this.  The property, location, views & service were all amazing.  We ate at the Raya restaurant which was also fantastic.  They focus on local flavors with many items obtained at local farmers markets.  You will need a boatload of money, but it is still a great value.
Manager Response: We love your tips, thank you!  Ocean view rooms are the only way to go at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We are delighted you enjoyed our Raya cuisine.  We have so much more for you to experience at the resort and we hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: My wife and I wanted to celebrate our 26th wedding anniversary by going for High Tea at the Ritz-Carlton and staying for a night. We booked the cheapest type of room they had, a Limited View Guestroom, which went for $425. Upon arrival we were thrilled to be upgraded two levels to a Fireside Coastline Guestroom, which costs $720.  Our room has a panoramic view of the ocean instead of overlooking the parking lot or something. We spent most of the afternoon enjoying the world-class view (take a look at my photos). We have a private patio complete with fireplace which kept us cozy while the sun was going down. I should also mention complimentary chocolate-dipped strawberries were delivered to our room shortly after we arrived. We're looking forward to being soothed by the pounding
Manager Response: Thank you for the photos...they are gorgeous and we love seeing them.  We are delighted that you experienced a memorable anniversary with us, and we hope you make this an annual tradition.  We love surprising and delighting our guests.  Happy Anniversary!

Summary: I am more of a Four Seasons fan than a Ritz-Carlton fan, but they have done a beautiful job with this hotel. Service was excellent. The views are exquisite. I attended a business function at the hotel and it was handled flawlessly.
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest feedback and we enjoyed having you as our guest.  We hope you have the chance to visit us again for a relaxing, personal visit.  We would love to have you!

Summary: Was here on business a few months ago.  Was delighted with my stay.  Nice room, good service, jaw dropping ocean views.  Loved it.  The hotel bar overlooking the beach is to die for, great sunsets. And the breakfast was outstanding, not much more to say!
Manager Response: Not a bad place to be for business right?  We loved having you and look forward to creating memories for you in the future for a non-business related visit.  Surfs up!

Summary Heading: One of the most beautiful views!
Summary: This was my first stay at a Ritz Carlton and I enjoyed my experience. I was here for a work event and the hotel is a beautiful setting for work or pleasure (wish I had more pleasure than work for this trip!). All the common areas of the hotel are gorgeous especially the lobby, bar and market cafe. The flower arrangements themselves were a sight! The hotel is very big and the trek from one part of the hotel can be quite long but you are rewarded with lovely and unique decorating accents throughout and gorgeous ocean views. I was traveling with a colleague who had a club level room so I had a chance to partake of the club level amenities which were very nice - wine, drinks and appetizers/desserts all day. I loved the many fireplaces in the hotel. I arrived late on Sunday and the
Manager Response: Thank you for the photos...we love them!  We are delighted that you enjoyed so much of what our property has to offer.  On your next visit, you will enjoy even more!  Our room enhancements are much needed and we are very excited for their completion.  We hope you can return and experience them first hand.  Until then, we will look forward to your next visit to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary: They have refurbished soem rooms on the 'wings' of the hotel very nicely and they have little patio seating areas that are qutie pleasant.  The conference facility, food, and service was all incredible and the staff was extremely pleasant and eager to help address your needs and desires.  The beach view was fabulous and the main lobby was light filled and quite pleasant.  I had a wonderful stay with no complaints!
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed feedback.  We take all of our guests' feedback to heart and act upon it right away.  We hope to have another opportunity to serve you so that you can truly enjoy our Ritz-Carlton ambience and mystique.  If there is anything we can do for you, please do not hesitate to let us know at (949) 240-2000.  Thank you again for your review of the resort and staff.

Summary: Love this resort!! Stay on club level if you can - the staff there are exceptional and will help you with all your reservation needs or anything at all! Especially love Mary and Penni who make our stay as perfect as possible!! The views of the ocean and sunset are amazing and not to be missed! Beach access down a steep walk way w/ shuttle service if needed! Have been staying here for the past 15 years and has never disappointed!! Comfy beds, softest sheets, light dimmers. Adirondack chairs to watch the sunset with bunnies hopping around - dolphins jumping in the sea, sail boats drifting by, stunning views of Catalina Island.  Try taking a Duffy ride (small electric boats w/ canopy cover) in the Balboa Bay with a packed picnic and some wine - best Duffy's are at California
Manager Response: It sounds like you had a great time while in our area!  Thank you for the fun recommendations.  We are glad you enjoyed yourself at the resort and we look forward to creating more memories for you again soon.  We couldn't agree with you more that our exclusive Club Level is outstanding.  Our team is phenomenal and their service ranks amongst the best in the world.  Welcome home!

Summary: They try hard but it is not quite a Ritz.  The room we had was old and they tried to modernize it but all they did was stuff a closet in an othewise small room.  Housekeeping did not service our room the first day we were there even though we finally told them a 4 hour time frame that we would be gone.  The door stuck so hard they probaly couldn't open it.  You needed a good hip check to open or close the door.  I tried to call the front desk the first night to find a TV station but the phones did not work in the room.  I called them on my cell phone.  They did come right away and fix the phones and they did fix the door.  Concierge, front desk and valet are very attentive but there is not much to back them up.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your constructive feedback.  We take this feedback and act upon it immediately.  We strive for perfection and listening to our guests helps us reach our goals.  We hope to have the opportunity to serve you again, and it is our desire that your next Ritz-Carlton experience is a true Ritz-Carlton experience.

Summary: This past January my family an I stayed at the Ritz in Laguna Niguel. It was lovely. We stayed on the club level and enjoyed all of it's amenities such as; breakfast, lunch, dinner, and dessert snacks. The staff was very nice and warmly welcomed us. They were very helpful during our stay. We've already got plans for next years trip! I highly advise staying at the Ritz in Laguna!
Manager Response: Welcome home!  We are delighted you have found a new home away from home; and you could not have made a better choice than to spend your visits on our exclusive Club Level.  Our detailed and professional ladies and gentlemen will always ensure you have a fantastic and memorable experience with us.  We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: True luxury experience.  Greeted by name 3 times - before I checked in! (hint: valet communicated my name to the staff).  Beautiful location on a bluff overlooking the ocean.  Peaceful to just rest in an adirondack chair on the lawn and watch the waves roll in.  Food across the board was excellent; staff throughout was top notch.  Needed some files printed, but the business center was busy - staff member took my zip drive, printed, sorted and batched my files after spotting me waiting.  Absolutely worth a visit.  Oh - did I mention the double rainbow?
Manager Response: We remember the double rainbow day!  It was phenomenal.  Aren't you glad you got to experience it?  We look forward to welcoming you back for more rainbows, dolphins, sunsets, and warm ocean breeze.  Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: We discovered The Ritz Carlton Laguanna Niquel 24 years ago. because of our awesome experience with the club level and especially Penney and Mary making me feel like a princess we have had the pleasure to frequent it every year .The most awesome views, great service and food. Last year for my 55 th birthday we went to Hawaii first and last visit.Great trip but our way back to east coast we stopped at Laguana.Well to we felt at home and felt everything we needed to experience was here.!!! BETTER THAN HAWAII!!! Best club level of any Ritz Carlton tha t we have experienced.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful comments.  We are so proud of our amazing Club Level and our team of ladies and gentlemen that service the Club.  They are exceptional and the reason why we consistently rank amongst the best in our company.  We are so appreciative of your loyalty and promise to never let you down.  We have many more memories in store for you so please visit again soon!

Summary: What a property!  Every member of the staff was helpful, warm and welcoming.  Especially the team at check in/check out.  McClinton Heil stood out as he made sure our stay was awesome.  The room was perfect and the views fantastic.  The location provided for a wonderful morning stroll along the the walking path that edges up against the pacific ocean and a beautiful golf course. Breathtaking views.  The resturant and bar were superb.  A gent named Harold Payne did wonderful improve music numbers for the guests in the bar...it was a lot of fun.
Manager Response: It sounds like you had wonderful time!  We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed a memorable experience.  We agree with you that McClinton is an exceptional leader....and so are all our ladies and gentlemen.  We hope to see you again soon for another stay-cation...perhaps your new home away from home?

Summary: Perhaps the most consistently excellent service I have experienced in a high-end property. Give the GM a medal. Well designed, tastefully elegant interior and a beautiful location overlooking the beach from a high. Food was excellent. Bar prices steep but you can't expect them not to be.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for visiting us and we look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary Heading: Beautiful location but not up to expectations
Summary: A lovely location, but   the hotel was not as luxurious as the St. Regis nearby and service was not up to Ritz standards.  A very nice courtesy pick up in a Lincoln Navigator a great  and friendly driver. The check in was lengthy and rushed. I suspect  under staffed. The agents  did their best with a smile. Many guests were complaining as I was in line about delays and poor rooms locations, etc. We were given a nice courtesy upgrade but the rooms were a bit underwhelming and bathroom was a bit dated. The bellman was great with the room details. Service was lacking in many ways and lengthy delays for requests and items never delivered. The lobby lounge and terrace bar were the redeeming  aspects.  Good  service in both. There was good service in the Breakfast dining room.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting the pictures of the resort; we love seeing them!  We hope you enjoyed a memorable experience overall and we apologize for any service inconsistencies you may have encountered.  We would welcome the opportunity to speak with you directly.  We know your next Ritz-Carlton experience will be a true Ritz-Carlton experience.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: My husband and I visited the Ritz Carlton during the holidays.  I have never had such a quality resort experience from the moment we pulled up to the hotel.  We were greeted by valet who was very friendly and personable.  From that moment until we arrived in our gorgeous room, we were accompanied by a Ritz Carlton employee the entire way.  Each employee we interacted with was exceptionally friendly and helpful.  I can say that even before we arrived in the room this was already the most luxurious resort experience we had ever had.  After arriving to the room, we were even brought ice by the employee who showed us to our room because he noticed we had champagne we may want to chill.  Talk about attention to detail!!  We then open the blinds and admired the outside and inside of
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely review of our resort.  We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience from the moment you arrived until the moment you departed.  That is our highest mission!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon and to creating new memories for you.  Thank you for your recommendation...please be assured we have heard your feedback and will bring it to our leadership team.  See you soon!

Summary: Stayed 1 week after xmas through New Years. great hotel, great service! 3rd stay in last 16 months, all have been excellant. if possible stay on the Club Level. the staff and service is unsurpassed! worthy of 6 six stars!
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you back!  Thank you for your loyalty.  It sounds like you fully enjoyed our exclusive Club Level.  We agree....it is amazing.  On behalf of all our ladies and gentlmen, we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Just returned from a 7 night stay at the Ritz Laguna Niguel and had a great time.  We arrived at around 2pm from the East Coast and the hotel was buzzing with activity.  As soon as we entered the grand lobby we were in awe.  The Christmas decorations were still up and they were magnificent.  Our room was not ready despite the fact that we reserved through AMEX's Platinum Fine Hotels program which is supposed to give you an early check in.  But no worries we decided to eat lunch at Raya, the main restaurant which has panoramic views of the Pacific.  We checked back at 3:30 and room was still not ready, minus 1 star, finally at around 4 the room was ready.  When we got to the room we were a bit dissapointed.  the room had no view and overlooked a wall next to the pool, also the
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and most of all thank you for your loyalty to The Ritz-Carlton Hotel Company.  We care very much about your happiness and well-being. We will never willingly put your satisfaction in jeopardy.  We are so glad you enjoyed your stay...aren't the dolphins and sunsets amazing?  We look forward to your next visit.  We have many more memories in store for you.

Summary: The Ritz in Laguna is magnificently set on a majestic cliff with a beautiful view of the ocean. We were at the hotel over Christmas and it was packed! Hundreds of people in the lobby, at the bar, in the restaurants...this is a busy place with a lot going on. We were greeted warmly at check in, and given a complimentary upgrade to an oceanfront room with a private fire pit. 180blue is a great terrace bar with good food and a nice crowd. The Ritz is in a great location, close to shopping and the beach. The gym is beautiful and well equipped.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for the holidays.  It was a pleasure having you with us.  We appreciate your comments regarding our staff and property.  Our staff takes great pride in the service they provide to each of our valuable guests.  They are extremely dedicated and motivated.  We look forward to creating more memorable experiences for you in the future.  Thank you for your visit!

Summary: We had the joy of staying here last week, 4th floor - club level. The service was fantastic, concierge was so attentive and helpful. The food + amenities were fantastic at the club level. The spa / salon were pristine and just how they should be at a resort like this.  The food was fabulous at Raya - the main restaurant.  I have absolutely no complaints - except that there were no black-out curtains in our room.  A bit surprising but also not a bad trade to wake up to see the surf coming in and out.  We will definitely return here as we are able!  A big thanks to all of the amazing staff there.
Manager Response: We couldn't agree with you more...our exclusive Club Level is the only way to go when visiting The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel!  Our service is impeccable, and our food/beverage options are outstanding.  Thank you for your visit!  We look forward to welcoming back very soon!

Summary: My fam stayed here for 2 nights for a wedding in Laguna Beach.  The hotel was spectacular, great views, friendly staff, & good food.  Of course it was expensive as expected but was definitely worth the price just a little getaway for a couple nights.  We enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: We enjoyed haivng you!  Thank you for choosing us for your short stay in the area.  We hope you have the chance to return for a longer visit perhaps during the beautiful summer.  We have many experiences to create for you...

Summary: This hotel is literally in the best location ever! Right below you is Salt Creek Beach Park and to the left is Strands Beach, both world-class locations. What I really loved about the Ritz Carlton was the service from every staff member, everyone greeted me with either "good afternoon" or "it would be my pleasure" and it was just a joy to be there.   The Ritz Carlton also has one of the coolest night time patios with Fire attractions that are really cool. It has one of the best locations I've ever been and I absolutely loved it! Room 4010 was the best room in the hotel! The fourth floor is really where you want to stay!  Also nearby were some great restaurants including the Harbor Grille in nearby Dana point Harbor. We had the opportunity to do stand-up paddle "SUP" & be a part
Manager Response: Yes indeed, our exclusive Club Level is the only way to go!  We are delighted you had the opportunity to experience our first-class Club service.  It was a pleasure having you and we hope to see you again soon.  We have more memories to create for you!

Summary: Today  I took advantage of the free yoga class with Cynthia.  No one else showed up, so I was fortunate enough to have a one on one session.  The location was amazing-- Yoga in a cliff-side gazebo high above the ocean.  Listening to the waves crash and staring off into the horizon with each pose was amazing.    Cynthia was both a skilled and talented teacher.  She contoured the class to what I needed for the stresses and activities of my life.  Cynthia even took the time to help me remedy a pose I've had trouble with in the past.   I can't stress enough that if you're staying in this hotel, you should treat yourself to yoga with Cynthia.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind compliments about Cynthia.  We couldn't agree with you more that Cynthia is not only a superstar but a very educated and talented yoga instructor. We are very fortunate to have her on our team.  We look forward to welcoming you back for more peaceful yoga sessions soon!

Summary Heading: A review from someone in touch with reality. Beautiful property, but overpriced as to be expected
Summary: My wife and I stayed 5 days at the Ritz Dana point finishing up a road trip down the California coastline. Let me first start off by stating the property is beautiful and the views of the ocean overlooking the cliff and sunset are picturesque.   Upon check-in we were greeted by an unfriendly young woman at the front desk. I was immediately confused with the lack of friendliness. Perhaps this is because my wife and I are in our low 30's and don't look or act like the typical Ritz patron? We brushed this off and went to our room. We booked a standard room which overlooked the pool figuring we would either be out or at the beach most of the time. It was nice, but not nice enough for Ritz standards and the premium one pays to stay there. There are several Marriott properties I have
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid feedback. We greatly appreciate your time in reviewing our resort.  We are delighted that you enjoyed our facility for the most part, and we look forward to welcoming back in the future for a much more positive experience.  We care about your well being and want you to fully enjoy our true Ritz-Carlton mystique.  Please contact our executive office directly for future reservations so we can assist you personally.  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary Heading: Well maintained beach front property with fabulous staff
Summary: Service was impeccible. All the staff went out of their way to help you. That was the highlight of this place. Rooms were well appointed, nicely decorated and clean.   For breakfast I loved the Huevos Rancheros. The crabs benedict (not on the menu in the weekend) was good too. At 180Blu, the nachos to share and salmon entree was great. Service at both Raya and 180Blu was great. They remembered our preference for juice/coffee etc at Raya on the 2nd day. My only grouse is with room service - it was exceedingly slow. They always said 30 minutes but took longer, even for a soup or a pot of hot chocolate.  Spa was beyond fabulous. My masseuse, Jenn Ryan (I think), was very good and customised my one hour massage to include a mini face and scalp massage. The massages are very
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting us!  We are delighted you enjoyed our location and service.  We will be sure to share your thoughtful comments with our ladies and gentlemen; especially Jenn.  Thank you for your constructive concerns about our In Room Dining response time as well.  Your comments are taken seriously.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon....we have many more unique experiences to share with you!

Summary: I have always loved this resort.  They have done a fantastic job renovating the hotel and the room was beautiful.  So big and the bathroom was stunning, all marble!    While the hotel is really nice it still feels comfortable.  Their new patio/bar is stunning and we had a great night sitting out to watch the sunset and enjoy cocktails!  Great music entertainment as well.  Can't wait to get back!
Manager Response: We are so fortunate to be able to enjoy the simply breathtaking sunsets that we do nearly each and every day.  They are truly amazing!  Thank you for your wonderful comments.  On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we look forward to serving you again very soon.

Summary: Bring your wallet and credits cards for you will need them, but the price is worth it!  Fabulous food, wonderful rooms, beautiful views, private beach, quiet areas with a relaxing feel to the entire hotel.  We took a stash of $2.00 bills for tipping and we did use them up as the staff is there to help you and you want to tip them.  Felt like a true vacation were you sleep, relax, eat, and enjoy the sun and sand!
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely comments regarding our rooms, service, and facilities.  We hoped you enjoyed every moment of our warm, relaxed, yet refined ambience.  We are looking forward to welcoming you back and creating more memorable experiences for you.

Summary: The hotel is perched above the beach with wonderful ocean views. The rooms are spacious and comfortable (without being special) - the beds are particularly good. The hotel is well mantained with attractive public areas. The staff levels are high and service is exceptionally pro-active, consistent and attentive - perhaps too much for some tastes! Our conference was extremely well supported by the hotel and participants gave consistently positive feedback on their stay.  Food was delicious both in the main restaurant and throughout the conference. Leisure facilities are good but the beach and trails also provide a perfect place for exercise and fresh air.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review about our resort.  It was a pleasure having you and we look forward to welcoming you again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Great view - excellent service - good food
Summary: I joined my husband on a business trip here for three nights.  Our room was on the first floor and we had a balcony with a fire place and a view of the ocean.  A perfect place to sit and read a book have lunch or dinner and especially to watch the sunset. We ordered room service one night and sat outside beside the fire place everything was so good. The staff were excellent and gave me good advice as to how to spend my days.  I had breakfast and dinner at Raya and the food was outstanding and again the great view of the ocean.  It was suggested that I go to Laguna Beach one day and I had a great day, you could easily spend hours going into all the little shops and art galleries.  From check in to check out the staff/service were amazing!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful comments.  We are thrilled that you enjoyed our resort and the historic areas of Laguna Beach and Dana Point.  We couldn't agree more, our surroundngs are phenomenal!  We look forward to providing you with excellent service each and every time you visit.  We have many memories to create for you!

Summary: The Ritz Carlton was a very nice hotel. We didn't stay here but we did stop by the bar for a few drinks. The total price of the bill for one beer and one mid priced glass of glass of wine came to $33.40 but that's probably to be expected coming from the Ritz.  If you're going to stay here be prepared to shell out the money, but it's top-notch, very nice surroundings very nice interior unbeatable views from the deck highly recommended if you can afford it.
Manager Response: Thank you for stopping by!  We enjoyed having you and we hope you were able to take home a small memory from your quick visit.  We look forward to your next visit and we hope you choose to stay overnight.  Our sleep experience ranks amongst the best in the world!

Summary: I stayed here three nights for a business conference. Provides a beautiful view of the Pacific Ocean and beach below.   I found the service to be very friendly and engaged, but a bit too clingy as mentioned by another reviewer.  The hotel is not large, but navigating to my room took some time with many twists and turns down a narrow hallway.  I counted 150 paces from the elevator on my floor to my room.  I arrived three days after daylight savings time ended, but found that my clock radio had not yet been adjusted.  That is not the type of overlooked detail that I would expect at a Ritz Carlton, but thankfully I relied on my cell phone for wake up.  During the day, the sound of room renovations above my room was very loud.  While one might expect renovations to be occurring at
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback.  We will use this information to ensure our processes are effective and appropriately in tact.  We couldn't agree with you more that particular situations should have been avoided.  We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again in the future so that we may share with you our finished room enhancements, and provide you with the exceptional level of service we are known for.

Summary Heading: Nice stay - excellent service, rooms fine but could use some punch
Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights last month.  The hotel itself is beautiful and all the common spaces are large, inviting and very nice.  The service was impeccable and extremely friendly.  I had to have dinner by myself the first night. I ate in Raya and the server was very friendly and the food amazing!  Took all his food suggestions and he was right.  He even gave me a small taste of the soup of the day because it sounded so good, but I knew I couldn't eat a whole cup with what else I was ordering.  Also ate breakfast twice in Raya - excellent huevos rancheros with amazing view of the surfers. The female concierge (sorry I can't remember her name) was AMAZING!!  Gave me all kinds of info. on local restaurants for breakfast and dinner.  Detailed info. on how to get to shopping (while
Manager Response: We love your photos!  Thank you so much for posting them!  We are delighted you enjoyed our amazing property and our incredible team of ladies and gentlemen.  We take great pride in providing warm, excellent, and refined service.  We hope you and your family have a chance to return again soon.  We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: I stayed the weekend here to celebrate my girlfriends birthday. We were welcomed upon entering the property by the manager of guest relations. He introduced himself, the hotel and its amenities and gave us his card in case we had any issues during our stay. From the bags being brought to the room, to our room being explained to us, strawberries being dropped off in our room in recognition of the birthday to the final greeting as we departed the next day...our stay was PERFECT. We enjoyed dinner at enoSTEAK and the service provided by Tyler and Tyler was exceptional. They attended to our every need and made good recommendations when pairing the right wine to our steak. The next morning we had breakfast at RAYA,..the stunning view of the beach and ocean below while enjoying the
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely review of our spectacular resort!  We love your photos!  On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel for your special celebration.  We hope we created memories for you that will last a life time.  We can't wait for you to come back....we have much more in store for you!

Summary: My wife and I combined business and pleasure and stayed at the Ritz from 10/13-10/20/12.  While the hotel and its location were great, it was the friendliness and customer oriented staff that really made the trip.  In fact, we quickly had the feeling that we were among family and friends.  The concierge, Cindy exuded enthusiasm and charm.  Matt, chef at Raya, was unbelievably helpful with my wife's salt-restricted diet and always came out to check on us.  Our frequent server at Raya, Rachel, became our adopted daughter.  Dean was also terrific in Raya. All staff from reception thru housekeeping had a quick smile, great eye contact and a great greeting for us.  Unforgettable stay and we do hope to return soon.
Manager Response: none

Summary: A total gem!  Stunning vistas, Incredible service from top to bottom.  A notable point for those who like to work out.  The gym is very well equipped with some of the best views of the Pacific Ocean  It 's the place to stay if your visiting the Laguna area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: A little after midnight on the last night of our stay, we were awoken to sound of someone entering our club-floor room.  Luckily the door chain was engaged which was all that kept the intruder at bay, who turned out to be a member of the staff - a security man who said there were reports of a "loud tv" in our room - however there was no tv on in our dead quiet room room.  No one called on the phone before violating our solitude, the guard stated he “let himself in” because we delayed in answering the knock at the door – not surprisingly because we were sound asleep.  This was our second stay at this property, and now our last.  For the nearly $1000 a night price tag for the room, one would expect their privacy would be insured, not to mention a good night’s sleep.  We had a very
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we thank you for choosing our resort.  Our guests' safety anc comfort are our highest missions.  We sincerely apologize for having let you down. Our Executive Office team would welcome the opportunity to discuss your experience further.  Please contact us at (949) 240-2000 at your earliest convenience.  Thank you for your valuable feedback.

Summary: I have been fortunate enough to stay in a lot of Ritz properties in several states and countries.  I can say without reservation this is THE BEST Ritz property I have ever encountered.  We had a medium sized meeting here (about 100 people) and found the meeting facilities ample and comfortable;  the service was prompt and amazing.   The design of the facility was also perfect for facilitating small group interactions and "down-time" informal discussions over a beverage or two. The property was well designed for comfort and relaxation.  Beautiful vistas and relaxing placed to enjoy them.  A fairly easy drive from Orange County John  Wayne Airport (SNA) and proximity to a number of diverse activities (beach walks, surfing, museums, shopping, historical sites etc) made the location
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review on our property.  We are delighted you enjoyed our personalized service.  We take great pride in delivering excellent, warm, and refined service to our guests.  It sounds like you truly enjoyed our facility as well as the local surroundings.  Whether you return for business or pleasure, we look forward to welcoming you back and creating more memories for you.  Thank you for your visit.

Summary: I was there less than 24 hours for a conference, but the hotel staff outdid themselves in friendliness, attentiveness and efficiency...  You can let training a employee empowerment are big parts of the culture. The view from my ocean front room was incredible. The decor is soft and contemporary. Will look forward to coming back with my family next time !
Manager Response: Thank you for the beautiful photo!  Our surroundings are impeccable!  You are right...training and employee empowerment are part of our rich tradition of service excellence.  We will move heaven and earth for our guests.  We are excited to welcome you and your family back.  We have many more experiences to create for you.

Summary: We just spent a 4 day weekend at the Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  It was wonderful.  Service was top, food was great and rooms are perfect.  We had a deluxe ocean facing suite which had a balcony.  It was everything one wants in a deluxe room.  Slight problem getting WIFI (the front desk didn't know what WIFI was??!!!) but otherwise we would highly recommend this spot.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words!  We always want to be the best!  Our team prides themselves on providing the best possible service to each of our valuable guests every day.  We thank you for your feedback about the front desk and ensure that doesn't happen again.  We look forward to welcoming you back again very soon.

Summary: Expensive with sub-par service. On-site dining sucks. Rooms are outdated. Staff acts like you work for them. Spend your money somewhere else. You will be much happier. We stayed there in July 2012. We asked permission to have a local photographer take family pictures while we were there and the management acted like we had just [--] on the lobby floor. The staff is is full of [--] and it is obvious the second you set foot on the property. Don't waste your money.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are so disappointed that we let you down during your stay in July.  We care about you and would welcome a more detailed account of your experience.  If your schedule permits, could you please reach out to our office?  We can be reached at (949) 240-2000.  We want to make this right for you...thank you.

Summary Heading: WOW!! I wish I could stay longer!!What a treat!!
Summary: The views are extraordinary (a L-o-n-g beach with surfers in the distance) and the staff is amazingly responsive and helpful,  and exceptionally professional. (if there were a service employee Olympics, these people would rank on top!)  We were housed on the Executive floor,(special key to get in)-operated -almost like a cruise ship(but with better service) with small platters of food served nearly around the clock-- where the service , if possible ,was even better. (If you want to entertain clients, you can bring them up here, but at a cost of $50  a person-but you will have a great meeting. Note; we were given a suite , but facing the courtyard, not the ocean, so we couldn't hear the surf..There are plenty of places to sit and listen however, both inside and outside.
Manager Response: Thank you for considering us as top contenders in the service Olympics!  We love it!  It sounds like you had a wonderful experience at our resort.....one that will bring you back again in the future.  We enjoyed having you and look forward to creating more memories for you soon.

Summary: This is really an outstanding hotel. The locations on the cliffs is gorgeous.  The staff are very friendly. The decor and specifically the floors are outstanding. The restaurants are really great.  Siting at Raya or 180 with the amazing views is something to be cherished.   It's also very nice to walk down to the sandy beach and watch the surfers.  We will definitely come back.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  We enjoyed having you and hope you took home some lasting memories.  We couldn't agree more that our staff, property, service and surroundings all rank amongst the best in the world. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience.

Summary: The hotel has beautiful views, well-kept grounds and an excellent location with easy access to the beach (short walk down a somewhat steep hill or catch a cart ride down/up).  Oberst06's review put it very well that the service is welcoming and friendly without being obsequious.  The first bellman we interacted with recognized us throughout our stay and was always pleasant but never too much.  The valet parking was flawless and the person at the outside valet desk recognized us by name by the second day in a relaxed manner without it being a gimmick.  Good American hotels sure do service well, and this one might be the best yet.  Also echo Oberst06's view that the rooms are very good, but some upgrades might be in order, and in particular, it would be great to lose the carpet in
Manager Response: Thank you for noticing our playful approach to luxury.  We will always provide the most personal and refined service in our industry. Our resort is truly an icon amongst the southern California coastline.  Our highest mission is to always provide excellent service and facilities to every one of our valuable guests.  We are delighted you enjoyed yourself and we look forward to welcoming you back very soon.  Thank you for your visit!

Summary: The Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel by far is the most spectacular hotel.  Stunning views, the impeccable service, and the beauty of this hotel makes this a must see.  The website for this property is true to what you see when you arrive.  The entrance, the lobby, and the views from the picture windows throughout the hotel are simply breathtaking.  The Market Place is a wonderful location for coffee, pastry, candy, or just relaxing.  180Blue provides spectacular views of the sunset.  There are plenty of locations throughout the hotel to just sit, relax, and enjoy the hotel and the view.  Our oceanfront view room with a balcony exceeded our expectations and provided priceless memories of our stay.  If you are a golfer, let the Ritz Carlton plan your ultimate golf get-a-way at Monarch
Manager Response: Thank you for your inspiring review of our resort!  You have painted a beautiful and accurate picture of what we offer and we are delighted that you enjoyed our facility and surroundings in every way.  What an incredible rainbow we experienced on that day!  As you know we pride ourselves in offering outstanding luxury experiences in a warm and relaxed environment.  It was a pleasure having you with us and we look forward to creating more memories for you in the near future.  Thank you for staying with us!

Summary Heading: Une femme d'un age certain - mais tres formidable neanmoins!
Summary: I've stayed here five or six times over the past 15 years and have always enjoyed myself.  The location, as others have noted, is among the more beautiful spots in the USA, and I suspect it would be easy to enjoy while sleeping in a pup tent.  This is clearly more than a tent, however, and there are expectations one has in staying at a R-C property; as with previous visits, my expectations were met.  The staff are uniformly welcoming and friendly without being obsequious, and any request I made was responded to promptly.  The rooms are well-furnished and comfortable, although as the title of the review implies some upgrades might be in order, notably the carpet.  The hotel has noted that it is addressing this.  I should mention that I arrived very early in the morning yet they
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed feedback...we greatly appreciate it!  We are embarking on a room enhancement project and you will hopefull notice this the next time you stay that the carpet will be replaced, as well as many other small yet noticeable touches.  We are very excited.  We enjoyed having you and creating memories for you.  Your wishes and needs will always be met and exceeded each time you visit us.  We will see you soon!

Summary Heading: It really looks like the pictures
Summary: This is the first hotel I have stayed in that actually has the spectacular views shown in  the pictures on the website.  The walk down to the beach is pretty steep, but they have carts to run guests down and back. But this allows for stunning views from the ocean view rooms and the restaurant and bar. They also have a great outdoor terrace with a nice menu and good sushi in the evenings.  There's not much to walk to right by the hotel, but downtown Dana Point is only a few minutes away and Laguna Beach isn't far either.  The rooms are pretty typical for a Ritz property and the bathrooms are huge; plenty of room for 2 people to get ready at the same time without stepping all over each other.
Manager Response: It sounds like you enjoyed alot of what our property and area have to offer....we love to hear that!  We agree; it is spectacular here and we hope you enjoyed our fine personal service.  We look forward to welcoming back again soon.

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel, but a bit pricey for what you get.
Summary: We just stayed at the Ritz in a club level room this weekend and although it is a nice hotel we have stayed in nicer and we just found it a bit pricey for the room we had - especially in October.  The suite was well over $1,000 per night for a garden view which was more like the front entrance driveway view. It makes me wonder what they would charge in July and August. Meals at the hotel were also nothing great and in fact we ordered room service the first night because we came in late and we were tired and my pizza had a junk of plastic in it!  I called to let them know and they graciously offered to take it off the bill, but still...this is the Ritz Carlton!  The good stuff: the view of the beach is amazing. It is in a perfect location. The club level - awesome!!!! Snacks and
Manager Response: We are so glad that you enjoyed your experience overall.  Our Ambassadors of the Environment programs are truly one of a kind and very special.  We hope to welcome you back in the future so we may share with you more exciting adventures!  If there is anything we can do for you in the mean time, please reach out to us at any time.  Thank you for your valuable feedback.

Summary: Stayed at the property for one night in October as part of a conference.  The Ritz may be expensive, but the service and views make it worth it.  All food and beverage was delicious, well prepared, and served with a smile.  The hotel set us up with a golf outing at a nearby course, which was a great experience coming from the east coast.  Wish I could have stayed longer, or that my wife and family could have joined me.
Manager Response: It is great to hear that you enjoyed our service and facility for your short one-night business stay.  It is our hope that you will return in the future with your family to truly enjoy all that we have to offer.  We look forward to welcoming you back and creating lifelong memories for you and your family.

Summary: We stayed in a mid scale room which was just under $1000 a night and I couldnt believe what we got for it. A small room with a small balcony with a partial view of the ocean. As I stood on the balcony I could touch the person standing on the neigbouring balcony they were so close together. There was no mini bar and the price of renting a movie in the room was more expensive than going to the movies. The decor has changed in the main part of the hotel and it is gaudy and brightly lit. What happened to the elegance? There were children lying around the floor and making noise in the bar after 10.30, this is a time when I really don't want to listen to children running around as they run around the hotel all day. Terrible experience and had to leave early as we were not prepared to
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback.  We listen to our guests and take all comments to heart.  We are sorry to have let you down and would welcome a personal conversation with you.  Please feel free to reach out to us at (949) 240-2000.  We look forward to hearing more about your experience, and hope you choose to visit us again.  Thank you again for your feedback.

Summary Heading: Beautiful Hotel in a Beautiful Location
Summary: If you are looking for a luxury hotel in with a stunning view of the beach, cliffs, and ocean in orange county the Ritz has it. The only downside is that for what you I wish a few other amenities were included like a breakfast, or valet parking. With that said though if you can afford it, it would be a great location to have a get away weekend to lay back and relax. If you have AAA, they give discounts so don't forget to ask!
Manager Response: We are delighted to know you enjoyed the resort and the beautiful surroundings, and we look forward to welcoming back again soon!

Summary Heading: A stay at the Ritz is always a treat
Summary: This was my second time to stay at this particular Ritz Carlton.  Just mention the name Ritz Carlton and you know you will have a wonderful, quality experience.  This RC, perched on a cliff overlooking the Pacific with surfers below and surrounded by beauty is unsurpassed in almost every way.  If you can financially swing it or if you have a chance to stay here for a business trip, do so!  The hotel was perfect in almost every way but two--the carpet in my room was slightly worse for wear, and the landscaping on the ocean side looked a bit tired and dirty (not sure whether due to bad weather or lack of attention).  But all else was on target.  Excellent service, smiles all around, beautiful decor, beautiful flowers in lobby, beautiful art in lobby and elsewhere, over-the-top
Manager Response: We are delighted to learn that you enjoyed many of the wonderful attributes of our gorgeous beach front resort.  Thank you for your visit.  We greatly appreciate your feedback and are working on both the areas you have mentioned to ensure we are always providing the finest in facilities for our guests. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Stayed here for a business conference in a room near the pool.   The location was spectacular and the dining was good, but the rooms were nearing the need for an upgrade. Nevertheless, the location was spectacular, especially in the early morning.
Manager Response: We couldn't agree with you more...our location and surroundings are one of a kind!  We are delighted you enjoyed the resort, and we look forward to welcoming you back to enjoy our new room enhancements coming soon!  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate it!

Summary Heading: Great location plagued by unacceptable service
Summary: Being heavy travelers my wife and I decided to take some time in OC during a trip to LA last week to unwind and relax. The ritz was at the top of our list given its spectacular location at the top of a bluff just north of Dana point. We spent 6 days at the resort last week and witnessed many of the pros and cons the property has to offer. First off the location is superb with amazing ocean and costal views all around you. Property is very large and accommodates to the business and personal crowd with a multitude of different options/services. Room was nice and clean with a great view of the coast. We were in club level so benefited from a higher location and view. Staff were friendly but overwhelmingly challenged with execution. I am not exaggerating when I say that we had at
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid feedback.  We greatly appreciate hearing from our valued guests.  We are so sorry our service and facilities did not meet your expectations, and we would like to speak with your further about your experience.  We look forward to speaking with you (949) 240-2000.

Summary: Really enjoyed my one night stay here - incredible location and beautiful sea views from the room.  Such comfy beds - so high up felt like the princess and the pea!  Lovely bathrooms.  Such nice pool areas and the option of the beach too.  Ate dinner and breakfast in Raya - both really excellent and just stunning views out of the huge windows.  Only negative was the constant presence of the housekeeping trolleys - I think I met at least 5 one each trip down a corridor, I felt that could have been a little more discreet.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful comments.  We are delighted you enjoyed some of the many offerings of the resort.  We appreciate your feedback regarding housekeeping service and we agree with you.  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: I've been lucky to travel extensively and stay at a lot of amazing hotels around the world.  One of the places that I have always wanted to stay was the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel at Dana Point.  So, for a week getaway with my wife, I ventured out to Dana Point on Labor Day.  The timing was perfect as the hotel was nearly empty.  We had the beautiful pool to ourselves and the pick of the best table for dinner.  We had such a wonderful time that the week flew by and we never left the hotel.  The facility is beautiful and in one of the most picturesque locations in the US.  It sits high above the cliffs with awesome views of the Pacific and the coast.  Splurge the extra $$$'s and go for an Ocean front room, you will not regret it.  The Raya restaurant is not to be missed and if
Manager Response: We are so glad you had a chance to enjoy our resort to the fullest.  We enjoyed having you!  Come back again soon so we can surprise and delight you even more.  Thank you for posting your honest review....it was heart warming to read.

Summary: My kids (20, 17 & 12) and I stayed here for 3 days in August.  The entire experience was amazing - we had a spectacular view from our room, the concierge was very helpful (booking several outings including golf & whale watching for us before we even got there), the staff was very accommodating - an overall spectacular stay! We ate in the hotel several nights and had great food - especially the night with live music and sushi on the balcony.  We happened to be there for Yappy Hour (a fund raiser on the first Thursday of the month for the local animal shelter) and loved the dogs & their owners!  The hotel was busy with lots of families but we had a great experience in every way.  Perfect weather, great room, spectacular view - a magical stay in every way!
Manager Response: We hope to see all of you again soon.  Perhaps we can be your new home away from home.  We enjoyed creating memories for your children as well...they are very important!  We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: The good. Beautiful views. Clean rooms. Great (public) beach. Tasty food. Fabulous kids club. Excellent club level. Mostly excellent service.  The bad. No warning the waves on the beach are killer! They hand you a boogie board to go die. Mainly about the conferences, so some of the hotels best areas were reserved for the week. So why market them to the rest of us?  The ugly. Marriott has made it almost impossible to extend your stay. This ritz has taken it to a high art of near impossibility. Really you have rooms available but I have to call the 1-800 to do so..I think not Fine....on to the next hotel. Most Ritz just try to charge extra if you do not call the 1-800. Matresses....we had 4 beds, average to horrible...folks if you are trying to sell your bedding why not try
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback!  We greatly appreciate hearing from you. Your comments have been well received.  If we can be of further assistance to you please do not hesitate to contact our office at (949) 240-2000.  We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary Heading: just as nice the second time around
Summary: We spent a week here for a meeting; the property is an nice as ever. The only downside to the room was the "garden view" that turned out to be a view of the front driveway. We made sure to not spend alot of time in the room, and why would you with the beautiful grounds and beach just around the corner.  The staff are very friendly, all would greet you and smile; housekeeping was timely for the most part, and the rooms were serviced twice daily (which was nice with after beach showers, etc).  Included in the resort fee is the beach set up, which was very nice, including chairs, umbrellas, and boogie boards. The valet staff is prompt, friendly, and helpful.  You can get a good cup of dark coffee at the coffeeshop in the morning; Raya was lovely for lunch, the view is spectacular.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback.  It is very helpful.  We value your loyalty to our resort and we look forward to being your host for years to come.  Our service will never let you down.

Summary Heading: RITZ CARLTON LAGUNA NIGUEL UNPARALLELED VIEWS AND SERVICE
Summary: I spend labor at The Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel and had a wonderful time.  First te location is amazing.  Situated in South Orange County, California the location has some of the best weather on the planet.  No air-conditioning required in the summer and hardly a need for heat in the winter.  Then the view is incredible.  This is all on top of great appointments and service.
Manager Response: Thank you for your photos!  We love them!  We couldn't agree with you more....it is paradise here.  We look forward to welcoming you back for another "staycation" soon!

Summary: The property was beautiful! The views are amazing! It was such a busy weekend that it took 3 hrs to get into our rooms. We stayed on the club level so at least we could enjoy the drinks and snacks they had to offer. As long as we stayed on the 4th floor we were treated wonderfully. At dinner we waited an hour and a half for our food to come. The food was great once we got it. We went down to the pool and not once were we ever asked if we wanted a drink. The servers looked upset to be working that day. They also misplaced our friends bags so that took a while to sort out as well. I know they must have been busy this weekend, but I expect a lot more from such a high class hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your valuable feedback.  We greatly appreciate your time in posting a review on TripAdvisor.  On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, it saddens us if one of our valuable guests departs the resort without the best possible experience and memories.  We would welcome the opportinity to discuss your stay further.  Please feel free to contact us at (949) 240-2000 so we can ensure your next Ritz-Carlton experience is a true Ritz-Carlton experience.  Thank you once again for your review.

Summary: beautiful location.  STUNNING VIEWS. absolutely breathtaking vista. a comfy mattress and smiling staff. ... however....  i spent 6 dollars for a diet coke; enough said.  this hotel makes you feel as if you are in the middle of vegas/disneyland/epcot center/ chucky cheeze.   there are children everywhere, international weddings around every corner, and euro-trash fragrance pumped into the lobby.  the decor is expensive yet tasteless.  the hotel was PACKED like an airport and the bars close at 11pm.  the rooms are simple and small without any amenities. the staff is friendly yet something feels as if they have no formal training whatsoever, and they lack a sense of class. the beach is small and public and the pools are littered with 'marco polo' and splashy unattended children.
Manager Response: We are so sorry you feel that way, and we thank you for your feedback.  If there is a time of year that would work better for you to return for a future visit, please contact our Executive Office directly at (949) 240-2000 and we will ensure your stay is much more to your liking.  Our goal is to provide exceptional memories for each of our guests on a personal one-on-one basis.  We would welcome the chance to change your perception of our world-class resort.
