Summary: This is my favorite place to stay in the world! The location is breath taking as is the hotel... everything is just perfect here and a little more laid back then your regular Ritz which is really nice because I have stayed at some & they are a bit too stuffy for my tastes. You have beach goers along with people trying to "fancy" and it is a good mix. This place will make you forget all your troubles and stress just melts away... actually, it just doesn't exist. The staff are there and attentive without being n your face. Very, very nice!
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed our little slice of heaven!  Thank you for enjoying the many offerings we have at the resort.  You are the most important guest when you are with us, and our promise to you is to make your stress disappear and let us do the work for you.  We hope you visit us again soon....it is our pleasure!

Summary: The food was good not great, although the service was top-notch (we loved 180 Blue). The pool was nice, however, I wish the adult pool was bigger for lap swimming.  Having said that, this hotel-property screams luxury and class. I would have loved to have had another few nights. I can't think of a better place to relax and unwind. The view is spectacular from every part of the hotel, except the pool. The property is clean and spacious, you can run along the beach, which is beautiful by the way. The gym is updated with great equipment, moreover, the panoramic view of the ocean while you're working out is just over the top spectacular!!! The valet service was first rate!! The valet staff went above and beyond asking if we needed directions, water or any other services. The maid
Manager Response: We couldn't agree with you more, and we couldn't imagine a better place to rest and unwind in a luxurious, refined and relaxed atmosphere. Given we have a spectacular view and facility, it really is our ladies and gentlemen who make our guests' visits memorable.  We are very proud of our team and know we speak for them when we say we look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: Myself, husband 2 & 5 year old spent 4 days at this property after 3 days in Beverly hills & prior to 9 days at pelican hill!  Apart from a stunning location & a few excellent staff members (manager ronnie & maintenance man Miquel) we were highly disappointed with the standard! Rooms on the surface very nice, however the carpet in our suite smelt so bad, it turned my stomach! The AC was so noisy we literally didn't sleep for our entire stay (I have never encountered anything like it) to be fair the hotel offered to move us, however on nite 2 (out of 4 nites) did not feel worth it! We were credited a full nights stay, but it ruined the experience! Food really bad in every restaurant apart from the outside bar overlooking the ocean! The service in the steak bar was really lacking.
Manager Response: Thank you for your very candid feedback; we greatly appreciate hearing from you.  In order to effectively work through the number of issues you have mentioned, we would be grateful if you could call our office directly.  We look forward to speaking with you, thank you.  We can be reached at (949) 240-2000.  We hope to have the opportunity to serve you again in the future so you can  experience our true Ritz-Carlton mystique.

Summary: We were there recently for a week-end getaway from Toronto and I have to say it was a very memorable experience.  My family of four (8-12 yr olds in tow) felt we had been away for a week after spending just two days in the hotel.  The beach was wonderful for all.  The kids played in the sand or boogie boarded, the beach concierge took care of everything when we arrived there (they have a private tram) and made us feel very special.  The restaurant and bar offerings are excellent.  Have the Fish Taco that is on the menu in the restaurant overlooking the cliff.....make sure you order a double because you will absolutely love it. The steak house (new concept) delivered its fine meat and accoutrements but the wine list was not up to par with the food, so I ordered the wine off
Manager Response: Thank you for enjoying some of the many offerings we have at the resort!  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay and took memories home with you.  We look forward to your future business, and are looking forward to creating more memories for you and your family soon.  Welcome home!

Summary: Luxurious hotel in a magnificent setting. Staff couldn't have been more helpful. Clean room with nice bathroom and good housekeeping. Request a quiet room as ours was next to the lifts and quite noisy at night with people returning to their rooms. Also (our room was 3001) was adjacent to a courtyard where wedding and conference receptions dined so not great if you are after peace and quiet in the evenings. Conference guests also landed in the restaurant in the eve so felt we were at work at times! Also the 35 dollars per day valet parking automatically added to bill took us by surprise. No self park available either so if you have a car prepare to pay! If you are aware of these points before you go it may help!
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review about our resort.  We appreciate your feedback.  We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Please let us know about your future stays with us and we will be sure to choose the right guest room to suit your needs.

Summary: Stayed here for 5 days. The hotel is superb. The views to the beach, the beach itself, the rooms, the service and the food are fantastic. The complimentary seats,boogie boards and fins at the beach and the shuttle to an from are a great idea. (shuttle only takes 30-40 seconds) The beach was lovely and the waves great fun. There are two pools one for families and the other a quieter area for swimmers. My only negatives were the seats at the family pool were very tightly packed together and the rooms while they decor and comfort was great the walls were paper thin. I would love to stay in this hotel again, it was expensive but for a treat, very worthwhile.
Manager Response: We look forward to creating more memories for you the next time you visit us.  We are delighted you had a chance to experience our facilities and beach.  We enjoy treating our guests with the utmost care and comfort.  Thank you for your valuable comments!

Summary: This hotel is simply outstanding. We have been there many times before but the experience just gets better each time. the hotel is friendly, polite and the service intuitive. the restaurants all work very well. Raya and 180blu now very well established with enoSteak a very good 2012 addition. If you come, stay on the club level as it is like a private hotel within a five star resort property. Led by Penni Garcia since the property opened the team provide exceptional service to new and repeat guests. Nothing is too much trouble. Many guests come for extended stays during the summer and, at times, the club is very crowded it all seems to work. The club is small by comparison with more recently opened properties but is an exemplar of phenomenal service offsetting the physical
Manager Response: "Heaven on earth"....we love it!  That is exactly the refined luxury experience we wish to provide all of our valuable guests.  We are delighted you enjoyed all that we have to offer.  Perhaps next time you can stay in one of our fireside rooms...they are heavenly as well.  We trust you took with you some life long memories, and we look forward to creating more new ones for you soon!

Summary: My wife and i had a brief, one night stay at this property and absolutely loved it.  The customer service was outstanding, the standard room we had was beautifully done, the hotel restaurants and bar were superb (with helpful wait staff as well), and the view of the ocean is incredible.  Throw in a great fitness center and a nice little sitting area outside our room, im not sure there was any aspect of our stay that was less than excellent.
Manager Response: Thank you for the compliments!  Next time you will have to stay with us for more than one evening.  We will exceed your expectations with our elegant yet refined service and ambience. We thrive on providing each of our guests with a memorable experience.  We look forward to your next arrival.

Summary: This property is a true Ritz Carlton experience! Formal elegance is defined here..... From the moment you drive up you can feel the elegance before even entering the facility. The Bellhops and Valet are immediately attentive and know exactly what to do. The luggage is quickly placed on a cart and the vehicle is swiftly valet parked. With 2 tickets in hand - one for luggage and one for parking you are quickly directed to the check in counter where the hosts check you in and refer to you by name. The decor is modern furnishings with a bit of a formal touch; Perhaps, the most distinguishing features of this property was the fantastic art gallery down one of the wings in the lobby, and of course the spectacular views of the Pacific from atop a cliff side. The oceanfront room
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback!  We couldn't agree with you more that our view and sunsets are out of this world.  They are so special.  We promise to always provide each of our guests a warm, relaxed, refined luxury experience with many life long memories attached. We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you are traveling from LA to San Diego.

Summary: This is one of my favorite hotels. The employees are so friendly. The rooms are beautiful and the views are unmatched. We were there for a business payoff and even the food at the morning buffet was to die for. We had a party on the grass overlooking the water and it truly was the perfect night. I know the rooms are expensive, but if you can swing it for a night or two, you will really feel like you went on vacation to somewhere exotic!
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome photos!  We love seeing them!  Whether you visit us on business or pleasure, we promise to always make you feel like royalty.  We are excited to welcome you back very soon!

Summary: Magnificent property with stunning cliff views.  Great gym with workout overlooking the Pacific.   Expensive but worth every penny.  A great place to splurge for a special occasion.  Service was attentive but not annoying.   They know how to pamper guests.
Manager Response: We will always pamper you every time you visit us...with a warm, relaxed, yet refined luxury experience.  We look forward to creating more memories for you.  See you soon!

Summary: Very nice hotel with wonderful service.  The valets rush to assist upon arrival whether you're in a Bugatti or a lil' ol' BMW [:-)] with a surfboard on top.  Inside and on the grounds the hotel is bustling with people having weddings and other events.  Typically I prefer a much quieter environment, but it was okay because I was still able to find a quiet spot on the beach as well as enjoy great service.  We were advised several times to reserve the restaurants in advance because it's so busy, but we didn't so we had great sushi and bar food on the outdoor portico.  It was also very crowded and people were waiting for tables.    The beach has a little surf break at the south end.  It is also a public beach and kind of crowded but at the south surf end it was possible to get some
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post a review about our resort.  We appreciate your feedback!  We hope we created many lasting memories for your during your stay with us, and we look forward to creating more for you in the future.

Summary: The hotel is beautiful.  Incredible views.  Situated about 150 feet above the Pacific.  The public space in the hotel is very clean as are the rooms.  However, I have never been a fan of carpet in the rooms...I prefer hardwood floors.   Beds were comfortable but just a touch too "fluffly." This is the only downside I can see in the hotel.  Service was exceptional.  Lots of College / University students but trained very well.  Food at Raya was very good!  Close to Legoland and Sea World, both of which I enjoyed surprisingly.  Shows at Legoland were a lot of fun.  About an hour to Los Angeles and San Diego.   Nice beach though not like the beach at the Ritz Carlton in Grand Cayman.  The waves at times were as high as I have seen.  My 3 year old loved them (as do the dozens of
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely comments.  We highly recommend you experience one of our suites that has wood flooring....sounds like you would love it.  And of course we will always serve you at the beach!  It would be our beach butler's pleasure.  We look forward to the opportunity!

Summary: We recently stayed for one night and wished were staying longer.  The hotel  was very busy when we arrived however check-in was a breeze. Our bellman, Paul was friendly and a true professional, he took time to be extremely helpful and informative about the hotel.We had a room with a ocean view that was spectacular. We spent the afternoon by the beautiful pool, where we relaxed to live music and great food and drinks at the poolside. The pool crew was very attentive. We later had drinks and apps on the outside terrance, it was rather crowded but we witnessed an unbelievably gorgeous sunset over the pacific ocean. In the morning we headed down to the beach, a golf cart takes you down to the beach and the hotel provides beach chairs and even body boards.  Salt Creek Beach is
Manager Response: We agree with you!  Paul is an asset to our team and we are delighted you got to meet him.  We are delighted that you have found a new home and we look forward to welcoming you back for many more amazing sunsets.  We enjoyed having you with us.

Summary: We stayed in the Club Level for four nights in August.  It is one of the best hotel we had ever stayed.  The view is gorgeous!  We love the wonderful staffs; especially Diane - the Club Level Concierge, and Christine at Kid’s Club.  The only regret is that we didn’t booked an ocean view room.  We’ll definitely be back next year!
Manager Response: Club Level is the only way to go!  Our Club staff are incredible!  Book that ocean view well in advance....they are hard to come by during the summer.  Hopefully we will see you before next summer, but if not we will be eagerly anticipating your arrival.  Until then we hope you hold on to the memories that were created here for you.

Summary: It's good for business to be busy but I agree with another reviewer about the Valet.. my goodness, great service but crazy busy!!!!  We stood in line for a while when we arrived and also waited a while when leaving.  The hotel is beautiful and has excellent service anywhere you go but it is so busy that its distracting.  The only thing I didn't like was the beach on the weekend, we realize it's public, so the Marriott/Ritz company has no control over it but the crowd was less than desirable at times... it was PACKED, we could barely walk on the sand without stepping over people.  The good thing was the Ritz employees who took care of our umbrellas, towels and chairs.  Too bad that public shack has such nasty restrooms because that means you have to go all the way back up to use
Manager Response: We agree, we are a very desirable resort and location in the summer months.  Our highest mission will never change however and that is to ensure every single one of our guests is treated with the utmost respect and refined genuine care.  We look forward to welcoming you back one day very soon.  Thank you for staying with us!

Summary: We were so happy with this resort! We went to celebrate an anniversary, and having never been to the area, were nervous to choose a resort. We hemmed and hawed between being in Laguna Beach or the quieter Dana Point. For our purposes, Dana Point was perfect - picturesque, quiet, and peaceful.   The hotel itself is amazing. The service starts the minute you arrive and it never let up. Never obtrusive, always warm and friendly. We were concerned that as it was a Ritz property we might feel "out of place," but this was a relaxed place, where you could wear shorts and a t-shirt or get totally dressed up for dinner and neither was inappropriate.  The food was great everywhere we ate, the breakfasts overlooking the ocean though were perfect. I'm still thinking about them. We loved all
Manager Response: What a thoughtful review, thank you!  You experienced our resort exactly how we wished you to.  We will never let you down.  And when you bring your children.....they will be our Guests Of The Day!  We look forward to it.  Keep those memories tight, and when you return we will create more for you.

Summary Heading: Club level is as nice as advertised
Summary: The food and drink amenities on the club level were excellent.  Fantastic even.  I found the added expense of club level to be a good value, as we had a large group, including kids, and wanted easy access to food.  If you plan to eat or drink elsewhere, the value proposition might change.  Concierge was extremely helpful in many small thoughtful ways.  The hotel is enormous.  Be prepared for the possibility of Las Vegas length walks between the lobby or pool and your room.    A car is necessary to get just about anywhere.  The valet staff were overburdened at times -- and occasionally we cooled our heels waiting for our auto.    The hotel is on top of a cliff.  Makes the views fantastic, but it is a very, very long walk down a very steep hill to get to the beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to spend your stay with us on our exclusive Club Level.  We agree, our team and facilities on Club are first class.  We are glad you enjoyed it!  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary: The entrance is beautiful with fresh flowers surrounding the main lobby. Liked the main restaurant that over looked the ocean - just stunning views. The little snack/deli/coffee area was great and comfortable. The two connecting rooms that we stayed in were beautiful but just could not rate this property excellent due to the condition of the carpet. It wasn't in need of vacuuming - it was in need of complete replacement. It was beyond professional cleaning - completely revolting with multiple stains and black imbedded dirt covering most of the room. For a high-end luxury resort such as this, we were shocked at the condition. What we thought was just as bad was that we filled out a comment card expressing this disappointment, handed it to the concierge and we have yet to receive
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback!  We love hearing from you and all of our valuable guests.  Your concerns are taken seriously.  We sincerely apologize for the delay in responding to your comment card.  Please know that we do have it and appreciate you taking the time to fill it out.  We hope to welcome you back again after our renovation enhancements are completed in several months.  The carpet will be replaced at that time (starting later this year).  We know you will enjoy that improvement as well as many others we will be doing.  Feel free to reach out to us in the Executive Office any time.  We would love to hear from you!

Summary Heading: Not a good choice for romance or relaxation
Summary: Went to Ritz for a relaxing getaway with my husband.  Imagined ourselves lounging poolside with a cocktail and a good book and then drifting away to a nice nap.  NO POSSIBLE!  The hotel is so kid friendly that every area of the hotel is overrun with loud unruly children.  There are 2 pools, so no reason not to make one for those over 13.  But instead there were really loud kids screaming at both pools, running back and forth by our table at lunch at Raya, and throngs of them in the lobby.  If you are looking for peace and quiet this hotel is way to big to be able to provide it.  Think Vegas and you get the picture.  The staff was all very, very friendly though.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback.  We greatly appreciate your time.  On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we are sorry to have let you down.  We do hope you choose to give us another chance during a slower occupancy time.  We enjoy creating relaxing and romantic memories, and want to do this for you in the near future.

Summary Heading: beautiful views, but otherwise a bit disappointing
Summary: We planned a week in southern California, staying first in San Diego, then the Ritz in Laguna, then the Santa Monica Beach Hotel. The Ritz was the most beautiful of the three, but we all agreed in every other way the other 2 were better. It started with check-in, when we weren't put in adjoining rooms after I was assured on the phone that we would be. So the clerk did manage to get us adjoining rooms, but they weren't ready until 6:00pm. The other 2 hotels no problem---adjoining rooms like I asked for, ready ahead of time even!  Otherwise service was pretty good, although one night we had a reservation at Raya and hostess told us to have seat on the couch across the foyer while our table was set (there were tons of empty tables, so this seemed weird) Then she just forgot about
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  It is very valuable and we take it to heart.  If we have let you down in any way, please allow us the chance to make it up to you.  When you would like to return to the resort, please contact the Executive Office directly and we will ensure your next stay with us is perfect.

Summary Heading: Favourite hotel of our trip but check your bill!!!
Summary: We stayed for 3 nights with our two teenagers and 9 year old son.  The reception area was beautiful with wonderful flower arrangements.  Check-in was fine and we were met by the customer relations manager and someone showed us to our room.  We went for our lunch at 180Blu which has spectacular views of the pacific.  Lunch was excellent.  Our rooms were lovely and we had wonderful views.  We had dinner at the hotel's restaurant and had a wonderful meal with ingredients and flavour combinations we had never tried before. Fantastic service.  The pool area was a little old fashioned I thought, with rows of sunbeds facing a rather boring pool.  However, it was a very relaxing place to be and the waiters made sure we had everything we wanted. Special mention for Zack by the pool - a
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our property.  We greatly appreciate the feedback.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon so we may provide you with a memorable experience.  We promise not to let you down.  Our ladies and gentlemen are eager to serve you.  Thanks again.

Summary: Just left the Laguna Niguel after an 8night stay and have stayed here on two other occasions along with the next door Montage.  In addition, have stayed at many Ritz Carlton hotels around the world but this current trip was an uneven and disappointing combined business and vacation experience with my husband as a travel companion. Definitely the worst 5-star hotel experience I have ever had.   1.  Our highlight was the first night arriving among the amazing flower arrangements at the registration desk and heading off to 180 Blu with terrific and attentive service and lovely food and wine with an unmatched view.  Love sitting on that beautiful open aired space overlooking the ocean vista. Sadly the trip only seemed to spiral downward after the first day - we tried to replicate
Manager Response: Your feedback is critical and we greatly appreciate all of it.  We will use it strategically and promptly. Could you please phone our executive team at (949) 240-2000 at your earliest convenience so we may ensure that we come to a satisfactory resolution with you?  Thank you in advance for your time.  We look forward to regaining your faith in us.

Summary: We just completed a week-long stay at this hotel.  It's scenery is world class.  Unfortunately its service is not.  I am a member of Ritz Carlton rewards and have stayed at 17 different Ritz Carlton hotels.  This is the worst one I have been to.   1.  The walls are paper thin.  This reminds me of a Hampton Inn.  2.  It caters to the masses.  It is a large hotel and caters to meetings and weddings.  I understand this pays the bills, but it is not helpful to an out of town guest who is personally paying for their own vacation.    If you cater to the masses, you become a Marriott.  The valet situation at this hotel is out of control.  They need more help.  There are too many locals/non-registered guests visiting the hotel to cater to the hotel guests.  Finally, for the first time
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and constructive criticism, thank you.  It has been taken to heart and will be used appropriately and promptly.  We would be very interested in speaking with you further and personally, and hope you have a moment to contact our executive team at (949) 240-2000.  You are valuable to us and we want to make it right for you.

Summary: We were prepared to be amazed!  We've stayed at other RC's and remembered being very pleased and have heard nothing but amazing reviews of this one.  Our 1st impression was "how are we supposed to fit 5 people in this room!?" followed quickly by "really? This is our view? We're Platinum members and we get 1st floor and no view despite making reservation nearly a year in advance and requesting an upgraded room numerous times!?" The staff was nice enough, no issues there, but there was no legendary service going on.   In fact, I had to call twice for towels by the pool.  3 days in a row we arrived to the smaller pool to find ZERO towels and piles of soiled towels on lounge chairs.  So if we wanted to dry off we couldn't nor could we find a place to sit unless we were willing to
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review and photos of our property.  We enjoyed having you as our guest.  With so many experiences waiting for you, we would be delighted to invite you back to enjoy the resort and memories at a time when our occupancy is lower than during the summer months.  We are most certain you would enjoy yourself.  Please feel free to contact our office at (949) 240-2000 so we can ensure your next Ritz-Carlton experience is a true Ritz-Carlton experience.

Summary: My wife and I first visited the Ritz Carlton in July 2008 for a retirement party for my predecessor.  When asked where I would like to have my retirement party (I live in Virginia), I immediately selected the Ritz.  This time, in addition to my wife, my two adult daughters accompanied me. My wife and I had an oceanside room and my daughters had ocean views.  While the rooms could have been larger, they were nonetheless, very nice.  The staff were all excellent, very knowledgeable, efficient, and friendly. The public areas are exquisite, particularly the flower arrangements and the landscaping.Three things keep the Ritz from being perfect, however -- the large flat screen TVs only receive analog chanels--no digitals.  This was a huge disappointment since, having gotten use to
Manager Response: Thank you for the photos....we love seeing them!  You will be glad to know we are replacing all of our televisions very soon.  We are excited to share them and all of our upcoming enhancements with you (perhaps during your next visit).  We have noted your preference for a coffee maker in your room and will make sure we have that for you the next time you stay with us.  If you could give us a call at 949 240 2000, we would be more than happy to replace the shoes that were lost.  Thank you for your feedback.

Summary Heading: 10 day stay, wish it was more
Summary: Delivered in all aspects, staff are all friendly, knowledgeable and well trained.  From our welcome at the Valet parking to departure all were spot-on. The boys and girls at the beach could not have been better, they assist to set you up with chairs/towels/water/boogie boards/flippers and brolly. The views are superb, location is prime site and from hotel poolside to surf is a 2 minute stroll-perfect!  Is it expensive? of course it is but value and price are not the same thing and in my opinion you get good value all round. Recommended.
Manager Response: Congratulations on your ten-night stay!  That is fantastic and we thank you.  We look forward to your next ten-night visit.  We will have so much fun creating more unique experiences and memories for you.  Welcome home.

Summary Heading: the place to stay in orange county
Summary: if you are going to visit orange county and want an experience to remember for a lifetime, this is the place to stay.  service is excellent.  spa and pools are fabulous.  new gym is right on ocean and never crowded.  views are some of the most beautiful of all hotels in the world.  beach is not crowded certain times of the year.  facilities are vast and immaculate.  food is delicious.  would not even need to leave resort to enjoy your stay.  golf nearby, bike paths, jogging on the beach, surfing, swimming, fun for kids, weddings.  thanksgiving buffet is enormous and outstanding, including service, variety and freshness.  you cannot beat this place!  and yes, it is expensive, but worth it!!
Manager Response: We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us!  We enjoyed creating memories for you to take home with you and keep for a lifetime.  You have found your new home away from home!  We are very proud of our Orange County jewel and we look forward to sharing it with you again soon.

Summary Heading: Aesthetically pleasing, but very poor service
Summary: I just completed a weekend stay at this property.  I have stayed here several times before and always had a pleasurable experience.  Hence my decision to stay again on my birthday, as I do every year.  The property is very aesthetically pleasing.  Everything is very clean and you really feel as though you are at a 5 star property.  Unfortunately, that is where it stops though.  The service at this hotel is horrible, to say the least.  Where do I start?  The valet assistant was very helpful in taking us to our room.  It was mentioned that it was my birthday and he said he would make sure something was done (champagne, strawberries, etc.).  This was not expected or requested.  However, we very much appreciated the thought.  Nothing ever happened.  No birthday wishes from the Ritz
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback.  We take your feedback seriously and will use it as learning and coaching for our leaders.  We take great pride in the service we provide and are very disappointed that we have let you down.  Could you kindly contact our team in the Executive Office to discuss your experience further?  We can be reached at (949 240 2000).  Thank you again for your time.

Summary: This property had fallen a bit, but thanks to the local ompetition, has refurbished and revitalized. Above a spectacular beach, it is truly a jewel in this area.  Service is wonderful, and updated restaurants and bars are great.  Only down side--a destination for the corporate conference crowd, which tend to be loud, ruining the beach vibe.
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid feedback.  We are glad you have experienced our enhancements. Although our business levels have increased, you are still extremely important to us.  It is our highest mission to make you want to return again and again, and feel extra special on every occasion.

Summary: Breathtaking views of the Pacific Ocean while enjoying an amazing lunch. I would highly recommend this Ritz Carlton if you are in the area. We sat on the patio overlooking the cliffs and then moved into the bar area for our business meeting. It was an awesome afternoon.
Manager Response: We do have an outstanding view!  We hope you found our service to be the same.  Please stop in the next time you are in the area.  We look forward to taking care of you.

Summary: My wife and I spent a weekend at the resort as part of a wedding anniversary celebration. The location is outstanding with its perch about 150 feet above the ocean. The beach is accessible by a walk down a steep walkway or via a complimentary shuttle. This section of the beach is called Salt Creek Beach and it is one of the most popular surfing venues in the area. The hotel grounds are beautiful; we never left them except for a stroll along the beach. We ate all meals in the resort. Our first evening was spent at the outdoor patio called 180blu where we enjoyed a 180 degree view of the ocean, great dinner of appetizers and a spectacular sunset. We enjoyed our dinner in Raya one evening and our Sunday Brunch there was superb. My wife raved about the spa and I enjoyed the fitness
Manager Response: We are delighted that you enjoyed our warm, relaxed yet refined luxury ambience.  We enjoyed creating anniversary memories for you and are looking forward to your return visit.  Thank you for experiencing our food & beverage outlets.  They all have their own unique atmosphere environment and hand crafted selections.  We hope to see you next year.  Welcome home!

Summary: Stayed there for a week in july 2012. Great service. Concierge. Food.  Front desk staff were very amateur. Worst i have ever experienced.  I booked 4 rooms. They were all outdated and depressing. Once you step in the corridors you feel like you're living in the 80's.  Stayed at montage previously.  Much much better than this outdated and overpriced hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for your vital, very important feedback.  We greatly appreciate your constructive criticism.  We would welcome the opportunity to discuss your visit personally.  Please call us in the Executive Office as soon as your schedule permits at (949) 240 2000.  We look forward to welcoming you back after the completion of our rooms renovation beginning in late fall.

Summary: This hotel was fantastic and the staff was so lovely, we are already planning our next trip. The view and proximity to the beach can not be topped. I loved the resort feel of the property and the consistent activity throughout. Our room had a balcony with an ocean view and I wanted to spend all my time there!   I really enjoyed the compilmentary yoga and the workout facility.  There were a lot of weddings during our stay and it seems like a great spot for both the ceremony and reception.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  It's our highest mission to provide the utmost personal service and accommodations for our guests every day.  We are glad you took home some wonderful memories, and we look forward to welcoming you back in another ocean front room very soon.

Summary: My husband & I stayed here for three days. It was amazing the customer service & the care that we received. I highly reccommend walking around the property. Beautiful flowers at every corner! Breakfast was divine!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review of our resort.  We hope you have found a new home away from home and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Best place in the area bar none.
Summary: Fantastic beyond measure!  180 Blue is incredible.  Go a bit before sunset to get a good seat etc.  The taco's on Taco Tuesday are the bomb.  Our room was spacious and overlooked the pool.  An ocean view would be awesome.  Either way you can't go wrong choosing this place.  Hope to go again soon.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting our resort and 180blu.  We agree...the view and the tacos are top notch!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Perhaps you can visit us during a slower period of lower occupancy and we will gladly upgrade you to a lovely view!

Summary: We had been told so many great things about this Ritz that we were just disappointed.  The location is great and the views are beautiful but that is all this hotel offers.  The pools are not overlooking the ocean.  The open spaces with the view were so crowded that we ended up driving elsewhere.  There were many parties and weddings go on and it was as if the party was in our room.  The staff was polite but there was nothing to be done about the noise.  I wish we had gone elsewhere.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and we are so sorry if you were inconvenienced by other visitors in any way throughout your stay.  Our mission every day is to provide a relaxing and memorable stay for all of our guests no matter what the purpose of their visit may be.  Please feel free to contact the Executive Office directly if we may assist you in any way.

Summary: Awesome hotel. Awesome view of the beach. Excellent customer service and staff are all very personable. We will surely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our resort for your special occasion!  We enjoyed celebrating with you and hope you took home some very fond memories.  Can we make this an annual tradition?  We look forward to welcoming you back for another spectacular visit.

Summary: You can't talk about this resort without mentioning (or starting with) the beautiful setting.  Perched on a bluff overlooking the Pacific Ocean the resort is built around beautiful views.  The resort itself is somewhat of an older model Ritz Carlton that has been refreshed into a luxury resort of the current times.  Our arrival coincided with the hotels "Yappy Hour" which was a cool experience for locals to bring their dogs and enjoy cocktails (presumably for the humans) and flavored water for the dogs while looking out on the ocean.  Everyone seemed to be having a blast and we enjoyed it as it was simply different.  We also loved the marketplace - we always hate having to order room service to get a coffee in the morning (or going out for it) but they have a casual (but nice)
Manager Response: We couldn't agree more....our ocean view rooms have the most incredible view of the Pacific!  Falling asleep with your room doors opened and listening to crashing of the waves is a favorite amongst our guests.  We look forward to return!  Thank you for visiting all of our food and beverage outlets.  They are all unique in their own ways. We hope you have the time during your next visit to experience our Dana Pool Cafe as well.  Welcome home!

Summary: My fiance took me here to propose to me and it was the best night of my life.  The hotel is absolutely beautiful and has an amazing view to wake up to every day.  With plenty of nightlife in the neighboring cities and the 2 minute walk (or golf cart ride courtesy of hotel) to the beach, you can't beat this place for a nice relaxing vacation, or romantic getaway.
Manager Response: Congratulations!  We are very happy for you and delighted that we can help share in the best night of your life.  We enjoy creating those memorable experiences for our guests that will last a life time.  Our resort is so relaxing and romantic...we can't think of a better place to be proposed to and celebrate for years to come.  In fact, we hope to be your host for your wedding!  Thank you for sharing your experience on TripAdvisor.  We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary Heading: Awesome service, ambiance and resort experience!
Summary: Love this resort.  We stayed for a weekend in June in an ocean view room with balcony.  Definitely worth the extra money to see hear and smell the gorgeous ocean. We slept with the French doors wide open all night.  The room was spacious, impeccably clean and beautifully decorated. Hip cool yet sophisticated is how I would describe the decor throughout the resort.  One thing we loved is how the resort incorporated the local art scene and artists throughout the resort without it being too stuffy or over bearing.  Ie. four local artists predicated one of their paintings on a surf board and then all four surf boards are mounted on the wall.  Very clever and great way to highlight the beach resort with local art scene of Laguna.  Also art wall filled with photos of local artists
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your detailed review of our resort.  We are so proud on a daily basis of the service and facilities we provide, and we are delighted that you enjoyed our mystique.  Thank you for embracing our culture and what we stand for, and for your appreciation of our local artists and photographers.  We truly have the most incredible location and cultural history here in Dana Point, Laguna Beach, and surrounding areas.  We look forward to welcoming you back again very soon.  And yes, we will remember your name then too!  Welcome home.

Summary: Beautiful location right on the beach, overlooking the Pacific.  The rooms are gorgeous.  The service was spectacular.  You can not go wrong with this resort.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting!  Please come back again soon!

Summary: This hotel is very modern and beautiful. You are always greeted by smiling faces. Yes, the balconies might be a little small, but the view makes up for it. The club level's food was amazing. The bathroom was awesome, it was all marble. They have a really cool walking trail that takes you all the way to downtown Laguna Niguel. The beach was nice. Didn't try the restaurants, way too expensive!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post a review.  We greatly appreciate it!  We are delighted you enjoyed our exclusive Club Level experience.  It truly ranks amongst the best in thel world.  When you have a chance to return, please call us directly at (949) 240-2000 and we can provide you with our current room and dining packages that will add value to your stay (based upon availability).  We are excited to welcome you back!

Summary: For the price, you get your money's worth of location and views.  Unfortunately, there were too many issues to make this a positive review. First was the missing extra bed we were promised that we had to call for, then there was the drain pipe one floor up that was dripping water onto our outdoor fireplace making a foul smelling odor, and finally the food which consisted of extremely salty sushi (even without soy sauce) and Velveeta cheese on the nachos (not a kids menu item). The staff were very friendly but they were all very young and clearly not at the level of some of the Four Seasons we've visited.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback.  Please rest assured that we listen and take it to heart.  We thank you for your business and hope you enjoyed your stay overall and you will return to the resort in the future.  We would welcome the chance to speak with you.  Kindly call our Executive Office at (949) 240-2000 so we may discuss your feedback personally.  Thank you!

Summary Heading: Location!  Daughter still asks to go back
Summary: Not so quiet luxury, unless you stay on a week night.  We enjoyed relative silence until the weekend rolled around.  You are paying primarily for location, location, location since they skimped on sound insulation.  Expect to be able to hear your neighbors' music and conversation, even if they are down the hall.  Ask for a room near the Monarch wing's quiet pool if your room overlooks the pool, as the Dana pool can get spirited on the weekend evenings due to wedding parties, etc.  Service was ok- not exceeding or over the top.  Unless you count the lollipop bouquets that they offer kiddos, it was industry standard service.  The food from Raya was fine but pricey.  An app of shrimp & mushroom quesadillas ($14) consisted of 10 bites.  They were two potsticker sized "quesadillas"-
Manager Response: We appreciate your candid feedback....thank you!  We hope you took home some life long memories after leaving our resort.  It is our highest mission to ensure you are comfortable and relaxed at all times.  We welcome the opportunity for you to reach out to us so we can make note of all your preferences and expectations in our database so that when you do return we are able to meet and exceed all of your needs.

Summary: Reception: There was a long queue, as many people arrived for a business meeting. We were, however, immediately asked whether we belonged to this group and could then check-in separately.  The hotel is situated on a hill at the sea and offers a beautiful view. We had a reservation for an Ocean View room, Club level. The room was nice but very small. They tried to enlarge it optically by having mirror-finished even the smallest surfaces.The room has two small chambers right and left from the balcony door, approx 1,20 x 1,20 m. One serves as wardrobe the other one contains the fridge and the safe. Small bathroom with two basins, bathtub with shower curtain, separate toilet. The bathtub has a circumferential edge so be careful when you rest your head. The rooms are poorly
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review.  We greatly appreciate your efforts.  We hope to welcome you back again very soon, and we will do our best to always have a room for you in a quiet area.  Please feel free to reach out to us directly at (949) 240-2000 to review occupancy and group activities prior to placing your reservation.

Summary: I have never stayed at a hotel with more amazing views and quality of service, even other Ritz Carlton properties. Even the workout room overlooking the ocean, which was a great way to start the day. There is a walking path down to a gorgeous beach and amazing sunsets every night.   I highly recommend getting an ocean front room on the ground floor so you can walk right out to the beach. It is also nice to enjoy a drink or snack on your patio listening to the waves.  We stayed April 2009 but it wouldn't let me go back that far.
Manager Response: We hope you have had the opportunity to return to our resort since 2009.  If not, please come soon!  We look forward to welcoming you back and will do our best to always have a first floor ocean view room available for you.  Thank you!

Summary Heading: The place to stay in Dana Point- Watch the sunset!
Summary: Well worth a visit, great location, very good service, conceirge lounge good but range of food a bit limited. we would go back.
Manager Response: We couldn't agree with you more....our sunsets are out of this world!  Thank you for sharing your experience and we look forward to creating more memories for you in the near future.

Summary: Beautiful location. Lovely interiors and a staff that aims to please. We had some little mix ups (room service forgot coffee cups, restaurant wasn't ready for us at time of reservation), but these things happen, it's how a hotel chooses to resolve them that counts. The staff was eager to remedy and make up for the little things that went wrong and so much went right. Loved it. The main restaurant was fantastic too.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  We enjoyed having you.  Thank you for your nice remarks about our restaurant Raya.  We have a new restaurant that we are excited to share with you during your next visit called enoSTEAK.  We look for to the opportunity to serve you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Fantastic hotel...exemplifies the great reputation of the Ritz
Summary: I stayed at the Ritz Laguna while attending a business conference.  I received a complimentary upgrade to the club level with a studio suite.  The hotel is well situated, clean, updated, and has fantastic views.  The staff is incredibly friendly and helpful.  I cannot say enough good things about this hotel and it's staff.  Congratulations to the management on a job well done.
Manager Response: Thank you for your visit and we are so glad you enjoyed your complimentary upgrade.  We enjoy surprising and delighting our guests!  It was our pleasure serving you and we hope to welcome you back to enjoy more memories very soon.

Summary: First, this hotel is situated on an absolutely beautiful position overlooking the ocean.  Truly stunning view.    Stayed on the club floor where the staff is excellent.  Very helpful and will do anything to help you enjoy the stay.  Penny is absolutely fantastic.  Diane is excellent too.    The common areas including pool, lobby, fitness center, etc are first rate and very, very nice.    We stayed on the club floor in a suite.  The room was odd in that some of the furnishings were second rate including the curtains, a couple of odd tables with mirrors, and the carpet seemed too long in the tooth.  However, the bathroom was huge and well appointed, the bed very comfortable, and quite spacious.  Bottom line is the room was alright but not what we would expect at a ritz property of
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We greatly appreciate it!  We hope you found our service and surroundings both excellent and breathtaking.  We look forward to welcoming you back again very soon.  Thank you for your visit.

Summary: There is not a better hotel experience in the world. My wife and I travel extensively and the Laguna Niguel is at the top of our list. We visited recently in May 2012 with a party of 8 including  two Grand-Children under the age of three. The management and staff could not be more accommodating.  During our stay one of the children became ill and had to be treated at a local hospital. A security guard actually volunteered to provide transportation.   Below is an excerpt of our correspondence to the hotel manager:  We would like to take this opportunity to express our appreciation to the wonderful, professional, and caring staff you have working for you at the Ritz Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  Upon our arrival on Friday, May 18th, 2012, our family was greeted immediately and quickly
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely review.  We are so thankful that everything turned out ok.  We will share your post with all of our ladies and gentlemen and we look forward to welcoming you back.  We are delighted to be part of your extended family!

Summary Heading: RITZY but disappointed with view from room
Summary: I booked a room five months out described as "Club Coastline View".  We arrived at night and the bellman, as he was giving us the tour of the property on our way to the room, described our view as a peek-a-boo at the beach room. WHAT, I'm paying nearly $1000 per night and I'm a loyal customer of the Ritz (stayed at Cayman, Naples, Jamaica, Cancun, Half Moon Bay, Kapalua, Key Biscayne, San Fran, Marina Del Ray, Sarasota and Dallas.)  We were very upset.  Basically, we got the worst possible view for our room rate. It was a garden view of the party room and lawn down below and if you cranked your neck, there was a 30 degreed angled coastline view.  They should describe this room as partial coastline. And if they had, I wouldn't have booked it.  Sometimes it's something like this
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide valuable feedback about your experience.  We greatly appreciate your time and take all comments seriously.  We will review your feedback about the view/category with our executive team.  We want you to have the best possible memories when you stay with us.  Please contact the Executive Office directly for your next visit and we will ensure your next view is outstanding. Thank you!

Summary: Just returned from one of the most amazing vacations of my life. Thank you Ritz Carlton for making our trip so special.  I went with my husband and 7 year old son for a week and we stayed in a coastal view room on the club floor. Once the elevators open on floor 4 - you feel at ease. They concierge greets you by name and really go out of their way to make you feel special. The continental breakfast was great (though we booked through AMEX Platinum and received a $60 per day breakfast credit anyway). I loved coming up from the beach at lunch time and having a sandwich and glass of wine in utter peace and quiet before hitting the pool! We dined at 181 Blue - which was good and also at Raya, which apart from the view, was actually pretty bland and uninspired. It is a short walk to
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We greatly appreciate you feedback.  Our highest mission is for each of our guests to rest and relax in the comfort of luxurious surroundings and impeccable service.  We look forward to welcoming you back again very soon.

Summary: I will keep this short and sweet: This property embodies the concept of the Ritz Carlton philosphy.  I have never experience the attentiveness, the purely blissful atmosphere, or the exceptional customer service that I had the pleasure of being submerged in during my visit to this breathtaking resort.  My fiance and I live locally, and desperately needed to refresh and recharge...it happened instantaniously the moment we stepped into the lobby.  I would certainly say an 11 on a scale form 1 to 10.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  Our goal is to sweep you off your feet from the moment you drive into the porte cochere, and keep you relaxed with excellent, refined, and attentive service until it is time to depart the resort.  We are delighted you took home some wonderful memories and we will see you again soon.

Summary: This place certainly lived up to the reviews.  We stayed for a weekend getaway (using up all my hard-earned Marriott points in one blowout).  The rooms were very nice.  We had an interior courtyard view, but our balcony faced some trees with a peaceful koi pond below, so we actually sat outside and read one afternoon and it was very nice even without an ocean view.  The facilities were immaculate, all the meals we had were excellent, and the staff was unfailingly friendly and helpful.  I guess the only slight drawback is that the hotel is kind of isolated on a bluff in a mostly residential area, so you have to drive if you want to go to any restaurants or bars off-campus.  Other than that, if you're looking for a place to check in and never leave for the weekend, this place is
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review of our resort.  It is hard to beat our amazing view, magnificent sunsets, and excellent service.  We are delighted you have found a new home to rest and relax and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: I've stayed many times at the Ritz and with the beach below, I rarely leave the hotel area.  The restaurant with its large views overlooking the ocean has good food along with the view.  The rooms are plush and very "beachy" in decor.  The only downside is the noise of doors slamming as people go in/out of their rooms....wish it was a quieter "slam".  The spa is wonderful and has excellent, attentive staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty to our resort.  We enjoy having you each and every time.  We hope we are anticipating all of your needs and exceeding your expectations on every visit.  If there are specific preferences you have regarding your housekeeping needs, and food and beverage needs, please do not hesitate to let us know. We look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: I was in town several weeks for business and a family vacation.   For the first few days we stayed at the Marriott near fashion island mall on business, then we spent a few days on the water at balboa beach club, then we were to spend a week at Marriott Newport coast. The beach club views were great, but the hotel was not quite what we had hoped.  We moved to the villas expecting to stay the week.  Parking and distance to pool were terrible....completely fed up....I moved the family to the Ritz.  Best decision ever!  The hotel was perfect and exceeded my high expectations from staying in numerous ritz and 4S hotels around the world through the years.  The hotel and service were top.  We were upgraded to club level which also improved our experience.    My only suggestions to
Manager Response: We are so glad you decided to give us a try!  Welcome home! We will never let you down.  Thank you for your feedback regarding the pool, outdoor showers, and the Spa.  You have been heard and we appreciate it!

Summary: Stayed for 4 nights and had an ocean view room with a small balcony.  Room was nice with walk in closet, in-room coffee maker, refrigerator & safe with electrical outlets in the safe.  Bathroom had 2 separate sinks so easy for two people to get ready at same time.  Beds were very comfortable.  Lighting was a bit confusing.   Views from hotel are beautiful and quite nice to take walks in the area.  Had a fabulous massage - although actual spa facilities seemed a bit small/limited.  Food was quite good. For the most part, seemed to be a lot of guest service staff around & very helpful.   Only complaint -- we had difficulty with on-site pc & tried calling the guest service number & let ring more than 20 times multiple times & no answer/no help (tried in morning & in afternoon).
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely review on our service and facilities.  It was a pleasure having you with us.  We have taken your feedback about the pc connection/service to heart and will strive to not let that happen again.  We appreciate your review.  Thank you!

Summary: The view is beautiful and can't be beat.  Staff is one of the most professional I have experienced.  I am a business traveler with nearly 100 nights per year in a hotel but this visit was strictly pleasure.  My boyfriend and I had a long drive in on the PCH from San Francisco and Juan greeted us pleasantly.  He was sympathetic to our fatigue and ensured that we enjoyed our first night at the hotel.  We had brought wine from Napa and he thoughtfully sent up an ice bucket and ice along with a generous snack since we were celebrating a birthday.  The following day the weather wasn't cooperating but coming from Upstate NY, we were happy to be outside.  The pool was not crowded and we grabbed a seat at the bar and proceeded to have one of the most memorable experiences of our trip.
Manager Response: Your response warmed our heart!  Thank you for the kind words, and we will be sure to share them with Juan and Dianne.  Come back soon!  We have many more memories and unique experiences to create for you.

Summary: After much deliberation on where to stay for our 25th anniversary - we decided on this amazing hotel. We did not regret it! From the moment we arrived, every detail was perfect. As our first time on "club level" - we were amazed by the level of service provided by our concierge hosts, and the food and beverage was excellent. The property is beautiful and an easy walk down to an incredible beach. Loved every minute - can't wait to go back! Thanks to everyone for the amazing service and hospitality.
Manager Response: Happy Anniversary!  Thank you for choosing to celebrate with us!  Our goal was to provide with flawless service and create life-long memories for you to take home with you.  Congratulations and we look forward to welcoming you back for #26!

Summary: Our stay here was nice but honestly not worth the money. With required valet parking and resort fees things got expensive. Ultimately because the hotel is so large, service is a bit impersonal. And therefore it just comes down to the ocean proximity which cam be had with less expensive hotels nearby. I dont mind dropping $500 a night but when i do i expect alot. I'd say all in all it was a nice stay but  overpriced for what you get.
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback.  Our ladies and gentlemen take great pride in providing the level of service that ranks amongst the best in the world.  We hope to welcome you back again in an effort to show you what we are all about, and the exceptional experiences we provided.  We encourage you to check availability for our many room packages that we offer that normally include parking and/or resort fee.  We would be glad to assist you in determining the best value for you.  Any of our team can assist you at (949) 240-2000.

Summary: The hotel location can't be beat.  Views are breathless, facility is spotless clean, bed was comfy, and (most) staff offer great service and attitude.  The lighting in the room was too dim for my preference.  Aside from this, my 2 main gripes are their pet policy and poor food quality.  The hotel charges $150 for non-refundable cleaning fee and $50 for boarding fee.  That said, my dog got nothing.  I had to sign a waiver form and provide my cell phone just in case my dog makes too much noise.  For a high-end hotel, I was shocked at such policy.  The Westin does not charge a fee and provides a big fluffly "Heavenly" dog bed with a fancy water and food bowl.  The food was to be desired, especially given the high-end price.
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback.  We apologize if your pet did not receive the royal treatment that we normally provide on a daily basis.  Perhaps you could share more with us about your experience.  If you would be so kind to call our Executive Office at (949) 240-2000, it would be very helpful for us.  We have quite an extensive pet program for all of our valued 4-legged friends.  Thank you once again.  We look forward to speaking with you, and also welcoming you back for a wonderful experience in the future.

Summary: We spent three nights at the Ritz and enjoyed it very much.  It is a huge facility and takes some getting used to for size.  The view overlooking the Pacific is fantastic.  The outside bar was a great place to relax.  We ate one meal in the restaurant overlooking the ocean and the food was excellent.  Our only complaint was that it took some time to retrieve our car even when we called ahead of time as the place was very busy with weddings.
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback regarding our valet services.  It will be shared with our team constructively.  We look forward to welcoming you back one day very soon.

Summary: We stayed at the RC-Laguna Niguel for five nights. We were there for a company outing/company fun type of event.  Our room was decent sized, but not particularly large.  We are a family of three, including a three year old. Our room had a king sized bed and we could have had a cot brought in, but we declined as our son was easily able to sleep (and be comfortable) on the chaise lounge at the end of bed.  The bathroom had too much white marble for my taste, but was ample in size with a private toilet so that more than one person could be in the room.    Although there are rooms with much nicer views to be had at this hotel than we had, I was OK with our view.  We were located on the ground level on the adult only pool side of the complex.  This pool is just a bit above us and our
Manager Response: Thank you, it was nice having you with us.  We hope you have the opportunity to return and spend time with us for a vacation!  We will be sure to create memories for you that will last a life time.

Summary: Beautiful property, room overlooks the gorgeous ocean, room was beautiful, but small, nice balcony, great service, very friendly. Elegant hotel.  Next time we would not fly into L.A., though!  Too far of a drive!  Gorgeous hotel and location.  My teen son loved to body surf but it is freezing cold, so get a wet suit!
Manager Response: Thank you for your nice comments!  Next time you visit, please fly into John Wayne Airport.  It will save you so much time.  We agree with your recommendations....bring a wetsuit and stay in an ocean view room!  We look forward to welcoming you and your family back again soon.

Summary: While the views are amazing, the rooms are in dire need of an upgrade  We spent 2 nights here and the hotel is also so spread out  the we got lost 3 x. my room had a terrible view. Concierge service was non existent as we called a few times for reservations and we did not receive a return call. Ordered breakfast as well which never came up.
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback.  It would give us great pleasure if we could speak with you by phone to address each area of concern.  Please contact the Executive Office directly at your convenience at (949) 240-2000.  Thank you!  You will be pleased to know that our room renovation is currently scheduled to begin toward the end of this year.  We know you will enjoy the new enhancements when finished.  We look forward to speaking with you soon.

Summary: We spent 3 nights at The Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel after spending 3 nights in Los Angeles.  The hotel itself is beautifully appointed and the location and views are spectacular.  The lobby is tranquil and decorated to the nines.  The hotel itself is clean and well maintained.  The overall experience, however, was a bit disappointing.  My husband and I are hotel connosieurs and we didn't feel this was on the level of a Ritz Carlton.  For starters, when we checked in, we were given a room that was facing a wall.  If you leaned over the balcony, you could see the pool. The room itself was lovely but the location was blah.  I called the front desk and asked nicely to switch us.  They offered to do so but only for $100/nt upcharge.  Apparently there was not a single comparably
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback.  We greatly appreciate your constructive criticism regarding our valet and concierge service.  We take all of our guests' feedback to heart in an effort to always provide the most excellent service we can.  Thank you!  We are glad you enjoyed our facility and offerings overall and we look forward to providing you with an exceptional stay the next time you choose to stay with us.  Your complete satisfaction is our highest mission.

Summary: Spent 2 nights staying at the Ritz Carlton - Laguna Niguel with my wife. All the usual niceties & the service was excellent, which again, in my experience of this company, is usual and as expected. We stayed on the Club Level, so had the use of its facilities & enjoyed the food and drink service which was included. Staff are very friendly and very helpful. Location, whilst having some fantastic views, differed from a lot of hotels I've stayed at, insofar as it's set above a 'bluff' (I'm English, so I assume that's a cliff?!!). The walk down to the beach is pretty easy & although we didn't use it, there's a golf buggy that you can get to ferry you down there and back. Fireplaces made the place really homely & the lobby and communal areas were all very welcoming. Overall, a very
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely comments about our resort and staff...we greatly appreciate it and they will be shared with our ladies and gentlemen.  Although you may be far away for the Southern California Coast, we certainly hope the memories we created for you will remain with you until your next vist.

Summary: We stayed here for three nights in May in a gorgeous Ocean View room. The hotel is stunning from the minute you walk into the lobby, with dramatic floral arrangements gracing all the public spaces. The room was spacious and comfortable with a large patio overlooking the ocean and the beautiful views of Dana Point. Unlike over Ritz Carlton's we have stayed at, this property has a nice variety of places to eat, from quick service to a beautiful, elegant restaurant overlooking the water. The hotel is conveniently located and a 10 minute drive to Laguna Beach and the Dana Point harbor area. There is a beautiful beach walk right on the property. We enjoyed watching the large group of surfers from dawn til dusk. We plan to go back with the kids. They have the Ambassadors of the Earth
Manager Response: We can't wait for you to return with your children!  We enjoy creating memories for all ages.  We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: We loved our stay at the RItz Carlton in Dana Point. We visited for two nights in May for my boyfriend's birthday and couldn't have been happier. Upon arrival, we upgraded to club level ($100/night extra) which was totally worth it. There are 4 food services per day and an open bar with anything you could want. Not to mention the service and all of the rooms on club level (top floor) are amazing. We had an ocean view which was completely stunning. So beautiful. One morning we had breakfast at Raya, the onsite restaurant and it was perfect. Great service, awesome view, and wonderful food. The people throughout the entire hotel are so nice and genuine. We loved every minute of our trip and will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Welcome home!  We agree that our Club Level accomodations and service are exceptional.  We enjoyed having you and look forward to your return.

Summary: Luxury hotel and staffs are very friendly and helpful. Hotel is relatively new so unlike some old Ritz-Carlton hotels.  Stayed in a room with ocean view.  What a spectacular view! Decent size room with marble floored bathroom.  Very clean and well maintained.  Hotel is about 10 minutes car ride to town, which is very charming and has nice restaurants.   If you are looking for relaxation with luxury accommodation, you won't go wrong with Ritz-Carlton.
Manager Response: We are proud to be your luxury destination choice for rest and relaxation!  Thank you for your comments.  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary: Great view of the ocean from the lobby and common areas.  Convenient to Laguna Beach.  Our stay was just "okay" so it seemed a bit pricey.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your comments.  It is our highest mission that your experience at our resort is exceptional and memorable.  Would you be so kind as to call our executive office so we can better understand how we can serve you better in the future?  Thank you.

Summary: We spent 5 days at the Ritz Carlton and we went through a number of different experiences. We booked a package with Ocean front view and a  "Comfort You" package that included breakfast and 100 USD resort credit.  The first experience was very nice. We had a very friendly welcome at the reception and we received a standard room with a fantastic ocean view. We spent the first minutes on the balcony and just said: WOW!  The room was pretty much Ritz Carlton standard. The one thing that I have never experienced at a Ritz Carlton though: it really did not smell nice. It felt a bit like a smoking room and some people tried to refurbish but never really could get rid of the old smoke. I felt that this was not really appropriate for this sort of rate. Nevertheless, we thought that we
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed feedback.  We will use it as a learning and coaching tool for our leaders.  They pride themselves on listening and responding, in order to be the best.  As you know, we are not perfect however we will ensure that any difficulty you are having is responded to promptly and to your satisfaction.  We look forward to welcoming you and your family back again soon.  We will not let you down!

Summary: A very casual yet elegant Ritz.  Rooms are standard RC rooms. The views are spectacular, and spent half my nights at 180 Blu on the back terrace....it was purely addictive.  A must to go back just to relax.
Manager Response: We enjoy providing luxury experiences with a playful approach.  We are thrilled you noticed! We look forward to welcoming you back for many more relaxing and elegant stays.

Summary: Our youngest son and his girlfriend planned a couple of days get-away for his birthday at the Ritz-Carlton Laquna Niguel.  Unbeknownst to his girlfriend our son was going to propose to her sometime during the trip...after he had spent some time trying to pick the perfect moment we suggested he consider "popping the question" sometime during dinner.  I offered to contact the property and ask if they might help in pulling off the surprise not really knowing what would work best or what they would be open to.  Bryon Bowker took the call, listened to what we were thinking, made suggestions. Long story short, Bryon facilitated the unnoticeable transfer of the ring from our son to the staff, surprise delivery of the ring to the table disguised as an entree on a bed of rose petals and
Manager Response: Our ladies and gentlemen take pride in making sure all of our guests, including our littler ones are well taken care of, and most of all very happy!  We agree, our Club Level experience ranks amongst the best in the world.  We look forward to creating more memories for you in the near future.  We encourage you to secure your reservations well in advance as our Club Level fills up very quickly.  We will share your review with our Club team....they enjoy the positive feedback.

Summary: Having heard so much about the Ritz Carlton hotel chain and how exceptional their hotels are, I finally got a chance to experience one along with my husband and children.  My husband booked a weekend stay at the Ritz Carlton, Laguna Niguel in Orange County, California. Right from the moment I entered the front drive, I felt magically relaxed and excitedly looked forward to a unique experience. This place captured the charm and relaxation that we longed for. The location of this hotel is breathtaking. It sits high above the cliffs of Dana Point above popular Salt Creek Beach. The view wrapped us into a state of mind that we won’t forget soon. The experience is what I call a magnified luxury, nestled in an elegant and peaceful setting.  The high points of the property was the
Manager Response: What an amazing and well written review...thank you!  We couldn't have said it better ourselves.  Thank you for noticing all of the littlest details that we strive to provide every single day to every single guest.  We are delighted you were able to experience our Jean-Michel Cousteau program.  It is one of a kind.  You are our family now, welcome home!

Summary: By far the most beautiful ritz property we have ever stayed at..just gorgeous! We were here as a family for 5 nights, upgraded to club following an initial "so-so" room with minimal view and VCR/tv not working properly. Following that first evening, we were showered with service..especially on the club level. The girls are amazing..helpful, sweet and eager to please. The only complaints we had were due to the initial first night, a spa service that was billed incorrectly and unexplained (an employee "hinting" at additional gratuity)..and corporate functions on the lawn directly below our balcony several afternoons and one evening. With that being said, the spa service was credited back and a minor reduction in room cost for the evening of the corporate event was provided (would
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  It is very helpful.  We have noted all of your concerns and preferences in our database and will ensure your next visit is flawless.  We are delighted you left the resort with some wonderful memories and we look forward to creating more memories for you in the future.

Summary: We recently spent two nights on the club level at this resort.  Cannot say enough about the staff at this location. Everyone was friendly and went out of their way to help you. We liked that it had a laid back beach vibe but with the comfort of a Ritz. Our room was spacious with high ceilings and a stunning view of the pacific. The walk down to the beach wasnt bad but they had rides if you needed them. The rooms were well appointed. Beds were comfortable. The hotel had a feeling of modern meets classic. The artwork is by local artists and added to the experience. Our girls loved the club level candy bar! We booked surf lessons for our three girls. They were a little costly but seemed to be on par with local rates. Their instructors were great! Wish we could have stayed here
Manager Response: Welcome home!  It was our pleasure having you with us and we are so glad you took advantage of our incredible surroundings.  We couldn't agree more that our exclusive Club Level is very special.  Our team is outstanding and they look forward to welcoming you back to enjoy again our playful approach to luxury.  We enjoyed creating memories for you and your family and look forward to creating more for you in the near future.

Summary: Yes, the hotel is old.  Yes, they could use with a major renovation - but what is the biggest reason you go to a Ritz, St Regis, Fairmont, etc?  Service.  Without boring the heck out of you - the Club Lounge at Laguna Niguel is THE BEST in the system.   I have two names for you .... Penni and Colleen.   Penni especially.   This woman is incredible.  She has been at the Ritz since it opened 27-28 years ago.  We all know who runs this hotel :)  Penni is efficient, friendly, and ALWAYS willing to g above and beyond for her Club members.   We will continue to stay here over the Montage or the St Regis  because of Penni.  This woman needs a raise!!!
Manager Response: We couldn't agree with you more!  Penni is an amazing leader, and she and her team are irreplaceable.  We are very fortunate to have them and will do our best to never let them go.   We are excited to welcome you back again soon.  Thank you so much for your loyalty to our resort.  We promise to never let you down.  We hope you have a chance to experience our soft goods renovation that is quickly approaching.  Until then, thank you for keeping us top of mind.

Summary Heading: RC Dana Point- A Contextual Review
Summary: We spend a spring weekend at the RC Dana Point. Our newborn tagged along. First, property specific highlights, second, a review in the context to the property's competition.   What Works:  1. Raya. The onsite restaurant. Food, presentation, venue and service are all up to the level required for this type of property. We ate breakfast, lunch and dinner here and have only positives to share.  2. The Marketplace: Effectively a venue for easy eatings combined with a comfortable TV lounge. Again, the food, presentation, venue and service are consistent and delivered very well.  3. Spa: Better considered as a petit spa, it has been effectively fully renovated recently enough to feel both current and comfortable. It lacks a jacuzzi, but has steam, sauna, rain-showers, relaxation room
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experiences at our resort and the other fine resorts of the Gold Coast.  Your feedback is interesting and helpful.  We greatly appreciate your detailed review.  It is always our desire for our valuable guests to depart the resort with memories that will last a life time, and when our guests return we work even harder to provide more unique experiences and special memories for them to take with them.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future so we may provide exceptional service to you and leave you wanting more.  We will be undergoing a soft goods room renovation soon and we hope you have a chance to experience the enhancements.

Summary: My husband and I visited The Ritz the second week in April and it was sensational. First class hospitality staff was extremely attentive and accommodating. Everything was clean and spacious~ we really enjoyed our stay there stress-free. I would absolutely recommend this hotel and will return again. The views are amazing too!
Manager Response: We are delighted that you may have found a new home away from home!  Thank you for your visit!

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for .. and then you pay more
Summary: I stayed here for work and at first I was drawn in by how pretty the place was and how friendly the people were.   And it was and they were.    The surroundings were gorgeous and every staff member I interacted with was friendly, helpful and professional.   Having tea on my balcony in the morning I even thought, perhaps it would be worth it -- as a treat to my family.  To come back and enjoy this place - maybe check out that great pool.  It would be expensive, but why not baby oneself now and then.   Then I got dressed and looked at the bill.
