The usual taxes for state, taxes for city, taxes for breathing were there -- and the room rate was actually not that much higher than I have paid before for a family vacation.   But the extra charge for housekeeping (I stayed one night
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid feedback.  It sounds as if you were visiting us as part of a conference group in which certain fees were automatically added to your bill.  We would be happy to speak to you personally about those charges.  Please feel free to give us a call at (949) 240-2000.  We hope you choose to return to the resort again soon to enjoy a visit of rest and relaxation.

Summary Heading: Business trip splurge = happy tag-along wife
Summary: Twist my arm to be dragged to the Ritz in Dana Point (actually north of Dana Point on Monarch Beach) for a business trip with my hubby. Not only is the service 5 stars (what would you expect from the Ritz?!), but the views of the ocean are amazing. Most of the meeting rooms have giant windows looking out over the bluffs at the ocean. Great trail/path system for getting around the exterior gardens and down to the beach. Various services offered each day. Yoga in the morning in the gardens along the ocean...wow. I only ate at the "coffee shop" (chai and a scone are perfect beach stroll guests) and had drinks at the bar. Dinners were spent at other locals like Maestro's (Laguna Beach/Newport Beach--ok), the Beach House (Crystal Cove State Park--awesome! But make reservations),
Manager Response: We are so glad you tagged along!  We hope your travels bring you back to our resort soon.  We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: Stayed here for several days with the kids during their spring break.  The club level was really a great experience and we enjoyed the services staff.  The surfing suggestion was awesome Ryan and Ian were great instructors and the team at the Ritz suggested.  The hotel has great walking trails and things to do so we all had an awesome time.  The rooms we had were good but the service was exceptional.
Manager Response: Thank you for your nice feedback.  We look forward to welcoming all of you back again very soon.  We enjoyed creating priceless memories for you!

Summary: Travelled with small children and stayed for 5 days/4 nights in a Suite on the Concierge level. On the downside, we booked through our AmEx Platinum-and this was the first hotel that did not "Welcome" us as Platinum cardholders, inform us of any extra perks we receive, nor did they even say "Sorry, we are full, we cannot upgrade you,blah,blah,blah." We book all of our travel through our Platinum card-so to not have the front desk adknowledge us was disappointing.  Also, the air conditioning unit in our room never seemed to actually cool the room-and ran extremely loudly.We called to inform the front desk-who sent maintenance to look at the unit while we were gone. In the process of working on the air conditioning, the carpet in the room became saturated around the intake vents
Manager Response: Thank you for your very valuable feedback.  We greatly appreciate your time in posting a review.  Our highest mission is to always provide exceptional and flawless service.  If we have let you down in any way, please contact our Executive Office so we may personally discuss your experiences further.  We hope to welcome you back to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel soon so we may provide you with the level of service we have become known for.

Summary: hotel location and view is amazing . good food and breakfast and has nice coffee shop with reasonable prices. highly recommended and i am sure i will come back
Manager Response: We are so excited to have had you visit beautiful Southern California and in particular our resort.  We hope we have become your new home away from home!

Summary: We tried to celebrate our anniversary at this hotel a number of years ago.  I have to say the service was sub-par at best.  A comedy of errors occurred which really soured our stay.  However, this time was fantastic and lived up to all the expectations we have for a Ritz property.  The hotel is stunning, the floral arrangements were spectacular.  The check-in desk personnel were knowledgeable, friendly and extremely efficient.  The ocean view room with balcony was great and all the staff around the property were friendly.  Room service was impeccable.  The person answering the phone to take the orders was very professional and the delivery, presentation and setup were impressive.  Would not hesitate to return.
Manager Response: We couldn't agree more!  Our view is sensational and our service is excellent.  Thank you for your visit.  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: We stayed here for a romantic getaway and were not disappointed.  The hotel is incredibly beautiful and elegant without being pretentious.  Every aspect of the service was fantastic.  We took morning strolls on the beach, had a wonderful sunset dinner at Raya - almost didn't dine here but I'm so glad we change our minds.  The food was so delicious - try the small plates.....and our waiter was so nice and helpful.  (We actually preferred Raya to the Stonehill Tavern at the St. Regis - too stuffy and claustrophibic - had us practically sitting on top of two other couples and the food was a disappointment)........Afternoon cocktails at 180blu were perfect.  The fitness center overlooks the ocean - makes it easier to work out.  Definitely on our  list of hotels to visit again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to visit our resort.  We know you have many choices in luxury destinations and we are thrilled to have your business.  We enjoyed creating memories for you and look forward to another opportunity to do that again soon.  Thank you as well for letting us know about the needed fitness center repair.  We appreciate it!

Summary: My wife and I just visited the Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel for our babymoon. It was our last trip together before we welcome our bundle of joy into the world. This place captured the charm and relaxation that we longed for. First of all: location, location, location! The view will catapult you into a state of mind that you won't forget and certainly won't want to leave. The pacific roars to life amid this place and with our ocean view on the club level, there just isn't much more that I can say other than that! The hotel sits high above the cliff's of Dana Point above popular Salt Creek Beach. If you are planning to go here all I can say first off is get an ocean view. You come here for the location so make it memorable. Wake up to the pacific in your face. Get an ocean view. We
Manager Response: WOW thank you so much for your kind words.  Everything you mentioned is exactly what we strive to provide each and every day to all of our valuable guests.  We are so delighted that you are a Ritz-Carlton guest for life!  On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, welcome home.

Summary: visited during the easter period for one week. The hotels location is stunning. We were upgraded to a ex suite and am glad as i would find the rooms a little small,( would book this catorgory on my return visit.) Have stayed at the ritz in Naples fl, and Palm beach two previous easters, Would of liked to see a egg hunt or something for the children but this  would not put me off returning at this time next year. The star of this hotel apart from the stunning location is the staff. Penni. Kathryn, Coleen and all the girls in the club lounge were truly the best staff i have experienced anywhere. The food and drink presentations were excellent and the help and advice from the club team outstanding but also very friendly.Wade the bellman that helped us with our luggage, Steven by
Manager Response: Thank you for your delightful comments.  We greatly appreciate them.  We are glad your experience was excellent.  Its always our highest mission to move heaven and earth for our guests and create personal, memorable, and long lasting memories and experiences.  See you soon!

Summary: Thank you for such a beautiful time on our short three day honeymoon.  All of your personnel were extremely courteous and accommodating, particularly Jim Fritz, chef, and Erin Snider, restaurant manager, and Bruce Brainerd, general manager.  We had multiple courtesies, including a room upgrade, champagne in the room, and some complimentary drinks upon arrival.  The room and grounds made for a very romantic time.  I could not have changed one thing in the way we spent our time and the way we were treated by everyone.  We will always remember the special beginning to our marriage you helped us enjoy.
Manager Response: Congratulations!  We will share your nice feedback with our team, thank you!  We look forward to welcoming you back year after year for more wonderful memories.

Summary Heading: What a View! Ask for a room away from the public access.
Summary: We stayed 4 nights in an ocean view room. We have stayed in many 5 star hotels and I would rate this a 4 star for the room we had. We were on the first floor so we did not have a view of the beach, but we could see the ocean. We also had a tub shower combination that was hard to get in and out of. The brochure we had showed the room having a walk in shower. We were in the 2nd. to last room on the south side near the public access and we had people walking by our room all day long until the evening. We had to leave our curtains drawn if we wanted any privacy. We asked to be moved, but the hotel is not that large and they were full for the week. As others have stated the staff is outstanding and the gym has a magnificent view of the ocean with many work out machines. The food in
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback.  We greatly appreciate hearing from our guests.  We would welcome the opportunity to speak with you in person so we can properly update on database with your preferences.  Our number at the hotel is (949) 240-2000.  Thank you!  We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: My husband and I live in LA and had just come back from a trip with friends so we wanted to stay close on our anniversary but wanted something special. The Ritz was perfect! We have stayed in tons of amazing hotels and the service at the Ritz was exceptional. We stayed in an Ocean view room which was beautiful, the view was amazing. We then had lunch at 180 Blu. Mike was our server and he was fantastic! The white sangria was to die for and they even had very easily identifiable gluten free options which made my day (especially because the truffle fries were gluten free). After lunch we enjoyed some wine on our private patio, which was small but perfect for two people to sit out and enjoy the sunset and watch the surfers. Afterwards we had dinner at Raya, they had beautiful rose
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely review of our property, offerings, service, and staff.  We greatly appreciate your feedback.  We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to welcoming you back for each anniversary for years to come.  We enjoy creating life long memories for our special guests.

Summary: My husband and our children spent 4 days at the hotel in March, and the hotel exceeded our expectations.  The hotel staff are all friendly and helpful.  The staff on the Club level are outstanding.  The concierges, Kathryn and Colleen, are extremely helpful, provided exceptional service, and are very responsive to any requests or problems that we had.  They gave great suggestions on things to do and places to eat at.  Staying on the club level definitely elevated the enjoyment of our trip.   We were able to relax, sleep in, and enjoy the sun and family time.  Also, we enjoyed the yoga classes and used the fitness center daily.  The fitness center was enjoyable to exercise in with the outstanding ocean views and equipment.  The location of the hotel made it so easy for us to
Manager Response: Welcome to your new home away from home!  We are delighted that you enjoyed our facilities and amazing surroundings.  We strive to create memories for our younger guests as well and  are delighted your children had a great time as well. We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: My fiancee came home in a Saturday morning, and said he was going to take me somewhere as a surprise. He took me for an extended weekend to Ritz Carlton, Laguna Niguel. We stayed in a suite overlooking the gorgeous ocean, we watch the dolphins jumping during the sunset. The hotel gave us as a gift a cheese, fruits and wine in the afternoon. The open air restaurant is very elegant and romantic, we were able to walk down the stairs and walk on the beach to watch the surfers and birds. We had dinner at the Chart house, unforgettable experiences in dining and the best entertainment destinations around.
Manager Response: Just the memories we were hoping you would take home with you!  We look forward to creating more wonderful memories for you very soon.

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel along the California coastline
Summary: I took an extended weekend to view some investment properties and selected the Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel as my base of travel.  In my 4 days, I found the amenities to be in line with a 5 star hotel and services that are casually responsive to almost anyone's wish.  The restaurants are exact and elegant.  My personal vehicle was unblemished and no extra miles indicating joy rides.  I felt comfortable and was able to conduct business within the suite with room services. Security is ensured and my only negative is that a lady friend of a guest was scrutinized which was uncomfortable and awkward.  Perhaps they should have assessed her demeanor and exquisite jewelry rather than her torn jeans, large sunglasses and sandals.  As for the suite, the elegance of the  rooms does not
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments; and we agree that our view is spectacular!  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us.  We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Great views, nice rooms overlooking ocean
Summary: The hotel lived up to its reputation.  Great service, amenities and an overall sharp looking property.  However, I would not suggest this as a romantic getaway - as was our aim - but, great family vacation spot.  The hotel's charm is partly offset by the magnitude of the property and the many conferences going on every day.  Frankly, it is hard to unwind when suits with name tags are rampaging the property with cell phones.    The gym was magnificent, with top equipment and amazing ocean views.  The restaurants were good, but perhaps some better options available off property.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your feedback about your experience at our resort.  We are glad you enjoyed yourself and we hope you choose to visit us again perhaps during our slower season so you can fully unwind and relax.  We look forward to welcoming you back and creating memories for you.

Summary Heading: Beautiful property, top notch service with a smile!
Summary: My husband and I just spent three incredibly relaxing nights at this Ritz property.  We are already looking at our calendar to figure out when we can go back!  Located on a bluff overlooking Salt Creek Beach, the property has incredible views of the Pacific and the coast.  Although we were not fortunate enough to get an ocean view room, there are plenty of areas btoh inside and ourside of the hotel where you can enjoy the view.  If you are looking to be part of the Laguna scene, this is not the right hotel for you.  Downtown Laguna is an easy 15-20 minute drive from the hotel, but not within walking distance.  Cabs are easily accessible.  We stayed in a one bedroom suite on the Club level overlooking one of the hotel pools, which was lovely and spacious.  Had the pool been
Manager Response: Thank you for your thorough review of our resort and some of the services we provide.  We appreciate your time in posting your thoughts.  We hope you went home with many unforgettable memories and we look forward to creating more for you in the years to come.

Summary: I just checked out after a one day stay, and I can't say enough about how wonderful my stay was.  The staff is incredible, the food was amazing, the views are phenomenal.  I stay in hotels over 150 nights a year, and the Ritz Carlton at Laguna Niguel is amazing.  However, I simply cannot understand how the hotel could allow guests to smoke on the patios.  The wind blows smoke directly in to all the other rooms that the smoke can reach.  This is not an issue for me when it comes to outdoor bars - I can expect smoke there - it is a bar.  But when the smoke drifts into my room, I have a problem with that.  I didn't pay for a room with an ocean view to be forced to keep my patio door closed.  If the law allows it, the hotel can simply designate a block of rooms as non-smoking that
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable and honest feedback.  We greatly appreciate it.  You have our word that we will take a closer look into the logistics of 180blu and how we can best serve all of our guests dining at the outlet, as well as those staying in rooms close by.  We want to ensure you come back again and again.  You are right, the ocean front rooms with the patio doors open is the only way to go!  Thank you once again, and please feel free to reach out to our Executive Office if you wish to discuss your visit further.

Summary: One of the nicest stays our family has ever had. Usual great service, stunning views, great pools, beach.  It does not get better in the US.
Manager Response: We are so proud of our spectacular location, and even more proud of all our ladies and gentlemen and the unique, exceptional service they provide.  We are delighted to have you as our guest, and as part of our family, and hope you choose The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel again very soon!

Summary: On a recent stay at this oceanfront resort, my husband and I were again treated to the best domestic service of any hotel in recent years.Even the engineer who helped us with the phones in our room remembered my name two days later upon meeting in a hallway!!We had a few issues with a barking service dog next door and though the hotel could not ask the offender to leave we were given a generous credit to our bill on check out.We were attending a conference that took all rooms at the hotel and even with a full house the hotel ran perfectly...no excuses as you usually hear from hotels when they are full...everything worked as it should...just smiling faces and "can do" service.Bravo to you!
Manager Response: Thank you for your compliments!  Each of our guests will always receive the best service possible whether we have a full house or not.  We enjoyed having you and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Have spent a total of 15+ days over a couple of years at this hotel. I think if I had the chance I would live there :). Great staff, great location, great service.  Sunset is spectacular! As you would expect, pricey, but if you really want it nice, this is the place to stay.  Heading back again in October this year (which I believe is the nicest time).  You expect a certain level of service from the Ritz, however, this location tops others that I have stayed at.  Congrats to the management. Try it, you'll like it !
Manager Response: We are honored to be your home away from home, and we look forward to welcoming you back again in October!  It is our highest mission to continue providing you with new and even more memorable experiences.  Thank you!

Summary: Pros: The view is absolutely stunning. They also have a variety of restaurants in the property, and you can also grab a quick bite at the market place. We stayed as a family for my dad's birthday and when we checked in, we got a free box of chocolates. Complimentary wifi, water bottles, yoga, and pilates classes. The staff was professional, we forgot our passports in the room safe, and they were very attentive and shipped it to us at our hotel in Beverly Hills. We loved how relaxing Dana Point was compared to staying in Beverly Hills. We will definitely be back!   Cons: The minibar was empty. There was a problem with my parents room, my mom mentioned that the bed smelled like pee on our first night, we brought the matter to the front desk agent, who apologized for what happened,
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your generous feedback.  We want you to know that we listen and accept all guest feedback whether positive or negative.  We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to creating more memories for you in the future.  If your schedule allows, please contact our Executive Office directly at (949) 240-2000 to further discuss your experiences.  We would appreciate that very much.

Summary: We have been at the hotel last weekend with my girlfriend to celebrate her birthday. It was planned at the last minute but it worked great. I tried to surprise her in all the way, from strawberry with chocolate in the room and champagne on arrival. Dinner reservation at the restaurant and while we were having dinner petals of red roses in the room. The hotel is great, very classy and elegant, we loved it. The restaurant was excellent too and the services at the pool was very good too. The suite...mmm...nice but honestly a little outdated. This is only my personal point of view, there was everything in there, it was great, nice, accention to all the possible details...but honestly for 1250 USD a night I was expecting a little more.... The best past however was the staff.  I am in
Manager Response: Congratulations!!  We loved having you here and are delighted all of our planning with you resulted in a flawless and memorable stay with us.  We enjoy creating life long memories for our guests...thank you for the opportunity!  We hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: My husband & I greatly enjoyed two days at this beautiful place.  From the time we arrived til we left, we felt like treasured guests. Each RC employee could not do enough for us - their desire to please is phenomenal!   Our room was on the first floor so we were able to walk out onto a patio which then led to a grassy area overlooking the ocean.  It was the perfect location for a great view and access to the outside. It was our anniversary so the staff presented us with chocolate and strawberries - a very nice touch!  We had breakfast each morning in the oceanfront restaurant - what a way to start the day.
Manager Response: You ARE our treasured guest and you always will be!  We are happy to hear that we created memories for you and we will continue to surprise and delight you on your future visits.  Thank you for the opportunity to do so!

Summary: Recently stayed 6 days- room was spotless-with all the amenities one could imagine- gorgeous bathroom- housekeeping pays attention to all the details- turn down service excellent! Concierge services were on target ( especially Lucinda) great restaurants were suggested and they were excellent! Pam and Jesse in the main dining room provided prompt  professional service! Food was delicious- served promptly and HOT!!!! Especially loved all the breakfast selections and the vegetarian meal created by the chef at dinner! The ocean views in the dining room are breathtaking! The pools are beautiful and kept well supplied with towels and ice water and attentive service by the pool staff for drinks and snacks. Enjoyed the spa- had an awesome massage by Allie. Car valet personnel were quick
Manager Response: We are so glad you were able to experience the sunsets here...aren't they spectacular? Thank you for your detailed review.  We will share your comments with the employees you mentioned.  Our staff always enjoys reading such nice feedback.  We look forward to welcoming you back again very soon so we may provide you with another exceptional experience.

Summary: A nice hotel, a little tucked away from the street.  With a very small sign, so keep your eyes open.  Beautiful view out the back to the cliffs and ocean.  Rooms are nice, a 4-star standard; it's the little things that are missing or not carried out 100% that do not qualify it for 5 stars. Same for the service, really nice people, but not 5 star.  We were sitting with a large group on the grass overlooking the beach.  Most people were already back in the meeting, but at 2 (out of 8) tables people were speaking.  Nonetheless, the empty tables were cleared and wheeled off.  Not very comfortable for the rest of us. So all in all, beautiful location, good food, and good service - but that last bit to make it exceptional is missing.
Manager Response: Indeed we have a fantastic location - like no other in Southern California.  Our highest mission is to provide the level of service that ranks amongst the best in the world.  We thank you for your feedback as we continue our quest for excellence.

Summary Heading: The Best Service I've Ever Experienced
Summary: This is the second Ritz Carlton I've stayed in (Chicago was the first). I've learned a few things about the Ritz brand....   First, it's going to be an expensive stay. Second, the service will blow your mind. Third, you can't really go wrong with a Ritz. Fourth, I wish I had more money and could live in one.  The Laguna Niguel property is one of my favorite places I have ever stepped foot in. The grounds are incredible, there are tons of seating locations to hang out and grab a drink, the food is great, but the people are what takes it to another level. The service is RIDICULOUSLY good. They really live up to the Ritz Carlton name here.  The rooms are actually just ok and the soundproofing could use a lot of work (I should be able to get a better night's sleep at this price).
Manager Response: We would love to have you move in with us!  Thank you for your nice review of our resort.  We will never let you down.  Welcome home!

Summary Heading: Very Good Hotel in a Beautiful Spot
Summary: Booked a last minute trip here from the East Coast for a short vacation with our 6 yr. old.  Here are a few important things to know: 1.  While our travel agent said there was a kids club, there is NO MORE RITZ KIDS.  The only thing they have are pricey environment classes for kids 5 and up which start at $80 for a 3 hr. class per child. 2.  Get on the club floor if you can.  It has very good service, a beautiful lounge, and food throughout the day (a nice breakfast, a light lunch, hors d'oeuvres and a dessert buffet.)  If you like to drink, they have liquor and limited wine from late afternoon on. 3. Our suite had no internet and it took them almost 24 hrs. to get it to work.  It was a pain to get fixed -- techs in our room, having to take our laptop to other rooms to check,
Manager Response: Thank you very much for providing such valuable feedback.  We greatly appreciate it.  Feedback such as yours always helps us in making improvements and adjustments in our service and facilities where needed.  We encourage you to reach out to our executive office at (949) 240-2000 to speak directly with our leadership team about your concerns.  Thank you again for taking the time to write your review.

Summary: Our Favorite southern California destination. From the moment we arrive and are greeted by name (throughout our stay) to the moment we leave with cold water and directions already in our car we realize that it is the little things that make this property so special. The rooms are always just right, the staff attentive without being intrusive, the food of highest quality and the setting..... Paradise. We always choose to stay on club level as the value can not be beat. The concierge on club level will treat you like a superstar and make you feel like family. The views are sweeping and breathtaking. Access to to the beach is a quick walk down hill with direct access( beach butler is available for transport). Be sure to enjoy the view from the main bar it is mesmerizing and have
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us.  It's our pleasure to provide you with the most creative memories to take home with you.  We hope you have the chance to visit us and Kelly again soon.  He does make the best margaritas!  We are proud to be your new home away from home.

Summary Heading: Best hotel service I've ever had
Summary: okay...I had a horrible night for my last birthday....and Ended up driving up here at 3am with no reservations and looking complete mess. The staff couldnt be sweeter and more understanding.  Instead of treating me like a crazy lady, they were comforting. I got a hotel room over looking salt creek beach for the price of a room with no view. I was satisfied with this and just wanted to go to bed. Not too long after unpacking in my hotel room, I receive a letter at the door...Hand written letter from the front desk girl saying she noticed it was my bday and offered me a discount for my breakfast. THis was not a short letter, this was a long and very sweet and personable letter. SOme people dont like this kind of service, but after the day I had...this blew me away. The letter
Manager Response: What a delightful review. Its always gratifying to read actual stories such as yours.  Our staff fully believes in the care and service they are providing for our guests on a daily basis.  We all enjoy creating life long memories.  Welcome home!

Summary: I met my husband (who was in Ca for earlier in the week) for a Valentines Weekend and some much needed R&R....... We did not have an ocean front room, but we did have a coastal view..Very private and we could hear the ocean waves and watch surfers plus people just walking around in the park.. I would re-book that room in a heart beat.. The Hotel was wonderful..the walking grounds spectacular, the staff was efficient and friendly. The food choices a little redundant if you ate at the outside bar and the indoor dining room.. I would suggest eating out for dinners..LOVE that the Market Place was open for early risers with fresh baked goods and great Peet's Coffee.. My husband used the gym twice and said it was the best gym he has been able to use in a very long time..plus you cant
Manager Response: We hope we catered to your every wish and need.....thats our highest mission.  We look forward to creating more memories for you in the near future.  We will be sure to hold another beautiful coastline room for you!

Summary Heading: Luxurious hotel with beautiful pool and spectacular view of the beach
Summary: We stayed here during a work conference, which was taking place at the hotel. The hotel is luxurious and grand. The room was a bit small, but was elegant and comfortable. We had a view of the pool from our room. Throughout the hotel, there are spectacular views of the ocean. It is truly breathtaking. Parking at the hotel is valet-only. The staff was friendly and always brought around the car promptly. There were plenty of chairs around the pool and the wait staff was very attentive.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our excellent service and fantastic facilities.  Next time you visit, we hope it is for some personal R&R.  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: From accommodating some special requests for a joint birthday celebration, to a personal welcome immediately upon arrival from Jodie, the Guest Relations Coordinator, to a personal escorting up to the room, to a warm welcome-back from Mary at the Club Level lounge, to Penny's warmth after a relaxing day with some port in the Club, to "Happy Birthday" amenities everywhere we were in the hotel, it simply couldn't have been better.  A huge thank you to General Manager Bruce Brainerd (and Julie) for putting in place all the elements of a memorable stay.
Manager Response: What a wonderful reivew, thank you for your valuable time in writing it.  We agree with you....our exclusive Club Level experience ranks amongst the best in the world and we hope to welcome you back again for years to come.  We have many more memories to create for you!  Your generous feedback will be shared with our leaders and we thank you once again for taking the time to share it.

Summary: From the moment I arrived the service quality was evident.  The staff was excellent though as in any case ask better questions.  If you want a cookie - you may want to ask for a description first.  The largest plate of cookies will arrive and at no small cost when you only wanted a cookie.  That aside the location was lovely.  Happened to be there during the "surfing Santa" contest which was great fun.  The restaurant offered a solid and hearty breakfast though the rest of our meals were covered by our conference. And those meals were excellent even when cooked for the masses.  Very impressed with the banquet facilities. The bar was popular and a bit expensive for my tastes though again the service was spot on.
Manager Response: We look forward to welcoming you back whether for business or personal travel.  We will always make your stay a memorable and special one!

Summary: The standard by which most other hotels should be measured.....the service is so exceptional that it's hard to put words to describe.....amazing views and an overall exceptional choice....one of my top 3 (perhaps #1) hotel in the US
Manager Response: Thank you for your warm comments.  We are delighted you enjoyed our facilities and staff while you were here for business.  We look forward to welcoming you back for a vacation too sometime soon.

Summary: I have stayed here several times on business when in this part of California.   The rooms oddly are small but if you get a ocean front room. who cares!  I highly recommend this hotel .
Manager Response: Thank you for recommending us!  We are honored to be your CA home away from home!

Summary Heading: Beautiful Resort, Great Grounds, Service, Food, Almost a Five-Star... Except for...
Summary: The Rooms are the only disappointment at this nearly flawless resort right on a cliff over the Pacific Ocean near Laguna Beach.  The lobby is beautiful (albeit overly fragrant), the views are SPECTACULAR from the Restaurant, 180Blue Bar, Ocean-View rooms and lobby bar.  The grounds are superb with a nice hilly stroll to the beach below.  Restaurant was also superb and service was Ritz-Carlton Caliber.  HOWEVER, this hotel lose a full star for the rooms. We upgraded to an ocean view room with balcony. The view was great, but the small room is getting old and is noisy.  The old wood doors fit poorly, so you hear each conversation that walks by... we were on the main lobby floor right by the 180Blue Bar and heard way too much clatter.  Our neighbor had a yapping do--which is
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed feedback!  We love to receive comments from our guests.  We agree, there is no better view in any hotel in Southern California, and paired with our excellent service, the experience we offer is a homerun.  Would you be so kind as to contact the executive office directly at 949 240 2000 so we can take note of your room preferences and any others you may have?  We want to ensure your next stay is absolutely beyond your dreams.  Thank you.

Summary Heading: Great hotel but could use better management
Summary: We recently stayed more than a week at this hotel.  The location is spectacular, the restaurants are great.  We especially liked the lovely outdoor location of the 180blu restaurant with absolutely wonderful sushi and a mohito that rivals the best of Miami.  You cannot go wrong with any of the restaurants.  The panoramic view over the Pacific Ocean is truly breathtaking.  Now for the not so terrific aspects.  We have stayed at many Ritz Carlton, and have come to expect the best.  No Ritz has ever failed us except this one.  Our room appeared somewhat dated, had holes in a lamp shade and several light bulbs were burned out.  That was an issue because there were few lights to begin with, so it was hard to find things in our suitcase.  There was no coffee maker in the room, which I
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review.  We take each of our guest's valuable feedback to heart and share it with our management team.  We will be enhancing our guestrooms very soon and we feel confident that you will enjoy the changes once complete.  We hope you have the opportunity to experience the changes to our rooms and provide another review.  We are very proud of our team and their daily accomplishments; however we always continue on our quest for excellence.....it is our highest mission.

Summary: I was here for the night with a friend in one of the ocean view rooms. The property is really top of the line, they did not sacrifice quality anywhere. We arrived to the room with a bottle of Champagne waiting for us. We left the door open at night just so we could hear the constant crashing of the waves down below. The club level staff was very helpful and a pleasure to talk while enjoying the great treats. The open air restaurant on the patio was great to escape to later in the night and enjoy some wine. The staff was so attentive and even arranged for chocolate strawberries in the room, and I wasn't even thinking about that.(Funny thing...the girl I was with didn't like chocolate.) Great location with a good surf spot down below.
Manager Response: It is great to read that we created memories for you and your guest, and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  We will never let you down!

Summary Heading: A Ritz in every way except concierge service
Summary: This was our third stay at this Ritz.  The views from the rooms looking out over the cliffs and ocean are simply incredible.  The rooms, decor, and staff are fully up to what you expect from a Ritz.  No complaints.  We had two issues though, one extremely minor, one not so minor.  On the minor side are their bottles of lotion that are artfully shaped but functionally fail - you cannot squeeze them hard enough to get lotion out without slamming them against your hand (and possibly having lotion go all over).  Great design must be pleasing AND functional.  The much bigger problem is their concierge service.  Rather than professional concierges who are knowledgeable about local restaurants (and other stuff) and who can make good and dependable recommendations, this Ritz has chosen
Manager Response: Thank you for your very detailed review of our property and service.  Your comments are taken seriously and we will use them in an effort to learn and grow from your experience.  While we strive extremely hard to provide a level of service that ranks amongst the best in the world, we seem to have let you down.  Please contact the Executive Office directly at (949) 240-2000 to speak with our team regarding your experience.  Thank you and we look forward to welcoming you back to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary Heading: A nice place to stay in Dana Point
Summary: We like to be there as often as even possible - or should I say the budget allows? I love that place- it is nicely renovated and if you are a frequent guest you are treated very very very special. You see nothing else as the ocean and might be only disrupted by the foghorn- otherwise you can totally relax and enjoy.
Manager Response: You are right...we do remember you!  We have a very unique way of remembering all of our return guests and we are glad you noticed.  Come back soon!

Summary: The Ritz Carlton is situated on the bluff directly overlooking the Pacific. From almost any vantage point the ocean is the focal point. There's a wonderful outdoor patio bar where guests can do their winter whale watching. The view from the weight room is unparalleled. Trails lead down to the beach. The rooms could use a little facelift. They look a little tired. Come to think of it, the beds were uncomfortable, lumpy, soft, and poorly made. Other than that, the staff is outstanding--all very friendly and professional. Great place to stay if you visit Southern California and great venue for a wedding.
Manager Response: Thank you for your constructive feedback.  We are excited to share with you our soft goods renovation taking place within the next year to all of our guestrooms.  We know you will enjoyt he enhancements.  We couldn't agree more that our amazing view, paired with our outstanding service, are a homerun!  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary: We had arrived at 9 pm for a stay that had been pre-planned and organized like a military take-over since September. My friends had stayed there in the past, waxing prolific over the beauty of the place, the service, the views. It was to my friends' detriment that the room we had pre-booked and carefully arranged happened to be situated in the wing where the pool was currently being renovated. So instead of the expected steps-to-a-pool-and-a-view sort of welcome, we were relegated to a second floor that looked out to...nothing. The front desk was obviously ill prepared and could do nothing about it. We carefully explained our disappointment to the manager at hand, and Ashley, took pains to fix the problem.  We were upgraded to a suite, a beautiful ocean-view. However upon moving
Manager Response: Thank you for your very kind words about Ashley.  She is a super star and we are so fortunate to have her on our team.  She genuinely cares about your well-being.  We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay after getting settled.  We do fall down from time to time, but our highest mission is to always ensure your complete satisfaction upon resolution.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Unbeatable location, supurb staff....Elegant, beautiful and comfortable hotel
Summary: My husband and I travel for work and have been to hundreds of hotels... many on the level of a Ritz Carlton, but none compare to this property.    We spent the last days of our honeymoon and were overwhelmed not only with the beauty of the hotel, but also with the superior professionalism of the staff and all the property has to offer.   We were treated so well... I thought we would never leave.    To top it off... when staying at the hotel, you have everything you need, so if you dont have a car, don't bother renting one.  They have amazing food (restaurant and a perfect little snack/coffee shop), work out facilities with views that can't be matched, tennis courts, beach, top notch spa, wine room.  What more would you need?  Even if you can only make it for a night.... don't
Manager Response: Thank you for your glowing review of our resort!  We are so proud of our staff and our facilities.  We are delighted we were able to create a few lifelong memories for you, and we look forward to welcoming you back to your new home away from home very soon.  The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel is the perfect place to celebrate special occasions!

Summary Heading: Price versus Value Winner all the time with this Resort
Summary: The Ritz is perfectly located 168 feet above the Ocean looking at Catalina Island ahead and Surfers below. This resort lives up to the Ritz reputation with a price that wont break the bank and will  make your family or significant other happy beyond belief. I live 2 miles away from this hotel and have stayed here on 3 occassions to give me a break from the daily grind. The food available at the dining options are great and the service right from the valet to all involved never let you down. The view, the view, and the view is what this 5 star hotel captures from your room, the great fitness room, the rooftop cocktail area, the bar moon window and finally the outside grounds that overlook the cliffs of Dana Point and the wonderful walking areas where you can start holding your
Manager Response: WOW - you captured exactly what we strive to provide perfectly!  Thank you!  We appreciate your loyalty and we will never let you down.  We are honored to be your home away from home.  See you soon!

Summary Heading: Finally writing about this special place
Summary: We were here in September and Im just writing this review now!  This hotel was exceptionall...we booked thru American Express and were given a resort credit and breakfast which we had in room overlooking the ocean.  The room was beautiful and and the service great.  We never left the property dining at hotel for both lunch and dinner as only there one night.  We got up early to play tennis and the courts were great  too.  Highly recommend this place.  Its beautiful.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your busy day to write your review of our resort.  We pride ourselves on offering the most incredible facilities and service you will find anywhere.  We hope you can experience more memories with us again soon.

Summary: One of the most beautiful and grand hotels. Each room offers the best view of the beautiful waters of the Pacific Ocean. The restaurants are very good. The best part of the hotel is the Pacific Ocean. Good service and very efficient staff.
Manager Response: We are so fortunate to have the most amazing view of the Pacific Ocean of any resort in Southern California!  We are delighted you enjoyed yourself and we look forward to welcoming you back again very soon.

Summary: I have had the pleasure of stating at Ritz's all over the world, and the common trait amongst all of them - impeccable service! This property was no exception! Was there for 4 nights and each one a wonderful experience. The views, the room layout, the food - all tops! Since my last visit was for a business confernce, the group sales and banquet staff were some of he finest I have ever worked with...every detail was looked after!  Glad we'll be back next January!
Manager Response: Whether for leisure or business travel, our highest mission is to provide a memorable experience for all of our guests.  Thank you for your kind feedback.  We look forward to welcoming you back again soon, no matter what the reason may be!

Summary: There simply are not enough lovely words for me to describe the amazing vacation we just had at this property!  We took our family (grown kids and spouses) for 3 nights over the New Years weekend, and every one of us can't wait to return. We were blessed to be able to stay on the concierge level...once you've gone to the 6th floor, you never go back!!  The snacks, goodies, beverages and candy bar has to be seen to be believed...but that all pales in comparison to the spoiling the staff lavishes you with. There was no request that couldn't be accommodated, and with a "it's my pleasure!" type of attitude.  Pennie is one of the best examples of quality hospitality we have ever encountered!  What a delightful way this was to ring in a  new year together as a family!
Manager Response: Thank you so much!  We are extremely proud of Penny and all of our ladies and gentlemen.  They enjoy welcoming our guests into their home and creating memorable experiences that will last a life time.  We agree....the Club Level experience is the best in the world!  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary: While one of the older Ritz's, the location and views makes this Ritz a "must try". We found the staff to generally be friendly and professional. Room sizes are on the small size, but rennovations provide a modern appearance. The signature resturant Raya was average for dinner. Definitely try the wine tasting and drinks/light food on the outside deck at sunset. Great spot for wedding etc.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your busy schedule to provide a review of our resort.  We greatly appreciate your feedback.  We hope to welcome you back to this special desination of ours very soon.

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel in a beautiful setting!
Summary: We checked in on new years day. The holiday decoration was beautiful. The employees are o friendly and extra helpful. The food was good, although very expensive. Although we wouldn't of expected anything else. Would absolutely come back again.
Manager Response: We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us.  We hope we instilled memories for you and your family that will last forever.  We hope you can come back again soon.  Please visit our website...we continuously offer special value packages.  Thank you for your feedback.

Summary: Located high on a bluff overlooking a dramatic beach it is pretty much close to heaven in more ways than one. We came to spend New Years evening here and we had a terrific introduction to 2012. We were able to check in early, we had a bit of an upgrade to partial ocean view and had a small balcony. The room was very comfortable and there was a small fridge, free bottles of water and a very high bed. In fact if you are under 5 ft 3 you might need  stool to get on. alo or dismiss the bell boy when he offers to explain how the lights work. We did and I was never able to figure it out. As in most hotels, the lighting was not adequate. Service, as in all Ritz hotels, was flawless . The missing lightbulb was brought up in five minutes, and every representative was cheerful and
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed feedback.  We have shared it with the appropriate leaders and promise you that we will tighten up our processes.  Thank you for your business and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  We have an exciting 2012 planned and hope to share it with you.

Summary: This is a flagship Ritz Carlton resort property that is superbly maintained.  The valets, bell men, concierge and reception folks were all warm, friendly and seemed genuinely interested in making our stay memorable.  Upon arrival I was pleased to learn that my rooms had been upgraded.  The balconies of my adjoining rooms were expansive and the views of the Pacific were unbeatable.  Within 15 minutes of arrival, there was a knock at the door and my son was surprised to find that the hotel had sent a small cake to recognize his 10th birthday.   The kids really enjoyed the Ritz Carlton scavenger hunt and loved watching the surfers catch waves.  The hotel was tastefully decorated for the Christmas season.  (lights, Christmas trees and a very impressive ginger bread ship) This
Manager Response: Thank you for noticing our casual elegance.  We pride ourselves on learning about, and listening to, our guests.  Finding out that simple something that will make them remember their experience with us for a lifetime.  Come back soon....we are looking forward to it!

Summary Heading: Best place to be on Christmas!
Summary: One of our families holiday traditions is to put the prime rib in the oven and head down the street to the Ritz! Their "gingerbread houses" are amazing! As are the views, the drinks on the deck, the carolers, the overall ambiance. On Christmas Day at the Ritz, the locals take over, and it is an awesome treat. For martinis and cigars (for the boys) on the deck, it cannot be beat. Do not think there are many views that can compete with this (especially with the typical So Cal Christmas heat wave).
Manager Response: We couldn't agree more!  180blu is an amazing venue for all, not just the boys.  Our views are absolutely unbeatable, and we enjoy providing the level of service that ranks amongst the best in the world.  We can't imagine not being a part of your holiday traditions.  Thank you!

Summary Heading: Spectacular views and treated like royalty!
Summary: We spent a weekend at the Ritz right before Christmas.  I was a little reluctant since the Montage is my favorite.  But I felt that the Ritz, was just as spectacular, views were awesome, loved our balcony and the outdoor bar where we sat each night around the fire pits in comfortable chairs and enjoyed the ocean and the surfers and dolphins.  The wait staff could not have been more friendly and personable and helpful.   Of course it is expensive but it's to be expected for a Ritz and you get what you pay for in this case.  We had no complaints.   We even laughed and took pictures when they would park our Ford rental next to the Bentley convertibles in their front circle when we asked for our car to be brought up.  The valets enjoyed it and laughed along with us!  I know it is a
Manager Response: We are delighted you decided to give us a try!  We will never let you down and are so thankful for your business.  Please come join us again soon.  We have new and exciting things happening in 2012...can't wait to share them with you!

Summary: gorgeous property with service you would expect from a ritz. im a sucker for turn-down service, so i loved the chocolate-on-pillow every time we get back to our room. although on the expensive side, definitely stay there for the view and experience!
Manager Response: Thank you for your photos, we love seeing them.  We agree that our view is one of the best in the world and we treasure that every day.  Along with our excellent service, your experience here is a home run!

Summary: Very nice hotel. Everything has an extra cost which I did not like. Great location but other options in area.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We realize you have many choices in luxury destinations and we are delighted you chose to stay with us.  We look forward to being of excellent service to you again in the future.

Summary: Two nights in an oceanview room - fantastic!  All the staff were friendly, helpful and seemed to really like working here.  I was first put in a garden view room where some hammering was going on, when I ask Jim Bell if I had to listen to that he quickly called the front desk and got me a new room with a view - now that's what you're paying for - absolutely incredible view, lovely room, and very comfy bed.  I had dinner in Raya and it was delicious (arugula salad Yummy!), followed by drinks at the bar.  courtney was my server and she was fantastic, took very good care of me.  I was traveling alone and everyone was very thoughtful of that.  worked out in the gym which has tremendous views, very clean and variety of equipment.  My only complaint was the spa and salon.  The girl at
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback.  It is through comments such as yours that we learn and continue striving for excellence.  We read and take all feedback seriously.  We will be sure to recognize Jim and Courtney on their stellar service and share your Spa/Salon concerns with our appropriate team of leaders.  We hope to welcome you back soon so you can enjoy a true Ritz-Carlton Spa and Salon experience.

Summary: We just spent 4 heavenly nights at this hotel. The setting on a cliff above the Pacific Ocean is magnificent. The staff is exceptional; wherever we walked, employees greeted us and offered to be of assistance without ever being intrusive. There is a paved walking path down to the beautiful beach, and if you don't want to walk up or down, they will shuttle you! The full-service spa is lovely; the fitness room might be the most beautiful fitness room in the world, with floor-to-ceiling windows offering breathtaking views of the ocean. They offer complimentary daily yoga and pilate classes; the instructors are very experienced and knowledgeable and take a personal interest in each participant. The rooms are immaculate and very comfortable, and with our patio door left open just a
Manager Response: What an awesome picture you shared!  We know you will agree with us when we say our sunsets are out of this world!  Thank you for your pleasant review.  We look forward to welcoming you back again very soon - your new home away from home.

Summary: I recently attended a weekend conference at this hotel. The hotel was well decorated for the holiday season but also had an antique surf board theme which is appropriate given the hotel's purch above the breaking waves of the Pacific Ocean. Conference facilities work well for business or weddings at this location. The staff is friendly, the rooms are clean, the view from the gym is spectacular. The hotel also has a driveway which goes down to the beach and links to an extensive paved hiking trail.
Manager Response: We are glad you took notice of our surboard collection.  We participate in a silent auction each holiday season in which the money raised from purchasing the unique and autographed surfboards benefits our partner organization, Surfers Healing.  Thank you for your review and we look forward to welcoming back soon.

Summary: We just returned from a stay at the Ritz Laguna Niguel and had a wonderful experience.  The hotel is one of the best Ritz Carlton properties that I have personally stayed at.   The hotel is set on a great location - near Laguna Beach and close to Dana Point.   Similar to The Montage, it is set up on the cliffs offering great views of the Pacific ocean.     We stayed on the Club Level and had just an outstanding experience and it was worth every penny.  Mary, one of the Club Level attendents, is such a pleasure and made entire trip an A+.  The staff is great and they all offer A+ service.  The room was well appointed and extremely comfortable.  My only complaint was that on the last two days the main pool was closed for renovation.   We were not told about this in advance.
Manager Response: We enjoyed having you with us!  We agree, our exclusive Club Level ranks amongst the best in the world.  Mary and her team are wonderful.  We sincerely apologize for the pool maintenance.  We are looking forward to sharing our enhancements with you in the near future.  Thank you for your loyalty to our resort!

Summary: We stayed at this Ritz for our anniversary and it was beautiful.  The property itself is decorated in more of a modern style, which is nice to see, though the rooms don't appear to have been updated for some time.  The rooms are very nice, but you can tell they were decorated some time ago and some of the bath fixtures stick, etc.  We did have an ocean view room.  If you want immediate beach access, stay on the first floor - you can walk out of your room right onto the grassy area overlooking the ocean.  I will say that the view is probably better from the higher floors and you will have a balcony that you can go out onto.  If I had to do it again, I would choose a higher floor instead of the first.  The property itself has so much to offer.  I highly recommend spending time at
Manager Response: Thank you for your taking the time to provide your feedback.  We utilize all of our guests' feedback in order to continuously improve our services and facilities.  We hope you can join us again soon after our next phase of enhancements is complete in 2012.  We are all very excited for the changes and additions that will begin very soon.

Summary: This was a one of the best hotels I've stayed at.  The valet staff was very friendly and helpful and the view of the hotel was stunning.  You can stand in the bar area, or just outside the hotel and have a view over the cliffs with a scenic view of the ocean and a beautiful sunset.  Great food, and I was sad that I had to leave...  Thanks for a great stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel!  We look forward to creating more memorable experiences for you in the future.

Summary: Wonderful service, fabulous location, all the amenities you need.
Manager Response: Thank you for commenting on our service, location, and facilities.  We enjoy providing the level of service that ranks amongst the best in the world, along with an incredible location and view!

Summary: Had an ocean view room and can't believe the view. Staff is accommodating and the place is very clean. Very relaxing place to be
Manager Response: We are delighted you found some R&R time with us.  We look forward to providing you more relaxing memories in the near future.

Summary: from the moment you arrive until you leave you are treated like royalty. its a beautiful resort. Lobby is stunning with decorated flowers. rooms are very nice and clean. had ocean view and worth every penny. stunning views. did not eat here or use spa so i cant comment on that. valet was very quick. will come back again
Manager Response: We couldn't agree more.....our view is simply breath taking and like none you see from a resort in Southern California.  Our highest mission is to enhance our spectacular view and sunsets with our outstanding guest service.  It's a winning combination!  Come back again soon.

Summary Heading: Great service and a great expereicne
Summary: Based upon a lifetime of travel the Ritz Carlton, Laguna Niguel, remains our favorite luxury destination. To us, she reigns as the grand madame far above other hotels in the area.  Should one desire, you can have total fulfillment never venturing outside the property.  Every aspect of a desirous getaway is satisfied within the resort at an extraordinary level.  Most importantly, the service extended by all the Ladies and Gentlemen is consistently unparalleled to all others.  The resort uniquely welcomes you as though you are truly the most important guest and envelops you in a family atmosphere. You will not depart without planning your return!
Manager Response: Your experience is exactly what our ladies and gentlemen strive for every day with every guest.  We love hearing that we have hit a home run!  Our mission is to continue striving for excellence and keep our guests wanting more.  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon so we can create more life long memories for you.  We hope you have the opportunity to visit us during the holiday season.  It is a very special time of year at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary Heading: Wonderful Property In A Great Location
Summary: Stayed for a business meeting for four nights. The property is everything you would expect from a RC and the location/views are fantastic.  The service was exceptional and the ocean view rooms provide for amazing sunset views.  Great area, helpful staff, and lots of activities to keep one occupied.  Highly recommended if your budget can allow it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely review of our resort!  We hope to welcome you back very soon for a relaxing visit  of leisure time.  We look forward to assisting you.

Summary: Spent 2 night over Fall break at Ritz Carlton with kids.  Fabulous! in every way.  We were able to cash in our Marriott points and then upgrade to the suite floor for $75 a night with access to food and snacks throughout the day, beverages and libations included.  The staff was top notch!  The kids were treated like royalty - this speaks volumes considering we have three very rambunctious additions.  Enjoyed access to tennis courts, basketball and soccer balls for our brood.  Welcoming pools and hot tub!  Beautiful workout room with ceiling to floor windows overlooking the ocean and surfers below.  Easy access to beach!  Stayed at the Montage too in past with my husband.  Both are exceptional.  If you want a fun relaxing vacation, call them!
Manager Response: We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us!  Thank you for choosing to visit The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.  We look forwarding to welcoming all of you back again very soon.

Summary: Our stay at the Ritz was amazing. We went for a long relaxing weekend. The hotel grounds were perfect we relaxed on the cliff overlooking the surfers and beautiful beach for hours. We had lunch at the pool one day and it was very good.  The hotel offers a great breakfast with a knockout view. The staff did a good job. We were lucky enough to be there during a "Yappy Hour". All the locals brought their dogs in halloween costumes.  Over 500 dogs in costume what a blast!  We love the ritz and it never disappoints. Our favorite dinner was at Watermarc in Laguna it was casual but divine!
Manager Response: We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us; especially Yappy Hour!  What a treat!  We enjoyed having you and look forward to your next visit to The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary: This hotel was amazing. The staff goes above and beyond for you. The minute you pull up in your car there is a hand on the door ready for you. They practcally escort you to the front desk. My kids were greeted with beach buckets and a scavenger hunt. Our room wasnt ready so we decided to check out the pool area and before we even got there we got a call that it was ready. We had an ocean view suite on the 4th floor. The views were truly amazing as was the sound of the waves. The rooms were so luxurious I could have just stayed there all day. But my kids wanted to go the pool. We had lunch there twice and the service was excellent and food was good too. The restaurant at the hotel was creative and delicious, my kids were given a special dessert by our waiter. There is out side
Manager Response: We are delighted you have found a new home away from home for you and your children as well.  We take pride in ensuring our smaller guests have just as wonderful of a time as our adult guests.  Creating memories is our passion.  We look forward to welcoming you all back again very soon.

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel that's great for families or couples.
Summary: My family (me, wife & 3 kids) just spent 4 days at the Ritz for a family wedding.  All of the activities including the actual wedding were at the Ritz so besides one round of golf we never left the property.  In a nutshell we had a great time. Upon arrival we had the opportunity to upgrade to the Club Level.  I highly recommend this as it was great for us with the kids and adults.  There are several meals provided each day with a bar and other nice touches.  The staff on this floor were great and very helpful and friendly the whole time.  I’m not sure if it’s cheaper to wait till you get there but definitely look into it.   The property itself is very big and spread out.  There are a couple of pools, several restaurants and bars, fitness, outside lounges, and right on the beach.
Manager Response: There is so much to do and see in the Laguna area as well as right at our resort.  Thank you for taking the time to explore our facility and grounds.  You are right, our exclusive Club Level is phenomenal!  Did you have the opportunity to experience Jean Michel Cousteau's Ambassadors of the Environment?  If not, please put that on your list for your next visit.  We look forward to it!

Summary: recently stayed at this property for a wedding.  the rooms were very nice and spacious.  service was outstanding.  truely recommend a room with a ocean view.  the front desk and concierge went out of thier way to help us out.  it is truely the little things that make an experience memorable.
Manager Response: We are so glad you got to experience our resort.  Thank you for your post.  Our dedicated and talented team of ladies and gentlemen try very hard to anticipate every need, spoken or not spoken, of our guests.  It is our pleasure!

Summary: We spent 4 nights at the Ritz in Oct 2011 and in every aspect it was a wonderful stay.  The Ritz is located on a cliff above the Pacific, and most of the even numbered rooms overlook the ocean.  The rooms on the first floor (ground level) have nice patios but the beach is not visible from the room.  Rooms on upper floors appear to have better views.   The valet, bellman, front desk staff and concierge were very helpful and responsive.  We just had one incident with the valet when we called down for our call about 20 minutes in advance and they didn't have the car or a record we called.   The rooms are a nice size with a small walk-in closet with drawers, and another "closet" with the safe and fridge.  Robes are provides and the bathrooms have tubs, dual vanities, and attractive
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting our resort and posting a review about your experience.  We are delighted you enjoyed our facility and service.  We strive to provide each of our guests with the best possible experience and memories.  We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Huge disappointment, poor service for a Ritz Carlton
Summary: We saw no housekeeping for an entire day, even after three requests (2 phone calls and one visit to the front desk).  Very lazy, unaccomodating staff.  Our room overlooked the pool which was terribly loud with screaming children and birds flying about our terrace.  We were not given a king sized bed, as we had requested.  This place was a huge disappointment!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback and concerns.  Your care, comfort, and satisfaction are our highest missions and we would welcome the opportunity to discuss your visit in more detail personally.  Please contact our Executive Office at your earliest convenience. Thank you.

Summary: I visited the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel on a recent business trip.  I had never previously stayed in a Ritz before and had been excited to see what the “Ritz” experience was all about.  After reading some of the reviews, I became somewhat apprehensive.  However, I am happy to report that my experience was excellent.  I don’t know that I could say enough good things about the staff and the way they take care of their guests.  There was always someone available to answer a question about the hotel, amenities, or nearby areas.  One morning, my TV wouldn’t change channels.  I assumed it was the remote so I went to the concierge at 5am.  He asked if I wanted an engineer to come look at my TV then.  I declined as it wasn’t that big of an issue.  At the same time, I asked what time
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  You are right....there is so much to do here and so much more for you to do on your next visit.  Your care and comfort is our highest mission, and providing you with excellent service is our top priority.  We enjoy creating memories for our guests and we look forward to welcoming you back with open arms.  See you soon!

Summary Heading: There is much to do....how about much to do
Summary: My wife and I try to visit a Ritz Carlton every year for our anniversary, and I wasn’t expecting anything but the best from Laguna and that is exactly what we receive. Top notch personal service and the club level service is worth its weight in gold. Great experience, awesome personalities, award winning service with an awesome view. Anything we requested was always followed with a "sure" or "I’ll look into that". Second only the Bachelor Gulch and the Reynolds Plantation, by far one of the most awarding stays we have ever had at a Ritz.   The only concern we had, and it was not a complaint was the dinner we experienced at Raya was not up to par. The service was great but the food and its presentation was not so great. But this was a concern that was quickly rectified and that
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review of our service, facilities, Club Level, and Raya.  We greatly appreciate your compliments and feedback.  The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel is a fantastic place to celebrate a special occasion.  We enjoy creating memories for our guests.  We hope you have found a new special place to celebrate your anniversaries and we look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: Visiting the Ritz Carleton was one of 3 five star resorts we visited last week.  When we entered the hotel and checked in, they allowed us to check-in at around 10:30am, which was very convenient!  The butler also walked us to our room and provided an overiew of the resort utilizing an interactive display on one of the walls.  The room was okay, with a large marble bathroom.  Yet, the remainder of the room was very plain and simple.  The resort facility was beautiful with very nice flooring and decorations.  The best was the view off of one of the floors wherein you could sit at the top of the cliff and overlook the ocean.  This was an incredible view that my family enjoyed while sitting on comfortable chairs watching the sun set over the ocean.  Simply breathtaking and the
Manager Response: We are delighted you and your family enjoyed your stay with us.  Our view and beach are magnificent and we love sharing them with our guests.  Thank you for visiting the fine Southern California coast.

Summary: My husband and I live in Orange County and decided to use Marriott points (who knew?) to spend our anniversary at the Ritz Carlton and I am so glad we did! From the moment we arrived until we left, the customer service was incredible.   The check in process was seamless and they had upgraded us to a room with an ocean view which was fabulous.  The bell captain brought our luggage right away, told us about the property and brought ice.  Shortly thereafter the hotel sent strawberries and champagne along with two cards - one from the valet Travis congratulating us on our anniversary and the other from the hotel.  A great touch.  The fitness center is well equipped and overlooks the ocean.  We had sushi and drinks at 180blu one night. Service, drinks and food were all good.  We also
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review of your excellent experience and our service and outlets.  We hope you have found a new, close, home away from home.  We look forward to welcoming you back again very soon.  Thank you for redeeming your points with us!

Summary: The Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel has spoiled me. The views are to die for and the grounds are amazing. Add on top of that the fact that the staff will go above and beyond to make sure everyone is comfortable. I was there for a conference and two amazing things happened. First, a coworker needed to make a presentation in the morning but her luggage didn't make it. The hotel operator brought her some of her own clothes and did her hair and makeup. There is no way this was in her job description - she was just empowered to do what it took. Then another coworker found a pair of pants in the gift shop that she wanted but they were too long. The staff made a couple of phone calls, and I'm not kidding when I say, the hemmed pants were waiting in her room by the time she got back (maybe
Manager Response: We love spoiling our guests!  We will always do whatever it takes to ensure  your stay is as memorable as possible. It is our pleasure!  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary Heading: Could Almost Convince Me to Move to California
Summary: This was the second year I accompanied my husband on a business trip to Orange County -- and also the second time we stayed at the Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel. The property is fabulous and overlooks the beautiful ocean -- stellar views throughout. This time we were treated to an executive suite. It was so difficult to leave! Aside from the first-rate service one would expect from a Ritz-Carlton property, I'd like to personally recommend the restaurant, Raya. I was hoping Sweet Corn Soup was still on the menu -- and it was. It is absolutely delicious! A new favorite is the lobster tacos. Get both items and you'll dream about them for a year as I have. Everything at this resort is just top notch.
Manager Response: Thank you for your post about Raya.  We are so proud of Raya and it is always nice to hear our guests are as well.  Sweet corn soup is a favorite of many!  And the lobster tacos are a new and well loved addition to our amazing menu.  We hope you get to return soon and experience Taco Tuesday!  Until then......sweet dreams.

Summary: I am writing to commend the staff on the excellent service received on my most recent visit to the Ritz Carlton Laguna Nigel. I and my family have been staying at the hotel since 1997, and have never been disappointed. The staff which we consider our “Ritz Family” truly has made the Ritz Carlton feel like our home away from home.   There are a few members I would like to recognize individually for their always caring attitudes and courteous manner:   Penni Garcia, the club level concierge, which of course words cannot express her continued efforts to make sure we and everyone she encounters is satisfied to the greatest extent. She is indeed a pleasure to be around, a delight, and is a novelty in customer service.  Enough cannot be said about Mary Wiesen, Kathryn – Day, Colleen –
Manager Response: WOW!  Thank you for the detailed review of your stay.  We are so honored to have you and your family as part of our family.  We are grateful for your loyalty and will never let you down.  We promise to continue to provide you with new, life-long memories.  We can't wait for your next visit!  Take good care in the meantime and we will see you soon.

Summary: Very special place, hotel with great service, beautiful views from the beach, good food, clean, spacious and comfortable room.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments!  We hope you have found a new home away from home.  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary: Great location. Friendly staff. The usual great rooms provided by the Ritz-Carlton. Gym is amazing and facing the ocean. So is the breakfast room.
Manager Response: Thank you!  We hope to see you again very soon!

Summary: I visited theis hotel for a conference, and paid the conference rate, but was accompanied by my girlfriend at the time for four days, three nights.  This was my first stay at a Ritz Carlton property, and the room was good; definitely worth the conference rate of around $270.  Although the room was just a room like many others that I've stayed in, it was clean and comfortable, and generally speaking met my expectations, though the bathroom was above average for a hotel bathroom (double sinks, etc).  The valet, bellmen, concierge, waitstaff all provided great service.  The hotel is on a cliff overlooking the ocean, and the view was definitely the highlight of the property.  I was on a ground floor room, and the star of the production was the view from the patio, which was only
Manager Response: We are delighted you and your girlfriend enjoyed your stay with us and we hope to welcome you back soon for a much more relaxing leisure visit.  Please feel free to reach out to us if we can assist you in any way for your next reservation.  Thank you!

Summary: We surprised our two grown daughters and their 3 children 8 and under for a long surprise birthday weekend.  We had planned with the staff in advance.  They had planned for us an amazing weekend! From beach toys for the kids when we arrived, to goodies set up in our room ( birthday cupcakes , cookies, fruit, chocolate champaign and more).  Then a birthday lunch at the pool with gifts for each daughter. The food was fantastic, the spa was divine, and for the kids an amazing treasure hunt around the grounds.  Their Ambassador of the Environment club for the kids was great! One staff member in particular Rebecca gave our family great service! One morning we had a family yoga session outside and the wonderful instructor took some great pics of our family in yoga poses, had the hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for the lovely post!  We love creating memorable getaways for our guests, even our smaller ones!  Next time you visit hopefully Southern California won't have a blackout.  See you soon!

Summary: I stayed 4 nights with my Husband on a business function for my work. Luckily the trip was mostly play rather than work. We were able to enjoy the hotel and the area, which are both gorgeous. I loved everything from the high end finishes to the fresh flowers in the hotel. And the views are breath taking day and night. The food was simply amazing, I loved every dish I had there, especially the halibut and fillet mignon. If I had the opportunity I definitely would return to this amazing hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your photos.  We love seeing them!  We hope you have a chance very soon to return to the resort.  We look forward to welcoming you back.
