Summary Heading: Amazing views and service with some room to improve!
Summary: My husband and I have made it a tradition to stay at The Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel every anniversary.  I’ve waited to write this review after having stayed here several times to provide a more accurate account.  I will start with the pros. Pros:   Location: The hotel sits right on Salt Creek beach and offers free transfers down the small hill to the beach.  Every section of the hotel offers amazing vistas of the California coastline.   Their restaurants 180 Blu and Raya sit over the water and are the perfect place to order a glass of wine and some California cuisine while watching the surfers catch some waves.  Dolphins are very often seen right up near the shore and are always fun to watch too.  Also, a quick drive down beautiful PCH will place you right in the heart of Laguna
Manager Response: Thank you so much for all of that wonderful feedback.  We listen to every piece of feedback our guests provide us.  Our highest mission is to provide the exact service and facilities that our guests want, deserve, and expect.  We were so fortunate to have an amazing summer of high occupancy.  After several years of uncertainty it was wonderful to be full.  We are looking forward to welcoming you back for another fantastic stay very soon.  We know you will enjoy our new guest room enhancements at that time.  We have many things planned for our rooms over the next year.  Of which include refrigerators and many other subtle surprises.  We are excited!   Please let us know in the Executive Office if you have any specific questions about our room enhancements, and/or if we can assist you with your next reservation.

Summary Heading: The Ritz really delivers a WOW experience!!
Summary: I was a little bit eskeptical at the beginning, but the very moment I entered the lobby, my perception changed inmediately. i loved staying at the Ritz Laguna Niguel. I didn´t want to leave, next time I will aim at the Club level. The customer experience there is really something. People is so friendly and they take care!! Facilities are outstanding! It is really amazing staying at a Ritz.
Manager Response: We can not wait to welcome you back for another WOW experience!  We create WOW experiences for our guests every day!  Thank you for your review.

Summary Heading: The Ladies at the Ritz - Excellence, once again!
Summary: Director of Guest Services, Clarita Parra and Club Level Supervisor, Penni Garcia (along with Penni’s crew on the Club Level) have once again, made us feel so special and so welcomed during our visit last month.   Clarita personally greeted us when we checked in and escorted us to the Club Level - where we were again greeted so warmly by Penni, who remembered us from our previous visit in 2010.    Both Clarita and Penni told us they were working the weekend of our visit and we got the sense that working the weekends was neither a chore nor just a job for them, but that they really enjoyed taking care of people and making sure they helped ensure that we had the full “Ritz experience”.     The Club Level at the Ritz is such a wonderful way to experience the Ritz because it’s like
Manager Response: We are honored to receive such a glowing review, thank you!   We agree with you...Clarita and Penni are tremendous assets to our our leadership team.  Guests just like you continue to return to our resort just to see their friendly, warm faces.  We are very proud of them and also our entire Club team.  They are the real reason why our Club has been rated #1 in our company by our guests for four consequetive years.  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel, great staff, but not my favourite Ritz
Summary: Just back from a 4 day beach break. We broke up our trip with a night in San Diego so had first an ocean front and then a garden view room. It is definitely worth spending the extra for a full ocean view as that is the main draw of this hotel. There is a whole set up on the terrace for sundowners with cocktails and sushi - arrive early to get a seat but if not, the indoor bar has wonderful sunset views too.  Surfing lessons are a must, lots of fun and the concierge can set you up with a local teacher. Valet staff were also super welcoming and helpful, we also loved the wine and chocolate/cheese bar. Despite all this, it just didn't feel up to the same standard as some other Ritz properties (stayed at Dove Mountain and Grand Cayman also this year).
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your wonderful expereince. We couldn't agree more that each of Ritz-Carlton properties have their own, special feeling that reflects the uniqueness of each area of the world that they are placed in.  That is what makes each of our hotels and resorts so special.  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: 5 star service, but MUST LOVE DOGS
Summary: Stayed with my family for a long weekend.   The property is spectacular.  The views are unreal, as are the flowers and the landcaping.   For the most part, the service can't be beat -- everywhere, from the restuarants, to the valet (the best valet I've ever experienced -- fast, friendly) to the bell service.  All really top notch.  There are, however a few negatives, one really big.  For the smaller negatives -- the rooms are tired.  Walls scratched, tub wouldnt drain, one sink had a slow drain.  No coffee set up in room, and the minibars have all been emptied in favor of a market-shop in the lobby.   That was fine, but why leave the old, empty mini bar in the closet with a note saying "this is not a refrigerator".   Not very Ritz Carlton-like.  Now, for the really big negative.
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed comments.  We have taken your feedback to heart and have shared it with our team.  Our rooms will soon be undergoing many enhancements over the next year that we are very excited about.  We know you will love the changes.  In response to your feedback regarding dogs, we host a very successful event once a month (during summer only) called Yappy Hour.  It is a wonderful outreach (a complimentary event) to our local community.  Being that our beaches and walkways are all public spaces and not private, we of course welcome all.  A signifcant portion from the food and beverage sales at the event are donated to the Pet Project which benefits animal shelters in our local area.  We look forward to assisting you again in the future.

Summary: I would recommend you book early to get one of the lovely rooms that over look the Pacific Ocean, however if you don’t you can enjoy the awe-inspiring sunsets from any of the many balconies, Adirondack chairs or benches that adore the property.  We dined at Raya, the food was brilliant; prepared and presented with perfection. Wine from the dining lounge 180blu, with panoramic views could not be better.  Be prepared to pay the price for a stay at this elegant hotel, the customer service was superb. The receptionist that greeted us upon our arrival was informative and genuine.
Manager Response: We agree!  The view is superb!  Thank you for sharing your experience.  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary Heading: Overall great stay, should have stayed longer.
Summary: The hotel is about a 10-15 minute drive from Laguna Beach, perched over the ocean.Twelve members of our family stayed at the Ritz to attend a wedding in nearby Laguna Beach. Some of us on the Club floor suites and others in standard rooms. Overall impressions: Location is excllent, service is impeccable with staff always willing to go the extra mile to satisfy; facilities are extensive and there is something for everyone. There were many families staying at the hotel at the time and some with little children. That suited us as we had with us our 10 month old grand-son however it may not be everyone's cup of tea. I expect mid-summer is peak season and the hotel may be a little quieter in other periods. Two caveats to an overall good stay: The rooms I saw are a bit dated and could
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our resort as your destination to attend the wedding.  We remember you and your family and are delighted you enjoyed yourselves.  We do have a soft renovation of in-room amenities that will be taking place this fall and winter. We are very excited for that and look forward to sharing our new room enhancements with you soon.  Please remember the next time you return that we have shuttle service for you to and from the beach so you do not have to endure all of those stairs!

Summary: It is so sad that the one thing that makes this hotel less than perfect is quite an important thing to most people.  First off, let me say that this wonderful hotel is definitely worth the price.  The ocean view room is spectacular with full ocean views and plenty of space in the bedroom and bathroom.  We stayed on the club level and it is SUPERB.  Everyone at the hotel is helpful and kind, and go out of their way to make you feel welcome and taken care of.  We are big believers in customer service and the service here is remarkable.  The food, location, service, pools, beach, spa - literally everything - has been wonderful.  We are seasoned travelers and always stay at upper echelon properties, and in our opinion, this hotel is the best place to stay in all of Southern
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and we can certainly empathize with your frustration.  Although we are a non-smoking facility, we can not forbid guests to smoke outside of the hotel.  We are so sorry that this put a damper on your wonderful stay with us.  Please let us know the next time you visit and we will do our very best to ensure you have a wonderful experience.

Summary Heading: Room a littel disappointing as along way from reception etc
Summary: At Ritz you expect great service and we certainly got this. Disappointed that the restaurant is more of a corridor and this needs to be looked at.  Expensive but its the Ritz. Great cocktail bat overlooking the Pacific but needs to be bigger...
Manager Response: Thank you for your ideas.  We greatly appreciate the feedback.  We agree....we need more ocean front outdoor guest facilities.  We are continuously brain storming  ways to accomodate the large number of guests we serve every day.  Our resort just celebrated its 27th year already!  We have added numerous options for our guests and have more in the long range planning.  We hope to never disappoint you or any of our valuable guests.  Stay tuned for more additions and improvements.  See you soon.

Summary: The Ocean views are amazing and the service is lovely and courteous. The hotel is not as well kept as it should be. There were stains on lobby furniture and on bathrobes. The water pressure in the shower was awful. The air conditioning was very loud. The pool area had a bad smell and the food quality was only okay. This is not what we expected at a five star resort.
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed feedback.  We will ensure all of these issues have our urgent attention immediately.  Thank you!  We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: Third time over from the UK and as good as ever. We had two adjacent rooms on the third floor with a pool view, and whilst not as nice as the last time we stayed view-wise, everything else about the rooms was great. The breakfasts in Raya were excellent. All the staff extremely helpful, especially Lauren who fixed us up with some local info.  180Blu is a great new addition to when we stayed last. Great place for a digestif or just a beer whilst watching the sun go down. I would rather the valet parking charges and restort fees didnt appear separately. They add up to a lot of $$$. That would be my only negative. the valet service was very good though. Some good guys, especially Orion. So what if you have to WALK to the beach? The views are out of this world, and there is always
Manager Response: We are delighted you have found a home away from home!!  We greatly value your loyalty....thank you!  We will be sure to share your nice comments with Orion and Lauren. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon for a longer visit this time.

Summary: There are two things this place has going for it; excellent service and the ocean location. It probably was worthy of a 5 star rating a few years ago but it is more of a 3 for the rooms. I had an ocean view which was great but the room itself needed renovating.  I decided to splurge and was expecting first class accommodations and was disappointed to see stains on the upholstery and on the worn out carpet, rusted AC vent in my room. The bath tub had rusted fixtures and the towels were worn, not the 'fluffy' white luxurious you get in most 5 stars. Oh.....you know what I mean!! I looked into checking out, but read my fine print and I had purchased a hotel/air package with Expedia non-refundable. I am more than willing to pay top dollar, but then It needs to meet expectation of a
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  It is our highest mission to ensure each of our guests enjoys the best possible experience whether they are big or small.  We have an amazing kids program and extremely fortunate to partner with Jean Michel Cousteau with his exclusive Ambassadors of the Environment program - one of only three in the world!  We are also very excited for our upcoming room renovation starting this fall.  We will be enhancing our guest rooms and our public areas.  It is going to be fantastic and we invite you back to experience the enhancements very soon.

Summary: Let me preface my review with the fact that I personally have champagne tastes with a beer pocketbook.  Staying at the Ritz for us was a real treat and not something we would typically indulge in. My wife and I stayed for just one night, as we had a wedding in Dana Point we were attending.  Interestingly 7-8 years ago we won a one night stay at the Ritz at a silent auction and had never used it until this event.   The rooms were little more expensive by the time we wanted to use our gift certificate but I didn't mind paying the additional $100 for a night at the Ritz.  The property inside and out is beautiful and overlooks the ocean, we had one of their most inexpensive rooms which I think runs $600 a night, but the gift certificate took care of most of that expense.  I was
Manager Response: We are delighted to have created memories for you here at our amazing resort.  We look forward to creating more for you in the future.  We hope to become your new home away from home.  We offer many packages throughout the year that add great value.  We encourage you to visit our website at ----- when you are planning your next getaway.

Summary: Stayed here for my 40th birthday celebrations last year. Booked hotel via amex centurion which usually means you get special treatement at Ritz Carltons but not here. Check in staff did not seem to care- threw me a key and we were left to find our room. The room was ok- nothing special.  Hotel was very full- and felt more like a wedding factory. Food was over priced and serivce was awful. NOT A RITZ CARLTON!
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest comments.  We greatly value all of our guests and are fortunate to be partners with American Express Centurion.  We would like to discuss your stay with you further.  Please contact the Executive Office at ----------------.  Thank you.

Summary Heading: Apart from the ocean view - i'm unimpressed!
Summary: I was looking forward to my one night stay at the hotel with friends. My expectations were high; but it's the Ritz afterall and the rates don't come cheap!   A few incidents: - We were given wrong rooms (which was compensated with a complimentary 50$ per room) - I had to carry my own luggage - Staircase from our floor to the pool smelled very very bad - We were pursued one night by valet claiming that i had locked my car at the hotel entrance with keys inside...which of course was not true. I had to walk all the way to the entrance only for the gentlemen to realize he was mistaken. He duly apologized. - AC in the room was too loud and kept waking us up  For the amount of money we were paying, i was expecting perfection.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  The service you received is certainly not indicative of what our ladies and gentlemen pledge to provide to each of our valuable guests.  We would be delighted to welcome you back so you may experience our true Ritz-Carlton service.  Please contact the Executive Office directly for future reservation requests.

Summary Heading: Still the best: we will be back!
Summary: We have been coming to this property since 1994 and through that period the experience has been fantastic; We had rooms on the Club level where the service is exceptional; the staff superb and the leadership from Mary, Kathryn and Penni superb. Most of the staff have been there for many years and always remember you from previous stays. Although the Club is physically small by comparison with more recent properties the Club has deservedly been the best Club for the past three years.   The staff throughout the hotel could not have been friendlier. The renovation of the hotel some years ago has worn well and the restaurant Raya fills a very important gap in dining facilities in the hotel. Room service operates with Japanese style efficiency and is very good indeed.  The location
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review!  We value your loyalty to our resort and our Club Level.  We are so proud of our team on Club.  They deserve all the praise!  We've noted your idea regarding the laundry bags and will be working on a viable solution quickly.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon and creating more memories for you.

Summary: I see all of the great reviews, and perhaps it was just an off weekend, but we had a really rough from check in and it was followed up wtih just a mediocre experience.  So, the Good: Nice view - though the beach is a hike down and then back up.  However, there is a frequent shuttle Lobby - I loved coming in and smelling the plumeria scented lobby.  The decore is contemporary and romantic Pool staff - they were attentive and asked frequently if we needed anything and helped us find chairs together Beach Butlers - providing chairs/towels/umbrellas down there is a nice touch so you don't have to fumble with all of that, though it does seem like they should just set you up vs providing them as it is still a hike down stairs from where you retrieve them.  Ok, so now the bad: Room -
Manager Response: We were saddend to read your review!  But we greatly appreciate your feedback as it is very helpful in our efforts to continously strive for service excellence.  We would welcome the opportunity to show you what we are truly all about here.  Please contact the Executive Office directly and we will ensure your next experience is a true Ritz-Carlton experience.

Summary: The hotel is beautiful..flower's and beautiful painting's every where....up on a cliff.....but the coastal room we booked looked out onto a grassy field and under that was wedding's one right after the other going with NOISE... bushes on one side and a blue tarp on a roof.....could hardly call this coastal....(you did see the water in the distance)......also do not open your door because mosquitoes will attack and bite even though they say they do NOT EXIST(at least 4 bites)!!!!!!!!!....we complained and they upgraded us to an ocean view.....(saw the ocean but...NO PRIVACY....balcony was one foot from the other room with no solid divider.....we never sat there.....the couple next to us did though....LOL......NO MINI BAR.......just a cooler with nothing in it.......and to top it
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  It is very useful.  We do hope you choose to stay with us again in the future.  We have several packages offered throughout the year that add value to the normal room rate.  If we can be of assistance, please contact the Executive Office directly.

Summary: I really liked the casualness of this hotel.  Most Ritz properties have dress codes, can't walk through the lobby with shorts, bathing suits etc and tend to be formally decorated. You can see every kind of dress in the lobby from bikinis to  couture .  This hotel is more modern . The service is wonderful.  The room service gets the order  up immediately.    We stayed in the Monarch wing, which has  probably the least expensive rooms( convention rates)  but actually was very convenient to the smaller less crowded pool which still had bar/food/towel service.  The hotel grounds are wonderful for finding an adirondak chair to take in the view.   The  beach is down a big hill, however there is a  small transport that  runs continuously for the guests who don't want to walk.    Can't
Manager Response: Thank you for your very detailed review of our resort.  Our location ranks amongst the best in the world.  We are very proud of our ladies and gentlemen and the service they provide for our valuable guests.  We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: I was booked for a business meeting here Monday and Tuesday; I came up early on Saturday to enjoy the So Cal area for fun before my meetings. The hotel didn't disappoint (even with just a pool facing room) and my trip was very relaxing. Sitting by the pool, relaxing by the beach with supplied chair, umbrellas and towels or watching the sunset with strangers, it was a great experience!  The valet representatives are friendly, offer water and maps and make sure you're taken care of. Great hotel, great service. Laguna Beach, Newport and many other great places are just a short drive away.  Thanks for an outstanding trip!
Manager Response: We are delighted that you were able to enjoy some personal time along with your business.  We hope you have the chance to visit us again soon whether it be of business or personal nature.  Thank you for your nice feedback about our valet team.  They do an outstanding job and we will be sure to recognize them on your behalf.

Summary Heading: Lovely, Charming and Better than it's Been in a long Time
Summary: I've spent more than a collective year of my life in this hotel in the last 10 years, so believe me when I say this place is firing on all cylinders and running better than i recal it running.  My family and I were thoroughly impressed with some of the subtle updates improvements and simple touches that have been improved over the past two years. Prices are up here as-well but in-line with the season, the amenities and fair given the cost of maintaining this grand-dame.  The key here (to make sure you get the full experience) is to request a club-level ocean-front (not ocean-view) room or suite.  The best suite to that end is the old crown suite which is a fourth floor corner suite.  That suite can get noisy with the Santa Anna winds in the winter months but in summer it is just
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely review!  We are so fortunate to have local guests like you who truly appreciate the Grand Dame of the Southern California coast.  We agree, there are no better accomodations than ocean front, Club Level guestrooms!  They do book up so quickly...great advice!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon so you can enjoy the many more enhancements we have planned this fall.

Summary Heading: Great!  Not sure why there were negative reviews.
Summary: Great experience.  I looked at the reviews prior to booking reservation.  I almost got scared away.  Glad I didn't.  We only stayed two nights but it was wonderful.  It's not a new hotel and you could tell in places, but it didn't bother us.  We had a great time!  Main pool can be crowded.  Great to people watch though!!  Grounds were very nice.  Shuttle to take you down to the beach, which was very nice.  Wonderful service.  The restaurant is not my style and is very expensive.  But it's part of the experience and we had fun.  Very helpful staff - especially thought the pool staff did well.  By gosh if you wanted something they'd get it for you.  We don't stay at a Ritz often - so know this about this hotel.  There are some unique people that stay at this hotel.  It's CA so we
Manager Response: We take pride in solving and delivering on each of our guest's requests!  We will make it happen!  Thank you for the nice review and we look forward to being your new, special getaway experience.

Summary Heading: Idyllic location and great customer service
Summary: There's no question the location for this hotel is unbeatable.  Georgeous cliff-top views with beaches down below on either side.  From the gym all you see is a wall of water.  Truly amazing.  The service is first rate.  Every single person that worked there was friendly and aimed to please.  Obviouisly HR is on top of their game here, and it shows.  The grounds are immaculate and beautiful.  The beach caddy system was great and made going to the beach with a couple little kids half as much trouble as usual.  They supplied everything you need and cart it down to the beach.  Even took the shuttle back up the hill.  That was great.  The pool is nice, not spectacular.  They also have a smaller pool for kids.  The water is heated so you can go in anytime.  The rooms are fine.  Not
Manager Response: Our service will never waiver!  We care about you and all of our guests.  It is very important to us that you take home memories that you will never forget.  We hope to see you again very soon to enjoy another Ritz-Carlton experience.

Summary: Stayed for 4 nights for both business and pleasure.  Was able to upgrade at check-in to the club level which is really worth it.  Breakfast, lunch, snacks and drinks with amazing service, particularly Kathryn and Penny.  Outstanding!!!  They just need a couple of more terraces in the club lounge overlooking the beach.  The property is gorgeous with outstanding views and great service.  Everyone is helpful with a big smile.  Rooms are good size with decent furniture and are clean but the bathrooms could use some updating.  Separate tub and shower are now classic 5 star amenities which they need.  Fitness room is great even though the weather was so fantastic, exercise outdoors was the best.  The pool is nice, could be cleaner and a lap pool for swimmers is a much needed upgrade.
Manager Response: We enjoy providing complimentary upgrades to our valuable guests when we are able to.  Our Club Level is amazing and we will be sure to share your praise with Penni and Kathryn.  We agree that we need more ocean view terrace areas!  Our efforts are continuous in keeping our 27-year old resort in top-notch condition.  We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: The location is beautiful. A+ for the cliff the hotel is built on overlooking two different beaches.   Our ocean-facing room seemed in the small size, and was poorly kept (scratches on the wall, nails to jimmy-rig the chain holder on the front door, etc.). Smallish bathroom. The room had no refrigerator. We had housekeeping bring one in, but it was not stocked. C+ grade for a supposedly 5-star hotel.   The common areas for the hotel seems less than ideal. There is only one small outside balcony to enjoy the view with a cocktail. It seems like the hotel builder wanted to cram in more rooms instead of outside public areas. The inside public area is ok. The pool seems like a nicer Best Western pool - nothing to write home about. B grade for the common areas.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our resort.  We welcome and appreciate every piece of feedback we receive.  We will be undergoing a soft goods renovation this fall and we hope you have the opportunity to return to the resort and experience the enhancements.

Summary Heading: A great place with a spectacular view of the Pacific
Summary: We stayed at the stayed at the Laguna Niguel Ritz Carlton (near Dana Point) for two nights in July, 2011.  We had just come from more than two weeks in the French Polynesian Islands, so this stay had the potential for a huge let-down after our previous time in Paradise.  We flew into LAX, rented a car, and finally arrived at the hotel about 6 pm.  The hotel staff made us feel that we were very special.  It seemed that even though a number of people were checking into the hotel that evening, we were the people they were especially looking forward to meeting and greeting.  I don’t think that Bill and Hillary Clinton could have received a warmer welcome than we did.  We had reserved an ocean-view room, which was upgraded to the club level.  In talking with a number of staff, I was
Manager Response: We are so glad you have found a bit of paradise in Southern California!  We are delighted to be your new paradise.  You are very special to us and we look forward to welcoming you back so we may create more exceptional memories for you and your close-by family.  Perhaps you will choose to stay on our exclusive Club Level again.  Our Club Level has been voted the #1 Club Level in our company for the past 3 consecutive years.  Our team of ladies and gentlemen consider our Club Level as their home and eagerly await the chance to invite you in again.

Summary Heading: Outstanding Service - Coming Back Soon for Another Business Stay
Summary: I stayed at the hotel as part of a two-day conference (Jan 5th-7th) and was wildly impressed from the moment I arrived in dealing with the valet attendant to getting to my room.  The average nightly rate for this place is about $500 but with the conf I got it for a $250/night stay.  My room was a basic queen room which overlooked a garden area and not the magnificent Pacific as those rooms were considerable more expensive but I was offered to upgrade to that option at check-in.  This was hands down the single most comfortable bed I ever slept in as it absorbs your body, it was so awesome that I would love to get that same mattress for my own home.  The room was a nice sized offering but I did have one knock on it that I noticed right away and that was the state that the carpet
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you, thank you for the wonderful feedback!  We greatly appreciate your detailed comments.  We are anxious for another review from you regarding your subsequent business stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: We have just returned from the Ritz Laguna and loved it!  We had a coastal view room on the first floor and it was perfect.  The restaurants, food, pool, bars, beach are all top notch.  Watching the surfers every morning while we had breakfast was really neat! We were traveling with two children and this Ritz did a phenomenal job of catering to the kids!  There were beach balls and toys at the pool for them to play with as well as board games.  They received a bucket with a shovel, beach ball, a fun quiz and a few sweet treats from the hotel as well.   Lastly, the hotel provides complimentary beach chairs, boogie boards, sand toys, and bottled water which was really nice.    My only two complaints would be the $80 charge per child for their kids club.   Seemed a little high
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know that your children enjoyed their stay with us as well!  We enjoy creating memories for our littler guests just as much as we do for their parents.  We look forward to pampering all of you again next summer.

Summary: This hotel is defiantly the best hotel I've ever stayed at. When you stay at a Ritz-Carlton you know you're staying in the lap of luxury but this is beyond that. This isn't your typical Ritz. It has somewhat of a contemporary flair to it. The views of the Pacific Ocean are amazing. I've never seen anything like it. The hotel is located over 100 feet on a bluff overlooking the ocean. Everything about the hotel is amazing and it is of course reflected in the price which was around $500 a night for a two room one and a half bath room. It slept four and had a good size balcony. We weren't able to get a room with a view of the Pacific, and at first I was very disappointed. This all changed when I saw the view to the East. We were overlooking the larger of the two pools I had seen and
Manager Response: We are so appreciative of your feedback and are glad to know you enjoyed our more contemporary flair.  Our service, mission, and philosophy will never change however.  We will always provide warm, personal, excellent, and memorable service for our guests.  Thank you for your review.  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Driving into the parking lot we noticed the fire hydrant was painted gold. We should have known this was going to be a symbol of our experience for the next few days. Every single person on staff treated us like royalty and sincerely cared about our happiness and having a great vacation.  I especially loved having someone  set up our beach spot with chairs, umbrella, body board, towels, water and sunblock each morning. Take the trolley into town and avoid the parking. It's very convenient and a great way to experience the beauty of Laguna. We will definitely be back next summer.
Manager Response: You are very special to us.  It is our highest mission to provide each of our valuable guests with their very own personal and memorable experience.  We are delighted you enjoyed the magic of our property and the surrounding area.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We stayed here for a conference in mid april 2011.  We experienced a level of service unmatched by any Ritz Carlton or Four Seasons we've ever stayed at.  Every department at this hotel tries their utmost to make you feel welcome and pampered.   The rooms are quite large and beautifully appointed.   Ultra comfortable beds and bedding. Lovely, relaxing pool area and top notch fitness facility. The vistas from this hotel are stunning and the hotel is situated to take advantage of them. Sunset takes your breath away.   The food at the restaurants is delicious and creative and service here was 5 star as well.  We will definitely be coming back to this hotel for a family vacation in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review of our resort.  The sunsets are magnificent aren't they?  We are so proud of our location and environment, and our service and staff.  We are proud to be Ritz-Carlton!  We eagerly await your next visit and look forward to welcoming your children.

Summary: Just got back from our yearly business trip to Ritz Carlton Dana Point, which is only 45 minutes north of our san diego home.  I always enjoy going here because it is a beautiful property walkable to a gorgeous beach below.  This Ritz is a bit more casual than others i have been to and that appeals to me.  Pool area is in the interior of the hotel, which is a shame because it would be awesome if it had an ocean view.  We always ask for a coast view room, a bit cheaper than ocean front but still very scenic....great service, nice rooms and perfect location.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel is the perfect location for a "stay-cation", and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Aren't the coastal view rooms beautiful? We invite you to enjoy Raya, 180blu, Bar Raya, our exclusive Club Level Lounge, and our fitness center which all are ocean front areas in the resort when you return.

Summary: My wife and I stayed at the RC for our 20th wedding anniversary.  It was a very nice stay.  The Hotel is great and its location right on the beach makes it even better.  We were able to secure a "package" that included breakfast for two each morning, waiver of the resort fee, and waiver of the parking fee.  We upgraded our room to a partial ocean view ($100 extra/night) and it was worth it because you could sit out on the balcony and watch/listen to the ocean.  The service was impeccable.  We mentioned to the person who checked us in that it was our 20th anniverary and they sent up a bottle of champagne for us.  The gym is great- it has a large panoramic window that overlooks the ocean.  The only downside was that the rooms were not soundproof.  You can easily hear people next
Manager Response: Congratulations!  Thank you for choosing to celebrate with us.  We can't imagine a more romantic location to enjoy a special anniversary!  We look forward to welcoming you back for many more special events so we may have the opportunity to create even more memories for you.

Summary: The Ritz Carlton at Laguna Niguel is a nice property that has the polish of a fine hotel.  The hotel has a great setting (on the cliffs above the beach).  The views are amazing and it is well worth a trip down the hill to the beach.  The rooms had a great feel and the bathroom was a dream in white marble.  Very nice property, we will be back.  Make sure to head over to the charming town of San Jaun Capistrano (very close by car) to see the historic mission when you are here-it is beautiful.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about our resort.  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us.  We enjoy creating life-long memories for our guests, and we hope to welcome you back very soon.

Summary Heading: Wonderful staff and location - very nice to kids
Summary: We had a wonderful two night stay here with our two small children. The hotel upgraded us to a coastal view and little sweet treats were in the room and at the restaurant for my birthday. They gave toys to the kids at the Raya restaurant. Staff is so kind and attentive and the grounds are great. The kids loved the pool, koi ponds, bunny rabbits that live in the garden and the view is just amazing. We all loved the convenience of the golf cart ride to the beach and butler service that sets up chairs and umbrellas. They even gave the kids toy pails and shovels to dig with. The only recommendation to the hotel is to add a restaurant for more casual dining...something in between the pool side cafe and Raya in terms of sophistication. We loved the food at Raya and the kids were
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely review of our resort!  We enjoy catering to our smaller guests just as much as we do our others.  We are delighted you have found a new home away from home and hope to see you again real soon!

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel/ location, friendly staff, poor service,requests ignored
Summary: We loved the location and amenities of this hotel. Staff friendly. They will promise you everything you ask for, but doesn't happen. Requested no feathers before, during, and after check in. Had to call hk twice. Key didn't work, was stuck in hallway, no house phone to call, no cell service. Nowhere to buy ice cream or a candy bar after 9pm for the kids. Promised early check in when we called that morning and told room was ready, but had to wait 4 hours once we got there. Front desk offered to send up pizza restaurant menu which never arrived. Filled out survey after our trip, never got a reply.
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest feedback.  We value all of our guests' comments.  They help us in our continuing efforts to provide excellent service and follow-through.  We hope you will contact our office so we can secure all the details of your stay and ensure your complete satisfaction.  It is our desire that we correct the incidents that took place and welcome you back in the future for a most memorable stay.

Summary: one of the reasons to pay about $600 a night is to play safe and be sure to get a great room. we have booked a room and arrived at 11:30pm. the room that we got (2001) was next to the elvator engine room. each time someone used the elvator the noise was terrible. they had no other room to give us and at midnight we have start traveling in search for another hotel. it should be expected from a ritz hotel not to have such room or at least let you know in advance. we will not come again.
Manager Response: Please accept our sincerest apology for your disappointing experience.  This is certainly not the memory we intended for you to take with you.  Please contact our office directly at your convenience so we may discuss your experience and ensure you are completely satisfied with the resolution.

Summary: Stayed here for a short beach vacation - amazing service from the moment we checked in, staff friendly, attentive and so helpful. The views are amazing and the grounds beautiful. It is so peaceful and staff ensure you are well taken care of . Will definitely be back
Manager Response: Thank you for your simple and honest review of our resort, facilities, and service.  You have found a new home, and we are eagerly awaiting your next visit.

Summary: The hotel is about an hour (give or take with traffic or not) from LAX at the top of a hill overlooking the beach and ocean.  Surfers can be seen at all hours of daylight.  I had a pool view, which was not as nice and the pool area was a bit noisy with children's activities until 10p on a Thursday night.  The room is large and there is a balcony.  The decor is very modern.  Amenities include a flat screen TV and a DVD player, as well as wireless Internet service.  Room service is quick and the food is good.  There is a running trail with a lot of hills that starts at the hotel - a map may be provided by the concierge.  The gym overlooks the ocean and has most of the equipment you would need.  The lobby is beautifully decorated with fresh flowers in many different locations.  I
Manager Response: What a nice surprise to have photos posted of our guest rooms.  Thank you!  We are delighted you enjoyed your visit with us.  We hope you have the opportunity to return soon and visit 180blu again.  We are very proud of our new outdoor lounge....no outdoor lounge has a better view!  We will see you soon.

Summary: From the moment we arrived, my wife and I were treated like the hotel's only guests.  The associates took their time to welcome us back again and introduced us to the many new updated and upgraded areas of the hotel.  Every staff member at the Ritz-Carlton always smiled and made us feel comfortable!  Our guest room was spacious, clean, and filled with many amenities.  Our view of the ocean as well as the hotel's grounds was astounding!  The Ritz-Carlton is the perfect place for a getaway and reconnect time! The Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel remains the standard that all the new hotels in the area strive to imitate!  Bravo to all the staff at the Ritz-Carlton!!!!
Manager Response: We agree with you 100%!  The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel IS the perfect place for a getaway and reconnect time!  As you know, our staff prides themselves on excellent customer service surpassing all of our competition.  It is our pleasure!  We are excited to welcome you back to for your next getaway very soon. Thank you for your review.

Summary: My family and I are very familiar with the Ritz Carlton and have been coming here (as locals) and have known many employees over many years.  I stayed at the hotel quite a few years ago before newer management took over, but we regularly enjoyed several of the restaurants.  (BTW, it was an enormous mistake to remove the Grill Room without any comparable replacement!)  However, I now live nearby so I sometimes still explore the hotel and its grounds.  We recently came back from one of our walks through the hotel and the nearby park.  This is perhaps why we are so upset to see what once was a true destination resort overtaken by an absence of good taste in recent years.  Sure, there still appears to be a few good restaurants and the location is superior, but the decor is no better
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and feedback.  They have been shared amongst our executive team and our ownership.  We would be delighted to speak with you in person.  Please stop by the next time you are in the area, or give us a call.  Thank you again for your feedback.

Summary Heading: Very nice property and great service
Summary: Although there was a mixup in rooms when we first checked in, the staff was very accommodating. The views from the front of the hotel are beautiful, and the lobby and other areas of the hotel look recently updated. The bed was very comfortable. They allow travel with pets (for a fee) and our dog enjoyed her vacation as well.  Among the helpful people were Michael at the front desk and Josh the bellman. Lots of others but cannot remember the names.   The concierge recommended a few places to eat. We enjoyed 230 Forest and the Cliff in downtown Laguna.  The location is less than 5 minutes from Dana Point, and about a 10 minute drive to Laguna downtown.   I was impressed with the valet, they were very quick to get our car each time.  Overall it was a very good weekend experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post such a thoughtful review of our resort.  We greatly appreciate your comments about Josh and Michael and will be sure to recognize them. We hope you have found a new "home away from home" and we look forward to welcoming you back again very soon.

Summary: Perhaps it was a matter of managing expectations.  I went to the Ritz expecting something special and I got a whole lot of ordinary.  It was odd to see that the pool was in a courtyard instead of overlooking the ocean.  The bar was too small, with no seat to be found (maybe this review would be better if I had been able to get a cocktail!).  The service was mostly disinterested, as if they didn't feel like working too hard.  The hotel seemed to be newly refurbished, but something about it still felt stale.  On this beautiful coast, there are more impressive and special places to stay, and the Ritz should simply be skipped.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback.  We appreciate your thoughts and concerns.    It is always our highest mission to provide excellent service and facilities to each of our guests, and it would be our pleasure to speak with you further regarding your stay.  Please contact the Executive Office at your convenience at (949) 240-2000.  We look forward to speaking with you.

Summary: The only impressive thing about this hotel is the bill we got at the end of our stay.  The place is simply not very special for what they charge.  Please do yourself a favor and stay at the Montage - there is no comparison! There was really nothing wrong with the Ritz.  We stayed in a club room, which was perfectly nice (the oceanfront room, that is...the garden rooms present an intimate view of one's neighbors).  The club lounge was great with plenty of drinks and snacks throughout the day.  Other than that, nothing in this hotel was very wonderful.  The lobby is nice, but it seems like the architect missed something in designing this place.  Big lobby, but no room for a proper restaurant.  The only restaurant in the hotel is located in the hallway.  There are two pools,
Manager Response: Thank you for your very candid feedback.  We greatly appreciate all the feedback we receive from our valuable guests.  On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we hoped your stay would be flawless and beyond your expectations.  Our guests' comfort is our highest mission and we strive to create memories for our guests that will last a lifetime.    It would be our pleasure to speak with you further regarding your stay.  Please contact the Executive Office at your convenience at (949) 240-2000.  We look forward to speaking with you.

Summary Heading: beautiful down to the last detail
Summary: Beautiful property only made better by the stunning ocean views.  A short walk down the hill to the beach and for those who don't like the climb up the hill, get a ride from the Ritz golf shuttle.  Marble bath rooms and a bed like a cloud.  Don't miss a relaxing snack on the outdoor patio while you take in the ocean.
Manager Response: Thank you for the lovely compliments!  We look forward to welcoming you back again very soon!

Summary Heading: The Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel is just beautiful and the scenery is breathtaking
Summary: We rode our bikes to the Ritz Carlton. When we got there, the valets asked us if we wanted our bikes taken care of without blinking an eye. They also asked us if we wanted our luggage taken to our room. We were only there for overnight and had bike bags with us so we didn't need the help but there was no hesitation. The spa was very welcoming because they let us use the facilities without charge (and many hotels do). The room was beautiful and the tub was a lovely soaking tub. I loved it after the challenging bike ride. My only downside was lunch at the pool where the service was spotty and the food not inspired. Their regular restaurant (Raya) is very good and we loved going to the wine bar for cheese, chocolate, and pate! It is a joy to visit.
Manager Response: How fun that you rode your bikes here from Newport!  Isn't the scenery spectacular?  We are glad you were well taken care of with your bikes.  You are our most important guests whether you ride in or drive in!  Thank you for your feedback regarding our Spa and our Pool facilities.  We appreciate you taking the time to share your experiences with us.  Please come again soon!

Summary: This hotel has wonderful service and great views!!  I just enjoy sitting on the patio looking over the ocean.  The surfers show up every morning and stay all day at the beach.  It was a little cold for California, but we did enjoy the beach one day.  They provide nice beach service,  The exercise room is fantastic and has a wonderful view of the Pacific Ocean.  Lots of walking trails.  I would recommend the Concierge level, they have food options and drink options all day.  The hotel was very busy, so we frequently waited for our car.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review!  Our exclusive Club Level is a very special place.  Our team of exceptional ladies and gentlemen there have continued to earn the rating of #1 Ritz-Carlton Club in the world for three consecutive years.  We are delighted you had the opportunity to experience the finest personal service of our Club.  We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Nice resort,  but service team needs to ramp it up!
Summary: We stayed here for four days. The resort is large and within a few hours we learned how to get from here to there. The rooms are very nice, large bathroom and we slept well. Restaurants were nice and the public spaces - lobbies, lounges, patios, pool were kept clean and were enhanced with flowers. My gripes had to do with service.  At the pool, waited over one hour to have a waiter take a drink order. When asked for a drink he replied, "You're not in my section."  Every night we called for 'turn down" service to get towels and wanted the room straightened up. My husband said please come after 6:30. What was the result?  At 4:45 every afternoon, a woman - with a language barrier - knocked on the door with towels. We called housekeeping daily to let them know of this issue, and it
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our property.  We greatly appreciate all the feedback we receive.  We welcome the opportunity to speak with you in person so we may make note of your houskeeping preferences for your future stays with us.  Please feel free to contact the Executive Office.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The Great Stuff: This hotel is situated on top of a cliff overlooking the ocean and I think anyone would be hard pressed to find a better view.  The walk down the paved path to the ocean takes less than five minutes and for those who don't want to walk there is also a golf cart shuttle.  The beach is a very nice, public beach and has excellent surfing, boogie boarding.  The beach was not crowded and the sand was nice.  There is also a bike / running path that runs along the water then goes inland which was nice to run.  The best part of the hotel was the grassy area on top of the cliff overlooking the water.  The hotel has a line of lounge chairs to sit and look out.  Spectacular.  The concierge was very helpful in arranging a surfboard rental and restaurant choices.  Definately
Manager Response: Thank you for your very detailed review of our resort.  We always appreciate such valuable feedback.  We are excited for our upcoming room enhancements this year in which we will be adding high definition TVs to all of our rooms; as well as several other improvements.  We invite you to join us when the enhancements are complete and know you will appreciate them as much as we will.  Please feel free to make your next reservation directly through the Executive Office.  We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary Heading: Fabulous service matched by a magnificent view
Summary: A lot has been written about the Ritz Carlton vs The Montage on this website. I had a very hard decision about where to stay for a weekend in Laguna. As we live on the East Coast our outside options were very important to us. While we did end up staying at the Ritz, we had lunch and spent a little time at The Montage. I think we made the right decision for us. We stayed in an ocean front room and had breakfast included with our room rate. Both mornings we had breakfast on our balcony overlooking a surfing competition on Salt Creek beach below.The room service attendants were great and when my husband tried to move furniture around to fit the cart better on the terrace the attendant implored him to stop saying that the Ritz provides service that takes care of its guests. Our view
Manager Response: We promise to never let you down!  Thank you for giving us the chance to provide you with a unique, memorable and personable experience.  We will be sure to share your comments with Erin as well.  She is a wonderful leader.  We look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: I am staying at this hotel memorial day weekend.  I called the general number and asked to speak to the concierge, so that I could make Sunday brunch reservations, as well as book an appointment at the spa.  I made the general assumption that it is the concierge department who makes these arrangements.  Apparently, that is not the case at the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel.  The guy who answered the phone at the concierge desk couldn't have been more unhelpful.  When I stated why I was calling, he was like "Ok..." and seemed perplexed.  Since he seemed so perplexed and wasn't saying any of usual "sure, what time would you like for Sunday brunch?...," I asked if he was the right person to help me with these requests.  At which point, he said I should call the reservations department,
Manager Response: We are so sorry to hear of your difficult experience prior to arriving to our resort.  Of course that saddens all of us.  Please contact the Executive Office directly at (949) 240-2000 as soon as possible and we will assist you immediately with all of your needs.  Our highest mission at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel is for you to have a personal, memorable, flawless, and relaxing stay with us.  We look forward to welcoming you.

Summary: I traveled to the Ritz Carlton Laguna to celebrate a friend's special birthday. The staff rolled out the red carpet for us and were completely accomodating. My friend received multiple drinks on the house for her birthday, along with a bottle of champagne waiting for her in her room. The hotel was immaculate, the staff professional and extremely curteous. It was a perfectly wonderful experience.
Manager Response: Happy Birthday to your friend!  We enjoy celebrating birthdays with our guests.  We hope this becomes an annual tradition!  Thank you for choosing The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel.

Summary Heading: Crushed to report poor service after hearing and being trained on the legendary Ritz service excellence.
Summary: We are on day 2 of our 4 day Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel stay and have already had 2 meals  "comped due to poor service.  We didn't complain or throw a fit, just asked where our food and drinks were when over an hour had passed since we ordered poolside. This wouldn't be worth remarking on if it hadn't happened at dinner last night as well. It took over 2 hours to get our food...and our waiter offered free dessert without us having made any comment.  The service recovery is well done, but having attended at "Service Excellence" training conducted by Ritz Carlton staff...I was really looking forward to experiencing their difference.  They were giving advice to those of us in healthcare on how to inprove our patient experience.    Other than food service, all is excellent. Very
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know you experienced difficulties while with us.  Our management staff will be reaching out to you personally for more detailed feedback.  We want you to be completely satisfied with your visit and return to us in the future.  Thank you for letting us respond to your concerns.

Summary Heading: What you'd expect from a Ritz!
Summary: First off, the location of this hotel is simply gorgeous!!! Located on a cliff, the views of Laguna Beach, and north towards Dana Point are amazing. We didn't get to see a good sunset the week we stayed, but had the weather/clouds cooperated, I would imagine it'd be a great place to see one.   The room was simply fantastic. We had a King room on the 2nd floor, room 2050. It came with a partial view of the ocean, and looked out on a courtyard and a conference center. The room was great, very large, had most of the amenities, a very comfortable King bed, and a bathroom that was all marble, had his and her sinks, a decent shower and separate water closet.  The rooms were ALWAYS clean, the housekeeping staff did a superb job. Turn down service each night as well.  The overall
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review.  We are delighted you experienced our service and facilities for both business and pleasure purposes during your recent visit.  It is our highest mission that our business guests and our guests visiting us for leisure all experience the same excellent, precise, and warm service.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Please feel free to reach out to the Executive Office at any time for future assistance.

Summary: We just got back from four days at the Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel and our stay was amazing in every way.  Upon arrival, we were upgraded at no extra charge from a small suite with a garden view to an oceanview suite with an additional 400 square feet of space.  The service was impeccable- every morning when we set out for an off-property activity, our car was waiting for us by the time we made it to the lobby and the valet was quick to offer directions, cold bottled water, fresh fruit and lollipops for our three children.  The concierge recommended wonderful nearby restaurants that were both adult and child friendly.  We can't wait to return!
Manager Response: Thank you for posting this wonderful review about your recent stay at our resort.  We pride ourselves in providing personable and memorable experiences for all of our guests, including our smaller ones.  We await your next visit.  Welcome home!

Summary: I travel frequently, and have stayed in top hotels all over the world. From the valet parkers to housekeeping to the concierge, the service is amazing.  Some shoutouts are in order.   Thanks to Olga and Lucinda for working SO hard to arrange for wetsuits and surfboards.  Nick and Joe - you guys we so friendly and helpful when it came to setting us up on the beach.  To the nice people in housekeeping who brought me an entire bag of chocolates when my sweet tooth kicked in after dinner, thanks!  And finally, to just about everyone who stopped to ask my family and me how our stay was.   Truly, I cannot even imagine a more service oriented hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for commending Olga, Lucinda, Nick, and Joe for their excellent service.  They are stellar employees and we are very fortunate to have them on our team of fine ladies and gentlemen.  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: Earlier this month I booked a block of rooms for business colleagues who were visiting my company from Europe and the experience was excellent. The hotel was easy to work with and made all the arrangements to make my colleagues experience a smooth and pleasant one. The hotel staff facilitated weekend activities and managed transportation needs for my guests.  The rooms were excellent and my colleagues were very comfortable.  I booked a private room for a reception and a larger room for the lecture and both rooms were well staffed and professional. Although this hotel is often reviewed as a resort property, my experience with this hotel as an upper end business hotel was excellent.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your conference experience.  Our ladies and gentlemen pride themselves on providing excellent and memorable service to all of our valuable guests whether they visit for leisure or for business.  We look forward to having your business again in the future and promise to provide you the same level of service each and every time you visit us.

Summary Heading: Best Resort in California...Everything is more than perfect.
Summary: I can't even imagine a better stay at the beautiful Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel. The Resort is the best in California. Nothing compares to the dramatic views, the luxurious rooms, or impeccable service. Here is a short review of the Ritz-Carlton Laguna Niguel:   Room: Very Luxurious, yet very understated. We stayed in a Garden view room that overlooked the pool, and very much enjoyed it. I don't see why so many people say you must get an ocean view room... I loved this room! The bed was heaven on earth, the most comfortable bed, period. The Bathroom, like all Ritz Properties, is decked out in marble and is beautiful. No complaints of the room, it was Perfect!  Service: The best... Jordan at the front desk was very efficient at check in, He really did a great job. Valet Service
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write such an honest and thorough review of our resort!  We enjoy creating special memories for our guests to take home with them, and we look forward to creating more for you and your family in the future.  Welcome home!

Summary: I have to say, the sense of arrival in the lobby was amazing with the smell of fresh flowers!  The staff was extremely courteous and the resort dining was excellent. After recent renovations, it's nice to see the Ritz has moved away from the traditional decor, which could be found at any city center Ritz. The new decor was warm, comfortable and inviting. Knowing this resort has a long history of excellence, I had high expectations. It's not as though I didn't have a great experience, I can truly say I received better service and quality at a Hilton in Los Cabos the previous week. Hats off to the Ritz, but my nod goes to the Hilton Los Cabos!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post a reivew on TripAdvisor regarding your recent stay with us.  We greatly value your feedback and it is shared amongst our staff.  We are very proud of our enhancements here at the resort and are glad you enjoyed them as well.  We pride ourselves on providing the level of service that is amongst the best in the world.  We look forward to welcoming you back.  Please feel free to reach out to the Executive Office prior to booking your next stay with us and we will ensure your next visit is another true Ritz-Carlton experience.

Summary: This hotel is perched in such a spectacular location,will take your breath away. Hotel is very relaxing and comfortable,staff is amazing. We had the opportunity to have a few breakfast and lunches at the hotel,excellent food{Esp. the Rock Shrimp Quesadillas & Churros with hot chocolate dipping sauce}.  The 180 Blue outdoor patio was a welcome retreat on a warm day to enjoy the sea views and have a cocktail. Loved taking morning walks on the beach trails that seem endless.... We loved the Yappy Hour event that took place on the Ritz lawn one evening,fabulous concept and made up for missing our dog back home..... Thanks for all the Ritz and Relaxation...Your the Best!
Manager Response: Thank you for your very warm review of your recent experiences at our resort!  We are delighted that our staff created a memorable visit for you.  Thank you for attending Yappy Hour.  We are so excited to be catering to our special four-legged guests as well.  Yappy Hour is the first Thursday of every month.  We hope we have the opportunity to welcome and meet your dog in the near future!  On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we are honored to have your business and we greatly value your loyalty to our resort and brand.

Summary: My wife and I stayed here recently for a little "get-away" after I returned from a deployment to Afghanistan.  When the management learned of my recent return they instantly upgraded us to one of the nicest rooms in the house.  The staff were entirely courteous, generous with their time and resources and superbly gracious. The entire stay was a much needed respite and I left refreshed and relaxed.  I so impressed I immediately made reservations for another Ritz Carlton stay in the next month. I loved this place!
Manager Response: On behalf of all our ladies and gentlemen, we are delighted you had the opportunity to relax and rejuvenate upon your return home.  Staying at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel is a very relaxing experience.  Thank you for sharing your experience.  We are delighted to welcome you back very soon!

Summary: The service was fantastic.  We've been coming to this hotel every year for the past 7 years and it's amazing.  When we pull up to the entrance, the staff remember us and even have sand pails/toys ready for the kids.  There are goodies in our room ready for us. We usually get adjoining rooms and it works well for the 6 of us.  The rooms are spacious, very clean and the ones facing the ocean are on par with the garden view ones.  Thre staff is friendly and the best thing is that they never say "no".  They always manage to find a way for any request that we have ever had.  the location is great.  close to LAX and even closer to John Wayne airport.  The hotel is picture perfect.  A nice drive down the coast to either LA or San Diego.  Great for taking a bike ride down the south
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your valuable time to post this lovely review!  We pride ourselves on creating personable and memorable experience for our guests.  We thank you for your loyalty....it means alot to us and makes us strive even harder to be the premier worldwide provider of luxury experiences.  We await your next viist!

Summary: I am here at the resort.  I have used Trip Advisor many times to guide me in property selections, and I have never posted a review.  I feel as though I should put my experience out there for others who are considering this property,   I had such anticipation as I consider The Ritz to be a premiere resort. Unfortunately, the experience has so far been a disappointment.   I have traveled here with my family for a nice, relaxing vacation. We have stayede at the Montage twice and many other high end resorts.  Check in:  We checked in yesterday and there was a huge conference winding down.  Once we made it through check in, we were asked if wanted to upgrade our room to ocean view for an additional $100 per night.  We upgraded, and then had to wait 2 1/2 hours to get our upgraded
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest feedback and concerns.  We greatly appreciate you taking the time to provide your review on TripAdvisor.  Of course, we are naturally disappointed that your experience was anything less than perfect.  We value you as our special guest, and are greatly disappointed that we did not have the opportunity to speak with you while you were with us to ensure we fulfilled and exceeded all of your wishes and needs.  It would have been our pleasure.  We feel we have an exceptional team of ladies and gentlemen who truly care about our guests' experiences. Please feel free to contact our office directly to further discuss your experience.  We hope to have the opportunity to recreate your visit again in the near future.

Summary: I recently stayed at this wonderful hotel and went to the spa,unfortunately I did not have a good massage and told the spa manager of my experience. She handled the matter very prompt and that topped  my wonderful experience at the hotel...There should be more people that love their jobs with a passion like she does.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting a review about our Spa and staff on Trip Advisor.  We always enjoy hearing about our employees.  We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to our Spa in the near future.  We know your next Spa experience will be a true Ritz-Carlton Spa experience.

Summary: This is the most beautiful hotel with wonderful personal service. Sean O'Neil, the reservations manager, this year as in our previous stays did all he could to provide us with a luxurious comfortable room. He went out of his way, as did Francisco, our waiter, Daniel at the front desk. Our only exception to perfect service was the petite dark haired young hostess at Raya who was disinterested in finding us a table and quite snippy. But, otherwise, this week was perfection and we will most certainly return. Dr. Judy
Manager Response: Thenk you for your feedback.  As you know we strive to always provide the finest personal service for our guest who will always enjoy a warm, relaxed, yet refined ambience.  It's always gratifying to read such wonderful comments about our staff.  We will be sure to provide recognition for them.  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary: Just spent three days at this property on the club floor. The property is beautiful, set high up overlooking the ocean. The club lounge was good, but not as good as the ritz San Francisco club lounge. Service was very good, although the valet service was slow at times. Food at the resort is excellent. Exercise facility was very nice, but could have used more elliptical machines.   My biggest issue with the property is the rooms. Apparently, they were recently remodeled, but are really not very nice compared to other ritz or four seasons. The rooms are small, bed was too soft, bathroom was lousy. The bathroom marble is circa 1985, it has a tub/shower combo with a shower curtain and no rain shower. Ugly!  The public spaces, restaurants are all wonderful, but the rooms are just not
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review.  We value all of our guests' comments.  Your feedback assists us in our continuing efforts to be the #1 provider of luxury service and experiences.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future to experience the new room products and enhancements that we will be implementing this summer and throughout the remainder of the year.

Summary: We stayed at the Ritz Laguna Niguel last fall to celebrate my 50th birthday.  It was spectacular.  The hotel is impeccable, the service is wonderful, the grounds are beautiful.  We stayed on the Club Level and the staff was unbelievably attentive.  They had a array of food that was beautifully presented, fresh and delicious.  Each time we would leave the room and return, a new selection of items would appear.  If there were any beverages that you desired that were not stocked, the staff would find them for you.   Our room was overlooking the ocean and the view was magnificent.  One evening we dined at Raya.  The food was delicious and the view was amazing.  Very romantic.  I would stay at the Ritz Laguna Niguel again in a heart beat.
Manager Response: Happy Birthday!  We are delighted you chose us to celebrate with.  We enjoyed creating life-long memories for you and look forward to creating more for you in the near future.  We are very proud of our exclusive Club Level and enjoy hearing our guests' feedback about our exceptional staff.  We will see you soon!

Summary Heading: Beautiful location, Gorgeous Hotel, Exceptional Service
Summary: I got married at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel this past October and our entire experience with them from start to finish was exceptional.  They were extremely accommodating and went out of their way to make our experience perfect.  The service was phenomenal and our guests were treated very well.  Many of our out of town guests stayed at The Ritz and they all commented on how beautiful the grounds were and on how much they enjoyed their stay.  I definitely plan on returning -- most likely on our one year anniversary.
Manager Response: Congratulations!  We are pleased you chose our resort for your wedding!  The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel is a very special place to celebrate weddings and anniversaries.  Thank you for your wonderful comments.  We look forward to welcoming you back for your 1st anniversary!

Summary: I am a regular client in this hotel. It is only 1 hour and half from LA. So, for me this hotel become a little get away from crazy life style in LA. I like it because it has a one of the best locations in CA. It is a great place to have a wedding ceremony.  I can’t say I like the food in this hotel. That is why every time I’m there I am having a dinner at Mastros Steakhouse (15-20 min away from hotel). SPA is good. They have a nice Ashiatsu, that is rear to find in this area.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about our resort.  We value your comments and feedback.  The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel is the perfect place for a close by getaway.  It gives us great pleasure to create memories for you and our guests no matter what the occasion may be. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: Every year we stay in the hotel. I can't say anything bad, the hotel is just perfect, it's like a second home for our family. The stuff is very friendly and professional, they really pay rersonal attention. Can't wait to come again!
Manager Response: Welcome Home!  We look forward to creating more memories for you again very soon!

Summary Heading: WOW factor! The Ritz on Dana Point is the perfect setting!
Summary: We arrived at this hotel with nervous anticipation.  It was a "get to know you" business trip after our beloved firm was purchased by another firm.  We were immediately put at ease buy the new firm's travel staff and the Ritz staff as they took our bags, took us to a reception, and fed us what was to be the first of many delicious meals prepared by the Ritz's amazing dining staff.  Were then ushered to our Club Garden Executive Suite, the largest and most well appointed rooms we've ever had on one of these trips.  We quickly changed out of our travel clothes and walked around the property to become familiar with it.  After a bit, being drawn to the ocean as always, we walked down to the beach.  Looking back at this beautiful hotel was like looking at a post card...picture
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review.  We always enjoy hearing from our guests and appreciate your feedback on your experience.  We look forward to welcoming you back again very soon.

Summary: Ritz Carlton in Dana Point was beautiful. We stayed there because my work had our holiday party in one of the ballrooms. The next morning we had breakfast/lunch at the Raya restaraunt . It was a delicacy. I would suggest the ocean view room. Room was clean, comfortable, and homely. Would definitely return. Totally worth it!
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving your comments on Trip Advisor.  We are delighted you have found a new getaway and we are excited to welcome you back very soon!

Summary: This hotel is in a great spot, quite with amazing views of the ocean. The hotel itself is nice but when we visited, things in the room seemed a bit shabby. Additionally the staff really missed the mark. I have a package shipped to the hotel and called prior to arrival to confirm that they had it. When I got there it took over an hour for them to figure out what I was talking about and finally bring it to me. When we were checking in, I had my arms full of my laptop, purse and a couple other bags and the door staff didn't bother to help while i struggled to get the front door open. We were there to relax & the hotel's occupancy was not that high....where did we get put? Right on the garden courtyard area that had a wedding start at 10am, music and all which completely negated the
Manager Response: Thank you for your very detailed feedback.  We take all of our valuable guests' feedback seriously and sincerely regret that we did not meet your expectations in some areas of the resort, but are delighted you had an overall enjoyable stay.  Our caring staff strives at all times to provide service excellence and your feedback is definitely useful for us.  We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for a true Ritz-Carlton experience.  Please contact the Executive Office directly for future assistance.

Summary: The hotel is truely a great resort. Just physically its a gorgeous property with beautiful lobby with marble and flowers. Hallways and rooms are elegant and classic with some modern details. The grounds are beautiful and the fitness center is great with a great view. o yes, the restaurant had just breathtaking views and walking around the property is fun. The staff is great. Jesse the valet, Drew at reception, Teresa at the gift shop, and a very sweet hostess at Raya. I think her name starts with an A, she was very young and so sweet, sorry that I could barely see her name on the tag because it would have been awkward to keep staring at her name tag. The housekeeping staff was also so pleasant and professional and whenever a staff member sees you they greet you, all around
Manager Response: Thank you very much for such a wonderful, detailed account of your stay with us.  We appreciate your time in posting it on Trip Advisor.  It was our pleasure having you as our guests and we look forward to creating more memories for you in the near future.

Summary: This hotel lived up to expectations (see earlier reviews and pictures).  However, the club level lounge is the very best we have ever experienced for food presentations and drinks (know well what other locations offer).  If you have never tried a Ritz Carlton club level, this is the one to enjoy.  We were slightly disappointed, though, with the hotel's unusual design in utilizing next to no ocean view in the club lounge.  There are two smallish sets of windows.  They are floor to ceiling and one opens onto a little balcony where two people may sit.  Otherwise, there are only two tables in that room (another room has tables and sofa centering around a fireplace with garden views) which have even a partial view of the ocean.  Virtually every other club where we have stayed has
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback on our exclusive Club Level services.  The Club Level at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel has been voted the #1 Club Level within our company for two consequetive years!  Thank you for your loyalty and we are excited to welcome you back home very soon.

Summary: I stayed here with my husband after our wedding. The hotel itself is beautiful. we had a beautiful ocean view room and we even took some after wedding portraits around the hotel grounds. My only complaint is that the walls are thin and we could hear all the outside hall noise and neighbors tv in the morning. other than that, this hotel is fabulous with great service.
